column1: Bunny Rabbit. Mara loved her bunny rabbit. Mara didn't know how to train her rabbit. Her mom tried a few times. Finally her mom found out about some training methods. Mara was finally able to train her bunny.
Good Terms. Jane and Ray were walking around the park. Jane asked Ray to play tennis. Ray said no. Jane offered him a place to sit and eat. Ray gladly agreed to sit at her table.

What And Itch. Lucy had a horrible skin condition. She would itch and itchy all the time. Lucy didn't have a lot of money so she had to rely on her mom. Her mom tried to get her to stop scratching. Thankfully, Lucy's mom finally got her to stop scratching.

Empty Club. The boys were bored at school. They decided to go to the empty club to talk. After a few minutes, nobody wanted to talk to them. They decided to go home instead. They didn't have a good time that day.
Wrestling. Tim was always the best wrestler at school. He was invited to a local tournament. He practiced hard. Tim defeated the other wrestlers. He got first place.
Magical Fruit. Mia's grandma always put a magic fruit in her apple pie. Mia's parents hated it. When she was twelve they hid the pie. The fruit did not appear. Mia learned her lesson.

Schedule. Cameron got a new job today. He is in charge of planning the office day. Today is the first day of the office. Cameron has a lot of work to do before he can start. He will get to work tomorrow.

Candy in the dirt. Sophia wanted to have a candy treat for Easter. She took out all the ingredients in a bag and mixed them together. Her sister saw her doing it and laughed. She pointed the bag at the ground and laughed again. Sophia's sister went to find the ground and scooped all the candy.

Robins cruel exit. Robins family moved from their small town in the north. Robins loved his new town and was excited to go home. Once in his new town he was not very good. His first day in town was rough. After a few days of this, Robins family moved away.

Good Fences. Travis was trying to make some good neighbors. He put up the old fence. He bought some metal strips to put between the two sides. He used those strips to create a good looking fence. Travis was happy to have done something good.

Carnival Games. My kids went to the carnival last Saturday. We played games for about 30 minutes before going home. We also played lots of games for an hour. We had a lot of fun. We had a lot of family fun that day.

New Neighbors. Jim's neighbors were moving. They moved from the city to the suburbs. Jim couldn't wait to go visit his new neighbors. He spent his time watching the news and playing with his toys. After he got home, he was sad that he never got to go see his new neighbors.

The Face Wash. Liza got a face wash for her birthday. It was brown, so she was excited to try it. But it was so bad that she couldn't eat anything for a week. She eventually gave up. Liza had to throw it out, and tried the new bottle instead.

Bill started a company. Bill was a software developer and wanted to sell a new product. He searched online for other vendors that he could hire. He read about many companies, but none appealed to him. He found an ad that offered great rates and got the job. Now Bill is happily running a successful software company.

Pool. Sara was taking a swim class at the pool. They were swimming laps to build strength. Sara dove into the deep end of the pool. Sara splashed all over the place. Everyone laughed at Sara's antics.

Megan sees a ghost. Megan was scared at her house. She was getting ready to go out to work. She wanted to be alone. She went to her bedroom and put on a pair of flip flops. The flip flop made her feel calm.

Francine Has her Ears Pierced. Francine has been looking for a new job. Francine's ears are in constant need of a piercing. Finally she finds one that will let her choose her earrings. She pierces her ears as an art project. Francine is glad that she has a new job.

Penn. We used to watch the Penn and Teller show together every Saturday morning. My parents always told me it was not real and they were just actors. I finally confronted my parents about it one night when they were out. They told me it was a tv show and not real. We finally told our parents and they laughed.

Flower Shop. I went to the flower shop today. I bought my flowers. When I left, the owner asked me what kind of flowers I like. I didn't know what to say so I just gave him my answer. He smiled and said he likes flowers.

Shoes. My friend Sam bought a new pair of shoes. They fit him in his new size and he loves them. His feet hurt so bad from the shoes. Sam has been asking for a new pair for Years. He will be glad to get another pair of shoes.

Spare Change. Sara was at the corner store and stopped at the soda fountain. She asked the cashier for a change and was told no. Sara asked the cashier if she could use his change and was told no. Sara told the cashier to take his change and she wouldn't have any. The cashier took the change and gave it to Sara.

Balloon Fight. The kids made a game out of making balloon animals. They all got their balls out and started tossing them up into the air. Suddenly, the balloon caught one of the little balloons. The other little balloons began to fly away in all directions. After ten minutes, all the little balloons were gone.

Stripley. My brother bought an old stripley from an auction. He is about seventy-five and retired. He loved the old car. I told him that I thought he should keep it. He said he had already lost interest.

Milkshake. Jenna needed a milkshake. She got out all the ingredients from the freezer. She made a delicious one with peanut butter. She drank the whole thing in one sitting. She was glad she had a milkshake on the house.
Vintage toy. Tina got a vintage toy. She was not sure what it was. She opened it up and was amazed. It was a real character. It really stood out to her.

New Underwear. Linda had to get new underwear. She went to the store and picked out three pairs. The first pair she tried to wear didn't work. The second pair she tried the same way as the first. Finally the third pair she bought worked and fit her perfectly.

The Psychology of Grades. Amy was assigned a work project to complete for the final grade. The teacher told Amy that she should study psychology to prepare for the project. Amy was reluctant to take the project but she followed the teacher's advice. When Amy got to the project, Amy studied hard and she wrote a great report. Amy's work was recognized by the teacher and Amy's final grade was a A.

New Dog. Lena was taking care of her friend's dog. It was very big and strong and used to chew everything. She was happy when the dog became a loyal family member. But unfortunately it also got sick a few days later. Lena wished it had never met her friend.
Music Band. Sam was an awesome guitar player. He knew all the chords. He played them often at school. He got asked to play on his school's football team. Sam was so happy to do it.
The Concert. I wanted to go see a concert. I did not have enough money. So I decided to make a deal with the cashier. He gave me $5. I went see the concert and it was ok.

Dinosaurs. My son's teacher said the students could make their own dinosaurs. He had a large wooden box with lots of bones to play with. He used some of the bones to build a dragon for his class. The dragon was large and scary, but he won first prize! I won second prize with my dragon building kit.
Pickles. Tom's mother told him not to pickle his vegetables. He did it anyway. He gave the pickles to his friends. One of them dropped the pickles. Tom got sick and had to go home.

Raking Leaves. Bob was raking leaves in his yard. He noticed a bunch of seeds stuck in the leaves. He removed all of the seeds from the leaves. He began to plant seeds into the dirt. Bob was happy to have a new crop.

Dangerous Campfire. Mike's brother invited him to stay at his cabin. His brother was trying to start a campfire. Mike's brother was not sure if the fire would be ok. Mike didn't want to hurt his brother's feelings. So Mike told him to not do it since the fire was dangerous.

Bianca Dyes Her Hair. Bianca notices that her hair looks greasy and frizzy. Bianca decides to dye her hair to make it look better. She goes to the salon to get the dye. After the dye is applied, she looks in the mirror. Bianca is happy to see her new hair.

Dancing. Tom and Kim wanted to impress their friend Sue. They decided to put on a show at the club. Their friend Sue was skeptical of the performance. Sue agreed to go and see the performance anyway. Her face lit up when she saw them dancing and had a great time!

Buying a New TV. Jake had an old TV that kept breaking down. He decided that it was time for a new one. Jake went to the store and picked out the best looking one. The next morning, Jake set it up and enjoyed watching TV. He was pleased with his new TV purchase.

Deaf Kid. Dan was an elementary school student who was deaf. His classmates teased him because he was deaf. One day Dan was playing basketball in a crowded gym. Another student yelled, pointing at Dan's hearing aid. Dan felt embarrassed and never told his parents about the incident.

Race. It was time to run the race. Jim had a lot of distance on him. He started to run slowly and steadily. It took Jim an hour to get to his goal. It was worth it though because Jim made it to the end.

The Puppet Show. The kids liked to make up silly characters. They made one of a cowboy and a mermaid. They gave it to their parents for the holidays. The parents loved the characters. They had so much fun the kids ran around the house playing.

New Hobby. The school year was ending and it was time for me to do something fun. I decided to go to the pet store and look at all the animals. I chose a dog, a cat, and a snake. I got home, unpacked everything, and put it on the shelf. I went back to work a few days later and loved it.
No Jumping. Beth got home from school. Her husband had an accident on the way home. He broke his hip. He is in the hospital now. She has to wait to get him home to jump him.

Comparison. I decided to ask my neighbor what he thought about my outfit. He said he thinks I looked nice and he liked my shoes. I felt offended. We were about to argue over this. My neighbor didn't say a word about my outfit.
seafood. Sammy was at the beach. He wanted to eat some seafood. The beach was a big seafood place. He decided to go for some tuna. Unfortunately, it was not good at all.

Burritos. The Smiths were tired of trying to cook food. They bought a food processor and bought burritos. They cooked them for an hour and it tasted amazing. The Smiths ordered one more burrito and ate it too. They loved the food so much they kept eating and ordering burritos.
Spinach. Anna loved spinach. She didn't know how to make it. She bought some spinach from the store. It wasn't fresh enough. Anna had to buy another batch.
Exercising. Tina worked out everyday. She decided to get in shape. She started lifting weights. It really helped her gain muscle. Tina was happy with her results.

New Year's Resolution. I vowed to exercise a little less. But I had a difficult time doing so. In the third week of the year I had to exercise more. It took a long time but I finally managed it. My exercise had improved my quality of life tremendously.

John Buys An Umbrella. John wanted to stay dry on a hot summer day. John went to the store to buy a new umbrella. John went to the garage and retrieved an old umbrella. He put the umbrella in the car. John drove home with the old umbrella.

Embarrassing Mistake. Janet was walking to work. While running to get to her car, she tripped. Janet began to cry on the sidewalk. The news came and they took her to the hospital. Janet had a broken leg and was very embarrassed.

Greenery. Mia liked to plant things. She didn't plant anything too big. One day, Mia saw some grass she hadn't seen in a while. She realized she had forgotten about it. She planted more grass in the summer.

The Weight Loss Expert. Nina thought she was healthy because she lost 15 pounds in one month. But when she went to her doctor, she was horrified. The doctor told Nina that she needed to lose more weight. She followed the advice she was given and lost 20 pounds in one week. Nina felt so proud of herself because her doctor was right!

Library Book. Cindy was about to finish up a paper for school. She decided to get a book to help with the assignment. She went to the library. She got to the book section and found a few more books. Finally she was done with her paper and could go home.

Low Blood Sugar. Tim was feeling sick. He wanted to eat something to make him feel better. He decided to eat a sugary soda. It wasn't enough and he started to feel dizzy. He eventually had to call out of work and take medicine.
Broken Nose. I was walking through the park. I felt a sharp pain in my nose. I looked down and saw that I had broken my nose. I ran home to get my mom. I went to the hospital and had my nose fixed.

Eternal love. Anna was in love with her boyfriend, Fred. But she knew he loved her best, and they argued often. But the more they argued, the more they fell in love. Soon Anna had decided she couldn't stay with Fred! He loved her, but she was so happy - she never liked him anymore!
Lost Phone. Tim dropped his phone. Tim looked for it for a while. Eventually he realized he lost it. Tim got a new one. Tim dropped his new one as well.

Eviction. Tom's girlfriend was evicted. She had to move out by herself. Tom was not sure he could take care of her alone. Tom hired a private investigator to look for a new apartment. Tom found a nice apartment and moved in with his girlfriend.
Thunder. My kids love playing in the rain. They love running around in the mud. Today we got to play in the thunder. It was loud and loud and we had a great time. We are glad we did it.
Lost poncho. Yesterday I lost my poncho. I looked everywhere for it. I was able to find it. But I couldn't find it anywhere. So, I gave up and put on another poncho.

Swim. Nora wanted to take a swim in the lake. She bought a bathing suit and a bathing cap. Nora went to the lake and set up her swim gear. She put on her bathing cap and swam into the water. Nora enjoyed a nice swim.
Sticky. Kim was trying to clean up her couch. It was sticky. Kim used the sticky stuff to make a floor cleaner. When she was done she got down on it. It was still sticky.

Mother. Kate didn't have any friends growing up. One day her best friend introduced her to her old school friend. She met this old friend while riding her bike around the neighborhood. The two began talking everyday after school. Now, they are very close friends!

ID. One day, a teacher was checking in a student. He found out that the student had lost her ID. The teacher asked to see the ID. The student said she couldn't because she didn't have it. The teacher was angry, but allowed the student to go.

The Inheritance. Haley is a middle aged woman who is having trouble finding work. She decided to sell her home and move to the suburbs. Her brother gets the deed and she sells her car to move. She sells the car and buys a house to live in. She lives in the house she bought and is happy with her new life.

Mike Drinks White Wine. Mike decided to drink a glass of white wine. He opened a fresh bottle from the bottle store. He tried a sip of the wine. The wine tasted great! Mike is happy to have drank a glass of white wine.
Broken Bike. Jim was riding his bike. But suddenly he felt a sudden jerk. His chain snapped. And Jim was stuck. He had to call for a tow truck.

The Blind Date. I went on a blind date with a man named Jim. The date went well for a couple of days. The date got boring so Jim took me out to dinner. I had a great time with Jim at dinner. He picked me up and we went out again.
The Stormy Day. Bill was watching a movie. Suddenly, lightning started to hit. He could feel the wind pick up. Bill ran outside. The storm had passed but he was still cold.

White Cast Christmas. I had been working hard on my christmas wish list. Suddenly, I got a call from my neighbor. She had a white cast on her hand. I immediately rushed over to see what the issue was. Thankfully, it was a scrape, and my neighbor was not hurt.

The volleyball accident. Ava was playing volleyball with friends. She was running hard and trying to be fast. Then she dropped the ball and her elbow went into her shoulder. Thankfully Ava's doctor saw her and made an x-ray. The x-ray showed that Ava had a small puncture wound.

Turtle Fears. Dylan was a pet turtle that lived in a house on the farm. One day while in his cage, he began to run and jump off. The entire cage was shattered and everything was strewn. The vet rushed him into surgery and said he was paralyzed. They still treat him but Dylan is not as happy as he used to be.
Shoelaces. Jim hated wearing shoelaces. One day his mother told him to. He had to go to the store to buy some. Jim was sad when he had to take them off. The shoelaces did not get a problem.

Easy mac disappointment. Tina decided to make her very first mac. When it was done she took it home. To her dismay though she couldn't find the recipe. She called her friend who told her that she found the recipe. Tina was able to get the ingredients on her own.
Puppy Litter. Kim was cleaning her house. She was taking out the garbage. She didn't see a puppy in the garbage. Kim was surprised. Kim decided to leave the dog alone.

Old Friend. Jane was watching a movie about ghosts. Her friend asked her about the ghosts. Jane said that ghosts did not exist. Her friend told her about a ghost story. Jane got upset and refused to talk to her friend.

The Easter Parade. My family went to the Easter parade last Easter. We saw the whole parade route. There was also a marching band. My cousin's class performed in the front of the crowd. It was a fun family tradition.

No Littering. The Jones' cat, Spot, never bathed. One night the Jones were sleeping and they heard a weird scratching noise. Spot was on the floor scratching himself. The cat didn't leave the floor for a week. Eventually the cat left the floor and the Jones were relieved.

Ham Sandwich. We used to go to the local pizza shop, but I could never get a good sandwich. Then I found a recipe for a ham sandwich and decided to try it. I followed the recipe, making a large sandwich that tasted great! I decided to make it again, using fresh ham. It was the best ham sandwich ever!

Confession. Rory was in a lot of trouble. One day, his parents tried to hide a secret. One of his teachers saw him writing his name in the book. Her and her friends made fun of Rory for having a secret. Rory broke down and confessed the truth to his parents.

Janet. Janet loved to wear her fancy boots. Every time she went out, someone complimented her boots. She was always the first to get help on the steps. She started a blog in honor of her boots. People kept writing and Janet loved the attention she got.
The fishing trip. Tim was at the lake with friends. They all caught many fish. They all ate the fish. They decided to go home. Tim and his friends were happy.

Rex Drinks Tea. Rex notices that he is getting tired all of the time. He decides to drink some tea. Rex feels better after drinking a cup of tea. Rex is glad that he drinks a cup of tea. Rex is glad that he doesn't feel tired anymore.

Scared Teddy. I decided to hide behind my brother to watch the thunder. I heard thunder and started running. I tripped over a step and fell on my face. Teddy was so scared that he jumped up and ran away. It scared me when he left and I went back to hiding.

Power Outage. My parents decided to cancel the power in the house. It went out and the house was dark and cold. We sat on the floor while the house was dark. I was not used to the cold and I was freezing. I went inside and went to sleep.

A new hobby. Liz loved reading fantasy novels. Her favorite was the Mistborn series. So she decided to start reading the series. She read the first book in three months. She loved it so much, she decided to read every single one!

Photo. Eli found a picture of his grandmother on Facebook. He decided to share it. His friend liked the picture. Her friend told Eli her grandmother is dying. Eli decided to stop sharing pictures of his grandmother.

The Deadline. Gus got to work at his desk. He wasn't really doing anything but he wanted to get on with it. Then, the whole day passed and he couldn't find his chair. Then, he found the chair he had been looking for and he was done. Gus finished his work on time and was very proud.
Wine tasting. Tom had never tried wine. He decided to go with friends. They all got drunk. They decided to go to the tasting room. They all had a good time.

The bed. Diana's bed was falling apart. She went to her family's home and asked to borrow some sheets. At first, the mommy agreed and let her borrow the sheets. After a few hours, Diana decided to use the sheets. She didn't care that the sheets were dirty or old.
The saxophone. Tim was practicing. His saxophone started to skip. Tim played it with his mouth. It stopped. He replaced it with an electric one.

The Farm. The family went to the farm. They planted many seeds. They worked very hard to grow their crops. When summer came, the family gathered their crops. They prepared food for themselves and their family.
Outside the Window. Jim was very happy with his new job. He liked to work outside. He had a lot of fun. However, he missed his dog very much. He was sad for a while.

Making it gluten free. I recently decided to go gluten free. I purchased some great gluten free oats. I went online and bought the gluten free oats. I went to the store to buy the oats. I am now making my own gluten free oat drinks.

The plane trip. Today was the first day of the trip. I really wanted to see the mountains. My son and I bought a plane ticket to Hawaii. On the way to the airport we saw two planes go by. We didn't get to see the mountains.

Jen's Game. Jen was the best gamer in school. She wanted to be a professional gamer. She practiced everyday for her big event. In the finals, she was able to beat all her opponents. She won the game and went on to the big stage.

More Alone. When I was younger I was always picked last at recess. I was always picked by other kids who were much smarter. I was able to do pretty well on the team at recess but not with others. It wasn't until middle school that I was picked by my own team. I still wish I had practiced with the others at recess so I could be better.

Theme park excitement. The week before Christmas we went to the theme park. My parents had gotten me in the car and we were going straight to the park. It took us two hours to get there and a half hour drive back. I enjoyed every minute of it. By the time we left, I was so tired that I fell asleep and missed the whole trip.
Futsal. John wanted to play football. He was new to the sport, though. He practiced every day. Finally he was able to go out and play. John enjoyed his new hobby.

Bluebirds. In early spring there would be a small flock of birds flying around our yard. We would always watch the bluebirds fly in and out. They were beautiful. When they went into the woods we would pick them up. Sometimes we would put them in baskets and give them to the kids.

The Trip. Kara was so excited to go on her first vacation! She packed her bags and got on a plane for the trip. On the plane, Kara saw people on the ground all sick. The doctor told her they were all very sick, and she didn't have to go. Kara was very upset, but she had no choice because she couldn't fly.

Carnival Ride. Brett got a carnival ticket for his birthday. He went on a rides. Brett was on the most rides in the whole carnival. After a long ride, he got ready for bed. Brett never went on a rides again after that day.

Lost Throughout the Process. Jasmine was walking down the street. She saw someone in a suit standing at a bus stop. The man asked her if she needed help with anything. She politely declined and told him to leave her alone. Jasmine thought she got lost in the middle of town.

The Murderer. Bob had been on death row for 25 years. He saw a lawyer and convinced him to get help. He went to his first trial and didn't do well. He was found not guilty and was released. Bob started a career as a lawyer and got the death sentence reversed.
Home Run. Ken was playing baseball. He was trying to hit a homerun. He was swinging hard at the ball. He managed to hit the ball with all his might. It ended up going in the stands.
Greg Visits the Zoo. Greg decided he would visit the zoo. He took his wife with him. They both loved the zoo. The zoo had several lions. Greg had a good time at the zoo.

New Shoes. Jane's favorite pair of shoes were no longer in her closet. She looked online for a replacement pair. She went to the store and asked for a pair. The store owner said no and that she could not sell her shoes. Jane was upset but determined to find the perfect replacement.

Cole. Cole is an American football player. He is also very arrogant. His team is going to win the Super Bowl this year. His team is losing by ten points and Cole has to throw a touchdown pass. He throws a perfect pass that gives his team the win.

Shirley Temple Doll. I bought a silver Shirley Temple doll. I decorated her with a large hoop earring and a large gold bow. She has a lot of personality. She also has lots of funny phrases. I hope she lives forever.

Patty's Sleepover. Patty woke up early one morning. She told her mom she wanted to have a sleepover with her friends. Patty and her friends made all the beds and made some food. When Patty and her friends got to bed they fell fast asleep. Patty woke up when they were all asleep, crying.

New Shears. Tina bought a new set of scissors for her home. She loved them until she saw the sharp point on her palm. She pulled hard to pull the scissors out. She screamed when she saw it was in her palm. She had accidentally stepped on her husband's razor!

As I Sit Here. Gina sat on the back porch with a bottle of water. She lit the bottle and went inside to talk to her friends. She sat for a while on the porch and had a chat with a friend. She went back outside to see if they were still talking. Gina got into her car and drove off.

Going to School. Fred was going to his first day of high school. When he got to school he was nervous. He stayed behind in line to be sure he wasn't late. When he got to class he realized his new friend was there. Fred and John became best friends.
Hit. John was running away from home. He got hit by a car. John felt badly. John went to the doctor. He got a shot to the leg.
The dog. Ava wanted to have a pet dog. She decided to get a dog. She went to the dog pound to get a dog. She found the perfect dog, the poodle. She had a wonderful new dog.

Fears. John had an intense fear of heights. He tried very hard to avoid heights during the day, but it was impossible. On vacation he hired an air conditioning expert to help him. The expert showed him the best way to overcome his fear. John successfully conquered his fear of heights!

Driver. I'm a terrible driver. I can barely drive a car. When I try, I can get it right to within ten feet. Unfortunately, I often cannot get it back. I'm afraid to get behind the wheel on my own, but I must try.
Man's best friend. Mike had a dog named Buddy. Buddy did not have a collar. Buddy got loose from the man's house. Buddy was found by a stranger on the street. Mike now has a new dog named Mikey.

The First Birthday. The first day of school was in two weeks. My little sister's class invited all of her friends. I did not know if I wanted to go. My mom took me to the playground and showed me around. My little sister and I were so happy and I went with her.

The fair. Jill and her family went to the fair for the first time. They were excited and eager to see all the animals. They bought lots of food and played games. The kids loved riding the rides. They couldn't wait to go back.
The Bison. The family took a trip to a national park. They saw many animals there. The family decided to try the biggest bison. It looked big and majestic. The family loved the bison.

A Good Samaritan. It was a very warm and sunny day. I was waiting on my friend to come to the door. I decided to jump in front of a car as it was driving by. The driver stopped and had a look and stopped his car. After that I was thankful for my good deed.

Pictures. One of the most important tools in the kitchen is a set of picture frames. I bought a set of ten in 2004. It took me three months to find a good store and a job. In the end, I finally was able to find a job at an antique store. Now I have a nice set of frames and a good career.

Appendicitis. Gina wanted to learn to play a game she was playing with her family. She found an app for her phone that would teach her to play. But she kept falling and rolling her eyes. It was a chore, but she kept trying. Eventually she was able to make it fun and a lot of fun.

Money. Sam was going to make a big money deal today. He had to sell a ton of his possessions. He started by selling his favorite car. His car was worth so much money, he didn't want to sell it. He kept the car instead and made his deal.

Genre Disagreement. Teddy was feeling a bit bored. He decided to go on YouTube to look for inspiration. He searched for various genres he enjoyed. His results gave him a variety of ideas for his next album. Teddy had a great time listening to many genres of music.
For a Five. The teacher gave her the test. The student got very nervous. She missed the questions. She kept studying and didn't pay much attention. The teacher allowed her to retake the test.

Sardines. Bob was hungry. He went to the kitchen to buy a can of sardines. He found the sardines in a can and brought them to the table. His wife came and got the can, but was too busy to eat it. Bob decided to try to cook instead.

Too Curious. The teacher took his students out to lunch. I thought it was going to be fun. I forgot to look up the menu in advance. When we arrived, everyone began to eat their food. It was a lot of fun.

The School Fight. Tim had just started high school. The fights were happening all the time. He always tried to avoid them, but it made him mad. One day he finally got in a fight and got very hurt. He vowed to never get in any more fights.

Video Game. My friend and I were playing a video game. It was an online game we both had a lot of fun with. The game became increasingly more difficult. When the game ended, he said he didn't win. My friend wasn't happy I beat him.

Milkshakes. My friends and I went to the local Dairy Queen. We all ordered different kinds of milkshakes. Afterwards, we had a huge party. My friends and I had a ton of fun. It was one of the best nights of my life.

Bad Haircut. Tom had just gotten a haircut. He was very unhappy with how it turned out. He decided to take it to the barber. When he got to the barber it was cut worse than before. Tom decided to never go to a barber again.

The New Airplane. One day, the Wright Brothers got a patent on a new airplane. Their new plane flew faster and higher than ever before. The Wrights were very proud. They used their new airplane to build a new airport in Philadelphia. They had a successful airport that they named after them.

Bruised Knees. I broke my leg on a trampoline on a trampoline park. I sat down in a chair and cried. I started crying more as time went on. I then broke out in a rash. I still do not know why I got injured on the trampoline.
Heavy Belly. The man lifted the heavy bucket of tomatoes. He placed it on his back. The next day his stomach was full of pain. He went to the doctor. He found out he was constipated.

The STained Glass. Ethan was cleaning up the dishes. He found a shattered vase. He cleaned it up and found blood. It was stained with red paint. Ethan was grounded for a week for not cleaning the glasses.

The pregnancy prank. Diana was getting a surprise pregnancy. The whole family was in shock. Everyone was telling her she was going to have twins. Diana was getting sick of it. She decided to just ignore it all and stay normal.
Special Treat. John was a child actor. He was getting an acting role. He tried his best to act his part. Unfortunately, he gave up the part. John learned his lesson.

A Ship Without Direction. The man sat on the deck of a sailing ship. The ship was moving too fast. He decided to put the ship into reverse. The ship began to move backward. The man decided to leave the ship.
Bad decision. Ava went to the mall with her friends. They got into a big fight. Ava fought back. Her friends decided to let her leave. Ava is no longer allowed to go to the mall.
Unicorn. My girlfriend bought a pair of exotic unicorns. They came in a box. She told me they were beautiful. They looked like real animals. She said she would be happy if I wore them.
Egypt. I took my family to see a Broadway show in NYC in 1997. My son wanted to see Egypt. The show was really bad. It started to rain. I had to take my family home.
Office job. I decided to work in an office. The office was very crowded. I had to work long hours. I worked for the whole month. I was glad that I decided to work there.

Wrong Number. I used to have a friend named Jeff. We used to go to the same restaurants. Jeff always ordered the same thing for dinner. I asked him what he wanted for dinner once. He said he wants to watch TV, so I bought him a dvd.

Summer. John wanted to play baseball but was too small to play with other kids. John saw his friend, Joe, a little kid playing baseball. Joe wanted to play baseball too. John and Joe decided to try out for the school baseball team. John and Joe went on to become the best baseball player in town.

Ants in the Keurig. The Keurig coffee machine went into a stall and started brewing. The worker told them there was ants in the machine. The workers asked if they could have the Keurig outside. The worker put the machine outside. The Keurig pest control came and sprayed it out.
New Pet Toys. Tina wanted to get a new pet. Her dog was starting to get old and overweight. She wanted a dog toy. She found a dog toy in the pet store. She got the toy and her dog loved it.

Baby Girl. My granddaughter is going to be a nurse for the first time this week. My wife and I took her to the nursing station. She fell asleep when she got into the chair. When she woke up, we realized she had lost her cap. We were surprised but understanding as we had to take her back.

Party. Kelley invited her friends to her birthday party. She was excited, but she didn't know what to expect. She got dressed and got the food and drinks ready. The girls had a blast. Kelley had a great time.

Fear of Flight. I was terrified of airplanes in high school. When I was 18, I learned to fly a plane. My parents told me if I didn't like it, I could cancel my plans. I didn't want to leave my friends and parents. So, I left my flight plans for 3 months.

Expensive Chocolate. Jim bought a chocolate bar from the grocery store. He couldn't afford it so he threw the bar away. Jim kept the chocolate bar in his garage until his mother bought it. Jim made a large chocolate bar for his mother and gave it to her. His mother loved his chocolate bar and the two became good friends.

Forgetful Roll. Tom decided to make a big breakfast for himself. He went to the store and bought the ingredients. He followed the recipe and got the ingredients together. After making it he noticed it was missing a few ingredients. Tom realized he had made it the wrong way.

A Second Job. Gina worked hard at her job for six months. She was very stressed about her paychecks and hours. She worked extra hard one day in the morning. Her boss noticed and offered her a second job. Gina agreed and was thrilled to get another paid day off.

kittens. Anna and her mom bought some kittens. They brought them home and started giving them some milk and food. They named them Nala and Poppa. They all liked to play together, and they played every day. Soon, Anna's mom was full of kittens and fed them every day!

Power Steering. Dan didn't want to get out of his car. He couldn't believe how slow his car was getting. He pulled over to the side of the road. His mom got out of the car and drove over to help him. After that Dan always let his mom help him drive.
Getting The Pointe. Bob was playing with friends at the woods. They needed to make a pointe. They put some wood on a tree and went around it. It was difficult. Bob had to quit.

Hot air balloon fire. The man put the balloon up high in the sky. The balloon was a hot air balloon. The balloon started to float out of control. It went over a forest and caught fire. The fire spread so fast that it burned out the whole balloon.

The Perfect Steak. I wanted to make a steak to take to the grill. I tried different cuts, but none of them were perfect. My friend suggested I try a rare steak. He gave me a medium rare steak. I was thrilled and had the best steak I ever had!
Trouble. Ethan had a lot of money. He was playing online poker with friends. Someone else decided to bet all of Ethan's money. The other player was very smart. He beat Ethan to the punch!
New Lipstick. Kate wanted a new lipstick. She found a great pink lipstick. She decided to buy it. It wasn't the prettiest lipstick in the world. But it was the perfect shade.

Grouping. A group of friends were bored at the park. They decided to play basketball. The first team to make ten baskets won. They played basketball all night. The winners were not certain of who won.

Hot Summer Day. It was a hot day outside. James went outside to play. James fell from his basketball hoop and hurt his arm. James went to the doctor to see if he could play basketball again. James was able to play basketball the next day.
The Science Fair. Jane was good at science. She entered into a competition. The contest was about making models. Jane made the best model. Jane won first prize.

Etsy Business. Mary was selling homemade items on etsy. She had a new t-shirt design. She made it available for sale on the site. Mary was pleased to have a few sales. The t-shirt sales continued to increase.
New shirt. Tom wanted a new shirt. Unfortunately it was already sold out. He was disappointed. However he was able to get one. It ended up being his new favorite shirt.

Bad Traffic. Kia was stuck in traffic at a red light. But she decided to just keep driving, so she was late. A car pulled into the intersection and started to turn left. But Kia's car slid into the other car's passenger side. Luckily, no one was injured.

Help paying. I was looking to get some new headphones. I needed help with them but I didn't know where to look. I asked around but didn't have any help. Finally I decided to ask my cousin for help. She was able to help me out with the headphones.

Charles and the Rose. Charles had a pet rose that he loved very much. The rose grew old and Charles decided to give it away. He gave his pet rose to the Humane Society. The Humane Society took care of the rose for many years. Now Charles is very happy with the way his pet rose is going.
Broken ipod. Alicia was listening to her ipod. She dropped it by accident. The screen was cracked. It wasn't repairable. Alicia had to return it to the store for a new one.

Gas Money. I was driving a friend from California to Boston. I had just arrived and he was upset because the gas money was low. I told him that it was always difficult to get gas money in California. I also told him I had never seen anyone get gas money so cheaply. He realized that was the reason for his outburst.

Shot Put. It was the first race of the day. I was nervous as my shot putter was ready for competition. At the start I did a terrible throw. The judges disqualified me. Now I'm going to have to learn to practice for next year.
Ice cream. The boy went to the ice cream shop. He ordered vanilla bean and chocolate chip. He got the chocolate chip ice cream. He got the vanilla bean ice cream. The boy got a chocolate chip sundae.

Stuck Kite. Liam took his kite out to fly. All of a sudden, it got stuck in a tree. Liam tried using his feet to get it down. After many attempts, Liam could not free it from the tree. Liam's kite had to be removed and was destroyed.

Rosie. Roxy and Bob went to school together. Roxy had always been scared to be alone. So, she hid behind Bob in the locker room. She thought Bob wouldn't notice her. But, Bob saw her and kissed her, shocking her.

Miranda fights a cold. Miranda is in the hospital recovering from the flu. Her doctor orders her to stay home all week. She is nervous but hopeful. On Friday Miranda gets her flu shot. She is much less nervous for the rest of the week.

The Movie. One day Jane took her son to see a movie. She had decided that the movie was so scary that she wouldn't go. Jane was nervous she wouldn't like the movie, but the movie was very scary. Jane decided to go through with her decision. She ended up liking the movie.

Snowdrifts. Tom lived in the snowy wilderness. Every winter it was always very snowy. Tom was walking around one day and saw a slide. Tom was frightened but was able to escape. He never found out how it got there though.
Rain. It began to rain all day. Sam had a raincoat and a hat on. Sam decided to go for a walk in the park. When he came home, his raincoat was soaked. Sam vowed to buy a rain coat.

Jack. Jack was an old man with many grandchildren. One day his grandson came and asked him if he could come visit. Jack agreed to the visit but had a big fight with his grandson. The grandson was so mad that he killed his grandfather. Jack's grandson then killed himself.

Mugry. Mugry the cat is a very sad cat. Her family has always tried to get her to smile more. Unfortunately her smile only lasts a week. She will still smile however she will be more sleepy. Luckily she has a good mate named Cog.

Bad Hike. Gina had just finished hiking one day. She heard a car pull into the parking lot. She hurried away from it, as her friends were waiting. When she turned around the car was gone. Gina wasn't sure why she had gotten in the car.

Rapper. Teddy wanted to be a rapper. He would rap all day in his room and try to make music. One day he was invited to a studio to record. He tried to rap but he was horrible. Teddy decided to just be a professional rapper from now on.

Getting a Haircut. Sandy was nervous about going to get her hair cut. She was worried that she would mess up. Her dad drove her to the barber. After that, she was comfortable. Sandy was pleased with how it looked afterwards.

Favorite Game. Tom's favorite game is basketball. Tom loves watching basketball games on TV. Tom decided he would watch a new game this weekend. He bought a ticket to watch a game of the new NBA game. Tom was happy to be in the stands for the game.
The free brownies. Alicia and her sisters were starving. They needed something to eat. They ran to the store. They were shocked. There were free brownies everywhere!

War Times. The city had a lot of war casualties. The mayor had an idea to get the injured soldiers out. The soldiers got out of the war. They went to the doctor to get medical care. The doctors treated the soldiers and the city was saved.

Orange Zest Water. Kate loved orange juice. One day she was trying it out in a glass. The orange was too green and it tasted weird. She tried to stir it into the water. However it tasted fine but it was too tart.
Lightbulb. The town hall was having a power outage. A man had a lamp in the town hall. It didn't work. He ordered a new one. He bought it.

The Decorations. The girls had been decorating for Easter for weeks. They had hung colorful eggs, lights, and other Easter decorations. They put some of the decorations up in their room. Then they decorated the door. They were so excited to decorate for the big day!
Socks. I wanted to buy socks. But I didn't have enough money. I couldn't afford to buy socks. So, I looked for other ways to get money. I decided to earn money on my own and then buy my own socks.

Sneak Attack. I found a pair of pants at the store. They were in poor condition. I decided to sneak into the store and steal them. I went into the dressing room and was shocked. I found that the store security had caught me!

Filling the Post. Barry wanted to write a story for the school paper. He decided to start writing about the new girl at school. Barry wrote about how she was very smart. He wrote a nice story about the two of them. The story was very popular and Barry was able to get the story in.
The Snowball Fight. Bella was playing on her snow slide with her friends. They were having a snowball fight. Bella was caught by her friends. She then fell off her sled. Luckily, she was okay.

Clyde gets into a fight. Clyde was getting into a fight with some kids. They were throwing punches all around him. He wasn't paying attention and swung his arm at them. The kids all laughed and threw more punches. Clyde got knocked out and never spoke to them again.

The Vaccine. Tim was taking his daughter to the doctor. He told her she needed to be immunized against whooping cough. It turns out she didn't know any whooping cough people. She had to go to a different doctor to get the shot. Heather still didn't know anyone who had the disease.

The Rap. When I was little I listened to my favorite rap artist. He rhymes about my life and how I am going through some struggles. He gave me some advice that helped me with my troubles. I started listening to his music all the time. Now I know how to have a successful career too.
Lights. The man turned the light on. It was on the wrong setting. He checked the manual. He got it right the first time. The neighbor's garage light came on during the night.

Boat Trip. When we went on vacation we took our two sons to our cabin in the lake. We had some nice time and relaxed. We had been there almost two months and they had not gotten on the boat. They did not want to sit in the backseat anymore. The boat was so much fun and we were glad to be back at it.

Dan goes to jail. Dan is in jail for robbing a bank. His wife tells him he has to do more. Dan does not listen and stays out past curfew. He is caught and sent to jail. Dan is proud to have been caught and let go.

Football. I had never played football in my life. I decided to give it a shot and I decided to join a team. I joined the school's football team. We practiced everyday. I made some friends along the way.
Sprained Ankle. Tom was at work. His foot was hurting badly. He decided to run and then take a break. He ended up spraining his ankle. Tom ended up not being able to work in the morning.

The USS Hornet. The Hornet had been the best battleship in the world. During the battle of Midway, the Hornet was hit by a torpedo. The Hornet exploded in flames. The captain and crew all survived. The Hornet was a shining example of the military's might.

Vision Changes. Aura had always had blurry vision but now her vision was getting worse. She went to the eye doctor and they looked into her options. They recommended that Aura have her eyes examined. The doctor gave Aura some glasses and contacts to wear. In just a few months Aura's vision had improved.

Confession. Jane was having doubts about her religion. So she decided to go to church. Jane heard a woman talking about her doubts. Jane realized that the woman was talking about her. Jane decided not to go to church.

Lice. Tom noticed lice on the girls he was dating. He didn't know how to treat them. Tom's friend suggested he get rid of the lice. Tom decided to go through with the task. Tom was glad to have rid the lice off.

concert. A couple had their first concert at a local venue. The sound was terrible. The crowd was so loud they couldn't hear the music. They got out of their seats to scream. Finally the security man removed the obnoxious crowd.

Career Opportunities. Landon graduated high school. He knew he wanted to make a difference in the world. He decided he wanted to be a lawyer. He applied to several law schools. He finally found one he could apply to.
Gross teeth. I went to the dentist to have my teeth taken out. He took out a bunch of teeth. I had to get my mouth filled with some stuff. It cost a lot of money. I had to get my teeth fixed.

steak throw. Dan wanted to throw a steak. He thought he was very good at it. He took out a small steak and put it on the grill. After about 10 minutes, the steak was burnt. Dan decided he should take a lesson.

No Fish. Ginny didn't like to cook. Her friends insisted on her eating seafood every day. She realized that seafood was unhealthy. She decided to cut the amount of fish she ate. Now, Ginny doesn't like to cook at all.

Greens. Jane wanted some spinach for lunch. Jane went to the grocery store to get a pack. Jane brought her spinach home. When she got home, she made a huge mess. Jane decided she would not eat spinach for lunch.
dress. Sara had a party for her friends. She bought a nice dress. She put the dress on for her friends. Some of them liked it, but some didn't. Sara felt very unhappy about the party.

Marriages. We live in a big city where people get married more often. One day a couple came into my apartment and wanted to get married. We told them we would need a second opinion. They did not believe me, so I was shocked when they got married. We live in Texas and not New York, but still do have people get married.

Racoons for Dinner. Bobby wanted to be a professional raccoon hunter. He went to the store and bought a bow and arrow. He set out into the woods with his bow. Then he took the raccoons he found to the back of his car. Bobby finally had a kill!

Rattle and shake. The woman made a big batch of chili. She couldn't figure out how to shake the chili. She tried a few methods and none worked. Finally, she tried shaking it. It worked great and she was happy.
A Dog's Life. My daughter brought home a pit bull today. He is 8 weeks old. We took him home because we were worried about him. He sleeps with us most of the day. My wife calls him Papa Bear.
Octopi. I went to the pet store today. I bought two octopi. I brought the octopus home to my house. My parents were upset because they hate octopus. They made my dad put the octopus in a jar.

The Car Mechanic. Dennis is tired of his car breaking down. He thinks he can fix it himself. He buys new parts and starts repairing them himself. He fixes the problem but it breaks again. He calls a mechanic and gives up.

Jake's Dog Chases A Squirrel. Jake was walking home from work. He saw a squirrel in his path. Jake stopped and waited for the squirrel to pass him. After a while Jake saw a bigger and more aggressive squirrel. Jake ran home.
The Hatching. Eve and her family were at the park. Her mom wanted to get out of the house. She went inside. She found a bird egg that she had forgotten about. It hatched and she was very happy.
Computer Day. Tim was having a computer day. He picked up a new laptop. It needed a lot of software installed. Tim followed the directions. The software was installed very quickly.

Example Essay. Kate had an essay to write for the class. She wrote a bad essay about a friend. Kate's teacher graded the essay. The teacher told Kate that the essay was not good. Kate did not get any credit for her essay.
Balding. Bob was very balding. Bob had to get a hair transplant. He had to get it done in a hospital. Bob didn't feel well for weeks after. He decided to stop getting hair transplants.

Weight Troubles. Cindy was always overweight. One day she found out her doctor was a dietician. She started dieting and losing weight. Her doctor was so helpful that Cindy became a very healthy weight. She now feels so happy and accomplished with her life.

Birds. The family went out to feed the birds. They saw a lot of little white birds. They fed the birds and kept them safe. The next day, the family went to the same spot and saw a lot of big birds. They brought the little birds back.
Lunch time. It was lunch time. I hadn't ate all day. I decided to go for a walk. After walking, I noticed my wallet was missing. I decided to check my pockets before I walked home.

Moon Shine. I was driving home one night, bored. I looked up and saw a beautiful moon shining brightly in the sky. I got very lost and drove home until I noticed a light ahead. A truck was leaving from a garage behind me, I pulled over. My sister turned the light on, and I was able to see the moon shining well.

Silent Movie. Ruth was sitting in a dark movie theater. She noticed something moving on the screen. She stared at the movie for some time. Suddenly the screen went blank and a woman stood up. She said she was in the movie and they were just watching some silent movies.

Designing Women. Caroline had always wanted to be a graphic designer. Her dream was to make her dream come true. But her parents and siblings would not let her become a graphic designer. Caroline went to school for graphic design, but did not excel. In high school, she decided to become a journalist to make a difference.

Neti Pot. I wanted a new neti pot for my apartment. My friend has one and said I could borrow hers. I asked her for help with finding the right pots. She showed me a few pots and we went to the store. We found the pots, bought them and put them in my neti pot.

The Courthouse. Ned and his dad were going to court. They went to the courthouse, and got a good look at the building. Ned's dad told him it was a large courthouse, and they were going to be there. Ned and his dad filed into the courtroom. Ned and his dad went to court, and were both arrested.
Don't Pull Me. Nate ran into someone in a bar last night. The guy was a bit too aggressive. He pulled Nate by the ear. Nate screamed at him and asked to speak to a manager. The guy left.
Mean girl. The bully always made fun of the girls. She would yell out what a man was supposed to say. It made me very uncomfortable. I decided to just ignore her. But she kept on bothering me.

Shopping Dilemma. Jane went to the store to buy a new hat. When she got to the store, she was frustrated. There were no hats for sale. Jane took the shopping dilemma personally. She didn't mind the hat, but left disappointed.

Healthy Sleep. Nate had a lot of stress in his life. One day he had to go to a doctor to get some tests done. He fell asleep during the exam. He woke up with blood everywhere. Nate realized that stress is the root of his issues.

New Car. Joe was tired of buying cars and couldn't afford them. He decided to quit his job. Joe bought a new car and a truck and headed to a new location. The new location was in a far away state. Joe was able to buy a new truck for a good price and he was happy.
Runaway dumpster. Toby had a trash bag. It was full of cans. One day he put them in the trash bag and left. The trash bag was lost in the park. Toby had to come back and get it the next day.

Francisco's Feeling Sick. Francisco's stomach was really hurting from all the food he had been eating. He started coughing and throwing up a lot. Finally Francisco went to the emergency room. The doctor ran some tests on him. The doctor gave Francisco antibiotics to help him.

Too Long, Didn't Read. Nate had been in the Army for a long time. He was always a little bit too careful with his gun. His dad noticed the trouble he was having with his rounds. His dad sent Nate out on the range. He helped Nate shoot for several hours.

Baby Changes. Mary was pregnant. She went to the doctor to schedule an appointment. The doctor said she was in the right place for a cesarean section. Mary cried when the doctor took her into the operating room. But when she was out, her baby was just like any other baby.

Truck. I bought a new truck today. I took the truck out to the salt flats. I put my truck in the salt and drove it around for a while. I didn't realize how hot the salt was. I was sweating and started to cry when I went home.

Foot the Bill. My wife has always wanted a car for her birthday. On her birthday she gets to take her birthday wish. Her parents get her a car. She drives it out to the car dealership. My wife is very happy about her birthday gift.

basement. Amy lived in an apartment and hated her upstairs. She tried to get it done. She went to the basement to have her walls painted. When she turned the corner she slipped and hit her head. She was rushed to the hospital but thankfully she was okay.

Couch and Chair. Travis ordered a new couch and chair online. He was hoping they would arrive within the week. The next day his couch and chair arrived. It was a very high quality couch and chair. Travis was very happy with the purchase.
The Loft. Kelli loved to take pictures. She had an old loft to rent. It was small but she enjoyed it. It was perfect for taking photos. Kelli loved her new place.

Electric Shock. Tom was playing video games at home. All of a sudden his power went out. He tried his phone to find his signal, but it was spotty. He eventually had to call a repairman to get it fixed. He was able to play his games afterwards.

Lost Hat. Jim was at the park with his friends. Jim's hat fell off while they were playing. Jim tried to find it again but couldn't find it. His friends came up to him with a new hat. Jim thanked them for their new hat.
Drunk Driver. Ava was a college student. She was at the bar and drinking heavily. Ava tried to drive the wrong way down the road. Ava was pulled over. She was busted for driving under the influence.

It Leaked!. Kelly was making chili and had to use a measuring cup. When she got back, she noticed her chili had leaked. The lid had fallen off. Kelly tried to fix it but it leaked again. Luckily she was able to get it back before she burned herself.
nurse. Kelsi is a nurse. She works in the neonatal intensive care unit. One night, a baby died. Kelsi was horrified. She had to quit her job for a few weeks.
Johnny Goes Swimming. Johnny decides to go swimming. He goes to the pool. Johnny gets in his swimsuit and swims. Johnny gets back in his swimsuit. Johnny swims all day.

The Nightmare. I was sleeping one night. Suddenly I had a nightmare about a shark in my room. I woke up screaming and jumped out of bed. I ran downstairs to get a flashlight. The shark was there and I saw it was just my mother!

Sweet and Spicy. I took my dad to a Mexican restaurant last night. The restaurant was out of the sauce they usually use for tacos. I told my father we were going to order a chicken taco. My father thought it was so spicy and ordered the hot sauce. He was very surprised and surprised how spicy it was.
New Phone. James got a new phone yesterday. He was really excited about it. He thought it would make his life much easier. Instead, his phone caused him more problems. James now hates his phone.

Henry's Shower. Henry decided to shower every day. He was tired of always forgetting to water. After work, Henry realized how much he missed the shower. Henry decided to only shower in the mornings instead. By his fourth day without a shower, Henry no longer missed the shower.

Last Minute. Tasha got a new baby in a week. The only problem was that she needed to buy some diapers. She was going to be in school for a week. She decided she was going to save her money. After school she bought her baby some diapers.

Mike Olsen. I met Mike Olsen on the bus in 1987. We were on a road trip with the bus route we were on. The bus was headed towards our home. I said hello and he asked if I was happy. I said I was very happy he asked that question.

Ice Skating Gone Wrong. Molly was ice skating in the park with her grandma. Her grandma noticed that her footing was off. Molly's grandma said they had to wait for the ice to cool off. She was angry that Molly had to wait for an hour. Molly's mom promised to be more careful from then on.

Familiar Face. Sandra was having trouble finding a bar to drink at. She went to the bar at the corner of a busy street. While she waited for her drink to be finished, a friend came in. She asked the friend where she wanted to go. Sandra's friend recommended a local bar and they made a good decision.

A Mess in the Kitchen. Tom was making chicken, and forgot to clean the table. He had to go back in and change his plates. Tom felt like he had ruined the food. He went back to his room to clean up his mess. He realized he forgot to turn off the microwave.

The dog parade. Juan always saw funny dog parades when he was young. Juan always thought the dogs in the parades were funny. His friends made fun of him for it. Juan was too upset to speak to them. Now he always avoids the parades after that.

Bat Mitzvah. It was Beth's son's Bat Mitzvah. She went to the Bat Mitzvah ceremony. She was not happy with the ceremony. She was unhappy that her son did not say his blessing. Beth did not participate in the Bat Mitzvah.
Tea tasting. I decided to go to the tea shop. I bought a tea. The tea was very pleasant. I started to enjoy the tea. The tea tasted amazing.

Baby Boom. We moved to North Carolina last year. Our apartment building just bought a new building. They decided to renovate the existing building. Today, the entire complex is a neon, neon green wonderland. My parents will visit today to see what's new!

A Little Elbow Grease. Jake was doing the dishes one day. He accidentally spilled grease on his shirt. Jake's shirt was starting to come off in pieces. Jake took the shirt to a local thrift shop. Jake bought a new shirt and the grease was gone.

Eclipse. I took my daughter to the Kennedy Space Center to view the solar eclipse. She really enjoyed watching the eclipse. She wanted to know the real reason she watched it. She said she got a sticker with the sun and moon on it. She really liked seeing the solar eclipse.
Birthday Pie. Tom was at his girlfriend's house. She had made him a pie. They loved the way it tasted. Tom didn't want to eat it anymore. He ended up throwing it out.

Cat and Mouse. Rita was playing in her living room. Suddenly, a mouse came in and tried to escape from her house. She chased it around the room for a long time. Finally, she finally caught the mouse and caught it. Finally, she was able to go back inside her house.

Winter Vacation. Lydia is visiting her friend's house during winter break. She is excited to visit her crush, but her friend is upset. She is so upset that she wants Lydia to stay in her house for the summer. Lydia says she is busy and can't take any time off. She stays in the friend's house for the summer and regrets not visiting.
Problems. John and Tom were dating. They had a huge fight one night. John took it really hard. He ended up breaking up with Tom. John realized that it wasn't a good idea to fight over a girl.

Bobert. Bobert went to the barber to have a haircut. The barber was so bad that the bobert looked terrible. The barber told him he needed a new haircut. The barber decided to cut off Bobert's beard. The barber was very upset.

Spanish test. Sara had a Spanish test the next day. She knew she had studied and memorized all the words. She did her best and hoped she scored well. On the day of the test she could not believe it. She had scored the highest she has ever scored.

Scaffolding. My dad bought some wooden planks for my new house. I had always wanted to build a house out of them. I asked him to show me how to use them. He showed me a few steps, and then told me to follow. I had a lot of fun trying to build that house.

The older man. Charles liked to play golf. One day he got the nerve to ask out a younger woman. They got together for lunch. At the end of the day she said yes. Charles was so thrilled he almost cried.
Bad dream. Susie had a really bad dream. She woke up really nervous. Her mom told her it would pass. But it came back to haunt her. She never got over it.
Prisons not all bad. I went into the prison. It was really cold. We had to go to the locker rooms. We were allowed to use the telephone. Then, we moved into the cell blocks.
knock. The doorbell rang. Tom answered it quickly. It was his brother. He wanted to know why he had not answered. He told him that he didn't have his keys.

Christmas Vacation. My parents took a trip to Florida. The trip was to their house. The trip began early and ended late. My parents spent a good amount of time in the car. Christmas was a great time for my parents.
Sandwiches. My brother made me a sandwich for dinner. We went out for a walk around the block. He was making my sandwich. It turned out to be the wrong sandwich. I was upset that I was late for work.
Meat. I wanted some steak. I decided to grill it. I went outside to prepare the grill. I set the grill up. I grilled the steak.

The Soda Can. Tina was working on her lawn. She was using a soda can to scoop up snow. She knocked it over and spilled it all over the ground. Tina had to clean it up. She decided she would get better at using plastic.
Water. A man was drinking a glass of water. He heard the doorbell ring. He opened the door and got the glass. The water spilled out. The man felt bad and poured a new glass.

Night Ruined. When I came home my wife asked why we were still in the house. I said because my cat was outside. She said we couldn't leave for a few minutes. So we went back inside the house. Then my wife said I should have killed the cat.

Painful Frisbee. Gina was playing Frisbee with her friends. She was doing great but the wind was really bad. Gina ended up landing on the ground. Her leg was badly broken. Gina's friends were sad she had to go to the hospital.

Seller. Karen's sister was getting married. Karen felt terrible that she didn't help her sister with her flower arrangements. Karen asked her sister to pay for the flowers. Her sister said no because she wanted to go shopping. Karen felt terrible she didn't help her sister out.
Coffee Place. The man made coffee. He filled his car's pot. He went to the store. He paid for the coffee. He drove back home.

Blues. Bob heard about a bluegrass band playing at a local park. Bob decided to check it out for himself. Bob attended the concert. The music was not the same as that band's. Bob left the park after the concert.

Hypocrite?. Kate's mom is overweight and looks horrible. She is very rude and does not let her kids watch TV. One day the kids complained and her mom stopped watching. She told the kids that she could watch if she wanted to. They complained again and she went back to the TV to complain.

Date Ditch. Dina was getting ready to leave for her date. She was wearing her usual black dress and heels. But she ran to find something to wear instead. It took her about an hour to find the perfect dress. In the end she decided on a black blouse with a pom poms.

Soldier. John was an 18-year-old Army officer. He lived in Iraq. He received a call from a man in the desert. He raced through the desert to find him. They found their lost loved one who'd just been killed by enemy fire.

Applying for a Job. My friend Tim has an interview tomorrow. He has been working for the same company for four years. Today he took time out to apply for a job. His manager told Tim that he's qualified for the job. Tim decided to apply and impress the manager.

The New Fish. Kate's mother was going through the mail. It was time for her new fish to come in. The mailman brought Kate her new fish. She was so excited to see her new fish. When the mailman brought the new fish back she jumped with joy.

Service Dog. Nita had a service dog. The dog acted as a guide to Nita's wheelchair. Nita didn't notice until someone else was near her. Nita wasn't aware that the dog could still be seen. The other person stopped and helped Nita back up.
Pie. Eddie was making a pie. But he couldn't make it into a pie shell. He tried to shape it. He even tried to shape the crust. But he ended up with a big mess.

Bow and Arrow. Dan always loved shooting arrows with his dad. One day Dan decided to buy a bow and arrow set. The day after, Dan felt a terrible pain in his leg. He had stepped on a metal pin on the top of the set! Dan vowed to always practice shooting his bow and arrow.
Delicious ice cream. Susie loved ice cream. She was craving it but had no money. Finally Susie decided to save up and buy some. Susie was excited. Susie happily ate her delicious ice cream.
Noise. My sister-in-law got up this morning at 9am. We had to call the police because of the loud music. She woke up late for work. There were 3 kids playing outside. We told her to go back to sleep.
Worthless. The man asked his parents for money. They were very stingy. The man said he had to go buy a present. His parents told him he could do whatever he wanted. The man bought himself a new bike.

The melted balloon. Rory was excited to go to the party. He was carrying a bag of balloons. He pulled them out of the bag and then dropped them. The balloons all exploded and they melted. He had to go buy a new bag.

The Renovation. Bill was a very talented guy. Bill wanted to show off his talent to his friends. Bill did a lot of renovations to his house. One night Bill was very drunk. Bill had to call in to work the next day to start his new life.

Special Assessment. Amy had a hard time remembering all her multiplication tables. She had a doctor order an assessment. The doctor was able to answer all her questions. The doctor helped Amy understand the material. Amy was able to get her multiplication table.
Matt's Keys. Matt lost his car keys. He had to get them from the garage. He remembered where they were. He called the number on the key. He had to get a cab.

Cell Phones. Katherine bought a new cell phone for her first year of college. She used it everyday and got good and good with it. One day she got a text and couldn't answer it. She turned it off and tried to call her friend. She finally got through to her friend and they spoke.

ET. My wife's niece in law loves television. One day she watched an episode of ET. She liked the aliens but they were very strange. She asked her friend about ET. His friend was not surprised at all and said it was the best series ever.
Bullies get served. My friend is a bully. He called me a horrible name. I told him I was not his type of person. He felt badly and was really upset. I guess that was the end of that.

Grandmother's Cookies. Grandmother's cookies are grandma's secret. She always hid them in the cupboard. She never told her granddaughter how to bake them. One day her granddaughter found them in the cupboard. Her granddaughter was excited to bake them and share them with her Grandmother.

Regret. Kate had a lot of makeup on at work. She kept putting it on. After a while she forgot it was on. A coworker told her she should never put on makeup again. Kate was disappointed and took off her makeup.

One dollar. I had a dollar to my name when I was younger. I never used it. I ended up having a bunch of money and went to a thrift store. They let me pick one item out of a bag. It was a dollar book and I bought it.

Tim's Band. Tim played the drums in a band. He would play for three hours every day. One day his band needed a new drum player. They asked Tim to join their band. Tim accepted and made a good impression.
New Minivan. Dan bought a new minivan. It was very cheap. He put a lot of miles on it. He drove it every day. Dan loved his new minivan!
Shark. Dan was on vacation. He went on the beach and saw a shark. It was really scary. Dan decided he didn't want to go back to the beach. He stayed at home instead.

Germany. My wife was excited to visit Germany. We took the train from New York City. We stayed at a hotel in Berlin. She ate at a local food shop. I had to take a cab back home because my wife ate too much food.

Armando burns the tacos. Armando works at a taco place. His favorite thing to eat there is tacos. His coworkers all ask him to cook them. Armando realizes he's burnt the tacos. He gives the tacos to his coworkers anyway.

The Bank Teller. I used to be a bank teller when I was a kid. I would get to pick people's pockets at the drop of a hat. I always knew what people wanted. One day a man asked me to lend him $100. I did and he didn't want to get in trouble for stealing.

Scary Customer. One time my boss asked me to make sure he ate his vegetables. I went over to his office and waited on him to come out. When he left, I heard some sort of loud screaming. I called the police and they arrested him. I guess I'm just not good at waiting on him.

The Termination. Kim was having a great time with her friends. But then her friend left her to go to her work. Kim had a lot of trouble making new friends. Finally Kim found a group of girls she could make friends with. The girls made the time together that she never knew she had.

sweet tooth. Sally has a problem with her sweet tooth. When she ate a sweet treat, her stomach hurt badly. Sally realized she needed to eat less sweets. So she started making a lemonade, apple juice, or a ginger ale. After three weeks of trying, Sally's sweet tooth was gone!

Short Cut to BC. My girlfriend and I have never been to Brighton. We wanted to go to BC to see a local band. They had a very short set. The tickets are cheap though. We are planning on going next year.

Window Seat. Jill and her mom had tickets for a concert. They couldn't decide on a window seat. They debated over a few seats. Finally, they decided on a movie theater. Jill and her mom had a great time watching movies there.
Bunny's Toes. John bought a new puppy. The puppy barked constantly. He would chase the rabbit for the ball. John could not get the ball out of the rabbit's mouth. John threw the ball away.

Showing Online. I went out on a date with the boy from work. I was not looking where I was going. I ended up looking in the mirror and saw a piece of wood stuck to my pants. I didn't see the wood in the reflection but I had to be careful. I felt bad when I was finished but never went back out again.
Hurricane. My car suddenly started shaking. I looked outside but there was no rain. A hurricane was coming towards us. I quickly ran inside. Luckily, no damage was done.

Driving. Lars went to the auto show. He brought his father's brand new car. The car made a big noise when he put the key in the ignition. His father bought him a new car key. His dad took him to the auto shop and repaired the car.
Way too hot. The kids were playing outside. They were playing football. It got really hot outside. They couldn't stop playing. They were so tired they got home early.
Switch Plates. Tom's wife was trying to eat at a restaurant. They switched plates in the middle of their meal. Tom did not notice the plates. The plate slipped from his hands. Tom's wife became sick.

Paint Bar. The Smith family was out playing in their backyard. All of a sudden, they saw a large spray paint can. The kids wanted to play with it so they sprayed paint on it. When the kids sprayed paint on the can, it flew into a tree. The kids didn't know how to get the paint off of the tree.
Big Waves. The family was on the beach. They all looked out into the sea. They watched huge waves slam into each other. The water was so dangerous. The family decided to leave.
Baseball cards. My son loved to play baseball. He used to play with all kinds of cards. He also played with baseball cards in a box. The box had a hole in it. He opened it up and his cards came out.

Cat Rescue. Tina was a cat who was afraid to get outside. Her owner decided to put a fence around the house. Tina got used to it and did fine. Then one day she saw some birds and started jumping in and out of them. Tina loves her owner and is now more comfortable in the house.

Cleaner. Kate was working at the store. It was a hot day and the store was full of people. She was too busy to do her own work. Kate came across an item that she forgot she had. She used it to clean a room for a cashier.

abusive. I had to work as a waitress for my family. We had a strict policy against using profanity and violence. My coworkers would make fun of us because we were Asian. They started talking to me about my culture and trying to offend me. I decided to quit that job and go to school to learn more about it.
Cooking. When I was young I made pasta for my friend. He thought it was delicious. It was so good he never tasted it again. I never did that with pasta again. I guess I learned my lesson though.

Roger the Dog. Roger was a pit bull puppy who loved to chase balls. The balls often fell from the sky and into Roger's yard. One day his owner, a farmer, noticed Roger chasing a ball. The farmer asked Roger if he could play fetch with his dog. Roger had a great time playing fetch with the farmer's dog.

Sally Likes Pie. Sally's mom told her that there is pie for her to bake. Sally was excited to bake pie for her Mom. Sally baked the pie for her Mom. Sally's Mom was pleased that Sally liked baking pies. Sally was happy that she was able to bake her Mom pie.

Second Date. Ben's girlfriend was on a first date with Bob. Bob seemed to be trying to talk Ben into a romantic evening. Ben had a great time, even though his girlfriend didn't seem to. The next day, Ben got a phone call from his girlfriend. He heard she had been offered the job of his dreams!

umbrella. I wanted to buy a new umbrella. I looked in the store and couldn't find one I liked. Then I remembered my mother's old umbrella. My mother had a small yellow umbrella that my uncle used. I took the umbrella home, and never looked back.

Accident. Gina was riding her bike when she slid. She started spinning around. The bike flipped over onto its side. She landed in the middle of the street. Gina had broken her collar bone and bruises.

Track. Tim was a strong runner. His friend Sam loved to go run. One day they were both on the same team and played together. Tim's friend was slower and had a hard time running. Sam beat Tim to beat Tim's friend.

garden. Tim had planted an apple tree in his backyard. The tree grew quickly and soon had three branches. Tim realized he didn't have a lot of money for maintenance. He decided to cut the tree and sell it on eBay. Tim made a quick profit and was proud of his decision.

Weekends. Sheila hated the idea of having to stay home with her baby. Sheila decided that it would be best to have two weekends a month off. Sheila asked her friend, Carol, to stay with her. Carol agreed to stay with Sheila until the baby was a week old. Carol had a great time with Sheila, and Sheila was happy.
The forgotten cereal. John was eating cereal. He couldn't find it. He searched everywhere. Eventually he gave up and ate ice cream instead. He was thankful for not forgetting it.

The Bar. The couple went to a bar. The waitress took them to a room and helped them order. After the drinks, they got out their games. They went on to play and have fun for an hour. The couple decided they would go back to that bar more often.

Triumphant Return. A man took his car off road racing. He had driven up from Albuquerque with no problems. He was going to take a race track trip to Las Vegas. He drove up the desert and stopped by a small canyon. He had fun racing in the small canyon.
Delivery. Liz was doing her grocery shopping. She was hungry. Liz put in some garlic powder on her food. As she ate, she heard her son scream. Liz's son was eating his pizza slice!
