Repaired Laptop. Sam was doing homework online. He noticed the laptop had overheated and shut down. Sam had to send the laptop in to get repaired. The laptop was repaired and he was happy about that. Sam returned the laptop and kept the extra money.

Flat Tires. Derek took a road trip with his girlfriend. They were driving down the road and the car made a loud noise. Derek didn't know why the noise came from the car. Derek called his girlfriend to ask where the noise was coming from. Derek's girlfriend explained that the tires on her car were flat.
Free Pizza. John ordered a pizza. John's food came after half an hour. John complained to the manager. The manager offered to pay half of the bill. John thanked the manager.

Easter Bunny. Burt and his little cousin Jimmy wanted to play with the Easter bunny. They tied a string around its neck. They pulled it slowly, as if the bunny was trying to catch them. Then, the three of them threw eggs at the bunny. When the rabbit got tired, they ran and gave him candy.

Henry. Henry is getting ready to take a bus to school one day. As he's trying to get into his car, his phone falls out of his pocket. It crashes to the ground in the middle of the street. He finds the owner of the phone to call his mom. Henry's mom brings him to school where he spends the day safe.

Going to the Mall. Today was the first day of school. The first hour was spent at the school, then we went to the mall. We picked out new outfits and bought a new tv. We went to Target and bought candy. We were able to spend a good amount of money on clothes today.
Roll Over. She was laying down in bed. She heard a loud thud. She rolled over. It was a large thud. Her head was bleeding.

Ben's First Time at the Beach. Ben was scared to go to the beach with his family. He didn't want to wake his parents up. He waited in a grassy field until the weather was nice. Ben was surprised to see his family come running to him! They were so relieved to see Ben was safe from the beach!

Cane Tips. Cathy's boyfriend didn't know how to cut his cane. So Cathy decided to teach him. Cathy gave her boyfriend tips on how to do it. So his cane didn't look like he was missing any tips. But his cane did look crooked when he cut it.

Hot Air Balloon. Today, we decided to try out the hot air ballooning hobby. I brought my hot air balloon with me and waited for the hot air balloon to arrive. When the balloon arrived I got on with my friends. The balloon floated over the river and into a large lake. The hot air balloon had fun for the whole afternoon.

The first guitar. Ruth was in her early twenties. She was shopping at a thrift store. She found a guitar for a good price. She went to the thrift store and bought it. She was thrilled with the purchase.

Bonus Round. Tom was on his way home from work one day. He decided to take a bonus round through the city. He passed many stores with lots of bonus coupons. Finally he made it to a clothing store with a free t-shirt. Tom was really happy to have free clothes.

Dead Battery. Abe needed his cell phone. He put it into the charger and waited. Abe plugged in his charger and waited. He heard the charging battery beep. Abe realized he had put in the wrong charger.

Goofing around. It was a very long flight, and my flight attendant offered to get us checked in. The flight attendant was an experienced pilot, and she was very helpful. After checking in, we had to wait for the next flight to take off. The flight attendant asked me about my flight, but it was late. Finally we were able to leave the airport and have some drinks.
Jarvis Takes a Nap. Jarvis was really tired. He decided to take a nap. He fell asleep quickly. When he woke up, he found out he wasn't in bed. Jarvis had to stay up late to finish his test.

Playing in the Bathroom. Gina was playing in the bathroom. Her mom had been watching her. Gina was hiding behind a stall. She was scared the teacher would see her hiding. She hid in the stall until her mom could find her.
Harassment. Lester was a nice guy. He went to a party. There were a lot of women there. Lester was uncomfortable at this party. He left and never spoke with another woman again.

In the store. I went to the store yesterday to get a candy bar. I bought a pack of them to take home. When I got home, I put the candy bars in the bag. Then, I put everything back in the car. I drove home and ate the rest.

Pool Party. One day Tim was going to his favorite pool party. He wanted to be cool while at it. When he got there he noticed everyone was there already. The people were already drunk and not paying attention. Tim got bored and left the pool party.

Birthday Girl. I was working at the coffee shop last week when a customer asked for my number. Since I don't use cell phones, he thought I must not know him. I answered him and he told me he was an old school classmate. He asked me if I liked him. It turns out he's my cousin, and he asked me out on a date.
Old Pipes. We used to live on an old farm. We used to have old pipes and we would fill them up. We filled them up on Saturday. Then we took them out on Sunday. That was how we did it.
Sound off. Sammy was out with his dog. They were playing fetch. Suddenly, his dog barks loudly. Sammy has no idea why. He goes to look around but there's a noise.

Steve's Tattoo. Steve had an artistic tattoo of a sword on his thigh. His girlfriend was not impressed. She told him that she thought it was too sexual. Steve felt embarrassed and depressed. He did not remove the tattoo until he felt better.
Ant Bites. Jake was playing with ants. He heard a noise. Jake saw that one of the ants was biting him. He grabbed the ant and ran away. The ant did not bite him.

Blank mind. Sam was having trouble concentrating. He would stare at the same object over and over. Sam couldn't figure out what was going on. His mom came into the room. She taught him to change the channels so he could focus.

Make Up. Lenny hated his long hair. He was not sure how he could remove it. He decided to go to the hair salon. He got his hair cut and was pleased. He then proceeded to look amazing in his new hairstyle.

Bubbles. Cindy likes bubble tea. Her friend told her it tastes like water. So Cindy tried it and it was so yummy. She liked it so much that she bought some more. Now she never wants to drink anything else.

New Doll. The Jones family wanted a new baby doll. They visited several stores to try and find the perfect one. One store sold dolls they thought looked like their daughter. The doll had red hair and green eyes. The Jones family bought the doll with the hopes of having another one.

The broken ice machine. Joe was watching television. Then he heard the ice machine begin to rumble. It began to fill up with water. Joe went to go see what was happening. When he went back to his couch, the ice machine was gone.

The New Car. Jake was feeling a bit stressed out about his finances. His car had been totaled just a few months before. Jake didn't want to pay the car's fair market value. So he had his father help him buy a new car. Jake was relieved it was a great deal and took it home.

Fire Drill. Tom was bored one afternoon. He went into his room and turned on his television. He found a commercial for a martial arts school. He decided to sign up and take martial arts classes. Tom loved the classes and got good at them.

Learning to Surf. The boy wanted to learn to surf. His dad took him to the surf shop to learn. The shop showed the boy how to surf and taught him to ride a board. The boy finally learned how to surf. He was happy with his new found skill.

Museum. I was at a museum with my grandfather. He showed me how to make a lampshade. I decided to use some plastic. Then, I used the lampshade for the lamp in my bedroom. I was so happy that I made the lampshade for my grandfather.
Spilled wine on table. It was a really warm summer evening. Sam was going out with friends. They decided to drink some wine. He spilled it all on the table. He got in a lot of trouble.

Selena. Selena wanted a puppy for her birthday. She begged her parents. Finally, on Christmas day, she received a pink puppy. She named it Max, and the two of them had lots of fun together. Selena was very happy, and glad that Max became her new best friend!

The Birds. The birds chirped loudly as they flew across the park. The birds sang to each other all day long. The park ranger had set up some benches for the birds to sit. The park ranger told the park ranger to watch the birds. A few birds began to fly away with no one around to see them.

A Broken Mug. I was trying to clean my mug with my favorite cleaning agent. After I used it for a while it didn't seem to be working. So I threw it out and tried to clean the mess with a new cleaner. The new cleaner worked just as well. So I was able to get the mug to be spotless.
Gym Rats. Jill was a great runner. She tried out for a team at her school. She was terrible in the gym. However, her coach encouraged her. Jill was able to earn a spot on the team.

Food fight. Allie's mom gave her $40 dollars. She then offered to buy her lunch. But when Allie got it, she realized that she didn't have her wallet. Allie called her mom to ask about her money. She was so mad that she immediately ate the food and left.
Flour. Tom was a baker. He was asked to make his family bread. Tom thought for awhile, then made the batter. His dough was dry and hard to shape. Tom realized his flour was not well mixed.

Daddy. I was looking for my father. He had moved away for his business. After searching for days I found him. He was standing on top of a building. I was afraid I would run into him if I looked too hard.

Pamper trouble. Kate and her friends went to the beach. When they got there they were not allowed in the water. Pamper's were upset. It took a week to get them to come back. Pamper had to stay outside all week long.
Cat with no Meow. A cat had kittens. The kittens ate all of the cat's food. The cat's mom fed the kittens scraps. The kittens ate the scraps. Now the cat has a lot of cat food.

The New Couch. Natalie was going out of town for a few weeks. She packed her bags and was about to head out. When she got to the airport, her bag was checked. She realized she didn't pack a new couch! Thankfully, she was able to rent a couch at her hotel.
New Car. Tom needed a new car. He looked at several dealerships. He did some research online. He found the car he wanted at a good price. He bought it and loved it.

Online Rant. A man posted a rant online. He talked about women not liking him for some reason. A bunch of women heard the rant and commented on it. The guy stopped posting online. He realized he had made a mistake.
Dirty Carpet. Timmy was playing in his garage. He saw that his carpet was very messy. It was soaked and filthy. Timmy told his dad to clean it up. Timmy's dad cleaned up the entire garage.
Morning Jog. I have a morning jog every day. One day, I started it at 5 AM. I went for about 2 miles. Then, I went home. Now, I have a very nice, fresh run in my morning.

The Animal Report. Annie had been reporting animals every day for her school paper. She would write a story about how an animal lived in the neighborhood. One day she went out in the field with her camera. She saw a kitten and her stomach dropped. She had found a mother cat hiding underneath a rock!
Loose Tooth. I was having trouble with loose tooth. I went to the dentist that weekend. I had my tooth pulled. My tooth came out. I went back to get it done.

Scholarship. Anna was not a very smart student. She always did poorly in school. When she turned 16 she applied for a scholarship to study abroad. She got an acceptance letter. Now she lives in Italy with her family.
Sofa Cover. I bought a new sofa cover in 2006. It was very heavy. I put it on the top shelf of the sofa. I tried to make it sit there but it fell down. I finally had to put it on the floor.

No more rules!. The principal announced that he is going to change the school dress code. The first thing that he made was the boys' dress code. All boys can't wear jeans to school. He also said that any girl that sees any boys in jeans is going to be upset. He made the dress code more gender neutral.

Buying a new computer. Tom bought a new computer on ebay. It wasn't working. He was very upset by it. The person who bought it from ebay gave Tom his money back. Tom was glad and was able to buy a new computer on ebay again.
Balding Head. Ted was wearing glasses. He was very balding. One day, he wore them to a party. It was very crowded and Ted couldn't see anything. His parents eventually bought him some glasses.
First Job. I got a job as an usher. It was not a very good job. The people did not seem to like it. Eventually, it became boring. I went back to my old job.
Flowers. The flowers were beautiful. Her boyfriend loved them. He wanted to buy more flowers. He asked her to buy more flowers. She said that she could not afford to.
Drunk. Drunk!. Fred had a bad hangover. He was ready to go to bed. He pulled his blankets over his head. He threw up everywhere. He was out of it by the time his parents got home.

James needs glasses. James has been losing his vision. He finally asks for help with his prescription. The optometrist tests his eyes and gives him glasses. James wears the glasses for a few weeks. After that he is able to see very well with his glasses.

Government. Bill was a local businessman and wanted to work with the government. Bill started working with a local politician to find a way to work together. Bill's neighbor found out about Bill's plan. He asked Bill to sell his business. Bill became a millionaire and could now run for president.
Speed dating. Lucy had been on a couple of dates. All of them had ended in tears. She decided to speed date instead. She was nervous and nervous. She did not get many responses.
Going Pro. Sam wanted to join the pro soccer team. He practiced hard every day. He had a great game. Sam made the team. He made the team as a starter.
Being Bold. Marge was on the phone with a friend. A loud sound came from the garage. A car was coming out and had a flat tire. Marge had to call the police. Her friend was embarrassed.

No More Leaves!. Jane bought a bag of leaves from the store. She put them in the back of her car to help clear the snow out. Jane drove for an hour through the snow. She was tired and cranky after driving through the snow. Jane threw the bags of leaves in the trash.

Children's books. Cora loved children's books. She spent her time reading, sewing and playing with the dolls. One day, the school announced they were selling books. Cora went to the bookstore and saw many great children's books. Cora purchased her favorite books for a discounted price.

Lori's Date. Lori's boyfriend didn't like her. Lori's boyfriend got angry at her. Lori's boyfriend threatened Lori. Lori's boyfriend broke up with her. Lori felt sad for a while but was glad when her boyfriend asked her out.
Sleeping Over. My wife and I went out last night. We rented a movie last night. We stayed in a hotel. We had to sleep over last night. It was fun and I can't wait to see the movie tonight.
Cooked Too Much. Tim was really hungry. He decided to cook himself some dinner. He decided to use the store bought chicken. He burned the chicken. Tim learned not to use store bought food.

Shattered Dreams. The man had just woken up. He was too tired to do anything at first. He drifted back into sleep. When he awoke again, he was on the ground. The cops told him it was an accident and not murder.
The Glasses. Sam had an eye infection. He wore glasses. He went outside one day. He fell and broke his glasses. He decided never to wear glasses again.

Used Item. Tim was selling his used clothes at a garage sale. He had a few hundred people in line waiting to see his sale. Tim decided to stay at his tent. After an hour, he was done with his sale. Tim felt proud that he had managed to sell five used clothes.

Quarterback Keeper. Cara had always loved watching the Quarterback Keeper from afar. He was always excited when the game started. One night he was not the Quarterback Keeper, and his team lost. Cara was so upset and felt like a loser. He eventually realized that he was just excited to see his favorite player.

The Sleepover. Sally's parents bought her a sleepover for the holidays. Sally and her friends got to spend time together. She had a lot of fun and met a lot of new friends. Sally had a really good time. It was a good time.

Plane Tickets. Kari was going on her first vacation. She booked a plane ticket to Florida for the weekend. Kari checked into her hotel and set her luggage for her trip. She unpacked her luggage one night and got a call from the airline. Kari was told that her plane had been delayed a week!
The Flood. I went to visit a friend in 2013. We took a boat out to a river. I was shocked by the flood that happened. I ran to my friend to help him. He pulled me out safely.

Boat day!. The kids decided to go to the local boat store to buy a new boat. They had a great day of shopping and learning about boats. They then bought a nice new boat to take out on the lake. The next week they were going out to the lake. They were having a blast with the new boat!

New Puppy. Nate had just gotten a new puppy. The puppy was very naughty. The puppy would bark when nobody was around. Nate decided to discipline the puppy a lot. The puppy eventually became more gentle.
Wedding. Kim was getting married in 2 weeks. Her cousin had asked if he could go. Kim had to decline because she was busy. Kim's cousin called later. He asked Kim if she would come to the wedding.

Avoiding the In Laws. I had never seen a cop in person. I went to a bar and invited a friend with me. The bar owner's brother pulled up to the bar. The bar owner's brother told him to get out of his car. I got out of my car and the police officer came over to my friend.

The New Kitten. Kelsi was walking down the street. Suddenly, she saw a kitten on the street. Kelsi took it and brought it home. It immediately became part of the family. She was happy to give it a home.

Saturday Night Live. My family is from Long Island. My uncle always brought my siblings to the comedy show. It was our favorite tradition. This Saturday, we missed it because of the weather. Now we are all disappointed that we missed the comedy show.

Spoiling niece. Jan was babysitting her niece when she got in trouble. She was running in the backyard when the police showed up. She wasn't even old enough to drink. Jan gave her niece the hard time because she was so disrespectful. She decided to tell her that it was over soon.

Broken Eggs. Sam had just gotten up from a long night of watching movies. He was very tired when he got to work. The next day he looked in his refrigerator for his breakfast. He noticed his eggs were all but broken. Sam realized that his egg breakers were broken too.

Basketball Practice. Tom practiced basketball with his friends everyday. He practiced hard for the next game. Tom got an A on his last shot. He and his friends practiced for 2 hours. His team won the next game.
Huge Debt. Tom and his wife wanted to go on a honeymoon. Tom decided to pay for a cruise to a Caribbean island. They both bought a nice yacht. Tom had a lot of debt. Unfortunately Tom was broke.

Diplomat. Ginger has always wanted to go to international school. She decided to enroll in a Diplomacy class. Ginger felt very prepared and eager to learn more. Her classmates had a wonderful time during the first two years. The third year of Diplomacy made Ginger very proud.

Phone call. When I went to the doctor, he kept telling me he was busy. When I called him back later that day, he was not busy. So I ended up having to come back in for another appointment. After that, my doctor didn't call me back for another month. I finally realized that I shouldn't go to the doctor when he isn't busy.
Hit. Dan went to a concert. He was drunk. He went to the back. It wasn't that far back. Dan ended up hitting a woman.
Go. Cindy liked to play sports. She played soccer in middle school. She started playing softball in high school. She had to stop after the first game. The coach told her it was too dangerous to play.

Companion Physical. When my friend Bob got an acupuncturist last week I was upset. I did not like the price of the treatment. I called and complained about the procedure. Afterwards my friend apologized for the procedure. I agreed and was happy to have him as a close friend.
Lost Sandwich. Ben lost his sandwich at school one day. He looked for the place he had eaten it. But he couldn't find it. Eventually he gave up. He never found it again.
A Lion King Christmas. My family took a trip to the zoo. We went in the lion exhibit. It was amazing to see the lions. There was also a new exhibit with monkeys. It was a wonderful day at the zoo.

Cable TV. I went to the local cable station. I needed to know if there were any shows I could watch. I looked for shows to watch. I found a show that I wanted to watch. I had to wait an hour before I could watch the show.

Broken collectible. I had a friend buy me a rare collectible from an amusement park. I spent three dollars on the card. When I went to the store the vendor gave me a partial refund. I kept the card. Now I have it on my wall.
Uncle Freddy. Freddy was one of my best friends growing up. One day he got arrested for being a bad kid. I decided I would always look for him to talk to. He never showed up. I never found him again.

Hooray for vacations. A couple of weeks ago, I decided to take a vacation. On the first day I took a nice hike up the side of the mountains. On the second day I was in a cave and fell in. I took a few breaks, but mostly just took photos of nature. When I came out of the cave I was so happy I took a photo.
Wallet. My wallet was missing. I looked everywhere for it. I found it on the ground. I checked all the pockets and I still had it. I put it back and thanked my mother.

Incognito Mode. Jenny thought she was very sneaky. She went out one night while her friend was gone. When Jenny came back she looked at the ground. She noticed she had taken off her shoes. Jenny got so embarrassed when her friend found out.
Road Trip. Tom was on a road trip. He was always tired. His sleep schedule had been messed up. He decided to take a break. It helped him sleep better.
Acting lessons. John got a new job. It was acting class. John practiced with his friends. He got good enough to go on stage. John got an audition for the lead role.

Roommate to the Rescue. Avery's roommate left the apartment and didn't come back. She found Avery on the stairs and called 911. An officer arrived at the apartment. He told Avery to come down and check the mail. He then called the landlord to give him a copy of his lease.

Robert formed a band. Robert wanted to start a band. Robert talked to some people about joining the band. Robert and his band members decided to try out for a band. The band auditioned for the position. The band members made it into the band and now are practicing.

Kim the Waitress. Kim was a waitress. Kim loved making people feel happy. When it was time to pay, Kim didn't like money. One day, Kim decided to quit her job. Now she does her job for free and is happy.
Tree. There was a tree down the street. It had fallen in a storm. It was taller than the house. The homeowner was very upset. He called his insurance.

Family History Banquet. Bev took her family to a family history banquet. They all studied for two hours. When it was time to eat, they were hungry. Unfortunately, they couldn't find anything to eat. The food tasted okay, but not particularly memorable.

Washing Hair. Bella was very nervous. Today was the first day she was going to wash her hair. Bella decided she would wash it this morning. On the way out of the shower, Bella slipped on her shoes. She fell right into the washing machine.
The Hearing. My brother was going to have a hearing tomorrow. His mom told him she couldn't take him. They went to the hearing office. He was nervous. He was relieved when they ruled in his favor.

Gap Tooth. Tom had a gap tooth that needed filling. Tom did not like going to the dentist and was nervous. He was nervous because he had never had a fill root canal. The dentist did not do anything wrong and it was all over. Tom felt relieved that he finally had a cavity filled.

Homework Hater. Kate's mother got upset because Kate had a late homework assignment. Kate's mother decided to send her to the store to buy her own pencils. Kate did not want to spend extra money and her grades suffered. Kate's mother gave her extra credit for failing the homework assignment. Kate received extra credit from the store for her late homework.
Colorado Cold. Jake was camping in Colorado with some friends. They made a fire. It began to get very cold. After the fire died down, it started to rain. They decided to leave.
Comedy. Tim decided to make comedy. He went to the community college. Tim was a hard worker. He made an audience. Tim made a lot of money.

Exam Grade. Tina did not study for an exam. She was scared she would fail the exam. Tina procrastinated her studying until she was late to the exam. At the end of the test, she scored an 80% on the exam. Tina felt very proud.

Cd. I got my friend to scan my computer for viruses. I turned on my computer and waited for it to finish. After several minutes my computer came back to me. I scanned it again and it said it had downloaded a virus. I was able to delete the virus after it downloaded it.

The Space Station. In 1985, NASA launched the Space Station to the moon. The astronauts planned to land the vehicle in the lunar crater. On December 13, the astronauts lifted off on the space shuttle. They landed the vehicle in a crater, and collected samples. Now the Apollo astronauts are the only ones who have ever returned to the moon.

Chase. The police had a man on the loose in a neighborhood. They needed a warrant to arrest him. The man ran through the neighborhood. The police tracked him down. The man was caught and taken into custody.

Molly and Devin. Molly and Devin went to the doctor. They got vaccinated at the doctor's office. They went home and slept until the next day. They woke up to see the doctor's office was closed. Molly and Devin felt very disappointed.

The New Girl. Jenna had been at school with other girls. Her friends told her she looked like one of them. She didn't believe it. When Jenna finally went home she was shocked. She was so sad she went back to school the next day.
Missed Alarm. Tom was late for work. He tried to get to work early to be on time. Unfortunately his alarm went off. He got up at noon to go to work. He missed work and got in trouble at work.

The melted colander. Martha was making mashed potatoes. She put a large bowl of potatoes into the colander. Suddenly, the potatoes started to melt. Martha panicked and had to rush to the kitchen. Luckily, the colander came out okay and she was able to eat it.

Interrupted. Joey was playing with his friend, Johnny. Joey and Johnny were throwing tennis balls. Joey ran up the court to catch the ball. The ball landed in a fountain in front of Joey. Joey's mom chased Joey down to get the ball.
Dirty Cat. Tim's cat was very dirty. It would jump in the air. He had it bathe twice a day. Eventually the cat got itchy. Tim bought the cat a bowl of rice to clean.

Too Long Ago To Remember. She woke up the next morning and realized that she had forgotten to eat her breakfast. The food was on the table, waiting for her. She walked into the kitchen to eat it and there was a surprise on the plate. It was a box of frozen oatmeal. Amy ate the oatmeal in about 20 minutes and felt energized.

Skating too fast. It was a very hot day. The other night I ran out of water. I decided to try out the ice rink. I jumped off of the top of the ramp and landed. I felt sick to my stomach after I got back down.
Spicy Chicken. Tim decided to try a new recipe. He made spicy chicken. Tim ate a big bite. He felt sick. He was glad he did not order the normal chicken.

Whisper. Tim liked to whisper behind people's back. He knew his boss would notice. He decided to start a secret club for people to go to. A few people joined him. Everyone started to gossip about Tim's secret.

Bunny Surprise. Ruth loved bunnies more than anything. Ruth decided to get a bunny for her birthday. Ruth bought a bunny and was excited. But when she got the bunny, she was horrified. The bunny was a chocolate bunny!
Dirty Room. Tom was in his room. He heard noises coming from it. He opened his door. It was covered in vomit and feces. Tom had to call the landlord.

The Song Cover. Sam got a job at a pizza parlor. He was asked to cover a song from a popular video game. Sam got the song really wrong. The employee laughed at Sam. Sam felt bad and vowed to never cover a cover again.
A new PC Mouse. Brad needed to buy a new mouse. He looked at some reviews and decided on a good one. Brad went to the store to buy one. He took it home and setup it. He was happy with it.

Squash. I have always loved eating squash. One day I was going to my grandma's house. I got a bunch of squash in the refrigerator. I cooked them all up for her. Now she has a huge freezer full of squash.
Skiing. The boys went for a ski trip. They skied down a huge hill. They were all exhausted by the end of the trip. They returned home tired and happy. They had a fun ski trip.

Lost Sight. Timmy's cell phone had been lost in the mail. He decided to find it in a trash can. But when he found it, it was destroyed. It was completely smashed and Timmy was sad. Timmy then realized the trash can was full of junk food.

Spider Jump. There once was a little girl who loved playing with toys. Her favorite toy was a little spider. One day she accidentally dropped it in a puddle. Now her entire house is filled with spiders. She hasn't let them in her house since.

End of speech. I told my class the last words of a speech I will give. We had to memorize all of the words. Some of the words I forgot completely. Then, some were easier than others. I still think I learned more than I was able to.

Burger To Go. Dana loved making burritos. She was on her way to a burrito party. She noticed she had left her phone at home. She panicked and turned around. The phone was in the trash and Dana was sad.

Sharing Bread. Sally hated her job and hated sharing her food. She asked her manager if she could work a half shift so she could eat. The manager said it was no problem and she could be free. When Sally got back to her desk, she thanked her manager. She then shared her sandwich with her coworkers.

Ryan Loses Weight. Ryan decides he wants to lose weight. Ryan purchases a gym membership. Ryan spends several days working out. Finally Ryan is able to successfully lose weight. Ryan is proud of himself.

wing sauce. I decided to make wings. I started by putting some marinara sauce on the chicken. I tasted it and realized the sauce was too spicy. I decided to cut some strips instead. I found out that my strips had much less spicy sauce than mine.
The Tiger. One night a tiger went missing. Everyone was concerned. They searched for him all night. They even looked into the mountains. Finally a hunter spotted the tiger.

Teacher At A Party. Tina was at a birthday party. Her teacher offered to be her date. She asked her parents for permission. Her parents allowed her to go on a date with him. He ended up being her new best friend.

Lost in the air. Dale took his new video camera out to the plane. He was curious to see what the view was like. He was excited to see a plane fly by. However, after taking a few pictures, he noticed something. It was a man with a black suit and goggles on his head.

Vanilla Cake. Mary decided to bake some vanilla cake for her girlfriend. She measured out the ingredients and waited for the recipe. When it was done, she put it in the oven. When she was done, she took it out of the oven and tasted it. It was delicious!

Lisa. Lisa was a new girl in school. She wanted to make friends quickly. She decided to go to a movie with her friends. Unfortunately the movie was too scary. Lisa was too scared to go to the movie with her friends.
bank trip. Tim was on vacation. He wanted to get to the bank for money. He went to the bank and asked for some money. The teller let him keep his money. Tim went home to spend his vacation.
Treat. Kaya and her friends went to the grocery store. The girls were looking for fruit. They went to the produce section. The clerk told them not to buy apples. The girls got oranges instead.
Bridal shower. I was getting married. It was a nice ceremony. The bridal shower was beautiful. It was all over the place. All in all, it was a nice day.

Poor Lighting. Jane was driving on the highway. She noticed that the sun was shining brightly in the distance. Jane decided to change her headlights. Unfortunately, the change did not improve the visibility. Jane decided to call a tow truck.

CCD. The teacher had a new student in the class. It was difficult for the new student to take a class. They both struggled to learn the material. One day, the teacher assigned the new student to the other side. The new student got it, but it made them both sad.

The Mountain Lion. Jim was walking his dog in the woods one day. He noticed a small mountain lion watching him. Jim felt scared. Jim kept walking. Later the same day, Jim was reunited with the mountain lion.

Drunk Story. Jude was reading his story to his children. Suddenly, they started to cry. Jude took them out of his story. The children were confused about what happened. They wanted to ask their grandparents about it.

Two Years. Sasha never did anything to upset her family. So when her father told her she could stay on the farm if she studied. She did her homework and studied hard every night. She even bought a new laptop so she could stay up all night. She was very proud when she received an email thanking her for doing so.

Bad Visitor. When Tom's dog got sick, he went to his friend. Tom's friend brought him some medicine. His friend left him the medicine to take to the vet. Tom gave the medicine to his friend. His friend came back with the medicine and his dog was well.

Doctor Visit. Fred wanted to visit a family member for the first time. He looked up the nearest family doctor online. He called the number listed and made an appointment. The doctor showed up and examined him. Fred was happy and excited to see his family member.
New kitten. Jill got a new kitten. She named it Fido. She loved having him around. But then one day she had to go to work. She found out that Fido had gotten out by accident.

Too small for playing piano. Molly was nervous to start her first piano recital. She was afraid that she would make mistakes. She practiced day and night, and practiced very hard. When she stepped on stage, she was very excited. She made many wonderful music and danced all night.

Fender Bender. Sam was driving home late at night. He noticed a car in his lane was moving. He tried to move over, but the car made a sudden move. Sam swerved his car into the side of the other car. Sam got out of his car and was fine, but got a flat tire.

Bad CLothes wash. Kelly was trying to wash her clothes. She was trying her best but the machine kept freezing. She tried again and it was freezing again. She decided to put her clothes away in the dryer. Finally it was set and she was able to finish her clothes.

Terry the Police Officer. Terry was the police officer on patrol one night. He saw an armed man in the area. Terry called his partner who arrived and arrested the man. Terry took the man to the station. The man was then released from jail and Terry was happy.

The New Toy. Jenny wanted a new doll that was pink. Her parents bought her a doll that was pink. Jenny was very excited when she got her new doll. Jenny was so happy when she opened the box. Her new doll was much smaller than she expected.
Not Good News. Tom was on vacation. He went to the beach with his girlfriend. She told him she needed to get a doctor's appointment. Tom felt upset about it. Tom went home instead.

Bad Exertion. Maggie started a new job on Monday. Her boss told her to get up at five every morning. Maggie decided to do the same. The next day she ran out of time to get to her desk. Maggie gave her boss a warning.

The Sad Birthday. Tina was turning sixteen and had forgotten her birthday. She didn't feel like making a big deal out of it and left alone. As soon as she got home, her parents surprised her with a party. She had a birthday cake, cookies, and even her own video game system! Tina was beyond happy and decided she would never forget her birthday.

The bad audition. Mandy was taking an audition for a modeling job. Mandy was nervous before the auditions started. During the auditions she was very good at singing. After the auditions the agency told her that she got the job. Mandy was so happy because she didn't know what to say to thank them.

The Tyrant. She told her daughter to leave the house. The girl didn't listen and waited for her mom. Her mom came out to her house with the police. She found an older man beating up a young man. The man was the tyrannical husband of the young man.

Sam The Video Game Addict. Sam loved video games and played them often. One day he became addicted to a particular game and couldn't stop. This was bad because it made him want to quit. He played the game for weeks and days at a time. Eventually his gaming addiction made him get worse and die.

Pizzeria. I wanted to have some homemade pizza for dinner. I was worried that I would waste all the cheese if I tried to do it. I searched online for ideas for homemade pizza dough. I found one recipe. I followed it and it turned out perfectly.
The tattoo removal. Jenny loved tattoos. She decided she wanted one in her neck. It hurt a lot and she was terrified. Luckily she was able to get it. She loves tattoos.

Work. Diana's day at work was a disaster. She had been in a bad accident earlier in the week. She did not know how to fix her car. Her boss had her take a look at her car and take a quiz. Finally she was able to fix her car and keep working.

Dog. Dan loved his pet dog. He was very protective over his dog. One day he saw his dog run away and hurt a child. Dan called his dog's owner to pick him up. Dan returned the dog to the person who owned him.
Soccer. Lacy was in her high school soccer team. One day she sprained her ankle. The coach did not want to take her out of the game. He made her sit on the bench. Lacy was sad when she left the game.
Rice Milk. Bob was at a fast food restaurant. He ordered some fried chicken. The chicken was crispy. But the rice was so watery. Bob decided to get a glass of water for lunch.
Party. My friend had a party. His friends invited their friends over. At the party, everyone started drinking. They all went home. My friend didn't invite anyone over again.

The Chicken. It was a rainy day and Sue was hungry. She grabbed her favorite chicken breast and some bread. Sue walked to the store to buy her food. When Sue got to the store, she saw that the store was out of bread. Sue ran to the store and bought bread to make her own chicken.
Karma. John was playing with his kids. They were being mean to each other. John asked them to stop. They weren't listening. John got the police to call in his kids.

Unwanted apps. Tim was surfing the web one afternoon. Suddenly, he noticed that his favorite internet apps were disappearing. Tim was furious about it. Then, he noticed something else. They were all now removed from his home network.
Too heavy. Caroline and Bill were going on a trip. Bill told Caroline to take her backpack. Caroline took her bag, but it fell off of the bench. Caroline fell down on the ground. Bill got very mad.

A Dog on a Boat?. The family sat down at a picnic table for their afternoon meal. Suddenly the boy said his dog wanted to go out on the water. The dog barked and yelped at the boat. Dad asked if he could come back later. His dog came back in a few hours.

Smoke. John got a text message from his girlfriend. Her boyfriend was out of town. She had to stay home with the kids. John went outside to see if he could hear them. The smoke alarm had gone off and he got to watch tv.

The Bodybuilder. Matt was on his high school varsity wrestling team. He would always make the team, despite his looks. One day while competing, he got injured. His coach had to call off the competition to give him some rest. Matt was upset but learned that it would be alright.

Malaysia. My daughter was at school in Malaysia last week. We were surprised to learn it was so long. I had never seen this length of road before. I was looking forward to it. It took hours to get there.

Cracked. Beth went to the park with her friends. As she sat down her bike fell out of her grasp. Her arm went in the air and she landed on her ankle. It cracked open as she hit the ground. She was okay but her friends had to pick her up.
Alpaca. Tim loves animals. He has two goats. He found an alpaca in the backyard. Tim's goats loved the alpaca. Tim now has a new pet.

A night at the city. My friends and I were hanging out. We decided to make a movie night. We spent the evening watching movies. We got in trouble for stealing a projector. It took awhile to make up for the movie we stole.

Work. Gina wanted to learn how to cook. But her dad wasn't interested in her. So Gina had to go to work at a restaurant to learn how to cook. And her first job was to prepare pizza. It wasn't a great career choice.
Bad Cook. Tom was cooking at home. He was making a sandwich. He put too much bread into the pan. The bread burned on the first slice. He had to throw out the burnt bread.

change. The couple was eating a fancy dinner. Suddenly the waitress brought them change. They wondered how they would pay for the meal. Luckily, they had a lot in their pockets! They were able to pay for their meal without much trouble.

The Ticket. A man walked up to the counter and gave the driver a ticket for speeding. The man left a note saying he would write another one. The next week the same man came back and said he would write another. The man wrote another ticket and told the clerk what he had done. The clerk wrote a ticket and the man got away with it.
Toy shopping. We took our kids to Toyland last Saturday. They loved it. They chose lots of different toys. We had fun helping with the kids. It was a great time.

Wedding Day. It was Tiffany and Henry's wedding day. It had been a long time since they had been able to take a trip. They had been going to the city almost every day. However when it was time to leave for the wedding, the plane ride was long. Tiffany and Henry decided to take a cab instead.

The Christmas Miracle. There was a young boy named Jim who was so lonely on Christmas morning. Jim's parents decided that he could have a secret Santa. Jim was excited that they told him his secret Santa was a Santa Claus. The rest of the day, Jim would play with his secret Santa. After his parents went to bed, Jim slept soundly.

My drone. When I was a kid, my dad bought me a drone. He told me it was going to make me a great pilot. So I was very excited for the weekend. As I got home from the airfield, I realized it was broken. I ended up not being able to fly my drone.
Anger management. Kate was in the cafeteria. Someone bumped into her. The girl started to yell at Kate. Kate tried to take the girl's attention. Kate wasn't able to make them leave.

New friends. My new friends are all very smart and funny. They all go out with me once in a while. Yesterday we went to a bar and danced a little. I hope we get more together. Now we are really hanging out.
Susie's favorite Doll. Susie was watching a scary movie. All of the sudden her favorite doll popped out. She screamed in terror. Susie had a panic attack. She ran home and cried in her own room.

Public Speaking. Alicia's boss told her she was bad at public speaking. He also made her wear a fancy dress to the meeting. When she got to the meeting, Alicia realized she hadn't been prepared. Her boss's stern looks didn't help her feel good about herself. Alicia didn't speak for the rest of the meeting.

Truss. I got into a car accident. The driver got out and was hurt pretty badly. My daughter helped him get into the ambulance. He was lucky to be okay. I'm not sure what happened in that car accident.

Brian made the baseball team. Brian was an average kid who wanted to try out for the team. He worked very hard and his tryouts went well. Brian practiced hard everyday after school. Brian played in the final game of tryouts. Brian was excited to be on the team.
Lost. Tom bought a car in California. It was very old and very dirty. He kept it for a few weeks. Then, it broke down on the interstate. Tom had to get a new one.

Date Night. Today my friend came over to stay with me. We were excited to catch up. When we got to my place it started to rain. It was raining hard and the wind was strong. When the storm ended, it started to snow and my friend was scared.

Labor. It was late at night and Beth was going to have an abortion. She sat at home, exhausted and in pain. After several hours she went to her doctor. Her doctor said she had contractions and her labor was stopped. Beth was relieved and felt great relief.
My iphone. Today I bought a new iPhone. I opened it up and looked inside. It was a new iPad. The iPad was bigger and faster. Now I love my new iPad.

Holding a Parking Spot. Tom was waiting for a friend at a parking spot. Tom forgot to move out of the spot when he left. The car in front of him turned out. It hit the side of Tom's car. He was very happy the car didn't get rear-ended.

Contest. Gina was in the fourth grade and entered a contest. She could win 100 candy bars, one for each of her classmates. The prize for second place was 100 candy bars. When the results were posted the girl was upset. She had gotten second place, not 100 candy bars.

Sandy Shoes. Sandy was working late one night. She didn't have any money to buy a new pair of shoes. Sandy went to the shoe store to buy a pair of black sandals. The cashier informed her they were out of sandals. Sandy left the store crying and disappointed.
Dragon. Lucy had never seen a real dragon before. She was very curious about them. She asked her mom to show her one. After a bit of watching she saw one. Lucy was very excited about this.
Fist Fight. It was Kelly's turn to get in the water. She was going to swim against the current. The waves pushed her back. Then a strong wave hit her face. Kelly screamed as her hand got cut off.

Fig Tree. I decided to take a fig tree out for a walk. I walked down the path to where the fig tree was. I took a few pictures of the tree. Then, I went back to where I had started. I decided to take a picture of my new fig tree.

The Beach Ball. Rita loved beach sports. She loved playing volleyball, especially the beach volleyball game. She was excited to try out for the state team this year. Her team won all of the beach volleyball games. She was so happy to be on the team and play in the beach!
The Bed. The man put on his shoes. He put on his pants. He put on his shirt. He got into bed. He fell asleep fast.
Song. The man sang a song. His wife listened to it. She was impressed. She decided to sing along with him. They both became great songwriters.

James Drinks Iced Coffee. James notices that his coffee has been cold lately. He decides to mix some hot water with the cold coffee. He drinks the hot water and feels refreshed. His coffee isn't cold anymore. James is happy that he no longer has cold coffee.
Fishing. Mark was out fishing. He set out a castline with his pole. Mark got a bite on his line. Mark was happy with his catch. Mark was happy that he had caught a fish.
Dent. Tom had a cavity. He went to the dentist. The dentist looked at his teeth. He told Tom he needed to take medication. Tom felt better after taking the medication.

Translating. Amy was trying to translate a Chinese poem into English. She was trying to speak a little bit of it in her head. Then she got the idea to use an online translator. She checked her translator every day for errors. Finally she was good enough to submit the poem to the paper!

Making a New Friend. Tim always had trouble making new friends. He couldn't figure out why nobody liked him. After a long time of trying he finally decided to try to make some. His first few tries, no one seemed to like him. Then after a while he began to make some friends through his humor.

Exterminator. Kendra was having a bad day. She found a dead mouse in her room. She thought the dead mouse would just be a dead mouse. But when she looked in the kitchen, she saw something. Her cat had taken the dead mouse outside!

Procrastinator. Dan wanted to help his friend Alex finish his school report. He told Alex that he had to finish his report by June 15. Alex was very frustrated and demanded to know why. Dan explained that it was due in a few days. However, after work, Alex found it was already due and got upset.

Bloody Nose. Tim had just started to drink alcohol. The blood in his nose was extremely red. He tried not to flinch when others made fun of him. Tim continued to drink and his nose kept getting bloodier. The doctor told him to stop drinking alcohol and his nose would improve.

Jewish. Derek wanted to be a doctor, but his mom said he couldn't be Jewish. So he took a kabbalah class and practiced his prayers. In school, people started to notice that Derek wasn't Jewish. Derek's mom became furious and asked for him to change his religion. After being Jewish for years, Derek never became a doctor.

Volunteer. Jane was doing a cooking program at a camp. She asked her mom if she could volunteer. Jane's mom was against it. Jane decided she could not do it. Jane felt bad and decided to come back next year.

Sugar. Tricia went to the store. She wanted to get some fruit for breakfast. When she walked in, the cashier told her it was out of sugar. Tricia was confused and thought the cashier didn't know. Tricia left the store without sugar and went home hungry.

My dad is crazy. I never understood why everyone hates my dad. I would always go with him to the movies with him. The first time I saw that movie he was talking about God. He said that God told him to make me famous. It was then that I understood why I hate him.

The Heart Attack. Sandy had been battling with anxiety since the age of 14. She tried to get help but all she was getting was cold medicine. When she was finally diagnosed, her doctor told her she had a heart attack. The paramedics had to rush her to the hospital. Luckily, her heart did not break and she felt much better.

Turn On Music. She sat down on the bench and looked at the music in the car. She looked at the windows and couldn't find the source of the sound. She looked all over the bench. She eventually gave up and turned the radio on. After that, she couldn't find the source of the music.

Hide n Seek Game. Tom and Tom's friend Tim played Hide n Seek. Tom's friend had a secret base underneath Tim's house. Tom was able to spy on the secret base. He was able to find out how Tim's friend's plans worked. Tim found out about his secret base, but Tom won.

Larry Loses His Sunglasses. Larry is driving in his car one day. He notices that he is wearing his favorite sunglasses. He puts them on and gets into his car. He begins to drive his car. He loses his sunglasses while driving.

Relationships. My boyfriend and I were dating for 2 years. He would spend his evenings in front of the TV. One day he was reading while I was cooking. He became upset and told me to get out of the way. He said I was ruining his favorite show.
Becky's New Dad. Becky never knew her biological father. She met her biological dad through Facebook. The two became friends. They married in California. Now they are parents to a little girl.
Bad coffee. Tim ordered a big coffee. He went to get it to go. The coffee was made by the machine. He noticed a small drip that ruined it. Tim got a refund on it.

Racing Competition. Ronda and her brother loved to watch car races. One day she decided to start watching one herself. While she was watching the car races she saw a racetrack. There was also a dog track. Ronda decided that she would like to learn to race too.

Birthday. I was going to my cousin's 50th birthday party. I wore black pants and a white t-shirt. My cousin told me I was ugly and not nice enough. I decided to ignore his advice. As I left his house, I saw a girl kissing his hand!

Old House. Joe's old house needed to be redone. He and his family decided to do it themselves. They used old paint and nails to make new walls. They put up a new roof and put a new bathtub in it. The whole house is now a beautiful brown house.

Suspended!. Sam was suspended at school for fighting. He argued with his teacher, and they were never able to resolve the issue. Sam's grades slipped, and he was offered another teaching job. Sam accepted the job, and began working with children. The children at his new school loved him!
Smoker. I am a retired smoker. I still smoke when my wife leaves. Last weekend I was at the mall. I saw a smoker there. He didn't notice me until after he left the store.

Smelly Cat. John took his cat out to a field. He let her smell the flowers in the flower garden. After a while he put in a fan. The cat began to smell it. John got home and found out that his cat had gotten stung by a bee.

Chicken Soup. I was at home and needed some soup. I went to the refrigerator and found the chicken soup I was looking for. I made some chicken noodle soup and put it in the bowl. I drank the soup with hot tea. After dinner I felt great and wanted to eat more soup.
Return to sender. Tim was a salesman. He had a job in which he worked from home. He received a package today. His computer was broken. It was his return from the sender.
Future Engineer. Jim wanted to be an engineer. He worked his way up to be an electrician. Jim eventually got a great job. Jim was able to retire early after 25 years of work. Jim was very happy.

Growing Plants is Hard. Gina and her siblings were helping their grandma plant a garden. Gina was reluctant to work, but her older sister urged her. She picked a plant and put it in a container, leaving her sister to work. Gina worked hard, but was unable to work fast enough. Her mother came in to help her work, and she was happy to see a result.

No Patience at All. Ben got up early in the morning to go jogging. However, he couldn't find his way back home. After several minutes, he realized he was lost. The road was closed due to a snowstorm. Luckily, Ben made it home in just one hour.

New Attitude. Tim was a teenager who was always a prankster. He tried to be cool by doing a prank at his friend's house. He got caught and his parents caught him. His parents grounded him for a month. Tim was a different person when he got out of it.

Careless Accident. John was on his way home from the gym. He decided to take a shortcut through some trees. As he was driving on the highway, he began to see a big tree in the road. He slowed down and looked at the trees. He felt relieved and knew he was safe from the car accident.

School Play. I was invited to a school play this summer. I went to the play last night. I did not like the play. However, I am still going to see it when I have free time. I'm going to take it one of these days.
Champ. Jim went to a casino. He saw a card he really liked. He decided to buy the card. He won the card. He then realized he lost the money.

new boyfriend. Tim was single for a while. He was seeing a girl that he liked. Tim began meeting more people and was meeting a lot. He decided to make a move and ask her on a date. Unfortunately she said no.

Sydnee's Song. Sydnee's new song went viral on the internet. She was nervous when she heard it. Her band and her management tried to get it off the internet. It finally ended up getting on the radio. It was a huge hit.

Novel. Gina had bought a novel she thought would be popular. She read it with her friends. The next day Gina saw the novel on her friend's shelves. She knew she had been caught. Gina was so upset she never read the novel again.

Water bottle. I went to the store with a water bottle. I bought a lot of things at the store. When I got home I used the water bottle in a bathtub. It was fun and I ended up drinking a lot. I realized I need to buy a new water bottle.

Bad Joke. Lance made a joke about a group of guys at the coffee shop. It was supposed to be a joke about being friends. The guys around him started laughing. Lance was embarrassed and apologized. It never worked out as planned.

The Speaker. Gina was seated in the front row when the speaker started speaking. It wasn't long before everyone in the hall began to shout. Gina started looking for her seat and realized it was on the other side. She realized she could only sit on the left side of the room. She was surprised at how uncomfortable it was to sit this way.
Visit. Samantha was at work one day. She got a call from her cousin. She was invited over for a visit. Her cousin told her that she was looking forward to the visit. She was happy that she got to go.
Sleeping Early. Bill was a late night snack eater. His wife wanted him to get some more sleep. Bill didn't like to get up. She told him he was late. Bill was very angry.

The Noisemaker. Tom was out at a bar with friends. Suddenly someone knocked on their door. Tom opened it and they said they were there to complain. The door was slammed and someone threw a smoke bomb inside. Everyone was upset and went home.

Banana Peel. Tom had an oily skin. He got a banana peel from a local health food store. Tom put it on before going to bed. He woke up the next morning with horrible sunburn. Tom had to eat a raw banana peel for a week.

Soggy. Gina walked into her room. She wanted to sleep but found that the room was dirty. Her parents had ordered pizza. But it was soggy so they left it there. Gina threw the pizza away and went to sleep.
Fencing. Sasha played tennis everyday. Her team had a tournament coming up. She practiced her serve and return shots. On the day of the tournament, she felt sick. She didn't go and her team lost.

Raul's Cat Costume. Raul wanted to be a cartoon character in his school's Halloween party. He knew he had to be unique to pass his classes and stay alive. He went to a costume store to pick a costume. The costume was too large for him to wear comfortably. Raul's friend gave him a shirt and a pair of pants to wear.

Pool trip. We wanted to go to the pool yesterday. We went in and put on swimsuits. Once we were out in the water we got to play a game. The game involved making swimmers jump and flip. We had a lot of fun.

New Kittens!. Eli was at the dog park and saw a bunch of puppies. He decided to play with them. But a pack of coyotes started chasing after them. Eli tried to run, but couldn't get away. Luckily, Eli's dog ran over and saved him.

Black Friday. Tom was shopping at the mall. He saw a lot of deals but none he wanted. He noticed he was stuck in the mall for hours. His family was waiting outside for him. They told him they'd do anything for a few minutes.

Puppy. Sara wanted a puppy. She decided to adopt one. When her parents went to pick one out they picked out the smallest one. Sara found out the dog was deaf. Sara decided she would adopt another dog and bring it home.

A dog. The family had just moved to a new town. Their new house was an old farmhouse. When they went out on the porch they saw a dog. They went in and found the dog very sick. The family took him to the vet and he got better.
Ready Supper. Sam wanted to prepare a supper. He looked online. He bought all the ingredients. Then he prepared the supper. It came out great.

The Dress. Kate was looking to buy a new dress for the dance. She found one that she loved. Unfortunately it was too small. But then she got a coupon for 25% off at the store! Kate ended up getting it!

Teased. Carson was feeling sad because he wasn't happy. He called his friends to talk about it. They said that it wasn't their business and that he should feel better. They asked him if he needed them. He felt silly for not asking for it.

Paws. My friends are getting a cat. They are really excited for their new pet. They brought home a little kitty puppy for me to try out. It was a tough little kitty, though. I think the puppy is going to be okay.

No makeup allowed. One day, Kelly was in the middle of a photo shoot. As soon as the photo session was over, her makeup was gone. She tried to explain to her friend what happened but she was confused. She then decided to just let it slide and not say anything. However, one of her friends did notice and confronted her about it.

Super Mario. I've always loved playing video games. I bought a Super Mario Bros. set as a gift for my friend. I got the game and put it in the living room. I turned on the television. I watched as Mario ran across the screen.

False Alarm. Tom was at home watching television. A loud noise suddenly went off in the distance. Tom got up and looked around. It turned out that the noise was coming from outside. Tom quickly put the tv down.

The Card Collection. Kate had a huge card collection of her friends and family. One day she found one of her cousins was missing a card. She searched everywhere but couldn't find it. She was sad but determined to find it. She was very happy to find it and it helped her to feel better.

Migraine again!. Last week I had a migraine that made me miss work for five days. I kept going home and slept, then the headache got worse. I finally got the migraine under control with some pills. The next morning, it started to feel like a migraine again. Finally, I decided to schedule an appointment with the doctor.

Snake in the grass. It was a cold winter. Cindy was having trouble finding the grass. She noticed that she had left her car door open. She opened the door and found a snake in the grass. Cindy decided not to open the door again.
Too Much of a Wait. Tom was driving to work. There was a long line in the parking lot. He decided to drive past. He drove past several times. Finally he decided to wait for it to be over.

Erin and the dog. Erin is very afraid of the dog. The dog is always trying to get at Erin. Erin tries everything to try to get the dog. Finally she locks herself in a room. The dog eats her and Erin no longer fears the dog.

Statistics. My brother wanted to read the books about statistics. So I made him read a bunch of them. He wanted to show me how they applied in real life. But when he got home, he was very angry. He did not want to have to read the books again.

Comeback. The Yankees were down to their last batter. They hit a walk-off double play. The last two batters were on. The Yankees were up by one run. The final pitch came to Mark Teixeira to hit the winning home run.
Tadpoles. I was at the aquarium. There were several tarantulas. I picked one to put into the tank. Unfortunately, they were poisonous to me. I had to put him back out the next day.
Big Test. Tom was a high school senior. He was about to take a big test. Tom was very nervous about it. He kept trying to stay calm and focused. Eventually he got the answer he was looking for.
Space Heater. Joe was driving along. He noticed the car's heater wasn't working. He turned the heater on. The car was cool from the inside. Joe was relieved he had turned the heater on.

Perfect polish. Ivy really loved glitter polishes. She couldn't wait to get the perfect one. She decided to get all of them to buy one. Unfortunately, her mother took her to the store. Ivy had to take her to get a new one instead.
Free Food. Sasha was at the store. She wanted to get some ice cream. But she was too hungry. So she decided to get some pizza instead. She was happy with her choice.

Family Strife. The Johnson family was having family issues. They had always been very close. They decided to split up their problems. They tried to make the situation work. It didn't work out, and they are now fighting.

Reader. Bob was reading a popular book. He tried to read the same passage. He got distracted by the scenery and forgot about the story. When he got up, Bob couldn't remember how he got home. Bob was late for work.

The Bank Robber. Nora wanted to open a bank account. She bought a safari coat, but no money. She went to the bank to get a loan. The banker told her he was sorry, and loaned her $5000. Nora was excited and bought an expensive safari coat the next day.
Roadtrip. The kids decided to go to the Grand Canyon. They packed all their things in their car. They drove for over five hours. They stopped at a few places. When they got back, they were exhausted!

Stinky Feet. Diana was walking down the street. Suddenly, she heard a weird sneeze coming from her shoe. She looked down to see her feet were smelly. It turned out that her socks were leaking. Luckily, she didn't have to wash them for a long time.

Awkward Shave. Tom took his friends to the barber to get a shave. His friends asked him to shave before they left. Tom did not know how to shave properly. He thought he did a good job, but his friends thought he was ugly. Tom felt terrible afterwards.
The Free Burgers. Tom got really hungry. He didn't have a good dinner. Tom decided to go to a burger joint. They gave him free food. Tom felt great about it.

Cookies. Jane was baking cookies. She mixed up the ingredients for the cookies. When she took them out of the oven she realized they were dry. She checked her measurements and realized she made the dough too big. Jane had to go back and fix her mistake.
Runaway Dog. My neighbor's dog ran away today. He is 10 years old. I called animal control and they are looking for him. I sent him a note and got a reward for a reward. I hope they catch him.
Small Box. My wife and I found a large box on the ground. We opened it up. It contained a few magazines and a few books. We threw the items away. Now we just read.

Gas Station Blues. Beth was bored one morning when she got home. She decided to get a cup of coffee. As she walked to the counter she noticed a sign for breakfast. It read breakfast in the morning for two people. Beth was happy and went back to her desk.

Gus the Zombie. Gus was a popular local hero who had a funny name. He became a popular YouTube meme for his videos of singing and running. He became popular because he would go into other people's houses and scare them. A couple weeks ago Gus went into a random house in a random town. He went in and scared a woman, but the police caught him and he was released.

Clean Numbers. Liza had a habit of procrastinating and forgetting. Today was one of those days. Liza wanted to go to a party but could not. She had to do chores for the whole day. Her house became a mess.

Cold Shower. Sam woke up late. He was cold because he had had no shower. He turned off the heater but it wouldn't help. Sam threw on a sweatshirt and scarf and headed outside. Sam got soaking wet by the time he got back in his house.
Runner. Fred enjoyed running, but was never really competitive. His friend challenged him to a race. Fred trained for the race for a few months. At the race, Fred ran really well. Fred won the race!

Slippery Situation. I had to use a walkie talkie on the phone during a big storm. As I was talking, I felt a huge drop in the basement. I heard a loud crashing sound, so I ran upstairs. My walkie talkie was destroyed. I had to go without my walkie talkie.
Making Dinner. Barry made his family dinner. He took the first bite and spit it out. The second bite was very good. The third bite was even better. Barry decided to make more often.

Trial. Mara was taking a standardized test. She was doing well on it and wanted to improve. She hired a tutor to help her with the test. The tutor helped her a lot. Soon, Mara's grade was going up to a B!

New Crush. Tommy had a new girl in school. Tommy was very nervous about meeting her. After he saw her for the first time he was amazed. They clicked and became instant friends. Tommy made it a tradition to meet the girl before they went home.

Poetic Success. In an old English novel, James had the story of a poet struggling in the street. The poet became depressed after falling off his bicycle. James saw the poet's face, and realized he was not depressed. The poet looked back at James and smiled. James knew he was onto something.

The big storm. One day, a big storm came through town. The big storm flooded the roads. The streets had to be closed for days. The city started a fundraiser to pay for the repairs. The fundraiser was successful and they were able to reopen the roads.

Searched. Maggie decided to check her phone for messages. She was frustrated that she couldn't find her text. She tried to find a specific message on her phone. Finally she had the message sent to her. Maggie was relieved that she wasn't missing any messages.

The quick move. Jill wanted a new home. She decided to go to a cheaper place. She needed to relocate to another state. Jill decided to move closer to her grandparents. She moved to Florida and was happy there.

Pool closing. All of a sudden the pool closed for a few days. We were very sad about it. Then a new owner came and renovated it. When he opened it it was beautiful again. We were glad the pool reopened.

A Neighbor's Passing. The neighbor's husband passed away. His wife and kids were devastated. They decided to move into his old home. They worked hard and bought a lot of renovations. When they moved in, the house was very neat.
Game-Winner. Terrance took the ball from the other team. He ran down the court with it. He threw it high above his head. It landed in the hoop. The crowd cheered as the player's won.

The movie. Trevor liked scary movies. He picked out the scariest one he could. When he saw it he freaked out. Trevor decided to stay home and watch the movie alone. He found the movie to be just as scary as he had expected.

Eyesight. Tom lost his vision to macular degeneration. He didn't want to take the long trip to the eye doctor. He called his girlfriend and asked her to pick him up. She agreed and they took the long drive. After arriving, Tom had a good time with his girlfriend.

Lifting Weights. I've always wanted to lift weights. I tried lifting with a barbell on the floor, but that wasn't stable. I then tried lifting by dumbbells, but that was awkward. I finally decided to start lifting weights by the barbell. Now I lift weights by the barbell and it's working well.

Plaque. Lily placed a big, beautiful plaque in her front yard. She had bought it for the town hall. She thought the town hall would appreciate it. The next day, the town hall took down the plaque. It replaced it with a small plaque.

Free Haircut. Mandy had wavy brown hair. She decided to cut it short. After the cut was done, she realized she looked terrible. Mandy decided to go get a new haircut. She had the cut done the next day.

Cookies. Alicia wanted to bake some cookies. She put the dough into the oven. But when she took the cookies out, they were burned. Alicia ran out of oil to put back in the oven. So she had to eat the burnt cookies anyway.
The Grand Slam. I was the pitcher in a basketball game. The score was tied. I tried to hit the ball. I made the shot and went up for a lay up. I missed the lay up and the game was tied.

Sam. Sam was a boy who liked playing baseball with other boys. His older brother Sam was his best friend. Sam liked playing baseball, but didn't like playing baseball with his brother. One day, Sam and his brother had to go play baseball. Sam and his brother played baseball for all three days, but got hurt.
Rain OUt. The sky got cloudy. Timmy had to wait for his mother to bring the car in. They drove until the clouds cleared. They stopped at a gas station to rest. They drove home after the sun came up.

Dessert. Sam had no money to pay for his mother's birthday. So he got up the courage to ask his mother for money. She told him she'd pay him if he brought her a present. Sam got a puppy for her birthday, and promised to bring her one. Sam never had to pay for his mother's birthday gift.
Box of Candy. Amy loved candy. She loved the smell. She picked up the biggest box she could find. She filled the box with candy. It made her very happy.
Spy. Anna had a secret to keep. She wasn't allowed to tell anyone. One day she decided to tell her mom. Then she hid it for months. She finally confessed it to her dad!

Jasmine's Ring. Jasmine loved gold. She decided to give her ring to the best jewelry store. When she tried to pay they had no money. They had to ask her to come with and help them. When she came they were so grateful and thankful.

Mistake. Miley was having dinner with her friends. She was on her way to the bar when a man came up to her. He was wearing a pink baseball cap with a purple bow on the front. Miley smiled at the man, but then realized he was wearing a hat. She took it off to throw the man out, but he didn't notice.

Late night Snack. Jim always had a peanut butter and jelly sandwich on his desk. Last night he forgot his sandwich. He decided to grab his friend's sandwich. It tasted really bad. Jim decided to bring his sandwich from the kitchen.

5 Years. Gina was sitting at the bus stop waiting for the bus. She was happy about having a new puppy. She couldn't wait to play with her puppy. But after 3 minutes her puppy wouldn't stop chasing her. Gina was annoyed that she waited so long to see her puppy.

hostage. Sam was a new college student. He was being attacked by a student named Ben. The two of them fought in the library. Ben managed to grab Sam's wallet and phone. After being beaten up, Sam was unable to continue his studies.

Caldwells. Caldwell has three cats and two dogs. He likes to keep them in separate crates. This keeps them apart in the house. However, one day he noticed the dog had moved. He had to call the police to get her back.
Bad aloe gel. Kelly got aloe gel. She put it on her lips. Unfortunately it didn't feel good. It made her lips soggy. She felt sick.

Zoe for President. Zoe was running for president. She spent much of her campaign talking about women's issues. Zoe's campaign was not a success. Zoe decided she would focus her efforts elsewhere. Zoe won the race with a good showing in the primaries.

New guitar. A man went online to look for a guitar. He found a cheap one at a garage sale. He got it and had it shipped to him. When he got it he tried to play it. It was really bad so he threw it out.

Cheesy. The man asked his wife for her opinion on some pasta. She did not like it and told him to try it again. His wife thought the man was being silly and suggested he try another. The man did not listen and decided to go for it. His wife called him out for being silly and he told her to shut up.
Jay at the concert. Jay's favorite band is performing tonight. He bought tickets to the concert. He was so excited to see them. He was so excited to meet them. Jay is happy to see them.

Gun range. Kia was on her first visit to the gun range. She had heard about it being a shooting range, but didn't know much about it. The people were friendly and informative. Kia loved the range and tried several guns. She bought a new one and loved it.
Stylist. Mandy wanted to become a stylist. She looked online for jobs. She found a posting at a clothing store. She applied. Mandy was hired the next week.

The Garden. The woman planted a vegetable garden. She watered it and watered it. After a year, it was big and strong. She watered it again and it was ready to flower. The woman smiled as she watched her garden flourish.

piano lessons. Susie thought she would never learn how to play the piano. But when she signed up for lessons, she became really good. Her father took her to a new location and taught her how to play. She became better and better. She soon got the place booked for next year.

Special Ingredient. Kenny's mother always used her mother's special food seasoning. Kenny's mother said she liked that because it was fresh. Kenny ate her mother's seasoning. But his mother's chicken was not fresh. He decided to go buy fresh chicken.
Too Busy. Jim woke up to a loud noise. He quickly took a deep breath and went outside. He opened the window. He went outside and walked around. Jim felt exhausted and went back inside.
The bus ride. Sam was on a school bus. Sam's bus broke down. Sam and his friend drove to a repair shop. They repaired Sam's bus. The next day, Sam and his friend rode the bus to school.

Best Formula. Dan loves to drink hot coffee. Dan wanted to make some homemade hot coffee. Dan used water, cream, sugar, and coffee. After making the coffee, Dan took some for himself. Dan loves to drink his homemade hot coffee.

Card Games. Molly was very good at playing cards. She wanted to play with her friends one day. She practiced all week. The day of the big game she played well. Her friends decided to invite her to play next time.

Questioned. Jane went to the beach with her friends. A group of guys approached her. Jane noticed a tattoo of a swastika on one of the guys. They kept staring at her. Jane's friends decided to run away.

The Race. Tom was running a very fast race. He thought it would end in a close finish. All of a sudden it was about to end. It had to be stopped to make sure it didn't crash. The race was a record time for Tom and he won!
Dunkirk. My sister and I had to go to Dunkirk last week. We took a bus. We got there and it was beautiful. We had fun riding around on the boat. We stayed at a nice hotel.

Pimple Face. My friend had a pimple on her forehead that was black. She had heard that black pimples look bad. She decided to shave it off. She decided to apply pimple cream to it. Within an hour, her pimple was gone!

A Lap of Coffee. I went to a coffee shop for my daily coffee. I asked for the iced iced coffee, but I was told to get iced hot coffee. I felt like I would be better off without the hot coffee. I walked out of the shop feeling disappointed. I went to my car, went home, and drank a cup of hot coffee.

Rated R. Darlene has never been a fan of horror movies. One night she decides to go to the movie. After she starts she immediately gives up. She decides she'll never see a true horror movie. She decides she can only watch horror movies that she has seen.

Pizza. Samantha decided to make a pizza for her family. She went to the store to buy all the ingredients. She went home and prepared her food. Her family loved the pizza. Samantha couldn't wait to share her family's favorite dish!

Gossip. I was sitting at my desk reading a newspaper one day. Suddenly, the doorbell rang. I answered the door and it was my boss calling. I told him about the story of the girl who broke into my house. He didn't seem happy.

Ikea Store. We bought a new couch for our new apartment. The couch arrived and was great. The couch felt amazing in our new place. It was so comfortable we ordered another couch. We loved our new couch and were happy.

Breakup. Tom's girlfriend told him that she was tired of it. Tom didn't want to break up with her so she left the house. His mother got out of work to pick him up. Tom got home and realized he was alone again. Tom had to find a new girlfriend.
