The Blood Drive. Sophie was volunteering at a blood drive. She needed to get some donations. She went to a gas station with her parents. Her parents let her donate blood there. She was pleased that she did.

Spree. Alicia wanted to quit her job, but couldn't. She had a lot of bills to pay. Finally, Alicia decided to go on a huge shopping spree. The grocery list had to wait, but Alicia spent over two hundred dollars. Alicia found a job and happily ended her shopping spree.

The Missing Pie. One day when we were out of doughnuts I remembered our old pie recipe. It was the same one we used to bake a million years ago. We dug through the cupboards and found nothing. I looked all over the house and could not find it. We spent the next hour looking and finally found the pie.
Deep-fried. Bob and his friends went to a fried chicken restaurant. The place was really crowded. Bob ordered some deep-fried chicken. It was amazing. Bob was happy he ordered it.

Burger. John had to make a special meal for his wife's birthday. He tried to make burgers for her, but they were gross. His friends thought he was nuts. John decided to try to make them himself. He made his wife a perfectly made, delicious hamburger!

Gratitude. I saw my best friend at the store yesterday. He asked me for a credit card. I told him to go and get a credit card for himself. He said that he didn't have a credit card. That really hurt my friend.
Annie's Test. Annie was a freshman in college. She had an exam in the afternoon. She stayed up all night studying. Annie stayed up very late that night. She studied all night.

Little League, Big Dreams. Troy wanted to play baseball as a kid. He got a tryout with a team at the neighborhood ball club. Troy pitched extremely well at the tryout. The manager gave him a try out for the team. Troy's first game at the big league level was played the next day.

Soccer. Dan wanted to be the best at soccer. So he bought himself a special ball and joined a local team. After two months of practice, Dan joined a national championship team. Dan was happy that he was finally an adept soccer player. Dan wanted to become a professional soccer player.
Breakfast. I decided to eat breakfast today. I grabbed my favorite cereal. I ate it and started to get a good feeling. When I was done I felt full and rested. That made me feel very good.
Messy Studio. I took my girlfriend to a studio. When we arrived she thought it was too messy. She wanted to clean it up. I let her help me with it. Eventually we were able to clean it.

Trying To Stop A Thief. Tom heard about a store robbery that happened. He decided to go inside of the store. While inside, a man tried to steal his money. Tom ran as fast as he could. Tom made it out unharmed and was happy.
Icy Roads. Sam was driving along on the interstate. It was very icy out. Sam was going to miss the next exit. He had to change lanes to pass another car. It took him a long time to get back out.

Pool and ice cream. Sue's friends invited her over. She was really excited to spend time with them. Sue asked her mom if she could go. Her mother said she didn't want to see her. Sue went to a swimming pool instead.

Too Old To Trick Or Treat. Tommy and his buddies decided to go trick or treating. The boys went to their favorite local store. Tommy was the last to go inside. He was too old to be old enough to do his own trick. When they got outside, Tommy was gone.

Tough Test. I took a physics test the other day. I sat down and tried to focus. My eyes were closing and my mind was in a fog. After twenty minutes of trying I got an A. I can barely believe how tired I was and how hard the test was.
Messy theater. I was in a theater with my girlfriend. We were bored. There was no one to watch the movie. I grabbed a few things from the cupboard. Then, we made popcorn.

Between the pages. Gus liked to read. He spent a lot of time in between the pages. He could barely read the entire book. He kept looking forward to what was coming next. He never read the whole thing.

Nick Goes to England. Nick decided that he wanted to take a vacation. Nick did research on what destinations were located in England. He booked tickets to a flight to England. Nick arrived in England the day before his flight. Nick was glad that he decided to travel to England.

Breakfast Noodle. One day, Amy decided to make breakfast for her family. She bought all the ingredients. Amy was excited when her family ate the meal. Unfortunately they were all very full. Amy realized they ate too many pieces of toast.

No Self-Service. Janice and her friends went out to eat. The waiter kept bringing their drinks back. When the waiter finished up, the waiter noticed. He was confused because no one came to the table. The waiter left and the girls continued to eat alone.
Car Keys. Kia locked her car. She couldn't open it. She went to the store. She bought a cheap key. The car was now unlocked!
Jake Takes A Test. Jake has been taking the MCAT for the last year. He has taken many practice tests. Today, he has a big test. He studied hard all week for the test. He ended up passing the test.

Wide Feet. She tried to walk, but her feet were too wide. She called for a trainer and an exercise specialist. She went to the sports center and signed up for a class. She worked hard in her class. She ended up having wider feet!
College. I did not want to go to college. I asked my parents for my money for it. They agreed to a financial aid package. I did not attend college. My parents did not mind.

Summer Reading. It was the summer and James was bored. He decided to take up reading. He browsed several magazines and read in his room. James finished the entire book in two days. He was happy he was able to do this.

The Lottery Win. Jared made a lot of money on the lottery. He was excited to get a new car. Jared decided to spend all his money on a new car. Jared paid cash for his new car. Jared drove his new car to the dealership and purchased the new car.

Ben starts a food fight. Ben was out with friends. They were eating at a new restaurant. Ben decided to try some of their food. As soon as he bit into his food, he got angry. Ben got his friends to leave and apologized.

Too Much Rain. Gina was going to a concert with her band. The rain seemed to pour down harder. Gina's mom was yelling to get away. Gina tried to run, but the rain was too much. Gina was soaked by the end of the night.

The Drums. The couple sat in their apartment watching a movie. A loud boom came over the speakers. The couple screamed. They were amazed to see the boom was a real drum set. They were so excited to put it on their wall!

The Basketball Team. Ethan went to play his junior basketball team. The boys were losing by a few points. Ethan tried everything in his power to help his team. They ended up winning by 8 points. Ethan felt great about his work and gave a big shout out.

Salvation Army. My grandmother and I went to the Salvation Army on Sunday. We sat in the cafeteria for an hour, watching television. The staff worked very hard. We were all given a card that gave a lot of money. My grandmother had enough money to buy some stuff.

Rainy steph. Stephanie was in a car accident that took her leg. After her leg was healed, she was a lot more careful. Stephanie had the nerve to take a stroll on a rainy day. She had a lot of fun that day. After the day was over, Stephanie started walking again.
Quitting. Kim had been doing her job for weeks. She had always been happy to work at her job. Yet one day she felt very bored. She decided to quit. Kim was happy to take a break from work.

Missing Cake. The family was having a birthday party. Everyone ate cake and drank soda. Tom went to the bathroom to take a break. When he returned the cake was missing. His family thought someone had taken it.

Disco Dance. Timmy had never been to a disco. He was excited to go to one one night with his friends. They got ready and got in line. After waiting for fifteen minutes they went in. They danced all night and had a great time.
The Bunny. We bought a bunny. The bunny was black and orange. It was fluffy and funny. When we got the bunny, it had an injury. It couldn't walk.

Mango. Sally went to the market with her friend. She saw some mangoes that were bright green. Sally was not sure what they were. The mangoes had a green rind. Sally decided to buy them so she could be sure they weren't poisonous.

Stuck in the mud. I was walking to the store. There was mud all around. I tried to walk around but it was too slippery. I had to put my foot down and wait. After waiting for 10 minutes, I finally found my way.

Gerald. Gerald was a lonely man who liked to go fishing. One morning he went to the lake to fish. At the lake he saw a lady fishing. He approached the lady to ask for a fishing pole. The lady gave him a fishing pole.

The Puppy. A few weeks ago, we were sitting on the bench. The puppy jumped up at us and sniffed our feet. We decided to take him inside the house. As soon as we opened the door, the puppy jumped again. After a few hours, we decided to put the puppy back.
Entertainment. Tim was bored. He wanted to have some fun. He thought of a way to entertain himself. He decided to get into the theater. He had so much fun he never bored again.

Bitter exes. Jim had been in a terrible relationship for awhile now. He met someone new and they hit it off right away. He fell in love immediately. The woman wanted more than anything. Jim broke up with her right away.
Pictures. Joe had no money. Joe thought about the best way to get money. He decided to paint his house. Joe painted his house. Now Joe had money.

Eye Infection. Kate went to the doctor to see if there were any eye drops in the house. The doctor examined her eyes and said she had an eye infection. Kate went to the store to get eye drops. She filled up her eye drops but they didn't work. Kate went back to the doctor.
Broken heel. Today I went to the skatepark. I was trying to practice with my friends. My heel slipped on the concrete. My heel fell on the ground. I decided to go home and walk.
Driver. I worked in the auto shop. My boss would drive a car on our shift. He would get drunk and make bad decisions. He got fired and my boss let him go. The owner gave me my old job.

The Spider. The family was watching movies. They had been warned by their babysitter not to leave the house. They all were playing with a few pieces of cloth in the living room. Suddenly a spider emerged from the cloth. The spiders was stuck in the fabric so it was stuck there forever.
Too expensive muffins. Amy bought some muffins at the store. But then they were out of vanilla. Amy had to have the store return the muffins. The store was not happy. Amy gave up.

Jeff and his house. Jeff was tired of not having a house. So he decided to build one. He worked day and night on it. He finally finished it and put it on the market. Jeff sold it and now owns his own home.
The Sushi Chef. Lars had always wanted to be a sushi chef. His parents thought it was too much work. Lars studied hard in school. He was a great student. Lars is now a chef at a sushi restaurant.

Long Hair. Jenny was a popular girl in high school. She had short hair but wanted to grow it out. Jenny had to cut it in front of her whole class. She sat down and her mom took her to the school nurse. Jenny was told her hair would grow back by itself.

The Amusement Park. It was summer and the family wanted to go to the amusement park. The children were so excited to ride all the rides. When it was time to ride the roller coaster they were so scared. It was a great roller coaster, and they loved it! Now, the family always rides the coaster together.
Baked apples. My friends made a batch of apple pies. They were all delicious. But one of them had mold in it. The rest of the pies came out okay. I'm not sure why but I didn't make any more pies.

Sand. John went to the beach one afternoon. He got to play in the sand. It was very sunny at the beach. John began playing in the water. After a few hours in the water, he realized he was not very good at swimming.

The teacher at the store. Tim had a test coming up. He was excited for it because it was his first test. Tim was really worried about failing the test. Tim studied and was confident in his ability. Tim did great on the test and passed!
Leaky Roof. One evening Tom was out in the yard playing. He tripped over a branch. He hit his head. Tom was taken to the hospital. His mom patched up the hole in the roof.

New transportation. Dana really wanted to start her school year on time. She was excited that the new school year would start soon. When she got to school her class was very crowded. Dana waited for everyone to get off the bus. When she got off the bus, it was completely empty.
Exam. I was nervous for my history exam. When I got the test back, it was okay. I got a B. However, my mom made me take a written exam. The written test made me nervous.

Dan the candy man. Dan worked in the candy factory in a small town. He was paid to make small candy treats for the residents. When his boss retired he became the sole candy maker. Dan was given many responsibilities as he aged and got fat. Dan's boss found out and fired him from his job.

Goldfish. Linda's cat was a goldfish. Linda wanted to get a goldfish, but couldn't afford the bills. She decided to get the cat neutered. When Linda's cat was neutered, she adopted him as a pet. Linda never had to spend money on a pet again.

Can't Come In Today. Nancy has been waiting at a drive through for an hour. She had to get home quickly. She left the drive through with nothing to eat. She called her husband to tell him. Her husband took her home and she ate dinner.
Disastrous Diana. Diana was a great tennis player. She often beat her opponents at tennis. She thought that this meant that she was great. This wasn't true. She lost all of her matches.

Fussy Cat. Joey's cat was very fussy and always had a treat. One day, Joey got his cat a large treat and put it in the bowl. After a while, Joey's cat forgot about the treat. Joey's cat continued to be fussy. Joey gave up on the cat and bought some catnip instead.
Boating. Nita was going on a boat trip. She and her friends had a blast. They took lots of pictures. The boat capsized during the trip. Nita and her friends had to swim to shore.

Fashion. My favorite thing to wear is a red dress. It's my favorite thing to wear. I've been wearing it to school and the movies. Recently I went shopping for a new dress. I went home and put on my dress and I was so happy.
Marie. Marie loves to read. She had read over fifty books last year. Her parents want her to go to college. Marie hates to go to college. Marie is going to college next year.

Popsicle drip. Ava was watching TV one afternoon. Suddenly, she heard a pop! She realized she had put her ice cream on too long. Then she realized her ice cream hadn't been on long enough. She had to use a cone to scoop ice cream out.
Whistling Tea Kettle. Mary wanted to play a prank. She turned on her kettle and whistled loudly. The tea kettle began to boil. She then turned it off. Her parents saw the kettle on the stove.

Peapod. I bought a lot of books online. I decided to scan them all. My brother said he could do it. I thought he was joking, and he did not scan the book. I was extremely upset and demanded he not do it.

Garrett's Baseball Game. Garrett is the pitcher for his high school baseball team. He is struggling this season and hasn't pitched in awhile. The home team comes out to bat and gets three hits. Garrett gets the last strike and wins the game. Garrett is happy that his teammates were able to come out to play.

Star Quarterback. It was time for a new star quarterback to be drafted. Bill always had a special talent for making big plays. Bill was going to be the next great quarterback and he was going to be drafted. The second round was set, and Bill was ready. Bill went in the first round, and the New England Patriots selected him.

School Dance. Mary went to her favorite dance to meet a new friend. At the dance everyone was talking and having fun. Mary was nervous as she got on stage. She had been dancing for 3 hours. When she met her new friend she had a great time.

Body Transformation. Sara wanted to become a professional bodybuilder. She decided to use a diet and exercises to improve her appearance. She found a trainer to assist her with her diet and workouts. She began working out in the gym on a regular basis. Soon Sara's body was ready for professional competition.

Charging my phone. Yesterday I was watching a movie on Netflix. I forgot my phone in my pocket and it ended up falling out. My phone fell out while I was watching the movie. The screen cracked on the screen and my phone died. I was able to buy another one after I replaced the screen.

Bike Ride. I am on my way to go biking in the city. I decide to stop and ask for a ride. A young man agrees to go. The young man is wearing a black shirt with red stripes. I realize that the red stripes in the shirt are for a motorcycle.
The Nail. Toni was playing soccer with her friends. Suddenly, she tripped and fell. Her nails got stuck in her shoe. Toni couldn't get them out! Luckily her mom fixed them for her.
The Whale Problem. Tim was on vacation. He went to a local whale watching site. A large humpback whale surfaced. Tim decided to swim out to the whale. It was dangerous, but Tim survived.

The Model. Tina was a model for a fashion magazine. She tried out for the show but she fell flat on her face. Tina decided to practice on her own. She practiced until she had a better grip on her hair. She made it to the show and was able to get an A.

That Star. Kia's first love was a white, cisgendered, straight star. She dreamed of falling in love with her. She didn't realize she could do that without being a star. She was very nervous when she first saw a cis woman. But eventually, Kia fell in love with her and they started a relationship.

Fairy-tale. I asked my boyfriend for a fairy-tale, and he wanted a really good fairy tale. It had to be dark, so it wouldn't be funny, and it had to be set in a fairy tale. We spent all day writing the story, but we were not very good. We had to take it back to his house, and his parents read it to him. He loved the story, and it stayed
Sick from fajitas. Susie got a terrible headache. She didn't want to go to work. Susie called in sick from work. So her boss gave her a half day off. She was able to go to the doctor.
Excitement. Lance was excited. He had just finished a marathon. The next day he ran an ultramarathon. It was hard and his heart was breaking. He decided to be more patient next time.

Hot weather. My girlfriend asked me if I want to go out with friends. I said that I will try to find a warm place. We went to a football stadium. The weather was terrible and I was cold. She still loves me despite it.

Walden. Jill was bored and decided to play in the sand. She gathered up rocks and dirt and tried to make a wading pool. She dug a hole in the ground and put a large shovel in. Jill had to dig until her hand cramped and she had to stop. After that, Jill filled the hole with dirt and dug until it was wide.

Visual Genome. Jenny had been working on a visual genome for years. She would type in random words and see what they looked like. She worked with the text to write down what they meant. Then she had the results mapped onto a 2D chart. The chart was then used to categorize the different words.
Diet Soda. Tom started drinking diet soda daily. His friends all complained about it. Tom decided to try it. The diet soda really messes with his stomach. He is not sure he wants to drink it more.

Cactus in the Window. Caleb's grandparents were very old. Caleb's grandpa's window was very old and creaky. Caleb decided to climb the window to try to find cactus. The cactus grew all over the top and bottom of the window. Caleb's grandpa had to buy him a new window.

All work all play. Tiffany was a nurse. One night she went into a room with a man in a bathrobe. She screamed for her colleagues to get out of the bath. When they did, they saw her naked in the corner. She had accidentally put a gun in the man's hand.

Gymnastics Flips. I used to be a good gymnast. I used to be able to do gymnastics flips like a pro. Now I cannot do them. I have to learn new moves to be able to do flips. I guess I need a special tutor to teach me how to do flips.

Prank calls. I was doing a prank call to my friend last week. He agreed to it and I called him from my work. I told him to meet me at the park. He never showed up. Now I have to call him back at work.

Prank. Bill's parents thought that his prank would work. His brother and dad got their cell phones out and used it to call him. Bill thought he was going to get into big trouble. He was just getting ready to be picked up. Bill's parents told him he could have fun but not play prank.
Slow down. Tom was driving at night. It was very dark. He didn't see a car coming. The car didn't see Tom. It didn't see Tom.

The Bus Driver. Derek was walking in the mall one day. He passed a bus stop and heard a man calling for it. The driver drove to the stop and started to call for the driver. Derek decided to drive to the bus stop and wait for the driver. Derek was happy he never had to drive the bus again.

Duran Duran. My wife and I went to see a concert in Boston last month. The concert was a bit raucous. We tried to ignore it until the end. At the end, the band broke up. We did not attend the concert again.
Fresh lemonade. Today was my favorite day of the year. We went to the zoo. The animals were so cute and playful. When the sun went down the animals were still happy. I love the Zoo.

Marcus Makes a Sandwich. Marcus notices his mother is cooking a sandwich. Marcus decides he would like a sandwich as well. He makes a sandwich. He eats his sandwich. Marcus is happy that he made a sandwich.

Lost love. My husband and I were separated for a few weeks in 2013. After the break up we started talking about being together again. We talked a lot in the first few weeks. We even saw a movie together! He told me he was going to ask me to marry him.
Smelly Cat. The other day my cat went outside. She smelled something. I didn't know what it was. When I found out, I looked everywhere for it. I eventually found it under a rock in the yard.
Start your fight!. Tim decided to confront his bully Tom. Tom was very angry. Tim pushed him in the hallway. Tim's parents came in. Tom had a fight with them.

Toothpaste. Tom went to the dentist for some cavities. The dentist removed a tooth and he noticed a terrible white spot. It was a terrible toothpaste, and Tom was so upset. Tom tried to get another filling, but it was no use. Tom decided not to use cavities again.

Talent. Gina's dad always asked her to come to the school plays. Now he wants to find a new play to go to. His friend Joe suggested that she try dancing. It was the only thing he could think of. He told Gina the only drawback was that she couldn't dance.
Ingredients. I was cooking supper. I had a bunch of ingredients. I needed a certain ingredient, so I decided to make it. It tasted great. It was a good idea to keep an extra bag on hand.

Wild Rosebush. The kids gathered for a picnic. They picked a wild rose bush to cut for their lunch. They put the rosebush in a big trash bag. When they got back, it was gone! They searched the garbage and found the rosebush.
Swimming. Anna wanted to learn how to swim. She signed up for classes. Anna practiced every day. Soon, she was swimming like an expert! Anna was proud of her improvement!

The first kiss. Tim and Tim's schoolmates were dating. Tim wanted to get the girl to like him. One day Tim asked the girl out on a date. Tim invited his friend over and they both went out on the date. Tim and the girl were very much in love.

Melvin's Dog. Melvin loved his dog very much. Melvin's father took him to get his dog checked out. The dog was having a very bad habit of biting people. The vet told Melvin his dog was a bully and needed to be put down. Melvin vowed never to take his dog for a walk again.

Jason's decision. Jason was depressed about his current job situation. He wanted to work from home, but he knew his company was closed. Jason wrote an open letter to his company. His company posted the letter on the Internet. Jason received many responses from people wanting to work from home.

Stunt. Joe wanted to become an extra in a horror movie. He hired a stunt man and hired an A-list actress. Joe thought he'd have a hit on his hands. But the stunt man broke his arm and fell down the canyon. Joe couldn't get the job and had to take another shot.
Huge. It was the biggest spider I ever saw. It was around the size of my finger. The whole room shook. We all ran out of the room. We were scared to death of the spider.
Lost Car. Alicia was going for a run. She had to stop at a red light. Alicia's car got stopped by another car. Alicia's car was towed. Alicia had to get a new car.
Frozen Ice. Tom was on vacation. He went to a local ice cream parlor. He tried a vanilla ice cream. Tom thought it tasted weird. He decided not to eat it.

Close call. I was playing on the baseball field. One of the balls landed in a tree. When it hit the tree I jumped out of the way. A large branch came loose and flew out of my way. I ended up falling out of the tree.
The Alamo. When I was young we visited San Antonio. We went to the Alamo. It was in San Antonio. It was beautiful. It's sad that it has been lost.
How Shelly Broke Her Toe. It was a hot day. Her toenail was already a big mess. Her mom decided to put ice on it. It worked, but her toe was still sticky. Thankfully she didn't break it.
Jelly Shoes. My son was in the 8th grade. We bought him a pair of jelly shoes. He did not like them at all. My son tried them on in the car. He said they were a great fit!

Astronaut. Rena worked hard to be an astronaut. She practiced her piloting skills every day. She finally got her pilot's license. She flew to the moon to prove she could do it. Rena became an astronaut.

The Move. Joey moved into a new apartment. He was nervous about making a new friends. He would go out with his friends everyday for a week. After a week he realized they weren't friends after all. He eventually moved out of the apartment.

A Kingdom Betrayal. My family and I were out to dinner one night. I had a friend that I thought could become my wife. He bet on the games that night and won. I was very upset that he did that to me. I told him that he would never be my wife, but we ended up having kids.

Breakfast. Joe went out to eat one night. He ordered a cheeseburger and fries. He had one of the worst breakfasts ever. He had a terrible time eating the food. Joe did not want to get out of there that night.

Biggest Fan. Bill and Jane both wanted the biggest fan. They got into a huge argument. One of the girls admitted she didn't really care for him. Bill tried to comfort her. She accepted it and was really upset at Bill.

Stretching. Amy wasn't allowed to ride her bike without a stretch. She'd stretch for an hour before her first race. Amy hated the pain she felt in her calves. She decided to stop stretching after one race. She felt much better after that.

How I sprained my ankle. I was running around the park with friends. I tripped over a rock. My ankle gave out immediately and I broke it. I had to go to the hospital to get it fixed. Luckily it was just a bruise.

Gym. My daughter wanted to try out for the soccer team. She practiced soccer for three months. When the tryouts were over she did a better job. She was offered a spot on the team. Her parents were thrilled.

Stolen Jewelry. Lucy found a ring on the ground near her couch. She couldn't imagine anyone would buy it for such low value. After a while she decided to check on the owner. She found it was the owner's mother. Lucy felt relieved when she realized she could get her money back.

Michael's Collection. Michael wanted to help kids in need. He visited a shelter and collected old clothing. He wore the clothing to school. He was able to get some free school supplies. The kids loved Michael's kindness.

Two Fans and Their Favorite Show. The two fans had been waiting for the new Star Wars movie to come out. On Christmas eve, they decided to see a movie on Christmas day. They waited in line for an hour and twenty minutes. Finally, they got their tickets. Now they sit in front of their TV waiting for the new Star Wars movie.

Racing Cars. Jerry loved racing in his dad's race cars. When Jerry was ten years old, his father died. Jerry became very sad and wanted to be a car racer. He found a shop and took many racing lessons. Now, Jerry is a successful car racing driver.
Fishing. Bill loved to fish. He had a huge bass in the river with him. It was really small and slow. Bill cast a line and the fish jumped. He took the bait and the fish swam away.

Paint Cover Up. Dan had just been hired on to paint a house for a rich family. He thought it would be a fun project for the young artist. The family was not having it though. They accused him of stealing. Dan was fired and had to find a new job.

Kitten Friends. Doris and Tom had a playful friendship. They adopted a kitten together. They would play together every day after school. They also took the kitten on hikes and to the beach. They were best friends through thick and thin.
Cross country. Sam wanted to go cross country. His friends made fun of him for his fear of heights. Sam decided to join a race. He felt stronger going the distance. Sam was happy he took the risk.

Great birthday. Timmy's birthday was coming up. He asked for a puppy. He was disappointed and thought his parents would say no. He found a puppy in the yard and asked for one. His parents said yes and he got a puppy too!

Josh. Josh is the best quarterback in school. He won the championship last year. All his friends are scared to play against him. One day, Josh scored a touchdown and everyone was thrilled. Now everyone in school calls Josh the best quarterback ever!

Drive-thru. Ethan's car wouldn't start. It had to be towed out to the shop. He was stuck for an hour waiting for it to be fixed. When he got back the car was in terrible shape. Ethan bought a new car and never had to deal with it again.

Best Trip Ever. Joe was on a trip to New Orleans. He had never been, but he had read so much about it. The trip began very well. Then, a huge storm blew in, leaving Joe stranded. He spent the entire day in the middle of the streets, and he felt awful.

Lovers and Flowers. Lucy and Jack were happy to be alone. They decided to have a picnic. There was no food in the car. They decided to throw flowers on top of each other. It made their picnic feel more romantic.
Steve's Award. Steve was a member of the Boy Scouts. He did very well in the annual merit badge. Steve had been nominated for an award. He did not win it. Steve was sad but accepted the award.

No Biting Please. I was on my way to the airport yesterday. I was on my way to a doctor's appointment. On my way there I saw something on the ground. It was a dead mouse. It was on my way back home and I had no idea where.

Calling In Sick. My friend Tim was having trouble working at his job. Tim was taking time off from work to go home. He was supposed to call in sick, but couldn't. Tim was going to be late for work that day. Tim was so upset, he called in sick.

The Surprise in the Creek. Jane was going fishing with her mom. Her mother turned her back to the river. Jane was shocked to see the water had a deep green tinge. She pulled in the hook. She saw a giant fish that her mom had been hiding!

Fell in the lake. I was riding my bike one day. While riding I dropped my bicycle and felt something wet. The wet felt like it was going to fall out of my shoe. I pulled my foot out of the wet and saw that it was a big crack. I had broken my right heel in three places.

For Victory. Sam decided he didn't like jocks. But he realized the other team is better than him. He practiced with his friends until he got good. The next game he came out and beat his team. He went to the party with his friends.

New Horizons. The astronauts were looking up at the stars. They had never seen anything so amazing. They looked through binoculars and telescopes. They noticed that some of the stars were moving away. The astronauts realized the Earth is not the center of the universe.
Instant Exit. My nephew was in high school. He had an upcoming band concert. We got there early to get seats. They were completely sold out. I guess we'll never see them again.
Bad haircut. Marissa had bad hair day. She decided she would get a haircut. The barber was very rude. Afterward, her hair felt terrible. Marissa decided to not get a haircut.

Old Prison. One day Billy was sent to an old prison in Arkansas. He was kept there for many Years. After he left he was found in the middle of a fight. Billy was taken back home where his mother found him. Now Billy lives a happy life and doesn't get to do what he likes.

Vegetable Garden. Mary has a vegetable garden. She takes the vegetables from her garden each week. Her garden is now looking pretty good. She is ready to sell her vegetables. Mary is happy to make some money selling vegetables.

The Cracked Cup. Amy and her friends were playing in a field when she fell down. The boys ran to help her up, but her cup shattered. She got angry, yelling that she could not play anymore. Her friend Jane said she would be mad if she didn't. They went outside to play.

Big Money. A man was getting a second job. The new job involved moving furniture around the house. The man would take a large amount of money out of his bank account. The man's bank refused to tell him what the money was going towards. The man ended up having to steal a car.

Pet a Fish. One day I was out fishing with my dad. I cast my hook and saw a small fish. I hooked the fish and threw it in the water. I went to take it out and it was already dead. I didn't have any money for fish so I took it home.

Cookies. Kelly really wanted to impress her boyfriend. She decided to make him a batch of cookies. The cookies were delicious! Her boyfriend couldn't believe his eyes. He told her he loved cookies and she was happy.

The Freezer. Cindy is a woman who hates to eat ice cream. She decided to try to eat one while walking around the city. The first few times, she got ice cream in a bag. One day she ordered a frozen milkshake. She couldn't wait to eat it.

Ooh That Smell. Sally was playing hide and seek in the house. She went behind the stove and crawled inside. It wasn't long before her parents discovered her. Her mom had a bad smell of something nasty on her. Sally was grounded for two days.
Hair. Tom was a musician. Tom's hair was thinning. Tom decided to do a mohawk. Tom tried a wig and it looked horrible. Tom never went back to a straight haired look again.

Louvre. I decided to take a train to Paris. After arriving I saw all the famous buildings. The Louvre was my favorite. It was a beautiful place. It was a very different experience to being in a small town.

Wedding Video. The couple was going to get married. They were filming the wedding. They got everything perfect. Then the wedding footage was accidentally deleted. The couple never got the footage they shot.

The Pet Trial. Fred is a great dog but his owners aren't sure if they can keep him. They take him to the local animal shelter, to see if anyone has any pets. There are so many animals that need homes and the kids are excited. At the shelter, Fred finds a sweet white dog, named Nya. Fred falls in love with Nya and spends the next few days playing with her.

Marco Jumps Rope. Marco was at the pool. He was having fun jumping rope. Then his dad told him he would like to see his friend next. He got down from the rope and jumped. He ended up falling into the pool and broke his arm.

Early Dismissal. Jill had gotten into trouble at school. Her mother was very mad at her for a very long time. After several months Jill was informed that she would be grounded. Jill tried to remain resolute in her resolve. After a few weeks, her mother allowed her to stay at her house.

New friends. Kelly and her class had a Halloween party. But, Kelly didn't know anyone in the class. When she was alone, her friends were scared. But, Kelly made new friends that night. They didn't feel nervous anymore.

Linda starts a garden. Linda wants to have a garden in her backyard. She starts by planting seeds and water. The next month she adds a vegetable garden. She puts some tomatoes in her garden. Linda is happy to have started a garden.

Lost Tools. Tom was at work. He decided to get a new set of tools. After buying them, he didn't realize they were missing. Tom looked everywhere and couldn't find them. He had to spend all his money and time looking for them.

The steak. Remy loves steak. He is always craving one. Remy's friends decided to invite him to a big steak dinner. After he eats his steak, Remy is very satisfied. Remy decides to go back to the party later.

Erik's First Kiss. Erik had never been kissed before. He was nervous about the first time he kissed a girl. After a while, Erik started to really enjoy his date. He was very happy to kiss her. He finally kissed a girl.

Round Food. My wife and I went to eat Chinese food last week. We didn't order any dishes. The waiter took our order but the food came later than expected. We went back a week later and the food was no longer gone. We're thinking of ordering Chinese food a lot more carefully.

Envious. Gina was at lunch with friends when her sister Beth sat next to her. Gina noticed that Beth was jealous that Gina and her friends were eating. Gina told Beth that her and her friends weren't really eating but just talking. Beth felt bad about being jealous. Gina's sister told Beth that she'd told her the truth.
The Scientists. Amy was a teacher's pet. She loved teaching about science. Her students loved hearing her. She knew she could do a lot with her hands. Amy was hired for her work ethic.

Going Blind. One day I went blind for ten hours. It was incredibly painful, and the next day I felt even worse. After that, I went to see a psychologist. He said that it wasn't worth it to be depressed. It helped me, and I'm so glad that I've recovered.

dinner in the woods. Dina went to the woods. She had been looking for the perfect spot. She found a nice spot in the woods. Dina spent the whole day there. She finally met the man she had been looking for.

Cancer. I was a very good runner in high school. I went to track one year and was very competitive. I went to the state track meet and ran the mile and half. After that I got really sick and had to quit. I had a very bad back problem.

Good Job, Little Buddy. A friend named Tom was playing with my son's ball. Tom took a long time and was really tired. The ball ended up bouncing over a person's chair. Tom's friend ran up to tell him his friend fell. I offered Tom my autograph as a thank you for his help.
Water Damage. Tim bought a new bike. It looked great. After a few weeks he noticed some water damage. Tim contacted the local bike shop. They sent someone to repair it for him.

Fish Tank Maintenance. Travis likes fish, but is worried that he can't handle the stress. He is not sure what to do. One day he saw a new fish tank come out of the window. He saw that the fish was so stressed he wouldn't eat. So, he bought a new fish and is more relaxed about the stress.

Joey. Joey wanted to get better at surfing. He asked his dad to take him to the beach. Joey and his dad met on the beach. Joey went surfing with his dad. Joey was very proud of himself after his first day.

Keys. I was looking for a keychain to make a ring. I found one that said "I love Keys". However, it was a little too small. I decided to use it as a guide instead. I ended up making a ring with a giant keychain.
Cat kisses. Today I heard a knock on the door. It was a neighbor's cat knocking. It said, "Can I come in?" I invited it in and it took a nap. Now it's my cat.
Baby Bird. I was walking in the park. I saw a baby bird flying around. It landed on a rock. I picked it up. I returned the bird to its nest.

starfish. I was at the beach with my friends. They were picking a spot for a tent. I got a bite to eat a starfish and felt something tug. It was a starfish, but was smaller than it looked. They threw it away.

Long Distance. I had a friend who lived in a small town. He used to go out of town a lot. One day he was in the middle of a long distance phone call. I tried calling him back but I was late. We never talked again.

Friends. Kate was excited for her friend's birthday party. But she was also worried about her friends. She tried to make them feel comfortable. But then Kate noticed a problem. The party was only for a few people.
The Baby. The little girl was sitting up in her crib. She looked so happy, I smiled. Then she cried. She was so scared, and I wanted to give her a hug. She decided to stay in her crib.
Let It Go. The boy pushed the girl around. The girl pushed back. The boy got upset. He began pushing her back. The girl pushed her back.

John's Idea. John had a problem with his dog peeing all over his carpet. John took a carpet cleaning product and cleaned all the areas. He then used his carpet cleaner to clean all the spots. He felt proud of his good work. His dog loved his carpet cleaner!

Saving For The Future. Bill really wanted to buy a new video game. His parents couldn't afford it though. Bill decided to go on a shopping spree. He saved every penny he earned. Within a month he had saved enough to buy the game!

The game payment. Tommy wanted to be the star of his basketball team. He decided to practice every day after school. On his first day he took an extra shot to score a basket. His coach noticed the extra effort and made him the starting point guard. His team won the next game.

Peanuts. Tom was taking a trip to the beach. He decided to eat some peanuts. Tom was allergic to peanuts and began to get a rash. His wife bought him some medicine. Tom felt better a short while later.
Treatment. Sam was having a bad day. He tried to get some rest but it was not enough. The doctor prescribed some medicine. It worked but Sam still felt tired. He was then told to go home and rest.

A Break. Sasha was sitting at her desk. Suddenly she realized she was out of coffee. She decided to drive to the convenience store. Sasha bought some coffee, and a carton of bread. Sasha enjoyed her break after driving to the store.

Monster Truck Show. The family was driving down the highway. They were having a very fun time. Then a large truck suddenly appeared out of nowhere. The family ran to see what was going on. The truck drove over a huge truck that rolled down the road.

lost boy. Logan was a lost boy in a forest. He didn't know what he was looking for or how to find his way. He was hungry but knew he was lost so he ate a few berries. Afterwards, he asked a man for directions and was taken to the next town. Logan had a great time with his new friend that day.
The awful truth. Tom loved playing golf. He went golfing with his friends. His buddies had a few drinks. Tom felt sick the next day. He decided to stop golfing.

The meal. Betsy was going to make a special meal for her boyfriend. He was excited, but not sure what to expect. When he got the food out he was in disbelief. It was so good, it was a huge hit. Betsy is now working on her next special recipe.

Babysitter. Ella had two young children. Her mom needed to find a babysitter for Ella's kids. Ella told the kids she was working on babysitting. Ella's kids did not want a babysitter. Ella found a nice babysitter.

Amber's Weekend. Amber wanted to go on a trip to Hawaii for her birthday. She decided to make plans to go to the island. Amber drove to Hawaii to see if there was anything to see. She was disappointed to find that there was no theme park to visit. Amber decided she would go to the beach instead.
Return Policy. Tina has her dog at the dog park. The leash is gone so she can't get the dog. Tina tells the manager her dog is missing. The manager is helpful and puts the dog back. Tina thanks him.

Dancing. Ava loves to dance. She decided to try a new routine at the rec center. She began to do the routine and practiced it everyday. Then she put it on YouTube and loved it. Her routine became popular and Ava was given a medal.

Refusal. Drew was a hard worker. He worked at the post office for thirty years. One day he had to stop work and go back to college. His boss called him up and told him he was being fired. Drew was angry but refused to quit.
The Bank Job. Tom got a job in a bank. It was not a good position. His first day was rough. He really needed to get better at it. Tom eventually became a good bank teller.
Christmas Tree. Mary wanted a tree. She went to the yard sale. Mary bought a big Christmas tree. Mary got her tree decorated. Mary was able to put it in her living room.

Ceramics Class. Sally really liked art class. She liked all the different styles of painting. She decided she would take art class. She got all the materials for her first class. Sally was ecstatic when she took her first painting class.
Missed Bus. John missed his bus. He waited by his house to catch it. He walked to school by himself. The bus finally arrived. John rode the bus to school.

Baseball game. Allie wanted to watch her favorite baseball team play. She went to the game but was disappointed. The team lost badly. Allie had a great time and was sad about it. She didn't watch any more baseball games.
Senator. Mark wanted to be the senator for his state. He worked very hard and took many measures. His peers were very unhappy. He won the primary and the seat. Mark is now the senator of his state.

Always late. I had a hard time getting up in the morning. I didn't always take enough breaks. So I decided to schedule a work meeting to work on my productivity. I had that scheduled and it went smoothly. I then was able to do many other things with my day.
Death. A teacher told me to never read the newspaper in class. I did not listen to the teacher. The teacher was talking about the weather. I decided to read the newspaper. I ended up dying in class.

Trouble Cats. One night my girlfriend and I heard a loud noise in the garage. We went to check it out but could not find anything. We then saw a litter of kittens lying on the ground. It turns out that they were covered in mud. We put them in a small kennel in the garage to help clean them up.

Crying. Anna was always in a bad mood. She tried to deal with her bad moods on her own. She tried to stay calm and focused. But then she found something to help. She decided to get a snuggle buddy for her moods.

Cautious Taxi. Tina was waiting at a red light when a car behind her sped off. She began to cry as the car continued driving. When she had nothing else to do she decided to take the bus. The driver got out and gave Tina a very friendly wave. It made her smile and made her feel safe again.

The Van. John loved to play games with his friends. He bought a brand new sports car for himself. He called his friend and asked him if he would be a guest for the weekend. John and his friend went to a nice, quiet country club. John's new sports car made him happy and entertained his friends.

Gold digger. Bob's grandma always had a gold ring for her birthday. She told Bob that he could get it if he was very clever. Bob didn't know anything about gold but he tried very hard. He finally caught on that he could not win the ring. After that he never won anything as his grandma was very sad.

Parasailing. Bill really wanted to learn how to parasail. He got his friends together and they all went. Bill got really dizzy on his first jump. His friends had to hold him down. He learned to be more careful.

Hockey Fight. Jim had a hockey match today. He was in the lead. Jim and his opponent began to fight. Jim threw a punch and his opponent punched him back. The referee was angry at the two men fighting.

Snow Storm. Kelly and her friends were hanging out. All of a sudden, it started to snow. Kelly decided she'd rather stay home. Her mother got home and told her to go outside. Kelly felt so foolish when she left her friends.
Expert Boxer. Lily needed to learn to box. So, she decided to take lessons. She practiced for weeks. Finally, she became an expert boxer. She was very proud of herself.

Book. Lydia wanted to get into college but didn't know where to begin. She decided to pick out a book about colleges. When she went to the library, she picked the perfect book. She started studying the book and immediately felt smarter. She was now confident she would make a good college student.

Hound Control. One of our neighbors has a dog that's really destructive. Our dog gets out of the yard and runs around the neighborhood. One day our neighbor's dog came home and was very scared. The dog barked and ran around the house for a long time. Luckily our neighbor got our dog back and she never did that again.
Loud Party. I was hosting a party. I had the music turned up loud. Several people complained. I didn't listen to them. I invited them to come in and complain.

The First Pay. Marianne was going out of town. She had to get some things delivered. She paid to get the stuff done at the post office. Then, she used her debit card to pay the bill. When she got home, she was very happy.
Free Samples. My mom asked if I'd like a snack. I didn't really have any money. Instead, I gave her some samples of my cereal. I paid and they were free. I realized the value of a snack today.

Fun day at the Carnival. Kelly took her family to the Carnival for the first time. Everyone was having a great time dancing and having fun. After a long day at the Carnival she was exhausted. When Kelly got home she made a huge dinner. Everyone enjoyed their dinner.

Drinking. My wife and I love to drink. We went to the beach one day and had a great time. We laid on the beach and chugged beers. We didn't want to go back home but we had no other choice. We drank all night and had a great time!

STAR TESTING. The new school year started on Monday. I am in the first year of kindergarten. I did not have my test back until Wednesday. The teacher told me it would be a two week test. We all did all of the work and then took the test.

Friend. I am going on vacation to the Caribbean this week. I have been working on my book. Today I went to a local bar to meet a friend. He came over to drink and talk to me. He really enjoyed the vacation.

Dead end job. Kelly was offered the job of secretary at a company. The job was great but it didn't pay the bills. To solve her issue, she began saving money. Soon she had saved up enough to buy her own house. Kelly was so happy she never had to work at a dead end job again.
Movies. The family decided to watch a movie. They looked up the movie on the internet. They picked the movie at random. The movie was terrible! They decided to stick to popcorn and stay home.
Pool Party. Sam wanted to have a pool party. He invited all his friends. Sam went to the pool with his friends. They played for an hour. Afterwards they went back to their houses.

Try It Now. I bought a book from the bookstore called Try It Now. The author wrote stories about what life was like as a man. He told me that he was working on an adult novel. I decided to take a chance and read it. I found out that I liked it a lot.
Misery. Jane loved her job. However, it was also very stressful. She was having trouble falling asleep. She made a change. Now, Jane is more productive at her job.

Valentine's Surprise. Sam's father bought him a new car. He wanted to surprise Sam for his birthday. He went to the car dealership to buy a Valentine's card. He found a card that said happy valentine's day. Sam's father wrote a special card and sent it to Sam.

Lost Girl. Jill was riding her bike in the woods. She saw a group of girls chasing a girl. Jill decided to go to them to get them to stop. Jill called them all a bunch of names, and they didn't stop. Jill was able to catch up with the girl and get away.
Vivian Cuts her Hair. Vivian has long hair. She knows it is starting to get out of control. Vivian decides to cut it. She cuts all of her hair off. Vivian feels better about her long hair.

Bar. Sally was upset with her mother for what happened to her dog. She decided to move out. She rented an apartment. Her mom was mad at her and took away the dog. Sally felt guilty but still lived her life anyway.

Facebook Drama. Sam's friend was a terrible person. His friend had been posting pictures of her son online. Sam asked his friend why he would do that. His friend said that his son was a terrible kid. Sam felt terrible that his friend felt that way.

Steak Sandwich. Benny loves a steak sandwich, so he went to the market. He wanted the perfect steak. He tried many different kinds, but couldn't decide. After some deliberation, he bought a filet mignon. He ate his sandwich and was happy he found a good steak.

Goog. Jenna went to see a movie with her friend Beth. She had never seen Goog before. Her friend showed her some of her favorite shows. Jenna watched the movie but was bored from all the action. Her friends convinced her to watch more shows next time.

calming nerves. I have been having a lot of anxiety lately. I went to the doctor and got a diagnosis. The doctor told me that my anxiety was caused by low testosterone. I was very sad that I could not get rid of my anxiety. Now I have very low testosterone and a lot less anxiety.

Lucretia Packs A Lunch. Lucretia is not a very good cook. Her family thinks she should learn how to cook better. They take her out to learn. She works very hard to learn how to cook. Lucretia becomes very good at cooking.

Turning Point. It was a rainy evening. We decided to make a game of volleyball. We threw a basketball at each other. We ran off and went to our bedroom. We decided we were going to play hockey after all.

UUA. Last night I got to attend the annual University of Texas at Austin football game. The game was so fun and loud, I got a big crush on the player on the other team. He ended up being a good friend of mine, so I was proud. In addition, I won a beer named after him at the game. I can't wait to do this again this year!
Ants. Sandra had ants in her home. She knew not to get them. One day a friend came over. The friend threw an ant into her bed. The ant killed the friend.

Reverse Psychology. Tom was having a bad day. He was upset about an online situation. He started to feel depressed and angry. He began to study how reverse psychology works. He realized he was able to change his attitude and his life.

You'd Think They'd Require a Commercial License. My son-in-law came to town this weekend. He brought a bottle of champagne. He had a lot of people over. Everyone was drinking champagne and eating caviar. He came back home without paying for the champagne.
Tyler gets hacked. Tyler is online playing. He notices that his internet is being slow. He gets home to fix it. He learns that someone is watching him. Tyler freaks out and calls the police.

Financial Issues. Jim lost his job. He decided to take up drinking. The next day he decided he would be very broke. The next week he lost his job again. Jim had to go to a hotel and stay there for a month.

Hide and Seek. I went to my friend's house to play hide and seek. We sat on the couch to play, waiting for the game to start. I told him if he found me, he had to guess where I was. He went to look around the couch, and I saw a stuffed bear on the ground. I told him that I think he's looking for his brother.
Fault. The man fell down. He tried to get back up. His foot slipped. He fell down again. He had to call an ambulance.

Torn Jeans. Kenzie was walking to school. Suddenly she stepped on a large bump. The jeans ripped right in half. Kenzie got mad but decided to try to fix them. Unfortunately, the repair bill was too high to be considered.

Horror Movies. James and his friends liked to watch scary movies. One day they were watching one of them. It started to make their stomachs cramp. They decided to call an ambulance. They never watched any more horror movies after that.

Stray Cat. Devin owned a stray cat. It would often stay by his side when he took a bus ride to work. One day, the cat escaped and ran across the street. He got hit by a car and lost his leg. Now Devin does not take the bus to work.

No Vacation. Nancy was on vacation with her family. She was in Mexico and could not use the internet. Her kids thought it was funny to play the video games in the hotel lobby. Nancy had to go to the bathroom before she could use the internet. Her kids made fun of her and she was no longer able to go.

Cherry Pie. Gus decided to make a cherry pie for his mother's birthday. He followed all of the directions carefully. However, it turned out to be the most difficult apple pie Gus ever made. Gus' mother decided not to eat it. He made a cherry pie with candy instead for himself.

Follower. Mina was very quiet and always stayed in her room. One day, she heard a knock at her door. She opened the door and a stranger was waiting. She introduced herself and they exchanged numbers. Soon she was making new friends in her new apartment.

Zoe Speaks. Zoe is at a party at her friend's house. She is playing video games. Her mom comes outside. She tells Zoe that she needs to shut off her games. Zoe stays quiet all night and hopes to not be upset.

Baby. Kate had recently lost her baby. She was too upset to think about it. But then she got in trouble with her parents. They grounded her and made her work weekends. Kate wished she had never gotten a second baby.
The Lake. We went to the lake for a relaxing summer day. It had a very clear blue water. We had a lot of fun splashing in it. The sun went down. It made the water look even more clear.
Porch Swing. Sue's neighbors had a porch swing. Sue decided to play on it. She was afraid of the other kids. When she jumped on it she heard them laughing. She was relieved when they stopped.
first beer. It was Joe's first day of college. The first thing he did was to get his first beer. He bought a 6 pack of Bud. He took his first sip. He loved it.
The Box. The man put the dog in the box. The dog smelled the scent. The dog barked at the box. The man took the dog back to his room. The dog barked at the box again.

Losing Streak. Brianna went to the lake to swim. She started out swimming but quickly found herself sinking. Brianna decided to dive in and get out of the water. As soon as she surfaced she realized the waves were so strong. She was able to get back into the water but felt so frustrated.
Sad On Easter. John wanted to carve a tree for Easter. He went to the store. He found some eggs and plastic. He started carving. John gave it to his wife to eat.

Football Fever. Jack decided he wanted to try out for his high school football team. He practiced all summer before the try out. His coach told him that he was great in the classroom but bad on the field. Jack worked hard and played well during the try outs. Jack was a part of the high school football team.

Flowers. Mary bought the first bouquet of flowers from the store. They were purple and pink. As Mary was walking home, she was stopped by a policeman. The policeman asked Mary if she was selling flowers. Mary felt offended and decided to leave the store.

Fast and too Furious. Nate is in the Fast and Furious movie franchise. He was hoping for another installment. They did not make him happy. He was disappointed. He will never watch another Fast and Furious movie.
Not Tired. I went to sleep last night. I woke up feeling very tired. I tried to go back to sleep but it was difficult. I went back to sleep again. I slept until I fell asleep.

red dress. Jessica's class had to wear red dresses. Jessica wanted to try it out. She bought a pair and tried it out. Her hair was too long but the color was cute. She was happy she got to try it out.

Stale Cereal. Tom was watching television one day. Suddenly his cereal started to smell bad. Tom thought he had spoiled his cereal. He looked around for his cereal. Tom found it in the refrigerator and ate it.

Cookie Sale. A girl who was overweight bought lots of cookies. She got a lot of compliments on her diet. One day she got in a car accident and lost control. Her mother felt bad about it, but felt that the cookies were good for her. Now all the cookies in the house are donated.

New Show. The Smith family decided to watch their favorite show. They sat in their living room with their popcorn. They waited until the credits ended. Then they sat down to watch the show. The Smiths loved the show.
Workout. We went to a gym at my college. The workout was on an incline. I wasn't used to it. I could not go very far up the incline. I ended up falling.

Valentine's Brownies. One of my coworkers was really depressed. She was trying to get a job so she could help her friend. One day, I decided to give her a brownie. She smiled when I gave her one. Later, she was at work eating a brownie.

A Dozen Roses. Rita wanted to get all her friends roses. But she couldn't find any of them. She found them in her mom's closet. She went over to her mom and said that she found them. Her mom gave her the roses.

Expected Delivery. Gina was excited to start the day with her grandma. But her grandma was very late and the mail truck never came. Gina was upset and told her mom. Her mom knew she was disappointed but didn't say anything. Gina didn't care because she had to wait anyway.

Driving Lessons. My dad said he would teach me how to drive. I was very scared to drive without being taught first. After some practice, he helped me out. He taught me how to brake and turn. Now, I am really good at driving.

Pokemon. Tom wanted to go to the park. Unfortunately he didn't know where to find a pokemon. Tom drove to the nearest park. He found a pokemon and then went to the park. Tom had fun and then he went home.

Peanuts. My parents sent me to school with nothing but my brand new book. I was scared. The book was about mice and rats and spiders. It was scary! When I finally got home, I found the book was a very funny book.

Lunch. Sandra had invited Mary to go to lunch with her. Mary accepted, but was late to the lunch. Sandra was upset, because Mary had ruined her lunch. After dinner, she brought Mary to a restaurant with free food. Mary was happy, and Sandra gave her a hug.

Moving Day. It was finally time to move out into my new house. It took me two months to put everything in place. We loaded up the truck with everything I needed. We started walking down the road. When we got there, it was a beautiful sight.
Cheer. The girls cheered for the team on the field. The cheerleaders took off their uniforms. They looked fabulous. The team won the game! Everyone had a great time.
Bay. Tom was in the army. His unit was deployed in a major operation. The unit was in the middle of an island. Tom's unit got stranded on a bay. Tom's unit survived but was scarred.
The Brother. Jenny and her brother were best friends. One day, their mother died. Jenny felt very sad. Her brother gave her flowers. Jenny felt better after that.
Too short. Liza was very short. She was so short her friends teased her. Her friends made fun of her height. Liza went to the hospital to get a height changing machine. Liza was so happy to be tall!

Sam Catches a Fish. Sam got a cat for his birthday. His cat was a picky eater. The cat would only eat certain foods. Sam realized he needed to start training his cat. Sam took his cat to the pet store and bought him some fish.

street ball. Today is the big day for Jim. He is going to be playing the street ball in front of his school. He is going to score and the crowd is going to cheer. He has practiced his shots many times. When it is his turn he scores and he is very happy.

Music Software. Paul loved to listen to music. He had a huge collection of albums. His favorite albums were ones that were in the public domain. Paul decided to sell some of his music online. Paul became rich from his new business.

The list. Remy had a hard time finding anything to eat. His list was very long. He checked every restaurant and grocery store. After a lot of time he had no new food in his house. His girlfriend came over to make him dinner, so he decided to make it.

Desktop Christmas Trees. Our friends all got their Christmas tree this morning. We got the biggest one we could find. It was the prettiest one. We took it home to decorate. We made a few posts for it in the living room.

Garrett's Basketball Journey. Garrett has always wanted to play professional basketball. He works very hard to learn the game. After working very hard for many Year's he finally becomes a professional. Garrett is happy to be a professional player. He is also very happy that he can help to change the lives of so many.

Family dinner. We went to our relatives for a dinner on Saturday. My husband's sister cooked the main course. I made the side dishes. My brother cooked potato salad. Our table enjoyed the meal very much.

River Bank. My son and I were walking back to our hotel. We came upon a narrow, deep river bank. I put my foot in it, and it slipped right into my foot. We were both soaked and not able to walk. We had to use the bathroom a short time later.
Knife Safety. The knife was held under the table. Someone stepped on it. The knife cut off the finger of the person. He called the doctor. The doctor sent him to the hospital.

The Rally. My family and I decided to go to a rally. The music was loud and it was a very hot day. I had a hot towel to put on so I had a good feeling. The rally ended up being great. I did not go to a rally again.

Too Big. Gina decided to go to the store for some candy. She was nervous, as she had never bought candy before. The cashier told her she was too big. He took away her bag of candy. The store owner was very disappointed in Gina.

The Olives. Bella was a picky eater. She really didn't like olives or anything but they were a part of her meal. One day she got a small basket of olives. She didn't know what to do with them, so she ate them all. She ate so much olives that she wound up sick.

Santa. My niece came to visit me in August. She lives in Texas, not too far from my home. She had a very good time at my house. My niece bought her new christmas tree and presents. We hope for more visits in the future.

The camping trip. John was planning a camping trip with his family. He went through the whole list of chores. When the day came they were all ready. After a long day, they went on a hike. They had an amazing time that night.

Bad food. Lydia hated eating food. Her parents had strict rules about it. Lydia was constantly getting sick. She tried everything to stop getting sick. She eventually got a job at a fast food restaurant.

Too Old To Go. Tina could not leave school. She had a birthday party and needed a ride to her party. Tina decided to call her friend to pick her up. Unfortunately they were too old to go with her. Tina was sad and sad that her friend did not want to go with her.
Fried Chicken. Tina was invited to a friend's house. They were grilling hot dogs outside. They were eating chicken. Tina bit into one. It was fried to a golden brown.

Steve and His Cats. Steve was at his farm when he noticed a cat standing around the barn. He went inside to see what was going on. He saw that it had been abandoned and needed food. He went to his neighbor and bought a small rabbit. He put it in a cage so he could keep it and he had a happy cat family.

Retirement fund. Tina started her own company last summer. She didn't know what to do with her company's money. She knew she wanted a retirement fund so she made one. She worked on it for months and had a great retirement. Now, she can retire with her money.
Trash in the Closet. Tom lived with his parents. His mother liked to clean. Tom noticed the trash in his closet. He asked his parents about it. They had to throw it away.

The Lollipop. I decided to make a lollipop for my wife. I got some candy wrappers and some candy bars. I mixed together all the ingredients. After I put the lollipop in a bowl, I dropped it in the trash. I watched my wife eat the lollipop.

afloat. Tom went on a vacation to the Maldives. The air was too cold for Tom to stay in his hotel. He decided to sail his boat to the nearest island. Once on the island he warmed up on a beach. Tom had a wonderful vacation.

Home Run. Larry wanted to play a trick on the other team. He pretended to be hurt. The other team didn't realize he had been hurt. He hit the ball too far to get back. He was happy that he got a home run out of it.

Bend To My Metal Will. A woman found a metal will at an antique store. She had it framed and put it on the mantle of her house. The woman got her hair straightened by the same woman. Then she put in the will. She loved how her hair turned out.
Taco Tuesday. John had never tried taco bell. He was hungry but didn't want to spend money. He decided to call his friend. They went to Tacos TONIGHT! It was the best Taco bell he had ever had!
Dishes. Jane cleaned her kitchen. She realized she didn't have any clean dishes. Jane picked up some from the garbage. She started washing them. The smell was too much to handle.

Delivering the baby. Carol was ready to go into labor. She wanted to get some rest after having a baby. She decided to read a book to her husband. After a while, she began to feel light headed. Carol had to call a doctor and he performed an emergency c-section.

Band. I love to play the banjo. Last year I decided to join my school's band. The first day of the school band, I got to play in a show. I was nervous, but then I became more confident. I played the show beautifully.
The Bar. Juan went to a bar. He thought it would be fun to drink. He was in for a shock. It was very loud and he got very drunk. Juan never wanted to go back.
Hail Mary. Ben was an electrician. He was working late when the power went out. He got out his tools to fix it. He didn't have any batteries so had to improvise. Ben successfully fixed the outage.

Beauty and The Beast. The kids went to the Disney princess parade. They were not Disney princesses. Their moms called them princesses for the day. The kids had no idea what to think. Their moms had no clue what to tell them.
Child support. Susie had been out partying all week. She and her boyfriend broke up. Susie wanted to keep partying. She went back to her house. She got a restraining order and has not been back.

The Baseball Game. Sam's team was up by two runs in the ninth inning. They needed one more hit to win the game. They all lined up to hit a homerun! It was one of the best plays I've ever seen. The ball went over the fence and won the game.

It Was Supposed To Be Their Apartment, Not Just His. Mark had rented a room from a friend of his. His friend said it was a good fit and that they should move in soon. When Mark moved in, the roommate was nowhere to be found. He had left the door open. He had moved away from Mark before he realized it.

Winter Storm. The weather looked very bad yesterday. It started snowing and then freezing in the middle of the night. The next day, the weather was worse. The sky grew darker and fogier. I don't want to get to work without a shovel.
Into the abyss. Dan is hiking in the forest. He comes across a trail. He follows it until he comes upon a deep ravine. Dan is almost lost. Finally Dan makes it out.

Christmas Problems. Molly was working with her aunt and uncle in their kitchen. They were making dinner for her parents. Molly was distracted by the sound of kids playing. She forgot to take the turkey out of the oven. Her mother punished her by throwing out the entire turkey.
Putting the Cat Down. Beth and her brother watched a cat on TV. The cat was sad and lonely. The cat went into a nearby tree. Beth's brother came out of the house to see the cat. The cat was dead.

The Brown Bag. Tom was a big fan of bagging groceries. He carried a large brown paper bag on his daily run. Tom decided to buy a bigger brown bag. He brought his new bag to his local store. Tom bagged groceries in his new large bag!

Pig Eye. Cindy was having trouble seeing with her glasses. She bought an eye doctor who said she had pig's eyes. The doctor said it would be ok and gave her prescription glasses. She started wearing them, and she was no longer having trouble seeing. Now she can see much better than before!

Baking. Linda had to make a special cake. Her friend wanted to make one but it didn't turn out right. She thought about it, and finally decided on a chocolate cake. When she made it, it looked amazing. She made it again and it was even better.
Tacos. John wanted to cook. He had a few different ideas he wanted to try. John bought ingredients from the store. He got his cooking supplies. He cooked up tacos at home.

Lorraine Makes her Bed. Lorraine wakes up early and makes her bed. She puts her clothes in the washer. Lorraine puts the laundry in the dryer. Lorraine then puts her shoes on. She then turns off the light and lays in her bed.

Timmy Loves to Dance. Timmy loves to dance. He started practicing when he was 5 years old. He loves to dance the most when he is older. He went to his very first dance competition. Timmy was so happy when he won a gold medal.

Over Sleepy. I was working at a desk when I noticed my eyes felt foggy. I tried to go to sleep but it was impossible. I had no idea what was causing my eyes to feel so blurry. I finally got up and went for a walk. When I came home it took me hours to realize that I overslept.

The Cheeseburger addict. Lucy was very hungry. She made a quick trip to the corner store to buy some food. When she got home she found a stack of hamburgers. Lucy was tempted to eat them all. However, she realized she had to save the money she spent.
Grapes. Karen had never been to a vineyard. She went with her parents to see one. She really enjoyed it. She wanted to go back. She was very happy she had finally gone to a vineyard.

The Work Event. Jim was a very good football player. One day he was practicing a great play and needed to run to the opponent. He ran into a teammate and knocked him to the ground. Jim was sent home early. Now Jim had to go work out.
Food network star. Izzy was a new food network star. She didn't have any other show. Then she got the lead role in a new show. She played the lead role on all six episodes. She was a big success.
Sleazy. Tom and Jan were best friends. They were very close. They were also lazy. They never got to do anything together. They had a falling out.
The new show. Alicia was watching a new show. She was interested. But the show did not interest her. So she left early. She thought the show was just lame.

Sue's Trip. Sue was vacationing in Florida. She needed to buy groceries. Sue called her mom and asked her to take her out to the store. Her mom picked her up and brought her back home. Sue had bought her favorite snacks from the store.

The Broken Toy Box. Billy was playing with his toy box when it started to shake. He turned it over and it fell apart. Billy's mom told him that the toy box broke. He went to the store and picked out a new one. Billy's new toy box was a lot easier to fix.
Pizza Place. A man went to get pizza. It was a little late but he made it on time. It wasn't pizza though. He ordered a hamburger instead. He got a hamburger with extra sauce.

Missing. Samantha was shopping for candy. She didn't see anything that looked good. When she finally made it home it was gone. She checked everywhere and still no luck. She went to a different candy store and they told her they lost the bag.

Signing up for a library card. Sally had to sign up for a library card. She went to the library and looked around. She decided to ask around at the tables. She learned she needed to pick out a photo for the card. She ended up having fun signing everything.

Stripped down. Tim was in a new place. He had recently moved from his parent's house. He was trying to fit in and he had a hard time. He got really dirty quickly. He decided to take a shower and shave.

The Big Win. Dennis had been playing chess for years. A tournament was coming up. Dennis was determined to win. Dennis was confident he would win. At the tournament, Dennis was able to easily win it all.

A visit to Grandma. Rosa visited her grandma. Grandma wasn't home to visit. Grandma didn't want Rosa to see the living room. Grandma brought a movie on the tv. Rosa enjoyed watching the movie in her grandmother's living room.

Always do Your Homework. Tim always knew he didn't do his homework. He always forgot things. One day he forgot about his math class. Tim got in trouble. It taught him that never doing his homework is bad.

Picking a Movie. I tried to find a new movie to watch last night. I couldn't decide which one to choose. I checked the cable guide, but I wasn't satisfied. I decided to just turn on Netflix. I ended up just being bored watching it all.

Video Games. The kids enjoyed playing video games. They watched videos of each new game. They had several different controllers. They also each had several different video games. After playing all of the games, the kids were exhausted.
Lost remote. I was doing something I needed to get done. I noticed my phone had stopped working. I looked everywhere for it. I couldn't find it. Eventually I had to call tech support to come help me.

Itching. Joey was in the hospital because he was having itchy eyes. He was allergic to everything. His eyes were really swollen and red. His doctor gave him lotion. Joey felt better and looked forward to going home.

Bracketology. I played a lot of baseball growing up. I had to watch a lot of baseball games on tv. I would go over the scores every week. I would write a bracket based on all the games I watched. I was always very excited for the baseball playoffs.

The Man Across the Street. I saw a man across the street the other day. He was sitting on the sidewalk looking at a building across the street. I decided to talk to him. I was surprised how polite he was. I decided to keep walking to avoid getting caught.

Catfishing. Gina was sitting at the lake with her grandma. She noticed a fishing pole sitting by a rock. It seemed to her like her grandma was fishing with it. But she couldn't believe her eyes. A man had hidden a camera into the fishing pole and taken pictures.

Unlucky Good-Luck Charm. A group of elderly people went to a bar on a winter's night. They were seated by a black cat. The cats were black, but had white spots. A group of men with white shirts came over and gave them money. The men had a long talk with the group.

Lion. Gina wanted a new stuffed animal. But it wasn't in her size range. She decided to take a chance and get a lion instead. When she opened the box, she was overwhelmed by the size. It was so large, she immediately got upset.
Homeless Heart. Jim was walking to work. His bus came along. One of the homeless people was waiting for a bus. Jim started to cry. The homeless person just laughed at him.
