Moving Up. Barry always wanted to be a police officer. But he was embarrassed at his poor grades. One day, Barry decided he would make sure to do better. Barry studied hard, learned the language, and practiced many hours a day. Finally, Barry was able to graduate with a degree in law enforcement.

Comedian Carrie. Carrie always wanted to be a comedian. But she did not think she had the potential for it. Finally Carrie signed up for a comedy tryout at the club. She performed her heart out and it was her biggest crowd. A year later Carrie is a popular stand up comic.

Big Day. Samantha woke up early to go run a mile. She woke up the kids early to do the same. She then went outside for a run. They all lined up and ran around the block. They ran until they were all tired.
Carlos Meets a Girl. Carlos was walking on the sidewalk one day. A cute girl comes up to him. Carlos gives her his number. She texts him that she loves him. Carlos and the girl become a couple.

Olson Opposes Octopus. Olson is an older man who has trouble making eye contact. His friend Jim gives him a big bowl of octopus. When he takes a bite, he screams and tries to move his hand. Jim gets angry and starts pushing him around. Olson is no longer able to eat octopus.

Used Music Store. Jane was excited to check out a used music store. The music there was really old and cheap. Jane paid in cash and walked through the store. There, she bought two copies of her favorite song. Jane was happy she had checked out a used music store.

Fred. My grandfather had a great collection of movie posters. He displayed them in his house. I was able to steal a poster of his favorite movie from one of his shelves. I then used the poster to make my own posters. He did not care that I ripped the poster apart.

The Bad Attitude. Kate hated her neighbor's new pet monkey. She saw the monkey running around the neighborhood. The monkey did all sorts of mischief. Kate got out of her house and asked her mother to call the police. Her mother had an angry response.

Sad story. My coworker is divorced and my wife loves him. He went to the club to try and get a date. The girl he chose was not interested. She was upset at him for not asking her out. He told me he would not try again.

Repaying the Pastor. I went to a church service. After the service I left my seat and walked to the back of the church. The minister called me over to his seat. He told me that my parents had paid him back for helping me. I thanked him and he was very thankful.

Writer. Bob's daughter wanted to be a writer. He told her he didn't think she was very creative. Then he got into her head and encouraged her. He started to believe in her. Within a month she had a novel ready to submit to agents.

The Lost Dog. Sam's dog was running around the neighborhood. He finally left the house and found his dog's collar. He called the number on the collar and looked all over. Sam was able to finally locate his dog. He then took the dog home to his parents.

Birds. Sara was walking through her neighborhood. Suddenly, she heard a weird noise. Sara looked over her shoulder to see what the sound was. A pair of birds were pecking on her porch. Sara ran into her house to get a broom to scare them off.
The Bridge. The couple went to the local park. The view was beautiful. They went down to the water. It was so beautiful. They had a great time.
Sam Walks the Dog. Sam heard a dog bark. He walked over to see what was wrong. He saw the dog looking sick. Sam put some medicine into the dog's mouth. The dog got better after a few days.

Bad sale. Cara was shopping at her favorite department store. She was about to buy some clothes but they were so expensive. Suddenly, a really beautiful dress caught her eye. She decided to get it in the red and gold color scheme. When she saw it, she cried and she decided to buy it immediately.
theater. My wife and I went to see a musical. There were 3 musical acts in the show. The last act was in a big venue. There were two large tents. Everyone was in the big tent.

Sandy's Allergies. Sandy had always had allergies to certain foods. Sandy tried many products to try to eliminate her allergy. Eventually she found a recipe that she liked. Sandy followed the instructions exactly. Sandy no longer has an allergy to certain foods.

Hospital Visit. Tom got his ear pierced. The next day he got in a car accident. The surgeon removed half of Tom's ear. The ear was damaged beyond repair. Tom was disappointed but determined to get it fixed.

Fear Returns. Timmy felt his body shake from anxiety. He thought he was too nervous to go to school. He ran to his room and grabbed his school bag. Timmy started to cry. The teacher found him and helped him through his anxiety.

Drawing Class. Kate decided to go to her first art class. She was terrified by how boring it would be. But she began to love art. She was relieved when the teacher let her draw a picture. Kate liked drawing so much she continued to attend.

Carmen Plays Softball. Carmen plays softball for her high school. Carmen practiced hard all year to be ready for the big game. When the game started, Carmen ran for home. She made the entire team proud. Now Carmen practices every day.

Jersey. Joe owned a pair of vintage surfboard shoes. He decided to put on his old sandals and try to surf. He was not able to surf very well. He tried to put his surfboard on a small rock in the ocean. The rock was on his feet and he fell off of his surfboard.
The Blog. Gina's friend was doing a blog. She got in trouble for her posts. Her parents didn't like the blog. Gina didn't like Gina. She was so annoyed that she deleted the blog.

Retiring from Teaching. Joe has been teaching for 40 years. This year he is retiring. Joe does not think he can retire after 40 years. He says he will go back to school for teaching. He has been teaching for 30 years and still feels sad.

Getting Dressed. John had been having trouble falling asleep at night. He decided to get dressed. John put on a shirt and a pair of pants. He went to the kitchen to grab some food. John was able to fall asleep.
Tom's Drink. Tom loved to drink. He wanted a drink that was just right. Tom tried many different drinks. He always settled for the most simple. Tom never felt like drinking again.

Gertrude Slips. Gertrude was walking home from work one night. She ran into her friends who were waiting for her. Gertrude slipped and fell. Her friend helped her get up and started taking her for ice cream. Gertrude was happy that she was okay after slipping.

Lost Job. My father and I worked together at a pizza joint. We worked hard on the shop floor but did not get paid enough. After being out of work for six weeks we were desperate for money. One day my father went to the gas station and bought a lottery ticket. My father found out his lucky number and got his first job!

No Spare. Lola was a single mother to a 10 year old. Her son wanted to go to the park with his friends. Lola had no more to borrow from the laundry room. She asked her son to take her car to go to the park. She paid for his car and he went with his friends.
John Runs Errands. John decided to get a coffee for the road. He went to the local shop. He bought a nice coffee. He took it home. John enjoyed his coffee.

Catching Burglars. My husband and I decided to start burglar alarms. We set up one at the back door and another at the front door. We told our family to be on alert at all times. After a week the alarms worked! We never heard any movement inside our house.

Arra. My family took a trip to New York City. The trip included an overnight train trip from Boston. We met with friends at a hotel in NYC. I fell asleep in the afternoon and missed the train home. We had a great trip to the city of lights!

job interview. Jim was going to get a job interview soon. He had been practicing very hard for two months. His phone rang and he answered it quickly. The interviewer asked him about his practice. Jim showed off his new baseball bat and hit the interview well.

The chicken baby. Lily was eating at her favorite chicken restaurant. She decided to order some chicken breast for dinner. When she got home, her mother was waiting for her. She told her she didn't have any breast milk. Lily was mad and immediately went to the store.

Lary's Lasagna. Lary went to a Italian restaurant to get Italian food. He ordered the spaghetti with mushrooms and peppers. He was disappointed as he thought the meat tasted too fresh. However, the waiter brought him the lasagna anyway. Lary liked the lasagna even more because the meat was seasoned.

First day of classes. Ivy wanted to learn to drive. She went to her first car class. She drove the car in the class. When she got home, she practiced driving on her home track. Now Ivy is a great driver.

Bankrupt. The man deposited a check into his bank account. It turned out to be $300,000. He thought he would take the check in cash. The next day, his bank shut down due to a $700,000 loss. He didn't get any money back.

Home Away. I went to visit my grandma in my old home. I thought I'd bring her some home cooked food. Unfortunately, I was out of butter. My grandma was upset that I wasn't home cooked food. I learned my lesson about being inattentive.

Fixing the Sink. My father decided to fix the toilet. He took the cover off and replaced it. After the cover was removed the toilet would not flush. He used a plunger to push it out of the toilet. After doing that he finally flushed the toilet.

Too Close. Sue was painting her bedroom. She was close enough to the wall to see everything clearly. However, when her roommate moved a mirror, she couldn't see. It was much harder for Sue to finish painting. She had to turn on a video to see better.
The Fire. Tara was out playing with friends. She had lit a fire. They all sat around and started talking. The fire got out of control and spread. Everyone ran to the fire.

Biographies. I love reading biographies of prominent people. It is fascinating to read about their life and times. I especially love reading about their children. I particularly love reading about their grandchildren. I will always have a great deal of fascination with their lives.

The busy day. My wife and I went to a friend's wedding last weekend. We were there from about 8 to 12 am. Everyone started to get their food and water at around noon. I sat in the car and watched the couple as they went down the aisle. It was a great wedding.
Knife. Tom wanted to do an art project. He made a knife out of paper and glue. He presented it to the class. They loved it. Tom was able to show the whole class.

Last to the party. Linda was sitting alone at a party. A man approached her to ask her to be his girlfriend. The man asked her to marry him. She refused, and the man left. She went home and put on her pants.

Bill's Bar. Bill loves to drink a lot of beer. He usually goes to the bar before a football game. He decided to buy some beer at the bar. He drove to the bar to get more beer. Bill's favorite bar is back at home with his wife.
Dead Mouse. I was walking around my house. I felt a sharp pain in my foot. It became very sore and infected. I took it to the doctor. The doctor said I had a dead mouse.

The Fishing Pole. Tim's dad loved fishing. Tim's dad always taught him to use a pole. Tim was really bad at fishing so his dad wasn't too upset. Tim got better at fishing over time. Now Tim's dad is very pleased.

sick day. Sandy was feeling a bit down about being sick today. She felt sick about having to work the day after. Sandy decided she wouldn't do anything today. After getting some things done she went back to her desk. She felt much better that night.

The Race. Tory and her sister were at the track. They were having a race to see who could run fastest. The competition was intense, but they did it. When it was over they were both happy. They had both done a great job!
In The Mitt. I had just gotten in a car accident. My pants ripped in three places! I was in a lot of pain. I pulled out a new pair of pants. I was happy my new pants did not rip.
Coffee. Dennis made a cup of coffee for his wife. He heated the coffee with an electric kettle. When the water boiled, the kettle broke. Dennis' wife was upset. She told him to buy a better kettle.
The bird flies. The bird flew. It landed on a bush. The bird started to peck at the bush. The bush began to rot. The bird fell asleep on the ground.

Knee. I woke up and went to the bathroom. While I was in the bathroom I got my knee very bad. I immediately fell to the floor. The pain was so bad that I could not move at all. I immediately had to go to the hospital.

Sandwich. Liz made a sandwich with everything she could find. She put the sandwich in the microwave and watched the sandwich cook. Liz tried to take the sandwich out but the microwave wouldn't shut off. Liz went to the bathroom and then returned the sandwich. The sandwich was now burnt and soft, and Liz was happy.
Rapper. Bill is a rapper. He does some really cool rap. He is invited to perform in front of the whole town. He performs his best. The people love it.
On set. Kara took pictures for a tv commercial. She got into her car to go home. When she came back she had pictures in her car. She went to get them all. Kara found out that they were gone!

Gusty Winds. I was in New York last week. One day there was a severe wind storm that blew my umbrella. I had to walk out to the sidewalk to get my umbrella. I ran back inside for shelter. I didn't get my umbrella back until it was time to leave.
Ted buys a car. Ted was looking for a new car. He was shopping online. He found a nice car. He went to the dealership. Ted bought the car.

Kids Chair. Gina and her sister were playing hide and seek. All the sudden, the chair she was hiding in fell down. It landed right on top of the chair across the room. Gina was mad that she had to clean the seat. After cleaning it, Gina was happy to see it was clean.

The Bowling Match. I was throwing my bowling ball around the house. I felt a hard thwack on my bowling ball. My ball flew into the air and was bounced around. I tried to catch the ball but it got lost in the air. I got in trouble and had to pay for it.

The Park at Night. John was playing on the monkey bars at the park. He saw an adult playing with a toddler. The adult and the toddler had their eyes glued to the screen. The adult went and picked up the toddler from the floor. The toddler was happy to be with his parents.

Fireworks. I got home from a long day at the beach. I went out to my deck and lit up a few fireworks. It was a beautiful night and everyone was having fun. The next day I took pictures of the fireworks. I was going to keep the memories to myself.

Magic Kingdom. Mary and Beth went to Magic Kingdom last weekend. They spent the day with some friends. Then they went back to the car. Mary's parents had planned a surprise for her. She had a great day at Magic Kingdom.

Gym Rats. Jane had to walk home after work every day. She hated going to the gym because it was so loud. Jane hated walking home because she had no idea where she was. One day, Jane's friend came over to take her out for a walk. Jane enjoyed walking at the local park with her friend.
McDonalds. I like to go to McDonalds. Today I went with my friend. I wanted to get some french fries. I waited outside for my fries. When I got my fries, I put it on the counter and ate it.

The Twins. Liam and Jena had been fighting for months. Liam was tired of being constantly teased. One day, Liam told Jena she looked just like her twin. Jena began to cry and run away. Liam was heartbroken and never spoke to Jena again.
A lost day. Travis was running through the park. He had just met a new girl. She started to walk by him. He followed her but lost her. He finally figured out where she went.

My phone plan. I have a number of phones, from several different companies. When I have the phones it doesn't always look like they all connect. My number of phones has expanded. It took me awhile to adjust all the settings. I am glad that I have the flexibility to have several phones.

Southie. Neil had always wanted to visit California. His family decided to travel there for vacation. They visited San Francisco and Los Angeles. Then they went to Maui. They loved every minute of their trip!

Fleas. Alyssa's dog loved to play in the living room. Alyssa took her dog outside on a leash. The dog bit one of the walls. Alyssa went to the hardware store to get paint. She used the paint to fix the wall.
Good Signs. Lars went to a movie last night. It was rated R but it was good to see. When the movie started to get dark he took a seat. The movie had some good scenes. He had a good time.

Nick. Nick's girlfriend is pregnant. Nick does not want to take care of the baby. Nick is invited to his girlfriend's wedding. He leaves his house with the baby. Nick is not allowed to take the baby home with him.
The Puppy. The Smith family adopted a puppy. They named it Rolf. The dog ate all their vegetables. Rolf's favorite food was the dog's treats. The Smith family was sad the puppy was eaten.
Baseball. My daughter wants to play baseball. I took her to the park yesterday. She was very excited. She did hit a ball. Now we have baseball.
Sandals. Tom was walking to school. Suddenly, he heard a noise. He noticed that someone had kicked his shoes. He decided to buy sandals instead. Tom was happy with the purchase.
Waffles. I made waffles for breakfast. I mixed all the ingredients together. Then I poured the batter onto a waffle iron. I waited until it was done to take a bite. The waffles were delicious.

Rockstar. Jim had always been a very humble man. One day, Jim's friend got into an argument with him. In front of his friend's family, Jim confronted his friend. Jim was very hurt by this and decided to make a change. Jim quit being a humble man and became a rockstar.

Frozen in Place. Earl's girlfriend was always cold. He asked her to stay at his place for a few days. She refused. So he asked her why she couldn't take care of herself. She explained she was too busy working.
Lost Bird. Jenna was on her bike. She was riding up a hill. Suddenly she heard a cry. A lost bird fell from a tree. Jenna didn't see it again until she got off the bike.
Facebook isn't for everyone. Tim was looking for a job. He tried to find one with Facebook. He found out he didn't like Facebook. He was very frustrated. He eventually just used Twitter instead.

Let's Party!. Jude had just bought his friend a big birthday present. But he thought his friend would rather watch a movie. So he surprised his friend with a party to be in. But his friends showed up and made a great show of it! But Jude still wished he had given his friend a movie instead!
A Robbery. Dan was walking home from school. A man tried to rob him. Dan fought back. The man ran away. Dan never saw that man again.

Sandals. Lola wanted sandals for her winter shoes. Her mom wanted the same color sandals for her kids. When they went shopping for sandals, they couldn't agree. Finally, Lola found the sandals she wanted in black. She was happy that she finally had a pair of winter sandals.

Chain. I went on a camping trip with my friends. We were headed to the mountains. We had to drive up a big dirt road to get there. We got to the top and put our chain on the back. Now I can climb as well as anyone.
Great lunch. I went out with my friend today. We went to the park and played a few games. We decided to eat lunch. I went to go home. I came back with 20 dollars!

Green Hair. Bob had a greenish brown hair color. His friends and family told him it looked strange. One day his hair started turning black. He went to the store to get a perm. He had his new perm and was much happier with his hair color.

Parting Ways. Sue and Brian had been married for 3 years. Sue decided to leave and try her luck at the open sea. Sue was a great sailor, and sailed to the open sea on her yacht. On her return, she discovered she'd lost her wallet! Now she and Brian never speak again.

Slip and Slide. My daughter and her sister were 8 and 7 at the time. The oldest child would sit on the lap of the older girl. In the fall the little girl fell down the slide a couple times. She went to the hospital. The older sister was very upset with the younger girl.

The Tumor. Nancy found a lump on her side. She had to go to the hospital. The doctor told her she had a rare form of cancer. Nancy got the chemotherapy drugs and chemotherapy. Unfortunately it did not help.
Tom Gets A Dog. Tom wanted to buy a new pet. He went to the pet store to look at all the animals. After seeing a small, white dog, Tom bought it. It was cute and playful. He named his new pet, Spot.
The Home. The couple had just bought a new home. The couple was very excited. They had just started renovations. Their new home had many features. They were glad they got the new home.
Kicked Out. Tom got into a fight with his friend. They were fighting for attention. Tom's parents found out. They were not happy about this. They made Tom stay out of their yard.

Philly Cheese Steak Sub. Last night we went out to eat. We ordered three sub sandwiches. It took a while to get everything together. When it came, it was delicious. My husband decided to get it again tonight.

Havoc. Gina had just fallen asleep in her room. She heard a loud noise coming from her closet. Her mother had let her out to clean the garage. Gina was scared, but had a plan. She quietly got in her car and sped off.

The Interview. Jane's boss called her into his office. She was nervous to be called into his office. Jane did her best at the interview. Jane had a good job interview. Jane was excited to start her new job.
Firework. There was a big storm brewing. The rain made a big stink. The kids made a firework display. They made tons of firecrackers. They had so much fun and were so happy.

The Perfect Haircut. Molly was doing her first hairdresser. She was getting ready for a big event. She decided on a color for the occasion. When she was done, she was happy with how she looked. Molly was glad she decided to go to the hairdresser.

Doug cleans house. Doug has always had an issue with washing his hands. Today he decides to finally clean up. First Doug picks up the trash from the floor. Then he cleans his apartment. Finally Doug feels more confident about washing his hands.

Corey Deals with his Stress. Corey's work had a big meeting the next day. Corey did not want to cancel his work. Corey decided to spend time with his friends in a bar. Corey drank beer, and talked to friends. Corey was able to relax a lot when he returned to work.

Car Buying. A man needed a new car but did not have a car. He decided to buy a used car. He went to many dealerships to find a car. He finally found a used car he liked and purchased it. The man was so happy that he was not looking for a new car!

Fishing trip. Sam decided to take his son out to fish. He bought his son a pole and his fishing rod. Sam and his son went out to the lake. Sam caught a big fish. Sam's son loved watching the fish swim.

Pharmacy. Mary was visiting a local pharmacy. She saw that the pharmacist there had an extra bottle of cough syrup. Mary decided to try a few samples of the syrup. She loved the cough syrup and purchased more. She was very happy that the pharmacist had offered to share.

Pickpocket. Jane went out with her friends. She sat on the couch and tried to watch television. While watching a movie, someone tapped her on the shoulder. Jane turned around and noticed that it was her ex-boyfriend. Jane apologized to him and left the couch.

The Move Out. Ike had his move out day today. He was moving into his new apartment. He packed his belongings into the moving van. He drove off to the new apartment. Ike was relieved to be leaving the old one behind.

Angela. Angela had just turned thirty-five years old. She decided to go through with her first pregnancy. She went to the hospital where she was very scared. As she waited, the hospital staff offered her some hope. The doctor ended up giving Angela a baby girl!

Bull Ride. My boyfriend and I took our bull ride last Saturday. He likes to ride on the bulls. He told me to keep my eyes on the ground. When the bull comes towards us, I jump and I rode to the ground. He fell on his back.

Declined. It had been two weeks since Jim got to school. And he hadn't moved at all. It seemed like he would never leave the school grounds. But now it was school time, and he was ready to go. It was the best day he ever had at school.
Ride Along. Tom was out for a ride. A friend had lent him a horse. It was a small colt. It was not very fast. It could hardly make it across a small bridge.
Stainless. I had my car cleaned last week. I went to the garage. I got my car ready. The mechanic changed the paint. My car looks absolutely beautiful now!

The Nickname. Sheila was working as a maid. One of her clients tried to change her name. The client didn't understand and used the wrong name. Sheila's name became a joke around the house. Sheila's family was embarrassed at being told they were ugly.

John's Social Life. John lived in a rough neighborhood. It was rough to live with people that made bad decisions. One day john's neighbors were making bad decisions. John decided to try to help people in his neighborhood. He ended up being able to help people because he was an alcoholic.
Jailbird. Kate was driving on the highway. She had not been paying attention on the road. Her car spun out of control. It slammed into a ditch. The car was totaled.

Swap Shop. Anna was looking for her makeup. She looked for it in the local swap shop. But the clerk refused to let her buy it. She thought she would have to return it. She was relieved when she found it in a local beauty supply store.

Stuck in traffic. Samantha had to take the bus to work. She arrived fifteen minutes early. On the way there, she was stuck in traffic. The bus finally left, and Samantha tried to find a better place to sit. She found a spot on the bus, and waited for the next bus.

Chicken and Waffles. I went to the grocery store yesterday. When I got home I decided to make some chicken and waffles. I put the ingredients into the crock pot and waited. After an hour of waiting, I had a delicious meal. I felt like a genius when I made the meal.
Pizza. Lara loved pizza. Everyday she made a new flavor. One day she put a new pepperoni on the top. She was excited to eat the new pizza. Her parents were impressed with her cooking skills.

The lake storm. John was boating with his friend. The lake was out of the way. They headed towards the center. The water suddenly started coming in. John and his friend decided to turn around and go back.

99. The man took his son to Disneyland for the first time. He got the boy a t-shirt. The boy asked to get a chocolate frog. The boy did as he was told. He looked at his father and said, dad, is that a frog?
Caught stealing. Tom was in a rush to get to work. He stole some candy from the store. Tom was caught. His co-workers confronted him. Tom confessed and was fired.

The Phone Call. Ava was excited to start her summer in Spain. The first few weeks, she was able to call her boyfriend back home. He would be at work or at home, depending on when he was at work. She was sad to hear he was busy at the office today. She was relieved when he came home and gave her a call.
Interview. Ethan went for a job interview. He wore a new hat. He looked really good for the interview. Ethan was hired. Ethan is happy he went for the interview.

Retirement. Tom and Jane were both very interested in the same career. Tom loved sports, while Jane loved art. Tom decided to enter a painting contest. Unfortunately, he did not win. Jane however decided she would continue to pursue painting.
Across the Alley. I had to run across the street to the store. I went under a bridge and jumped across it. It was very dangerous. I fell to the ground. I decided I needed to exercise more.

Dishonest. Nathan bought some groceries. He went to the store. Nathan found some candy bars and brought them home. However, his mom told him that the candy bars weren't for him. Nathan was very upset.
The Shoes. I was walking to school today. I was running and I fell into a puddle. My shoes were soaked through. I tried to dry them but they were too slippery. I decided to buy new shoes.

Dehydrated. Dan was driving home when he felt light headed. He kept driving but he got drowsy and lost track of time. Suddenly, he crashed into a parked car. It was a minor accident and Dan wasn't hurt. But he had to pee a lot so he could keep driving.

Building the shed. Bill had to build a shed. It was too big to fit inside of the shed. Bill went to the hardware store. Bill bought a lot of tools and material. Bill was able to build his shed in no time.
Handing out candy. Jill was feeling hungry. She noticed the candy was on her desk. She picked up several pieces. After handing out some she was not feeling hungry anymore. She felt like a kid again.

The Pasta Dinner. Alicia was going to her boyfriend's house for a pasta dinner. She was very nervous because she was used to eating spaghetti. When she got there, she ordered a large spaghetti dish. When she tasted it, it was surprisingly good. Alicia's boyfriend didn't even notice at all.

Music. Lily was at a jazz club with her friends. One of her friends had a guitar and wanted to learn to play. Lily was the only one in her club playing. Lily asked her friends for help. Luckily they all came to her aid.

Tutoring Help. The teacher assigned the first two weeks of classes. There were two groups. The first group worked on a science project. The second group worked on an arts project. The third group went home after the project.
Dave needs a new car. Dave needed a new car. He searched for many different ones. He couldn't decide on a car. Dave finally decided on a sporty one. Dave picked up the new car today.
Local Ad. Dan recently found a local advertising job. He applied online. He got the job. Dan left his apartment to look for a new apartment. Dan eventually found a new job.

Too Much Soda. Jim didn't drink soda at all. One day, he tried to drink more than he normally did. He drank almost as much as he normally did. He became sick to his stomach and threw up. Jim decided to cut back on soda completely from then on.
Dog. Jim bought a new dog. He named the dog Spot. Spot ate all of Jim's dinner. Jim took the dog to the shelter. He found a loving family.

Doves cry. My neighbor is a pretty bird, a rooster. He will cry if he sees a dove. One day, he was at my house, looking for food. A dove flew by and scared him very badly. He cried until I fed him and then he was very happy again.

The Earthquake. Tim was playing basketball with his friends. Suddenly, Tim felt a jolt as he jumped for the ball. As he landed, a big earthquake occurred. Tim's friends ran to him to see what happened. They all came out of the building just in time.

The musical student. Cynthia was a great piano student at the local college. Cynthia took piano lessons weekly. One day, Cynthia's piano teacher quit. Cynthia decided to take lessons on her own. Soon, Cynthia was very good at piano!
Rita chokes. Rita was eating a banana. She didn't realize it was undercooked. She starts choking on her banana. Rita starts crying and goes to the nurse's office. Rita was rushed to the hospital.

Large Ego. Gina had to walk across the school after class. She thought her sister Beth was a bully. When Beth turned around she could see Gina's face. Gina was furious and turned around. She could not believe Beth was bullying her.

Beer run. I was walking through the park when I saw a huge crowd gathered there. I was so excited to see how many people were there and what beers they had. A large man was walking along with a cooler and beer in his hands. He was carrying over 20 beers to the park. I watched as he ran and made his way to the crowd.
Tom the Drunk. Tom was drunk at a party. A man tried to pick a fight with him. Tom got punched and kicked. He got out of the man's face. Tom decided not to drink anymore.

Tim gets in Shape. Tim wanted to become healthier and start exercising. He decided to do some cardio everyday. Eventually Tim's cardio routine was taking him too far. He started to exercise more but felt sick more often. After doing some reading he decided to stop cardio and start lifting weights.

Criticized. Maggie was watching a horror movie. She felt disturbed by the images. She asked the kids about it afterward. Some of the kids told her that they had been scared. She decided not to watch it again.

Stale Dale. Dale was a young boy. He got a piece of gum stuck in his teeth. Dale was crying because he couldn't get it out. He went to the bathroom to urinate. Afterwards, Dale ate some stale bread and a cookie.
Bathrobe. John had a really old wardrobe. He decided to clean it out. He took it to the cleaners. He bought a new one. The new one looked great!

Teaching Lesson. Today I was teaching math to a couple of 6th graders. It was the middle of the afternoon and my math teacher was gone. When I walked to my desk, my math teacher was not there. I called her name, and she was not there either. She never showed up to the class that day.

seeing eye dog. Irene saw a dog walking up the street. She decided to go get him. She found the owner, a lady with a cat. She took the dog to the vet, where he had to have surgery. Irene now has a seeing-eye dog.
Fire. Lori was cooking at her favorite diner. She was cooking some chicken and bacon. Suddenly, a small fire broke out. Lori panicked and shut her food off. Luckily, it was only minor.

Veteran's Day. It was Veterans Day. John was sad that it was only Saturday. He knew he had to do something nice. John decided to go to the local soup kitchen. John made some delicious hot chicken soup.

Hitting the curb. Allie was in the parking lot of her school. She was trying to park. But she was too nervous to get out of her car. So she just stood there and got nervous. Finally she finally decided to leave and go home.

Travel to Hawaii. Mary really wanted to see Hawaii. She had always wanted to swim there. Her mom took her out on a rafting trip. Mary had a wonderful time on the rafting trip. Mary loved the experience of traveling to Hawaii.

Married. My sister in law is marrying a man she met online. My sister in law works very hard for her career. She was laid off from her last job and now is trying to save money. My sister in law is going to take a job on the other side of the country. I hope this is not the end of my sister in law.
Turtle Violation. I took my kids to the zoo. We had a lot of fun in the zoo. Then we saw a turtle. It kept bumping into my son's head. I yelled at the turtle.

My Best friend Andy and Larry. Andy was a mean kid. He always made fun of my friends for being overweight. One day my friend Larry asked Andy to the park. Andy asked Larry if he could join in. Larry and Andy became best friends.
Bad purchase. Tom bought a car. He thought it was too expensive. Tom had a lot of problems with it. He brought it back to get it fixed. Unfortunately they couldn't fix it.

Sisters Fighting. Gina was watching her younger sister in the yard. Her sister was trying to get the neighbor's phone book. Gina yelled at her to not play with her brother's books. The book she was holding was still on the ground and her sister started to play. Gina decided to be her sister's big sister again.

Stomach. My stomach felt terrible. I went to the doctor to get checked out. The doctor told me I was sick. I decided to call my friend to see if he would drive me to work. I went to the doctor and my stomach was fine.
Spot the Dog. Spot the dog was not a big dog. He was a little puppy. He got caught by the neighbor's dog. The neighbor had a net and caught Spot. Spot's owner was very happy.

Nasty Attitude. Lydia and her boyfriend were fighting over who should wash the dishes. Their mom yelled at them to stop. The couple turned on the TV, and the TV played a movie. It was a bad movie that made them sad. The couple resolved their disagreement by agreeing to watch a movie together.

Lake. The family was on vacation in a beautiful lake. There was nothing else to do and the family sat down to eat. Their food was delicious. They decided to stay there longer. It was a perfect spot for relaxing in the sun.

Bagpipe. Jack was a very talented trumpet player. His dad took him to an audition at an open band practice. Jack blew all the notes and they gave him a standing ovation. Jack got in and took lessons for the next 2 years. He became a very good trumpet player.
NYC. We went on a cruise ship. It was fun. I was the only woman on the ship. I had to wear a hijab. It was a weird experience.
Italian Food. My wife likes Italian food. She likes to try new places and try new things. Yesterday we went to a new place. They had the best pasta I have ever had. I am glad we found this place.

Skydiver. Sam loved heights. He joined the circus to do stunt jumping. He performed so well the circus hired him to do jumping stunts again. Sam became known as the best acrobat in the circus. Sam went on to work in the circus as well.

Trapped Dog. Mina found her neighbor's dog stuck in the middle of the street. She decided to help him out. Mina tied a rope to the dog. She then tied a string to the gate. Finally she helped the dog up to freedom.
Broken Television. Tom was watching TV. His television broke. He checked to see if it was a problem. It wasn't a problem so he kept watching. Eventually he checked to see if he had broken it.

Hamsters for All. Jake had a pet hamster. One day Jake was out on a field trip. He threw the hamster to the ground. The hamster tried to roll over but fell. Jake decided that hamsters didn't need to be tied up.
Not what expected. Allie went to the bar. She decided to drink a few beers. When she got home she realized she was drunk. She didn't realize it until she was asleep. Allie woke up to a surprise.

Friend. Tom was very close with his friend. Tom got invited to his friend's wedding. Tom was scared and didn't know what to say. Tom decided to tell his friend about his fears. His friend's father told him that he was the best guy ever.

Shane goes to a play. Shane decided to go to the play. He picked a seat in the row in front of the stage. As the show was about to start he got very nervous. The actor in the play didn't notice Shane. When the play finished, Shane was able to stand up.
Chalky. Dan found the dog's coat chalky. He tried several coats. None of them were good. He decided to get a new dog coat. His dog now has a smooth coat.

Jorge Cooks Beans. Jorge had never cooked beans before. He went to the store and bought the necessary ingredients. He was unsure about how to boil the beans. He gave it a shot and made a pot of beans. His beans were delicious and he was glad he had tried it.

Jack buys car accessories. Jack wanted to buy some car accessories. He went to the car lot and looked for his favorite items. After a couple hours, he found everything he needed. After driving the car home, Jack cleaned the windows. Jack was able to relax after a day of searching for his car accessories.

Not Mad. When she arrived at the store, he sat down to talk. She couldn't hear him because he was so close to the cashier. Finally, she realized he had his phone on his lap. He called her back. He said he'd texted her earlier.
Pool. Our family decided to take a trip to the pool. We rented a car and drove to the pool. It was really dark. After a while the lights came on. We could finally see the pool.

Cheap Move. Joe was a professional athlete. He had a contract with the NFL to run a sprint for a group of athletes. Joe decided to run the 100 meter dash. The 100 meter dash took place in a local park. Joe was embarrassed to realize that he was not as fast as he thought he was.

Safe and Sound. Drake was sleeping in his bunk at his Navy training base. Drake heard some commotion in the next room. Drake decided he would investigate the noise. Drake went to investigate the commotion. Drake found his bunkmate's corpse.

News. Ginger's favorite news show was on TV. It was called The Big Story. Ginger was very excited to be part of the show. On the show, the anchor interviewed Ginger's favorite sports star. Ginger was very excited to be on the show.

Broken Arm. My son is going to try out for his soccer team today. We put him in a t-shirt and shorts. As he was running, he tripped on a branch. It broke his arm. He cried and told us he would go again.

Mary's Kitten. Mary's mom was visiting from out of town. Mary's dad didn't have any pets. She begged his mom to get her a kitten. Mary's dad gave in and bought her a kitten. Mary's kitten is the best pet ever!
The Mattress. Tom was always stressed out from work. He decided to buy a mattress. The mattress didn't help much. Tom went home and took a long nap. He was glad to have a sleeping relief.
Tooth. The boy ran and ran to get the toothbrush. He was too short to reach it. He knocked over a lamp and it broke. He tried to pull it out of his mouth. It was stuck to his teeth and hurt.
Migraine. Ava was diagnosed with a migraine. She had to take medication. It made her more dizzy. She had trouble walking. She was rushed to the emergency room.

RMV. Jane needed to get her driver's license. Her friend gave her the name of a local RMV. Jane got there in the afternoon. The lady working at the RMV gave Jane a $100 registration fee. Jane drove off in the rear of the RMV.

Basketball Rim. Tom was out on the basketball court. A rim was right next to him. It came off his shoe and made a hole in his shoe. Tom kept walking without getting rid of the rim. Tom had to get the rim removed from his shoes.

To much of a good thing. Bella had her first day of work in her new job. She had to be in charge of writing the news for a radio station. She wrote it all off as a very difficult job. Her boss came to her and said she was a great writer. He was very pleased with her.

Rotten Luck. The family was out for the day. They stopped at a local ice cream shop. When the order came, it was wrong. They waited for a manager to give them a new order. Luckily, she was able to fix it.

Lilly has a stroke. Lilly is a very smart person. Lilly was diagnosed with a stroke. Lilly's family was very worried about her. Lilly became very ill after a few months. Lilly died within a few weeks.

The Gym. I decided to join a gym. I walked inside and began checking out the machines. A man gave me an evaluation for fitness. He gave me some advice on how to improve my workout. I ended up doing an amazing workout.

Reading. Jim and John were best friends who loved to read. Their favorite genre was science fiction. John got a science fiction novel and they read it every day. They both decided to start a science fiction fandom. They created their own science fiction fan club and all their friends joined!

An unexpected accident. Dan had to work a new job. He was a secretary in a store. A woman came in wearing a wig to work with his boss. Dan's boss took his wig and told him to stop. Dan was shocked and hurt.

Selfish People. Timmy didn't like going to school anymore. He was so bored and lonely he couldn't care about school anymore. He began looking for people who would play video games. He found many who would play video games with him. Timmy decided to be more selfish.

Ruined Mailbox. Alfred had a small mailbox on his street. The mailbox was often broken so he got it professionally fixed. When he put it back up the mail would roll up all over. So Alfred installed a giant garbage bag to hold the mail in place. He felt so much better when he felt secure with that.

Bleach Cap Search. I was cleaning the bathroom. I grabbed a cap and looked inside. I found out that it was full of bleach. I scrubbed the entire cap from the tile. I was able to get rid of the bleach.

grocery. Mary had been looking forward to going to the grocery store for months. She had always been on a strict budget. It was finally time to get her groceries. But she was so disappointed! It had been so expensive, she hadn't even had anything to drink.
Padding. Ava had a pillow that was badly ripped. It was very wrinkled and ripped. So Ava decided to buy a pad. She bought a thick foam pad. Ava was glad to be able to buy a cushion.

mike walker. Dori took a walk by herself one day. She saw some interesting things in the park. Her friend told her about a new mike walker at the park. Dori felt sad she would have to walk again alone. She then went back home and told her friend about the new mike walker.

Movie rip off. I was going to go see a movie with some friends. I decided to drive to the theater and sit on the bench. As I sat down, my friend started laughing. She was doing a fake death scene. I thought she was a little over the top.

Tyler saves the baby. Tyler is going on a date with the girl of his dreams. His date agrees to take him to a restaurant. They are about to leave when a baby stumbles into the food. It's a newborn and Tyler rushes to see how it is. He rushes to the doctor and saves the baby.

My Mom Lost Her Job Today. My mom lost her job last week. She had been with her job for a year. She was going to be laid off on Friday. I wrote to my boss expressing my concern. I have asked my boss to make a new position available.
Wedding Party. My wife and I went to a wedding party. We had a lot of fun. We also got dressed up for the dance. We had a lot of drinks afterward. We had a good time.

Lost Deal. Jill was shopping at the mall with her mother. The line for the shoes in the shoe store was extremely long. When Jill reached the shoes the line was out the door. Jill and her mother had to go back to their car. Jill was very angry that they had to wait for the shoes.

Lansing Trip. One day I decided to visit Lansing, Michigan. I took my sister and friend with me. We drove up to the local college. We were able to check out the museum. Afterwards we decided to have lunch in a local cafe.

Easter Bunny. Betsy had a favorite Easter bunny. Betsy loved him a lot, and would chase him. One Easter she got so excited and went into the woods. As she was going home, the bunny saw her. The bunny started to chase her and Betsy was happy.

Bad Dessert. Joe was invited to a friend's house. When he arrived he ate a lot of food. Afterwards he forgot about the food. The next morning he was exhausted. He had forgotten about his delicious dessert.

Mike Fixes His Overheating PC. Mike noticed his computer was having a lot of heat issues. He realized he had not checked the fans and the case. Mike decided to make a small investment to get a better case. His decision saved his computer as it ran cooler. Mike was happy that he could turn his computer around.
Loud music. Dan was bored at home. He sat down to change the volume on his television. The volume was too loud. Dan couldn't stand the noise. Dan turned the volume down until it was quieter.
Tax Evasion. My wife worked in a retirement home. She took a tax deduction. Her wife is in prison. She has not paid taxes. The IRS came to our door last week.

New York Vacation. Neil took his wife to New York City on a vacation. They had dinner and went to a jazz club. Neil's wife found a necklace of stars. Neil's wife loved the necklace. They decided to take another trip to New York City.

College Applications. The couple had to apply to college. They sat down and brainstormed about what they should apply for. After a few hours, they had a list of three courses they were interested in. They waited for the results of their application. After weeks of waiting, they were notified that they were accepted!

Generations. Miley was a baby who had just had her first baby. She was still a new mom and wanted to have a baby. She didn't have a lot of friends in her town, and so she decided to get help. Her friends were very helpful and helped her make friends. After a few weeks of friendship, Miley had a baby.

Vegas. The couple visited Las Vegas one Saturday. The couple had been there a week and wanted to stay longer. They wanted to get an early start on the new year. It was too early to do this so they decided to stay at a hotel. Their stay was a great success.

No Hesitation. Tom was always a bad golfer. He had a game plan and it was to not hit anything. His friends were very talented and he tried to emulate them. He ended up hitting the ball so many times he got very tired. He was glad when he won his first game.

Car in Parking Garage. Tim was walking down the street. He saw a car parked in the garage. Tim wanted to take it but he wasn't allowed to. Tim was scared and he ran away. After that he never entered the garage again.

the song. Sue thought her friend Amy wanted her to come over for a concert. She didn't realize her friend wanted the show to end. Sue sat in her room for several hours. The concert was ending. She went out for a few beers and danced with her friends.
The move. The Johnson family needed to move to a new city. It was time to move. They needed a place to live. They found a good house. They moved into their new house.

Coupon Clipping. Kate needed to get coupons from a store. But she could not find the address for it. She went through every store in the neighborhood looking. After 20 minutes she finally saw the address. She found the coupon shop in the address and got the coupons.

Online Shopping. I was looking for some books at the library. I decided to go shopping on amazon. I looked at books for years and years. I was sad to find out I was going to buy nothing. I was so glad I had a good deal on books online.
New Router. The Internet in our apartment was old and slow. I installed a brand new router online. The router installed easily. The internet worked great! Now my internet is as fast as ever.

Firebug. I was fascinated by firebugs. My parents told me not to touch any firebugs. I got a little bit too close to one, and burned my hand badly. My parents took me to the doctor. The doctor said my hand was burned badly, and I needed plastic surgery.

New handbag. Lulu needed a new handbag. She looked on the internet to find the best one. She found a great one but it was too expensive. She decided to save her money. She bought the bag anyway and was happy.

Space Mountain. The Smith family went to Disney World. They had a ton of fun. They were in the park for hours and then went home. They decided to make plans for the future. The trip was great and they planned trips to go back.

Movies. The other day we went to the movies. It was very crowded and we tried to stand up. We ended up getting seated with the front row seats. The movie was okay and we ended up leaving at the end. We'll definitely go back.

amnesia. I had a long day at work yesterday. I had to leave early in the afternoon. I was stuck at my desk for a long time. I felt a lot more confused after I got home. I realized it was more fun to just go home.

Getting Ears Pierced. Alicia was going to get her ears pierced. She went to the piercing parlor to get her ears pierced. When she got there they started to put the jewelry in. At first Alicia was scared to get them pierced. After a while she became much more comfortable.

Total heat stroke. Tina was swimming with her friends in the pool. Suddenly she got caught in a current. She began to float and then she was swept away. Tina was stuck in the water for 3 hours. Thankfully she was rescued and saved.
To the Beach. My family and I were watching the beach yesterday. Our grandpa went over to help him sand. He took his shoes off. We all stood around looking at the sand. It was so pretty.
The Hair Band. Kia had taken dance lessons. Her hair had been in pigtails all week. The hair band needed to be straightened. She decided to try her best. It was painful, but the hair looked great.

Army Recruit. I was a civilian in the Army. I volunteered for the army for about two weeks. I hated my job in the army and wanted to quit. My boss called me back into the army. I accepted the offer because I thought it was the right thing to do.

Graphing Calculator. I wanted to know how many calories a chocolate bar would give me. I looked up several recipes on the internet. I created a graph with each recipe. I used the number in the recipe I made to get calories. After I had done that, I used the graph to figure out how many calories I would get.

Tail. I noticed my dog's tail was very short and flat. I put a stick up to it, and it began to wiggle. I took a long look at the tail and noticed it was crooked. I took him to a groomer, who fixed it for him. Now his tail is straight, and he's no longer flat!

Road Trip. Tina decided to go on a road trip with her family. She packed a backpack full of items for the trip. Tina got on the road and headed for the mountains. The road trip went great and Tina was happy. Tina was glad she packed her supplies for the trip.

The Paper. Janet was writing a story. She couldn't figure out how to end the chapter. She checked the newspaper to see how the day had been. It was a Saturday, so it had been a long day. The paper reported that a boy had died that day.

The old town visit. I went to the old town one summer. I took a tour around the old downtown. They had a lot of historical markers. I found a place where there used to be a large church. It was so old that I wasn't sure if I could actually see it.

In Trouble. Jake had just started to go to college. His new dorm mates had been drinking in the halls all week. Jake tried to break it up but the friends had too much. They started a fight. Jake had to lock himself out of his dorm.
The Goat. The goats were outside. They didn't know there were kids nearby. They all started running up and down the grass. They ran out of the goat pasture. They ran through the fence and were fine.

Ferns. Barry was a gardener. He hated to do it but he always got a lot of flowers. One day, he noticed some red florients in the garden. He went to pick them but found they were poisonous. Barry decided to stop caring about flowers.

Siblings. The kids were playing in the yard. They got all the toys and saw all of the cool stuff. Then they decided to share what they found. They started to play with their new toys together. The kids shared the new toys all night.

Rex Can't Sleep. Rex always struggled to fall asleep at night. He woke up at night and heard a dog barking. He checked the house to see what was going on. Rex noticed that his cat had gotten loose from its cage. Rex had to let the cat out to get it cleaned.
Camping. Joe was camping. But he was alone. A bear approached his camp site. Joe ran back home. He forgot about the bear all day.

The Game. The kids were playing a game of hide and go seek. They were hiding in the basement. They searched all night for a hidey hole. The parents woke up late and found the children in the house. The parents were grounded for a month.

The Pistol. Jim was in the park with his friend. The two were playing a game of kickball. Jim had the ball and ran up to the goal. He threw the ball and missed the shot. His friend hit the ball and Jim scored a point.

Leaf Collector. Joe's garden was looking bare. He knew his dad would buy him something. But Joe hated being poor! Then Joe noticed his dad's gardening equipment. There were a few things he could grow.

Frank Finds a Friend. Frank had been lonely lately. He asked his friend how he was. His friend told him he had lost his job. Frank was upset but he made an effort to make new friends. Frank's new friend is his new best friend.

Driving School. Linda was driving around downtown. All of a sudden she lost her car keys. She called the rental company to see if she could borrow the car. Unfortunately, the rental company was closed. Linda had to call the police to get a ride home.

Summer 1987. In summer 1987 my wife and I lived in a dormitory. It was located on the sixth floor. The temperature in the dormitory was over 100 degrees. One day my roommate had a bad cold. He missed the upcoming school year because he was sick.

The Expensive Bill. Amy was at a concert. She ordered a drink and sang along. Then the bartender turned off her phone. She had to leave and call the bartender. She was disappointed when she got a $100 bill!

Sanitary. It was a rainy day at work. Mike put on his dirty work clothes to get ready for work. When he came into work, he realized he didn't have any clean laundry. The next day at work, Mike made up a plan to have a new load of laundry. Mike is now a better cleaner person because he has a new load.

Wednesday Dinner. John was very hungry and decided to cook dinner. John got home and started cooking. He followed his wife's suggestions to cook the best spaghetti. When it was done, John ate it with wine. He got plenty of wine to keep him up all night.

The Letter. My parents had a secret letter to hide. It was addressed to me, so I hid it well. When I got to school, everyone knew I had received it. Everyone laughed, and said it was a joke. I was sad that no one liked my secret.
Fast Cars. Billy wanted to win at speed. He had a big collection of fast cars. Billy took his friends to the race track. The boys raced around and won. Now Billy and his friends race cars together.

Wedding Disaster. Jane was getting married to her fiance. The night before the big day, Jane took her fiance to a casino. She tried to win a few dollars but ended up losing. As she left she could see his face. Jane was disappointed with herself.
The Rug. I bought a new rug to hang on my kitchen counter. I hung it up on a pegboard to dry it out. I put a sheet over it. I put it on top of some pillows. Now it looks great.

Hair Spray. Sara wanted to get her kids' hair color. She decided to buy them a kit. She purchased some sprays to mix together. The spray ended up working great. When they dried the kids were a happy shade of red.

Jake Finds a Friend. Jake needed some friends. He went to a coffee shop and met some guys there. They played basketball together. They had fun for a few hours. Jake was happy that he had made a new friend.
Writing a Song. The man wrote a song. He called it up to record it. He gave the engineer a rough idea of what to do. The engineer came up with a great song. The man recorded the song and sold it.
Sandwich Thief. I was working on my lunch break. A stranger walked up to me. He offered to buy me a sandwich. I declined, thinking he was trying to scam me. He got up and left the store.

A bear spotted. I was playing near a pond when I noticed a big bear. I began to run back to my house as fast as I could. A few seconds later, the bear disappeared into the distance. When I returned home, I turned on my lights. I hope that the bear is gone and I can go back to sleep.
Fun at the Park. It was raining. They decided to take a walk to the park. They played basketball in the middle of the park. They had so much fun. The kids returned home soaked.

David goes fishing. David went fishing for the first time today. He got in his boat and started to drive. He took his fishing pole and headed to the lake. He caught a few fish and set up his rod. After a couple hours of fishing, he felt satisfied.

The New Drone. Tim was excited about his new drone. He took it out and tried to fly it. His drone fell off of a cliff. It landed safely on the side of the road. Tim and his friends are happy they saved their drone.

Answered Prayer. I was sitting in the park last night. All of a sudden, a man was standing next to me. He was asking for my help to pray for his friend. I told him I would help him pray. His friend thanked me for my help.

One Store School Supplies. Sam's school had an assignment on art supplies. He was not sure what to buy. His mom told him to go to Walmart and get what they had. Sam decided to get supplies. Sam bought the supplies and was glad he didn't have to pay.

Clean Towels. Amy was at work when it began to rain. She hurried home and realized her house was soaked. She took her towels to the dry cleaners. Her husband went to the dry cleaners with the towels. Amy paid the dry cleaners and she was pleased.
piercing. Lucy wanted her ears pierced. She went to a local piercing parlor. She was very nervous. Her ears felt very strange after being pierced. After a while, she liked them.

No experience. I was looking to buy my son a computer. He wanted to know what he should buy. I told him to try out any old computer he could find. He said he didn't know what he wanted and just wanted to play. I bought him the cheapest one I could find and he is doing fine.

The costume party. Jenny was at her mother's costume party. She loved the costumes and wanted to be a ghost. Her mother told her that ghost stories didn't work for her. Jenny decided to give ghost stories a try anyway. She wound up having a wonderful time with her mother's party.
The Test. Miles had a test in the morning. He was worried that he wasn't studying enough. He kept doing poorly on the test. Miles decided to stay up late. He passed the test with flying colors!
Daughter to Work. Mary decided to work. She got hired at a new store. She was excited. Her daughter became very upset. Mary had to take care of the daughter.

Greedy Child. Tommy and his family were on their way home from the store. His mom told him not to eat any snacks. He picked up a handful of crackers and pretended like they were chips. Tommy's mom was annoyed and told him to keep chewing. She said that chips were fine but crackers were not.

After Hours Capers. Kenny and Dan loved to watch the TV after the movies. Dan always thought of how good the after hours shows looked. Kenny had a few ideas of his own for how to sneak up to a TV. Dan asked Kenny for help to make an after hours Caper. Kenny agreed and they spent the next several hours watching the shows.

Ruined Pants. Teddy went to go buy some clothes for his birthday. His dad told him to buy some jeans. Teddy bought the jeans and took them to the store. Teddy was too poor to buy new jeans so he left the store. When he got home he had ruined his jeans.
New Underwear. Bill had just woken up from a cold sleep. He tried on his underwear. He found a pair he liked. However, they were way too small. He bought another pair.

Mildred Tries Out For Soccer. Mildred notices that she has been playing soccer with some of her school friends. She is worried that she will not make the team. Her mother tells her that she might make the team. Mildred attends her first soccer game with her new friends. She is happy that she made the team.
Flossing Pain. I was brushing my teeth. I found it hard to get the floss out of the way. I started to get irritated. I pulled up my tooth. The floss came out.

Dominick's Birthday. Dominick wanted to throw a party for his birthday. He looked online for parties, but nothing seemed to be going well. Then he found out that his friend, John, has a birthday party. He scheduled John's party, and arranged for the food to be delivered. Dominick was happy to get all the party items on his birthday!

Ice Cream. Sara and I like to go to the local ice cream parlor. Usually it's on the weekends. Last Friday they were out for the day. They put out a new flavor, chocolate cake. I like this new flavor, but Sara hates chocolate cake.

A Wall of Burning Books. Jane was trying to finish her first novel. She tried to cut down some of her older books. They burned through the pages. Jane was stuck with a pile of burned books. It was a very frustrating experience.

Biking Through a Puddle. I was out for a bike ride when I saw something splashing. It was a puddle of water that looked a lot like mud. I tried to ride on top of it but ended up falling off. Water splashed all over my body and I got soaked. I decided I should never bike through a puddle.
US Invades Iraq. The United States decided to invade Iraq. It was not a popular decision. The troops were killed in large numbers. People got sick and became ill. It took years to rebuild.
Story. Jane wanted to do a story. So she wrote a story. She took it to the editor. She was asked to rewrite some of the sentences. The editor liked the rewrite.

Blankets. Jane loved to decorate her house. Jane decided to make some colorful blankets. Jane wrapped them in colorful wrapping paper. Jane put the blankets up on the dresser. Jane looked great with her colorful blankets!

Envy. A woman had several white friends. They would all go to the same restaurant every week. One day she went to the restaurant with them. When she arrived there were no white people at the restaurant. She felt a sense of disgust towards them.

Old Bear. Dan's family lived next door to a wild bear. The bear lived on the north side of the property. Dan had a big bear spray that he used in his car. He was shocked when he saw the bear in the woods. He shot the bear and the bear ran away.
The Pool. Dana was playing in the pool one day. He didn't feel like swimming. He got in his car and drove off. He went home. He fell asleep on the couch.

Swinging. I was running a bit on my swings at the pool. I was feeling a bit sluggish and started to fall down. The water splashed up and soaked me. The water splashed under my shorts and my swim trunks. I decided I was never going to go on those swings again.
A skiing accident. Tina went skiing with her boyfriend. They were skiing down a trail. Tina fell off of the slide. She got hurt badly. She had to go to the hospital to get checked out.
The Swan. A man stood on a bridge over a river. He wanted to feel the air flow over him. He felt the water under his feet. He jumped down to the riverbank. He fell into the water, feeling the breeze.
A Difficult Reading. Nancy was reading a novel. It was really difficult. She had to stop at several points. She could not go on reading. She decided to skip it.
Recital. Tom was having a recital soon. His mom told him not to do certain things. Tom tried doing those things. Unfortunately Tom broke his arm. His mom was furious.

The Grand Escape. Bob was very good at playing games on his board game. He decided to play chess and he was determined to win. Bob played very fast, he was sure he would win easily. Suddenly he realized that there were a dozen other players on the board. They were playing a different game and they lost.
Lost purse. I went to the jewelry store yesterday. While I was there, I lost my purse. I had to walk back home. I realized I left my cell phone there. I am very upset about it.

Lying. A woman was in a relationship with a man named Joe. Joe claimed that his girlfriend left him. Joe called her, but she never answered. Joe sent her a text message with a picture of himself kissing her. The girl believed Joe's story.

Overgrowth. Tom decided to do some landscaping. He went to the store to buy supplies. He began by digging up a nice patch of dirt. He went to the store and purchased all the soil he needed. Tom worked on the area all week long.

The Driver's Test. Brent was driving home from work. A police officer pulled him over and gave him a ticket. Brent studied for the test for hours and was ready to go. Brent had never had any trouble in his life before. Brent passed and decided to take the test again.

Green Thumb. Alicia lived in a very small town in Illinois. She noticed a lot of kids playing football in the street. Alicia approached the kids and asked if they wanted to play. Alicia and the kids went to the park and they played football. Alicia felt more relaxed after she talked to the kids.

Snake Escape. Timmy went into his bedroom closet. He got out a can of paint and poured it on his ceiling. He jumped off the bed and walked towards the ceiling. Timmy was careful not to drop the paint. Timmy was happy when he was able to get out of the closet safely.

Mandarin Chinese. Bobby and his family wanted to learn Chinese. They went to the local Chinese language center to sign up. They were amazed how well they understood the materials. Then they took a class at their local Chinese restaurant. There they enjoyed a delicious meal with their Chinese friends!

Devil's Paradise. There was an old house in the mountains. It had a huge moat. One night a young girl and her family went in to fish for salmon. The girl fell into the moat, but the family caught her. Now the moat is a tourist attraction.

Broken Axle. I once owned a motorcycle that I loved very much. I had a very cheap fork on my bike. One day I bought a better fork and installed it. My bike felt better after installing the better fork. Now my bike doesn't feel so cheap and I'm proud of that.

Near Drowning. Nell was out walking with her dog. A tree branch came loose and it fell down into the pond. Nell's dog dove after it, and the branch caught on Nell's shoe. She tried to swim but couldn't. Nell's dog had drowned.
Too fast. Allie had a date with a guy she liked. He wanted to meet her at her place. When she got there he had an extra long walk. Allie got there a little late. She couldn't finish her date.
Boo!. Samantha was drinking tea. She got up to make a cup of tea. Then she got a piece of candy. Samantha dropped the candy and started to cry. Her boyfriend rushed to comfort her.

time capsule. Jane was sitting in a cafe. She noticed her time capsule wasn't there. Jane checked the time and realized it was 1 AM. Jane then took out the capsule and looked inside. Inside was her diary from that day.

Berry's Trick. Berry wanted to have his hair cut. Berry's father took him to a barber. Berry learned a lot from the barber. He got his hair cut that same day. Berry is very proud of his new hairstyle.

Car accident. I drove to the grocery store yesterday. I was going to buy a carton of cereal. All of a sudden the car in front of me flipped over. My wife called the police to report the accident. Luckily the driver was okay.

Falling tree. Tom's house was in the middle of a forest. The house had a big tree that he didn't like. It was taller than him. Tom decided he was going to try to climb it. Tom made it and climbed the tree, he was happy about that.

Special Delivery. Jim delivered a special order from a manufacturer. He was called to deliver it at a factory. Jim got a call from the boss that it was finished. Jim was shocked at what he saw. The entire assembly line was broken and was falling apart.

The Pie. Beth was working on a pie with her grandma. She had been baking for a while, but never tried to decorate. Her grandma asked her if she was ready. Beth's grandma picked up the pie and showed her how to make it. Beth was so excited to see her grandma make her pie.

Clean Room. Kate's dad cleaned her room every day. She hated seeing him so frustrated. But then one day she noticed the cleaning was not complete. The whole room was filled with dusty dust. Kate didn't want to see her dad cleaning again.
The Race. Sally entered a 5K race. She ran at first to prepare. She then got a bit slower. At the end of the race she was still in the lead. Sally won the race!

Lifetime Puppy. Tommy's mom wanted to get him a puppy. He begged her but she always refused. One day he went and got his old stuffed toy puppy instead. It got stuck in his teeth and Tommy cried. He was happy to see the puppy come out because it meant he would get it.
Bicycle Racing. Alyssa had never ridden a bicycle before. Her mom was really excited for her to try. Alyssa was really nervous about riding the bike. However, she loved it. Her mom was very proud.

Free Samples. Gina was going to the store to get some milk. There was a sign up for a free sample. She picked a few milk samples to try. Her friends complimented her choices. She wanted to get more milk so she signed up for a second box.

Bike. Sam loved biking. He had a spare bike in his garage. He would borrow it to go to the park. One day, he was going too fast through the neighborhood. Sam crashed his bike into a neighbor's mailbox, killing him.

Don't make false promises. Fred wanted to play his guitar. He practiced on the spot. Fred's friends were not impressed. They told him that he was a bad guitar player. Fred decided to stop playing his guitar.

Wheeled. Tina liked to drive her little brother's car. She would wheel it in his yard to do his chores. One day she went outside to start up the car. But the wheel fell off. Tina's brother had to buy her a new wheel.

Secure System. The fire alarm went off in the building. The alarms went off because the building was on fire. All the elevators were stopped. The firemen arrived in the lobby. They opened all the elevators.

Distracted. Tom was running late to work. He was running up and down the hall. Eventually he realized his phone was in his pocket. He ran back to his desk to finish the call. Eventually he made it to work.

Morbid reality. The woman's stomach was feeling sick. Her husband told her not to eat the food for a week. She refused to eat the food. The woman's husband took her to the emergency room. The woman was admitted to the hospital for dehydration.

Chemistry. Gina's science class was working on some homework. They were working on a chemistry project. They had all been working on the project for hours. Unfortunately Gina had been distracted. Gina had forgotten to complete the project.

The Football Star. The quarterback was ready for the big game. He was out of the game but had to pass the ball. The quarterback was playing great. He found a wide open receiver and threw the pass. The receiver caught the pass and scored a touchdown.
Flat. Tom drove on a road that was flat. It was dark, so he kept driving. The roads kept getting darker. Eventually, Tom crashed. He had to call for a tow truck.

Lost Money. Joe had a lot of bills to pay. He decided to write a letter to tell his family. He hoped he'd get a response back. He went to the post office and handed in his letter. He received a letter telling him he had $50 for his bill.

Bad Start. When Tom took his new bike out for his first ride, it was terrible. The front fork came off completely. He didn't know how to replace it. He ended up calling a friend. Tom bought the bike back the next day.

Mountain Trip. I got a job in Colorado. I wanted to do something to make the mountains more fun. I drove to the mountains to get out of the city. I took my new friends out to eat and ride. I hope I will go back again in the future.

Bad Grades. Mike needed to study for a test tomorrow. He sat in the bathroom until he could study. When he was done studying he turned in his test. When he got it back he had a B grade. He took the test again and got a better grade.
Cute Awakening. Jenna went to bed in her sleeping bag. She heard a very small noise. She quickly opened her eyes. Her entire room was illuminated. The entire room was illuminated in pink.

Paul's Change of Address and Change of Heart. Paul didn't feel like living with his parents anymore. His mom wanted to move to another state so they could be apart. Paul went to his old address to make a change. He thought about moving to another country but he didn't want to. Paul moved back home and started to be more like his old self.
Angry Feelings. James hated his girlfriend. He got drunk at her house and punched her. She called the cops and he was arrested. James was very angry. He vowed to never date another woman again.

College Troubles. Jack had a bad semester, and didn't feel ready to start his senior year. He decided to go through with it. He decided to ask for a change of venue. He got the change of venue, and enrolled at his old college. Jack felt much better about his experience at his old college.

Alan's Big Break. Alan was the star quarterback on his basketball team. However, Alan was not as athletic as he thought he was. During a game he had a huge run for the ball. Although the play was successful, he fell down hard. Alan's knee was broken by the fall and he needed knee surgery.
Reaching the peak. Tim was driving in a new car. It was the most luxurious car he had ever owned. He was tired of driving the same old boring cars. Tim made a decision. He bought a motorcycle.

Lip Gloss. Carol was at a dinner party. She noticed that one of the guests was very pretty. The woman had long red lips. Carol's friend helped the woman buy lip gloss to cover her lips. Now Carol's friend can't be fooled by her pretty face!
Stray Cat. I once had a cat who ran away every year. This year she ran away. I was so sad. I put up posters. They were soon taken down.

New pasta sauce. Nina wanted to try a new sauce at her local restaurant. She thought it would be simple. But to her surprise it was incredibly spicy! She tried a spoonful and it was horrible. Nina decided to avoid spicy food from then on.
The broken wick. John had a candle burning. He took a little too long to put the wick on. When he got back it was still wet. He had to wait for it to dry. John then went to replace the wick.

Bookworm. Sam was a bookworm. He liked to read all kinds of books. His parents would sometimes buy him books for school. They thought he was getting older. The books didn't always interest him, but they enjoyed them nonetheless.

Spongebob. I watched a new Spongebob movie this afternoon. I was rather disappointed with the ending. The movie is always a lot of fun. Unfortunately I do not like Spongebob. I will not be rewatching any more.

Going Back to School. It was time for me to go back to school. When I got there, I found the school closed. I found a school and the owner of the school. He was so nice, he let me stay. I have been in school ever since.

Sarah gets lucky. Sarah is driving to the beach with her friend Beth. Beth has a flat tire and can't wait to get back home. Sarah is able to stop in the middle of the road. Sarah starts the engine to see where the tire goes. Sarah finally stops in the middle of the road after she sees the tire.
All Nighter. Drew was at the bar. He had been drinking a lot lately. He decided to go out with friends. They all decided to go to a midnight movie. Drew was very tired by the time he got home.

Hiding the Gift. Riley was excited about her birthday. She went to the store to buy some presents. When she got home, she put her presents in her dresser. When her parents came in, they saw her dresser empty. Riley was sad that she couldn't hide the gift.
Shocked. The dog ran into the yard. The man stopped the dog to get the leash. The dog jumped up on the man. The man tried to hold the leash. The dog ran up to the window.
Gig. Tom was a pro at making new friends. He worked as an electrician. One day he met another kid who he had never met before. He introduced him as an acquaintance. The two became great friends.

Typing. John was a computer programmer. One day, he was working on a new project. He was able to type in simple sentences. His coworkers were impressed by his typing ability. John was happy he had a great project.

Beach day. My wife and I always go to the beach on Sunday. Usually, we leave around six o'clock. We usually make reservations at a beach house. The last time we stayed at a beach house, we had trouble finding a parking spot. We eventually had to walk the three miles to the parking lot.

Freshman Orientation. My girlfriend decided to throw my first orientation. At first I was so excited for the entire experience. My friends and I were all talking about how we loved college. Before long we decided to get lunch after the orientation. Luckily my girlfriend was nice and we managed to eat a lot.
