Pleased. Jim really wanted a new video game. He told all his friends about it. Jim's friends agreed to go play it. They all played it with him. Jim was happy they played it with him.
Bread. Kelley was baking bread. She began to mix the dough. When she mixed it, she had an accident. She mixed in the salt instead of the yeast. The bread didn't rise at all.

Electronic music. I had a lot of electronic music at my house in my room. It got too loud and I moved my headphones out of the way. I put the music in a car stereo. It was so loud that I could barely hear my friends. I had to have them move.

Saving a Life. John wanted to quit his drug addiction. He decided to get clean by starting to ride his bike. He started with a few days of riding in the woods. He quickly found that it was a lot harder than he thought. John then stopped by a clinic and got clean from his drug addiction.
Mushroom Pizza. Sandy was starving. She decided to order pizza. She picked out her favorite pizza. She realized that she only had mushrooms on it. Sandy threw the pizza in the garbage.

The Job Offer. Sally was feeling lucky today. Her mother had been out of town and she was alone with her dad. She decided to get a job and her dad came in to help. She started a cooking job and the couple started spending time together. When she was finished she decided to quit her job and go back home.

The Bike. My bike broke down. I looked all over for a new bike. I decided to ask my neighbors if they needed one. My neighbors offered me a bike for my birthday. I used my birthday gift to buy a new bike.
The Murder. Travis is a police detective. He is trying to solve a murder. Travis goes to the local park. He asks a group of teenagers to be his partners. Travis solved the murder of a boy.
Judy Know Football. Judy was a huge fan of football. She always dreamed of playing in a big game. Judy tried out for the college football team. Judy was rejected. Judy now plays kickball instead.

The Touchdown. The football team was struggling in the second half. They were trailing the score by just a few points. A touchdown pass by Jay would turn the game around. The pass came in time to save the day. Jay had a great game and led his team to victory.

Stamp Collection. Mary was very particular about her stamps. She kept a large number of them locked up in a large case. One day, she couldn't find them. She began searching online. She found her stamps in her attic.

A common scenario. Tim was trying to get a girl to date him. He always thought that he was funny. He thought he was great at the game of basketball. He thought he was great at all sports. He thought that was enough for her.
Tim buys a puppy. Tim wanted a new pet. He decided to go to the pet store. The pet store had a puppy that he wanted. Tim went in to the store and bought the puppy. Tim was happy to have a new pet.

Court of Some Peels. It was time to do some peel work on his car. He grabbed some tools and began to peel. Once he was done, his car was beautiful and shiny. It really made him feel accomplished. The car was a lot cheaper and worked even better.

The Carnival. The kids were excited to go on the kids carnival. They rode lots of rides and games. They even rode a giant balloon with lots of balloons. The end of the carnival was the big parade. They had a lot of fun that day.

Lottery. Ava was excited to go on the lottery. She thought that it would be fun. She won a million dollars! But after that, she realized she hated winning money. She regretted her decision to get the lottery ticket!

Luke. Luke was a great athlete, and played a game with his friends. He had a lot of fun and felt his team was ahead. Luke then played the game again, and lost again. He realized it wasn't fair to his team and he wasn't allowed to play. The next day Luke went home sad and unhappy.

No Perfect Dress. I went to the dance on Saturday with some friends. There was a great dress that I liked. I looked around the club. I couldn't find the dress I wanted. My friends let me borrow a dress to save my embarrassment.

Sand Castles. Eddie bought a huge house. He wanted to have a lot of room for his family. Eddie decided to build his own sandcastle. He poured all the sand he needed on the house. He started to build it but it kept collapsing!

Rainy Day. Tim wanted to surprise his girlfriend for her birthday. He took her out to the park. They sat outside talking. As they were talking Tim accidentally fell and broke his glasses. Tim broke up with his girlfriend.

Kim's Son's Glasses. Kim was sad her glasses broke. She looked for some work-arounds online. She bought a cheap pair of sunglasses and put it on. Soon Kim had no more glasses. She was so happy when they made a new pair.
Fixing the roof. I tried to fix the roof on my house. I got a ladder to get down. I started fixing the roof. I could not reach the roof with the ladder. I had to call a plumber.
Shoes. I saw a pair of shoes online for $100. I ordered them. They shipped and I waited for them to arrive. I realized they had a bad delivery. I had to return them and get a refund.

The Boy's Dog. When Jim's dad was in the military he always had a pet dog. His dog was very large and was always in the yard playing. When Jim's dad returned from his service he lost his dog. Jim begged his dad to take him to a pet store. But Jim's dad was very sad when he saw his dog at a shelter.

Burning Down. The man lit his cigarette and lit it on fire. He went out to smoke it, but it spread all over the yard. A few hours later, the whole yard was consumed by flames. Luckily, he managed to get out before they all died. He bought a big fire extinguisher for the future.
Ticket Hogger. Gina loved going to the carnival. She would buy the best items. She would pay cash to get them. She would win prizes often. Gina spent most of her days there.

Pokemon Hunting. Jake was trying to go Pokemon hunting. He got his backpack full of items. He was ready to go on his first hunt. Jake had a wonderful time at his first hunt. He would go on more Pokemon hunting trips.

Poor Clark. Clark hated going to the dentist. He had never been good at brushing his teeth. He couldn't figure out why his teeth were so loose. One day he came to the dentist and learned that he had cavities! Clark hated the dentist.
Wet Phone. My phone would not turn on. I looked all over for it. I couldn't find it. I finally found it in my desk drawer. Now my phone works perfectly.

Picky Much?. It had just recently been released, and I was anxiously awaiting it. I decided to watch a few previews, hoping to get a good first impression. I was excited to hear how good the movie was going to be. To my surprise, the reviews were very positive. I decided I was ready for the movie to come out.

Street Racing. Billy was on his way home from the mall. He saw a fast car speeding towards him. The car was going too fast. He tried to swerve away but was too late. The car hit him in the chest and he died instantly.

Tooth Fairy. Alicia was walking down the street with her dog. She spotted a girl who asked for a toothbrush. Alicia gave the girl one and she took it. She then decided to give the toothbrush to a girl next door. They had a lot of fun that day.

beans. Mary wanted to make herself a tasty breakfast. She got out her crockpot and put in some ingredients. She began cooking up some eggs. She added some cheese, fruit and a side of cereal. Mary felt so good that her body felt great.

Odd habit. Gina's sister wanted to watch her sister in her sleep. But Gina told her that she had to sleep first. She woke up at 6:00 and saw her sister's face, but not in sleep. She walked to the television room and looked for the TV remote. But she didn't find it.

Grades. I was a freshman in high school. I took two classes for writing. The teacher asked us to write a story. I tried to write my story, but it was terrible. My friend suggested that I get better grades.

Walker Gets Organized. Walker had an important job interview in a few days. He had an extra shift at his job. He called in sick to work on Thursday and stayed home. Walker practiced his interview skills on Thursday as much as he could. Walker was so ready for the interview that he did well.

Science Project. John loved working with animals. He decided to build a robot to work with. John had an idea and had all of the parts at home. John went to the electronics store to buy all of his electronics. John spent three whole weeks working on his robot.

The Surprise Party. Kate and her friends went to a party with a new girl. It turned out that the girl was actually her old friend, Mary. When they arrived at the party they all saw Mary's boyfriend! Kate and her friends didn't know they had been told. After being told that Mary's boyfriend was their new friend, they all ran away.

Too much work. Tim hated his job. His boss always made him do a lot of work. One day Tim decided he would just quit. He felt so much better afterwards. Tim was never asked to do so much work ever again.

Hula Hoops. My cousin asked me to play a game of Hula Hoops with him. We all gathered around a hoop in the yard and started to jump. As we jumped, we bounced the ball over each other. We bounced the ball so high that we landed in a tree. I ended up having a great time playing with my cousin.

the Freeloader. Jane had a very bad debt problem. She knew she had no way of paying it. One day she decided to go shopping. There, she found a pair of sneakers she liked. She was able to pay off her debt.
The world. Bill wanted to be a famous actor. He decided to open a theme park. He called it The World. After many years, he had enough money for it. He got the license and opened it.

Bad Reception. Sam and Jay were playing basketball. Both guys were very good at it. Sam hit the ball and it went in. His mom called for the refs to check it. The refs waved the game over and it went in.

Eli. Eli worked hard as a construction worker. He was always in a good mood. One day he was out on his morning walk. A car slammed into Eli's back. He passed out and was taken to the hospital by a passing truck.
Running on Fumes. I wanted to play basketball. I went down to the street. The street was too hot. I could not sweat. I ran on fumes for most of the game.

kittens. Amy's parents took her to get her nails done. When she got home, she put on the nail polish. She was excited for her nails to come out. However, her mom brought her kitten and scratched her hand. Amy cried as she cried, unable to get her kittens.
the graveyard. Javier was digging up the cemetery. He heard someone scream. Javier didn't know what they were yelling at. He quickly ran away. Javier never found out who yelled at him.

The Bagel. I used to make the bagel at home. I would heat the bagel in the toaster for a few minutes. Then, I would mix the bagel with some cream cheese. I'd then enjoy my breakfast. I was a bit OCD about my bagel making.

Pancakes with Grandma. The girls were tired but had nothing better to do. Their grandma was cooking pancakes and the girls got excited. They had a good time chatting about the weather and their grandpa. Their grandma got them all excited and they ate their pancakes. They couldn't wait until next time to go back!
Overtime. The football team was down by 3 points. They had been down all day. In overtime, the team got a huge touchdown. The coach cheered. They scored 20 points in extra time and won the game.

The Scary Car. John was driving his friend's car home from a party. The car's engine started smoking and John pulled over to check. His friend's car was badly damaged and John called an ambulance. John put on his friend's car as quickly as he could. John's friend was thankful that John was so quick to help him.

Rainy Vacation. Kate's parents invited her to the beach for a vacation. They told her they would take her if she brought a towel. Kate had never brought a towel and didn't know what to do. She did her best, but it was still raining. Kate's parents grounded her for a month.

The Cookie Exchange. Jane and Joe had been shopping for gifts for a long time. They decided to throw a cookie exchange. They went to the store to purchase their favorite cookie. When they got home they baked cookies and sent them to each other. After the exchange they enjoyed each others gifts more.

Cereal. I went to a small diner to get my daily staple, a bowl of cereal. It took two minutes to get my cereal from the refrigerator. When I walked in, I saw that they served breakfast burritos. As I ate the breakfast burrito, I wished I could eat breakfast burritos every day. This was my least favorite breakfast food experience.

Scuba diving. I went scuba diving last week. First I had to buy some equipment. Then I was put in the boat. After a few hours of diving, I had a great time. I hope I can go back to scuba diving some time soon.

The Dry Milk. Tina wanted to make a healthy breakfast. She went to the store for some fruit and vegetables. When she got home, she realized that there was no milk left. She went to the store to get some milk. She bought the milk and drank it to help her break her fast.

Vladimir Plays Pool. Vladimir had always wanted to play pool but was afraid he would hurt his knees. Finally his friends convinced him to give it a try. The first game they played went well. Vladimir and his friends had a lot of fun. They both agreed that pool was a great hobby.
Playing graveyard. Sam and his friends wanted to play graveyard. They walked around the neighborhood. They played some games. They all finished up at the graveyard. They had a good time.

Accident at Home. My roommate's daughter is not very nice. She was playing on the floor, and I accidentally dropped her in a puddle. She went to cry, but I pretended to help her. I poured water over her and helped her back into the house. I was happy that she was okay, and that she was in my house.
Justin breaks down. Justin is driving home from school. He sees smoke coming from his car. His car is on fire. Justin pulls over and calls for help. He is relieved to see his friends safe.

Cathy's Garden. Cathy has always been a gardener. When she became pregnant, she couldn't afford a garden. Cathy's husband offered to plant a garden for her. She accepted and he planted her garden. She was happy with her garden and helped her husband plant more.

Favorite Letter. Lily received a letter one day from a new teacher. The letter asked her if she can help with the class project. Lily worked on the project hard for many days. She was surprised to see a thank you note on the teacher's desk. Lily thought it was an amazing letter.

Head Stuck. Tom was trying to get to the restroom. He ran into the wall and his head stuck. Tom tried to push the head out but it kept getting stuck. Eventually he had to cut his head off. Tom had to wear a scarf for a while after that.
Lost CD. Tim was out with friends. He found a lost cd. Tim was very bummed. He called his friends. They found it and got it back.

cringey LDR. Tom didn't know anyone who dated Chinese girls. He thought they sounded like Chinese guys, just boring and gross. However, one day a girl invited him out on a date. She was nice and cute. Tom didn't feel weird about the whole thing.

Losing Faith. Tina's dog was very mischievous. She tried to get him to calm down, but he was always a whiner. One day she tried to calm him down in the car. When she gave him his favorite food, he refused it. After several days of no food, the dog calmed down.

Woods. Bob went on a hike in the woods. As he was hiking, he stumbled across a log. Bob fell to the ground, hurting his arm. He told his friend to call 911. Bob and his friend decided to keep hiking after that.

Alex's Sickness. Alex had a sore throat for the last few days. He decided to stay home from school and take a cold pill. After he took his pill, he felt much better. His dad took him to the doctor where he was diagnosed with strep throat. Alex went to school the next day without his throat hurting.

Don't Do It. Dan was at a party with his friends. His girlfriend kept talking about her new cat. Dan wanted to be cool, so he decided to sneak a peek. He caught her looking at the cat and she slapped him. Dan got the girl's attention by playing with the cat.

Ken's First Day. Ken had been going to school for many Year's. He had learned to write and was very happy to be starting school. As he arrived at school, he decided to make friends. He met a pretty girl there named Jane, and she introduced him to others. Ken and Jane became good friends, and he learned to write songs and sing.

Not crazy. When i first met my friend she was a mess. She started acting strange one day. I thought it was the flu but she kept being out and about. She also started using drugs. My friend ended up going to rehab.

Protest. Sue was attending a protest. At one point, she decided to go outside and stand up. The police came, and yelled at her. They threw her in jail and put her on a bus. She was never able to go back to the protest.
Fate. Bobby and his friends went to the lake. They got onto a dock to go fishing. After a while they started a fight. Bobby and his friends started fighting too. Everyone was very sad.

Tom and the Turtles. Tom loved to go fishing in the ocean. Tom decided to bring a turtle home for his pet. One day Tom went fishing with the turtle. The turtle got stuck in the wire. Tom was very sad when the turtle died.

The Lasagna. Kara's mom told her they had a big pot of lasagna for dinner. Kara was very hungry. She took a large spoonful and began to devour it. Her mom told her it was too much. Kara had to be quiet since she was so full.

Nurse Talitha. Talitha loved being a nurse. Her favorite part was waiting on patients. She loved being able to help them. She also loved seeing the changes in them. Talitha couldn't wait to help her new patients grow in the future.
Lost and resentful. John was driving down the street. All of a sudden he heard a loud crash. He decided to stop. He found out it was his girlfriend. John broke up with his girlfriend.

Swimming team. Sue wanted to play on her school swim team. She practiced everyday after school. She was hoping to make the team. Unfortunately she did not make the team. She was sad but determined to try again next year.

Campaign. Jim was running for his school's student body president. He went door to door asking for money to pay the campaign expenses. Jim worked hard to convince people to donate money. On the day of the election, Jim's opponent got the highest number of votes. Jim ended up losing the student body president race.
Final Match. Dan was a basketball player. Dan was losing the final match of a game. Dan was in trouble. Dan tried to commit suicide. Dan committed suicide on the bench instead.
Painting. I took out my painting and put it on the shelf. My wife decided to show it to my children. She painted a picture. She wanted the kids to get it. They loved the picture.

Lindsey's first drive. Lindsey was a teenager, and her first drive was to the store. She had no idea how to drive a car. She asked her dad for help. His dad taught her to drive, and she was very confident. Lindsey was excited to go grocery shopping!
Karen makes a sandwich. Karen is hungry. She decides to make a sandwich. She makes a ham sandwich. She eats the ham sandwich. She is satisfied with her food.

Ron Buys A Phone. Ron was on a phone call and missed his wife's text. He called her to ask if they were okay. Ron's wife told him that they were together again. Ron was saddened and told his wife that he loved her. The two fell in love and have been happily married ever since.

Moving. I had to move my things. When I was done I unpacked everything. The move was a lot of work but it was worth it. When it was all done I was able to put everything in storage. Now I don't have to move all my things around anymore.
Key. Lucy was going to the store. She realized she had no key to her car. Lucy remembered how her dad had given her the car keys. Lucy used them to unlock the car. She then drove away.

Ten Year Reunion. Joe retired from the Army. He was invited to a retirement party at his former company. Joe did not invite his wife and kids. Joe's wife and kids were there to see him. Joe was happy with his reunion with his family.

Cleaned Out. Tim had gotten into a car accident. He was in a lot of pain and he needed a taxi. Tim called his old friend for a ride. The friend came and picked Tim up. Tim wound up sleeping the night off at his friend's house.

Summer dreams destroyed. Kerry was out in the backyard on her own. Suddenly, she heard a loud noise. She looked up to see that her grass had been cut down. She went outside to discover that she lost her job. She was happy when she found a new job in town.

Inconsiderate Neighbor. John and Maria lived next door to one another. One day, a cat ran across the street, and jumped on John's car window. He didn't get out of the car to check on it. In addition, Maria left a small piece of food on the cat's window. Maria eventually learned to watch where she stepped.
Hide and Go. Lilly's house was a disaster. It was full of cats. She called animal control. They were able to locate the owner. Lilly had a new, well-appointed cat.

Overwhelmed by technology. I used to love the idea of technology. When I was in high school, I could not believe how advanced it was. I was on my way to a college and they told me the Internet was down. It took two hours to get it back up. I was so disappointed in the world.

Crazy Neighbors. Our neighbors had a crazy cat. I tried to be calm but she would chase me around the house. I told my parents that I wanted to be normal. They told me to get a job and move out. I became a successful lawyer and now live with my cat.

Back Pain. I was playing volleyball with a lot of energy. I tried to break a dunk with one hand but landed with my back. After a while, my back hurt too much to play. I had to sit out the rest of the season. I was embarrassed to have my back pain so much.

True Challenge. I took up running last month. I've run a few races so far. I haven't made any real progress though. I decided to train harder. I'm getting really close to running a race and will be proud.

Linda loses. Linda was excited about her first day at the office. She walked through the lobby and saw the large conference rooms. She was nervous since she hadn't worked in a conference room before. Once inside, she was met with excitement and joy. She was glad to have found this exciting job.

Stranded Island. Tom was at the beach with friends. They were all having a great time when a wave hit. They were thrown into the water and couldn't get out. Eventually they made it to shore. They were relieved to be alive.

Social Media. My daughter works for the media department in our office. I was going through her Facebook page and saw a lot of pictures. The photos were of her taking a walk in the woods. She told me she was hiking with friends. I thanked her for the photos.

Nick and the Doll. Nick was a child model in a modeling agency. He was invited to come into their dressing room and see the doll. He had his parents help him into the doll's body. As Nick looked at it, the doll's face was broken in half. He had to use a crutch to get into the doll, and the crutch was a dead girl.
Drinking. The kids were having a sleepover. It was their first sleepover. Their mom poured wine for them. The kids had a lot of fun drinking the wine. They spent the night at their mom's house.

Old Bed. John was looking for a new bed for his bedroom. He was looking at many online ads. One ad he found was from his old college roommate. The roommate was going to sell her bed. John found the old bed on Craigslist for $20.

Slump. Timothy was in a slump. He was really enjoying his summer vacation. It was a relaxing vacation but his days were boring. He was forced to stay home to watch movies. He became extremely bored and his mood soured.

Fun pizza party. My friends and I went to a pizza party. I had a glass of red wine and my friend had a glass of orange juice. We ordered two pizzas, my friend had a bacon cheeseburger and I had a green pepper pizza. After we ate, we danced and played cards. We had a good time and ordered another pizza.

Celebrity Look-alike. Timmy is a big fan of famous celebrities. He wanted to be a celebrity looking just like them. Timmy decided to buy a hairpiece and fake nails. When he went to the mall, he found a perfect pair of fake nails. Timmy was happy he could now be as famous looking as the celebrities.

Gun. Sandy's best friend gave her a shiny gun. She asked Sandy if she wanted to play with it. Sandy had to decide if she would play with it or not. She was tempted to shoot it but then decided against it. She still wanted to play with it though.

Snake in the Yard. A snake came out of the garage. Gina was terrified that she was going to be bitten. But then the snake moved slowly away. Gina felt a sharp pain and looked down. She was holding a dead snake!

Math Tutor. Bella and Bill took a math class together in middle school. One day, Bill suggested that Bella take a math tutoring class. The tutoring was to be a one week internship. Bella accepted the offer. She was happy that she could work with a tutor instead of alone.

Prom Night. Rita was so nervous for prom. She didn't want to disappoint her crush. On prom night, she was so nervous, she couldn't sleep. At midnight, she woke up with her heart pounding. When Rita got home she finally relaxed and could sleep.
Iron. I was ironing one day. I dropped my iron on the ground. My shirt became completely black! I was so embarrassed I ran away. Now I iron my shirt a little.

Goodbye Love. Sam's wife decided to leave him for another man. He did not know this was coming. Sam was upset and felt cheated out of his marriage. He found himself thinking of the girl he loved. Eventually he went on to have a long, successful life.

No Money No Honey. Tommy was bored one evening. He wanted some music to listen to. He went to the stereo in his room. He tried to put on music but he couldn't hear anything. He threw his headphones in the air and sat in frustration.
Erin and the TV. Erin was watching TV. He saw that the news was on the screen. He jumped for joy. It was a report about a new product. Erin started using his new product.

Old Stove. There is an old stove that is located in the front yard. It is not very efficient and is not used much. I had to clean out the garage and remove the old stove. My son bought the stove off of craigslist. Now we use our old stove.

Book of Mormon. Jodi's friends would read her a story every night after school. She would get so absorbed in the story that she wouldn't notice. One day, a book publisher sent her an advance on a new book. Jodi decided to buy the new book to be able to read it. She was so excited to read the new book, she read over 50 pages in one night!

The College. Kia and her classmates went to a college. She thought it was a strange place. Then she saw it was called a college. Kia realized she had never heard of the school! She was so excited to go!

baby. One day, I took a trip to the beach with my wife. We were excited to take the long drive to a place that was far away. While we were driving, we heard a loud crash. My wife said she heard a person crying in the middle of the road. My son, who was in his car seat, didn't cry, but he looked so sad!
Glare. The sun was shining brightly. The car was in direct sunlight. The driver sat down. He could not see the road. He rolled down the window.

Where is my refund?. Tom had bought a game on the computer. It was supposed to be delivered to his door but never did. Tom went to his local store to return it. The store said that it could not be returned. They charged him a $60 fee to return it.
dead dog. Trevor's dog died recently. He had to call a lawyer to get help. The dog had to be put down. He decided to have his dog cremated. The ashes were put in the backyard.

Seriously, They're Everywhere. Diana got home from work one day. She didn't see her shoes anywhere! She went on her front porch and her shoes were on the ground. She realized they were inside her house. The entire yard was covered in shoes.
Samuel's sandwich. Samuel is starving. He decides he needs a sandwich. He heads to the kitchen to get one. He gets a ham and cheese sandwich. Samuel eats his sandwich.

A miscommunication. Gina's and her brother were in a large group. They were getting ready for a party later in the day. Gina was trying to finish her homework but felt lost. She looked around but didn't see anyone else nearby. Finally she realized her brother was the only one who was finished.

Infection. It was an open field outside Sam's house. Sam was walking with his family one day. Sam stepped on a small rock. He was immediately sick to his stomach. Sam had to go to the hospital to get it treated.

Picking just one. Sam and his friends decided to get ice cream. They were excited about getting one scoop. They made their choice and then picked out a cone. Sam went first and got two scoops. His friend got one and then went home.

maracas. Sandy was going to her first dance recital in ten years. She didn't know any of the steps so she was really nervous. At first she couldn't make it all. Then, she began to get it. Sandy was so glad she made it to the recital.

Jam or jelly. My dog ran over to the kitchen to look for food. He found some kibble and looked for some jelly. Then he found some jam and looked for jelly. I tried a jelly sandwich with his food. My dog liked the sandwich.

The Manual. The kids were supposed to start the new year's paper in the morning. But they were both exhausted by the time the paper came out. They each wrote a short paragraph about their day. They turned it in the next morning. The teacher told them it would be fine if they stayed up later.

Forgetful Sam. Sam needed to buy a movie but didn't have enough money. So he went to the store and saw that there were a lot of good ones. But after looking at them for a while he still couldn't decide. He decided to leave them to the professionals. And after he bought them he realized they were great.

Cold Soup. I have been making cold soup for a week. This is my favorite soup. However, my neighbors are not happy about the soup. Today they made my soup with a different kind of broth. My soup did not taste good any longer.

Wednesdays. Ava's boyfriend broke up with her last week. She was heartbroken. Today she made up for lost time by going to her favorite diner. There, she met a new friend named John and had some great food. She got over her heartbreak.
Hiking Trip. Sally decided to go hiking. Sally loaded up her backpack with supplies. She drove to the trail head. She hiked for three hours. Sally hiked all day and returned home.

Every time. Sara came home from school. She had a ton of homework to do. It would be 2 hours before she finished the assignments. When Sara walked into the house she immediately jumped into her homework. The next day Sara had to pull out her books.

Salty. Karen worked hard on her hair for months. She was sure she would never get it flat again. But she took good care of it all through high school. After her graduation, she started working as a salon assistant. Her work helped her get her hair completely flat for college!

Over-reacting. It was Christmas and Tommy was excited about it. He spent hours looking at all the presents his family got. He was not sure what he wanted. He waited until the last minute. He finally decided to just take a look around and be happy.

Ironing Clothes. Amy was ironing her clothes. Amy was about to finish the ironing. Amy tried to move her chair backwards. Amy accidentally hit her head on the floor. Amy fell on the floor and broke her glasses.

Lizzie's Locks. Lizzie loved to go to the park with her friends. The park had a lot of trees that were very old. Lizzie liked to climb up the branches to see her friends. She climbed a bunch of the trees and then fell to the ground. Her friend's didn't really like the fell tree Lizzie's lock.

Jacob's Lawn. Jacob was having trouble with his grass. He decided to buy a weed wacker. He got some out and put it on the lawn. The weed wacker worked really well. Now Jacob's grass was looking great.

Banana Split. Lucy and Jane were friends. Jane ate all her lunch and left Lucy to eat alone. Jane took Lucy to the local park and offered her a banana split. Lucy said yes. Jane felt so good about the food she decided to eat at least two more times.

Speech. My speech was the worst speech I have ever given. I tried to give the speech for years. I tried to teach people to use the word "nigger" in public. I was told it was wrong. I was very disappointed.

Snacker. Evan was eating his favorite snack in the cafeteria. While he was enjoying the snack, his brother ran in the cafeteria. Evan couldn't stand being away from his snack. He ended up sitting on the bench next to the snack. The boy didn't seem to notice and kept eating it.

Sushi. My favorite dish was sushi. I could eat it everyday. One day I got sick and couldn't eat it for a week. I couldn't wait for the day I could eat sushi again. The day I could eat sushi again I was happy.
Last Work Sandwich. Tom was sick of sandwiches. He was always hungry. Tom went to the supermarket. He bought a sandwich that cost him $2. Tom ate it all up.

Clark Watches Birds. Clark loves birds. He has always had a fascination with them since he was a child. Clark's parents always took him to the local zoo. Clark always loved to watch the birds as they fluttered and soared. Clark never knew what his parents were doing when they were gone.
Egg. I got an egg on my way home from work. It fell from a window. It fell on the ground. I went to retrieve it. The egg was alive.

Not Realizing. He was waiting for the bell to ring. He saw the ball going into the basket. When he turned around, he realized it was empty. He began to cry. The coach sent him to the line for a full minute.
Best in Class. Gina had a test in biology in which she was the best. She was also very scared. Her mom thought she would not do well. But Gina did very well. Gina was proud of herself.

Trip to Australia. I went on vacation to Australia. I flew out and drove for four days. I went to the beach, and walked around for four days. I had a lot of fun. I will go back to Australia again soon.
Our New Kayaks. We ordered new kayaks. They arrived in the mail in two days. I got on the boat with one. It started to rain very hard at first. After a little while the kayak started to float.
The actor. Gina was at her aunt's house. Her aunt had a new actress in town. She asked Gina to meet her. Gina walked into the room and found a weird looking man. She realized she had been set up.

Kiera. Kiera was a very nice lady. She was nice and sweet even though she was a lady. Her brother said that she liked girls but wasn't a lady. When they had the same grades, she tried to be more like her brother. She ended up being the class rep for the girls and made them jealous.
parking ticket. Timmy went to the park today. He found a parking spot. The person in the spot paid for the spot. Timmy didn't have any money for his ticket. He ended up parking in the street.
Ruts. My wife bought me a new car in September. When I got home, I noticed a bad rattle sound under the hood. I called the auto repair shop. I went back to the car shop. They replaced the rattle.

The Pizza. The couple ordered a large pizza. They told the delivery man that they didn't want to pay for it. The delivery man was very angry and kicked the woman out of the house. They decided to eat off of their own plates. It wasn't much fun, but they were able to save a few bucks.

New calculator. Sam needed a new calculator. He went to his local office store. They had all the same calculators. Sam had to decide between the two. He decided to go with the calculator from the store.

Giant Squid. Derek saw a giant squid swimming near the water. He screamed and threw rocks at it. The squid swam away, but Derek was angry. He wanted to have it chase him. That was his idea of a good prank.
Gorilla. The gorilla appeared at the zoo. A zookeeper tried to pick him up. The gorilla pushed away the zookeeper. The zookeeper had to run. The zookeeper went back to the gate.

Sid is the life of the party. Sid is one of the funniest and most entertaining characters in the room. Everyone loves Sid because he brings laughter to the room. Everyone has a secret fear of Sid because he always bring fun. People get so angry because Sid always bring fun. Everyone hates Sid but it is worth it because he bring fun.

Skateboarding. I wanted to learn to skateboard. I decided to go and purchase a skateboard from the local store. I went home and built a board out of cardboard. After a while I started getting a lot of bumps and bruises. I stopped going to the store and just learned to skate myself.

President. Jeb got the highest grade in his class at his Junior prom. He did a great job that year and was very proud. Jeb invited all of his friends to the prom that same year. They all got a great time with him that same year. Jeb won a place on his school's hall of fame.
Wild Jump. Joe was in a gym one day. He tried to jump from a high platform. He missed the platform by a few feet. Joe got very hurt. Joe was never able to jump again.
Mike is stuck. Mike was watching tv. He decided to take a break. While he was away, he was followed by a car. The car had a man in it. The man asked Mike for a ride.

Sneaking In. Jenny was trying to sneak into the building. She wanted to steal some snacks. She ran past several security guards. When she got close, she was stopped by the front desk. The cops let her leave without being caught.
Virginia Beach. My boyfriend drove us to Virginia Beach for the first time. We stayed at a hotel. I ate my breakfast in a restaurant. It was delicious! I took him out with me later that day.

Learning how to cook. Tina decided to try to cook her mom's famous pasta. She bought all the ingredients and began cooking. The food began to simmer as she added the vegetables. As she went to flip the vegetables, she dropped a fork. The fork had broken in half.

Promotion. Tom was a senior and needed a promotion. His boss was concerned about his work ethic. Tom started to quit more and more. One day Tom got a great proposal. His boss promoted him to the next level and he accepted!
Stephen gets bullied. Stephen is at school. A boy comes up to him. The boy punches Stephen in the face. Stephen gets scared and runs. Stephen gets home after the boy leaves.

Sports. Jill enjoyed playing sports with her friends. One day, they decided to go swimming. Jill forgot to bring sunscreen. The water was too hot and her friends were all sunburned. They vowed to remember to bring sunscreen from then on.
Keeping Score. A man was playing a baseball game. The score was tied. The man took his time to score. The team was down by one run. The man hit a homerun to take the lead back.

Cat. The little cat ran to his favorite litter box and jumped in. When he tried to jump in the box he tripped over the bar. He fell on the floor and was shaking with fear. He jumped out of the box and went to his mom. His mom helped him up and he is ok now.
Shuttle. One day the couple wanted to take a vacation. They decided to try a shuttle service. They got a shuttle ticket. They set off for the airport. It took them about 2 hours to get there.

Mutual Attraction. Nathan thought that he was going to find a girlfriend. He decided to ask out his crush, Jill, on a date. Nathan met Jill at the bar. She was very nice to Nathan and they had a great time. They decided to date for a few more dates.

Jimmy Drops History Class. Jimmy is an aspiring historian. He has been studying the civil war. He had to drop history class. He asked his teacher to help. His teacher told him he could do that after class.

Chipped tooth. Today I found out I had a chipped tooth. I was so upset. I went to the dentist to get it fixed. The dentist told me it was a small chip. The dentist said he could give me some pills to help me feel better.

Games. I took my brother to play video games. We went to an arcade. I got my brother an  arcades controller. He was able to play a lot of games with me. I gave him a good game because I thought it was good.

Digging. It was my first day of summer camp. My friend's dad took me to dig. I tried to get as much dirt out of my socks as possible. I got stuck and my friend helped me out. I went back to digging with my friends that day.
The Cheating. Jake had his first date. He met her at a party. He thought she was cute. Then she saw his phone in her purse. Jake realized he had been with her for awhile.

Sandbox. Lois was excited to start a sandbox. She put all of her dirty toys in it. Then she added some food to make a sandbox garden. She spent the whole day making her sandbox. She enjoyed making her sandbox even more.

The ice cream truck. The ice cream truck was rolling down the street. All of a sudden a big bump occurred. There was a huge piece of ice on the ground. The ice truck drove away. Tom was happy the ice was gone.
Jane Opens a Candy Shop. Jane is very excited to have a business start. She takes out a loan. She buys equipment. Jane opens her first candy shop. It is a huge success.

The Bar. Kia had always wanted to try bar food. She thought it sounded delicious, but her friends didn't. So she ordered a burger and fries to see if she liked them. To her delight, the fries were so good that she asked for more! She ended up eating a burger, fries, and a drink all in one night!

Lonely elders. Jenny was in her mid 20s and was very lonely. She went to her friend's house to talk to a few people. All of the elderly people there seemed very bored and distant. Jenny felt terrible, as her friend had just told her that they'd moved away. She didn't want to have to leave her friends to find a new one.
Taxi Fight. John was waiting for a taxi in his neighborhood. A guy came up to him. They began to yell and swear. Eventually, the guy got very angry and punched John. John got up and ran.
New Job. Tim wanted to get a new job. He went to several interviews. One interview did not go well. He did not get the job. Tim learned his lesson.

Alone away from home. When it was time for her birthday, her grandma surprised her. Grandma got her a brand new puppy! He was small, brown and very cute. Gina decided she liked the puppy and wanted one herself. Gina had a great birthday party that night.
Figure Skating. I went to the skating rink to take a warm up. I thought I could do well. However, I was terrible. I fell many times. I realized I needed to work on my technique.

Haircut. Jack's mom told him he couldn't cut his own hair. Jack was determined to grow a new beard. Jack decided to shave his face. The shaved face looked very silly! Jack's mom grounded Jack for a week.

Obvious but Truthful. A man was asked to come clean about his identity. He said that he was from Mexico. The interviewer went on to ask more questions. The man was forced to give more information. The man was fired.
Limitless Embarrassment. Tim went for a run. He heard some people shouting behind him. Tim did not look back. A car drove next to him. The driver laughed at Tim for laughing.
Food Challenge. Tommy was a champion wrestler. He challenged Timmy to a food challenge. Tommy agreed. Timmy made his own pizza. Tommy was happy with his first taste.

Mountains. The girls loved mountains. They walked them every day. One day they decided to walk the tallest peak in Colorado. They walked all the way to the top and were exhausted. It was amazing to them how much they loved mountains.
Unknown Fees. Tom was doing business online. He was charging too much. Tom complained. The seller gave Tom some refunds. Tom was happy with the exchange.

Bird. Ava bought a bird feeder. She hung it in a tree near her house. One day she noticed a bunch of little yellow and brown birds. She put in bird seedlings to attract them. Soon Ava had more birds than she could possibly count.

Candles. We were watching TV when it started to rain. We quickly rushed outside to put candles out. Then we were forced to wait and see what would happen. We were very disappointed to see the trees and cars had completely stopped. It was a beautiful sunny day.

Figure Skating. The skaters were waiting for the judges to announce the top ten. They had been practicing their tricks all week long. The judges announced the first place finisher. They were all very impressed. They decided to enter the next year's competition.

Restaurant. Lucy and her mom were at the diner. They were hungry but Lucy didn't know what to get. Lucy's mom suggested a sandwich. Lucy couldn't decide which sandwich she wanted so she asked for advice. Lucy's mom recommended the turkey sandwich.

Last Minute Decision. Tom was trying to decide which store to go to. He went to the grocery store and the store had a sale on cheese. Tom ended up buying a lot of cheese and buying some products for it. Tom realized the cheese wasn't that great but he bought it anyway. Tom felt bad about it later on.

The Quota. Ethan has worked for his company for 2 months. He has only worked during the holidays and weekends. Ethan decided to go on a vacation. His manager noticed he had been gone. He sent him to his desk and said he was being fired.

Arrested. Derek ran up to his friend and told him to stop texting. His friend got mad and pulled out his phone. He pulled up the pictures of Derek with another guy. Derek ran to his friend and told him it was a mistake. His friend punched him and Derek was arrested.

Pixy. In 2012 I bought a box of Pixy Stix. I thought the pictures looked horrible. I tried to open them with a small rock. I had to read and watch tutorials online. Eventually I was able to open the Pixy Stix with a small rock.

Presentation. I had to give a presentation to the entire school. I needed to use a lot of PowerPoint. I had to do my presentation in an hour. My wife helped me with the presentation. It was very difficult and took a lot of time.

Adoption. Sam's mom wanted to get him a kitten for his birthday. She went through all of Sam's toys and put them in a box. She also put Sam's favorite stuffed animal, a kitten, in the box. Sam picked up the kitten and gave it a bath and fed it. When Sam's mom got home, she smiled and thanked Sam for doing such a good thing.

Sign Language. Sue was learning sign language. She was going to her first sign language class. Sue was nervous about the class. In the beginning she wasn't paying attention. Luckily she made a lot of new friends with her class.
Going Fishing. Tom went fishing one day. He had never been fishing before. His fish went on a fishing trip. Tom caught a large bluegill. He had never caught a bluegill.

Parking Spot. Kate was walking to the park from home. She saw a park with no parking spots. Kate decided to park in the nearby park. She walked to the park and waited for a spot. She found a spot and felt better.

Burned cookies. I went to the store to buy cookies. I went to the snack aisle and picked out some peanut butter. When I was about to pay, a customer asked for the cookies. They told me that the cookies were already burnt. I had to pay the customer and had to wait 20 minutes before I could get them.
Risk. The gambler placed a big bet. The bet was very risky. The game was tied with a minute left. The gambler took a deep breath. He felt good after his big win.

Front step trout. I was at the park fishing with friends. We were fishing from a truck. It was raining so we had to go back. My dad brought us to a spot at the edge of a pond. I had never seen a trout in real life so I was very happy.

Hillary is determined. Hillary is a teacher at a high school. Her students have been talking about her every day. This makes Hillary very anxious about what will happen to her. Hillary decides to take a summer vacation. She now has the time and energy to focus on teaching.

Purse envy. When my mom was pregnant, she had a lot of money. She would always tell me how lucky I was. When she found out I was having a son, she was very proud. She gave him lots of gifts. My son ended up being a very lucky kid.
The Catch. Mark was playing baseball. He was trying to hit the ball really far. He kept missing. He kept throwing more and more strikes. Mark scored a run and the team won the game.

teacher affair. Susie was a popular teacher. She had lots of boyfriends. One day her boyfriend Tim met her at lunch. Tim asked Susie to marry him and it made her upset. Susie decided to end her affair with Tim.

Cowboy Doll. Gina's crush had a cowboy doll. It looked like the kind she played with. He had big hair and blue eyes. He could throw a punch like a real one. Gina asked him to sit on the bed and they would be best friends.
Fish. My mother cooked fish for dinner last night. I made some for her for dinner. I used canned cod. My fish turned out to be delicious. We are both looking forward to our next visit.
Wet Ending. Timothy was playing basketball. Timothy dropped the ball. It landed in a puddle. Timothy and his friends ran out to retrieve the ball. The ball ended up stuck in the puddle.
Gravy. Sam decided to make gravy one day. He added some milk to his stockpot. Sam waited for it to cook. When the gravy was ready he tasted it. It was delicious!

Baby. Tom was a lonely and very shy child. He never had anyone to play with or to play with with in the yard. Tom decided that one day he would start playing with his new friend. Tom's parents came home one day to find him alone playing with the dog. His parents called animal control and Tom was put down.

The Eyesore. Joe was a good man. But one night, he forgot to clean up his trash. As a result, the whole neighborhood became aware of Joe. Joe became a target for the police. And Joe had to start paying more attention to his surroundings.

The Thief. Tom was shopping. He was walking along a mall. He saw a man in a trench coat stealing stuff. Tom grabbed his wallet and ran out of the store. He called the police and they were able to catch him.

Walking to school. Today I went for my morning walk to school. It was not particularly pleasant. As I walked to school the sun was shining hard. I fell a few times as I was walking. I was able to get home safely, though.

Jumping. Tim was having a hard time concentrating at school. He decided to do jumping jacks in his spare time. After a few days, Tim got really good at them. He did this until he could jump all day. Tim is now able to concentrate very well at school.

The Shopping Cart. Tommy's mother told him to put his shopping cart away. But when he got home, he found his cart. It was full of all kinds of things. Tommy's mother realized she left it in his room. Tommy was grounded for a week.
New iPad winning. Kelly loved playing games on her iPad. Her favorite game was Pokemon Go. She had been playing all day. When Kelly got home she opened her game. She won it in a landslide!
The Pizza. Maddy was eating pizza. She was making the crust. Then she forgot about the toppings. She got distracted by her phone. Maddy threw up the pizza.

Sparklers. Lars was playing in the garage. He threw a sparkler down the drain. The sparklers landed on a hot stove. The stove caught on fire and Lars had to put out the fire. He called the fire department and they brought him some water.

Classic car. John went to the dealership to buy his first car. John was nervous at first as he didn't know much about cars. After driving around for a while, John got to know the car. He really liked the car and asked for a test drive. The salesman offered John a test drive and John said yes!

The Game. Tom wanted to play video games. Tom's friends told him he was too young. Tom was the only one who actually wanted to play games. Tom played games every day for two weeks. Tom's friends told him he wasn't that bad at video games.

Clara's Algebra. Clara hated algebra. Her teacher told her she could retake it next semester. Clara hated that she couldn't retake algebra. Her dad enrolled her in Algebra II. Clara hated Algebra II as much as she hated algebra.

Getting Mugged. Tina had recently moved to a new city. All of her friends lived in the same area. Tina decided she would go to the bar for drinks. She parked her car at the corner of 5th and Chestnut streets. As she walked up the street, a guy tried to steal her purse.

Cleaning Windows. Tom noticed that his house was becoming cluttered. He decided he needed to clean up a bit. He decided to take out the trash and start over. Tom filled the trash bin with his old clothes. He finished and then went to take out the trash again.
Milk. Sara needed to get some milk. She couldn't find any in the house. She tried calling everywhere. Finally she called the grocery store. There was enough milk for Sara.

What the Earthquake Made. In the middle of the night on a hot summer day, the geologist woke up to the crackling of the electrical line. He went outside to check it out, his fingers were red from the electricity. He began to climb up the ladder to the top of the transmission tower. Suddenly he fell, knocking the equipment to the ground. As the equipment was covered in blackened wires and wires melted, he left.
Torn Socks. Sam got a pair of dirty socks. He put them in the dryer. The socks grew moldy. Sam tried to clean them. He accidentally put them in the oven.

The new friend. Sasha was having a hard time making friends. Her friends were too shy to ask her out. She finally asked her friend Beth out. Beth said yes to Sasha. They had a wonderful time together.

Hangover. Tim was at a concert with his band. All the sudden the music stopped. Everyone realized they were all out of alcohol. They ran outside and called their families. Eventually everyone was okay and they could go back to the concert.

Beat the game. My friends decided to play a game. I was hoping for a rematch of a past game. Instead it turned out to be a game of chicken. I was so mad I quit. I decided to play with my brother instead.
Home. The man opened the garage door. He went to his backyard and began to dig. He found a gold necklace. The man showed the necklace to the woman. The woman was happy and thanked the man.

Frozen Pizza. Joe was freezing out on the way home from work. He went to the store to buy some food. As he got in his car he saw he could get pizza. He got out to the store and ordered two big pizzas. He went back home and enjoyed them while frozen.
High Blood Pressure. Milton had been feeling bad. He decided to call in sick. Milton's wife went with him. They stayed in bed most of the day. He went to work anyway, feeling much better.
Yoga. Tyson was not having fun at school. He decided to do yoga to fix his attitude. Tyson went home and did his yoga. Tyson's attitude improved greatly. Tyson decided to do yoga again.

The Dog Race. Bob was running a race. He was nervous about it and almost dropped out. On the last lap he had a huge lead over everyone. However, he decided to take a break and wait for the other runners. He felt much better and won the race easily.

New Television. Tommy wanted a new television for his living room. He was too poor to afford a new one. He went to an electronics store for a good deal. The salesman helped Tommy make a good selection. Tommy finally got his new television.
Apple Tree. I went to a friend's house for a picnic. We went to the Apple Tree. We sat down in the shade and admired the beautiful apples. We took lots of photos. We felt good to enjoy nature.
Slurpee. My wife loves drinking slurpee. I decided to try making one with her. I went to the store and bought some. My wife bought a huge bag of them. It was her favorite drink.

Fun Times. It was a rainy day, so I got out my umbrella. I went out into the rain and walked around. When I finally arrived at the club, it started to pour. I got nervous and went inside. Then, I realized that it wasn't raining at all.

Video Games. Gemma loved to play video games. Her mom warned her about the addictive nature of video games. One day, Gemma's mom bought her an XBox One for her birthday. Gemma loved the XBox One so much that she played all day and all night. Afterwards, Gemma bought a Playstation 4 instead.

Cartwheel. Luna was playing in the sand. She felt like she was going to lose her balance. Then a gust of wind lifted her into the air. She ended up spinning on her side for about 20 seconds. Afterward, she fell down.
Food. Heidi was at a restaurant. She got the wrong order. They were happy to fix it. They sent her a free meal. Heidi was happy and satisfied.
Race to victory. There was a race to the finish line. Bert raced his friend in the race. They both had to cross a bridge. Bert got to the end first. He made it into second place.
Chinese Food. Tim went to a Chinese restaurant. The food was really spicy. Tim complained to the owner. The owner apologized. Tim went back and got the food with Chinese seasoning.

Orchard. Kia had just gotten a new orchard. She put some fruit on the vines. But to her dismay, she had trouble getting any fruit. She took out her hoe and dug through the dirt. Then, she found some grapes and dug them up to eat.

Turtle Encounter. We went on a turtle trip in the river. We were in the middle of the river. A man was walking around the river trying to be cool. Suddenly he noticed a turtle on the side of the river. The turtle jumped into the river and swam away.

Fire. Tom was cooking a turkey for Thanksgiving dinner. All of a sudden it got really hot. He had to put the food out immediately. After that, Tom could barely cook anything. He never cooked turkey again.

New Phone. Randy couldn't afford a new phone. So Randy decided to make his own. He printed out his own and made them himself. After the phone was made he sold them to people for cheap. Randy made hundreds and hundreds dollars in the first few months.

Animal Instinct. Anna was riding her bike on the sidewalk. A man rode by her and tried to start a fight. Anna began to fear her husband. She had never seen him so angry before. Anna hit her husband, and he turned and left.

The Celery. Timothy was making dinner for his family. His family didn't like the celery that was in his recipe. Timothy's family wanted him to keep the celery. Timothy was so sad to keep the celery. The next time his family made celery for dinner he used the celery.

Bishop. Dana is in charge of the small church in town. She has no idea what to do with the church. She gives her pastor a job running the church. When the pastor quit, she took his place. The congregation is happy with her choice.
Jimmy Races. Jimmy loved to ride bikes and run. He practiced very hard for an upcoming race. Jimmy practiced for a long time. He trained hard. Jimmy did his very best at the race.

Playing in a Band. Bob wanted to play in a band. He found one that was willing to play with him. He met some of the members. They practiced with him all night. They decided that they would play at the school dance.

Spaghetti. My boyfriend and I are trying to make a spaghetti dinner. We are doing fine, except for one issue. We have been unable to find the pasta! We finally found the pasta and it was just as we like. The spaghetti was delicious.
Coming Out. I am gay. I always wear a t-shirt with a big rainbow on it. One day, I wore the shirt out to a movie. A few boys in the audience made fun of me. I was disappointed in myself.
Dylan's new car. Dylan's car broke down a few days ago. Dylan could not afford to fix his car. Dylan was unable to find a job. Dylan has been laid off from his job. Dylan now has to buy a new car.

New App Department. Tina was trying to find the perfect app for her. She found several but none seemed to be quite right. She decided to try to make one for her. She wrote some code and put it online. It worked great so she gave it a try.

Bob and the Donkey. Bob and his brother were playing outside. Bob got really dirty and put his clothes in a pail. His brother told him to put his clothes back on. They went outside to play. Bob fell down the dirt and injured himself.

Tail rider. Amy's parents went out on a nice date with a guy named Dave. While Amy was waiting for her parents to come back from the date, Dave got upset. Dave went home and told his dad about Amy's date. Dave's dad grounded Dave for a month. Now Dave just hangs out at Amy's house.
Lost charge. Tom was walking home. He noticed that his phone was off. He put the phone into airplane mode. He charged it with the airplane mode. It worked, though.

Becca's Christmas Kitten. Becca is a woman who loves cats. She recently found a kitten on the street. She took it home to be safe and nursed it back to health. When it was time to release it, she named it after her. Becca named it "Becca".

Science Dissection. Tom always thought he was a great scientist. He decided to give it a try and dissect a frog. It ended up being much more difficult than he expected. Tom could only make a small hole in the frog. The frog still lives in Tom's living room.
A Hot Day. Jake went outside to cool off in the summer. He took a hot shower. He then sat and watched the sun rise. He didn't think anything of it. However, a fire started in the sky.

Robot Fighting. Tom went to a robot fighting tournament. He played against a robot that he thought was very weak. It was actually stronger than Tom thought. Tom was able to win. Tom was happy to have beaten the robot.
Knitting. Kim was an avid knitter. She was learning to knit. But Kim was losing her stitches. Kim was forced to give up knitting. Kim was no longer able to knit.
Large water slide. Kelly went on the largest water slide today. She had never been on one. She was nervous but loved it. It was so much fun. Kelly had so much fun she wanted to do it again.

Cat eats the Dog Treats. Molly bought dog treats at the pet store. She put them in a bag and took them home. Molly's cat, Maggie, started to take the treats. Molly was upset. Molly's cat finally got fed.

Jane and Cat. Jane decided she needed a cat for company. She was at a friend's house and they had kittens. Jane asked her parents if she could adopt one. They agreed, and she brought the kitten home. The kitten was very well trained, and Jane was glad she got a cat.

Surfing Scare. Bill was having fun at a surfing competition. He saw his friends surfing on the water. Suddenly he saw his friends wave at him. He was so frightened that he decided to turn around. Bill's friends continued to surf.

Girl Friend. When Kim was young, she had a pet fish. Her dad kept her in the tank all day. One day, her dad forgot to turn off the water. After a while, the water was turned back on. Kim saw the fish and cried.

Chatty Kathy. Kathy was having fun on the swings. She was laughing and chatting to her friends. Kathy decided to join the group of girls. Kathy started to play too aggressively. Kathy was suspended for two days.

Scuffed. John decided he wanted to drive his girlfriend to the grocery store. The car broke down in the middle of the road. John decided to call for a tow truck. The tow truck arrived five minutes after John called. John's girlfriend arrived a half hour later at the store.

Slow Internet. My mom called me this morning. I have to go to the store. I had forgotten to turn the internet on when I got home. I decided to go ahead and turn the internet on. Unfortunately the internet was slower than it should have been.
Baseball Slide. Nate was at the park playing baseball. There was a man on top of a slide. Nate slid down the hill towards him. The man hit Nate with his bat. Nate fell off the slide into the grass.

Lester Jumps Rope. Lester decides he wants to join the local high school track team. He gets in the ring with a local team and takes the first jump. He lands the jump and runs home to show his parents. His parents are proud that Lester is running. Lester shows his parents that he is the fastest sprinter in town.
Peanut. Milly loved peanuts. She bought them in a jar in the living room. When she opened the jar she spilled all over the carpet. Her mother said to clean it up. Milly was too small to clean it.

Water Skiing. Randy loved water skiing. His friends and family encouraged him to try it. One day Randy went to the lake and he loved it. His friends and family told him to be more careful. Randy learned to always be cautious before going water skiing.

Angkor Wat. Our family took a tour of the Angkor Wat temples. We visited the temple of the ancient Sumerians. We also saw the ruins of the ancient Aryan homeland. The trip had a great view of the ocean and the natural beauty. After the tour, we got to eat lunch in an open-air cafeteria.

Worse Than Before. Lars was running late for his first class of the day. He got to the class 30 minutes late, and was given detention. Lars tried his best to avoid the teachers, but he ran out of time. Finally he was forced to stand up and wait for his teacher. Lars did not want to be late again.

Horatio Finds a Job. Horatio has been unemployed for months. He applies for a job in his city. After some interview he gets the job. He feels so happy that he decides to go to work. Horatio is happy that he found a job.
The Cookie Burn. Liz loved to eat cookies. She got the best one ever that night. She ate it all up. Then her mom told her she had burned it. It had a huge scar on her face.

Construction Workers. Lydia got a job at the construction site. She spent her days stacking wood and concrete. She thought she'd be working on weekends. Instead, she found herself working full time. In the end, it wasn't a bad career choice.

Borrowed Money. Sally wanted to borrow money from her friend. Sally had no extra money in her account. Sally's friend agreed to pay her back. Sally paid her friend back. Sally was able to borrow money again.
Scuba Diving. Kathy was feeling adventurous. She decided to go scuba diving. She went down to the water and dove. Kathy loved her scuba diving experience. She loved going down to the water.

Preacher. The preacher got up in front of the church. He announced that God told him to do it. He also told the people that the people were the most blessed. People started to leave in terror. It's not my place to tell them that the preacher was wrong.

The evil dad. My brother took me to the mall. I wanted to go shopping, but my mom had a surprise. We went to a store to pick out clothes. When we left, we saw that the store was closed. My dad was running around the mall, looking for a job.

sad news. My dog ate a chocolate bar. He had eaten it while my mother was away. When she returned home the dog's fur was a mess. The dog looked very upset. I decided to take it to the vet the next day.

College. John was applying to college. He had not decided on a college yet. He was trying to pick which college to go to. He decided to look at his options. John went to the college he thought he would like to go to.

Punishment. Timmy was throwing a ball in the yard. His mother told him to stop. Timmy didn't listen and threw the ball. The ball went flying through the air towards a tree. Timmy's mother grounded him for a month.
Skip almost drowns. Skip is on a boat. Skip gets on the boat. Skip is having trouble breathing. Skip decides to get out of the boat. Skip gets into the water but drowns.
Dog. Teddy was a boxer. He went into a dog fight. Teddy got hit by a dog. Teddy got knocked out. He never went into a dog fight again.

A big hike. Sam had always wanted to hike in the backcountry. He had heard of hiking in national parks. On his trip to a national park he finally tried. Sam loved the beauty of the outdoors and wanted to see more. He decided to hike again and took a bunch of photos.

Ice Cream Day. It was a hot summer day. So the teacher decided to have ice cream for the kids. The kids loved it. They went to the store and bought lots of ice cream. It was a great day for ice cream.
I love her too. Nola was in a bad relationship. She decided to see a shrink. They recommended therapy. Nola started to see a therapist. Now she is happily single!

Jeff goes to the lake. Jeff is out on the lake with his friends. He starts to feel very thirsty. Finally he notices a sign that says the lake is open. He goes in and drinks some of the water. He feels much better!

The Saturation Point of Swiss Cheese. Tim loved cheese. He wanted to make a new cheese recipe. He tried making a cheese with all kinds of cheeses. He found one that had just the right amount of flavor. Tim then added it to his new Swiss cheese recipe.

Easier Sanctimonious Than Done. My aunt had just died. We were all feeling terrible. We began to feel a little bit better when we saw her. She was laying on the floor on a pillow. We all comforted each other.

Tara's Hat. Tara had a hat that she wore to school. One day, she lost her hat. It had fallen through the school building window. Tara was very upset at her lost hat. She asked her friends to buy her a new hat for her lost hat.

Recycled Cans. Bill wanted to recycle some cans. So, he bought a bunch of empty bottles. After picking them out, he went to the recycle bin. And he recycled all the cans in the bin. Bill felt very accomplished that day.
Cake. Lisa had never made a cake before. She bought all the ingredients for a cake. She mixed the ingredients in the blender. She added the cake mix in a bowl. Finally, she frosted the cake.

Jake Falls Off Ladder. Jake and his friend are in the yard playing. Jake decides to climb a ladder to play on a hill nearby. After climbing the ladder, Jake falls off the ladder. Jake breaks his arm when he falls. Jake doesn't play with his friends anymore.

Slide. I walked across a river with my girlfriend one day. We were walking in the water and decided to try to walk across. As we began the walk, we began to see a very large slide. My girlfriend was scared and did not want to walk across it. Eventually we came across a small bridge so we continued walking.

Grocery Games. I went grocery shopping today. I got to the store and looked around. I found a few really fun games. I picked up a game that allowed me to throw the ball and score points. I had a lot of fun playing it.
Track and Field Star. Tina was a runner on a school team. She decided to run track. She practiced hard. She made the team. Tina was proud to make the team.

Officer Helps. Sam was a street performer in a carousel. He was nervous about one particular act he was performing. During the act, Sam forgot a line of his song. He went on stage and forgot the rest of his lines. Sam got the worst ending ever.

Sharing. I walked down the street with a group of friends. We all decided to go eat a burger together. I was at the burger joint eating my burger. A woman from the group asked if she can get her burger. We all laughed about it.

wallet. I was walking to school in the winter. There were a lot of people who were cold. I couldn't wait to warm up! Unfortunately my coat was all wet and dirty. I left a big mess on the sidewalk and felt like I wasted my time.
Roller Coaster. I went to the theme park. I decided to go on the most popular roller coaster. It was scary, but thrilling. I did a few spins on it. I went back to my car and had a few beers.

The water on the books. I bought a new set of books. The books had a lot of pictures. One day my son took the pictures and put them in the books. The pictures were water marks. I realized the water was on the books.

Christmas Shopping. My wife's mother told her that she could do Christmas shopping for free this year. We both went shopping for gifts for a girl who is a toddler. She wanted a car seat. We bought her a pair of stroller and a pair of baby car seats. She loved the gifts we bought her.

Dave goes fishing. Dave loved fishing. He would spend all day on the lake catching fish. One day, Dave went fishing with his dad. They caught several fish. Dave felt a lot of pride when he had his catch.

Rick's Poor Time Management. Rick had a big project to finish. He was tired all the time. Rick tried to stay up all night. However, Rick couldn't concentrate long enough. Rick had to let his project be late.

Faker. Jim wanted to look tough. But at the school party, he acted silly. But no one knew how to recognize his acting for what it was. And they thought that he was just a kid pretending to be tough. Jim became a famous fake tough kid.
Cookies. Tia was hungry. She could not decide what she wanted to eat. Then she remembered that she had cookies! She rushed out and bought a dozen. She ate them up quickly.

Stage. Sally was backstage in the music show. She was in the midst of singing when her mom took her backstage. Her mom showed her a song she had written for her. Sally was so excited when her mom told her she could sing it too. She began to sing the song and it was so much fun.

Great American Story. One day, Tom bought a book from an antique shop. He read the opening paragraph and fell in love. The next paragraph was an autobiography, and it was amazing. Tom read it over and over, feeling like an author. His family loves the story and they tell stories about it every summer.
Soapmaking Disaster. The woman was making soap. She mixed in lots of ingredients. Then she added some water and shook it. The water got all over the soap. She had to throw it out.

Bacteria. Sally had to work on her lawn today. She tried to use bleach to clean up the mess. Her hands got all stained with the bleach. The bleach caused her to fall sick. She was relieved when her doctor said she had bacterial skin infection.

Eyebrow pulling. Jane hated her eyebrows and wanted them gone. One day, she saw a new boy named James. She met him and became mad that she didn't like his eyebrows. Jane began pulling them really hard. The boy told her he was only teasing her.
New Bag. Sasha's cat was always breaking her new bag. She bought a new one. Sasha's cat still broke her new bag. She couldn't afford the new bag. Sasha threw away her old one.

The Dog. The dogs chased each other for several minutes. Suddenly, one of the dogs tripped and fell. The other dog pounced on the injured dog. The dog fell on top of the injured dog. The dog and the dog's owner both smiled.

Choose. Amy wanted to know who the best singer in school was. Her favorite was probably Sara. Amy asked her to sing in front of her. She was very nervous, but she managed to do well. The next year she asked Sara to sing in front of her again.

Ridiculing. The family went out to eat for the first time. It was a nice night out to celebrate. All of a sudden, a friend told them a terrible joke. It was very unkind and disrespectful to a lot of people. The family didn't get along with their friend again.

Low Carbs. Tina had been feeling very depressed lately. She couldn't figure out why. She decided to do some research. She discovered low-carb diets weren't so bad. She started eating more veggies and fruit to help her feel better.

Ice Cream Truck. Alicia was having an ice cream craving. She needed something sweet. Alicia walked to the grocery store. She bought some chocolate milk. Alicia ate the milk ice cream and felt very satisfied.

Snow Cone Surprise. Timmy went to a local ice cream shop. They had a special snow cone flavor he'd never had before. Timmy got his cone, and it tasted amazing. He ate several of them, and was stuffed. Timmy decided to buy more in the future.

First day of Seventh grade. My mom and I went to the 7th grade yesterday. I forgot to bring my school supplies. So, today I did not have anything to eat. So, I ate ice cream at school. I am going to buy the supplies for today.

Expired plan. Tim wanted to get an online bill paying service. He went online and selected a plan. He was disappointed when he learned they were not renewing it. Tim decided to cancel it as he didn't want to be charged. He received a partial refund.

A Milk-Tooth. The cat snuggled up next to the bowl of cereal. It would usually keep to itself, but she needed to eat. When she began to eat, she accidentally swallowed a piece of food. It was very gross and she cried. Luckily, her mom helped her make up for it.

Mantis. The teacher told the class to be quiet and look at a model. The kids all stood in front of the model. They placed their hands on the model and held it up. After a while, the teacher asked them to touch the side of the model. Everyone was so amazed that they began to laugh.

Mother knows best. When my husband and I were younger we often fought. We were always upset with one another and wanted to fight. One day we had the idea to build an oven in our bedroom. The oven was heated and the entire room would be heated. Our fights became very subdued and we never fought.
The Eyebrow Burn. Rina was cleaning her apartment. Suddenly, she found her eyebrows burning. She grabbed a bottle of cream. She rubbed it into her eyebrows. Soon, she had no more eyebrows burning.

Scared. I went to the doctor because I felt extremely nervous. He gave me a couple of shots to calm my nerves. I was very scared. I went to sleep and felt much less worried. After I woke up I felt much more relaxed.
The Kitten. Tim got home from school. He noticed there was a cat on his front porch. He went inside his house. He heard the cat meowing. He got a kitty and was very happy.

Gloves. Kelsi bought new gloves for her gym class. She wore them when she first walked into her classroom. They felt too big and awkward. Kelsi's teacher told her that her hands needed to be smaller. Kelsi started wearing slimmer gloves the next time she went to the gym.

The Bonus. John was excited because he got a bonus at work. He was working extra hours and really enjoyed his job. One day he was late for work. John got a call from his manager. His manager decided he should be put on vacation.
Tired. It had been a long day. I had a lot to do. I decided to take a short break. While I was out I realized that my phone was broken. I had to call to set it up.
Group Activity. The kids were bored on a rainy day. They wanted to play with friends. So they decided to play football. When the game started they started to play. They were great at football.

Need a Job. My wife was unemployed when I was away on a business trip. I found her some ads in the paper and got a job. She asked to have me come over and take her. I said no. She said she had enough money by herself.
Study Up. Gina hadn't done well on her math test. Her mother wasn't happy. She told her to study harder. Gina studied for an hour and a half. Then she got a pass on her math test.

The camp pen pal. Amy and Sara were friends in the same camp. They had never met up before. Amy was very excited when she got the chance to meet Sara. They had lots of fun. Amy couldn't wait to get out of camp.

Jane's nail party. Jane was a very neat and tidy girl. Her mother told her she could have a nail party. Jane was very excited and excited. Jane's mom bought the supplies. The day of the party Jane's nails were perfect.

New Music. Dan wanted to get his parents to buy him new music. He went to the radio station to find the stations. He listened to every song he could find. After a month Dan's parents finally bought him a new album. Dan was happy to have listened to music with his parents.
Sam's Sail. Sam bought a sailboat. He took it out into the lake. His friends dared him to row it. Sam did it for them. They all laughed.
