The Casino. Mina was playing craps at the casino. She had lost all of her money! Then, a lady with a tray of chips offered Mina money for her troubles. Mina accepted the chips and they played another hand. Mina finally won enough money to go home and relax.

Construction. Tom was building a house. He had all the materials at his house. The day before his building day he went out for a walk. He didn't see anyone in his area. Tom had to build his house without anyone.

The Little Pig. Lester was walking home from school. He spotted a tiny pig on the ground. He asked if the pig wanted some grass. The pig snarled and ran off. Lester was disappointed, but he was happy to have a friend.
Thief. James stole a girl's book. He hid the book in a backpack. He took the book to his room. He started to read the book. The book fell out and the book was stolen.
The Garage. The couple bought a new house. They found an old garage and put it on their lot. They used a lot of space. They realized it was a lot of work. They hired a friend to help them do it.
Total scare. We had to walk across the street. My brother was behind me. My brother got scared. He started crying. The police came and gave us some help.
Oogum Boogum. The boy put on a pair of headphones. He plugged in the headphones. He went to a concert. His ears hurt because the headphones were plugged in. He went home with a broken headphones.
Boredom. I was doing nothing. I had a lot of things to do. So I decided to turn my TV off. But the television was stuck on. I had to call the cable company to get it fixed.
Too Much. Tom was at a club. There were too many drunk people. Tom decided to not drink. He went home and drank water instead. Tom's body felt better after.
Lilly's Song. Lilly went to the radio station. They played a song from a famous singer. Lilly felt bad for the singer. She wrote her own song. Lilly sang the song to the radio station.

Money for Groceries. Sue needed to pay her rent. She realized she didn't have any extra money to buy groceries. She decided to start a weekly donation to her local food bank. She donated her items every Thursday. Soon, Sue was able to afford groceries with the money she'd donated!

The Cave. Eli loved exploring the caves in his area. The first cave he ever went to was a mile underground. It was dark and cold at night. Then Eli felt a lot of pressure and a sudden gust of wind. Eli pulled out his flashlight, saw the cave entrance and began back.
Messed up baking. Yesterday I baked cookies. I forgot to put them in the oven. They burned when I put them in. I was so angry that I threw them away. I will never forget to turn off the oven again.

The Rental Car. Linda went to the airport to take a flight. When she arrived, she found that her car was broken into. She was very upset and nervous. She called the rental company. The driver said they would fix it right away.

Mystery. The mystery writer had a lot of books ready to be published. He started a new book and started making it a success. After awhile he decided to finish it but still make the money. He did all his work but no publisher would accept his book. It didn't matter to him as his next book had been so popular.

Albert's Girl Problems. Albert went to the store to buy food. He purchased three large bottles of milk. Albert drank his milk one glass at a time. Albert ate his food, feeling sick. Albert made his way home to change his clothes.

Coup d'etat. Gavin was an accountant and his accountant wife was very jealous of his success. She told her boss that she wanted to start a coup d'etat. She told everyone they were stupid to do business with her. Her boss decided to fire her for trying to overthrow the boss. She was very happy that she lost her job.
Wine. Jane wanted to make wine. She went to the store to get some wine. Jane bought a big bottle of wine. Jane tasted it and it was delicious. Jane was able to make some wine.

Trade Argument. Amy was at a trade fair in her home town. One of the booths had several new games. Amy thought the new game was interesting, but was not a fan. Her friend thought it was good, and offered to take her to the booth. Amy didn't think her friend was cool enough to go with her.

Danny moves out. Danny is a struggling musician. Danny is working on a new album. Danny is unable to find a record company. He decides to sign to a new record label. Danny's new record is a huge success.

The stolen bike. My parents have a lot of bikes. They have several mountain bikes. One day, the mountain bike was stolen from my parents. I was very upset and took it to the police. I never saw my mountain bike again.

Relaxing Weekend. Sam and his friends decided to go out for a relaxing weekend. They walked to a park and saw some ducks. The ducks seemed to be happy and swam by them. The boys swam for over two hours. They returned home feeling refreshed.

The American Dream. Linda was on her way to America when she was pulled over. She was asked for her papers and was given a ticket. Linda was so excited she decided to fly to America. She flew to Atlanta and took a bus there. She arrived in Atlanta on December 4th and began her life there.

Mile Club. Nathan wanted to join a mile club. He bought a membership card and filled it out. When he arrived at the club, he was shocked at the pace. He decided not to join and just walk in the mile club. Nathan loved his decision because it meant he didn't have to run.

The Swimming Test. Gina had a test tomorrow at the pool. She was scared that she would fail. But Gina still tried her hardest. In the end, Gina was not worried and got a good grade. And she was happy that she could go swimming after all.

Elizabeth's Bedroom. Elizabeth was looking for a new bedroom for her house. She found an antique, old, wood bed on ebay. She contacted the seller and had it shipped to her house. When it arrived, she set it up and it looked beautiful. Elizabeth loved her new home!

Migraines Or A Career. Gina had trouble concentrating at school. She'd been through so many different schools that she was tired of it. She applied for a job with her school's guidance office. She got a call back immediately. They offered her a full-time position as a mental health counselor.

Deadly consequences. Jenny and her friends were playing basketball. Suddenly, a stray dog bit Jenny. The dog's teeth were damaged and the bite took her arm. The police arrived and Jenny needed a cast on her arm. The owner took the dog to the pound and Jenny was able to get a new one.
Acting strangely. Tim was doing a play. He couldn't get his act on. He was trying everything he could think of. Eventually he decided to take a nap. He finally got it going.

Digs. We dug a tunnel and put our car in it. We thought we were safe until the hole got very deep. The hole was too small to climb out of and it was much deeper. We started to panic and call the police. Then we realized it was just a hole and called the fire department.
Highway. Jack wanted to drive to work one morning. Jack decided to take the highway instead. Jack crashed his car into a ditch. Jack had to pay $1000 in damages. Jack regretted taking the highway.
Expensive Accident. Tom had been saving for his whole life. He decided to purchase his dream car. He took the car for a test drive. He went too fast and hit the tree. Tom had to get it towed.

Rick and the Ball. Rick was playing in the yard with his friend. Rick fell on the ground in pain. His friend tried to pull him up, but Rick refused. His friend had to push Rick's hand out of his way. Rick felt embarrassed and walked home.

Prom. My family was watching a show on TV. A girl named Julie decided to make a surprise entrance. Her friends tried to talk to her, but Julie ignored them. At the prom, Julie wore a white dress and sparkly shoes. Her friends cheered her on.
First Night. Tom was a college freshman. He wanted to impress his friends. He decided to go out with them. He met a cool girl and they started talking. They decided to move in together.

An Amazing Woman. She was a beautiful, kind lady who was kind to all. One day, she saw a man in a dangerous situation and helped. The man was hurt badly and went to the hospital. The lady felt terrible and felt guilty about her actions. She told the policeman who arrested her and sentenced her to community service.

School play jitters. Kelly was excited about starting a new school play this week. She was worried that it would be a disappointment. As the day arrived, she had some misgivings. However to her surprise it was great. Kelly was pleased with the outcome.

Cheap candy. Linda's mom went grocery shopping. Linda didn't want to go with her mom. She decided to go out and buy some candy. Linda bought candy for herself and bought candy for her friends. Linda's mom appreciated the extra candy.

Drained Battery. Tom was having trouble charging his phone. He called the phone company to make a deal. They charged him a lot more money to ship him a new one. Tom did not want to pay that much money. He had the phone shipped back to the store for free.

College Graduate. Kia was on the verge of graduating high school. However, she was still studying for a final exam. When the final exam day came, Kia was very nervous. Luckily, Kia passed the exam without any problems. Kia was excited to start college.

Elephants. Tim had always been afraid of elephants. As an adult he was scared of them, but didn't know why. One day a family came to see his house and they saw him shaking. He looked up at them and they were afraid of him too. Tim was glad that the family came over and he was no longer scared.

Bedroom. It was a warm, summer night. The girls were in their bedroom in their pajamas. They heard loud thumping and knocking. The doorbell rang and the girls jumped. They ran downstairs to see that the door was broken.

Cooper and the tadpole. Cooper liked to feed his pet tadpole. He put the tadpole in a plastic tube. Then, he placed a towel under it. Cooper also placed some leaves and rocks in the tube. The tadpole climbed out and Cooper happily fed him.

Bad Bridge. Kara had a really bad bridge across the river. One day, Kara heard water running in the river. She didn't want to risk going into the water. She decided to go back to her house and wait. Once she heard it was okay, she went back to the bridge and was okay.

Work. We had to buy lunch for work on Friday. We went to the local sandwich shop. I got the French Fries, and Mike got the hot dogs. We ate until there was nothing left to eat. We got paid extra for working so hard.

All You Can Eat. Gina and her friends were on a field trip. They were at the lake. The teachers told them that they were allowed to eat whatever they wanted. There was chicken, beef, and dessert. But no one ate all they could eat.

The Last Bus. Alicia was trying to go to work but was late for work. The bus never showed up. Finally, Alicia waited outside and waited for an hour. Finally, the bus showed up. Alicia was relieved to see it arrive.

Note. John had a note for the woman he was dating. He didn't want to say anything and didn't think she would care. So he left it on her door step and left. A few weeks later she called him. It was to thank him for the note.
Trapped Cat. It had been raining very hard all day. The Cat in the basement was trapped. It was covered in water. I put it in the bathtub. He came out the next morning but was soaked.
Caught in the rain. Gina wanted to go to a friend's house. Her car was getting dirty. She did not have her umbrella. She stayed in the car for a long time. Her mother had to get her out.

The Sunscreen. Lucy went on a hot summer day. She didn't know that she could use sunscreen. She spent the whole day in the sun. As the day went on, her face began to burn. She needed sunscreen all through the night.

Bicycle Accident. The kids decided to go for a ride. They rode around their neighborhood and played baseball. While riding, a car came by and hit their bicycle. The children cried and apologized. The driver left the scene and the kids rode home alone.

Going to the Park. The girls were excited to go to the park. They packed up their stuff and headed out. When they got there they were so happy. They had fun all day long. The girls knew it was going to be a great day.
Lost. The woman lost her phone. She searched the house but didn't find it. She searched everywhere. She even checked the bushes. She found the phone and went to her boyfriend's house.
The Climb. Ricky and his friends were in a treehouse. They wanted to climb up. They all started working together. Ricky made it all the way to the top. The boys decided to go play in the park.

Water for Cats. I was drinking a glass of water with a bowl. I accidentally spilled a little on the floor. I was so thirsty and I wanted more water. My cat decided to use the bowl of water as a litter box. I'm glad that I didn't have to throw the water away.

Paycheck. John has a new job. He had to start earning money to buy food. He was shocked when his paycheck didn't arrive. John decided to work extra hours to save up. After 4 months he had enough money to pay for food!

Gymnastics. Gina was at the park with her sisters. She was in the gym with the other gymnasts. Suddenly, the teacher came over and announced that they were out. Gina was disappointed and went home. But it turned out her sisters did not come to the park alone.

The Wedding. Jared was a great cook. He was about to make his wife a beautiful wedding cake. He had a few ingredients and began cooking. Unfortunately, Jared forgot one ingredient. The cake came out horrible and Jared felt awful.

Internet Addiction. Tiffany used the internet every day. She would click on many websites. Her friends told her that she was addicted to the internet. Tiffany tried to stop using the internet. She learned she would have to live with it.

Fallen Tree. The Smiths always planted a big tree in the backyard. Unfortunately the tree got chopped down. The tree was very important to the family. The family dug it up. They moved the old tree into the basement.
Lazy. The man decided to work on his car. He went out one night. When he came back he was exhausted. He didn't do much work on it. The next day, he checked the car.

Break. Kate wanted to go see her friend at a movie. But she didn't want to go alone. Her friend asked if she could go with. Kate was scared, but her friend agreed to it. They were both very happy when they arrived.
Bryan and the song. Bryan was feeling bad. He felt like he was bored. Bryan decided to write a new song. He wrote a new song about himself. He felt better after he did that.

Roberto's Job Search. Roberto had a bad job search. He was out of work and unsure about his future. He asked his parents if they would be willing to help. His parents agreed to help him look for a new job. He eventually found a new job and was very happy with his choice.

Fast car. Caleb bought a new car. He loved fast cars and racing. One day he crashed his car and was badly hurt. His friends said he was too young to drive. Caleb went off to college and now he is a professional racer.

Sabrina is crushed. Sabrina is the best football player on her high school football team. She loves her team and always puts her best foot forward. Yet one day she becomes pregnant. She learns she is having a baby girl. Sabrina is crushed but happy to be a mom.

Vacation. I had to take my family to our first vacation. We went to the Grand Canyon. My son wanted to ride a carousel, which was the least fun. The only fun part was the water and the kids. We enjoyed our trip by the river.

Scary Snake. A man was walking through a canyon. A snake came up to him and bit him on his hand. The man shrieked and ran away. A helicopter came by and the man jumped out. He ran out and got the snake.
The candle choice. Tia needed a new candle. She was not sure which one to choose. She couldn't decide on which one. Finally she settled on one that was nice. Tia decided it was a great candle.

Lacrosse. The family had never played lacrosse before. They hired a coach for an upcoming game. The coach helped the kids learn new techniques and plays. The family loved the new games and the new coaching. They decided to get into lacrosse full time.
The tractor. Garry was looking for a new tractor. He looked online and found a great one. He decided to give it a shot. Unfortunately he couldn't fix it. So Garry drove off in his car instead.

Showing Is Believing. Sally told her parents that she was going to be in a musical. She went to the theater with a bag of popcorn. She saw the first part of the play, a comedy. After the play, Sally realized she hadn't believed the story. Sally was so upset that she couldn't talk to her parents.

Crushes. Kelsi went to the mall for her birthday party. Everyone at the party was wearing clothes from the same store. Kelsi liked that they were wearing the same outfit. Kelsi decided to ask her crush at work to take her to the store. Unfortunately, the guy rejected her.

Onions and Garlic. My family likes to grill. The weather was too warm for grilling today. The grill was so cold that I made my husband make a salad. I served my salad with extra garlic in it. It was so tasty, my husband ate every last bite.

Just Beachy. Joe liked to take walks in the beach. One day he decided to walk along the ocean shore. While he was walking he got lost. Joe lost track of time and fell into the sand. Joe had to clean up all of the sand from his feet.

Student Loans. Beth started college a few months ago. Her parents decided to send her to an expensive private school. Beth's school did not provide much financial aid. She had to take out several student loans. Beth still has the loan debt after she graduated.

Forgetful Daisy. Daisy was having a lot of problems in her house. She went to her mother and asked for help. Her mother told her to be patient, but that everything would be okay. Daisy wasn't so patient, and soon she was sleeping through her alarm. By the time she awoke, she had to run outside to change her dirty sheets.

Aaron. Aaron is having problems with his parents. His parents do not allow him to play outside much. Aaron decided to go play outside for the very first time in months. Aaron and his friends ran and played all day. Aaron was happy to finally be playing outside.
Cold, wet lesson. I was taking a long shower. I was holding the water. The water became very cold. I began to panic. I realized the shower was too long.
Tails. Anna needed a new tail. She decided she needed to get a new one. Anna went to the local craft store. She saw some beautiful animals. She purchased a new tail for the deer.

William loses the game. William was playing baseball with his friends. William started to hit a homerun. William hit the ball out of the park. William was awarded a point. William played more baseball next game.

Blood Plasma. Tom had a very high blood pressure. It made him very angry when he had to buy expensive medical equipment. Tom was so angry he threw a tantrum when he lost his job. Tom thought he'd get money from blood plasma donations. Unfortunately he didn't get enough money for him to have an emergency.

Hummingbird Day. On September 9th, we go to the park to hear birds. We see hundreds of hummingbirds that day. We learn so much about birds in this park. On the 11th we leave for home. We cannot wait for the next time we see birds.

Out. Mick's mom was going to be out of town. Mick was sad because he wanted to play with the cat. Mick decided to find a new cat to play with. Mick found a cat and named it Frank. Frank is a very happy cat that Mick plays with every day.
Question. Tom was driving home. He saw a drunk guy in the road. He stopped at a red light. He honked his horn to warn him. The drunk guy ignored the sound.
Loss of Energy. I was running low on energy. My family was worried about me. I told them I needed a long walk. After a half hour walk, I was exhausted. They said I had enough energy for dinner.

A Car Purchase. Jeff really needed a car for his job. He went to the dealership to look at all the options. He decided on a Chevy Chevette. He drove it out to the dealer and took it home. He was so excited when he got the keys!
Trying. Sam had a headache. He was really confused. Sam called his doctor to explain. The doctor gave him some advice. Sam went home with a clear head and a clear mind.
IHOP. The man went to iHOP. He ordered two drinks. The waitress brought him his meal. The man paid and left. He took a cab home.
Runaway Bride. Tom and his wife got married in 1981. Tom decided to tell his wife he had a job offer. He lied on his resume. His wife didn't believe it. She broke up with Tom.

Colorado. It was a beautiful day in Colorado. Bryan and I decided to head down to the state park. The park had a nice pool and a nice water slide. After we got back into the car, I began to enjoy the park. Bryan enjoyed the rest of his day and we headed home.

Insecurities; or How I Learned That Even Your Friends Will Hold You Back Because of Theirs. Tom was on a date with his ex-girlfriend. She told him she'd be staying after work. Tom wasn't sure why. She told him that she didn't want to see him. Tom realized he had no friends to hang out with after all.
Driving. Ida wanted to get back in the driving game. She was having a bad day. So she went out for a drive. She didn't know there was a speed trap. So she was caught speeding.

Mexican Food. One of the first things that my wife did as a single woman was eat Mexican food. We went to an Italian restaurant and ordered some chicken and pasta. We loved the food but the prices were very expensive. We ordered another dish and that was better than ever. We had the best dinner of our lives.

New album. I listened to a lot of music before buying my first album. I downloaded the whole thing for free. I played it in a small group of friends. When the album came out I got a lot of downloads. I got a lot of money and listened to it many times.

New Car. I wanted to buy a new car. I looked through my local dealers and couldn't find one. I drove down to the dealership. I found a great one I really liked. The salesman offered me a large trade in.

Stampede. My cousin and I had never gone to the Stampede. One summer, I decided to get tickets on my birthday. My cousin and I had so much fun. We rode all the horses, ate all the food, and saw a lot of music. We had such a great time!

The Tie. I bought a new tie for my graduation. It was pink with black stripes. I wore it proudly in my speech. One of the people in my class told me to move along. He said I looked very silly and I was embarrassed.

Puppy. Tom was on vacation with his parents. They decided to take a small trip to the pet store. They picked out a small fluffy puppy. Tom couldn't wait to play with him. He brought the puppy home with him the next day.

The Scam. Ronda got a new job at a local bank. Ronda was told by her boss to open a savings account for her. Ronda opened the account. The account was actually controlled by the bank. Ronda realized she had deposited her identity info into the scam account.
The Swimming Lesson. Sammy was at the pool with his family. His dad was teaching him how to swim. They practiced for a while. Sammy finally felt comfortable in the pool. He enjoyed swimming.

Power Plant. I always had my car parked in the garage. One day my wife called and wanted to go somewhere else. I was very mad and told her that I didn't want to go. I went back to the garage and grabbed my tools. I had to stop at a power plant to power up my car.

Snake Eating. Tim was hiking with friends. They saw a snake in a nearby bush. They all started laughing. Everyone laughed so much, Tim lost his grip on his hiking pole. He ended up falling in the bush and getting stung.

New Friends. Joe's parents got married, but his dad was really upset about it. He decided to make Joe a promise. He promised to always look after him and his younger siblings. After he left his house, his siblings loved playing with Joe. They called him the new Dad!

The Orange. John loved the color orange. One day he found an orange tree in his yard. The tree had many large orange fruits. John went to the store and bought the oranges. He went home and was very happy with his new orange tree.

Jake Goes Fishing. Jake is a fisherman. He has never gone fishing before. He asks his dad for directions to his first fishing spot. His dad shows him to the fishing spot. Jake fishes there for the first time ever.

New Dog. It was a warm afternoon and I saw a small black dog run up to the fence. The dog was small and yellow with a thin white stripe down its nose. I got my phone out to take a picture and the dog jumped up and down. I told the dog's owner I'd love to pet the dog. He told me they would have a small dinner for me.

Jimmy's Weight. Jimmy was overweight. He went to a restaurant and ordered a large burger. He ate all of his food and went to bed. He didn't realize until morning that he ate the entire burger. Jimmy felt sick the rest of the day.
Boiling Corn. The other day I boiled corn. It did not boil. I tried to stir the corn with a spoon. It did not stir. I threw it out because it didn't turn out well.

Todd Helps Out. Todd was bored at home one day. He decided to help some friends with a project. They asked Todd to help paint a room. Todd painted a nice room with his paint brushes. Todd felt great when he finished the project.

Reading Challenge. I decided to start reading more books. I read about one book every other day. After a week, I was reading one book every other day. I was so tired that I had to stop. I read a few more books before I was tired of reading.
Bad reaction. My daughter was playing with her little sister. It was raining. They started throwing water at each other. My daughter started crying. I had to calm her down.

Dead Plants. Sasha's yard is filled with a lot of dead plants. Sasha thinks that the plants would be a good addition to the garden. One day she decides to plant some trees. After planting the trees, Sasha notices that the plants are healthy. Sasha is glad that her dead plants have been useful to her garden.

Skydiving. Tom was jumping from a high balcony. He had to jump from a lot of different height. He was very careful to not fall from any height. However, he landed on his arm and scraped his arm. Tom's arm never recovered.

Dancing shoes. Jill had been looking for a new pair of shoes. She did not like any of the options she saw. Finally she was able to find a pair she liked. She decided to wear them to school the next day. The shoes were so comfy, she wore them again.

New Shoes. Jan's shoes were very worn and stained. Her mom recommended she get a new pair. Jan decided to splurge on a pair of white tennis shoes. Jan loved her new shoes. Jan's mom bought her a new pair of shoes at a discount.

Scary Sleepover. Allison and her friends went to her grandparents to have a sleepover. They played scary movies all night. In the morning Allison woke up scared and her ears ringing. Her mother told her that sleepover was over. Allison was upset her mother lied and said no sleepovers.
Phone. The phone rang. Sara didn't answer it. She got up to see if she'd made a mistake. The phone rang again. Sara had accidentally made a phone call.
Ladoo. We got a Ladoo. We put it on our desk in our office. A co worker came in and took it. She took it to the storage locker. We gave the Ladoo to her friend.

Spider. Maurice was afraid of spiders. He was scared of a certain type of spider. One day, Maurice was walking in the alley. A big spider climbed on him and crawled under his shirt. Maurice was more careful about leaving his house after that.

Classroom. The students sat down in class. The teacher started to teach. She was not explaining the concepts well. The students complained. The teacher apologized for not explaining the concepts well.

Katie Courier. Katie was a freelance typographer. She loved to be in front of the typeface, even at work. One day, Katie was asked to cover the wedding of a famous actress. Katie worked very hard, typing hundreds of words per hour. Katie was finally asked to type the wedding.

Stamp collector. John wanted to start collecting stamps. He had his old stamps and started going to the post office. He learned how to use a stamp cutter. He was able to cut through several pieces of cardboard. John's collection is bigger than he thought it would be.

Loud Snoring. Tim was snoring too loudly in his sleep. He'd been sleeping with his earplugs on all night. Tim was finally able to go to sleep without them. He decided to wear them out of laziness. He snored like crazy the rest of the night.

Tavon. Tavon was a tall black and red haired boy. Tavon wanted to play football and his dad agreed to sign him up. They drove to the local training center to begin the training. At the center he was taught various techniques. Tavon is now on the high school football team and is great!

Karate Class. Ida was doing yoga. Her teacher asked her to do a karate class. Ida was worried that she wouldn't learn the moves. Ida practiced the moves every day. In the end, she was a good student of Karate.

The concert. Last week I went to see my favorite band perform. The band was so good I stayed up way past my usual time. I tried to go to bed late but it was too late. I stayed up way past my usual time to catch the band in concert. I had the best time I've had all year.

Piano. I was a little girl who wanted to play piano. I had always been able to play the piano. I decided that I should practice with some friends. I got very good and practiced a lot. I eventually became able to play the piano.

Fundraising. My family and I have been trying to raise money for the car. We found some good people and started asking around. When it was time to ask, we felt very overwhelmed. Finally, we were able to raise enough for the car. It was great having a big crowd behind us.

Money gambling. Cody loved to play money games. One day, he was bored while at a casino. Cody decided to bet on a race that he didn't understand. He bet everything he had on the race. His winnings made him very upset with himself.

Happy ending. Beth and James had been married for ten years. James was a widower. Beth decided to break up with James. James felt bad and decided to help her out. They broke up and now she can spend her time with her friends.
Soda. Bobby decided to quit his soda habit. Bobby went to the store. He bought only water. After getting home, Bobby drank only water. Bobby felt very bad about quitting soda.
Delivery. Samantha had to deliver a package. It was for a friend. Samantha did a good job. However, a delivery person snuck up on her. Samantha was scared of the person.
Ants. I was cleaning up in the bathroom one day. I noticed some ants. I kept them outside. Soon they started to come back in. I called the exterminator.

Forgetful Bob. Bob was an avid gardener. He would always forget to water his plants. One day, Bob forgot to water his plants. He was so mad that he destroyed his plants. He felt bad, but knew that he could do better.
New Hair. Kim wanted to do something radical. She went to her hairdresser. They gave her a short buzz cut. Kim couldn't believe it. She looked great.

Eggs. Kim wanted a new dress. She decided to make her own egg salad dressing. She tried many different recipes. Then she found one that was perfect. Kim got to dress up like a princess and she was thrilled!

Surprise at school. Today was the day that Ann's crush was getting her autograph. Ann had never been to a concert and was excited. When she got to the stage, she stood in awe. Then she saw the autograph was actually a picture. Ann was so happy and thankful.

Fruit. Tasha was growing fruit trees on her farm. They were not very good but had nice fruit. One day she watered her trees and they got very good fruit. Her neighbors were happy about it. Tasha felt like a big success.

Bank. Sam and Amy decided to open a bank account. Sam worked long hours to open the bank account. The bank account was supposed to be open by the first of the month. The first day, the bank account had only $100 in it. Sam and Amy realized it was a bad idea to open a bank account.
Desk Builder. Tom wanted a new desk. He decided to build one. He hired a company to build one for him. It took a few days. Tom finished the desk and it looked great.
Doctor. My daughter is going into medical school. She has been studying hard. She will be a pediatrician. I have sent her tests for several months. She passed them and is going into medical school.

Arcade night. Dan was looking forward to the Saturday night his arcade was hosting. Dan decided to go to the arcade. The arcade offered games that Dan hadn't played in a long time. The games were challenging but interesting. Dan had a great time at the arcade.

Vegan. When I was in sixth grade, my mom suggested I try being vegan. I wasn't sure what to do, so I asked my friends. I went to my mom's house and she went out to buy me food. I bought some veggie burgers, but I also ate fruit and veggie milkshakes. After eating my veggie burgers, I became a vegan!

Big Deal. Jane and her family live in a trailer park. They wanted a house on their land. One day a developer offered Jane a deal. The developer offered to pay Jane for the land. Jane was very pleased with the offer.

Night Terrors. Bob and Mary were playing night terrors at the park. They were afraid of the dark. Mary began to get really scared. She tried to hide under a bush but she was too scared. Bob called his dad to take her home.
Yummy almonds. We went to a local cafe for some almond milk. When we got it, it was delicious! I ate it while we chatted. Then I felt ill afterwards. I still got an A for the taste.

Deep Cut. Amy was trying to shave her legs. She cut her leg too deep. The wound hurt very badly. Her mom called a doctor to get her out of the bath. Amy had to stay in the bath for the rest of the day.

Tow Truck. Jake took his lawn mower outside for some maintenance. Jake noticed that the gas tank was low. Jake took out a gas can from the garage and filled it with gas. Jake drove the lawn mower back to the garage. Jake mowed the lawn quickly.

Hidden Keys. Bob was trying to open his locked door. He was about to call his roommate to help him. Bob saw a shiny object in the hallway. He took a peek and saw that it was a hidden key. He was able to successfully open the door with his roommate's help.

Bills big idea. Bills was a student who loved doing science. He had a great idea for a device to measure pressure. He asked the professors for funding for it. The professors told him they would only fund if he did research. Bills was elated and went home to do research for it.

Online Dating. Beth and Mark had broken up in high school. They met online and arranged to meet up. They hit it off and began a long relationship. One day, Mark's sister emailed him asking him to meet her. They had met in real life and got married!

The kitty finds a home. Bert had a cat named Fido. One day Fido fell and injured his leg. Bert rushed to the vet who said he would be ready soon. Two days later Bert found Fido in the living room playing with kittens. Bert was so happy that he let go of Fido.
Lamb. The man cut some meat. He had some red meat. He put it on the grill. His dog came running in. It ate all of the meat.

Amazing sunglasses. I was at the lake one day. It was beautiful out and I was so happy. I saw something sparkle on the water so I took a selfie. I posted the photo on Facebook. My friends really complimented me on the amazing sunglasses.
Sick Day. Jim woke up feeling awful. He got up early and drove to work. He was not able to go in the building. Jim called in sick for his shift. Jim was glad he was able to work on a day off.
Jenny's Accident. Jenny was driving to work. She got a flat tire on her way there. Jenny started crying. Her boss gave her a ride to work. Jenny's boss saw that she was not in need of a ride.

The Genius Was The Intern. Tim was the smartest person in his high school. He always knew the answers to almost everything. He made a lot of money and was very smart. One day he was invited to his first job interview. He was the smartest person there and they hired him.

Sparky's Fish and Chips. Sparky likes to get a bite to eat. His favorite spot to get a bite is Fish and Chips. Sparky always gets his favorite fries and cheese. Sparky really enjoys Fish and Chips. Sparky feels good eating his favorite spot to eat.

Snitch. Lily was walking down the street with her dog. Suddenly, a boy came up to her and tried to snoop on her. She snuck up behind him and knocked him to the ground. She began to shout at the boy and scold him. The boy felt bad and apologized.
Radio. My wife's radio is broken. She can't reach it anywhere. It is stuck to the wall. My daughter suggested we try a screw driver. We managed to get the radio off.

Teacher, Teacher. My friend asked me to help his son study math. I showed him a few simple examples of problems. He didn't understand what I was saying. I told him that he should try harder. It was hard for him to understand so I just taught him the easy way.

A piece of italy. It was the start of summer vacation. Sally loved going to her friends house. She loved her friend and her friend's parents. She brought some of her favorite stuffed animals there. She had a great time hanging out with her friends at the house.

Personal space. Tim's girlfriend had been complaining about his closeness to her. She kept on complaining to her friends. Her friends wanted to make fun of Tim but did not want to do so. Tim's girlfriend kept on complaining and his friend got hurt. Now Tim's girlfriend doesn't have to be upset by his closeness.

Wild Concert. Fred was excited to go to the wild west music concert. The weather forecast called for rain the night before. Fred got there early, and prepared by leaving his keys at home. He also packed a water bottle to keep him cool. When the concert started, the rain didn't stop and Fred was soaked.
New Business. Tom decided to open a business. He got some help from some friends. It was tough. Tom learned a lot. Tom eventually became successful.
Spaghetti. The man made a spaghetti. He put it in the pot to cook. The pot started smoking. The man yelled. He put the pot out.

The Railing. Dan loved to build things. He liked to make things look beautiful. His latest project was a rail of fancy glass. It was beautiful, but Dan hated the thought of having to move it. Dan didn't want to do the work, so he got a cheaper replacement.
Boredom. The kids played outside. They were bored. They ran around for awhile. They were tired. They played again later.

The Shot. Jason tried out for the basketball team. He was the first player chosen. Jason ran as hard as he could for the basketball team. The coach let him try out again. He made the team and was happy.

Speak. Garry needed to learn a foreign language. He decided to take an online class to learn. After the first day, he had some trouble with the language. He worked very hard and made progress. He was able to pass the final exam after the class.

Art To Food. Rita was excited to get art supplies for a cooking class. She asked her grandma for a list of art supplies she needed. Her grandma made a list of things she would need to get. When Rita got to class she had everything on the list. She went to the art class and had a great time.

The Planets. The children were all very excited for the visit. They were going to see the planets! They were going to find the best place to see them. They got to the planets by walking around each one. They saw so many and had so much fun!

Lost Cause. John had a great life. He took great care of everyone he knew. One day, someone told him his dad was dead. John went to his dad's funeral and didn't bother to say goodbye. His family never found out.

Wrong Guilt. Sue's family was going on a vacation. She was supposed to go with them. Sue was afraid her family would notice she was gone. But her parents told her it was fine. They only made fun of her in secret.

Jim Opens A Taco Truck. Jim wanted to start up a taco truck. He started with a small garden and a few tables. Jim was going to have to pay some people to help him out. Jim was ready to open a business. Jim was ready to start a new career.

One Flew Over The Woman's Head. Beth was in the middle of the forest. A woman walked right by her and suddenly stopped. Beth turned around and ran, hoping the woman didn't notice her. However, she noticed a tree branch with a dead fly on it. She ran and jumped over the branch, so she wouldn't have to run the rest of the way.

Sparky's Homework. Sparky had been working hard all day. He was in the 9th grade when he was assigned his homework. Sparky took the assignment home with him. He finished the assignment late at night. Sparky's parents weren't able to get the assignment because of a blackout.

Soaked. Mary got a bath after going swimming. As she was bathing she tried to take out her towel. As she was pulling it out, she slipped on the wet floor. She was soaked for at least an hour. Mary went to get a towel from the laundry.

Finding God. The woman searched her entire life for some meaning. She tried to find the answer to a lot of questions. The God she found was in the Bible. She was so glad to find what she was looking for. She made a decision to leave her home and find God.

The nerd. Ben was a great nerd. He was a science and math nerd. He spent his free time writing long term project on science and math. One day his math teacher challenged him to a one on one contest. Ben beat him and is now a good scientist and math teacher.

voting. I was going to vote in the upcoming election. I thought about how to make the most informed choice. After research, I settled on one candidate. I chose him as my representative. Now, I can make informed decisions about my future.
Dad saves Son. My dad was doing the dishes. He was watching tv. While he was watching tv he sees his son crying. He rushes into the room. He helps his son and he is happy.
The Pens. Cindy was collecting pens. She had a lot of them, but needed some more. She put them in a box. Later that night, she came back with a new box. She filled it with the pens she already had.

A Helper. One day, Mike's dog was acting sad. Mike decided to take his dog to the vet. He brought the dog to the vet's office and put him down. The veterinarian was able to fix the dog's behavior. The dog now calms down and is very well behaved.

Gary. Gary was an old man and not fit to live. One day Gary decided to move into a new home. Gary did not have anyone in his old life to care for him. Gary eventually had to move back in with his parents. Gary never wanted to live on the streets again.
Pizza. Samantha was eating a pizza. Then she got sick. She threw up all over the pizza. It ruined the rest of her meal. She got revenge by eating pizza with sauce.

Being Greedy. I was working at a fast food restaurant. The manager gave a $5 tip. The employee was really generous with the money. However, he didn't pay the tip back to the employee. He just gave the employee a $5 tip anyways.

Asked to be a bridesmaid. Cindy was getting married in two weeks. She was sad that she would have to wait until that day. Then Cindy's best friend Anna called her. Anna wanted to be a bridesmaid too. Cindy was happy for her friend, but not happy that her sister wanted to be.

Birthday Cake. My dad bought me a birthday cake for my birthday. I love cake. I decided to eat the cake before I put it in the oven. When I opened the cake I burned it. I was happy because I could eat another one.

Kilt King Ken. Ken had never dressed up in a kilt before. His sister and best friend made fun of him. His friend, his sister and his friend all came over to try on his new kilt. They all agreed that Ken looked very cute in his kilt. Ken loved his new kilt and wore it often.

Staples. A man went to the store to buy some staples. He picked up a pack of eggs, some paper towels, and a knife. He left the store with his items and went home. His mom was upset because he left his items in the store. He was grounded for 2 weeks.

Lost Wallet. Mike took a bus to go shopping. When he was about to check out he saw he had lost his wallet. He remembered his wallet at the store. Mike went back to look for his wallet. Unfortunately, his wallet was at the back of a store window.
Audio recording. Tom was at a party. All the people were recording audio. A stranger asked him for money for the recording. Tom reluctantly obliged. The stranger never returned.
Princess. My sister got pregnant. She told my mother this. My mom brought her some girl scouts cookies. My sister got mad. She said the cookies were pink and sour.

Kilt wearing dad. Last week I went to the mall with my wife. We had a good time shopping and we were proud to show off our kilt. Once in the parking lot we heard loud car noises and saw a cop car. When the cop asked to see our driver's licenses he had trouble seeing. We had to spend the night in a hotel and the next day were arrested.

Diet. Sarah was trying to lose weight. She read online that a low calorie diet would help. Sarah bought a low calorie diet book and began eating it everyday. Within a few months she had lost twenty pounds! Sarah was so pleased that her low calorie diet was helping her!
Lost Shoe. I put my shoes in my room. However, they did not fit anymore. I looked everywhere but my room. Finally, I looked in my closet. In there, I found a box that fit my shoes.
First date. It was going to be a romantic night. I went out on a date. I had a nice time. Then we ended up going back to my place. I was happy to finally see my ex boyfriend again.

Heart. Tom was having problems with his heart. He asked his doctor about his condition. The doctor told him there was nothing that could be done. Tom started having regular heart attacks. Eventually, he died of a heart attack.
Going Overboard. I was at a family party with my family. Everyone got drunk and started dancing. The bouncer asked everyone to leave. They went over the top. I felt badly for them when we got home.

Long time to dry. I have been looking for a good quality drying solution. I went to a local store for some advice. It seemed like the perfect solution. I went to the store, purchased a pack and paid for it. The product arrived on my doorstep and I was happy.

New Wallpaper. Kate had a new wallpaper to put on her computer desk. She had it printed out on high quality paper. She put it in the wall. When she turned the computer on, it was blurry. The picture was blurry but she was happy it was fixed.
Jan goes to the dentist. Jan went to the dentist. He had a root canal. He went to sit in his chair. When he sat down his back hurt. The dentist said it would be better after a few weeks.

Tennis Coming of Age. Gus's family moved to a new city. He wasn't sure how he would start going to tennis lessons. His family wasn't sure either. So Gus decided to get a tennis racket for the first time. He's very happy with the racket he got.

Trumpet. Anna loved playing trumpet. She was very good, but never very good. She practiced hard every day. Finally she was so good that she decided to enter a competition. She went on to win first place!
Squirrel. My mother always wanted a squirrel. She took me to a local animal refuge. I found a cute little green one in one of the cages. I petted it. My mother was impressed.

Richard Grows a Beard. Richard wanted to grow a beard for Christmas. Christmas morning, he woke up to find out that his beard was gone. The man who had gotten it for him took it from his drawer. Richard was very upset that he lost his beard. He grew a mustache instead.

Silver Coins. Cathy was an avid coin collector. She found one silver coin that was worth $1000. She contacted the coin dealer. The dealer appraised the coin and gave it to Cathy. She brought the coin to the coin dealer and they sold the coin for $500.
Tea Time. It was a sunny and warm day. Cathy decided to have a glass of tea. Cathy put the tea in her cup. Cathy took a sip. She spit it out in disgust.

The Phone. Eli was walking home when he realized his phone was dead. He had no money to buy a new phone. He decided to call a friend to borrow his phone. He arrived at the friend's house with his phone. They had a good chat, and Eli was able to get back on his feet.

The Dog Park. Amy wanted to take her dog to the dog park. She didn't know the park and asked for directions. The park was about 50 yards away from her house. She made the half-hour drive to the park. The dog loved to play in the park.

Tom's Diner. My friend Tom lived in the city. He went to his favorite diner to get breakfast. It was a tiny diner with only ten tables. He was the only one to sit on the bench for his breakfast. I had the good fortune to sit next to him at his diner.

Felix Makes a Friend. Felix and his friend wanted to meet. They each went to the coffee shop. They were talking to the manager. The manager smiled and told them he was free. They decided to walk the park together.

Mylar Balloons. The kids wanted to make some helium balloons. They gathered their materials. Then, they set about making them. They found a perfect color for the balloons. Then, they inflated the balloons for their balloon show!
Normal. It was a nice day outside. Jim went outside to walk. He went outside and got soaked. Jim went to the bathroom. Jim felt like he was sick.

Fred Eats Salad. Fred notices that he has lost weight. He decides he needs a healthy way to satisfy his appetite. Fred buys a salad and eats it for lunch. He is no longer hungry. Fred is glad that he stopped eating junk food.

Riding Lessons. John wanted to learn how to ride a bike. He got a trainer to teach him how to ride. John worked hard on riding his bike. Eventually John got better at riding his bike. Now John can ride his bike anywhere.

The storm. It was a very rainy night. The wind blew the rain water onto the house. My daughter opened a window in the living room. A gushing shower came down from above. She cleaned the water from the windows.
The Powder Room. The twins were playing in the dirt. They went outside. They ran across a small shed. They climbed up and found a bunch of powder. They spent the afternoon making a mess.

Lost Keys. Dan took his keys with him to his first date with the girl he was with. As he tried to leave, he realized his keys were not in his pocket. He remembered they were in the kitchen. After searching the kitchen, he found them. Dan quickly made his way home before anyone noticed.
Condo Values. Derek is a developer. He was working on a condo project. Derek's client asked him to buy the condo. Derek did not know how much it was worth. Derek ended up losing a lot of money.

Sled. Lily had always wanted to go skydiving. She had never been so scared as she was at this moment. When she jumped, she screamed and yelled. Her friends were relieved and helped her calm down. Lily went home and cried.
Engagement. Ben was in high school when he met a girl named Jane. They immediately became friends. They decided to become engaged. Ben and Jane planned their wedding. It was beautiful and perfect!
Shots. Kenny went out with his friends. They were shooting hoops. One of them got hit with a basketball. Kenny was mad. He told his friends to stop.
Poisonous Gift. Tim was on vacation. He decided to buy his girlfriend a gift. He went to the store. The gift was poisonous. Tim apologized profusely.
Carrots. Jill liked carrots. One day she didn't have any carrots. Jill went to the store and bought a bag of them. Jill was very upset. She didn't want to buy carrots again.

The Excuse. The couple was arguing over a minor issue. One of the women said they didn't have to take the dog out. The other woman disagreed. The woman went outside to try to keep the peace. The dog ran right up to her and started barking.

The Monkey Emoji. Bob found a new favorite cartoon character. He was excited to show his friends and family. The character was called the Monkey emoji. Bob's coworkers didn't like the character. Bob found the character more annoying than useful.

The Meat. Nate bought a whole roast of beef. He couldn't find the recipe for the roast on the package. He went to the store and bought a butcher's knife. He went home and began to cut up the meat. He had made a delicious roast!
Bald. Bob was overweight. So he decided to take steps to lose weight. He did lots of yoga and light cardio. He also started to eat more veggies. He soon lost all the weight he wanted to.
Hair Gel. Tom bought new hair gel. He wanted to make it look his own. It did not look like his real hair. Tom sent it back and they gave him a refund. He went and bought some real hair gel instead.

The Stolen Shirt. Samantha and Fred were playing basketball. While Fred was doing the alley-oop he dropped the ball. The ball went back to Samantha and she ran up to grab it. She didn't catch the ball and it fell to the ground. Samantha was furious at Fred.

Coney Stew. Sandy and her family had just moved to a new town. It was a long way to get to their favorite place. One day a friend had a craving for fried chicken. She decided to make it. Sandy was very happy that her friend had the idea to try it.
Food order. My wife called me. She wanted me to come pick up food. I called the restaurant and told them we needed the food. They put the order in for me. When I got back, I had everything I needed.

A Ride Home. One evening, Billy's parents decided to take him to the mall. While they were gone, Billy saw a flyer advertising a car wash. Billy decided to drive there and get his car washed. Billy was excited when they returned and the car wash was complete. He felt glad that they took him home after all that work.
Math Test. Tim had a math test. He thought he did well on it. But he failed it. He was devastated. He was upset about his failure.
Drowsy. Tim had a long day at work. It was very bright and he was very tired. He couldn't keep still long enough. He laid down for a nap. By the time he woke up, he had slept like an idiot!

Holey skirt. I had on a skirt that was really high. I wore it for a wedding and my stomach fell in the mud. I tried to stand up to get out of the mud but fell on my back. It was really uncomfortable and I couldn't stand up anymore. I went home with a flat skirt instead.

Lick My Walls. When I was a teenager I had a dream to get a tattoo. In my dream, I went to the tattoo parlor to get a tattoo. The parlor's owner let me put a large lollipop on my tongue. I licked my lips to try and suck on the lollipop. After a few seconds I finally swallowed the lollipop.

The Fishing Trip. The girls went on a fishing trip. They caught many fish. They put them in baskets to take home. The girls shared the baskets with their friend. They were happy to have caught many fish.

Snacks. Cayla wanted to get into shape. She decided to begin working out every day. She would have a cup of coffee and a piece of fruit or snack. She would start with 30 minutes, and then add short breaks. At the end of the week, she had a huge energy boost.

The Lost Cellphone. I lost my cellphone on the train. I told the conductor about my phone. He checked the phone, but it was too damaged to find. I decided to buy a new cellphone. It worked better, but was not as stylish.

Incommunicado. I was sitting at home one night listening to music. Suddenly I heard my neighbor's daughter coming home from school. I asked her if she was going to school but she didn't answer. I went out to look for her and I found her. I waved to her and she waved back and they both went inside.

Paintball Challenge. Kyle was excited to go to the park for his first paintball challenge. He loved the game and decided to join. After some time, Kyle had gotten the hang of the game. He managed to score a lot of kills. Kyle had a great time at the park.

Beach Day. Amber and Mark were going to the beach on a hot and humid day. They headed over to the sand where they would have to relax for the next hour. After getting settled they ate some chips and then got ready for a day at the beach. The sun started to go down and the air cooled down. Finally they were able to relax for their next hour of fun.

Pick Me Up. I woke up one morning and felt a little off. I decided to pull over to the side of the road. I started walking to the car to get my things. The man behind me pulled out his gun and shot me. He didn't find out who I was until he was done killing me.

Video. Samantha had a video in her room to watch. She decided to watch it right away. Her friends came over to watch the video. It was funny and made Samantha laugh. She decided to watch it every night.

Related After All. Dan found out a girl in his class was in love with his ex-girlfriend. Dan decided he wanted to see her again. Dan's mother got the girls an engagement ring for the anniversary. Dan was nervous that she would not want to spend time with him. Dan's mom assured him she would and he knew she meant it.
Bad date. Lily had a bad date. She had a bad time. She decided to call it quits. She left the restaurant without a second date. Lily had to be more careful of who she dates next time.

Bird Attack. Tom was fishing with his dad one day. The two boys went out on a lake. It began to rain and the boys decided to go home. Later, Tom's father noticed that there were large birds flying around. He took the boys fishing without a problem and they were happy.

The Slide. Sam and his friends went to the pool. They went to the slide. Sam wanted to go down the slide. Sam's friends wanted to go down the stairs. Sam and his friends stayed on the bottom floor of the slide.
The dog. I wanted a new dog. I asked my friend for one. He said he'd bring one. I went to his house and he brought me a puppy. I am very happy with my new dog.

The Estimate. Tom was at the store. They were not giving him an accurate price. Tom asked if he could get a better estimate. The cashier obliged and gave him the best price he could. Tom took it home and paid with his credit card.

Mitch's Accident. Mitch was driving home after school. Mitch was going around a curve. Mitch got a flat tire on the way home. Mitch had to pull over because the tire wasn't inflated. Mitch changed the tire and drove home the rest of the way.

Strict Coach. Gina was a star volleyball player. She had a coach that liked to yell at her. One day the coach gave Gina detention. He also made her wear pink underwear all day. Gina was not pleased and her coach was fired.

Pet Snake. Bobby got a pet snake to keep him company. Bobby had no idea how to get it out of its tank. He tried a paper towel trick and then put his hand in it. The snake let him go in and out and he got the snake's food. Bobby kept his pet snake and was happy that he got a pet.
Picking up Trash. Sara had to take the trash to the street. She took the trash to the curb. The trash had spilled everywhere. She had to pick up the trash by hand. It took her an hour to get it done.

Bad Tip. John was running late for work one day. He ran down his steps and knocked his cane over. The cane shattered into a hundred pieces. John went home and fixed the cane. He felt embarrassed when he returned to work.

Taking a Chance. The Smiths decided to make a new friend. They decided to play basketball on the beach. When they got to the beach, they found a guy who had a ball. They challenged the stranger to a game of basketball. The stranger beat them both!

Camp. Bob was the camp counselor for the third year. He had not told anyone about his plans to leave. This year Bob told a counselor he would be leaving. His counselor was really disappointed in Bob. Bob knew he would not be as close to his family.

Puppy. Mimi loved animals. Her mommy had a small dog that lived with them. Mimi's mommy decided to train the dog and bring it home. Mimi was really nervous to bring home the puppy. She and her mommy took the dog home and it was a happy family.

Bathing Suit Failure. Janet had to wear a bathing suit to work one day. She didn't know how to swim. She told her boss that she was out of practice. The boss refused to change Janet's bathing suit. Janet went home with a horrible attitude about bathing.
Fire. Lane was cooking dinner. He decided to put some cheese on his hot dogs. They burned very badly. Lane had to rush to the hospital. He had burned a lot of nerves.

The lockdown scare. Lori was playing in her house. She heard a noise and went outside to check it out. Suddenly, she heard someone running around outside. She jumped on her bed and screamed. The person ran away and Lori never saw it.

Sister, Sister!. Shelly is very mean to her sister. Shelly's sister doesn't want to be mean to her. Shelly's sister has been playing pranks on her. Shelly tells her sister that her sister is sick. Shelly's sister leaves her to help her sister.

Missed Trash. I got home and found a bag of trash on the floor. I had to throw it away, as it wasn't cleaned. My neighbor said she put it in the back of the truck. I found out she had done that. I don't let anyone leave trash on the floor.

Broken Toe. My neighbor Joe was playing tennis yesterday. I decided to help him out, and we walked over to the courts. Joe was going for a serve. When Joe threw the ball, he missed the ball by a foot. Joe's toenail was broken.
On the roof. John decided to build a ladder. He needed to go over the garage roof. He started at the roof and worked his way up. Soon, the ladder was a ladder. He was proud to see it work.

Grand Canyon. Jake was traveling to his new home to visit his family. He was going to the Grand Canyon. He didn't have a car and didn't want to drive. Jake was in an airplane on a flight and got to ride the airplane. The airplane flew Jake all the way to the canyon.

Jan's Jilted Jawing. Jan had been dating her boyfriend for four years. One day they were out on a date. Jan decided to say she was pregnant. Jan's boyfriend was very mad and accused her of cheating. Jan stormed off and was very upset.

Disappointment. Tom liked his wife, but she was not as attentive. Her attention span was too short. Tom's wife began to become annoyed by her. They went to talk to each other and make things better. He was relieved to see his wife was still his favorite.

Diary. Dan has a diary that he keeps on his wall. One day while writing in his diary, he accidentally spilled a drink on it. Dan felt awful, but he had to write about it. When he was done, he found a note that said, You ruined my diary. Dan felt sad, but he knew it was for the best.
The Jury. Cora is a lawyer. She was on trial for a murder she did not commit. In court the judge read some of the evidence. Then he announced the verdict. Cora had been found not guilty.

Severe Storm. My friend and I were camping on the Appalachian Trail. A heavy rain storm hit right before we were supposed to arrive. My friend and I had no shelter. We huddled on the ground and waited for a long time. We finally huddled up but we didn't get a good night sleep.

Bad Treatment. Tim was a very bad worker. His boss didn't like him and treated him very poorly. His boss didn't notice because he didn't care about Tim. Tim tried hard to work on his attitude and his job skills. He was soon promoted and his boss accepted.
Friends. Sara and Sam didn't have any friends. Sara tried calling people, but nobody answered. Sam asked Sara to join a club. Sara joined the club. Now they have lots of friends.

Jump Rope Accident. Travis challenged his brother to a jump rope race. At first his brother was winning the race. Travis challenged him again. The race was not even close to fair. Travis broke his leg in the accident.
Fight Sleep. Tim was sleeping in. He didn't feel like cooking or reading. His dog kept barking at him. Tim finally fell asleep. The dog woke up and threw a fit at him.

perfect attendance. Lily was not at school. Her mother took her to the principal's office. The principal had Lily sit in the office all day. She took notes. Lily passed all her classes with perfect attendance.

The hide and seek winner. Jane loved hide and seek. Every day she would be at home with her favorite dolls. Jane would wait outside with them. On the way home she would find the dolls and hide. Every day Jane would win.

Mitch's Money. Mitch lost a lot of his money. Mitch had no idea what to do with all his money. Mitch asked his friends for help. Mitch's friends told Mitch to sell his possessions. Mitch sold all of his belongings for money.

Monkey See Monkey Doo. Joe bought a monkey to live at his farm. When Joe's parents were away he would have the monkey to play with. But when his parents returned Joe found the monkey had escaped. He was disappointed because the monkey had been his pet. But the next day his mother brought home a kitten with a monkey's nose.

The Kite. Liz was making some homemade kites. She wanted to teach her son how to fly one. She took him to the local park to test it out. It was pretty tough. She had to borrow a friend's kite and try again later.
Lost Keys. Tom kept missing keys. It was so frustrating. Tom's parents made him write them down. Tom began to practice at night. After a while, he was able to remember his keys.

The New Phone. Jason and his wife had just bought a new smartphone. They were very excited about it. But when they opened the box the new phone was very slow. The new phone didn't work right and they had to exchange it. Jason's wife was very unhappy and they had to get another phone.

Solar Power. I decided to learn how to do something useful with my life. I read that there are solar panels on my roof. I decided to install them. It took me all weekend to get all the panels installed. Now I get more solar power than I need.

The Leak. Cindy woke up to a loud noise. She looked outside and saw a large leak in her kitchen ceiling. She immediately called an inspector. After an hour of work, they finished fixing the problem. She was able to finish her day without any trouble.

Rex. Rex loved to read and write. He dreamed of being a writer of stories. Rex spent many hours every day writing and reading stories. He wrote a story for his mother. His mother liked the story and was very proud of him.

Emergency. I had a stroke in 2011. My friends and I went to the hospital to be treated. One of my friends came home and started to feel a twinge. We went to the doctor and he told us we had a stroke. We all made it home after waiting 3 hours for the doctor.

Quarters. Nathan went shopping for quarters at the store. When he got home, he realized he didn't have any change. He was very upset! Nathan took his phone and looked for his change. When he found it, he realized that he had lost his quarters!
My Favorite Binky. I've always loved the pink and purple binky. I had one when I was a child that was very small. One day, I saw one at a thrift store. It was my favorite. I didn't want to let it go.

Lost Puppy. Jake's mom got a new puppy for Jake. The puppy was not very active. Jake played with his dog everyday. He tried to get the puppy to move around more but he didn't. Jake's mom found the puppy and put him back in his box.

Successful Mediation for Shared Child Custody. A family wanted a child custody agreement in a court of law. It took months of negotiation to reach an agreement. Finally, after much work, they were able to agree on shared custody. They went home and spent the night. After their children came home, they went to court for a decision.
The Marathon. Jane really wanted to run a marathon. She trained hard all summer long. When it was time to run, she did great. Jane ran her first marathon. She ended up having a great time.

Wordsmith. Mitch had a speech impediment. He had been practicing for months. He went to the gym and practiced everyday. After a month he was almost ready for the test. It came and he took the test and aced it.
Floor. Bob was painting his floor. He accidentally stepped on the nail. Bob was horrified. Bob's wife yelled at him. They had to paint his whole floor instead.

Pink Underwear. I once had pink underwear. I wore the underwear out to the barber shop one night. When I got home the barber looked at my underwear. He told me he needed a new pair of underwear. I had to buy him some new pink underwear.

The Almost Revolt. The people of the village gathered at a council meeting. One member of the crowd wanted to stage a protest. They had a large meeting and a vote. To their surprise, the people did not vote to protest. Instead, they decided to simply hold off on a decision.

Stepping on a Nail. Jane was walking home from school one afternoon. Jane accidentally stepped on a nail while walking. Jane felt a pain on her foot. Jane went to the doctor. Jane had to get ten stitches to close the nail.

Cake Disaster. My friend baked a cake for the new year's party. When I took a bite, I felt weird and sick. I had a bad reaction, my face started swelling and my eyes felt red. I immediately called my mom who took me to the hospital. The doctor found out my reaction was due to a moldy cake.
Gym class. I took my son to the gym. He began to get tired in class. I gave him a pep talk. He was able to continue. He was more alert in class.

Cutting my own hair. Everyday I would cut my hair. I would try to look pretty in it but it never really worked. I tried so hard to maintain it that I cut it so short. After that I always shaved it off. Now, I look beautiful every day.

Movies with girlfriend. Diana and Sam wanted to go see a movie. Sam said he wanted to go alone. Diana said she wasn't scared but needed a friend. They found one at the local movie theater. They went to the movie with her and she loved it.
Orange Seed. I started a new garden today. It is orange color. I had a peach tree last year. I put orange seeds in it. I now have a garden of vegetables.

Not Creepy At All. A new friend was making her way through a busy hallway. She walked by a girl who seemed to be talking to her. The girl didn't notice her and continued to talk to the girl. Suddenly the girl turned around and walked off. A few seconds later she re-appeared and the girl stopped talking to her.
Nap Time. Bob went to sleep. He felt restless in his sleep. Bob put on his pajamas and went to his couch. Bob fell asleep again. He woke up feeling refreshed.

Cora. Cora has always loved to play dress up. She began working at a local mall. At her first job she saw a beautiful princess dress. She wanted to wear it and make a scene. She wore the dress and made a lot of people smile.

New Job. Kelly had just started her first job. She was excited because it was in a new state. But the company was difficult and Kelly began to hate it. She left within a week and went to a new company. The company was even harder to work with and Kelly hated it there.
Modern Dating. Tim was going on a date. He was really nervous. He could not talk at all. He did not have any confidence. Tim got nervous and the date ended.

The Paper. Bob had an idea for a fun project. He put the idea on his computer and began to type. While typing, he accidentally lost the paper. Bob's wife was frustrated and called an exterminator. The exterminator sprayed the paper and it came out okay.

Santeria. Marge wanted to try new things. She went to Santeria to learn about her cultures. They were all very different. She found them all very interesting. She was glad to try so many different cultures.

Clip. I was trying to watch the news. The clip on the tv was too violent for my tastes. I decided to skip over it. I read the next news item without looking at the clip. After that, I was much more attentive to the news.

Lost Dog. My dog likes to come running over to the kitchen table. I know I have to close the doors to block him out, but I'm not sure. I tried calling my neighbor's attention, but she didn't hear. I had to call the police to get her attention. She saw what was going on and came over to see if there was anything.
Lost Phone. Buddy was on his way to work. He lost his phone while he was walking. He could not find it. He looked in all the usual places, but could not find it. Buddy drove to his work anyway.

Neighborhood thief. Lara lived in an apartment. She found a small bag on the street. She saw that it contained many dollars. She tried to sell the money, but no one wanted it. She had to leave her apartment.

Making Lisa mad. Lisa was getting bored of the TV show. Her mom told her to watch a movie instead. Lisa didn't want to do it. Finally Lisa took a break. She couldn't stand the movie and decided to watch TV.
Frisbee. I went to the park yesterday. I decided to go to the frisbee area. The kids were playing on the swings. My dad came in the park with the frisbee. He had a fun day swinging it.

New World. Timmy was from a poor neighborhood in Miami. He wanted to move to a better neighborhood to raise his family. When he arrived in Hawaii, he bought a new house for himself. He felt proud when he moved out of his old one. Timmy and his family now lived a happy, successful life.

An Extra Treat. Kate was trying to get through the winter. Her mom decided to bake a special treat for her birthday. Kate was so excited to open the box. She tore into the treat without thinking. It was so delicious that she wanted more.

c-section. I am pregnant with a son. My husband did not want to have me c-sectioned. He thought the c-section would make the baby grow faster. I had to give birth by c-section and the baby did not grow. He eventually stopped being so mean.

Aluminum Foil Swords. Randy liked to play sword fighting. Randy decided to make some aluminum foil swords. He bought some foil and cut the foil into many pieces. He put them on each of his swords to make them fight. Randy and his friends all had fun playing sword fighting with foil swords.

Shelby goes to new york. Shelby was so happy to go to new york. She couldn't wait to see all the art and sights. Shelby got to know the new yorkers. Her family got her a nice room and free lunch. Shelby decided that she wanted to live in new york.
Kim's big test. Kim has a test tomorrow. She is really nervous. She has been studying all week. Kim starts her test. Kim passes the test.

Meatloaf. Lucy cooked up a batch of meatloaf. It was delicious. Her husband and his friends asked to have it again. She told them it was too good. She said that she wanted to try it again and they agreed.

NYC. I used to go to New York City every summer. I took tons of pictures to remember my trip. My girlfriend wanted to travel with me. She had to drive me there on a train. She was really surprised that I still had all those photos.

The Farmer's Market. Jill's mom had invited her to the farmer's market. She had never been before and this was her first. She saw some pretty flowers and some vegetables. She also bought a fresh fruit basket. It was all worth the trip to the market.

Camping Disaster. Jim was going camping with friends. The first day they set up a fire. But when it was done, they discovered they burned a lot of wood! They tried to salvage it, but it was too hard to move. Jim's friends took him home.

The Boat. A new boat had been purchased by the family. Their boat had been very small. The new boat was much larger and needed a lot of space. When they bought the boat they immediately put the storage on it. After they got it they couldn't believe the storage space.

Kind Acts. I met up with my friend yesterday. We had a lot of fun. After the party we went to a bar. I had to drink beer to forget about the things I did yesterday. My friend is going to drink some more tomorrow.

Soup Kitchen. Tom was sick of having to buy his family soup. He went to the local soup kitchen. He sat down at a table. He ordered soup and chips. He loved the food there and was glad he didn't have to buy it.
book. The man turned the page. He got distracted. He picked up a book. He left it on the table. Someone had already taken it.

New pair of louboutins. I have been wanting a new pair of louboutins. I went to the shoe store to buy a pair. The shoe store did not have any of the colors I wanted. I was so disappointed I had to leave. Now I have to wait for another pair of louboutins.

Conduit. Dan bought a water bottle from a store. He tried to carry it out his car, but the bottle was too small. Dan bought a big water bottle. He carried the big bottle into his car. Dan started the car and his water bottle was on his side.

The Snake. Gina's friends had told her to check out the pond. When she got there they told her to check out a small pond. The pond was filled with alligators. Gina ran from the pond and into the woods. She didn't get very far until she found an old RV abandoned.

The Prescription. A man went to the pharmacy to get a prescription. He asked the pharmacist if the prescription was for him. The pharmacist said it was. The man left the pharmacy. He drove to the store to buy the prescription.

The Stand. I was very bored on a Saturday afternoon. I decided to go to a nearby stand to see some live music. It was a very nice crowd and I had a lot of fun. Afterwards, I decided to just sit back and enjoy the show. After a few hours of that, I finally fell asleep.

Sleepaway Camp. Beth and her siblings went to a sleepaway camp. They lived with a couple of kids and slept on the ground. Beth had never been to a camp before. She was very bored and fell asleep in the grass. The campers had to keep an eye on her since she kept crying.

Presley. Ava had never wanted to take dancing lessons. But her mom convinced her to do so after she was taught. She was nervous, but excited when she got there. Ava loved her lessons! Soon Ava was a famous dancer!

Dog Ate My Homework. Last night my dog ate my homework. I threw it in the trash. This morning I realized I forgot to throw away the trash bin. This made me angry and upset. Now I keep the trash under the bed.

Wet Pants. John was running late for work. He took his pants and ran all the way to his car. Once he got inside he realized he forgot his water bottle. John hurried to get to work on time. It took him more than an hour to finish his shift.
Presidential Campaign. Hillary had a run for president for many years. She worked on many issues. She won the primaries. She made it to the general election. She lost by many points.

Taffy. Taffy was a baby duck who needed a place to live. She was born to a mom who had to go into the army to fight. Taffy had a rough childhood and needed someone to love. She found a little girl who loved her very much and took her home. Now Taffy is a happy duck.
Fishing Alone. I once took a fishing trip alone with no one around. I caught a few fish. I put the fish in a bucket. I brought it home. Now it's my prized possession.
magic mug. I wanted a magic mug for years. Eventually I finally got one. I love how it turns into a mug. But it's very heavy. Now I don't drink that much and I hate it.
Bluebirds. The family had a big yard. It had bluebirds nesting in the branches. The family collected and cared for them. After a while they could see them from every window. The family was amazed.

Street Fight. I went to a street fight about ten blocks away from home. I decided to get some beer and begin watching the fight. After watching the fight for several minutes I went to sleep. I awoke in the middle of the night when there was a knock at the door. It turned out that I had been the victim of a street fight.
