No Mail. Gina was sitting at home one day when she heard a knock at the door. There was no mail and she had to wait. She stood up and walked to the door. She saw that the door had been closed. She ran back inside to see if she could get the mail.

GO HOME. Jane was looking forward to the visit. She had planned a wonderful trip there. Jane spent hours waiting for her mother. Jane sat on the floor until her mother arrived. Her mother let her stay for a few days.

The Grapes. Anna and her family were on a family trip. They decided to eat out for the first time. She tried to go all night but was starving. Then they went to the fruit stand for the first time. There were a bunch of grapes and Anna had a lot of fun.

Turtle Rescue. Cara went outside to help her neighbor's turtle. The turtle had been trapped inside a house. Cara helped her neighbor release the turtle outside. The turtle was safe! Cara took her turtle home.

Coin Return. I went to a pawn shop to find a coin. I looked in the racks for a good coin. I looked again and there was a large coin. I found the coin and I returned it. I paid for the coin and I went home happy.
storm. My uncle was driving to a grocery store. A tornado warning was in effect for his town. He was told to stay in his car. In the rain the tornado sirens went off. He took the car to safety.

Ray Rides a Bike. Ray wanted to ride his bike to school. He called his friend John. They went to a local mountain bike shop. They rode their bikes to school together. Ray and John rode their bikes all the way to school.

Careful Driver. Jack had to work late one night and was very tired. He decided to drive a few miles past the traffic lights before getting home. His car stalled out in the middle of the road. It was dark and he got out to see the damage. The car had flipped on its side and he got it towed to a shop.

Backup Receiver. Charles got cut from his junior football team. He decided to try out for the varsity squad instead. On tryouts day, he ran a fast 4.52 at a sub 4 mile. After training for a week, he was cut from the varsity team. He started over with a different team and did really well.
The Dog. The man went to the park with his dog. The dog was playing in the grass. The man stepped away from the dog. The dog sniffed his foot. The dog lunged forward and bit the man.
Bike. I got a new bike for Christmas. I took it to the beach on Monday. We rode the bike around the water all day. Afterwards, I got sand in my teeth. I was not thrilled by my new bike.

Chiggers. We lived in the desert and we had some wild rattlesnakes. One day my husband picked a rattlesnake off the ground. After the snake bit him it took him a while to get better. We never saw another rattlesnake. Now he carries a plastic snake to scare them away.
Loose Shirt. Tom went to work. He put on his shirt to go to work. Tom forgot to tighten his shirt. He got a cut on his shirt. Tom was upset about the shirt.

Sounds Like The Plot To A... The kids loved to listen to a good audiobook. One day they were listening to a book about aliens and aliens. The story was filled with aliens, and aliens were scary! They told their parents it was a good read. The parents found it so convincing they gave it a five star rating.

Taken for granted. I went to the beach today. As soon as I stepped on the water I started to feel sick. I threw up my towel on the shore. When I got back to my car, I felt like I had a horrible cold. I will never go to the beach again.

Providence. I once took a road trip to Providence. I visited many historical sites. I even visited the State House. When I got home I decided to make it my new favorite city. Now I could go back often.

Funeral. Gina loved her grandma. They loved going to the park together. The park was a quiet place at the end of the street. But a lot of people would be in line. Gina knew the park was not the best place to say goodbye.

The Furry Blanket. Amy was wearing a blanket for bed. She was going to sleep in it in the night. Her dog got into the blanket. His nose brushed against Amy's face. Amy was upset she had to clean him off.

Best Present. Sammy loved to read books. One day he decided to give his friends a Christmas gift. He put them a book he had written about life in war. After his friends thanked him, he turned the book in. All the books were gone by Christmas time.
Violence isn't the answer. Tom had been drinking with friends. They started to get very rowdy. The police showed up. They took everyone to jail. Tom felt a lot better.

Pentatonix!. Tom loved heavy metal. He would listen to Metallica and other bands. When he had the chance to meet a group, he fell in love. He bought a t-shirt and waited in line to meet them. When he met them, he fell in love with them.

breakfast. Tim got up in the morning. He realized he forgot to put some eggs in his morning toast. He realized he wasn't paying attention to the time. He left the kitchen to get some eggs. Tim never forgot to put the eggs in his toast.

Fostering A Dog. Benny loved dogs more than anything. Benny's family could never afford to have him have a pet. After he passed, his parents took him to a local animal shelter. They chose a dog and Benny picked the puppy up. Benny's family is now a foster family.

The Christmas Tree. Tim was a little boy and loved trees. His parents decided to get him a Christmas tree. He couldn't wait to have a new tree. Once it was decorated, he unwrapped it. It was the cutest tree Tim had ever seen.
Sunglasses. Tom was going on a trip. He picked up sunglasses for his travels. They looked like sunglasses. Tom found out they were really expensive. He decided not to take them with him.

Landon's Lakehouse. Landon loved playing in his lake house. He would jump into the water every morning. One day, a huge storm came and destroyed his house. He went to the store to buy a new house. Now, his house is just a pile of mud.

Painting. Tom wanted to paint his girlfriend's bedroom red. He painted it too bright to be seen. The next day he went to do the same thing on his girlfriend's wall. His girlfriend found out he had painted the wrong wall. They argued and Tom didn't paint for the rest of the month.
Cheer tryouts. Allie wanted to be cheerleader. She went to tryouts and did her best. Then she got on stage. Allie got on stage and did her best. Allie got second place!
Dead Battery. Tom's television died. He could not find it. He decided to see if he could find a movie. He watched a lot of movies. His TV worked again and he was able to watch some television.

Laura's Flowers. Laura loved flowers. Her favorite flowers were roses. Laura's husband said he wanted roses as a gift. Laura thought carefully about what she wanted to give her husband. Her husband loved the roses and was very grateful.
Snack Bars. Tim wanted to eat some candy. He made a list of his favorite snacks. He found some bars in the cabinet. He decided to eat them. They were delicious.

The Sand Dollars. Jane's grandfather brought her to the beach for the first time in her life. It was so beautiful and exciting. Jane fell in love with the sand dollars. Jane couldn't wait to see her grandfather again. When she left, she left money for a beach house.

gunfire. The soldiers were on patrol. Suddenly the entire platoon heard shots. The platoon went into a fire fight. The platoon managed to hold out. Eventually the firefight was broken and the platoon left.

Branching Out. Tim's girlfriend dumped him last week. She said she didn't want to see him anymore. After a while, she didn't call him anymore. Tim's friend called him. He ended up talking to his girlfriend at his friend's house.

Bank Trip. Dan was going on his first trip to the bank. He was nervous about going to the bank in person. Dan went into the bank with his bags and waited. He had an easy time finding the teller to pay his check. Dan was not nervous anymore about his first bank trip.
Tickle. She sat there shaking. She knew she was going to get one. She kept her face turned away. She kept shaking. She was too frightened to move.
Worst musical. I saw a musical at the theatre. The musical had some bad parts. I was not prepared to see it. It was not worth the time to see it. So I decided to go home.
Rupture. John was on a long bike ride. His bike hit a rock. John's tire exploded. He called for help. They sent a mechanic to help fix the tire.
Rat Problem. I went to a party. It was being hosted by a rat. I threw a rock at the rat. I heard a loud noise. I ran away.

Taking the Dog for a Walk. I took my dog for a long walk today. The dog ran around a lot and I became worried about him. I found him the next day sitting by the edge of a bridge. He looked healthy and he was wearing a collar. I was relieved and thanked God for finding him.

Serving Time. Randy wanted to change his life. He began taking an interest in his future and career. He went to college and graduated with a degree in business. Randy decided to get his own restaurant in his town. After two years, he opened up his first restaurant.

Plan Ahead. Tom loved watching the show Star Trek. He thought that it was his favorite part of the show. Tom decided to save money for a big trip. After years of saving, he was able to buy the ticket. Tom was able to take his Trek date to space.

Closing down the A&P. Joey had to drive a long time to the corner store to buy supplies for a job interview. He was feeling impatient so he decided to skip getting his supplies. Joey didn't check his car while he was driving so he got a flat tire. When he stopped to change the flat tire he got a flat tire as well. Now Joey had to drive all the way back to his car store.
The Parrot. Joe had a parrot. One day Joe got the parrot out of the box. Joe walked up to the parrot. The parrot started to cry. The parrot had fallen out of the box and was stuck in the wall.
Spray Paint. Jane was doing a painting project. She bought some spray paint. She sprayed her walls. Then she painted the picture. Jane ended up with a nice finished painting.

Football. Jake loved to play football. He wanted to be the best at it. He played for the same team as his crush. Jake found out that he had the same interest. They fell in love and decided to be boyfriend and girlfriend.
Hair. Liza had long, thick hair. One day she decided to cut her hair. It was a lot of work, but she did it. Finally, she was happy with her new hair. Her friends were impressed by her great hair.
Putting away groceries. Kim got out of her house. She was walking to the grocery store. She was checking out. Suddenly, she tripped. Kim's groceries ended up falling on the ground.

The Piano Lesson. The piano teacher had her students practice a difficult piece for an upcoming competition. The kids practiced for over an hour. She gave the students a score on how many times they hit the notes. The teacher announced the winners and all the kids were very surprised. The teacher said she was surprised the kids got it wrong.
Foggy problems. Allie loved to go to the beach. So she went all day. But she never got anywhere. Then she saw it. She had a foggy memory.
Space Heater. I went to see a movie with my boyfriend. I wanted to get comfortable. I turned the temperature up to 100 degrees. We got very hot in the theater. I got so hot, I had to take a break.

Lost. The man fell from his truck. His wife helped him out of the truck. He got help from his friend. His friend got in trouble for not having a flashlight. The man asked his friend if he had a flashlight.

The Field. When I was a kid I always wanted to play in the field. I went to my grandpa's house and asked him if I could play. He agreed to let me. He told me it was his field and I could play in it. I played for a few hours and went home.

Slump. Amy always wanted to be a movie star. Her friend, who worked as a director, recommended an actress for an upcoming movie. Amy had never acted, but she wanted to try. She practiced all night and learned the lines perfectly. Her audition was the best she had ever had!
Allergic to Cats. Tom wanted a pet. He tried to get a cat from the pet store. There were none to be found in his neighborhood. Tom decided to get a kitty instead. Tom's cat died within days after.

A spill in the bag. Allie had just bought some ice cream. She was trying to carry it to the car when the bag slipped. Allie lost the bag on the way. Then she noticed it wasn't in her car at all. Luckily, her husband had come along and retrieved it.

Cooking is Important. Sammy decided he wanted to start cooking more often. He decided to buy a cookbook full of good recipes. He practiced very hard to become an expert cook. When he went to eat out with friends, he made the best food ever. He told all of his friends that he is a great cook!

Book. I was reading a novel yesterday. The author had left it out for a while. I kept forgetting about it. I finally remembered and read it all the way through. I was very satisfied with how the book ended.

Mountain. Sam was riding in his new mountain bike. He was running out of gas. He ran out of power and his bike wouldn't move. Sam fell off and lost control of his bike. Sam had to get help from other riders.

Todd's First Bike Ride. Todd was a kid who loved to ride his bike. When he was thirteen years old, he went to the local store. There, he purchased a big bike for himself. On his first bike ride, Todd rode at full speed for miles. After riding for hours, Todd decided that he would ride a bike more often.
Dress caught. I went shopping at Macy's. I bought a dress. I didn't tell anyone. When I got to work the next day my dress was gone. I asked everyone and no one knew I went shopping.
Dollar Store. Nola bought some candy at the dollar store. She ate half of the candy. She then threw it all away. She decided to buy some more candy. Nola ate the candy and threw it away as well.
Losing balance. Lucy was playing on the swing. She was falling and tripped over a branch. She landed on the floor. She looked up and saw her friend crying. Her friend was upset but Lucy was okay.

Kujata. I took a trip to the Pacific Northwest in 2013. My friends and I drove from Seattle to Portland. There was a lot of nature in the area we drove to. The scenery was beautiful. I really hope to visit the Pacific Northwest again soon.

Biking. Mike and his buddies wanted to do something adventurous. They went to their local park and put on a race. The boys rode all around the park and had a blast. They were so excited when it was time to turn around. But after turning around, the boys found the park closed.

Checker Floor. Tommy was playing checkers at his home. He threw the ball too far and it hit the checker floor. The entire floor was covered in paint. Tommy was mad at the whole house but he didn't hurt anyone. He cleaned up the mess before anyone noticed.
fridge. Bob was a very lazy man. He bought a really old fridge. It would break and was really old. It didn't have any air filters. Bob bought a brand new one.

Pool. Tom was bored and wanted to relax in the ocean. Tom decided to go to the beach. Tom brought his surfboard along with him. Tom climbed the ladder to the top of the pool. Tom enjoyed the ocean breeze while soaking in the sea breeze.

Wires. Kathy was running late for work. She had to get to work quickly, so she needed to get her car's tires changed. She grabbed a bunch of the supplies from her garage. Then she ran out the front door, hoping her car wouldn't be stolen. Just as she came out of the house, her keys popped out and she ran!

Dream Team. John wanted to play soccer. So he took his friends to the local park. They played soccer and had a blast. He ended up being on the championship team! He wanted to be on that team every week.

Sara's Big Move. Sara is about to leave her childhood home for college. She is going to a new college town with a lot of new people. Sara loves her new community and school. She spends every day meeting new people and making new friends. Sara is very happy that she moved away from her childhood home.
Not Solid. I started smoking a cigarette. It took a lot of puffs for it to go down. I didn't notice until I had to take a hit. I smoked the rest of the cigarette. I felt much better.

Metal in a Microwave. Bob was cooking dinner. He used a metal spatula to mix up the veggies. The metal spatula slipped from his hand. It shattered and burned Bob's hand. Bob had to stop cooking his meal right then.

Operation Table. Eli's boss had the office set up a table for his workers. The table was very hard to set up. It took Eli two hours to get it set up. The manager apologized to Eli. Eli was able to move forward with his work.

Crayons. Joe's teacher had given them crayons for recess. But Joe had no crayons. Joe decided to draw on the walls with crayons instead. And Joe learned to use markers instead of crayons. He learned to draw better.
Philip Got Punched. Philip was on the school bus. It was going fast. He began to fight with the other kids. Eventually Philip got punched. He fell down and hit his head.
The earthquake. The earthquake happened at 3 AM. It had been going on for a long time. It finally hit one house. The whole family was in the house. Everyone was safe.

The Train Delay. Gina and her friends were getting on a train for the first time. She was scared the trip would be bumpy. On the way out the train stalled. Luckily the driver didn't mind so Gina was safe. She went on the train with her friends.

Cells. When I was in college, we used to have a lab. We had many different cell types. One day, a scientist came by with some very strange cells. He was a physicist, and they were very strange. We gave him one and he was very glad to help.
Glass down. The kids were in the kitchen. They wanted a drink. The mom suggested an ice cream sundae. The kids happily ate their ice cream. But then they all became sick and went to the bathroom.

Family Vacation. They packed their bags and made their way to their hotel. They unpacked everything they brought. The car got a flat tire on the way to the hotel. They had to pull into the garage. They cleaned the tire and got back on the road.

Megan Makes A Fire. Shelly decided to build a fire in the fireplace. Shelly set up the fireplace and put some charcoal on the ground. She put on her gloves and a bucket of water. Shelly used her lighter to get the fire going. The fire began to grow strong and big.
Lost Game. Tom was playing pool. He was losing badly. Suddenly, a ball hit Tom in the head. He fell down on the ground unconscious. Tom's friends called an ambulance.

Thanks for the Pictures. I went to my friends house and took them out for a picnic. My girlfriend's family took us out. My family took pictures. My girlfriend got a lot of pictures. Thanks for all the pictures.
David loses his wife. David is playing tennis with his friends. David begins to lose control of the ball. David reaches for a tennis ball. He drops it on his wife. David loses his wife.

Cheap Frames. A woman went to buy a new house. She bought cheap framed pictures from a store. She got them framed in the front and back. She put them up in the windows of her new house. It made the house look much more modern.
New Job. Tom had just started at a new job. He was very nervous about starting so young. He worked very hard at his first day. He became comfortable with the job. Tom was very happy he had started.

Chris. Chris has been in detention. He is not allowed to have lunch. He is going to be late for lunch. Chris gets dressed, but cannot eat until his parents arrive. Chris's parents leave the detention room before they arrive.

I'm Not A Cry Baby. In third grade, there was a test on the last day. The teacher gave us a list of three questions to ask. I picked the first three questions and I was asked if I'm a cry baby. I lied and told the teacher I wasn't crying. I was asked to go to the bathroom since it was a bad test.
The Sunburn. Janet was in a beach pool one night. Her mom wanted to take her to the bathroom. The sand was so hot the whole time. Janet kept getting sunburned. She had to go home to change.

Partner. When I was younger, I used to babysit my neighbor's sister. She was 12 years old and she was really loud. One day she wouldn't stop hitting the walls. I had a long talk with her mom and she learned her lesson. Now, my neighbors sister has never hit the walls in her life.

Drive Away!. Nell's car was running low on gas. She tried to call for help, but there was no one nearby. Instead, she pulled into a gas station. Nell put on her hazard lights and waited for help. When a stranger came, Nell called for him to leave her alone.

They all ditched him. Kirk was a big soccer fan. So he went to a big soccer game. Kirk went on a team that only had a couple kids on it. He was shocked to see how competitive they were. But after the game, the kids were having a lot of fun.

Do the Right Thing. My friend and I were playing basketball. The game was going really well. Suddenly, my ball got stuck on a rock. I had to call a taxi. Luckily they had a car that could come pick me up.
Buying a cell phone. When I was 18 years old I got a cell phone. I bought a new iPhone. I loved it. Then I had a stroke. I was no longer able to have the phone.

Garden. Sheila wanted to have a garden. She planted all kinds of seeds in her garden. When the summer came around, she picked the seeds from the ground. Her garden grew up into a beautiful park. Sheila enjoyed her new garden and planted another garden.

Jan pays rent. Jan needed to pay her rent. So she looked online to find some options. She found that she was able to apply online. So she applied and now her rent was paid. Jan was proud of herself for working online.

Skip has dreams. Skip never thought he'd have such a successful career as a comic book artist. Skip was asked by DC to draw a new character and was given a budget. Skip drew a few pages of an original graphic novel and submitted it to DC. Skip's new project was rejected as being too generic. Skip then had the idea to draw the new character from scratch and now has a following.

Dad's Secret Profession. Charles was an engineer for an oil company. He worked at the site every day, and loved his job. One day, a young man was walking by the site when a pipe fell. Charles was sent by his boss to investigate the pipe. He was sent to investigate a large pipe on top of the oil field.
The Pillow. Janet was sleeping. She got a big comforter. She rolled it up for her. She tucked it in her nightstand. Janet was so tired after that!

First Football Game. Jax loved football. His mom told him not to play in the football game. Jax made his mom mad by saying he would play. Jax's mom was upset he made his mom mad. She never let him play again.

Falling in the Handstand. I decided to take a break. My trainer asked me to try to walk in a handstand. I tried walking into a standing position. The first one was easier than the other one. But I felt my ankle buckle after the second one.
The Flu Shot. Janet was feeling sick. So she got a flu shot. She felt so much better after. But, she was sick to her stomach for another day. Janet was so embarrassed.
Grass In The Bed. Tom was out with friends. His friend wanted a new carpet. He decided to replace his old bed with grass. Tom hated how it looked. He didn't let it affect his sleep that night.

Nervous Mom. Kelsey was pregnant and didn't have a boyfriend. She decided to meet her boyfriend during the night. She met him at a restaurant. He was very nervous and kept looking away. Kelsey decided not to meet him again after that.

Saint Patrick's Day. I decided to throw a party on Saint Patrick's Day. I decided to have a small party with some friends. When we got there, everyone was Irish. Everyone was celebrating their favorite holiday. When I served them their favorite meal, they thanked me.

Dust. Tom was washing his apartment. He ran the dishwasher and noticed a lot of dust. He cleaned it but kept getting more dust. He tried to run the vacuum but the dust was everywhere. Tom had to buy a new vacuum for his apartment.

Popcorn. My friends and I liked to watch movie previews. They usually featured lots of new and interesting movies. Yesterday, we were watching the previews for another new horror movie. We were having a great time, until the movie started and it got creepy. I wish we hadn't stopped watching previews, as it was quite scary.

Ninety Years Old. Barry lived his entire life in a cabin in the woods. He loved nature very much. One day, a scientist told Barry that the cabin was haunted. Barry was terrified and moved to a small town. Now, Barry has passed away.
Hot Water. Tom was cooking dinner. He got too full. He had to go to the restroom. Tom forgot to put the water in the microwave. The water burned his food.
Bad Donuts. I went to an ice cream parlor with my family. The donuts were terrible. My cousin came with some coffee. We drank several donuts. I then ordered a coffee.

Right Racquet. I was having a tennis match against my best friend. I was getting frustrated and thought I could not win. I went out to grab the racquet and my foot slipped and I fell. I fell on the court. My friend was amazed, he picked me up and I went back to the court.
Taxes. I needed to get my car fixed. So, I called the plumber. The plumber asked me if I had insurance. I told him I did. The plumber fixed my car for me.

Bad consequence. Benny was playing with his friends. His friends decided to do an ill-advised prank. They sprayed dye in Benny's hair. It made him sick. Now, Benny is very nervous and is very careful at all times.

Friend of a Friend. Ben is not fond of his high school friend. Ben feels they never communicate much. Ben went to his high school and asked if he could be his friend. Ben was able to talk to his friend for many hours. Ben and his friend are no longer friends.

Domestic Violence. Sally went to pick up a pizza. She picked up a large one. It was an unhealthy slice. When she returned it was gone. She asked the owner but he told her that it was his and to stop complaining.

The Cops. Dennis has been arrested for shoplifting at the supermarket. His lawyer was angry and said he could not get a lawyer. He asked for bail and a public defender. When the prosecutor said Dennis was poor he offered to drop the charges. He received a $20 fine and a public defender.
Prayer. My brother is a Presbyterian. His church has a lot of prayer spaces. He does not go to a lot of them. My brother went to one yesterday. It was a great space.

Puppy Race. Jade and her sister had decided to have a race. They would pick a dog out of a basket at the pound. Then they would race them around the house. It was very exciting to watch the two dogs. The two dogs ended up winning their own races.

Movie Night. Nancy invited her friends over for a movie night. After everyone checked in, they all decided on a movie. Nancy was upset when the movie didn't end up being good. After the movie ended, she had no choice but to go home. Her friends all had a good time at the movie night.

Turning The Drone Against Him. Mark was an avid gamer. He had a great collection of videogames. One day he decided to hack into his videogame system. He found a lot of money inside of the system. Mark decided to turn that money into a business.

Holy Frame. Nate was doing a construction project in his church basement. He used a metal frame to support the roof. The frame broke in several places and Nate's tools fell out. He tried to fix it himself, but it was too hard to do. He decided to replace the frame and hope for the best.

Golf. I wanted to play some golf yesterday. I drove to the course, and it was very busy. After a long time of trying, I finally got up to play. It took me an hour and a half to get ready. I lost to an expert golfer.
The Miscalculation. Barry was a farmer. He went out for a hayride with his son. Barry drove his truck off the hayride. The truck ended up falling on Barry's foot. Barry ended up breaking his foot.

The Book. Mary had been saving up money for a long time. She finally decided to buy a new book. It wasn't much but it was worth it. Mary read the book and loved it. She now read several books every week.

Arranging the place cards. Today I wanted to play some card games. I started by arranging the cards into a neat pile. I also put a marker and a ruler in the center of the pile. The pile was arranged so that the marker would fall to the floor. The games were arranged so that I would get to choose what to play.
Dog. Cara wanted a dog. She asked her parents if they could get one. Her parents agreed. Cara took her first dog home. Now she is a happy dog!

Trading Lunches. Cindy and her coworkers are eating lunch. Cindy's coworkers have decided to give her lunch money. Cindy feels bad about not being able to trade for her lunch. She and her coworkers agree to split the money equally. The lunch money ends up being enough to help Cindy out with her bills.

An Unexpected Rodent. My neighbor's dog had a huge knot on the bottom of his throat. My dog did not like the knot. He had a ball that was used to tie the knot. His knot was coming out of his mouth and getting stuck on my fence. My neighbor helped me put the ball back in his mouth.

Game Night. Jill invited her friends over to play games. They played Monopoly and Scrabble. Jill was the smartest of the three. She won the Monopoly game by 3 points! The three of them had a great time playing games that night.

Unsweetened. Remy got some free sample chocolate. He loved it and asked for a second. But then he realized he already had two. So he decided to buy unsweetened chocolate. He was upset that the second chocolate was too sweet.

Graduation. John was graduating high school. His mother took him to his graduation ceremony. It was the most emotional moment he'd ever experienced. He wanted so badly to go to a party with all his classmates. That was the only moment he wished he had graduated.

Kobe's Last Game. Kobe was playing in a basketball game. He shot a 3 pointer. The crowd cheered and clapped when he made it. Kobe was so happy that he couldn't hold back his emotions. Kobe jumped to his feet and clapped again and smiled at his fans.
The Passports. Lacey was visiting family in Paris. She wanted to travel to the city. She wanted to travel to get new passport. She got to the airport and checked in. Lacey loved her new passport!
Boston Trip. John was going on a trip to Boston. It was his first time there. He planned ahead and brought plenty of cash. John got some good food. He went and had a good time.

Army. I went off to fight in the war. I was not told to wear the uniform. I did not realize it was a requirement until I got home. The uniform made me ashamed to be an American. I had to hide my true patriotism.

ADHD. My son's friend is autistic. He likes to talk and cry. Last week I noticed that he talked about my daughter on Facebook. I was very upset because he is only six. Now he is doing well and I am happy.
Bad Friends. My friends wanted to visit the beach. We decided to go to the beach on Saturday. At the beach, we got very wet. My friends did not like that. We had to go home.

The Fabric. Linda was trying to make a dress. She was trying on different patterns and designs. Suddenly, her grandma pulled her aside. She offered to buy her fabric. Linda was so excited, she bought a dozen of fabric!

New lab gig. Tina's friend wanted her to be his assistant. She wanted her to come work in his lab. Tina refused. Tina's friend came back to ask her to help. Tina got her first pay check for teaching science.

Fitness Competition. The gym had a fitness competition this weekend. A girl from New York had won first place. The rest of the girls were all nervous. She was the top scorer. The next week she challenged her to a rematch.

Gas and Money. Jake went on a camping trip. He took his sleeping bag and a blanket. The rain began to pour down. Jake took his sleeping bag from the tent. Jake didn't get the chance to sleep because of the rain.

My new Sister. My sister, Lucy, has always been pretty quiet. Today, she sat by herself while her sister was out with friends. I told Lucy she was an annoying child, but she didn't care. She made a new friend, a really nice girl named Mandy. Now Lucy, and the other girls, think I'm a lot more like my mother.

Street of 3G. My neighbor has a 3G cell phone. I could see his location by just looking at his profile picture. I saw a guy walking in front of him at night. I thought he was an undercover cop. I ended up getting a warrant.

Peanut butter and jelly. I used to love peanut butter and jelly. One day, i decided to make my own peanut butter and jelly. I used a lot of different ingredients. I ate a lot of the homemade peanut butter and jelly. Now i no longer like peanut butter and jelly.

Tickets in Texas. My friends and I went to Texas on a road trip. We saw our first stadium in person. We saw the stadium during a big game. We left the stadium and rode the bus home. We finally had our tickets to the game.

Moses Went to Church. Moses was not religious. He was just going to church. But when he got to church, he heard about a man he knew. The man was sick and they prayed for him. The man prayed so that Moses would cure his illness.

Bathing suit. Sally had just gotten into the pool. She hadn't put on her bathing suit yet. She quickly put on a bathing suit. The water felt so nice under her skin. She couldn't wait to wear the bathing suit.

The Wholesale Club. Holly was going to meet a friend in town for a business meeting. She didn't have a car so she took a taxi. She got to the meeting and it was much farther than she expected. She got lost for hours. She ended up having to ask for directions.

The New Kid. Jenny had just moved to the city. She knew no one and her friends were nervous. They didn't understand her but tried to be friendly. She gave them advice and they understood. Jenny helped them start their own groups and become friends.

Football Pals. My college roommate and I used to play football. We practiced our skills every day after school. One day we met in a small park and played. We played hard but also well. We went out to a restaurant afterwards for lunch.

Babysitting nightmare. Allie babysat her grandpa while he was in the military. One night her grandpa came home and his mom was out of town. Allie was sad when she didn't get to watch her grandpa. Her grandpa came back to visit and Allie got to spend the night with him. Her grandpa was very thankful for her.

A Used Car. Tom's wife bought a new car. It was a used car and needed work. Tom went to the mechanic to do the work. Tom gave the mechanic his number and he picked up the car. Tom never forgot to change the oil again.

Tyler's huge mistake. Tyler is a homeless man. He recently got some money from a bank and needed some food. He went down to the corner store to buy a few items. Tyler was walking back to his car when he saw an old woman. He decided to help her and left his money on the table.

Marco Makes His Bed. Marco has to make his bed for work. He sets out a bed sheet and covers his pillow. Marco makes a pillow and lays down to relax. Marco makes a pillow and lays down to relax. Marco is ready for work the next day.
New Shoes. Jared needed new shoes. So he decided to go shopping. While he was at the mall, he noticed a shoe store. The shoe store was great. But he decided to just buy sneakers.

Off to the Races. The first few races went fairly well. But then it started to rain really hard. The next race started and it started to rain a lot more. By the time the next race started it was really hard to keep my head up. I wound up finishing the race in 15th place.
Rent. Tom lived in an apartment. One day the apartment's rent was due. He didn't have enough money to pay. He had to move out of his apartment. Tom was sad to leave his apartment.

Celebrity sighting. My friends went to the beach on Friday. I was waiting in line to go down the beach. I had a few beers with friends. I went to the beach and saw a celebrity. They walked into my line and I started watching them.

The Long Bike Ride. I decided to go for a long bike ride on my bike path one day. After about two miles I was very tired and ready to stop. I was about to turn back when I saw a deer walk by. I decided to keep going to go get lunch. After I got back on my bike, I couldn't believe how long I rode it!
Ticket. Tim had a work party. He forgot his ticket at home. He got there a bit late. He spent the rest of his time trying to find it. He ended up missing the whole thing.
Rent Money. Tom rented a room. It was not his own. Tom needed money. He borrowed some money from the landlord. He paid the rent and enjoyed the hotel.
The Rain. Bill was camping on a nearby lake. His tent was soaked in water. Bill's friends all offered to come over to help. Bill refused. He was more afraid of what they'd do to his tent.

Fake. She put her favorite makeup on and looked in the mirror. She felt confident and confident that she looked her best. She went to work and left the mirror after an hour. She couldn't believe how bad it looked. She had actually put fake eyelashes on.

Final Moments. Cora was about to enter a gymnastics competition. She thought she was in control, but then a trick didn't go right. She had to start over from the beginning. Cora landed on her feet, but she couldn't keep balance. She fell down, crying out for help.

Kitty Keeper. When we were kids, we used to love to play fetch with our toys. We got a cat to help us, but she didn't want to leave her bed. We sat down, and she started to eat from my bed. We didn't tell her not to do that, but we couldn't get the cat to stay. She did it and we're all happier for that.

Sleep. Gina's dad had gone to sleep. He would not awaken until late in the morning. Gina's mom was tired of waking him. She decided to put the alarm on the refrigerator. She called Gina and let her know she needed to wake up.

Mechanic. Joe loved cars. He was always asking for a mechanic. One day he decided to get his own place to work on cars. When he started his business he made some really cool cars. Joe is really happy that he got a mechanic.

Too Many Dogs. Tim hated his neighbor's dog. His neighbor had had so many dogs he couldn't keep track. Tim decided to have him killed. His neighbor was shocked when he found out. Tim was forced to pay for the killing.

George visits the comic book store. George was on vacation in New York. George decided he would visit the comic book store. He parked his car at the comic book store. George got out of his car. George walked over to the comics and bought a few comics.

Rick Nick and the Bee. Rick went camping with his dad. He and his dad were out on a hike. A small bee jumped on Rick and stung him. Rick was terrified and went home in tears. Rick decided he wasn't going to ever hike alone again.

Painting. Amy hated the fact that her bedroom walls were painted blue. But she couldn't paint them herself. Her mom bought paint to buy a job. She did a great job, and the walls were finally blue. Amy was so proud of her mom's labor.
Food. Sue likes to eat vegetables. She only eats them as a side dish. One day, Sue noticed a can of peas. Sue decided to try it out. It is the best vegetable soup ever!

Climate Change. John bought a sweater with climate change on it. The man at the counter told John not to wear the sweater. When John went to the store to return it, the sweater was gone. A man named Jim said the sweater was from him. John was offended by the name.

Cancelled. It had been a tough week at work, and Tim was feeling down. After work, Tim went home to cry alone. After a few hours, Tim decided that he was going to quit. Tim felt very relieved. With his new found determination, Tim made the change he wanted to.

Parade. The town was getting ready for the parade. They were having a big parade and it was big. They had a great time and everyone made it to the end. The big parade was over and the town was exhausted. Everyone was ready to move on to the next event.

Mexican Restaurant. I once went to a Mexican restaurant. I ordered three burritos. I then asked the server to mix my drink. The drink ended up being very strong. Therefore, I had to throw it out and order another.
Lost. John didn't know what to do. He had no friends. One day a girl he liked called him. She was talking about going to the store. She was going to the grocery store.
New Printers. My printer broke. I had to get it repaired. It took me two weeks to get it done. Finally, my printer was repaired. It cost me a lot more money to repair.
Dress Code. Gina was told to put on a dress by the principal. She didn't understand why. She knew she didn't wear a dress. She was asked to put on a skirt. Gina was confused and made fun of.

A baby's fall. Janet was cleaning her house one night. She heard a baby crying in the corner. She went to check on the baby. She found the baby's head under the couch. Janet felt terrible and helped the baby.

Frozen Food. Tim had to take a test on how to make hamburgers. Tim decided to make his own meat. He cut up some ground beef and some veggies. He then cooked the ground beef for an hour. Tim enjoyed his homemade hamburgers.

Friends of Mine. My friend is not very religious. One day we were driving around New York together. I got a phone call from my friend's mom. I felt weird hearing my name called in her ear. I had to walk back to my car and change.

Affair in Storage Room. My wife's sister-in-law lost her job this week. I saw an old album in the garage that was her old collection. I told my wife I thought it was her. She told me the man I saw with the album was her son. I told her she might want to clean up the garage.
Ultrasound. Kylie got a new baby. She had to get it checked for babies. She had an ultrasound. It showed some issues. It was very expensive to fix.

Running out of time. Bobby is a fast runner. He challenged his friend to a race. The friend accepted the challenge. Bobby felt bad that he wasn't as fast as he should be. So Bobby decided to take a break and do other things instead.
Jogging at the park. Tom was bored. He wanted to go for a jog. Tom walked to the park. He started walking around. He got lost and had to go back home.

Abandoned Home. Mark's house was burglarized. He realized his wife left the house. She wasn't home when the alarm went off. Mark called 911 to report the incident. They sent an officer to Mark's house.

secret. The secret to success was to have no friends. A man would get so discouraged that he stopped eating food. One day a friend got an envelope. The man opened it to find a letter from a girlfriend. The man decided to eat again.

The Horse. Sara decided she wanted to go horseback riding with her friends. She and her friends met up at a friend's place. The friends set up their saddles and saddles. Sara was very nervous. When the day came, Sara rode the best horse ever.

Imaginary Boat. Tommy always wanted to ride on an imaginary boat. His friend asked him to be his captain. He agreed and bought the boat and a boat kit. They got their boat together and went to the lake. Tommy's parents were thrilled when they saw them at the lake.
Waitress. Kim hated her job as a waitress. She got a job at a coffee shop. She became friends with a cute boy named Dave. Dave had a crush on Kim. Now, Dave and Kim date!
Broken arm. Tim was playing football. All of a sudden his arm got caught on the fence. Tim had to get medical attention. Tim had to get an X-ray. Tim's arm was broken.
Lost Tooth. Tom was on a hike. Suddenly, he heard a snap. He pulled his tooth out and saw that it was pulled completely out. He put it under his pillow. He never lost a tooth again.

Bad Dog. Bobby went to the dog park one day with his dog. He thought he had lost his dog. But then he noticed that the dog had gone! Bobby ran all the way back home with his dog. Bobby never went dog-park again.
Flee. Sam was playing outside. He heard a scary noise. He looked around and saw a bear in the field. Sam screamed and ran inside his house. He never went outside again.

Bad Skyler. Skyler had taken the bus all day. She was so exhausted she did not want to stay at home. She had to take a cab back to her dorm. When she got back she decided to eat a hamburger. She was not happy to have to stay at home and eat.

Dog's Behavior. My dog, Jake, had trouble getting along with other dogs. One day Jake got too loose and ran up a tree. Jake was very injured and was carried down by the branches. He had to wait for help, but he was brought to the vet, where he was healthy. We are very thankful for his patience, and will keep an eye on him.
Too many kids. I was at the park one day. I got a bunch of my friends together. We were all in one park. I asked everyone to move out of the way. Then I had to run home.
Saving a cookie. Today was the fifth of July. My friends and I wanted to eat some food. We decided to go to a restaurant. We ordered three cookies. We ate them, but had a small tummy ache.

The Old Man. The man looked old. He had gray hairs on his face and eyebrows. His wife decided to surprise him. She put on a fake mustache and put a big smile on his face. The old man was surprised and fell in love with the fake mustache.
Computer. The man turned his computer on. It wasn't working. He tried to call the company. He did not have a phone. He realized that he had to order a new computer.

new kid. Duke's class had a new kid in the class. Duke tried to help him a little. He helped him get used to his new environment. He also gave him some new toys to play with. The new kid liked the new kid.

bored. Anna needed some help with her schoolwork. She was always in a group and had no friends of her own. But she didn't know who to ask for help. So she looked online and found a group of people to ask. She went to the group and met other girls to join.

Fire. Josie and the family were all very scared of the fire. There was a fire alarm in the house that night. The fire started at the kitchen stove. The entire house burned down. The Josie family was all very thankful.

Dive Bar. Tasha had recently joined the volleyball team at her school. She had always wanted to try out for the diving team, but it was difficult. She got to try out and she did really well. Tasha and her teammates competed in the finals at the club. She ended up winning and got to try out for the diving team.
Terrible Name. The family decided to get a new pet. They went to the pet store. They chose a dog named Barney. The dog was rather mean and annoying. The family decided to get a cat instead.
A Towel. The baby was feeling gross. She was laying in bed. She wanted to feel clean. She laid down in a towel. She stayed dry from then on.

Dang Cat. My wife got a new cat for our 2 year old granddaughter. She had seen her mother with a cat, so she liked the cat. The cat scratched her one day, and now the cat scratched her. We talked to the vet, who said she was allergic to cats. I gave the cat away to the humane society.

Target. Sally was at the grocery store. She decided to get eggs for breakfast. She noticed she had the wrong size. So, she went back to the store and asked for the right size. The cashier made her a new order.

The Eater. Marlene was a hungry woman. She ordered herself a burger and fries from a local burger joint. She sat at a table and waited for her order. Her order finally came. She ate her delicious meal without a single complaint.
Walk. Sam was walking home from the store. He noticed someone in a store with a gun. Sam ran inside the store. The person with the gun turned out to be a police officer. Sam was grateful to be safe.

Performing a concert. My boyfriend took me to see his favorite band in person. I couldn't believe that my ears were so big. We drove so fast it felt like the car behind us was stopping. He said the band was great and everything was perfect. When we got home we decided we had to do it again.

Janitor Job. Janitor Dave hates doing the same thing over and over. Dave decides to give his friends a hard time to teach them. Dave has trouble with his friends. Dave doesn't have a job. Janitor Dave starts out as a janitor.
Jack's Dog. Jack and his dog were going sledding. The dog ran off after Jack fell off. Jack was upset. He decided to keep the dog. Jack bought a new dog for the dog.

Cleaning the yard. Sammy loved being outdoors. He always went outside to play. However, he hated cleaning up after himself. His mother made him start washing his own clothes. Sammy now enjoys cleaning after himself.
He will pay. I was at my brother's house. His mom was playing video games. I decided to help her out. We decided to make some video games. We won tons of money that night.

Swing Time. John and Tim were friends since third grade. John would always play outside on his swings. John had a hard time using the swings because of his weight. John decided to change the equipment in the house. Now, Tim plays baseball outside on his swings.

Jeff's A Lost Cause. Jeff lost his job because of the economy. He decided to look for work. Jeff searched everywhere for work. Jeff was discouraged because he couldn't find any work. Jeff was diagnosed with a depression and he quit his job.
Old diary. The boy opened up an old diary. He wrote out his thoughts. He was having nightmares. He put the diary away. He was finally tired of his dark thoughts.

Christmas lights. Lily's friends wanted her to make them Christmas lights. Lily didn't know what to make. She looked online to get some ideas. She settled on a pretty plain white Christmas tree. Her friends were very pleased with their new decorations.
The Appointment. Kim wanted to get a flu shot. Her doctor said she could wait until Friday. Kim felt sick the day of her appointment. She decided to go home instead. Kim went to the doctor instead.
Pajamas. I took my son to the mall. We walked to several stores. He tried on clothes for the first time. He was wearing a pair of striped pajamas. He told me the pajamas looked too good to be true.

The warning. Riley was playing outside with her friends. She heard a loud honking noise. She got out to see what it was. It was a motorcycle accident! She ran inside to let her parents know what had happened.

The Old Roller Coaster. The old roller coaster that was up near our house was getting old. We needed to find something new. We had to look up some other old rides. One of them we could not get to. It was too close and we couldn't find it.
Big Test. Tim took a test. He had no idea what he was doing. He kept messing up. Eventually he had to call his mom. He passed the test but felt awful about it.
Bonding Time. Timmy was playing in the yard. A puppy ran up to him. It was trying to lick Timmy's face. Timmy was scared. He ran as fast as he could to tell his mom about the puppy.

Adler. Adler is a black cat who lives in the city. Last week he ate the lunch of a young girl. The girl was very upset, and brought the police. The police arrived shortly after. Adler was immediately taken to the pound.

The Castle. Tim and Beth took a trip to Ireland. They went to see the local castle. It was massive and very impressive. It also looked like it belonged to a movie. The girls had a great time at the castle!

New dog. A new dog was adopted from a shelter. He immediately started barking and growling. The dog was small and seemed scared. He could not go into a kennel until he was calm. He was a great addition to our family.
No Donuts. Lila got a free donut from the vending machine. She put it in her mouth. She couldn't figure out why. She was having trouble eating it. She had to put it in her bag.

Buying another car. Jane needed to buy another car. She looked at all the cars in her neighborhood. She decided to go for a test drive. After a while, Jane decided to buy a different car. Jane drove to the dealership and purchased the different car.

Wood Wins. Today I watched a woodworking competition on TV. I won the second place in the competition. I was very proud of my work. My mom told me that the next time I make a project, I'll be better. Now, I'm happy that I showed off my woodworking skills.
Snorkeling. Tina wanted to learn to snorkel. She looked up videos online. She bought a scuba mask. She snorkeled for two hours. Her friend complimented her on her skill.
Randy gets the girl. Randy is at a bar. He starts to talk to a girl. The girl hits him back. Randy gets in a big fight. He ends up getting arrested.

Steve Becomes Just Like The Others. Steve was at the grocery store. But the prices were too high. And when he went to pay, he found out it was the same as the others. Steve began to wonder why the others had the same prices. But then he remembered that he liked the food there too.

Frombo. My brother had a large dog named Frombo. Frombo was a very mean dog. He would not stop barking at everything he saw. One day my brother told Frombo to stop barking. Frombo stopped barking when he heard my father calling Frombo.

Responsibility. I needed some help with the computer. So I called up some friends to help. My friends showed up an hour later. They worked hard and were not too tired. We were able to finish within an hour.

Major Regret. Amy's mom asked her to stay after school after class. Amy's mom took her shopping. Amy got a brand new pair of pants. She felt great about them. Her mom was not pleased when she found out.

Deer Huntress. Lana wanted to be a hero. She was hunting for deer at night. She came across a large herd of deer. Lana was able to shoot three deer in the head. She was able to scare the rest of the deer off.

Self Esteem. Tim was a college student and wanted to make sure he wasn't doing anything stupid. He started his online school of education and did his best. Then he began to see what the real job market was like. Tim got a great job offer to do what he liked for a lower salary. Tim was happy he'd saved up all that money.

Ross The Gamer. Ross had a problem with his parents not being as fun as he was. He had a lot of anger issues and tried a lot of therapy. Eventually, he gave up and decided he would just go to live with his parents. Ross moved in with them and they became very fun and happy. His parents and he became close friends.

Cherries Jubilee. The cherries had grown to full bloom. They had all been harvested. A farmer was selling the cherries at a local fair. The cherries were worth much more than the fair fees. A crowd gathered around to witness the sale.

Pothole. Sam was driving down a bumpy road one afternoon. A pothole was coming his way. He swerved to miss the pothole. Sam ended up in a pile of snow and got a horrible sunburn. He never got that chance again.

New Handle. I wanted a new handle for my coffee machine. I went to the coffee store to look around. There was a great deal on a handle I liked. I took the handle home and was happy to use it. Now my coffee machine has a great handle.

After School Getaway. One summer, my family went on an overnight trip. We went to the beach and played in the ocean. Later, we watched fireworks. When it was time to go home, we got ice cream. It was a great time.

Candy. Sandra liked candy. She had candy bars that were shaped like the letters A, B, and C. She would eat them as fast as she could. She went outside to find them, and found candy apples on the ground. She ate them up, and was able to sleep.

Chemistry Lab. When I was a kid, I used to love chemistry. I learned that many of my teachers hated science. I got the idea to get a science lab of my own. I got a lab, but my teacher hated it. I had to move back home to take it.

Condo. John found a condo that was affordable in his price range. John applied for the condo. John was rejected. He went to the bank and asked for a second mortgage. John's second mortgage loan was approved and John paid the full amount.
The Date. Joe went on a blind date. He met her in the parking lot of the restaurant. He asked her to dance. She agreed. Joe kissed her in the restaurant bathroom.

The Early Baby. Tommy was out with friends. They all decided to go to a bar and have a few drinks. When Tommy got home he went to his room and got his stuff. He found a bottle of birth control and put it in his pocket. The next morning he realized he was already a week pregnant!

Volcano. I was standing in the middle of my driveway when I saw a large cloud above. My neighbor told me there was a large volcanic eruption in the area. I took the news and checked it out. I saw many people crying and trying to get to safety. I went over and they were safe and sound.

Crushing Like a Frog. I was playing soccer with a friend one day. The ball landed in a big tree root and I began to slide down it. I was scared and wanted to go home, but I couldn't get up the tree. I held my breath and made it down as far as I could. I was crushed as my friend laughed as I crawled out of the tree.

Crush. Dan wanted to get the girl of his dreams. He made several fliers about the girl. He also placed posters all around campus. He waited and waited. He never heard back from the girl he had wanted for a long time.

Bumping into old friends. I went out to eat one day with a few old friends. I ordered a pizza that my friend told me was his. He was eating it when I bumped into him. I felt embarrassed and asked him for his name. He told me that he has an allergy and had to eat the pizza.

The paint compromise. Lisa had a birthday coming up. Her mom gave her a huge red box of paint. Lisa really wanted to paint her room purple. But her mom decided to compromise. Lisa had to paint her room a lighter color.
Test. Tom was having trouble in his math class. He had to take an extra test. Tom studied very hard for the test. He finally finished it. Tom was able to pass the test.
Diet. Gina needed to eat a healthier diet. She began by cutting out carbohydrates. She also cut out sugar. But she was still not gaining weight. Gina decided to eat more and lose the weight.

Annoying toy. There was an annoying toy in the living room. The kid would run around the room, trying to catch it. His mom would yell at him. One day, she had enough and threw the toy away. The kid was annoyed for the rest of the day.

Harper Gets Lost. Harper had a lot of work to do to get ready for his new job. He was going on a boat to go sailing. Harper got in the boat and started driving. As he drove the boat, he realized he was lost. He didn't get far until his wife called his cell phone.

Cake. Kelly was looking for a way to express her creativity. She decided to make a cake. She got all the ingredients and started to bake it. When it was finished, she decorated it. Kelly loved her cake.

Back Breaker. Randy was going through his dad's stuff. He found some old comics that had been flipped over. His dad told him to keep the comics. Randy went to the shed to check the comics out. Randy put the comics back and locked his dad in the shed.

Dog Bath. Marge's dog didn't like being on the floor. She started by putting dog shampoo and dog soap in the tub. Then, she scrubbed the dog with a scrubby brush. She rinsed and dried the dog. After, Marge was so happy with the dog bath.
The Soup. Joe was very hungry one day. So Joe decided to make his mom a delicious soup. Joe's mom was impressed. Joe decided to make many more soups for her. Joe was happy to be feeding his mom.
A Movie. The kids were going to watch a movie. They were in the theater. A scary movie started playing. It scared the kids. The parents had to pull them out of the movie.
The Lunchtime Pizza. Tina was starving. She ordered a slice of pizza. When she got the pizza, she was amazed. It was the best pizza she'd ever had. Tina ate the whole thing in under an hour.

Hooray for Lisa. Lisa was excited because it was her very first day at summer camp. She was thrilled to be a part of the first wave of campers. Lisa's new friends were so fun to be around. All of the kids were very happy and happy to be there. After dinner, the girls took pictures and went home.

Hoop. Sam went to the bar to see some musicians. He ordered a glass of wine, and asked if he could get a hula hoop. The bar employee saw him asking the hula hoop, and laughed. Sam had no idea who the person was, but decided to leave. The bar employee offered him a beer instead.
Acid rainy. Kelly took a long nap. She woke up to see a very dark rain. Kelly looked out the window. The sky was raining acid. Kelly screamed and ran out of her house.

Go to the Store. John and Mary decided to go to the store. They grabbed their bags and headed out to the car. They drove to the store and got everything they needed. They bought all the items they needed and then went home. John and Mary then went home and spent a fun evening together.

Crafting a Business. John wanted to start a craft store. He asked his friends to help him. They each had an idea of what kind of goods to make. John and his friends spent a week perfecting their ideas. The next day, they set out to start their business.

Costume Contest. The students entered their costumes into a contest. They went on stage and each displayed one piece of their costume. Then, they posed for pictures. At the end, they announced who had won. They each got to keep their costume!
Silverfish. I had a goldfish. I kept him for ten years. He was very healthy. One day the goldfish ran out of water. I found out it was because the fish was swimming too deep.
Renee goes Camping. Renee was camping with her friends. They decided to go on a big hike. They camped on a hilltop. It was raining and cold. It rained for a whole week.

The Chairs. Rita and her boyfriend went to the movie theater. While waiting in line Rita got distracted by the movie. She sat in her chair and began watching her favorite show. A security guard came up to the couple. He told them they couldn't watch the movie in the theater.

Bus still waiting. Tina's friend had come from work to see a concert. She tried to wait for her but she was in a rush. It was still too late for her to board the bus. She went and asked her friend where the bus was. Her friend was on his way and she was happy to see her.

Picking Flowers. Sara has been planning a trip to the park for weeks. She's hoping to spend time on a lovely sunny day. When she arrived, she was met by a lot of people. They were having a romantic picnic, she was sad. The next day she went to the park and enjoyed herself.

Big Fishing Trip. Today I took my fishing pole out to the lake. I got in my boat and started fishing. I had a great day fishing. I put in my last bite and drove home. After dinner I went out on the dock and had a beer.
peanut scare. Roxy and Ben were eating peanuts. They both bit a lot of the nuts. Ben was so scared he ran out the door. He ran to his brother's house. Ben ran back to his mother.
Winter coat. John needed a coat. He didn't own one that fit his needs. He found the perfect coat in the winter store. He bought it. He wore the coat the next day.

Inheritance. Jack inherited his wife's car. She had lived it off of her grandmother's car. Jack decided to sell it. He ended up selling the car for lots of money. Jack was happy to finally have some money to retire on.

Driving at Night. Alicia was late for her meeting. She got lost after arriving late. Alicia's car was hit from behind by a drunk driver. The driver ran her over and ran her over again. Alicia never drove at night after that.

Judy's pastry. Judy baked an oatmeal pastry. She let it cool for a little while. When it cooled she realized her oven didn't have a preheater. She spent the night in bed, cooking the pastry. The next morning, she could finally bake an oatmeal pastry!
Annual Trip. Bill went on an annual trip to Florida. Bill took his daughter with him. They visited all of the beaches. They also ate lots of seafood. Bill and his daughter loved their annual trip.

Kimmy's Cookies. Kimmy loved to bake. One day, she had a craving for cookies. Kimmy decided to bake cookies. Her cookies were not good, but she liked them anyway. Kimmy knew that cookies were her new favorite food.

Xerxes's Xenophobic Xeroxes. Xerxes hates Xeroxes and would rather not use them. He prefers to just sign documents with pencil and paper. His wife uses Xeroxes every chance she gets. Xerxes's wife always tells him that he looks terrible with his Xerox. Xerxes hates being embarrassed.

Bhishma. Krishna was a doctor. He was a great doctor and was able to cure many diseases. His name became famous and he became rich and famous. However, he never told his wife of his success. She asked him to tell his wife and he said, "Bhishma is dead."
History Test. I took my history exam today. I did a good job on it. Unfortunately, I forgot something important. When I got back I had to redo it. I will definitely retake the exam next year.

My Cat Fluffy. My cat Fluffy likes to play with toys. Sometimes she gets a toy and sticks it in her hair. Last week my cat threw a toy that she had stuck in her hair. The toy went flying up in the air. My cat has been trying to figure out where the toy came from.
The Joke. The kid was a good student. His teachers and parents could not agree on a topic. He made a joke that upset them all. Everyone laughed at his joke. He lost his spot in the group.

Doing a good favor. Ben and Mary went to the fair. They bought a lot of cotton candy. Then they bought some candy bars. Then they put them in a giant bucket of water. It was so funny to see how many of them died in the bucket.

Gerald. Gerald had always hated how his brother acted. He wanted to confront his brother, but he knew it would be pointless. Gerald tried hard to become more confident, and eventually spoke out. His brother got very upset and started to fight with him. Gerald was very hurt, but he realized how important it was to stand up.

The First Grade. A new student got assigned to be in the class. She had never been to a first grade before. The first time she went, she had no idea what to expect. When she got to class she was nervous. After about an hour she finally got used to it.

Too many shampoos. Tina hated the smell of a lot of shampoos. She needed one that she would not get irritated by. Her friend decided to give her some samples. They were all too strong and too common. Tina was forced to buy the one she wanted instead.

The flat tire. Lilly was at home when her tire popped. She tried everything to stop the tire from coming off. But nothing worked. Finally, she called triple A, and they came to help. Luckily, they were able to help her put the flat tire out.

Free. Ava was a hard worker and always tried to save her money. One day her husband asked her to stop at a fast food place. She told him no, but her husband decided he needed the money. Ava was happy that he offered to pay for the food. After she paid for the food, she happily ate it!

Precious. Kate was at her best friend's house for the first time. Her friend was in a relationship and the two girls were close friends. Kate and her friend chatted for an hour. Then, Kate's best friend's dad arrived. His daughter had had a baby with her new husband!

silence. The boy was having a hard time. His mom told him to try to relax. He told his mom to ignore him for the rest of the day. His mom said he was too loud. He was able to stay in class for the rest of the day.

Locked out. I was trying to get a ride to a party last night. I used my phone and texted my friend about the situation. After texting for over an hour I called the taxi company. The taxi driver said his taxi was running out of gas. I was sad that I had to go the long way to get to the party.

home ec. Lily was a teacher at her school. Her students didn't want to learn about their environment. So she decided to give them a home ec class. Lily spent all day giving them the basics. Then, she went home to read and think about the class.

A mix up. Timmy and his brother were riding their bikes. They decided to test a new speed limit on the street. While going too fast, they were hit by a semi truck. Timmy's brother got out of his bike and ran after the truck. Timmy was able to get out of the truck with minor injuries.

One day of Starvation. Tim was on vacation. He went to the local grocery store to get food. He bought a large bag of frozen foods. Tim went back to his hotel room. He found out that his food had spoiled.

Getting Fired. James was working as a dishwasher at a local hotel. It was a very slow night, so James was having trouble. James went back to his room. He noticed the water was shut off. James was fired on the spot.

Bye Dad. My father died in October. I felt sad because my father used to drive me to school every day. I decided to write him a letter after school. The letter said my dad wanted me to stay home after school. When I got home, I wrote him a thank you note.

Sign Me Up. Jack and Jill were dating. They had a long distance relationship. They wanted to meet in person and start dating again. Jack and Jill went to an arcade. They both met up and started dating again.

The Cow. I wanted to grow a cow. I thought I'd buy a large beef steer, but it was too expensive. I thought about buying a small cow, but it seemed expensive. I then thought of a solution that didn't seem too expensive. I decided to plant a small cow, and grow the cow for me!
Sick. I got very sick yesterday. I had diarrhea and stomach cramps. I was in pain. I took antibiotics. They worked very well.

The Trapeze. John was having trouble falling asleep. He decided to practice some acrobatic moves. The acrobatics gave him a lot of energy. John started performing more and more. After a while he was able to fall asleep.

From Girlfriend To Landlord. Jill is a waitress. Every day she works very hard. She is saving up to buy a house. This will be her first time moving into a new home. She has decided to be a real estate agent instead.

Santa Claus. Lilly was bored on Christmas Eve. She went downstairs and opened her presents. There was nothing that she wanted and her son said she should have had candy. When Lilly got downstairs she saw her son. He was holding a box of presents for her!

New Car. My wife's sister in law had a new car. She paid for it at the dealer. She took the keys to the dealership. She was nervous because her sister in law has diabetes. She was able to drive it home in no time.
New Boss. Tom was a fast food worker. His new boss would not allow him to leave early. Tom was tired of this. Tom took his grievances to his boss. He was relieved to find that his boss listened.

Computer Programming. Tim loved computer programming. He spent most of his spare time creating applications. His friends encouraged him to enter a contest. Tim entered and won first prize. He also got to stay at his parents house and learn a new skill.
Bubble Bubble. Sam was playing with bubbles. He was chasing a ball with a net. As he chased the ball he got a big bubble. He got carried off by the wind. He ended up crashing into his mom.

Soft Serve. I love eating soft serve ice cream. This is especially true this time of year. There are so many flavors that can be used. This particular flavor of ice cream is especially delicious. It is refreshing after a very long day.
grades. Bill decided to test his math skills. He took several tests. He got very confused when he got a D. Bill asked a teacher for help. Bill was happy when his teacher explained the error.
Smart Move. I thought my father didn't like me. He never had anything to do with me. I used to hide from him. Now I'm talking to him. We're both smarter because of it.
Son. My daughter and son were best friends. They fought for months. Finally they decided to get together. The fight started because I was the one to get them together. They both learned their lesson.

Grass. Sandy was growing her own grass. She tried different types of grass but nothing worked. She decided to just stick with her original grass. She bought a gallon of new grass. She watered the garden all winter long.

Lace Looks Good On Everyone, Darling. Allie loved making all of her friends happy. She especially liked to lace their outfits. Her favorite laces were those that were made with gold lace. Her friends were impressed when they looked at her outfit. Allie thought the idea of lacing was amazing.

Carlos Weeds His Garden. Carlos notices that he has a lot of weeds in his garden. He decides to do some gardening to combat the weeds. He plants grass seed and water it. After a few weeks he notices his garden is no longer weed free. Carlos decides not to water his garden anymore.
New fast food. I went to a new fast food place today. I ordered two burritos. The food came very fast. I then waited 10 minutes. When I finally ate, it was delicious.
Accident. Lenny was driving his old car. It was making a strange noise. He looked in the engine and saw a blown fuse. Lenny called a tow truck. The tow truck came and towed the car.
Dream. The dream was very intense. I did not have a lot of sleep. I became extremely anxious. I woke up with an intense headache. I quickly fell asleep in order to escape the dream.

Building a dock. Tom loved to fish. He got out of the dock in his boat. Tom then went to look for a spot to build his dock. The water got deep and he had no choice. Tom decided to build his dock at the lake bottom.

Painted Lines. Bob needed to paint a lot of walls. He asked his wife to help him. Bob's wife did not know how to paint. The two decided to paint the walls at Bob's house. They were very happy with their new painted lines.

Clothes. Jim is getting tired of his old clothes. So he decides to go shopping. He looks at a few stores and buys some new clothes. Jim is glad that he no longer needs old clothes. Jim is happy to be living in a new house.

Too Tired For Work. Tom was extremely tired and had to stay late to work. He kept running out of energy, but he worked anyway. After work he felt very jittery and confused. When he woke up he was exhausted and not ready for work. Tom was never able to finish work as he was too tired.

Signs of Spring. Sue's yard smelled of the sweetest of flowers. She loved the aroma. She bought a beautiful tulip bulb to plant next spring. She watered it as often as she could. She was glad to have the sweet scent of spring.

Losing Weight. Lola was starting to lose weight. She thought she was going to lose a few pounds. Her mother encouraged her to eat healthy. Unfortunately, she was still gaining weight. Lola gave up and stopped counting calories and exercise.

Comics. Bill was bored of his daily comic books. Bill decided to make his own comics. Bill bought a drawing kit at a store. Bill followed the instructions on how to make the comic book. Bill's comic book is the best one to come out of the store.
Plums. She wanted to buy some plums. She walked to the produce section. She bought plums. She had an orange peel. She put it in her pocket.

Funny Face. My wife went to the barber yesterday. The barber cut her hair very short. She tried on a lot of outfits but it was too short. She asked him to cut it into a more manageable size. He was more than happy to oblige.

Tooth pain. Martha had to put toothpaste on her white pants. She was in the bathroom in the morning, so she had to use her shirt. When she got out she could not find the toothpaste. Her mouth hurt really bad. Martha finally had to go to the dentist and get the toothpaste.

Too Tall. Dee went to a party with friends. The friend told her the person there was too tall. Dee was shocked. Dee went home and asked her boyfriend to help her. Her boyfriend was able to change her height.

Not on your Side Today. Carmen decided to make an omelette for dinner. While it looked good on the plate, it was horrible in the pan. Carmen took the pan to a store. Carmen decided she would buy more pans. She was disappointed that the pan was useless for cooking food.
Zoo trip. Yesterday I went to the zoo with my mom. We went in a small group. There were some big animals and small animals. We had a lot of fun. We will do it again soon.

quick trip to the store. I needed a lot of stuff for my mom's birthday. I went to the store to buy stuff. I bought her a lot of stuff. She thanked me for buying her stuff. She said she loved me that day.

The Baby Shower. Tasha wanted to surprise her boyfriend with a new baby shower. She had the flowers, cakes and gifts ready. When it was time to take the guests, Tasha had a surprise. Her baby was not in the shower! Tasha's boyfriend was thrilled to have a surprise at the baby shower.
Crust. Bob was eating at a diner. And they had a very bad rust stain on the walls. He went to the store and bought some black spray paint. And sprayed the walls. The rust stain came down.

Rich Family. Joe's family was poor but not bad. He always worked hard, always went out for a walk, and always ate healthy. His dad was very proud of his son's work ethic and good health. One day, Joe's father got a call that the company was going out of business. He was sad, but his father told him to take care of his kids.

Cheating. Ella was a pretty good swimmer. Her parents enrolled her in a local pool. Her dad noticed how fast Ella was going. He swam around her until she couldn't swim anymore. Ella's dad made her go swimming with the other girls at the pool.
Birthday. My friend's birthday is today. She is 40 years old. She doesn't like being called a baby. I told her I wouldn't call her that. I think she will like the title of grandma.

Store. Dan got stuck at the store with a friend. They had to go and buy some snacks. The snacks were expensive but they decided to buy them anyway. When they got home, Dan and his friend were starving. Dan had to spend the night at his friend's house until he got better.
Cavities. Kia's jawbone was chipping. She tried not to cry, but it was too painful. She saw a dentist and was terrified. They told her the teeth would come out soon. They were very scary!
Walking in the rain. Jake was walking in the rain. He was looking at the sights. There was a sign for a concert. Jake went in to get a better look. It was a beautiful concert.

Best Christmas. There was a lot of noise at the door today. One neighbor had the door shut and his car was being towed. It didn't take long for the police to arrive. There was a big pile of Christmas trees on the curb. Now all the kids have their own tree.

Karen. Karen was trying to watch her toddler son while her husband was at work. Karen called the child's mother and asked to stay. She asked her husband to come home so she could watch. He said he had work that night, and Karen could watch with him. Karen and her baby son watched the movie together that night.

Fued. I woke up the other day and my dog was on top of me. I yelled at him and told him to go get a drink. As soon as he started to get up, I jumped down on top of him. When I was on top of him, my dog started barking at me. I had a good laugh and now we are friends.
The Tie Choice. Linda was attending a wedding. Her husband had chosen a tie. The other guests took it and made fun of her. Linda decided to return the tie. She was happy to have done the right thing.

Cracked Screen. Sam was playing video games. All of a sudden his phone screen cracked. He had to order a replacement. After it arrived it was not a perfect screen. He had to send it back to the store and get a refund.

The Chalk. The man painted a picture. His wife bought the picture. She decided to paint the picture over the picture. She bought chalk and started working on the picture. After a few hours, he finished and painted over the chalk painting.
