The School Year. Abe was starting his first year of high school. It was difficult to balance school and home life. He spent much of his time at school helping his parents with homework. When it came time to go home, he was sad. His family had moved to a new school and he missed his old school!

The Missing Keys. One day, Mike walked into the house to get his keys. Unfortunately, he realized he forgot his key in his pocket. Mike remembered that his wife had dropped them at the park. He found his keys but couldn't find his wife's. After several hours of searching, he finally found her key.

The Last Towel. The boy finished a long swim. He was ready to go to his locker when he felt something wet. There was a wet spot on his t-shirt. The boy was embarrassed he didn't clean his shirt in time. The next day the boy was given a new shirt.

Circus. Lola's dad told her she would have a clown for her birthday. She and her sister waited impatiently as they waited to go to the circus. On their way to the circus, they ran into a dog with a baby inside. The dog started whining, and the little girl thought the circus was a bad idea. They went home early, sad that it had ruined their birthday plans.
The Music Lover. The man listened to his favorite music. The music was too loud for his ear. He went to the store and bought ear plugs. He played the music all day. He now has no ear problems.
Old Dog. Ben was a good dog. He was able to learn to do tricks and catch balls. He was very smart. Ben got to go on lots of walks with his owners. One day he got hit by a car.

Ice Cream Truck. It was a hot day and it was time for Tom to go ice cream. Tom decided to order a large truck. It was the biggest truck he had ever seen. Tom got to taste all the different flavors. He decided that his favorite was chocolate chip.

Skating Lessons. I have always wanted to learn to skateboard. I asked my friend if he would teach me. I hired a skater named Bill to teach me. We went out every weekend to skateboard. After a few weeks of teaching, I was able to learn how to skate.
Gambler. Bob loved gambling. He got really good at it. Bob decided to start a business. His first project was a gambling app. Bob was able to make a lot of money from his app.

The Jail. My friend Bob was incarcerated for possession of a small amount of cocaine. He was very upset that he didn't see the girl he loved. Bob did not talk to her for a week. He thought maybe she was dead. The next morning she came to the door and smiled at him.

Talk. Dan and Kim decided to talk for a long time. They were both very nervous about doing so. Finally Kim told him she was ready. Dan told her she was beautiful. They both laughed as she got up on her feet.

bag. We bought the same bag of cereal last month. We found out today that it's discontinued. I have several other bags, but I need that one. I guess I'll just have to be content with a bag of almonds. I'm so glad I found this store though.

Starbucks Wi-Fi. I went to Starbucks to order a coffee. While I waited I realized I forgot my wallet. I asked for someone to come take my wallet. I asked for an assistant manager to help me. When she arrived she gave me my wallet back.

Doll Show. Amy wanted to have a birthday party at the mall. She thought her parents would let her have a party at the mall. On her birthday, her parents made her come and visit the mall. At the mall Amy found all kinds of dolls and toys. When she went home she said the mall was the best birthday party ever.

Personal Dignity. In college I studied with a guy named Bill. Bill would always bring his lunch to class without asking anyone's opinion. He would come to class and only eat a tiny handful of pieces of food. His teacher had to come up with a way to force him to eat lunch. Bill always agreed, and he didn't have to bring anything.

Boredom Sets In. Dale hadn't been watching movies in a while. He decided to go to the movies one night. Dale was extremely bored as he watched movies. He decided to go home to watch TV instead. Dale wasn't satisfied after watching his two hour movie.
Push on the Swings. A man stood by the pool. He started a pool party. A few people showed up to the party. They did all kinds of fun things. The pool was a great success.

Fixing my car. Yesterday, I went to my car and saw that the front brakes were leaking. I drove the car to my friend's house to fix the brakes. I asked his father for help, and he was able to help me. I put a plug in the old brakes, and a new one put in. Now the car is working well.

Yancy. Yancy was trying to find a great new hat. He searched high and low, but couldn't find a perfect fit. Yancy found a great hat at a thrift store. It was the perfect hat for Yancy. Yancy felt happy to have found a great hat.

Broken mug. I was making a mug for my friend. I took the mug out of the box and put it in the microwave. The microwave ran out of power so I couldn't cook it. I had no choice but to throw it out. I decided to go buy a new mug from the store.

Doing laundry. When I was young, we always did the laundry. We would leave it to the washer overnight. This would then allow us to get clean. When we were done, we would clean our whole house. I still love doing laundry.
Car wash. Gina was washing her car one day. She noticed it was getting very dirty. She decided to do a car wash. She filled up the sink and the tub. Finally she washed her car and it was clean.

Henry Bear's Park. My wife went to the park with me this morning. We visited the bear statue. I decided to eat a piece of hot dog. A large bear came out of the bushes. We ran away as fast as we could.

Chloe gets a haircut. Chloe was growing out her hair. She noticed that her head hair was getting longer. She needed to get it cut. She looked everywhere for a haircut barber. Then she found one and got a great haircut.

The Movies. John wanted to get some more movies for his DVD collection. His wife, however, told him that there were too many. John reluctantly went to the electronics store and bought more. His wife said that they should take it from there. John agreed and the family decided to go out for a movie night.

So What's With Coffee Anyway?. Tom's wife told him he needed to start drinking more water. He started a small water challenge. Each day he drank 10 glasses of water. He had a great challenge! He gained a whole new respect for drinking a glass of water.

Faded Jeans. Tom's favorite jeans were faded. His sister recommended he try new jeans. Tom bought a pair from the nearest mall. The first week they were out of stock Tom had to go. The jeans were out of stock for a long time.
The Ice Cream. Kenny was eating ice cream with his friends. It was a delicious treat! It was frozen in the middle and tasted delicious. Kenny thanked his friends. They all went home and ate it.

Nap Mistake. One time my friend and I were talking on the phone. We were talking so long we forgot to turn off our phones. When the battery was low I realized I hadn't turned it off. It was too late so I had to wait for my dad to come. I ended up calling my friend and apologizing.

Piano. Joe was playing piano in his apartment. Suddenly, a stranger walked in and began messing with his music. He began to sing in a high pitched voice. Joe's girlfriend tried to calm him down. Joe then realized that he had to go play the concert.

Lucky Penny. Samantha bought a penny with her money. She decided to put it in a lottery ticket. The next day she saw that she won the prize. Her father told her it would be a long trip to get it back. That day, Samantha went to the bank to claim her prize.

The Speakers. The couple loved the surround sound system. They went to an electronics store to buy speakers. The salesman was very helpful. They bought speakers and went home. They were happy with their choice.

The Garden. A woman planted a garden with tomato plants. She also planted some peppers and beans. She planted all her seedlings. She was tired of the wait and didn't know if she'd have enough time. Luckily, she had enough time and planted her crops.

The Friend Fight. Jane saw her friend at a club one night. She was in a nice dress and heels, and they had a lot of chemistry. But when they saw each other again, they fought. They couldn't stand the other one, and left. Jane never saw her friend again.

Sleepy Cat. Gina woke up in the middle of the night to a meow. Her cat wasn't sleeping that well. Gina put a kitten blanket on her cat to sleep. Her cat didn't seem to care. Gina felt much better when she went back to sleep.

bottles. Sandy had always been a picky eater. She didn't like anything that was hot or cold. She decided to change her habits. She started making a small daily ritual of adding cold water to her glasses. By the end of the month she had the water sitting in her water glass every day!
Bananas. John was on a banana trip. He ate a whole bunch of them. He tried to eat the rest but his stomach hurt. John had to leave early. He was too full to make it to the next stop.

Mother's Day Cruise. Jill and Tim wanted to spend Mother's Day alone. Tim did not want to get out of the house. He thought it would be fun to go on a cruise. On the cruise he did not enjoy himself. His mother did not like that he did not spend time with her.

Regrets. I went to the doctor to have my ears checked. He said I was very healthy and my ears were perfectly shaped. Afterwards, I decided to play on the swings at the local park. I fell twice and fell on my ear. Now, I only play in my house.

Tight Shoes. Tim had a date tonight. It was the first time he had been single. He wanted to look smart so he went to a local shoe store. He bought a new pair of shoes. Tim was able to look smart on the date.

Christmas time. Karen's school started selling gifts on Christmas Eve. As her mother took her to the store, Karen gave her a bag of cookies. On Christmas morning, Karen realized there was no more cookies. Her mother explained that someone left out the sugar. Karen was so disappointed!

Beads, Beads, Everywhere. Tom was taking out the trash. There was a lot of trash in his house. Tom couldn't find any beads. Tom looked around and started to feel sad. Tom searched for several hours but still couldn't find anything.
Pizza. We love pizza. The only thing we don't like is the wait. It takes forever. One day we found a pizza place in town. We went inside and ordered a large pizza.

Good Spot. Gina and her class were walking to school. There was a new park in the distance. They decided to take it instead of going the opposite direction. The girls and the teacher began walking in different directions. The class eventually made it to the park.

Cartoons. I used to watch a lot of cartoons when I was little. I loved the characters, the style, and even the music. As I got older I realized how much I hated them. I decided to quit watching them. My wife loved them so much though that she still watches them.
My New Puppy. Today I bought a new puppy. She is a small lab. She loves to sleep in my bed. I also let her out on the swings. I am very happy with my new dog.
Tennis. The ball went into the cup. Anna was playing tennis. She hit the ball right into the cup. Anna's ball got stuck in the cup. Anna had to get the ball out of the cup.
Movie. Tim liked going to the movies. He had a hard time choosing one. He finally decided on a horror film. He found a good spot to sit. He enjoyed the movie.

Grumpy. Joe and his wife weren't getting along. He kept yelling at her all day. Her face would turn red and her eyes would water. The only solution Joe had was to yell at her so loud he could barely hear. He finally agreed to listen more and his wife stopped yelling at him.
Age Difference. Tom was at a club. He had a woman over. She was 27 years older than him. Tom wasn't sure if he should try to be friends with her. He ended up going to dinner with her.

What to do. Tina had to put the garbage into the towing truck. Tina realized she forgot her bag at home. She decided to check her bag to see if she had everything she needed. Tina realized she forgot her bag at home. Tina found her bag at her house and she put the garbage in the truck.

Summer Job. Nancy has always been interested in computers. She is a junior software developer for an engineering company. In July, she got the chance to move to Los Angeles. There, she found a job that she loved. Nancy's summer was amazing.

Mints. Karen was on vacation with her family in England. She noticed some fresh mint growing on the side of a field. She picked up a handful and drank it all. When she tasted it, it was horrible. She decided to give it away to her mother.
Bad ice cream. Tina went ice cream shopping. When she arrived, her stomach hurt. She could not believe how bad it was. She ran back home. Tina had to wait a while before she could eat again.

Riding a Bike Drunk. Dan had taken his girlfriend to the movies. When he got home, he went out on the patio. He decided to ride his bike through the park. Dan ended up riding the wrong path. He crashed his bike into a tree and injured his knee.

Kris' Kids' Christmas List. Kris was tired of hearing his kids talk about Christmas. He was also tired of being annoyed. So he decided to write down what he wanted for Christmas. On Christmas Eve Kris got into the car with his kids. He was glad to be done with Christmas.

Family Picture. The Thompson's took a family picture together. They didn't put the baby on the chair. They used the camera with the flash function instead. When they got back, they had forgotten the flash card. They had to take pictures again at home.
Mop. Sam bought a new mop. He took it outside to get rid of the dirt. He used it for a while. Then he decided to wash the floor. It cleaned up great.
Dairy Diary. Lisa was on a dairy trip. She was checking her dairy box. She didn't find much. But she saw some interesting candies. It was a great souvenir.

Rain. It had rained for hours before I realized it. I decided to run to the basement. I found some blankets and put them on the ground. I went back up the stairs and jumped in the air. The water was too low to jump and I jumped into the tub.

The free seasonings. Lacy was making chili for her family. She didn't have all the ingredients in the pantry. She was stuck. She decided to make free seasonings from scratch. Her chili came out perfect.

The Circus. Milly was a lonely girl in high school. She always wanted to be a circus performer. She got a job working as a clown at the local fair. Soon, she became a star. Milly had lots of fun performing in the fair.

The Trampoline. Dana was building a trampoline. She was about to finish when her dad started yelling. The boys started fighting with each other. Dana could not go in and save them. Dana had to call a friend to help her.

Larry's car smokes. Larry was at a red light. He pulled over to use the restroom. He put his foot on the pedal. He got distracted by the light and the car started smoking. Larry realized that he had forgotten to plug his cigarette lighter!

Sunk. The tide came in one evening. I was so happy, because we were sinking! When the tide was out, I jumped in the water to get away. My family ran after me. I realized I should never swim near the shore again.

Ebay Scam. Gary was looking for his favorite car. He was browsing Ebay. When he saw an ad for his favorite car he opened the bidding. When the car sold it was way out of his price range. Gary was upset that he wasted his time buying the car.

The Drag Race. Tim was excited to see the racers. He loved the old school TV shows. Unfortunately it was the year of the new kid on the block. They were on his favorite show. Tim loved it even though it was a joke.
Car Wash. I needed to get my car washed. I went to the car wash. I looked at the machines. I chose the best. It turned out well!

The blanket over the head. Kelly was trying to play hide and seek. Her little brother was laying on top of the blanket. She jumped on top of the blanket to play. Suddenly, her brother jumped off. Kelly ran under the blanket to find her brother.

The Heavy Pizza. Tim was going out for dinner. He ordered a medium pizza and didn't think twice about it. Then he realized he had left the sauce on. He made a note to go back and get it right. Tim ate the pizza without noticing the mess.
The Son. The boy wanted to be an engineer. He went to school to be an engineer. The school didn't allow him to be an engineer. The boy did not care. He did what he loved, to be an engineer.

Seth gets a girl. Seth was going out to dinner with his friends. He was walking down the street when he saw a girl. She was walking a few steps from where he was standing. She looked at him strangely and he noticed something. She was attractive and they got to talking.

The Nest. The kitten was hiding in the corner. She was hiding from a very bad storm! She wanted to be left alone. She found a nice blanket and crawled under it. She snuggled under the blanket and felt safe!
Zoned Out. Tim was watching a TV show. It was rated R. Tim thought it was just too much violence. He tried to ignore it and not look at the TV. Unfortunately, it kept interrupting Tim's rest.

A Cat for Mom. Lizzie saw a cat in the animal shelter. She decided to adopt the cat. Lizzie's mom thought it was a stray. She told Lizzie she thought her mom adopted a cat. Lizzie was angry because her mom did not tell her about the cat.
Basement. The basement was getting dirty. There was water all over the place. The basement walls were ragged. We took a rake and swept out the dirt. The basement was cleaned!

Try Hard. Sam was a really bad basketball player. He often got beat by bigger players, but he wanted to try harder. One day he challenged some of his teammates to a scrimmage. They all practiced all summer to get better. In the fall, Sam played well against some of his more experienced opponents.
story. The man told his son. His son told his son. The son's brother heard the man. The man tried to flee. The brother chased him through the house.

Mini golfing. The other day I was walking around the neighborhood. I noticed a mini golf course. I decided to give it a try. I got my ball on the hole and started playing. I fell over and hurt my arm.
The Mountain Lion. The kids ran through the woods. They didn't see any monsters. They saw a mountain lion. It was huge! They all screamed.

Jackson is a star. Jackson is a star. People have been waiting for him for months. People have been asking him for his autograph. Jackson is getting his first movie role. Jackson is very happy about this.
November. Tim was having his Thanksgiving dinner. It was an older family. He tried to be nice. His mom said she loved to cook. Tim appreciated it and got more for everyone.

Snorkeling Trip. Jenny and her friends went snorkeling. They went to the Bahamas. Jenny was scared of coral and did not like it. Luckily the snorkel didn't hurt her at all. She had a great time snorkeling.

Puppy Training. Jenna was a terrible girl and a bully. When she saw a puppy on the road, she ran after it. She pushed her way into the puppy's lap and it cried. Jenna was so happy to see the puppy that she started crying again. After an hour of crying, the puppy finally stopped crying.

Roy's Big Move. Roy had been in town for a few weeks now. He was working on a new restaurant and decided to move into the space. Roy rented a new, smaller space and put up a sign. He set up a coffee shop to replace his old place. His customers appreciated the new space and he felt great.

New Kid. Josie and her best friend, Laura, were going to the dance. Laura was scared to go alone, though. Josie decided to help Laura with her fears. Josie brought Laura to the dance alone. Laura had a great time at the dance.

Worry About Others Or Myself. Amy's grandmother died. Her mother, aunt, and cousins were distraught. Amy tried to calm them down. They began to blame Amy for her grandmother's death. Amy had enough of the blame game.

Looking. It was raining hard outside and it made it hard to see well. Kate decided to look for a shelter. A nearby shelter offered a free night's worth of food and shelter. Kate slept in and took the shelter's offer. After her shelter night she felt well rested the next morning.

Engineer. Sue was a young woman who had never learned to work in a shop. She decided to teach herself to work on engines. She bought new tools and books to learn more. At first she was terrible. But eventually she got really good.
Ship Your Car. Gina's mother took her to a garage sale. She saw a great old car. It was painted blue and gold. She knew she had to get it. Gina took her mom to the garage sale.
Playing at the Beach. It was a rainy day. Jack decided to take his kids to the beach. They went to a public pool. Jack played with his kids. His kids had a great time at the beach.

The broken screen. Linda was at work when her phone vibrated. A loud noise came from her phone. She looked at her phone and saw that it had been broken. Linda quickly drove back to work and got the phone fixed. Luckily, the screen worked again after a while.

Snorkeling. The Jones family loved to snorkel. They snorkeled every weekend. They always had a new piece of glass every time. Their favorite item was the fish. Their parents decided to make the Jones a fish tank to celebrate.
Pay. Lacy was running a cashier. She was supposed to be making money from this job. Lacy worked hard and earned a decent salary. Then the economy crashed. Lacy was forced to lay off her employees.

The Vase. I went to the fair today with my niece and my nephew. We played mini games for hours and went to lots of rides. We bought a big new vase. It is very fancy and pretty. I intend to have it on display at home to look at.
The Ship. The ship was being repaired. They brought their own trash. It was full of debris. They were working on it anyway. It took longer than they thought.
No More Beard. Tom hated his beard. He did not like it when people stared at him. One day Tom decided to shave it. When he did it was painful. He decided never to grow a beard again.
The Blanket. The family got ready for bed. They had laid out a blanket for the winter. They put it down and went to sleep. It rained the night before. The blanket got soaked.

Thanksgiving Dinner. My family loves Thanksgiving, and we all eat together. We all love to eat turkey and green beans. Last year, we decided to do a special meal for a special person. We cooked a lot of good things and had a nice meal. Thanksgiving dinner was a big hit with all of us!

The Tree. A large tree had a bad growth spurt. The tree was large enough to move several feet. A man pulled up the tree with a ladder and a chainsaw. The tree fell over in pieces on the ground. A man went to the tree to retrieve the pieces.
Subscription. Bob ordered a book. He waited. The book never showed up. He got a phone call. They were sorry and he had a good subscription.

Friend's bicycle. Kelsi's friend wanted to buy her a bike. Kelsi didn't have enough money. She asked her friend if she could borrow her friend's bike. Her friend agreed. Kelsi's friend got the bike for Kelsi.

Muscle. Jason was trying to gain muscle. Jason went to the gym for the first time ever. He was having a lot of fun until his buddy told him to relax. Jason started to sweat. Jason's buddy advised him to stick to what he likes to do.

Illness. It was my first day in college and my professor was very sick. He could hardly speak at all and didn't have a date to meet me. I felt very uncomfortable about it and asked the professor to call my girlfriend. When I arrived he said that she had come with to visit me. I felt relieved and talked to my girlfriend about the visit.

Chekhov's Warning. The game went to a point of extreme suspense. It was about to end. In the very last second, the clock ran out. In the sudden silence, the players were able to count backwards. The count was 5 - 4 - 3 - 2.
Joe's Cars. Joe drove his dad's old car very hard. One day Joe was behind on his payments. He wasn't able to make them in time. Joe went to see his father. His dad said it was all Joe's fault.

Bad Kids. I went to my cousin's house when I was a teenager. He was in the basement and he was trying to steal. I confronted him and got him out of the basement. I called the police and filed a report. I never saw him again.
Plants. Beth was sad to find out that her plants died. She got in the car to go home. She wanted to buy a new plant. Her neighbor offered her some flowers. She bought them, and then had new plants.
Lost Bird. My daughter found a little bird. She thought it was a pet. It was not. She took it to the shelter. It was taken in.

Class Reunion. Cindy had to take her first class reunion with all of her friends. She was nervous about how it would go. Cindy ended up having a good time. She had a lot of new friends. She knew she would do it again in a few years.

Presidential Vote. Jane wanted to vote for a presidential candidate. She went to the voting station. The voting booth was long gone. Jane went to the back of the building. She went to the polls for a vote.

The Hot Springs. When my daughter was in sixth grade we took her to the town's new hot springs. The place is so pretty you would think you were in the middle of the woods. We spent so much time in the hot springs that day we were sore for a long time. When we went home we all had a great time relaxing under the stars. We hope to return to the hot springs again when she is older.

The Topiary. Tim loved the topiary at his friend's house. He would plant it whenever he could. One day, Tim noticed it was dying. He decided to plant more. After a while, Tim had a big topiary at his friend's house.

Japan. Jane moved to Japan a few years ago. At first, she didn't understand many of the language. But soon, she was making new friends. They also made great memories. Jane decided she would come back often.

Angel has sex. Angel has a crush on a boy in her math class. She tries to talk to the boy's mother but her mother does not want to meet. Angel gets an idea and goes to the boy's mom. The boy's mother is so touched and happy to see Angel. The boy is now Angel's new boyfriend.

craft. Mary decided she wanted to make some crafts. She got out all the supplies she needed. Then she started working on the crafts. When they were finished, she made a bunch of decorations. Mary had made a bunch of handmade gifts for her friends.

The Embarrassed Girlfriend. My wife and I went to see The Usual Suspects. We thought it was a funny movie. In the middle of the movie she began to cry. We decided not to talk to her because she was embarrassed. That night she cried a lot.
New Dress. Nancy needed a new dress. She went to the mall to look. Nancy finally found a dress that she liked. She went home and tried it on. She loved it and bought it immediately.

Pumpkin Smashing. Tom was an avid pumpkin-smasher. One day, he found a huge pile of pumpkin in the kitchen. He decided to smash it all up. Tom did a great job. He got several compliments on his skills.

Bubbles. My friends and I were playing basketball in the park. We decided to jump a bounce house. I went up for the first bounce. The bounce house was too far. My friends and I decided to move the bounce house.
No Ride. Tom was walking home. There was a little girl stuck on the street. Tom got there very quickly. He helped the little girl up. Tom felt good that he did.

A Jump Start. Sally had fallen and hurt her knee. The doctor told her it would heal. Instead she woke up in the morning to a large cramp on her knee. She tried to move around her bedroom, but her knee was still in pain. She decided to stay in bed for the night.

Acknowledge. I was walking home from work and a lady stopped me. She smiled and told me her name is Susie. I thanked her for the compliment, and took a picture. Susie said she didn't mind and started walking away. I apologized and continued walking.

Dried lake. John got a new job working on the lake. He started with the lake as an empty reservoir. Over time it filled up with sediment. The lake was so full that it had to be drained. John had to start over at the very beginning.

Kids. Sam was at a bar with his friends. It got so loud that it made it hard for Sam to hear them. Sam went inside to find some privacy. There, he heard his friends yelling. Sam was too embarrassed to confront them.
A Friend Indeed. It was a hot summer day. And I wanted something cold to drink. I went to the local store. I found a pint of water that I liked. I brought it home, and had it cold for my friend.

Lost Homework. Tom got a test. He forgot to put his homework in his backpack. Tom went to class and looked at the test. He saw that it was already turned in. Tom made sure to bring his homework into the next class.

The Disgusting Pie. The mother cooked a delicious apple pie. She set it on the counter for a moment. Then she forgot about it. A few minutes later the pie exploded on the table. She was able to clean it up.

Down we go. Jenny had been dating Henry for two years. He invited her out to eat the other night. He took her to a fancy restaurant. She ate a lot of great food and had a great time. But he felt guilty all day long and promised to do better.

Drove. Kenny decided to get out of the house. He went out on a road trip. He started up his truck and got out. The wind blew against his tires and his engine started to die. Kenny started the engine of his truck, and ran back home.

Choosing Just One. Tina was in the market for a house. She looked at all her options to choose between one and another. She thought hard about what she wanted. She finally made her choice and put down the money. After putting in her deposit, she moved in her new home.
Stained Pants. Alyssa was at a party. A man walked into her room and walked up to her. He was wearing blue pants. He left blue pants on the floor. Alyssa cleaned up the blue pants.
Ordering a pizza. Tina was on her way home from work. She needed to order a pizza. She looked up reviews online. She ordered from Pizza Hut. She loved the pizza.
My Little Helper. It was a cool fall afternoon. Kia was walking her dog with a friend. She dropped her puppy on the ground. The puppy cried for a few minutes. She helped him climb out and take a nap.

The Tea Pot. Jane bought a new tea pot for her house. She used it every day. One day it got so hot in the house that it melted. Jane was upset at herself for using a new pot. The next day she got it fixed.

A day at the golf course. A couple friends and I went to the golf course. I was really looking forward to teeing off. I did not tee off and was waiting to go back to the hotel. I finally got there and was waiting on my tee time. It was a frustrating experience.

Military Veteran Tells A Story. One day, retired military police officer Joe went out for lunch. At the restaurant, a customer ordered a milkshake. While eating the milkshake, Joe was violently sick. When the customers left, Joe told his story of the milkshake. Joe was able to pass out after he finished his story.

Hunting. Logan was out for the day hunting. He spotted a squirrel and decided to keep his eyes on it. He waited for an hour for the squirrel to leave the tree. When it was gone, he decided to follow the squirrel home. It was later that night that Logan found the squirrel.

Braces. I went to the dentist to get braces. I needed them because I had a bad tooth. The dentist told me I would have to wear them for two months. I hated wearing the braces but felt that I had to get them over with. They were not comfortable but I made a lot of money wearing them.
Morning Noise. My sister in law came in the house at 6 AM. She said she was ready to go. I was confused and told her to stay in the house. She came back to bed and I stayed up. She woke up at 7 AM.

Birthday Cake. John's birthday was coming up. He had no plans for his birthday. So John decided to bake a cake to give to his parents. John's mom made the cake very special for John. He surprised his parents on his birthday with the cake.
Nice tip. Tina was waiting in line to pay. She was getting nervous. All of the sudden someone gave her a small tip. She was happy and thanked him. Then he gave her his card number.

Hotel Surprise. Kim was staying in a hotel for the first time. She hadn't been to a hotel in a long time. There was one room she loved. Kim asked a maid to clean it to make it look better. When it was clean it looked like a nice hotel room.
The Dog That Did Not Bark. The kids were playing outside. Suddenly a huge dog appeared. The dog growled at them. The kids all ran away scared. The dog did not bark after that.

The Accident. Sam had never been on a boat before. He was excited when he got on the boat. As he was paddling down the river he hit a rock. The rock bounced off the boat and hit Sam. Sam was soaked but he was okay.

The Chess grandmaster. My cousin asked me to play chess. I was very nervous and scared at first. After several games I played better and won. My cousin congratulated me and gave me money. The next day I went to my cousin's house to play more.

The Argument. Sandy was having an argument with her husband. She knew he wasn't making the right choices. So she took him shopping. She made him get on the treadmill and run for an hour. Finally she won the argument.

Losing a sister. My cousin was in an accident with a car. She was badly injured. I asked my sister if she could take her. She agreed to help me move to a new city. I am thankful to her and we are good now.

A Bear in Camp. Mitch was playing in the forest with his cousins. They had been digging for a while when a bear appeared. The bear started chewing on Mitch's shovel. Mitch screamed and ran to his mother. The bear was scared away but Mitch was okay.
Tomato. Dan loved eating fresh tomatoes. His mom took him to a farm. Dan picked the tomatoes himself. Dan bought tomato sauce and fresh basil. Dan ate his delicious fresh tomatoes.

Siren. Kate's car was honking at a stop sign. And she didn't see the car behind her honking too. Suddenly the cars behind her were racing. And they hit each other! Kate was so scared that she had to pull over.
Riding a Bike. The man took his bike on a trip. The trip included many twists and turns. He crashed and fell on his bike. The man rode away after his fall. His bike wasn't covered in scratches.

Bad Vacation. Tom was vacationing in Hawaii. It started to rain and Tom could not get his camera out. He took all of his pictures and video to the beach. When he got back to camp he realized there was no flash in the camera. Tom had ruined his trip.

Language. Jenny loved making friends. She was new at school and was learning many languages. She was a good student but wasn't really good at speaking. Her family made a plan for her to learn how to speak. At the age of 20 she made a good friend with a French girl.

Very First Basketball Game. Tim was watching his very first basketball game. The other team had won a big game. Tim tried to cheer his team up. Tim made fun of the other team's uniforms. The other team beat Tim's team in the next game.

Dance Like You Mean It. Dan is a dance instructor. Dan loves to teach people the basics of dance. One day Dan decides to teach people a new dance move. Dan teaches his students how to do the new dance move. Dan is very happy that he taught his students how to dance.

Snake At The Zoo. Billy took his dog to the zoo. The dog went into the enclosure with a snake in its mouth. The dog did not notice the snake. Billy found the snake in the dog's mouth. Billy had to pick up the dog and get it to be alright.
Stuffed Animal. My son has stuffed animals. Last night he was making a dragon. He stuffed a huge balloon in it. It exploded. I didn't have to clean up any of the mess.

Hockey. My wife has a love for hockey. She took me to a hockey game a few weeks ago. I was so excited to see the action. When it was time to leave I decided to buy a ticket. I had a great time and will be going back soon.

Softball Game. Sally and her friends wanted to go to a softball game. Sally had never been to a softball game before. She was afraid that it would be boring and forget about her friends. Sally played and made the softball team. Her team was the best in the school and they won the game!
jelly. I decided to eat some jelly. I put it in a bowl. I put the bowl on the counter. I put the bowl on the table. I ate the jelly.

Boxing Match. Jim took his friend Randy to the boxing ring. They met in the ring and started to spar. They were both very athletic and fought very hard. They did not know it, but the referee was watching their matches. Jim and Randy won their matches and made a promise.

Breakup. Derek moved to a new town to be with his girlfriend. He was a little nervous, but he decided to go meet her. While waiting, Derek got a text from his girlfriend. He answered and found out she had broken up with him. Derek was devastated to be heartbroken.

Fear of Alleys. Eli is afraid of alleys. When he was a kid he always stood in the doorway. One day Eli tried to sneak out of his house. He ran into an alley. He was not scared and just wanted to go home.

Suspect. A new neighbor asked for help with a fence. He thought it would be a simple task. However, he found that it was very challenging. He hired a contractor to help him. He was able to complete the project on time and under budget.

Building Laws. I was building a new shed. I had a big problem with the window framing. I called a professional to help me with the problem. The professional came out and fixed my window frame. Now I don't have to have trouble fitting the shed in my garage.

Trick or Treat. There was a kid who always wanted to get candy. He didn't have a ticket but he didn't want to ask. He decided to run and hide until he got one. A cop followed him in a car and then pulled him over. Then, he handed him the ticket to be on the safe side.

Chicken is good. I ate a whole chicken for dinner last night. I ordered the bone-in chicken breast. I thought it was overcooked, so I cut it in half. The skin was still crisp and juicy, though. I still think I'll order it next time.

The Pudding. It was Tina's first day of preschool. She had been to the dentist before. She had no idea how she would make her own pudding. Her mother was kind enough to come with some. Tina's pudding was delicious.

A New Car!. Tom was nervous about buying a new car. He went to a dealership and got a lot of information about the vehicle. Tom decided he was ready to buy a new car. When he got the car he loved it. He was very happy with his new car.
Old Speakers. Joey owned an old pair of speakers. They had gone through many crashes. He put them together and tried to fix them up. But none of the parts fit right. So Joey had to buy a new set.
Michigan Trip. John took a trip to Michigan. First, he went to Lansing. Then, he went to Ann Arbor. Finally, he went to Detroit. He thought it was a great trip!

Notices. I was walking down the road one day. I noticed a bunch of black and white flyers posted. The flyer said the city would be closing tomorrow. I was confused, but decided to go out anyways. Once I got in I was shocked to see it was a holiday.

Christmas party. Kari's school had a Christmas party. She had not been invited. Kari spent her first night alone in her room. She cried a little on her way out the door. She thought it was worth it to be with her friends.
Large TV. Tom was at home. He wanted a big TV. Tom had to settle for a small TV. He was upset. Tom decided to just go buy a bigger TV.
Tofu. Kelley wanted to be healthier. She decided to start eating more vegetables. She bought some tofu. She also ate a lot of fish. Kelley's health improved.
prison. Tiffany wanted to get a job at a prison. She had heard so many good things about them. She applied to one. She got the job. She loved working there.

Sleep. Mia had been having bad dreams all day. She tried to go back to sleep but was very restless. She tried to drift off to sleep. Eventually she drifted off and slept all day. Mia finally fell asleep.
Attitude. Amy was angry about something that her boyfriend did. He didn't think she should be upset. She decided to confront him. She confronted him about it. Amy confronted her boyfriend about it.
girlfriend. Samantha is a high school senior. She is dating Tim. He is a senior and lives far away. He has called her more often this week. She is upset she cannot see him.

Jim's Nice. Jim liked to sing in his car. One day his car broke down on the road. The mechanics had to pull Jim out of the car. Jim apologized and said he was sorry. Jim was still nice to the mechanic afterwards.
Wet Boots. Tim was out for a hike. He lost his hiking boots. Tim's friend brought him some new boots. Tim tried to put them on. Unfortunately his new boots did not dry correctly.
Ball Game. The ball game started. The pitcher threw the ball. The batter hit the ball. The ball went into the outfield. The team won the game.
Stripes. Gina was a little girl. One day she wanted to draw. She thought she would use colored stripes to draw her picture. The stripes went into a hole. The holes caused a lot of bleeding.

Lunch. Cindy and Mary were having lunch together. Mary didn't want to eat a piece of fruit that Cindy had eaten. Cindy's mom told her that fruit was delicious so they decided to eat. Mary and Cindy both had a great time with their amazing mother. It was a great opportunity for Mary to meet her crush.

Snowstorm 5. The weather in Minnesota was going to be snowy and rainy for the night. The temperature dropped to the low 40s. Some children woke up at 11:30 p.m. All the kids were running around and having fun. They went to sleep early at 1:30 a.m.
diving. I have been doing a lot of swimming lately. I wanted to go diving with my friends. It was raining when I went to the pond. My friends all came to the pond to dive. We had a great time.

Blown Surprise. It was Bill's birthday. Everyone was talking about his new car. The car didn't have much on it. He had his wife give him a gift card to a sports bar. He went to a sports bar and ordered a beer and a burger.
Loud Birds. Tina was trying to sleep. It was late in the evening. The birds were very loud. She couldn't concentrate. Eventually she fell asleep in her bed.

The tribe. Kia wanted to join the tribe. She was scared, but decided to join anyway. At first, she made no friends. However, she slowly began making new ones. She soon met many people that she really like.

Disappearing Bagels. Jake was feeling hungry one afternoon. He grabbed a bagel and went for a walk. He sat down at a bench and watched the people pass by. Jake walked out of the park and walked down the street. When he went back to his spot he realized he had to walk back home.

Larry passes on. Larry has been watching the football game with his wife. Larry has become tired of the NFL and wants to get away. Larry asks his wife if she can go out to eat. His wife tells him she will go out to eat. Larry goes out to eat with his wife.

Temptation. Joey's mom told him she had a birthday cake coming. The boy saw his favorite cake and wanted to have it. His mom said he could have the cake if he ate all of his candy. The boy did as he was told and ate all his candy. Joey went to sleep with a sore throat and the cake in his throat.

No Fork. I was eating my usual chicken fingers. I had decided to try a new style of food. The new chicken finger style involved me biting into a large chunk. I was really upset by it. My friend had told me that fork was used for the first time that day.
Eating Fish. The man sat on a bench eating a piece of fish. A bird flew by and knocked the fish onto the bench. The man jumped and hit the bird. The man sat down on his bench. The man ate a sandwich.

Emily Visits France. Emily loves going to the beach. She decides to head to the beach this summer. Her family decides to take her. Emily finds that France is not as romantic as she thought. She wishes she had not left so early.

poison ivy. Mia's grandmother warned her about poison ivy. Mia's mom took her to the doctor for it. She was terrified. The doctor was really excited when she told him it was over. They were relieved to finally be rid of it!

Safe Water. Kia wanted to drink her morning coffee without worry about it being unsafe. But her house was infested with cockroaches. She decided to boil the water in a pot and rinse it with tap water. She boiled the water and rinsed it. She felt safe drinking the water.

Breakdown. Karen was at work when her car stopped working. She called for help and realized that her car was a total loss. She called the tow truck company and they came to pick her up. She got her car fixed and they took her home. She was very relieved and happy.

Coffee. Cara went out for coffee on the weekend. It was a really cold day. Cara wanted to warm up, so she grabbed some chocolate milk. Cara set the coffee machine to brew hot coffee. Cara took a sip of her hot coffee.

Carpenter. Tom was interested in carpentry. He decided to learn how to fix old houses. He went to a local home improvement store and purchased supplies. Tom spent the weekend building and fixing his first house. Tom felt great when he finished.
Diet. I had been feeling bad since I lost thirty pounds. I had decided to start a new diet. I made a few new resolutions. I ended up losing my thirty pounds. I was glad that I had put in the work.

The Puppet Show. My family and I wanted to go to a local haunted house. The only problem was, we did not know where to go. We had no idea what to choose, though. We were scared and sad that we couldn't do something fun. Finally, we settled on the puppet show, and the experience was fantastic!

Aquaman. Ginny was so excited for the upcoming movie Aquaman. She was hoping the movie would star her favorite actor, Will Smith. To her dismay, Will Smith was cast as the movie's villain, Mera. Ginny was not pleased by this development. She decided to turn her Facebook profile to her friends, expressing her anger.

Allie's birthday party. Allie was so excited. All her friends were there. But when the party was over, there were no balloons. So Allie was so disappointed. She decided to stay home and watch TV instead.
tired. Jim was feeling very tired. He wanted to take a long break. His mom told him he had to stay awake. Jim stayed up all night and tried to stay alert. Jim made a plan to watch TV during the day.

Mary rides the bus. Mary wanted to be a bus driver. She worked hard all day and all night to earn the money. Finally she was able to buy a bus ticket to school. She got ready to go to school and saw her friend Mary was on the bus. Mary said hello to Mary's friend Mary had a great day.
Late to Practice. Tim had a big baseball game coming up. He wanted to go to practice. Unfortunately he wasn't able to. His mom kept him up all night. Eventually Tim found out that she was just busy.
Bad Reaction. I went to see my doctor yesterday. I had a mild reaction to my medication. The medication is in the eye drops. I got a rash on my forehead. He told me it was not a big deal.

Wrong Change. Tim was hungry one night. He went to the store to buy food. The cashier gave him several different items. Tim ate all the food he received. However, he didn't realize it was his change he used.

Ouch. My wife went to the mall to shop for clothes. She saw a beautiful blue dress that she really liked. She bought it and wore it to a fancy dinner. She was so pleased to see it had been carefully washed. But to her dismay, she saw a tear in the fabric.

Sandwich. Bob had to eat an important meeting. He made himself a sandwich that was both healthy and filling. After the meeting, he felt better than he had in years. Bob went back home and told his wife he felt good. They got a glass of wine and ate it together.
The Bus. Sally was late to work. The bus was moving quickly. Sally needed to catch it. She grabbed the shoulder straps and got on board. Sally ran to work on time.
The Cheater. Juanita was going to a party. Her date didn't want to. Juanita kept sneaking drinks. Her date discovered it. Juanita got kicked out of the party.

The Dog Park. I was excited to go to the dog park with my cousins. The weather was supposed to be beautiful. However, by the time I got there the temperature had dropped. The park had turned into a very cold, depressing place. I still had a great time though, as I was playing with other people.

The Jester. My family went to a church Christmas event. They were seated by a large portrait of Santa. They could see Santa in all of his glory. I decided to get up and walk up and down the portrait. I was so embarrassed!

Horses. Ricky didn't want to start horseback riding. His father told him that they would help him get ready. After a month Ricky decided to try horseback riding. He had a lot of fun and learned a lot. Ricky was glad he took his father's advice and tried horseback riding.
Not Here. Kate got lost. She asked a stranger for help. The stranger wasn't helpful. Kate tried to talk to the stranger. He yelled at her for her trouble and she was glad to get out.

Remorse. Brent was at his friends house. His friend kept him up talking all night. When Brent left the friends house his mom saw him crying. She yelled at Brent to do the right thing. Brent then went to his mom and apologized.
Ugly Picture. Kate bought a new picture. She tried to hang it. The picture was too big. Kate tried to cut a small picture. The picture fit.

John's Chip Dilemma. John had a chip on his shoulder because he was the only kid who didn't like chocolate. He decided to try to get a chip to the principal. John was determined to get the cookie. However, when he went to the principal's office, he was embarrassed. John learned to let people go first or risk getting grounded.
Lunch box. Mary had lunch with her boyfriend at a restaurant. She sat down and began to eat. The lunch box fell on the ground. Mary went to get it. She was relieved to find it was a new one.

A life worth living. Doris was a doctor, who liked to sing. One day her dream came true and she became a professional singer. But after many years of practice, Doris began to lose her voice. She was sad, but her singing became more and more important. Eventually, she had the opportunity to move to LA, and make it her life.

Leaving everything behind. Allie went on a hike today. She went into the forest without a map. At first she thought she was lost. She decided to ask for help. Eventually, her hike ended up finding her.

Low Bank Account. Sam's family had trouble keeping up with expenses. They had a lot of bills and bills were piling up. Sam had to start paying bills late. The bills piled up until Sam was broke. His family decided to take him to a casino.

Michelle's Dream. Michelle dreamed of playing football in college. She practiced all summer long. When fall came she got a scholarship to a big college. She worked hard in all of her classes. Michelle was determined to make a difference for her country.

The house volunteer. Cathy wanted to help her community. She had an idea. She decided to run for an elected position. Cathy found her candidate and campaigned for him. Her candidate won and Cathy was elected.

Sue Buys A Chair. Sue was bored at work and needed to find something to do. She decided to check the chairs in her cubicle. She found the perfect one and took it home. After she put it in her office, she was able to relax. Sue decided to take a day off from work to do something nice.
plastic mold. Susie was working on her car. She made some cups out of plastic. Then, she put them on the hood. The plastic started to move. She had to use a broom to get it all out.

Tight Fight. Sam and his brother were fighting each other. Sam ended up winning. He immediately told his brother he wouldn't fight him again. However, his brother beat him up really badly. Sam felt sad that he lost the fight.
Leftovers. My friends and I went to dinner one night. We ordered three dishes. I forgot to check the box of leftovers. My friend decided to eat them. It ruined the meal.

Internet. Sara had a big test in English. She went to school to study for the test. She also stayed home to watch TV and do some chores. Sara was very busy the whole day. She had no time for homework or study at home.

Final Exam. The school year was almost over and Emma had her final exam. She studied every day and hoped for the best. She was so nervous that she slept through her alarm. When she woke up, she had a huge exam that she was not prepared for. Emma ended up failing her final exam, but she was still happy.

Chemical. Tom was at a restaurant. He had a small amount of food that needed to be heated. Tom kept ordering food. He took too long and it burned him. He realized he had burned the food before he was even done.

Keeping Out Cold Drafts. Bob was a high school teacher who liked to stay warm on winter days. He would often bring a sweater with him and warm up in the lounge. He would keep it on at all times. He didn't bother keeping it clean because he thought he would get cold. When he was in class the next day he got it ruined because of the snow.

The pain. Kenny's dog was being very annoying to him. Kenny decided to change his diet. Kenny changed his dog's food. After he ate the new food Kenny's dog calmed down. Kenny was glad that his dog was no longer annoying him.

Swimsuit. Amy wanted to learn how to swim. She went to the pool and tried to go in. She didn't realize she was going too fast. She ended up falling in the water. She cried because she was embarrassed.

Jim Waches His Brother Play Basketball. Jim wanted to play with his brother. Jim and his brother played basketball for 2 hours. Jim lost the first game but won the second. Jim and his brother have played basketball for 2 hours. They are now playing video games.

Bad Cramps. Cody was out running with friends. He began to have bad cramps in his legs. He went to the doctor and had his leg x-rayed. The doctor gave him some medicine. The cramps went away after a while.

Walking Barefooted. Tina went to the beach yesterday. She went to a place where people were walking barefooted. Tina went through the sand and picked up a few sand grains. When she got home she found sand all over her feet. Tina decided to get new shoes at a store instead.

Sara's Cake. Sara bought a cupcake to bake. She put the cupcake in the oven, waited 20 minutes, and checked on it. When she looked inside, the cake was burnt. Sara tried to be more careful when she baked. The cupcake burned again, and Sara decided to never bake again.
Bad but Good Sushi. I went to an Asian buffet. The food was very expensive. The sushi chefs were out of tuna. My friend had fish and chips. I ate the chips and the fish with my friend.

Martha's Strict Parents. Martha lived in a very strict household. Martha's parents yelled and yelled at her every day. Martha started to question her values and lifestyle. Martha's parents eventually broke up with her over her lifestyle choices. Martha was now more open with her friends and was in good shape.

Thrift Store Rookie. Tom was looking for an affordable suit. He shopped at a thrift store for a week. He saw a jacket that fit well, and bought it. After a month of wear, Tom's jacket fell apart. Tom was disappointed that he had wasted so much money.

Carousel Barker. Hector loved to go to carousels at the county fair. He would sit in the back and watch all of the people come down the track. On one particularly busy day, Hector was caught up watching too much. Hector got so engrossed in the show he had missed the boat. Hector had to be rescued by the ride company.

Only Blue Pens. I got a job at a bank. At first they only gave me white pens. I got to know them and was surprised. I could actually make money from the blue pens. It was very nice of them to let me use them.
Stuck on top. Tim was on a boat. There was a rock sticking up on the bottom. He tried to push it out. It was stuck too hard. Tim was stuck for hours.
Mike Soiled His Diaper. Mike was doing his laundry. He ran out of detergent. Mike ran out of diapers too. Mike ran to the store. Mike purchased diapers and got the detergent back.

Rave. One day I went to a rave and ended up in a lot of trouble. The police showed up on the scene with flashlights. They asked me for ID. They searched me and found my ID. I was let go from the rave.

The Dog Paw. One day the dog got out of his kennel. His owner came home and he was there. His owner couldn't find him anywhere. She looked for him but found him behind his owner's couch. He was barking at her when she opened the door.
Grill. I used to hate to grill food. Then my friends invited me over to grill. I was amazed how good it got. Now I grill on my own. It's a lot of fun and I love my friends.
Busted. Tim got into an argument with his girlfriend. She told him to stop. He did not listen. Tim got into a huge fight with his girlfriend. She told the police she saw him hit her.

Larry Tries Basketball. Larry is a competitive basketball player. Larry decided to try out for his school's team. Larry made the team. Larry's mom told him he could not play basketball this year. Larry decided to go to college instead.
Unsupportive. I was going to go to the movies yesterday. I got my ticket and went in. Then I realized that it was really crowded. I left, frustrated. Thankfully I was able to find a seat.
Dog bite. Cary went for a walk in the forest. He ran into a dog. The dog bit Cary. Cary felt badly. He went home and told his mom.
Cookies. Tina decided to make cookies for the holidays. She used her favorite flavor. Tina's cookies were tasty. But Tina was too good for the cookie jar. Tina decided to make a new batch of cookies.

Needing new glasses. Tom was having trouble reading things. He went to the eye doctor. He was told he needed to wear corrective glasses. Tom bought some. He went out with his friends and saw his reading skills improve.

Cats. The kids wanted some new toys. They asked their parents if they could get some. Their parents said they could play with their own toys. They began to play with their own toys. The kids made lots of new friends.

Power Outage. The electricity went out in Dan's apartment. He was upset but not too badly. Dan decided he would not watch the tv until he can fix it. It took him all morning. Finally he was able to watch a show that was on.

Party love. Joe was a college student. He really liked a girl named Tia. Joe asked her out but she turned him down. Joe asked a random girl at school and she agreed to the date. Tia was thrilled and Joe was happy.

The Missing Tooth. Jack had just gotten his driver's license. He didn't know how to tell his mom he was going on a date. He pulled out a can of glue and poured some in his mouth. He stuck it back in and tried to chew. Unfortunately the tooth had slipped out of his mouth and was missing.

Not Done. Tommy broke his foot in three places. He was very sad because he could not play hockey for a while. His Dad took him to the doctor. The doctor put on a cast. The doctor gave Tommy a band aid to put over his broken foot.

The Lock. Joey was in the grocery store one day. Suddenly, a big box caught his eye. The box was covered with hundreds of locks. Joey wondered what was inside the boxes. Finally, Joey was able to unlock the lock and read the contents.

Good report card. John got a failing grade. John's mom gave him a high five. John went to school to receive a passing grade. He got his test back and it had passed. He received his report card and was very happy.
New froyo place. I just went to get a new froyo. When I got to the store I tried the chocolate. It was disgusting. I had to return it. I am not sure I will return to the store ever again.

The First Job. Fred was nervous to be a bartender. He had never worked in this type of business before. The first customer he saw was nice. He made him a drink. It was so good he asked the boss for a second job.

Positive Attitude. Gina had a crush on her friend Tom. She wanted to be able to kiss him. Gina told her dad she was nervous to ask her parents. His dad reassured her that no matter what her mother said she would be fine. Gina was pleased that he agreed.

School. I went to my first school. It was the first year of middle school. At first I hated it, but it slowly became fun to attend. At first, I would get teased a lot and feel out of place. However, as time went on, my new classmates and teachers became my friends.

Fussy Cat. The other day I saw my cat sitting on my couch. It was very fussy and couldn't get up. The cat's paws were so cold. I didn't know what to do so I called the plumber. Now my cat is warm and I can play with her.

The autobiography. A man wanted to write an autobiography. He wrote an autobiography in several weeks. When he finished, he had a long list of problems with his life. He wrote a lot of stuff about how he felt he was not good at life. He sold a lot of his stuff online.

Alex. Alex was a very mischievous cat. She liked to jump out of her house at night. One day she ran into a man in the street. He ran to her as she ran after him. The man's name was Jim and he took him home.

Wounded Bird. I was at the park with my friends one day. We decided to hunt some birds. I decided to take a long, slow shot at a hummingbird. I didn't realize how close I was to hitting the bird. I was mortified when I saw the bird flying away.
Milk Trap. My son got a milk trap one day. We told him to go pick up some. We saw a squirrel in it. He grabbed the trap. He got out safely.

Painted Nails. Jane hated painting her nails. So when she had a chance, she bought new ones. She bought new ones that were acrylic. She liked how they looked. But the pain from the nails were unbearable.

Small Fire. Ben and Amy were walking through the park. They were walking past a lake. A small fire broke out from a log on the ground. It started a small fire and burned the area. Amy and Ben ran and saved the area.

Career Pains. When I was in college I worked at a grocery store. One of the clerks was really bad at his job. He would steal items from the shelves and throw them away. I told him that he needed to go to college. He went to school and got a masters degree.
Dahlia. Dahlia and Mike started dating. She was the only one he ever liked. Unfortunately, his feelings for her changed. He still likes her though. So they decided to break up.

Raining at pick up. Alicia went to pick up her son from school. When she got to the school she realized it was raining. Alicia asked if it could wait. The lady who was at the school said yes. Alicia drove her son home with a rain coat on.
Grease Burn. Sam was washing dishes. He noticed a greasy film on the floor. Sam put some grease in the sink. The grease got on his arm. Sam had to take it off.

Irrigation. Bob was running low on water for his garden. So he decided to start digging a small well for irrigation. After a few weeks the well was done. He began to water the garden once a day. Bob ended up using only water from the well for his garden.

Pouch. My mother got me an old-fashioned pen pouch for my birthday. I used it for my first pencil, so I was excited. One day I took it off and it was gone. I put it back on and found the pencil and a stray dog. My mother said it's all part of the fun.

Cartoon. Kia wanted a new show to watch on TV. She begged her mom to let her have it. Finally she got it and tried it out. She thought it was very funny! Kia was thrilled to find out she had a new favorite show.

Airplane Food. Tom was at the airport for the first time. He decided he wanted to get some good food. He asked the airport worker for some great menu items. They provided him with sandwiches, hamburgers, and salads. Tom really enjoyed his time at the airport.

The Castle. I saw this castle in the book. It was in the middle of nowhere. I had a great idea to climb inside and pretend I was in a castle. I was able to make my way to the top. I had a great time there.

Refreshing Yellow #3 Batch B. My wife's coworker Sue likes to have a special drink on Friday. Every Friday she will make orange soda and lemonade. This Friday her coworker made lemonade and orange soda. My wife and her coworker both loved it. I guess Sue is a refreshing drink lover after all.

The Museum. Kate wanted to be a museum curator. She found that people like to visit her exhibit. They bought a lot of artifacts there. Kate was happy to have a job that she enjoyed. She made the museum very successful.
Tyler breaks his neck. Tyler was riding his bike. He went down a hill. His bike flipped over. Tyler hit the ground hard. Tyler broke his neck.

Bill Dates Dumb Girls. Bill wanted to meet a girl who had a smart phone. Bill found a smart girl named Sara on the Internet. Bill introduced himself to Sara at the coffee shop. Bill and Sara chatted about music, movies, and books. Bill told Sara he liked her but he was not interested in her.

Late Notice. The landlord called me to his office yesterday. He said he had to clean the whole kitchen. I have not seen my dog for four days. He said it would be finished by the end of the week. I was shocked and upset.

Tammy's Computer Skills. Tammy had just learned how to use her laptop. She needed to use it to help a student. Tammy had a computer science class that was nearby. The instructor set up a meeting. The student helped Tammy with her computer skills.
Sleep. She went to bed at two o'clock. She woke up an hour later. She was not ready to go to work. Her boss called her over and made her wait. She slept through her alarm and had to work early.

Lance. Lance wanted to be in a new band. They auditioned for the local talent show. They only got a couple of spots. Lance started practicing everyday. After the local talent show he got picked as a soloist.

Grocery List. Bob's grocery list was getting really long. He decided to call in some friends to help. They worked on his list for almost a whole day. Bob's list was done! Bob went home, and the list was much easier to remember!

Mailbox Surprise. When I was a kid we used to play hide and seek in the mailboxes at my neighborhood. The trick was you had to hide and then wait to see who hid first. I was a good kid and hid every time and was always the first to find out. One day, the mailman came by with two crates of books and a letter. The mailman smiled and said they were just the same books we hid

Basketball Foul. Ben was playing a game of basketball. His team was up by a lot and their opponents were down by a lot. Ben decided to foul his opponent in order to try and help his team win. However, the referee blew the whistle and Ben went to the bench. Luckily, Ben's team won because they were up by 15 points.

Nothing To Talk About. Joey asked Mary to marry him in his front yard. Joey asked Mary for flowers and chocolate cake to celebrate his proposal. Joey wanted Mary to say yes, but Mary was too afraid to marry. When Joey and Mary left, Mary said that she was ready to be happy. Now Joey and Mary are going to get married.

Worst Fear 2. John was walking on a dark trail with no light. He feared he would fall. He began to think of all the people he had seen that night. John realized he didn't really have any more fear. He turned the light on to see a beautiful sunrise.
The Funeral. It was a funeral. I felt so sad. So sad that I missed work. But at the end of the day, I had a good time. It was a good time.

A girl who loves to Dance. Linda wanted to be in dance forever. She signed up for lessons and practiced often. She decided to compete in a competition. Linda won 2nd place. Linda had a great experience and can't wait to do it again!
Sprinkles. Heather wanted a fancy dress. She wanted it to be bright. She had trouble finding something bright. She decided to buy some pretty glitter sprinkles. She loved them.

Iron Cross. Tina needed a new cross for her school's championship game. She did some research on a cross that was close to hers. She found the cross but not sure what size. Finally, she picked the cross that looked good. When she got to the game, she knew she would win.

Rafting. Rachael and Joe went on a cruise. They both loved spending time on the water. They spent hours exploring and had a blast. They didn't want to stop until it was dark. The only problem was that the boat stopped when it hit a rock.

Holey jeans. Dani worked at a factory. One day she got a call from the head of the company. It was time to change a pair of her favorite jeans. She got on her knees and started to change the jeans. She hated how they felt.
The Watch Shop. I got to work at the watch shop yesterday. I made a brand new watch for the store. They loved it. They sold it out right away. I was very happy.

Dry Lawn. Jim and Jane are moving into a new home. Jim wants to keep his grass green. He decides to just put in a sprinkler system. Jane is not happy with the dry grass. They decide to get a lawn mower and start over.
New Dress. Kate wanted to make a fashion statement. She wanted a fun dress for the party. She chose a fun pink color. But when she tried it on, it did not fit. Kate decided to get a new dress.

A Hot Day. Jake's house was always a hot and humid place. His parents decided to move him to a new area. They took Jake to a place he wasn't used to. He was uncomfortable and began to sweat. Jake's parents were disappointed when he moved in.

Pants. We went shopping last night for new pants. I looked in my closet but there were no pants. I looked in my husband's closet and there were no pants either. I tried to think of something to wear, but I didn't think of anything. I had to settle for looking nice for him.

Stay at Home Mom. Laura's daughter was diagnosed with autism. Her daughter was afraid of the dark and couldn't sleep all day. Laura told her daughter she was sleeping late and she was sleepy. Laura's daughter felt much better after reading her stories. Laura was happy her daughter was happy.

The Security Camera. Joe bought a new security camera for his house. He watched it all the time. It was a lot of fun to watch the footage. He posted the footage online. It got a lot of views and encouraged others to buy cameras too.

Pool Day. Tom had just gotten a new pool table. He spent his first day practicing his swings. He then went to play it with his friends. They all hit on the same spots. Tom had fun at his first pool day.

The test fail. Diane had a math test. She was terrified but prepared. She stayed up all night studying for it. When she got to the testing area she fell asleep. Her mom noticed and took her home to finish the test.

Talk Show. She had always wanted to try stand up comedy. When she found out she had to audition, she panicked. She had never been on a stage, and it was hard. She thought she would fail miserably. Yet to her surprise, she made some friends and was very successful.
Chess. I had never played chess before. My friend took me to a chess tournament last night. I won every game! I have a lot of fun playing chess with my friend. I hope we can play sometime soon!

Goo Rue Food. We ordered pizza and fries from the gourds at the restaurant. They had a lot of things on the menu. We ordered a lot of different types. It was a lot of fun to try a bunch of different items. It was a good place.

Doing the Exact Opposite. My cousin told me to get in a line at the store. We were already sitting in line. I realized that I forgot my wallet at home. I rushed to the store to buy my wallet. We had to sit in line for hours.
Weight loss. Kelsi was overweight. She went on a diet. She lost 15 pounds. Kelsi was happy about the change. She decided to keep a diet.
Trip. Sandy and her husband have been married for five years. The couple went on vacation. They visited a seaside resort. Sandy and her husband had a lot of fun. They were happy that they went.

Swimming. When John was a kid he wanted to learn to swim. He bought a swim suit and began practicing in the pool. John was good at swimming but didn't like to go in the water. He decided to stay out of the pool. The next summer he went swimming in the backyard.

Pregnant. Allison and her husband were expecting a baby. It would be a girl so Allison needed help. She went to a doctor to get an ultrasound done. She was very scared but decided to let the doctor help her. Luckily, the ultrasound showed that Allison was pregnant.
Summer Reading. Tom loved books. His friend suggested he read a good book on summer reading. Tom's friend recommended an old book. Tom read the book. Tom was glad that he had read a good book.

Job. Robby worked as a server at a popular restaurant. One night a customer brought him a tray of food. He handed it to him and asked him to put in some butter. The customer thanked him and asked him to bring more. Robby felt bad he had forgotten about the butter.

Green Grass. Tommy was a homeless man. Tommy found a spot for green grass. Tommy decided to plant a large green bush. Tommy had green grass planted on his property. Tommy loved having green grass at his home.

The Tattoo. Ben had been practicing his art for weeks. He had finally gotten it right on his leg. His friends were impressed with his work. His friends invited him to the local festival. Ben was glad he had gotten it right.

A Bounty of Soda. Gina's dad got her a huge soda. She went out with the boys to get it. As they went Gina's favorite place to sit down. They sat in the front and enjoyed the soda. She didn't even know the boys got her soda until they left.

I'm a Bad Goalie. Today, I was trying to make a save in my soccer game. The ball was flying at me when I took a touch and saw my goalie fall. My body fell on top of him, so I got up. I ran toward the goal and tried to score the next goal. I was about to shoot when the other goalie tackled me from behind.

Suspension. When John got a speeding ticket, he was so angry he drove off. He drove a lot in his anger but ended up crashing his car. It was scary but luckily no one was injured. The officer thought he deserved a more serious suspension. So John was forced to go to anger management classes.

Cops. A man got out of his car and stopped to pick up groceries. A cop pulled him over. He said that the man had no identification on him. The man asked the cop what happened to the ID he had. The cop told the man that he had to leave.

Ramen. A man was visiting Japan. He was impressed by the amazing variety of noodles. He decided to make ramen for himself. He bought all the ingredients. He put it all in a pot and cooked it over the fire!

Loose Cage. Tom had been chasing the train for a while. It had stopped at a station where it had some luggage. It decided to unload a lot of cargo, so it stopped. Tom was worried that it might have left him behind. Instead he got a free ride out of it.

Bike Race. Tim was riding his bike down the street. Someone behind him was going as fast as him. Tim decided to ride faster. He managed to beat the other person. He decided that riding faster was better than running.

The New Drink. Sam got out a new drink. He thought the new drink would appeal to his friends. Sam tried to sell the new drink to a bar. Sam's friends did not like the new drink. The new drink did not sell well at the bar.
Hunter. The man hunted. He hunted a lot. He caught a lot of prey. He had an exciting time hunting. He enjoyed hunting.

Angel at Work. Angel was an attractive worker who wanted a promotion. She told her manager about her romantic feelings for a co-worker. Angel's manager gave her a performance bonus for her commitment. Angel thanked her manager and the co-worker in a phone call. She told her co-worker she didn't care about money, and enjoyed working.

The Game. Cara loved playing chess. Her friends thought she was very competitive. One day, her mom signed her up for a local chess tournament. Cara beat all the other players. Cara decided she would start playing chess more often.

Problem Solver. Mike was a very good chess player. He didn't think his chess skills were that great. Mike began to search the internet for tips to help his chess. Mike found a website with many tips to improving his chess. Mike signed up for free chess lessons to improve his chess.

Sara's New Friend. Sara decided to invite her friend Lucy over to play on the swings. Lucy was excited to come over and play. Sara got some food and brought the swing set. Sara and Lucy started swinging, and Sara's mom called. Sara's mom took the swings back and made Lucy stay the night.

Wedding Day. It was my first day of high school. I took my date to a football game. My date and I had a great time. However, her car broke down and she couldn't go to the game. We will definitely not go on a date like that again.

Car Wash. I am allergic to detergents. I decided to try something I had never tried before. I washed my car in the car wash. I was shocked at how badly my car was damaged. Now I am more cautious of car wash cleaners.

First Day of School. I had just turned seven years old. I couldn't wait to start Kindergarten. I started going to school the day I turned seven. After two weeks, I was enrolled. By the time I left Kindergarten, I was in first grade!

Wish. The little girl saw a red ball on the ground. She ran up to the ball and said it was a wish. The ball flew toward the girl. The ball went in her hands. The little girl hugged the ball and wished for a long time.

Sleepover. The Jones family decided to go to the park to have fun. They brought all their toys and snacks. At the park, they played games and had fun. At dinner they all played a game together. They all had a great time.
Pilates. My friend's daughter loves Pilates. She is six years old. I asked her if she wants to try pilates. She said yes. I told my daughter it was a great workout.

The Canal. Amber and her family were on their way to the canal. While swimming, she had a bit of a panic attack. She thought about going back home. Then she remembered her mom and dad wanted to meet her. Amber was glad she'd at least made it to the canal.
Test. Maryann had a test tomorrow. She was worried she would not do well. Luckily she did alright. She was happy. She was glad she did well.

Shut Down. Amy was watching the new Sci-fi show at home. Suddenly the power went out. Amy had to sit on the couch to wait for a call. When the power came back on, she saw the power had gone out. Amy had to clean her room while she waited for her power.

Need A Ride. Sam was a college student who got home late one night. He needed to call for a ride to work. He couldn't find his phone and called a friend. His friend got him into a cab to work. Sam was glad that he wasn't late.

The Girl Scout. Sue wanted to be a girl scout. She did chores for the girls and gave them candy. Her mom said she was old enough to be a girl scout. Sue didn't go because she was too old. Her mom and dad are still sad they didn't get her a girl scout.

Bought new sheets. Lars bought new sheets to make his home a little cooler. He put them up on his deck, but they felt too heavy. He cut them into small pieces. He put them on the ground. Now, his deck is cooler than it was.

The Haircut. Cameron was getting married in a week. He went to the stylist to get a new style. They cut his hair down to his shoulders. Then they did a great job. The man was so happy about his new look.

Marco's Big Goal. Marco was determined to achieve his dream of playing in the NFL. He worked very hard and started playing football early in life.
