Marco's high school coach had the opportunity to play for the NFL. Marco's hard work paid off and he was drafted to the team. Marco is now the top player on his team and is very happy.
The Glass Bottle. I was at my house one day. I was carrying a glass bottle. I was walking across the house with it. I accidentally dropped it. It broke on the ground and broke my arm.

Weird Channel. My wife decided to watch tv. She opened a tv show to watch. The channel turned on and switched to an obscure channel. My wife tried searching online for something else. Luckily she was able to find another channel to watch.
Trash. I saw a sign for trash pickup. I walked over to it. I put my bags inside. I drove away. I walked home empty handed.
Shiny Red. The girl's hair was very shiny. She decided to get a hair dye. When she did the hair it was a light pink. The girl found the color very attractive. The girl bought the product.
One shot. Jim was playing ball. His team was losing. All Jim had to do was score one basket. Jim hit the ball. Jim's team won the game.

The Abandoned Car. Gina was going to pick up her dad from work. She was going to drive him to his old car, parked in the garage. She called the car's number. The number was no longer available. Gina went to her dad's old car instead.
Competition. Nancy competed in an archery contest. She aimed to score the highest total. She practiced the bow day and night. Her archery was flawless. Nancy won the competition.

Louis and the computer. Louis has always been afraid of computers. Louis has always been shy to use computers in class. Louis meets a girl at school that is friendly to computers. Louis and the girl start dating. Louis is now comfortable using computers in class.

High School Football. I really loved playing football. I was not very good at it. One day, I tried hard and ran very fast. I made the team as my team captain. We all cheered when we saw me on the football field.

The Play's the Thing. In college I became obsessed with The Lion King. My roommates all thought the movie was silly. Finally I convinced them I wanted to go see the movie. I spent two months perfecting my lines. I was so nervous I was nearly in tears.

Painted House. When Sam was five she wanted a special home painting for her birthday. Her mother took her to the art store and showed her lots of paintings. Sam decided she didn't want to buy a painting from the store. She painted her own house with markers instead. She really loved the house she painted!

Happy Birthday. Benny woke up happy. He didn't know how to say his birthday. His mom went to the grocery store. She asked them if they would buy him a card. The gift card made it easier for Benny to say his birthday.

Quinn and Rowen at Recess. Quinn and Rowen liked to go to recess. One day, they decided to play a prank on the other kids. They dressed up as pirates and went to recess as pirates. Rowen was scared and asked his mom what they were doing. Quinn laughed and said they were pirates.

The New Dog. The family moved to a new neighborhood. They saw a new dog wandering around the neighborhood. They decided to keep an eye on the dog. It seemed to calm down after a while. They named the new dog Spot.

Hot and sticky room. Tom and Sara were married for 2 years. Tom had a hard time with his wife. He wanted her to stop fighting with him. She got mad at him. They eventually got along but it took a while.
The Fly. Drew was playing in the yard. He was looking at the grass with a stick. He accidentally stepped on a fly. The fly stung his foot. Drew had to go to the hospital to get it fixed.
New job. Jim was unemployed. He needed a job. He applied to jobs all over town. Eventually Jim got a job at a fast food restaurant. Jim was happy that he got a job.
Rick is hurt. Rick was walking down the street. He noticed a cat sitting on the sidewalk. He took out his phone and took pictures. Rick's phone didn't work well. He couldn't get his pictures back.

A Friend's Thanksgiving. Jim and Sarah had an argument on Facebook. The argument lasted for months. One day, they decided to have dinner at a friend's house. At the end of the day, Jim told Sarah he was sorry for being mean. Sarah was happy to see Jim apologize for his Facebook comments.

Treat. Today I was going to have a chocolate peanut butter treat. I got out all my ingredients. When I looked at the bag, the chocolate was gone. I found out the peanut butter was on top of the chocolate. My dog got a piece of chocolate.

Olivia. Olivia and her sister were playing outside. Suddenly, Olivia slipped and fell down! The fall hurt very badly! Thankfully, she was not seriously injured. She went inside, where she decided to play video games instead.

Apple Pie. Anna bought an apple pie from the grocery store. She didn't realize that it was a commercial for a new candy. When she got home, she couldn't wait to try it. But when she tried the candy, she became sick. Anna threw out her apple pie and never bought commercial junk again.

Motorcycle Accident. Tim was riding his motorcycle home from work. He was going very fast down a one way street. A semi truck ran into him and he was thrown. The accident was slow moving but it hurt Tim badly. Tim vowed never to ride on the street again.
Car. We bought a car. It ran very well and was great fun. We went to a lot of fun events in it. One day we decided to take it to the beach. It wasn't that fun but was fun nonetheless.

First Time Shaving. Sara was about to shave her face for the first time. She was nervous, but it was worth it to get it right. When she finished the first time, she was shocked. It looked so good! Sara felt confident about her upcoming shave.

Registry Wit. A student had to get his driver's license. He went to the registry and filled out the paperwork. The office worker read all of the documents to him. When he handed them back, he was confused. The student then said he did not understand the paperwork.

All Work, No Play. Bill and Tim had been friends for three Year's. They were both great athletes, but Bill had never been much of a gamer. One day he decided to enter a gaming competition. Bill put his best performance all into his game. He won the contest and got a new videogame console.
Too Drunk. Tom and his friends wanted to do something fun. Tom decided to party. They drank a lot of alcohol. They crashed and passed out. The next morning Tom was very embarrassed.
Winning. Jim's team won a hockey game. They took their trophy home. Jim's team was very proud of their win. The owner had the best dinner ever. Jim's team enjoyed the dinner.

Movie Night. John was bored at home. He saw a movie at the movies. He decided to go with his friends to watch it with him. They all had fun and were tired after. He decided to watch more movies with them.

Bicycle Accident. Billy had a great time riding his bike around town. One evening while riding in his driveway he fell. The next morning he woke up with a sore knee. He had a lot of pain in his knee for the next 2 weeks. Billy vowed he would never ride a bike without a good pair of pants.

The Pianist. One day there was a piano concert at a local elementary school. I went to the concert and was impressed by the talent of the pianists. At the end of the concert I was disappointed that I did not get to hear. The next day I went to the studio and met the pianist. He was not very good but I loved his voice and I will always listen to him.

Speak To His Mom. It was late at night and Ben needed some sleep. His mom wasn't home and he decided to go to her. He called her in the kitchen. He sat with her and began to tell her why he was crying. She comforted him and promised to see him soon.

The Birthday Party. Allison had a birthday party at her friend's house. She got lots of presents and snacks. But her friend had a surprise for her! He brought her a puppy. Allison was very happy that she had a party after her birthday.
A Crazy Sandwich. My mom made us lunch. I asked for a sandwich. She made me an amazing one. I was really surprised. I thanked her.

Pancake Time. John wanted to make pancakes. He put all the ingredients in a pot and turned on the burner. John watched as the pancake sizzled for a few seconds. John got frustrated and threw the pot on the ground. John ate the pancake and learned to be more careful.

The Basketball Showdown. Billy was on the basketball team. One day he played against a bigger and meaner kid. Billy was tired and tired. Eventually the other kid punched him in the nose. Billy was so angry that he punched the kid in the face.

The Bucket. Sam walked down the street and saw a big wheeled dumpster. He picked it up and headed to the store. Sam's wife gave him a tour of the dumpster. Sam brought back some food and a soda. He sat down and had a nice lunch.

Floating down the river. Sam had never been rafting before. She didn't have a lot of experience but decided to give it a try. She bought a raft at the store and set out for the river. On the river Sam was nervous about her first time. Thankfully she had lots of fun and it was one of her favorite experiences.

Alan's Eulogy. Alan was invited to give a eulogy at his friend's funeral. Alan was very nervous. He thought that he would fail in his task. He spent hours preparing and praying. Alan's eulogy was perfect and it went smoothly.

Credit Card Debt. John had a lot of debt. John had recently been in a bad car accident. John was late paying his credit card bill. John could not afford his payments on time. John went to a loan shark to get the money he owed.

Trip to the beach. Lulu loved taking her family to the beach. She was able to go to a nearby beach because it was close. She was planning on taking her family there for vacation. However, Lulu's family ended up going to the same place. Lulu wished that she had gone to the beach earlier.

Ralph's Dog. Ralph had just gotten a new dog. The dog was so playful and fast. One day Ralph left the house with his dog. He couldn't find his dog anywhere. The dog ran all the way to Ralph's house after being chased by a squirrel.

Hiking up Hawksbill Crag. Tim went on a hike up the Hawksbill Mountains in Maine. He started from the beach and hiked up to the top of the mountains. Tim was sweating and cold. He turned around and went back down the trail. After that he had to get more water.

The Playground. Cory loved going to the playground. He had always wanted to rollerblade and play soccer. His friends decided to get a few friends together and play. They had a blast and Cory got sick. They had to be very cautious while riding the swings.

Lawyer or prosecutor. Jane was a young lawyer. She tried to defend a man accused of a crime. The man didn't believe the woman was telling the truth. The man was found guilty. The woman was awarded $10,000.

Food Truck. It was Joe's first time trying a food truck. He saw a chicken and waffles truck that he was interested in. Joe walked over to see the food truck. When he got to the food truck, he decided to give it a try. He ordered the chicken and waffles and they were delicious.
First kiss. Cindy was about to take her first kiss. Her date was there to introduce her. She tried to ignore him but couldn't. She couldn't ignore the kiss at all. She ended up falling in love.

Cruise. Tina was going on her first cruise. She was very excited. However, her excitement wore off when she heard the sea shanties. She kept staring at the screen. Then she realized she didn't want to get on the boat.
Baby Bottle. Sammy was having a baby. He needed to buy diapers for the new baby. He went to the store to buy baby bottles. Sammy's wife was upset at Sammy. Sammy felt bad for her.
The Big Test. Sara has a big exam today. She has been studying for weeks. She knows she is ready. Sara gets up and begins to study. When it is her turn to take the test, Sara feels sick.
The Dog Bowl. We have a dog named Bailey. Bailey is a big dog. When Bailey wakes up we usually put him in a bowl. He likes to chew on the inside. Now we always put Bailey in the bowl.

Peach Ice Cream. My brother got me ice cream for my birthday. I poured out a lot of the chocolate in the cup. I then used two sticks of butter in a bowl. I mixed them all together. Then I added a little peach ice cream.
Strange massage. One day I went to a massage parlor. I decided to try a strange one. They gave me a very strange massage. I tried it and it was very painful. I decided not to go back there.
Four Minutes. Sam bought a new watch. He liked how it showed time. So he bought four minutes for it. He took it home and set it up. He didn't realize how accurate it was.

Horror Film. I watched this movie last night. I can't think of anything else to say. I can't wait until it is released on DVD. I have bought it on video already. I will be waiting for it to come out on DVD.
Old Jeans. Tom bought some new jeans. They fit him very well. He wore them out and had to return them. The cashier called the owner and apologized. The owner apologized and offered to exchange them.

Eggplant. I went to the supermarket to buy some eggs. I bought a few kinds of eggplants. When I got home I made a batch of chicken noodle soup. I put the noodles in the toaster and it cooked. My noodle soup was a hit at dinner.

The Rescue. Drake was helping to rescue a child. He was helping to pick up someone's child. He didn't realize it was too late. The child had been drowned. Drake had to help his rescuer with the baby's life.

The Divorce. Lana was very worried that her boyfriend was cheating. He was also very mean to her, which Lana found upsetting. They decided to discuss it together. They both agreed that he would have to stop. They were then very happy.

Finally Alone. Kirk was depressed and lonely. He couldn't decide where he wanted to be. He went to the local bookstore to see what was on sale. There was nothing but books. He was sad and read a book instead.

Put on Your Pants. Amy was waiting in line for a bus. She was wearing an outfit that wasn't too revealing. Amy put on her pants and walked to the bus stop. When she got on the bus she was wearing only her underwear. Amy was mortified.

The Science Experiment. Jane was taking a science experiment to school. The experiment would have to keep the temperature under twenty degrees. Jane was extremely anxious because she didn't know if the temperature would hold. Jane carefully observed her experiment and she was certain it would hold. Jane successfully performed her experiment.
Cass. Cass was eating at her favorite place. She was enjoying her meal. Then she started to choke. Her mom took her to the hospital. Cass lost all of her food and now hates her mom.

Tina's Dinner. Tina cooked dinner for her family for the first time. She was nervous because they were all new to eating. She didn't know how to use the tongs correctly. After some practice she felt confident enough to start cooking. Tina was happy that she had learned to use the tongs correctly.
Car. Sheila decided she needed a new car. She decided to buy a used Toyota. Sheila drove the car for many weeks. One day she heard a squeaking noise. It was an old radiator.

The Irritating Neighbor. Linda was working in her yard when she heard some rustling. Her cat was getting out of the cage. When Linda walked outside the cat ran into her neighbor's front door. Linda called animal control to report the cat. Her neighbor was happy to help her find her lost cat.

Camel Ride. Tom's friend invited him to go camel riding. He was not sure how this would go. Tom got to the top of the mountain. The camel rider began yelling. Tom decided he didn't like camel riding after that.

Horace Eats Donuts. Horace has always wanted to eat donuts. Horace makes his favorite donut. Horace enjoys eating his favorite donut. Horace is happy about his donut eating experience. Horace will eat donuts for breakfast the rest of the day.

Early Breakfast. Lucy woke up to an hour of sleep and wanted to eat breakfast. She ate oatmeal and eggs and made a big bowl of cereal. She then headed to the kitchen for her favorite hot dogs. When she got back to the bed she heard loud crying. Lucy had forgotten to put the cat's food in the cat bowl!

Getting the last ipad. Cindy and her friend got their last ipad. The two girls had to take it back to the Apple store. They were really disappointed. The store was packed. They went back home with the ipad and bought another one.

Brought Lunch. I decided to bring lunch to the office. My coworkers didn't mind but I did. I brought lunch to the office. However, my co-workers came to my desk. I apologized but they still didn't like me.

The catch. Sam was the most talented basketball player on his team. Sam always tried to score more points than his opponents. He challenged his team to a basketball game. The team refused. Sam was kicked out of the team.
Sober. I went to a party. Everyone drank a little too much. I felt gross after. The next day I felt sick. My parents grounded me for being so sloppy.
The restaurant. Anna was at the bar. Her friends were there. They asked her what she thought of the food. She said she liked the food. They wanted to go back.

Hat. Tanya always wore a hat. Her mother told her she could not. The girl had been picked on a lot in school. Tanya asked her mother why she didn't like her. She didn't get the chance to talk to her mother about it.

The snakebite. The snake was wandering around in the woods. An old farmer was going to shoot at it to see if he would. The farmer held the snake over a pot and waited. Suddenly, the snake bit the farmer and he screamed. The farmer decided to take the snake back to the farm.

Birds. A bird flew into my neighbor's window today. It started flying away when he opened it. The bird was too scared to fly into the window. I decided to take the bird out and feed it. The bird flew off after.

Teeth whitening fail. Allie went to the dentist for a checkup. It was supposed to be a simple clean. She had to sit in the chair for an hour. She got up when her mom came in. Allie was horrified when she saw her teeth.

Going to the Zoo. The family loved going to the zoo. Their favorite animal to see was the penguin exhibit. They had a great day in the penguin habitat. They fed the penguins, saw the penguin exhibit, and went home. The family had a great day at the zoo.

New Camera App. Nell was looking through the smartphone apps for a new camera. She tried several of them. None were as good as she thought they would be. Finally she found one that was perfect. She immediately downloaded it and was glad to have a new camera.
New dress. Kelly wanted to buy a new dress. Kelly couldn't find the perfect dress. Then she found the perfect dress. Kelly loved her new dress. Kelly bought the dress.
Wrong Number. Tom got into an argument. He called the wrong number. It wasn't his number. Tom felt embarrassed. He had to get another number.
Mean Dog. Tom was playing with his friends. He went through a bush. His dog came by the bushes and bit Tom. He had to go to the hospital to get treated. Tom got a rabies shot.

The Tower. A group of children were bored at school. They decided to play games together. They set up a tower with balls and blocks. The tower slowly rose in the air. They called it tower, and everyone laughed.

Fish Tales. Sara decided to try to catch a trout. She bought bait and got her pole. The trout did not bite, and Sara became frustrated. She took out her phone and started filming her attempts. She uploaded her footage to YouTube and watched it go viral.
Newspaper. Tucker was bored. He was reading a newspaper. Tucker read all the news articles. Tucker had an idea. He was going to have a party!

Driving to the beach. I decided to drive to the beach. I took the local highway to my destination. However, I was very nervous driving by myself. I was afraid my car wouldn't start. Luckily, the parking lot was just a short walk away.

The Apple Orchard. Kate and her family were on a family trip. They were in the apple orchard. They were amazed by the huge amount of apples in the orchard. Kate and her family ate a lot of apples. It was a good trip.

David forgets about the sandwich. David was hungry. David decided he would make a sandwich. David put a slice of ham and cheese on his bread. David put some mustard on his sandwich. David ate the sandwich.
Bad grades. Tom's grades weren't great. He spent a lot of time in his room. He was playing games with friends. His grades didn't improve. Tom never played again.

The Show. Hilda was watching the first episode of her favorite TV show. It was a dark and violent horror show. Hilda was afraid the show would be so violent. But as the show went on, it became much funnier and more fun. Hilda loved every minute of her favorite show!
Beach. Lana loved the beach. She had a new vacation spot decided. She went down to the beach one day. She loved it! She spent that day relaxing.
Bad Tooth. I was eating some bread. I was chewing the whole piece. However, it broke my tooth. I had to get it fixed. However, the dentist was nice and fixed it.

Day Off. It had been a long week. The only thing on my mind was the day off I had. The thought of not working made me feel exhausted. Instead of relaxing, I tried to stay active. Now I can stay in better shape.

Making Out at the Movies. Kate and John were having dinner together. John decided to watch a scary movie. Kate decided to make out with John at the movie theater. She made out for hours. Eventually John went home.

Charlie Helps Paint. Charlie had always hated painting his living room. One day he decided to do something about it. Charlie went to the store and bought a paintbrush. Charlie used the brush to paint his living room a beautiful color. Charlie was very proud of his painting.

Black and white party. A few friends of mine were out to a bar last night. The lights were very dim and it looked like the place was all black. I noticed several of the men dressed up in black pants and shirts. One of the black men told me the club had been robbed. He said they left the bar with two hundred dollars and ran to the parking lot.
Unhappy about the gift. Amy's mom had given her a gift. She was excited about the gift. Unfortunately, her mom was unhappy about it. Amy did not get the present she asked for. Amy felt disappointed.

The Gay Sister. The man looked at the boy with his hands in his pockets. The boy looked at him with a sad face. The boy's mother stood in the doorway, waiting for her son. The boy opened his arms to hug his mother. She walked to his side, to see the boy was gay.
Water. The man poured some water into the faucet. He forgot to turn it off. The water filled the toilet. He cleaned it. He tried to fix the water leak.

Visit. Sally wanted to visit her family in New York. Her husband thought it would be a nice vacation. He asked her how much she was willing to spend. She told him a lot of money. He told her to call her husband to make the reservation.

Back to School. Sue was excited to start her first day of school. She took her mom and dad to the bus station. They arrived at school and began the day. After the first day, they decided it was time for the annual trip. It was a nice, quiet day and they enjoyed watching the river.

Late Night TV. Sally has always wanted to be a TV host. She tried going to college, but didn't get very far. One day, she asked her friend who had a great job for a new job. She got a job at a local sports bar and is a great host. Now, Sally's television show is popular and she loves it.

iPhone reveal. Sally was at a friend's house. She accidentally dropped her iPhone while washing dishes. She decided to open the phone to see the screen. The screen was completely blank. Sally then decided she needed to wait to return the phone.

Thrones. I wanted to watch my favorite show. My wife wanted to watch her favorite show. We decided to watch The Walking Dead. We decided to have a huge dinner. We finished the show, watched it, and watched the rest later.
The Brave Fireman. Jim was a firefighter. He was on a fire truck one day. One of his tires got stuck in the mud. He had to climb out to remove the stuck tire. Jim was saved from the burning vehicle.

Met at a Bar. Kate and her friends had met at a bar. It was cold but warm, so Kate and her friends drank. Kate and her friends played video games while they drank. At the end of the night, Kate and her friends had to go home. The girls decided to go back to that bar next time they saw each other.

Cooking White Rice. I wanted to make white rice. I tried cooking it, but the rice turned out to be tough. I was discouraged and decided to try to buy some rice. I bought some rice and was disappointed. However, I did learn that I was eating rice by mistake.

Mini golf. I went to the mini golf course for my birthday. They had a three hole course, but they only let you play five holes. I got to play three holes on Saturday. I was so good I made two baskets and one putt! My parents were so proud.

Dancefloor. Tom worked at a local dance floor. He was an excellent dancer and it was a great job for him. He often performed in front of his friends and family. One day he broke his ankle dancing with his friends. It took him three weeks to get his ankle straightened.

Shirtless. Sara was on her way to school. She noticed a boy who looked like he had just taken a shower. She stopped to ask him if he needed any help. He said yes and went on his way. She got dressed and started to walk.

Short Stories. Remy has been writing short stories for a long time. He usually starts them at the young age of 16. He is now published in multiple anthologies. Last year he won first prize in the NY Times Book Prize. He hopes that in the future he will be able to have a successful career.
The careless destruction. Sylvia was driving to work. All of a sudden she lost control of her car. She hit a tree. Her car broke into several pieces. Sylvia had to call for a tow truck.

Big Change. Tom lived by himself for most of his life. He used to work in an office and have a wife and kids. He then became a single man. Tom had a few bad experiences and decided to go out. He got a second job and finally had his family.

glasses. Amy needed new glasses. She went to the optometrist. She waited in the waiting room for an hour. When she walked in the optometrist gave her a pair of glasses. Amy felt very comfortable wearing her new glasses.

More Books. Bob started a new job at a small publishing house. He had just finished a book and was really looking forward to seeing it. Unfortunately, the publisher said they didn't want to put it out. Bob didn't understand why they wouldn't do so. Bob was upset that his book would not get out.

Emma's track race. Emma was running a race in the 4 mile. The race started at 10:00. By the time Emma was half way through the race, the wind was blowing. The wind blew Emma's shirt off. Emma was disappointed her first attempt was not a success.

Overstepping Boundaries. Jane was trying to find a new hobby. She was interested in the arts. After much research, she decided to get into cosplay. After months of practicing, she got a job in cosplay. Now, Jane is really enjoying her hobby.

Terrible Haircut. Jane had always been a tomboy. So when she got her haircut she was very surprised. She was cut in a way that was so long and uneven. She kept telling her friends how horrible it was. But as her friends laughed, she realized it was funny.

Birthday Cake. Dani was so excited for her birthday! She ordered a slice of chocolate cake from the store. When she went home, Dani put it on the table. She immediately stared at it. When her mom saw it, she thought she had done a horrible job.

Team Morale. There was a big competition at work the next day. Everyone was competing and it was close. It was all up to a small group of people. Everyone held their nerve and played their part. The entire team did well.
A Bad Cut. Drew was a hard worker. He would always put in extra effort. One day he cut his thumb badly. He was unable to work for 2 weeks. He was a lot happier once he healed.
Cheaters. A man was a star swimmer in college. He made it to the finals. He challenged an innocent girl to a race. The girl won by a landslide. The man cheated on his girlfriend.

Park Accident. Jake was driving his new pickup truck down a local road. His truck suddenly spun out on a corner and almost hit a tree. Jake had to swerve and get out of his car. When Jake finally got back into the car he saw the tree was still there. Jake decided it was best to give up and enjoy the rest of his trip.
Indigestion. Sam was trying to eat a sandwich. He was really trying to chew it. Then he couldn't stop. He tried to eat the whole thing. Eventually, he finished it.

Luke Plays Guitar. Luke really wanted to play a guitar. His parents told him he would not learn to play in a week. Luke did not want to start lessons. His parents finally convinced him to give it a shot. Luke now plays the guitar in a band.
Pull Up Me. Mike was a bully. Mike decided to do a pull up on another kid. The kid got angry. Mike didn't want to get in trouble. Mike apologized, but the kid did not.
Getting a snack. Allie went to the mall. She wanted to get something to eat. Then she saw the new candy store. It was so much more. So she got tons of new candy.

Rita visits her grandparents. Rita had a long distance relationship with a boyfriend. Her grandparents were far away. One day her boyfriend asked her if she'd like to see them. She agreed to see them. She had a wonderful time.

Childhood Games Made Real. Tia was playing in the sandbox with her cousins. Her favorite game was Checkers. They decided to play Checkers. Tia's favorite checker ended up winning the game! It was a game Tia would play every Friday night!

Pearls before (Guinea) Swine. Liz had always wanted to see a rare pearl necklace before she left for college. She saved money and finally had enough to buy one. When she arrived in college, she was so excited to try it. She could not believe how beautiful it was. Liz had been saving for a week so it would be worth it.

Making a New Friend. When I was a young boy, my friends all picked on me. As a result, I was always the target of their jokes and taunts. So I decided to take matters into my own hands. I decided to stop picking on my friends and start making new ones. After many years, I became the most popular kid in my class!

Worried. Gloria was very worried about the baby. She had a few things on her mind. When she went to get her baby her husband was gone. She felt as if he could disappear tomorrow. Thankfully he was home and she could wait.
Burn. Tom was at a music festival. He was listening to his music and tripped over his phone. His phone ended up breaking. Tom had to buy a new one. Tom bought a brand new phone.

Open Door. The Smith family loved living in the house with open doors. One night the whole family sat on the couch and watched the sunset. All of a sudden a gust of wind hit the house and knocked it over. The Smith family loved having a small enclosed porch again. It was a pleasant family home again.

Pink Shirt. John wanted to wear a new shirt. But he wasn't sure what he wanted. He looked around online and settled on a pink shirt. He chose a shirt that was the same as everyone else. John wore his new shirt to school the next day.
Camping Trip. Cindy decided to go camping with friends. Her friends told her to wear her best clothes. She took her clothes off. Cindy and her friends decided to hike. The girls had a great time.

The Bad Hair Cut. Tim's hair was getting really short. He went to his barber for a new haircut. The barber cut off too much of Tim's hair. Tim's hair started getting really curly. Tim decided to just cut his own hair.

Santa Claus. My friends and I were in the car when we heard the sirens behind us. We pulled over and noticed a semi-truck pulling an old truck. The driver was yelling at people to get out. A cop drove by and told him to get out and he got out. The driver didn't stop, but we helped him get out.

Cabin Fever. John went camping with his friends one weekend. The weather was perfect, and they enjoyed the quiet. But they found out about cabin fever soon after. They weren't used to it, and got sick within a few days. John was so embarrassed, and stopped going back.
Cold Pizza. Tom ordered a frozen pizza. The pizza was cold when it came out. He took it to the kitchen. Tom looked at the pizza and was disgusted. He ordered a pizza from a different restaurant.

Eggs. Ava was so excited to have eggs in the house. She opened the fridge, ready to eat them. She walked away to get a glass of water. When she returned, she saw her eggs had all melted. She realized she should have been more careful when making them.
Clancy Makes Toast. Clancy was out of bread. He decided to cook himself some toast. Clancy put the bread in the toaster. Clancy let the bread toaster heat up. Clancy used the toast to make pancakes.

Jumping. Ben went jogging yesterday. He didn't think too much of it. He didn't stop for a very long time. The next thing you know, he was at a very large tree. A large bird flew by Ben's face and he lost his balance.
Peppermint Bark. It was late summer. I needed to do something to pass the time. I put peppermint bark in my yard. All my friends looked at me with disgust. I decided to move to the mountains.

Hospital Visit. Hannah was visiting her sister in the hospital. She needed to use the bathroom but they were far away. She walked to the hospital to use the bathroom. She was greeted by the nurse and asked if she needed anything. She thanked her and left to go use the bathroom.

Miniature Dining Room. Janice wanted a new dining room in her house. She went to the store to look for a design. She wanted it to be a bit more rustic. She bought an old rocking chair and a rocking chair frame. The new dining room was beautiful.
The Snow. The kids were running around in the snow. It was a really deep pile. The parents told them to get inside. They jumped out and ran around in the snow. It had been a fun day!
The Well. We were walking through the woods. My sister and I came across an old well. It had been abandoned for years. We went into it and dug. There was a big turtle in the well.

Nathan. Nathan decided he wanted to be a professional basketball player. He bought expensive shoes and clothes. Nathan practiced his basketball skills everyday. When he was at his first tryout, he couldn't shoot a basketball. The coach told him to work on his dribbling and shot selection instead.

A Bridge Not Too Far. The man climbed a large wooden bridge over a small river. He got in his car and started it up. As he drove, he could feel the wood below him slowly vibrate. He noticed a crack in the bridge as he approached it. He backed out of his driveway and waited for the bridge to be fixed.

Door Slamming. Gina's boyfriend's car had a flat tire. Gina decided to slam the door so he couldn't leave. The door slammed loudly on the first try. She was relieved when the door opened. Gina stood there in disbelief when he drove away.

Shot in the Leg. Larry got up early to go fishing. He cast his line. After about an hour he got no fish. He called the boat and told them he couldn't cast. The boat came and gave him an electric hook.

Reading. He sat down with his book and began to read. He did not know where any of the stories were located. He kept flipping pages back and forth. Eventually he got lost in one story. He was unable to figure out where it was and had to stop.

Illegal Street Vendor. Tim walked down the street. There were many street vendors selling candy. Tim approached them and asked if he could buy some. The vendors gave Tim a small handful of candy. Tim bought them all and enjoyed their treats.
Strong Beer. Sam was at the bar. He ordered a strong beer. He took a sip of the beer. He thought it was disgusting. Sam wished he'd just ordered a soda.

Basketball Tryout. Juan was a basketball player in high school. He was not very good at basketball. So, he decided to try out for the team. He was not chosen for the team. He decided to go back home to practice.

Stuffed. John loved to eat candy. He stuffed his ears with as many candy bars as he could. His mom did not mind, as long as he did it at bedtime. One night she got out of bed and found him eating. He had to take him to the ER.

Crunches. Joe was tired of going to work with crunches in his morning. He decided to stop doing crunches. The day after, his crunches were still sore. He went to the doctor for the diagnosis. He was told that his muscles were too sore.

Too Afraid For A Second Date. Tom and Sara were on their third date. Tom was shy and nervous about talking to Sara. He decided to tell her how he felt about her. The next day Tom tried to get his feelings across to Sara. He was rejected and made fun of by her.

Salt in the pepper shaker. Kelly was making her father dinner. She put in some salt to flavor the food. Her father thought she was going to start eating the food. Kelly's father was upset and threw her out of the house. Kelly felt horrible about her actions.
Broken Dishwasher. Tom's dishwasher broke. He called his plumber. He was told to bring a ladder. Tom was able to use a ladder to get the dishwasher up. He was thankful for the help.
Firing employees. Sam was an employee. He decided to fire some of them. He asked his boss to not fire him. His boss allowed him to. Sam was happy about it.
Pageant. Mary wanted to be a model. She trained and put on many pounds. The judges were impressed. They gave her first place! Mary felt very proud.
A Good Bartender. Sandy went to a bar. She thought they were cheap. She ordered a ton of cheap drinks. However, she was pleasantly surprised. She didn't know she was drinking a lot of alcohol.

Bill Goes Skydiving. Bill loved to go skydiving. He had never gone before but knew he had to do it. He and his family planned for months and drove to the nearby park. He was nervous but excited as he stepped out of the plane. His first skydive went great and he had never been happier.
Bob's Big Break. Bob was doing well financially. His business had been doing well for years. He was thinking of expanding. He got a loan from the bank. Bob had the money and opened his first store.

Real Mom. Alicia loved to read but it was very difficult for her to read with her kids. Alicia's parents always kept the kids and kept her busy. So they decided to keep her in the bedroom all the time. Her first book, A Day at the Zoo, was a very hard read but she read it. Alicia decided she loved reading but reading at night was okay for kids.
New shoes. Kim bought a new pair of shoes. They fit her perfectly. They were very comfortable. Kim wore them everyday. Kim loved her new shoes.
The Storm. Tom was watching his TV. Suddenly the storm rolled in. The wind blew so hard it knocked down the television. Tom decided to hide in his basement. He was lucky the storm didn't kill his TV.

Greg Raposo. Greg grew up and was a high school student. He was always good at sports and was known as a great football player. His team was having a talent show at the talent show. Greg had a really great act for his talent show. Greg did an amazing job at his show.
Ugly Art. Sally was taking an art class. They had to paint something. Sally made a horrible art piece. It made the art class look bad. The class decided to look at Sally's work.

Price Matching. Tommy's friends offered him fifty dollars for his favorite new pair of jeans. Tommy politely declined, and kept the money. After an argument, his friends got together to compare prices. After a long and difficult negotiation, they were able to buy it. Tommy felt cheated by his friends.

Decision. When the baby was born, I thought it was a girl. I called my doctor and asked for a gender change. The doctor said he couldn't do it for me because I'm a boy. I was upset, and asked for a divorce. Now I have a boy as my baby's name!
Falling at the rink. I went to the rink to skate. I skated for five minutes. Then I ran a little too far, and fell. I hurt my knee badly. I had to get a cast put on it.

Beanie Babies. Tim was excited to get his Beagle back. He took it to the dog park in the evening. The Beagle chased it around and threw it things. It also ran and ate a little blueberry pie. Tim gave the dog back to his owner.
Beer. Mike loved to drink beer. He would always have a few in his house. One day he forgot his wallet. His beer was lost! Mike was very bummed that he lost his beer.
Food Poisoning. Sam didn't like meat. He wasn't eating enough of it. He made himself an apple pie. It tasted awful. Sam went back to eating fast food.

Robot. My friend Ben and I played a little video game with a robot. We had to collect a large number of blue balls. We both had a lot of trouble, because the robot wouldn't go back to collect. Finally, we found a way to get the robot to go back to collect. We used a little ball to bounce up and down the stairs.

Questioning. I walked to the bar yesterday. It was empty but i felt comfortable. I drank a drink and ate another. The man was dressed like a cowboy and asked me a question. I told him I had a question too.
Left Out. Tom was playing with his friends. He left his book on the floor. His friends were upset by the fact. They didn't want Tom to read their books. Tom's friends made him stay after class.

Boring Movie. Jim decided to watch a movie. The movie wasn't that entertaining. Jim decided he would watch another movie. The next night Jim watched the first movie. He had a much better time the second time.

The Angry Model. Ivan hated getting up in the morning. He knew he would need to get in shape if he wanted to be thin. Ivan decided to start lifting weights. He got bigger and stronger every week. Ivan loved his body and knew it was only going to get better.

Bill's Wife. Bill's wife died in a car accident. Bill's family asked him to pay for her funeral. He couldn't afford to pay for the funeral. Bill decided to start collecting his money instead. Bill's wife's remains are in a nice mausoleum right by his office.

How regretful. Tara had always wanted to go on an ocean vacation. She saved money and bought tickets for next year. The day after the trip, Tara broke her foot. She was forced to cancel her trip. Tara was extremely disappointed in herself.
Dog House. Dana liked to sit and watch TV. Her husband liked to play fetch. They built a big dog house together. One day Dana accidentally knocked over the house. Dana had to replace it.

Bat. Dee and her friends were playing in the yard. It started to rain and they hid in the basement. Dee climbed the stairs and peeked out the window. A large bat was flying in the air! Dee screamed and run to the door.

Backpacking Trip. I had to go on a hike to the woods. I packed all my camping essentials in the car. On the hike, I set up my tent, food, and snacks. When we got to the woods, it was so hot! The cooler tent made it much easier to stay cool.

Random. I ran across some random items in my living room. I asked my friend, who lives nearby, if I could keep them. She said yes, but said she would take them back to her house. When I called her, she said that her parents got rid of them. I was sad to hear this.

Severe Reaction. I have been having a bad reaction to the antihistamine Claritin. It is very severe for me. I will not take anything else for at least a week. The doctors tell me it is very serious. I am staying in bed until I am out of medication.

Solar Panels. My wife and I went shopping. She found a solar panel system on Amazon. I looked online for other solar panel systems. We found several that looked similar. We bought one of the solar panel systems on Amazon.

Wet Floor. Kim needed to use the restroom. She decided to use the bathroom on the floor. However, she noticed that her floor was sticky. Her feet became wet. She had to take a shower to wash them off.

The purse. Sara went to buy something at the store. She found a nice purse on the shelf. She looked inside to see it was too expensive for her. Sara looked again to see it was cheaper. She decided to keep it and was happy she did.

Soul Mates. There once was a man named Dave. Dave always got very little sleep. When he did sleep, it was usually because he was lonely. He often had to leave work early because of not enough sleep. Dave decided that he would make a sleep schedule to help himself.
The Fit. Tina decided to join a gym. She tried on many pants. When she tried them on, she loved them. They fit like a glove. Tina couldn't wait to get into the gym.

I Walked Home. We went to an ice cream parlor to eat ice cream. While eating our ice cream, a woman ran up and took my ice cream cone. She was a stranger and I was afraid she would take my money. I was afraid she would steal my ice cream too. However, the woman happily gave it to me.
Museum. I went to the museum today. I looked through the exhibits. There was so much to look at. I took many pictures. It was an amazing experience.

Pickpocket. I sat down on the bench to read. A man walked by me and tried to steal my wallet. I grabbed the wallet and ran. I was chased by the man but I got away. I went home and reported the incident to the police.
Hearing. Kia's dog wouldn't stop barking. She took him to the veterinarian. The vet said that the dog might have a hearing issue. Kia's dog was given special earplugs. The dog soon stopped barking!

Professional Photographer. Sam wanted to start taking photos professionally. He decided to move to New York. He went to a local camera store to purchase a DSLR. Once he was there he met with the owner and got an appointment. The next day he took photos of a wedding and he was so happy.

Try. The kid looked to his parents. He told them he wanted to be a great basketball player. His dad told him that he wasn't that good at basketball. The kid told his mom that was unfair. She told him he was just being stubborn and she wouldn't change him.
Baseball. Billy loves to play baseball. He got a new baseball bat from the store. He tried it out for a few swings. He made some really nice runs. Billy played the whole game.

Spicy Food. We went to a restaurant to celebrate New Year's. My wife had her Chinese food and I had my spicy chicken. Neither of us liked the spicy food, so we decided to order something else. My wife found out about my food preferences and gave me her secret recipe. I was able to finish my spicy chicken and she enjoyed hers.

Trash. Tom heard his neighbor was sick. So he threw out all of his trash cans. Tom got paid to clean it up. And after he was done Tom took all his trash home. Tom paid for all of his neighbor's trash.

music with sticks. Anna had never been to a music festival before. She was excited and nervous. She tried her best, though, to keep up. When she arrived, she found a nice spot to sit. She ended up having a really good time and couldn't wait to go back.
Bad tattoo. Tom got a tattoo. He was so excited. He went to get it done. Unfortunately it was bad. Tom had to get a different one.

Cheerleading Squad. Sara was in a cheerleading squad. She was doing her routine when she felt a sharp pain in her foot. Her foot felt like it was on fire and she realized she needed help. The coach took Sarah to the emergency room. The doctor told Sara that she fractured her foot.

School Winter. Winter was coming. My family and I all packed our winter coats and boots. We went on many hikes and made lots of new friends. The snow finally stopped falling. It had snowed so much that we could not go to school for a week.
The Belt. The man got a new belt. He wanted to show it off. He wore it everywhere. He wore it even to his doctor's appointment. His wife told him he looks good in it.
Waitress. Nancy works as a waitress. She has to clean tables all day. One day, she sees her customer. Her customer is extremely nice. Nancy doesn't get paid enough to pay for her shifts.

Messy Hair. Kate's mother always made her throw out her straightener. One day her hair got so messy it was hard to comb. She tried to comb it but the comb fell into the drain. She realized she had to clean the hair before it became unusable. She did this and everything was great.

Scared. Linda's friends were in the hall. They were laughing with another kid who was too drunk to remember. He fell down and couldn't get up. Linda looked out her window and saw him. She saw the tears and apologized to the other girl.

Easter Egg Hunt. Derek and his friends decided to have a hunt for Easter. They picked out a dozen eggs and started hunting. They went out in the fields in search of the eggs. Derek and his friends were exhausted at the end of the hunt. They couldn't wait to go back the next Easter.

College. One day, I had to go to college. First I got to sit through a tour of my dorm room. Then I had to take an orientation. Finally, I was to walk around campus and see where my classes were. When I arrived, I was pleased to see the dorm room was new and shiny.

Live in Person. Jane wanted to take her family on a vacation. She contacted a travel agent and booked a trip. She had her family over one weekend. They stayed at her house and ate dinner. Jane had a great time on her vacation.
Thud. Heather fell and hurt her shoulder. She could not walk well. Heather called her mom. Her mom drove her to the doctor. She was prescribed pain pills.

Logan's Mistake. Logan was working at the computer. He noticed his mouse was not working. Logan realized he forgot the power cord for his computer. Logan tried to use his mouse, but it was not working. Logan had to ask a friend for help to get his computer working.
Lost Keys. Tom kept getting lost at the store. He kept trying to remember where he put his car keys. Eventually he gave up. He was very annoyed with himself. Eventually someone helped him out.

Cell Phone. Sasha was trying to figure out what to wear. She looked all over the house for something practical. She saw her father's cell phone and was horrified. She picked it up and realized it was her old phone. She knew she should have been more discerning.

The Baby's Toy. Lola was babysitting a baby. He was eating the last of his toys. Lola threw the last toy and the baby cried. Lola had to take the baby to the store to get another. Lola had to buy the baby a new toy.

Safe. He went down to the basement with her. She took the rope and started to climb. He started to yell as she climbed higher. It was a long climb with lots of scary drops. Eventually she got to the top.

Pee Break. Nancy was walking through the house when she got a small rash. She walked around for a long time with the rash on her leg. Then she took a short break to remove the rash from her leg. When she left the house she went home and had to go back to school. Luckily, her mom decided that she wasn't getting in trouble because of it.
Potato. The farmer was planting potatoes. He took a potato out of the garden. The potato grew in the ground. The farmer tried to plant it again. He found that he had overran the potato.

Drag Racing. The guys wanted to beat the boys at a drag race. They wanted to do a barrel roll. They tried it but didn't know how. Eventually they got it down. They did a barrel roll and beat the boys at a race.

Freeway Speed. Trey drove through a city without stopping at all. He was on a highway and thought it was like that everywhere. A cop pulled him over and gave him a ticket. Trey felt bad for the cop so he went home and asked for his help. The cop taught Trey to never speed again and he drove very well.
Baby's First Tooth. It was a baby's first tooth. The baby was crying the entire time. His mother held him close. Finally, he let go. His first tooth had a hole in it.

Wrong Flavor. Tom went to a restaurant with a new restaurant. They were offering several different flavors of the food. Tom tried some and liked them, but others didn't. He tried some of them again and was still not satisfied. Tom gave up on going to that particular restaurant.

Grown Apart. Ella was very jealous that her sister, Ella, was very pretty. She wanted to be the prettiest too, so she'd steal dresses from her. Her sister had enough of that, so she called Ella a bad name. She decided to let Ella wear her own clothes without stealing. Ella was very hurt, and decided never to let her sister steal again.

Shoe Lifter. Carson was a great athlete. He liked to do the same things over and over. He never changed the shoes he wore for competitive activities. One day, he accidentally stole one of his coach's shoes. That day, Carson felt ashamed and went home.
Kicked out. I went to my high school dance. I was dressed pretty well. My friend told me that he found out I was dressed. I was kicked out of the dance. I hope my mother does not find out.

The backup singer. Kim got a call to do a backup in the middle of a concert. She was very excited to be in the game. She drove down to the arena with a lot of nervousness. When she got there she started to sing. The crowd loved it and it went well.
Dumping for someone else. Sally was about to be dumped. Her boyfriend wouldn't admit it. She began to become depressed. She finally talked to someone about the problem. After that he didn't dump her.

Meet The Manager. I am a new employee. The manager said hello to me. I introduced myself to him. I tried to go through the same steps as I did at the interview. I left feeling that my new manager was helpful.

Business. The man was working at his job. He was at his desk waiting for a call. Someone called and asked him if they can work with him. The man told the person to not call him again. He felt so bad that he didn't do more at work that day.

Ice Skating. Bob was an aspiring ice skater. He decided to try out for the city's high school team. He practiced his skating technique and tricks all winter. Bob was glad when he made the team. He won first place in the state ice skating championships.
Zombies. I went to a comic book store to find a new graphic novel. The first thing I picked out were the zombie ones. The first issue was sold out. I was furious. I could not wait for the next one.

Doing the Dishes. Lucy and her family were at the laundromat. They wanted to do the dishes. But they were too lazy to clean. So they spent the entire day doing the laundry. By the time they got to the table they were very messy!
Tea. Lucy wanted to drink a cup of tea. Her aunt bought her a tea set. She picked out some tea bags to drink. She poured the tea into a mug. She sat down and enjoyed her tea.

Claire and John. Claire and John are very close friends. When Claire's parents died they left John a will. It was the last will and testament of his parents. It stated that they both get to stay at their own place. John decided he could live in their house while he got better.

Reading the diary. I found the diary of my late husband. It was a diary I found in his old bedroom. The diary told of many things that happened in our marriage. I decided to read it all aloud to my husband. He was touched and smiled.

Peppers. Jill decided to make a pizza for her friends. She boiled up the veggies, and added the sauce. After a few minutes, the pizzas were ready. Jill went to pick up her friends and see what they liked. They thought they were being picky and left without eating.
Injured Arm. I was walking in the park today. I stepped on a branch and landed on my arm. My arm had a very deep cut. It got infected and infected. I had to go to the emergency room.

Charm bracelet. Sandra was on vacation in the USA. One day while shopping she spotted a bracelet. It was a bracelet for charm school. It had rhinestones on it and was very pretty. She bought it right away.

Makeup Artist. Mary wanted to learn how to create makeup. She asked her mother for some help. Her mother said that it would be better if Mary practiced alone. Mary practiced at her own home for several weeks. She finally finished a great job of makeup at her own party!
Pigs. I found a pair of pigs in my backyard. They were not very friendly. They grow very big. My sister and I went to the store to buy some food. I decided to take the pigs back to my yard.

Cornelia Finishes a Book Report. Cornelia is trying to finish her last book report. She has only two weeks before the deadline. Cornelia spends all day reading through her report. Finally the final page is on her desk. Cornelia is pleased that her report is finished.

Pencils. One day, Tim had a problem. His pencils were worn and out of date. He drove to the store and bought a new set. It took him 20 minutes to get them ready. He brought them home and put them in his bag.

Bob Nearly Gets a Ticket. Bob was driving his truck one day. A policeman saw him and decided to pull him over. Bob pulled over to the side of the road. The policeman asked if he had anything in his truck. Bob said he didn't have anything, so the policeman gave him a ticket.
Bad smell. I went to a Mexican restaurant. I ordered a burrito. Alas, there was a bad smell. I immediately asked for a refund. Thankfully they gave me a replacement.
World Series earthquake. There was a big earthquake. All of a sudden a lot of things shook. Everyone on the street were shaking. The team was in the dugout. They had to get out.
Pitbull Party. Sam's parents told him he couldn't have any pitbulls. Sam went to the local humane society. Sam had five pitbull puppies. Everyone was happy. Sam had so many friends.

The Research Project. Tim had an important research project due in a few months. He was really nervous about it. Tim started putting extra work into his project. Tim was able to finish it in time. Tim was glad to have finished his project on time.

Emu and Ostriches. I loved watching Emus and ostriches eating grass. They were so cute and playful! I would watch them as they ran, jumping, and catching their food. I went to the zoo. The Emus and Ostriches were there to eat!
Writer's Block. Tim was writing a long article. He kept falling asleep. He decided to write on the bus for a while. Soon, he was fully awake. He finished the article and turned it in.
Viral. Lina got her new boyfriend to sing. He went to a party where his friends played music. Someone played the wrong song. He was embarrassed. They got into a fight over the lyrics.
The New Home. Nell's parents said she could go to any school. She wanted to stay at home. Her mom took her to pick out a new home. She picked a new house and bought it. Nell loves her new home.

Rufus Visits Florida. Rufus has always dreamed of a beach vacation. One day he gets a chance to travel to Florida. Rufus goes to many beaches along the way. One day, he has a great time in Miami. Now Rufus has always wanted to visit Florida.

Monopoly. Nina was having a lot of fun playing Monopoly with her husband. Then Nina's son showed up to play. He started acting strange. His mom had to be called away for work. Luckily, Nina was able to calm down when her son calmed down.
Volleyball. Kelli is going to the beach with friends. They are going to play volleyball. Kelli gets really excited for the game. Kelli's friends take off. She catches them and has a good time.
Astronaut. Alyssa was going on her first space flight. She was nervous. She thought she might not do well. However, the whole flight she had fun. Alyssa was very proud of herself.
attention. Tim was working in a warehouse. He found a box of CDs. He opened it and discovered it was ripped to pieces. The CDs were worthless. He spent his day cursing at the people there.
Picking berries. Tim was in a hurry. He needed to pick berries in time for breakfast. He was driving to the store. He decided to stop at a store to buy some. He picked them up while it was closing.
Car Key. John was cleaning out his car. His wife told him to look under the key. He pulled out the car key. It was empty. He called his wife and told her what he found.

Shopping at Target. Mary was walking in Target. She noticed a big box of clothes on sale. Mary grabbed all the clothes for a low price. She put all the clothes into her shopping bag. Mary spent the day at Target.

Dan can't fly. Dan always loved the ocean and wanted to try it. Dan signed up for a course that would teach him how. Dan was worried when he couldn't get out of the boat with his friends. They found a solution and Dan had a great time. He is very happy that he is able to finally fly.

The Pacific North. A young man and his family were stranded on a beach. They didn't know how they would get back home. They decided to make a raft out of sticks and branches. When the family made it to shore they took shelter behind a tree. They decided to stay there forever because it was a good spot.
Reading. She looked at her favorite book. The teacher said that she was ready. He gave her a book and she opened it. It was really long. She decided not to read it and went home.

Late to Class. Tom was late to class. He had to stand in the hallway. Tom had to go to the bathroom and make it to class on time. He was mad about it. Tom decided he would not make the same mistake again.
Discontinued. Jim's car was running slow. Jim knew it needed a new motor. Jim drove to the dealership. The salesman gave Jim a new motor for his car. Jim took his new motor home and started his car.
The Move to Tulsa. The Brown family decided to move to Tulsa. It was going to be a big adjustment. The first few months were hard. Eventually they got used to the city. They were very happy there.

Geese. Ralph lived in England and had never seen geese. He decided to take a trip to the Netherlands to see them. He took a boat to the Dutch city of Rotterdam. He went to a local farm and had a look around. He decided he loved the Netherlands and wanted to live there forever.

Old Water Bottle. The woman brought an old water bottle to school. She didn't realize how hot it was in class. The water burned her hands and the back of her head. She had to use a hot towel to clean the burnt parts of her. She thought the water bottle was a bad idea.

Sports Day. Bill had to work the morning of school. It was a really bad day and Bill missed his morning shower. Bill quickly found a way to stay awake and go to work. His boss noticed and gave Bill a break. Bill was relieved and began his morning at work refreshed.

Chase. Nathan was afraid of heights. He would always stay in his house for safety. Nathan tried to jump the biggest buildings but was afraid of the fall. One day, Nathan tried a leap to the highest point in his city. Now, Nathan is the tallest man in the world.
Not Enough Ingredients. I ordered pizza for the family. I got three types of pizza. I asked them to put the toppings on the pizza. When I tried to eat it, it had no toppings. I had to throw it away.

The Bum. Sam hated living with his roommate. He hated how he always had to take over his roommate's homework. One day Sam saw that his roommate had left their homework at his desk. Sam immediately knew he had to do the homework. Sam took the assignment home and did it while he waited for his roommate.

Durpston. Durpston had just come from the airport. He wanted to watch his favorite movie on the big screen. The ticket seller put him in a VIP area. It was his favorite movie all along! Durpston was in heaven.

Wango. Wango the Wango wanted to go fishing. He went with his friend Jim to the river. Wango forgot the line and started to reel it in. Jim told him that he was a good fish and let him go. Wango was upset that Jim was being so cruel.

Resourceful. Jim wanted to learn how to be resourceful. Jim's brother offered him a book about being resourceful. Jim read the book and practiced it diligently. He applied his resourcefulness to many things. Jim is now a very productive person.

Train Ride. Tim and his family wanted to go for a short ride. The nearest train station was about five miles away. Tim tried to look for a place to ride on the express train. They couldn't find one. Tim decided to just drive instead.

The Barista. Tim wanted to be a coffee barista. He signed up for a coffee school. After four years of hard work he graduated. He was able to start his own company. Now Tim is the CEO of a huge company.
Driving to Work. Sally was running late for work. She pulled into her parking lot. Then she drove to work. She got there just as the doors were opening. Sally made it to work on time.

Valedictorian. Ralph was a valedictorian of his high school class. His family and friends thought he was a great student. Ralph decided to apply to law school to get his degree. He was accepted into the school and received his degree. He was very happy with his decision.

First Day of School. I was so nervous for my first day of school. I woke up so early to go to school. When I got there, I realized I was nervous. It took me a long time to calm down. I didn't make any friends and decided I wasn't ready for this school.

Save Often. Mandy was going to take a test. She knew the answer to all the questions on the test. However, she decided not to answer them. She did not know that the answers were on her textbook. The test was cancelled and she received a zero on it.

Football Star. Jim's favorite sport is football. His favorite player to watch is Drew. Last weekend, Jim went to a Drew football game. He enjoyed the game and met Drew. Jim was able to buy a Drew jersey at the store.
Lecture. Jane went to a lecture. She didn't know the material. Jane's teacher didn't explain. Jane tried to find a topic. She forgot all about the lecture.

Arcades. Mike loves playing the arcade. He plays all day and night. This weekend he bought an arcade cabinet. He has been trying to teach his daughter how to use it. He hopes she doesn't grow up to be a video game master.

Going to the Movies. Drew went to the movies with friends. His friends drove him to the movie theater. They spent a few hours in the movie theater and ate popcorn. The next day, they drove to the theater. When they got there, they bought some drinks and took a movie.

Car Sick. My daughter went to her first music festival last weekend. On Saturday, her mother called her and asked her to stay at home. She was worried because it was Friday. She called her father who came to pick her up on Sunday. She had a lot of fun in the car, but had no good reason to stay home.
"School". Jackie got into trouble at school. Her mom grounded her. She told her mom she was no longer welcome at the school. Jackie cried herself to sleep. Her mom was understanding.

The Therapist. I had a difficult relationship with a therapist. I decided to take a few months off to get more perspective. I did therapy twice a week for six months. After a while, I was able to get back to work. Now my therapist is my best friend.
The pony. Jane was on her way to the store. She was headed into the parking lot. Suddenly, a big pony walked up to her. It was so cute. Jane was able to buy a pony.
Police. The kids were playing with the toy. They tried to play with it. Suddenly a cop walked over. He told them to stop playing. The kids were angry and ran away.

Honey Pot. Beth loved eating raw honey. She would often put it in her cereal or her tea. One day, she got into a terrible car accident. The police officer told her she could get a small piece of it for free. She took it and began to eat her own food without the honey.
Lost Friend. Tom wanted to take his dog for a walk. But Tom's mother wasn't there. She was always looking over his shoulder. Tom decided to walk in front of her. And Tom and his dog walked away.

Random. It was a chilly day in town. Jane went outside to look at the clouds. She realized that there were snowflakes falling. She ran inside and shut her door. She was cold inside until the storm passed.
project. I had to make a paper airplane. I made it very quickly, though. I tried to take a picture of the finished product. I ended up burning it. I burned the picture and made it worse.

Test. Barry had a very important test coming up. He got all of his work done and stayed up all night studying. At the test, Barry got really nervous and had a hard time sleeping. When Barry came to class, he was surprised to see no one there. Barry felt good about his effort in studying.
Beer. We had a big party at our house in December. We had four or five beers. It was not good for me. I drank way too much. When I got home I felt terrible.

Meter Monitor Or Thief. Charles worked for a meter monitor who was on the lookout for any suspicious activity. The monitor always made sure the lights on his meters were turned on. One day Charles was not watching the meter and it was broken. Charles was fired from his job, though he thought he did nothing wrong. Charles learned not to get caught spying on meters again.

The Long Flight. Tim had a long flight to catch. The flight was well-organized and very organized. Tim made a huge effort to prepare. The flight was so long he missed his flight and missed his friends. Tim was very disappointed that he missed his flight.
Birthday Beach Trip. Troy had a birthday. He was excited to go to the beach. He took his parents. They went to the beach. Troy had a great birthday.

Benjamin Played Video Games. Benjamin got a new computer. He began playing computer games. He loved them so much he wanted to play them every day. Benjamin played for several weeks straight. By the end of the week he had played so much he quit!

Disappointment. Tom and his wife were out on a date. They were both really in love with each other. It was a nice evening out. The girls had an argument and Tom found it hilarious. He never thought he'd find someone so shallow.

New Show. Tina decided to go to the theatre to see a new play. She was excited about seeing it. When it was time for her turn to see the play she was happy. The show was a wonderful success. Tina was very happy that she had gone.
The Car Wash. It was time to wash the car. The woman put soap and water in it. Then she used a machine. Then she went to a nearby laundromat. Her car was clean!

New Bag. Tanya's mom bought her a new bag for school. She loved the new bag. However, Tanya began to hate her new bag. She had trouble holding the items in the bag. Tanya began to cry when her mom finally returned the bag.

Girls. When I was in high school, I had a crush on a girl in my class. One day she was at a friend's house. The friend invited me over for a smoke. We played games on a video game. I gave her my number.

Tree. My wife and I decided to cut down our tree in the backyard. We went to Home Depot to get supplies. We bought the first tools we needed and a planer. We set out to start the job of chopping down our tree. After 2 hours, we finally had a tree down.
The Wait Game. The two teams were tied with two seconds to go. James was fouled by Mike. James had possession. Mike took the shot. James blocked the shot to win the game.

School dance. The Johnson's are really nervous about the school dance. It's their first dance together and they're both scared. It's been a long time since they last danced so they're both nervous. But when it's time to go to the dance they go confidently. When the dance is over they go home happily.
Getting a Raise. Jim had been working at his job for 2 years. He had worked hard all year. Jim was finally getting a raise. He had been on the job for two years. Jim was now a new boss.

Giving Up. My sister and I were playing with toys when she dropped one in her lap. It shattered and went everywhere. The pieces were black so my parents couldn't tell what happened. I got angry and began to cry. The next day, we found the shattered pieces scattered all over the house.

Thunderstorm. We live near an electrical fire line. The fire department was called to a blackout. The fire department went in and put out a house fire. The fire department sent a team out to put out a lightning storm. We heard a loud pop and saw a cloud of sparks.

Ball Game. Jim and Bob were having a baseball game. They hit many foul balls. After the game, they were going to be at each other's house all night. The next day, the game was postponed due to rain. Jim and Bob are playing catch in the meantime.

Enchanted Village. The kids woke up to the sound of chirping. They were excited to see that it was an owl. They went outside and saw that there were many trees. They gathered up their sticks and stones. They then went in and spent their day building a house.
Popout. The kids were in the car in the parking lot. They found a pop-out. The kids were happy to see it. They put it on the dashboard. The car was cooler.

Quex Quacker. My coworker Mary is a proud quacker. She makes her own quiches. My mom and I make our own quiches. Today I made two quiches that will be on the menu tomorrow. My mother made the first one on her birthday.

Paid to stand in line. Tom's work was having a Christmas party. They were having a booth with some of their workers. Tom stood in line to get his booth. He was very disappointed. Tom felt very awkward at work.
barn raising. I wanted to buy a new car. I decided to start a barn raiser. I decided I would do something fun. I got a bunch of people together. We raised the money and bought a new car.
Dog. The dog barked at me. I picked up the leash and brought the dog home. The owner came to get him. I let him know he was there. He ran away and I never saw him again.

Art Obtains Understanding. Art wanted to become an artist. He enrolled in art classes at school. Eventually he became an expert artist. He began selling his artwork online. Art became more popular than he ever thought it would be.
Crazy. The man jumped up to his window. He shouted from the window at everyone. He tried to chase people down the street. He was stopped by a police officer. The officer told the man to stay down.

Room for Happiness. Joey had a hard life. His parents beat him constantly. He got to high school and made the varsity basketball team. Joey was the leading scorer in the team. Joey's life finally started getting better.

Long Time. I was waiting to finish my laundry last night. I had an extra load to do so I thought I would spend extra time. I waited and waited. When I realized the was no one else in the house. So I quickly went to sleep and I finished my load.

The Eggs. Mara had a big backyard. She got an egg and built a large sandbox for it. She spent a long time setting it up. She let the kids climb in and explore. The kids had fun making their own shapes in the sandbox.
Cooking. Ralph made a chicken breast. He put it in a pan to cook. He turned off the stove. When he tried to turn it on, it wouldn't turn over. Ralph didn't cook the chicken in the pan anymore.
Need feet to run. Lydia had to run outside but her feet hurt. So she decided to try to run without feet. Her feet hurt so bad she couldn't run. So she ended up resting. And she ended up exhausted.
Jackson. Jackson is a boy who is shy. He hides behind his father. One day his father comes home. He sees Jackson holding a kitten. Jackson shows his father how much he loves the kitten.
Snowball Fight. Sam wanted to play in the snow with his brother. His brother wanted to play in the ice. They argued back and forth. Sam fell and went flying. His brother won because he was bigger.
Sugar. Gina needed sugar. But she was on a strict diet. She decided to sneak some sugar into the cereal. It was so bad she had to throw it away. Gina had a very bitter craving for it.

Dishonest Andrea. A family went to an Italian restaurant. Their waitress told them they would have pasta. She then began to work on a stack of bills. The family was very confused as to where their money was. They were upset and went home to discuss it.

Too Big To Flush. Tom lived in an apartment without a balcony. He noticed his shower head was missing. He went to the store and got a plunger. He filled it with water and flushed it. After Tom did this he noticed the water was not draining.

Sunday Morning. The dog barked all day long, but they did not see a problem. They watched for the next 30 minutes or so. They began hearing a scratching noise, and they knew they were there. The barking continued, and the neighbors were getting frustrated. They decided to call animal control.
Bitcoin. My brother asked me to trade with him. I said yes. After a few hours we were trading. I lost about $5 in trading. He also lost a lot of money, so I traded nothing.

Driving. I bought my new car today. It took me several days to get it to the dealership. When I got it home, I started driving it. I was really nervous, because it was a brand new car. But in a week, I was driving a new car with no problems.

Making a Video Game. Tommy had always wanted to make a video game. He decided to work with a programmer to make a new video game. He and the programmer worked all week, but he had no success. Tommy decided to just give up and quit. After a month he decided to start working again.

Rhonda Visits a Museum. Rhonda loved going to the museum. Her favorite exhibits were those about dinosaurs. Rhonda could not wait to see the new dinosaur exhibit. Rhonda and her friends went on a field trip to see the new exhibit. Rhonda had a great time at the new dinosaur exhibit.

Wine Lover. Joey always liked drinking wine. One day his girlfriend asked him to take her out to dinner. Joey was too afraid to refuse. He knew that was his best chance of winning his girlfriend over. At the restaurant he made a fool of himself, but won her over.
Cattle. We decided to buy some beef cattle. The first time I had to feed them. It wasn't that hard. The cattle ate everything we gave them. We ended up spending money twice as much.
Final Exam. Today was the final exam. Sam needed an A or B grade to pass. He studied very hard. He was very tired when he got to class. Sam failed his class.
The late gift. Fred bought his mom a nice pair of headphones. But they were very late. She didn't tell him. So he ended up paying for them two weeks later. She was mad but she understood.

The Swimming Competition. Mary wanted to enter the state swimming competition. She was the last one standing and she worked as hard as she could. After four months, Mary made the finals. Mary had a great time swimming and won first place. She ended up going on to qualify for the state championship.
Patience. A man asked his doctor if he could do one more test. The doctor said he could. The man waited for the results. They said he was normal. The man was relieved.

Family Ski Trip. The Johnson's went on a family ski trip. The trip included a ski jump. They took off and flew over the top of the mountain. They landed and took pictures on their way down. They felt good about their ski trip.

Tornado in the Mind. I got a phone call from my sister saying there was a tornado. It came through our neighborhood. When it was all over, my sister was still upset about it. She said she was too nervous to see me. The next day she saw me and apologized for being so worried.

Bad Christmas. My daughter got her new shoes at a Christmas tree sale. They were in black and white with red laces. She put them on and was very excited. She didn't wear them for a couple weeks. Her feet hurt and they never looked right.
Sweater. Kelly made a sweater. But then she thought it was a bit silly. It had a pattern of people's faces on it. She made it again. Now the sweater is actually cute!

Fishing Trip. Tom went fishing with friends. He didn't realize that he had not put a pole on. The line got stuck in his shoe. Tom was sad, but he got a new pair of shoes. He felt foolish for missing the fishing trip.
