Spanish Test. Barry had a Spanish test tomorrow. He thought he would study hard. He was late, however. Barry still got a B. He decided to study next time.
Wire Hangers. Tim worked at a bar. There was a lot of bad customer service. Tim decided to hang all his bar hangers in his office. The bar owner was amused. Tim didn't get fired.
World view. Brett went to the beach for the day. Brett took in the beautiful ocean. Brett saw all sorts of sea animals. Brett even saw a few sharks. Brett had a great day at the beach.
Rainy Day. It was rainy outside. It rained for the second day in a row. Tom was driving on the road. A part of his tire went flat. Tom had to pull over.

Glenda. Glenda had been waiting a while to tell her boyfriend the news. She was afraid that her boyfriend wouldn't love her anymore. When the time came, she finally told him. To her surprise, she was very excited about it. After that, they were very happy together.

Family. Sally was invited to her sister's wedding. The whole family had come from out of town. They all had a great time together. At the end of the night they had an amazing time. Sally was happy for them.

Flat Tire. Jim had just bought a new car. He tried to turn a corner on the freeway. However, he realized that his front tire was flat. Jim went to his garage to get a spare. He didn't have a spare in time so his car broke down.

Riding Lawn Mower. My husband has always hated riding his lawn mower. However, we decided to buy him one this winter. We put on a long shirt and made sure he had a hat. After getting the mower out of the garage, he hated it. We decided to give him a new one to keep him busy.

Leaving. We decided to leave our hotel early one night. We packed our belongings into a cab and drove to a nearby hotel. A couple of our friends saw us leaving and decided to hang out with us. We drank a few beers and then drove home. It was a fun weekend.

Boring Main Event. John was watching the main event. A lot of action happened, but the fight was boring. He didn't really care. At the end of the fight he was sad. He got a good laugh out of it though.

Chair Claimed. Seth went to the pawn shop to claim a table from his desk. The clerk told him he couldn't have it since it was damaged. He brought his computer to the counter for a replacement. The counter manager refused and told Seth that the computer was already gone. Seth returned his computer and made the counter manager apologize.

Running. Seth was an excellent runner. However, Seth's running technique was terrible. His running style kept him from winning many races. Seth felt defeated and quit training altogether. His friend suggested he try running a mile every day.

Fired in One Day. Nancy decided to go shopping. When she arrived she found out there was a traffic accident. The traffic accident injured dozens of pedestrians. Nancy wasn't sure if she would be fired. Fortunately her boss was able to keep her on the job.

The Spite of Rodents. It was a hot day outside. Sam noticed some spiders on his house. Sam saw the spiders as they crawled up his body. Sam screamed for his mother. Sam's mother told him to kill the spiders and the heat would kill them.

Softball Tryouts. I had never tried out for the softball team. My coach signed me up for tryouts. We played three games in a row. The coach told me that I played well enough to make the team. I was so happy that I did make the team.

New Sister. Amy and her family got a new baby sister. They were very excited to meet her. The new baby girl was the cutest thing Amy had ever seen. They played together for many hours every day. Amy and her family were happy to have new baby sister.

Drews big date. Drew was going on his first date with a girl. He was nervous but decided to go on it anyways. Drew asked her how she felt about sports. She told him she liked soccer. Drew decided he would ask her next year.

First Day. I got my first day of school yesterday. First day was great, so I am so excited to go home. We had a few games and had lots of activities. We also had a pizza party, but I didn't win. I'm going to miss this school for a long time.
Water Slide. We had a big party at my grandparents house. We rented a large water slide for the guests. We had a long day. My brother and I went first. My sister went last.

The Blender. My mother bought me a blender for Christmas. I immediately ran through all of the flavors. I didn't like anything I tried. When I went home I looked at the blender and laughed. That was the last time I saw a blender I liked.

Scared. Sam took a trip to Florida. He didn't think the weather would be warm enough. He wore shorts when he went swimming. He accidentally slipped and broke his leg. Sam was too scared to swim that day.

Joy. Joy was a cat that lived in a cage. One day she climbed out of the cage, and escaped. Her owners were scared she would come back. They put her in the backyard to be safe. Now, Joy lives in a cage, and can come back inside the house!

The Compassion Of Crazy. Tom's dad had a bad day at work and was crying. Tom's father made a bet with him. If Tom cried for an hour he would never play video games again. Tom cried and sobbed for an hour straight. Tom won the bet and was able to play all day long.

Countdown. Gus wanted to be good at counting. But he did not have much practice. So he decided to try to count to ten. But he was not sure how to do it. Finally Gus asked his friend to help him count.

The bird. Mary and Tom had just bought a new house. Tom was a bird watcher. One night, Mary was sitting on the porch. A bird swooped down and ate the popcorn. Mary was so upset she yelled at Tom for letting the bird in!

Waterfall. Sam and his dad went to the local waterfall. Sam was fascinated by the water. He began swimming and playing in the water. He was so glad to relax after spending the day in the water. Sam and his dad enjoyed the waterfall.

Ride. The couple took a road trip to get to the beach. They took in a new hotel and made plans for their next visit. They decided to head out on the lake after dinner. The couple decided to rent a boat and sail through the bay. They had a great time on their boat trip.
An accident. Jenna was riding her bike down the street. As she was going around a curve, her wheel slipped. It went under a car. It hit another car. Jenna wasn't hurt but was annoyed.

Coffee Coffee Coffee. Amy loved to sip on her morning cup of joe. But it was hard to keep her eye on her coffee! She was trying to focus on work when she had to drink it. Suddenly, the coffee went flat and her coffee mug fell. It shattered on the floor!

J'accuse!. My neighbor is an alcoholic. He drinks to excess every single night. I noticed this last week while I was watching TV. My neighbors daughter came in the room and asked him why he was there. He told her he was trying to sneak out but she told him no.

Wild Scare. Cathy was walking home from work one day. She heard a strange noise and heard a scratching sound. Cathy turned around to see what the noise was. To her surprise it was a snake. She ran and jumped and screamed until she screamed too loud.

Cancun. I decided to go on vacation. I was very excited. However, I got sick with the flu. I was very upset about not being able to go to Cancun. But it was okay because I was in a lot of fun places anyways.

Laundry. The house was very dirty. It was due to the fact that it was very hot in there. So, Tom decided to do the laundry himself. He cleaned the whole house with his special laundry soap. He made his family a new list and a new routine.
computer class. John has to work on his computer all day. He doesn't want to miss his math test. John spends the afternoon working. He has a great night of sleep. John is happy he gets to study.
Lasagna. I made lasagna. My roommate made meatballs. He did not like meatballs. I put sauce on his lasagna. He still hated lasagna.

The New Bike. Jack bought a new bicycle. He was looking for one to commute to work. The bike looked great when he got it home. His wife complimented the bike when it was new. Jack was happy that the new bike was a good value.

New PHone. Mike wanted a new iPhone. Mike was excited to buy a new one. The carrier refused to honor Mike's new phone. Mike did not know how to contact them. Mike went to the nearest Apple store and bought a new iPhone.

Rock climbing fun. I went with my friends to the rock climbing area. We had a good time. However, we realized that we had too much water. So we returned home. Then we went to the pool for some more fun.

Angry Mom. Mary was at work when she saw a large truck in her driveway. A man had knocked it over and was trying to fix it. Mary wanted to be nice and told him to knock it off. The man didn't listen and pushed his truck off the cliff. Mary was sad the man had to move his car.
Lunchtime. Today's dinner was at McDonald's. It was packed. My family had to wait for over an hour. I had to take my wife out. She was very upset.

The Bears Game. The Bears played in a big game against the Vikings. The Bears had to beat the Vikings by at least 17 points. The Bears had the ball in the 4th quarter. The Bears ran three plays and scored 21 points. The Bears won the game.
The Roadside. The man sat on his car. His legs were cold and stiff. He began to cough very loudly. A truck came by. The man got out and waited to go home.

Jay's Garage. Jay's garage is full of all kinds of junk. He decided to put up some metal signs. He took down a lot of the old signs. Now his garage looks much cleaner. Jay is glad that he put up the signs.

Sick Day. It was the end of class and everyone was getting sick. Katherine could no longer stand the feeling of sickness. She got home and laid down and laid down all day. Soon she fell asleep. When she awoke she felt much better.

Barking Dog. There was a big game going on. The other team was losing badly. A large dog was barking at the other team. He kept barking after a few minutes. He eventually stopped because his master told him he was annoying.

Release the Stress. Tanya went to the lake with her husband on a hot sunny day. She felt like it was going to be a calm day. But all of the sudden, Tanya got upset. She could not find any calm at all. She called her husband and he came over right away.
City. Ginny wanted to get in shape. She joined a gym at the mall. She did squats and lunges. After a month of doing the workouts she saw results. She had lost some weight and looked great.

Bomb threat. Nancy was reading a book in her apartment. Suddenly a man jumped out at her. He was shouting about bombs. Nancy ran outside, but then the police showed up. The man went inside, and now lives in terror.

Rocket Surgery. The doctor took out a large metal box from the cabinet. He grabbed a metal bar to attach to the top of the box. He cut a hole in the back of the box. He began to cut through the metal. The doctor attached the metal bar to a metal rod.
Gum Hair. Gina's gum hair was all over the floor. She looked all around but could not find it. She was finally tired of being scolded for it. So she went outside. The gum hair was on her face.
Plane. I am an adult. I have always wanted to be on a plane. I bought a ticket for the first time yesterday. I took the plane to my family's vacation home. I met all my friends on the plane.

Lucretia Prints Her Paper. Lucretia realizes that her notebook is getting very dirty. She decides to go through her old papers and clean them. When she is done, she is proud that her notebooks are cleaner. She then goes to her computer and saves the pages. Lucretia is happy that her notebook is no longer dirty.

The Accident. The family went on a hike. They left early in the morning and didn't pack food. While they were on the trail, they lost their footing. They ended up falling off a cliff. They had to be rescued.

Christmas shopping. Allison was excited to get Christmas shopping under way. She was excited to be getting all of her family's Christmas gifts. At the store, she tried on several sweaters. Allison was happy she had found a sweater that fit. She put the sweater on her head to put on her sweater as soon as possible.

unrealistic. Ivan was invited to a family reunion one weekend. He was very nervous because he had no idea how to act. But his mom encouraged him and he managed to do well. Everyone complimented him and asked him to come back again. Ivan decided that he was ready and he was accepted by the group.
Clown Lover. The clown came through the door. I stared at him from outside the door. I wanted to get a better look. He smiled back at me. Then he walked outside and went to sleep.

Fire. The man started a fire in his house. He was afraid his kids might get burned. He didn't check the logs regularly. His kids ate a lot of candy while it was going on. He had to put it out but not before the house was destroyed.

Games. I was trying to learn a new game. I watched a video that showed how to play. I took a few games, and practiced hard. I realized I wasn't as good as I thought I was. I decided to move on to more challenging games.

Pizza Delivery. Ben is out of pizza and needs to make a quick delivery. He calls a pizza restaurant and asks them to come to his house. They tell him they are out of dough and they are going to deliver. Ben is very excited and tells his wife he is going to get pizza. He and his wife go to the pizza restaurant and get some great pizza.

Disney World. Maurice was excited to go to Disney World with his family. It was his first time going with his family. They got all the accoutrements and souvenirs they could. Maurice decided to go swimming in the ocean. Maurice had the time of his life at Disney World.

The Pets. Sara loves her pets a lot. She loves them so much that she bought a second home for them. She thought her second home would be perfect because it was big. It was but she didn't see a problem because the cats had to go outside. Her cats now have to go outside on their own.

The suet and the squirrel. Sue's family went to a friend's house for the weekend. When they arrived there was a squirrel in the yard. Sue tried to scare it away with a blanket. However, the squirrel came right back. The family tried to chase it but ended up running away.

The Football game. The Patriots and the Dolphins were in the Super Bowl. The Patriots were favored to win. They were very focused and motivated for this game. The game was close but the Patriots won by 10 points. The Dolphins went on to win the Super Bowl.

Ears. One day we bought some old speakers from a junk yard sale. We put them in our dining room and put some music on. As I listened, my ears hurt terribly. My ears are still hurting from the music. I am glad we bought the speakers.

Work's a Beach. The kids loved playing with the beach. They dug a sand castle out of the sand. They walked around the sand castle for an hour. When they were done they blew it up with a firework. They took their castles and played in the sand all afternoon!

Apartment Repairs. John woke up with a bad stomach ache. John realized that he forgot to get an appointment with the landlord. John called the number on the notice. John called back to cancel the lease. John was pleased that he was able to make it to work.

Bad temper. I worked at a fast food restaurant. I had a really hard day, which included many hours of work. I was extremely angry the whole time I was there. One of the customers decided to call a manager on me. I yelled at her, causing the whole situation to escalate.

Picnic Clean Up. When I was ten my family decided to bring a picnic to the park. We went around to different picnic spots. It was a lot of fun and we had a lot of food. It was almost a family affair. When we went home everyone told me it was the best day ever.

Morning. It was always very hot when I was young. One day my mom took me to the park to play. After a few hours, I was still very hot and miserable. I spent the rest of the afternoon in the shade. I'm not sure why I even stayed out that late!

Rally. Eli was an older brother to my cousin. Last weekend, Eli decided to bring his brother a march. Eli's brother didn't like the marchers. Eli made fun of him on Facebook. His brother decided to not come to the march.

New candy shop. Sara's favorite candy store was closing. She searched for another candy store nearby. She found a candy store that she liked. The candy store had all new candy. Sara was sad but happy.
Cook Work. Dylan had always wanted to be a cook. He thought that cook jobs were easy to find. He started taking cooking classes. He slowly started getting into cooking. He now makes a good living.

Chess. I have played chess for almost 20 years. It is a very fast game and I enjoy it. One day my friends told me they were interested in learning it. I went to their house and they practiced for 3 weeks. Now we play all the time and it is very fun.

Gamestop. Tom's girlfriend had no money. Tom knew she was using the casino to earn some extra money. Tom was curious and asked her where the slot machines were. He tried the machine for several hours. He gave her his money and she thanked him for it.
Detention. Tom was in detention. He made several mistakes. His teacher found out. He got in trouble. Tom ended up being sent to the office.
Frank's Diet. Frank was a healthy eater. Frank ate healthy food everyday. He was trying to lose weight. He tried to eat healthier food everyday. He lost weight.

The Dusty Puppy. Kya's dog loves to play with toys. One day he went in the basement and played with a toy. While there he took the toy and started to play with the trash. The dog ate the trash and left a huge trail of smoke. Kya was furious.
Mascara. Mary's eyelashes were getting clogged. She decided to get mascara. She went to her local drugstore. She bought a high quality brand. She was happy to see the difference.
Our Visit. On a spring day we took our daughter to the Zoo. She loved the lions. We brought a teddy bear to the Lion House. She loved the Zoo as well. We plan on returning next summer.

Cockroach. I was standing in my living room eating dinner. My dog was eating from a bowl. When I sat down my dog was chewing my fingers. I tried to get the dog away from the bowl. The dog ate the bowl before I could get the dog away.

Survival. My dad had some fish tanks in the garage. My brother and I climbed up the ladder to look in them. We saw a huge, black fish. I was frightened and threw my toy fish into the tank. My dad didn't seem to mind.
Bread. I ate too much bread this week. It was all stale. I couldn't go back to store. I had to buy it fresh. It took a lot of work.
Tired in the line. Tina was in line at a cafe. She was waiting for over an hour. Finally the line moved at her place. At this point, she was exhausted. Luckily, the waitress took her order.
Case. Amy was watching a scary movie. She kept being distracted. Eventually she was almost able to forget about it. When she saw it again she freaked out. She felt bad about it.

Cat Fur. Joe was playing at his house. He got in a fight with a little kid. The little kid took all of Joe's cat fur. Joe was so angry that he punched the kid. Joe's mom told him to leave cat fur at home.
Car Wash. The car wash was finally starting. I had to go over it with all my tools. I went to the shop with all my tools. We started the car wash. I got paid for the job.

The preconceived notion. John bought a new video game. He wasn't sure what to expect from it. He played it for a couple of hours. It was extremely frustrating. John realized that he was playing something very different than he thought.
Reenactment. My wife is a great story teller. I got her a story to tell to a local community center. It was about a shipwreck. We made a good impression. They offered us a paid internship!

Brad and the water life. Brad loved water sports. He would go to the lake every weekend. His favorite water sports were Kayaking and Swimming. Brad fell off a paddle board. He had to be rushed to the hospital to get it fixed.

Taxi. Marge was sick of waiting for a taxi. She would stand in line for hours. One day, she decided to ride the public bus. She was thrilled when she got to the bus stop. Her trip was much less stressful.

Nature. Tom wanted to go on a nature hike with his friends. He took his camera along with him. Tom and his friends went into the woods. They hiked for hours and got tired. Tom took a lot of pictures of the beautiful landscape.

Ben's new pet. Ben had been wanting a pet for a while. He had been thinking of getting a fish, or even a bird. One day Ben's friend asked him to go fishing with her. He was afraid but agreed to go fishing with her. Ben and his new fish have been best friends ever since.
Larkscall. I went to my niece's dance party. My niece is a dancer. She had hired a lot of other people to do the party. I danced to her music. It was my favorite song.

Tennis. Barry decided to play tennis for his birthday. He was nervous, because he didn't know anyone. A friend helped him learn how to serve. Then they went to a tournament. Barry won the tournament with ease!

Christmas Morning. Christmas morning was in the air. I was on the roof of my house, watching the sky. My mom came by to help me open the box. It was a present from a friend of mine. She gave me a box of presents.

Tabby. I tried to get a tabby cat. She was small and white and had black spots. The only place I could find one was in an animal shelter. The other cats in the shelter were too aggressive to pet her. I had to give up and adopt a cat instead.

Forgotten toothbrush. Tim went to the bathroom to brush his teeth. When he came out the toothbrush was missing. He called his mother to ask if she could get it. She said she couldn't, and Tim was upset. Tim got a brand new toothbrush for his birthday.

Homemade Cards. Amy wanted to make her kids homemade cards. She went to the craft store to buy some paper and glue. She put them on the card she wanted to make. She let the kids help with the glue. Amy's kids were proud that they had done such a good job.

On the Subway. A group of kids were riding the subway to school. A group of men approached the group and began to talk. The group got on the tracks to talk. The men got off the tracks and approached them. The kids got off the subway.
No Kenny. Kenny was out for a run. It was early morning and he was tired. He decided to run to the store. He made it there just in time. He bought a beer and enjoyed himself.
Torn Pantyhose. One of our neighbors had a pair of torn pantyhose. One day we went by the pantyhose to try them on. She pulled up a pair and they were torn. She threw them out. We were very upset.

Valentine's Gifts. Drew had an idea for a gift for Valentine's Day. He got out the cards and the tissues and candles. He bought many items for his girlfriend. When he was done, she opened it all and admired his gift. He thought it was the best present he had ever gotten.

Gayle's chores. Gayle was having some problems with her chores. She decided to get rid of some of them. Gayle got rid of her lawnmower. She also got rid of her dishwasher. Gayle was glad she could finally work on her chores.

Working hard. Joe was a very hard worker. He went to a new job every week. On Saturday Joe started a new job and was very nervous. On Sunday he got the news he was hired. Joe went home relieved of all of the pressure.

Metabolism or illness. Ava was feeling tired all the time. She felt it was time for her to see a doctor. Ava went to the doctor and had a blood test. Ava had an array of tests done. The doctor told Ava that she had an excess of calories.

I Almost Killed Myself Playing Pokemon Go. My friends and I were playing Pokemon Go on our phones. A huge amount of monsters appeared all over the street. We saw a few people running around and then ran home. When we got home, I was tired but in control of my phone. I played it until it was almost over.

Chef's Kitchen. Timmy wanted to cook. He tried many recipes he read about in magazines. One day he met a girl at the restaurant and asked to be her friend. She said yes and he was happy. They started dating and got married.

James's New Job. James has been a bartender for many years. James decided he needed to go to culinary school. James's mother enrolled him in culinary school. He passed the entrance exams. Now James is a full-time chef for a large restaurant.

Macy's Favorite Ice Cream. Macy loved to go to the ice cream shop on the corner. She had her favorite flavor of ice cream. Her favorite flavor was vanilla ice cream. One day, Macy's ice cream shop closed down. She couldn't get a vanilla ice cream.

Mule and Plow. Sally's grandfather took her horse on a ride. The horse's mane was full of dust. The horse kept the dust all over the mule. Sally asked for her mule back. Her grandfather said his horse had to go first.
The Jail. Tim was in trouble. He was in jail. He wanted to be released. He would not turn himself in. He did his time.

Keep on Giving. Tommy wanted to give his mother a special Christmas gift. He asked his mother to pick out a great Christmas gift. He told her about his goals for the year. Tommy's mother thought for a moment. She gave him the biggest carrot she had ever had and left him alone.
Working Stores. Tom had to work at a small store. Tom was very nervous. He knew he would make mistakes. Tom learned that he was very good at this job. Tom went on to be a successful employee.

Goaltending. My girlfriend's uncle works for a pro sports team. He coaches the goalie position. During a game the goalie made a huge save. The crowd cheered when the goalie was given the trophy. I asked him why he gave him the award for his work.
Banana boat. Joe went on a trip to a lake in Mexico. They made a banana boat. He got to enjoy the ocean for awhile. He also caught some fish. He did not go fishing again.

The Beach. Dana was at the beach one morning and thought it would be relaxing. She sat on a bench, listening to the waves. Suddenly, she felt a sharp pain on her ankle. She looked at her ankle, and saw that it had sprained. Dana made her way to the beach, and felt a lot better afterwards.

Lost for Awhile. My wife was at the airport when she got lost. She got on an airplane and it got to Denver very late. They gave us a ride for free. We were able to see her again. She made it to Boston just in time.

New Shoes. Kya needed a new pair of shoes. Her mom had gone to the store and picked them out for her. When Kya arrived home she put the shoes on. She fell and hurt her leg. Kya cried at the fall and bought a new pair.

The Fireman's Dog. Jake had been begging his parents for a dog. His parents told him they'd never give in. Jake decided to take a risk. He took his dog to the fire department. Jake got to keep his dog, and got to play with him.

The New Alphabet. Amy and her friends were learning a new alphabet. The kids put the names into big boxes. Amy wanted to add her name. She opened her box and saw her name all over. She decided to use a different alphabet for the next day.

Time Lost While Playing. Toby didn't really like his mom much. He was often out of her sight. Eventually, Toby decided to move out. His mom was annoyed, but she didn't say anything. Soon Toby had moved far away and left his mom.
The Cat. Joe wanted a cat. His mother thought he was crazy to ask for a cat. Joe saw an ad on the television. Joe saw a cat at the local animal shelter. Joe adopted the cat.
Spoiled. The kids went to the park. They started to play. A dog ate a cookie. The kids threw it away. They went home.
Can't see who's calling. Sam was riding a tricycle. His glasses were out of place. He tried to see who was calling. All of a sudden the phone rang. It was his best friend and he had to pick it up.

Animal safari fun. One day, my sister-in-law's daughter went to a petting zoo. The zoo was full of cute animals. A couple of the animals made inappropriate gestures to her. She wasn't offended, but her daughter made a big scene. That is why we don't go to that zoo anymore.
Out of Beer. Tim was trying to make a drink. He poured a beer into a cup. Tim decided to take it to the sink and drink. The beer spilled all over. Tim had to clean it up.

Home Econ. I read the book Home Economics in High School. I applied that knowledge in economics. I found many mistakes in my book. I tried to correct my mistakes. It took several years to correct my mistakes.
Cranky. Tom was always cray. His mom got mad at him. She made Tom get out of her house. Tom was scared to leave his room. He decided to stick to books for the rest of the day.

Can't Click Away Fast Enough. Tom kept on watching his friends playing basketball. He wanted to learn from them. He decided to try and shoot the ball with a similar style to theirs. He struggled at first but he kept practicing. He ended up becoming their best shooter.

Too Hot For Ice Cream. Jill went to buy some ice cream for the house. She looked in her freezer, but it was already melted. She also looked in her cupboards, but they were already full. Finally, she decided to try the back door of her kitchen. That made Jill's ice cream much less hot.
My niece. My niece has 2 daughters. One daughter was very ill. She was in the hospital for 3 days. The daughter was not able to attend the funeral. My niece is angry because of the expense.
Jacob Breaks His Phone. Jacob was trying to make a call. He was getting ready to leave his home. He dropped his phone while on the ground. It broke in half. He had to buy a new phone.

Riley is too loud. Riley was having a hard time sleeping one night. She was very hyper and made a lot of noise. She decided she needed to find a quieter room. She moved into her parent's room. Now Riley has no more noise issues at night.
Elizabeth can't kick. Elizabeth was trying to kick a ball. But she couldn't kick the ball. She kept kicking it in the air. Elizabeth tried again. She kicked the ball into the goal.
Cleaning the house. Today was a bad day at the job. I cleaned my house. When I was done I put everything away. The smell was horrible. It was like the house was dead.

Too Fat. My coworker Sara was about to eat. She was a huge fan of the show, but had recently gained weight. She had to lose it all to be able to be a waitress. She went to the store to buy a new bag. It was heavy and made her feel even more sick.

Small world. Jenny and her best friend were playing a computer game. Jenny lost and was so upset. Jenny asked her friend what she should do. Her friend suggested she try going to a local bar. Jenny drank with her friend and had a great time.

Going to School. Ava was going to be in third grade soon. She was nervous about how she would be learning. Her mom suggested she sign up for a bunch of online math lessons. At first Ava was skeptical, but she started feeling better. At first she was embarrassed, but she quickly got used to it!

Mahabharata. There were three kinds of people in the world. They were known as Brahmans, Vaishyas and Kshatriyas. Mahabharata is a novel that deals with the last two. It deals with a Mahabharata. The Mahabharata is considered the world's best written work.

Blanket head. When my sister's daughter was 2 years old she was sick. She had a blanket stuck in her head and couldn't get it down. I put it on her and I asked if she could sleep on it. My sister said yes and slept on it for a week. By the end of the week she was awake and smiling.

The Promotion. Bob's boss is very competitive. Bob's boss called him into his office. He had him write a very long paper about the company. Bob's boss decided to give him the promotion. Bob was very happy with the outcome of his promotion.

Sledgehammer. The kids were playing near a small pond. The children picked a sledgehammer and started smashing things. They began to smash windows and play in the mud. Then, the parents came by and told the kids to stop. The kids were grounded for a week.
Being rude. Allie asked her crush for a date. He told her no. Allie was crushed. Finally he said yes. Allie was very happy.
Test. Sam always studied for tests. He was worried that he might fail them. One day he did not study as much as he should have. He did poorly on the test. Sam failed the test.

The Pencil. Marge went to the grocery store. While there, she bought a new pencil. She took it to school the next day. She drew all the letters and numbers. Everyone complimented her on her neat drawing!

The Babysitter. I was taking care of an older child. She would leave me at my house and watch TV. I couldn't decide on what to watch. I was distracted by other activities. She decided to watch a movie.

Dark Stranger. Brent was going out with friends on his motorcycle. A stranger pulled up beside Brent and pulled out a knife. Brent screamed and ran away. He called the police who found his bike. He learned his friend was murdered by a Dark Stranger.

Mounting Bills. Miles had a big family and was having trouble paying for everything. So his mother took him to the store and asked for help. She bought him a car payment calculator for her phone. She used the calculator to see how much he owed. She then paid him the balance on his car.

Addictive Game. Derek was playing a very addictive game. He had been playing for an hour. He was having a lot of fun! But he had to take a break. But when he did, he started playing again immediately.

Marco Visits Utah. Marco visits Utah to see his son, who lives there. He spends the entire trip talking and observing. He even takes a drive on the Utah highway to visit with his son. He is satisfied that he visited his son. He returns home after he visits his son.
The Interview. Lily was interviewing for a job. She was nervous. She was scared of people judging her. Finally she went on stage and answered questions. Lily landed the job.
Stray kittens. My sister in law gave us one kitten. She told us the cat ran away. It was so sad to see it go. The next day we found the cat outside. It was covered in cat scratches.

Spring Water. Sam needed water for his plants. So he looked for spring water. He bought a bottle and went to check it out. He found some that was the perfect amount for his plants. Sam was able to get the water for free.

Driving again. John had driven for 20 years. He had made a lot of friends. However, he was nervous about being pulled over. He was pulled over by a police officer. John never felt so uncomfortable in his entire life.

Seth Rides a Bike. Seth notices his bicycle has become very slow and dull. Seth decides he needs a new bicycle. Seth goes to the bicycle shop to shop for a new bike. He finds one he likes and buys it. Seth is happy he finally bought a bicycle.
Ribs. The woman got mad. She asked her husband to stop making sounds. His wife went to bed. The woman woke up. She yelled at her husband.

Fluffy Socks. Gina was wearing socks. Her mom told her they were too thin. Gina had already gotten them dirty. She had to clean them as well. When she was done she looked in the mirror. She found she had long hair in them.
The Dare. Jim had to go to a baseball game. He wasn't scared of the players. The batter he faced hit a home run. It came close enough to hit his head. He had to go home with stitches.

Battle of the Bands. Trent played the drums in a band. They were going to a battle of the bands. They each got an instrument from the other band. They began playing and each hit their opponent. The battle of the bands was won by the band that got more instruments.

Terrible perfume. Susie wanted to buy something for her husband. She wanted to buy something nice. Susie could not find the right perfume. Then she found a very nice one. Susie was so happy to buy the perfume.

The Prisoner. I went to visit my friend Tom. He was incarcerated for petty crimes. I sat in his cell and watched him walk down the hall. He was very sad, and began crying. He told me he felt so much anger and sadness.

Clean Up Your Toys. My sister bought a lot of her toys from Toys R Us. She is only five, so she did not know how to organize them. She took all of them to the store and left. When she came back, she realized that she had left all the toys. She cleaned up her toys and returned them to the store.

Wrestling Show Disaster. Ricardo decided to try out for the school wrestling team. The first tryout, Ricardo threw up during his warm up. Ricardo then proceeded to try out for the team. During the tryouts Ricardo threw up again. Ricardo was then disqualified from the team.

Winner. Jordyn was at the mall. She saw a winner sign and it caught her eye. She spent her day going to the store and buying the item. The winner was named after her and she bought a ticket. Jordyn won a million dollars.
The Smallest Player. The children sat down at the table. It was a baseball game. The kids were playing baseball. They decided to play baseball as a team. They got to be the smallest team.

New years eve. My friends and I decided to go to the new york eve party. We were disappointed it was on a sunday. After being out for a couple hours. We saw that the night was going to be fun. After the party we all went out for pizza and drinks.

The Staircase. Sam was hiking in the woods. He was trying to climb a small staircase. All of a sudden he slipped and fell. His foot went through a hole in the stair. Sam had to go to the emergency room.

The Cereal. Cindy always ate cereal when she was hungry. However, one day she woke up with a terrible stomach ache. She then started to vomit. The cereal wasn't enough to make her feel better. Luckily, her family bought her some crackers instead.

Cleaning Up. Cindy was cleaning up her basement. She found some old toys and a few old clothes. She also found a huge bucket of dirt. Cindy decided she would clean up. She decided to try and move her garage into the basement.

The Sunglasses. Jane had a big shopping trip coming up. She decided to pick up a few pairs of sunglasses to use. Jane picked out two pairs of sunglasses, one pair that she liked and one she didn't. Jane took the sunglasses to her car and put them on her head. Jane was excited to finally get to look at her new sunglasses.

mike is angry. Mike is at the coffee shop with a friend. Mike's friend tells mike that he is not very bright. Mike is really angry and leaves the coffee shop. He finds a nice spot and sits and talks to himself. The coffee shop was a great conversation starter.

cotton candy. I went to the park with some friends yesterday. I saw a cotton candy store. I decided to get cotton candy. When I got there I realized I forgot my money. I had to buy some candy at the store instead.

Windy River. The family was out boating when the river got very windy. They had to get out of the boat and paddle for the river. The river was calm after a few hours. They returned to the boat and paddled around the area. They had a fun day.
Laughing. The man laughed. The woman in the group started to laugh. The man noticed. The man asked if anyone was laughing. A woman told him they were just jealous.
Pharmacy. We stopped by the Pharmacy today. It was a bit expensive. I paid for some of my things. I then paid for my insurance. Then we went home.

The new job. Timmy recently applied for a new job. He had been out of work for 2 years. His friend had recommended him to another friend. Timmy felt like he finally got a job. His friend was happy to see that Timmy got the job.

Purchasing Decisions. Tom had a really bad credit score. He tried really hard to improve it. Unfortunately he couldn't afford the things he wanted. Tom then was forced to go to a bad credit card company. He made much better credit but still got to buy things.

Fire. The Smith family bought a house in the country. They noticed that there were lots of trees in the yard. They figured out the trees were making it hotter. They decided to cut down most of the trees in the yard. The Smith family was no longer hot in the house.
Dumb Prank. My roommate recently put a prank on me. He put a piece of paper in my drink. He pretended to be a girl from work to make me drink. I did not recognize him. We then went to get lunch.

Lola drinks coffee. Lola is a heavy drinker. She can't stand the taste of coffee. She decides to drink some coffee every day. Lola is happy to have a healthy beverage. Lola is happy with her new found health.

Michael goes to prom. Michael has never been to a big party before. He goes to a girls prom for the first time and is really nervous. He sits at the bar and drinks as much as he can. He feels so comfortable at the bar and his nerves subside. Michael dances all night long and is so happy he went to prom.

Lanterns. Rita was excited about her first Halloween. She and her friends had made lanterns to decorate their houses. They went to their friends house and got everything together. They hung the lanterns all over the neighborhood. Everyone was excited to have their very own Halloween lanterns!

Online Chess. The boy was playing online chess. The other players were having a hard time. The boy's move made his opponent regret a move he made earlier. He kept improving and eventually was able to beat his opponent. The boy was happy and happy to be a good chess player.

Clams. Ava found a small mound in her backyard. It had several clams growing out of it. Ava asked her husband if he wanted to take her for a swim. Her husband agreed to let her go swimming. Ava swam with her husband for over an hour and then went back inside.
The Dance. The kids had a fun night of dancing. They also played board games. It was a great night! They made plans to have a dance again soon. The girls couldn't wait to have another fun night!

Painting Pottery. Shelley decided to paint pottery one day. She got a big pot and painted it carefully. But she messed up and ended up with a horrible result. So she had to paint something else and start over again. But after a few hours, she was finally able to get it right.
Books. John wanted to read a novel. He couldn't figure out what to read. John asked his mom for recommendations. His mom gave him an interesting fantasy novel. John read the novel and liked it.

Degrees. Ella needed to decide what to major in. She was unsure which one to major in so she went to see her counselor. The counselor suggested several options. The counselor told Ella which options she liked the most. Ella decided to major in English.

What did mom tell you  about talking to strangers. Kelly was on a road trip. Suddenly a stranger walked up to her. They talked for a long time. At the end they kissed. Kelly decided to leave him alone.

Mturk. Mike just started working on mturk. He was really looking forward to it. But Mike's day was just getting started. So he did a lot of mturk work that day. He came home late and couldn't sleep that night.

Leg. When I started running in high school I began running in the winter. I could barely run in the warm spring. In the summer I couldn't even run. So my coach told me to run in the winter. I went to the gym and began running in the winter.

Elephants. Timmy was in the park. He wanted to see an elephant. He started out by looking up at the elephant. He slowly moved forward until he was close enough to touch it. The elephant was so close it looked at Timmy as it walked away.
Volleyball Match. Kelsi decided to play volleyball with her team. They had a volleyball match. Kelsi was on the winning team! She scored a goal. Her team celebrated her.

A waterfall. Jane went to the waterfall to enjoy the sights. She saw a lot of people down there, so she walked over. The water was incredibly crystal clear and clear as a bell. She was amazed at how beautiful it was. She decided to make it a part of her daily routine.

Michelle's New Puppy. Michelle had always wanted a puppy of her own. She decided to adopt a puppy. Michelle took the puppy to the local animal shelter. Michelle felt the pups were cute and affectionate. Michelle was very happy with her puppy and couldn't wait to get home.

The baby won't sleep. Tiffany was laying on her bed looking at the wall. Suddenly she heard a baby crying loudly. Tiffany ran to the door and saw that her baby had fallen asleep. Tiffany called 911 to alert the emergency services. Tiffany decided to sleep on the couch tonight instead.
Growing up. A man is trying to get into a good college. He goes to many different schools. He finally finds one he likes. He spends 3 years there. He becomes a good college student.
Grease Fire. Tom got into a fight with his friends. They started a grease fire. Tom tried to put it out. He was too late. The grease had spread throughout the neighborhood.

The Circus. Marge was an excited child. Her favorite activity was the circus. Her mom bought her tickets to the big show. She was amazed as she walked on stage. Afterwards, she had a fun time in the stands.

Life Changes. Tom was recently married. He felt guilty every day and decided to stop cheating. Tom started dating a woman he was really attracted to. After a month of dating, he broke up with his wife. Tom regretted breaking up with his wife and was happy about it.

Pen Caps. One time, Bob bought some pen caps to sell to customers. He got a very large supply of them. A few weeks later, a customer got a lot of them. The customer told Bob that he wanted a specific number of the caps. Bob sold him some of the other pen caps.
First Day of Work. Lydia's first day at work is tomorrow. She was not prepared. She decided to practice some Spanish. On her first day at work, she made an error. Now, Lydia works overtime.

No Friends Left. Janice and her family had just moved into a new house. All of her old friends had moved away. Janice's mother was very sad about this. Her mother wanted to take her on a trip to a new school. After the trip, Janice and her family became much closer.

Allergy Medication. Sue's mom told her to take her allergy medication. Sue took the pill and ate food that was contaminated. Sue's mother found out and was not happy. Sue's mother decided to make her go to a doctor. The doctor prescribed Sue a special allergy medicine.

Sweatpants. Lars was wearing his favorite sweatpants. He wanted to sweat more, but they weren't very warm. Lars tried to sweat as much as he could. Unfortunately, he ended up getting sick. The sweatpants were very uncomfortable to wear.

Angela 5. Angela was an adult living with her parents. One day she decided to start dating a man. He was very nice, and they dated for a few months. Finally, they moved in together and started dating. Now she and her boyfriend are happily married.

Italian. The Smith family loved to eat Italian food. The family decided to try some in the new city. They tried a new pasta place with lots of toppings. It was a success! The family now always tries new Italian restaurants.
The Office. Kate had a job interview. She felt nervous. Then she arrived and the interview was short. But Kate nailed it! She got the job.
Keurig. Troy bought a Keurig coffee maker. He tried it out one night with his wife. He couldn't believe how hot the machine was. The coffee was too hot. Troy returned it that night.

Tibet. Bob was invited to a tea party in Tibet. It was at the monastery and he was going to drink tea with monks. He decided to take his family and meet them there. His family was very pleased with Bob's decision. Bob learned he has a great family to visit in Tibet.

Hockey Game. Lily wanted to go to the local hockey game. She called her friends to go with her. Lily took them to the rink. After waiting for an hour she went to get some ice cream. Lily and her friends had a good time and were happy they were there.

The worst cup of coffee. Suzy was having a coffee. She tried it without milk but it was terrible. She threw it out and tried it with half and half. After about an hour she made it again. Thankfully her stomach didn't feel too sick.

gold. One day my dad went to the store. He wanted to buy some gold bars. When he was done he asked the clerk to bring them home. The clerk said yes. She took him home and gave him an envelope of gold!
Soft Avocado. Marge had an avocado. She could eat it. But she wanted a better taste. So she decided to grind the avocado. It turned out to be so tasty!

The Kiss. Cathy was walking home from school. She passed by the park and sat down. She leaned into a guy and was smitten with him. She continued to talk to him for a while. Eventually he took her home.

Trying hard. Ava was feeling very proud of herself. She had a good grade on her report card. Ava had a great report card, too. But there was one small issue. Ava could not find her report card in the school basement!

The broken tail light. One day I was driving home. The sun was shining brightly. I noticed a car had a big tail light out. It looked like it had hit a deer. I pulled over and changed the tail light and the car looked fine.
Mouse. The cat would chase after the mouse. The cat wanted to get a treat. He would chase it in the house. He would even chase it in the car. The cat didn't like to get a treat.

Missing the Last Episode. Cindy was watching the show one day when the last episode aired. She was very upset by the end. She didn't get a chance to watch the rest of the season. Instead, she watched one episode after another. She didn't even finish one.
Catch the Thief. The man took the money from the register. He put it in his pocket. The next day, the man went to the store. He didn't notice the money on the floor. He hid the money in his shoe.

Contaminated Shorelines. The Smiths lived in a small coastal town. One summer they visited their childhood home. While there they found a large chunk of sand washed up onto the shore. They didn't think much of it at the time. The next year the beach was infested with crabs.
TuTu. Jill was studying abroad for two weeks. She wanted to go home. But she was sick of being abroad! She got sick of it and decided to go home. Jill's mom came home for her to enjoy her day off!

Lipstick mishaps. Tom was an artist. He had a pretty extensive collection of art. He loved using his pretty colors. One day he forgot to remove his lipstick from his shirt. He tried to put it back on and it ended up sticking to the shirt.

Jackpot. Manny was looking to win a prize at the casino. He knew he would have to bring it on a Friday night. He started watching local sports with a friend. He made a winning entry into the casino jackpot. He paid off the card in cash that night.
Boring Movie. Tom was bored in class. He started watching tv. He was watching an old movie. Tom was bored. He decided to leave.

John Visits His Grandma. John loves his grandmother. One day, he is invited to visit his grandmother. He is so excited to go to see his grandmother. John's grandmother has many beautiful clothes and decorations. John and his grandmother spend the whole day together.

Clothes Shopping. Lara was shopping for clothes. She wanted to try some new items. She found some new jeans and a cute shirt. But the shirts were way too expensive. So she decided to just stick to shopping at the mall.

Brand. Bob wanted to become a better driver. He studied all he could about car maintenance. His car needed to be cleaned more often. Bob bought the same car for a few more dollars. He is very happy with his decision.

First day of school. It was the first day of school for Sarah. She was nervous. Her friend brought her her favorite book to read. Sarah went to school happy and relaxed. She ended up having a great day.

Tokyo Trouble. Tom was an American tourist in Tokyo. He met a Japanese girl who was very beautiful. Tom loved her and wanted to impress her. He dressed up in a kimono and tried on some jewelry. Unfortunately his American dollar wasn't enough to get her attention.

Nice investment. Ben was at the mall. And he noticed a store that was selling a lot of nice items. Ben decided to purchase a few. He found the store was very inexpensive. Ben went to the store and paid for all the items.

Sick Daughter. Beth's dad got a job at the local coffee shop. Her mom was very sick and had to work two shifts. Her mom stayed home and nursed her daughter to health. After a few days she recovered. Beth was very thankful to her mom.

Failure. My son and I were playing on his computer. We found a few funny jokes and I told him a few. He was laughing and made a comment that I didn't like. It was too much for me to handle. I gave up and got another computer.

Camping. Last weekend my friends and I had to camp out in a tent. We all had a great time having a blast. After the camp out was done, we all went home. We watched movies and played video games. It was a fun weekend for all of us.
Borrowed car. Susie was driving home. She noticed a car stopped next to her. She didn't know if it was her but she felt scared. So she borrowed it anyway. Susie didn't want to get in trouble.
First Time Drinking. I was at a bar last week. There was a very loud music. The music kept me up all night. I ended up stumbling home. I drank too much and fell asleep.

Javier Scores A Goal. Javier had scored a goal earlier in the game. He was feeling very proud. His team was up by 2 goals. The ball went through the goalie and into the net. Javier's goal made the team lead 1-0.

Noisy Toddlers. When I was in preschool, I would play loud music all day. I decided to turn it down from loud music. It was hard, but I ended up being more patient and quieter. One day I was playing loudly with my brothers. We wound up yelling at each other and had to go home.

Fold Them. Candy had a bunch of old clothes she was unsure of how to fold. She decided to try and fold them together. She put the clothes in a pile and folded them together. She was a little confused as to which way they should be. She decided to fold them all the way to the end.

Surprise Dinner. Kelly and her family were traveling through Europe. They decided they wanted to try something new. Kelly didn't know what they were going to eat. Finally Kelly's family suggested Italian. Kelly was thrilled and she loved the food.

Tornado Alley. Tim had never heard of tornados. He decided to check the local news. He read a lot of scary news. Tim decided to check a tornado warning. He was very relieved when a tornado was predicted.

Bob's Son Hits a Homerun. Bob is watching his son run a mile. He is proud of the way his son runs a mile. One of his son's attempts to run a mile goes wrong. Bob is disappointed his son doesn't want to be a runner. Bob tells his son to keep training and he will be a great runner.

The Epidemic. The CDC told us to expect a plague outbreak if the temperatures didn't improve. The news was so ominous that my girlfriend thought it was real. She woke me up and said we should evacuate. I got a flight to the CDC and was a bit nervous at first. Thankfully they said it was just a local plague outbreak.

Read to Me. The teacher read a book to the class. Every student stood up and began to read. I stayed seated to read the book. Everyone began to read the same page. After a couple of minutes, I read a chapter of the book.
Speech. The man spoke. He said his speech was very boring. The audience got angry. The man tried to calm down. His friend calmed him down and made his speech more interesting.

Newbie. She was learning how to ride a bicycle. She started out very slowly. She was trying to pedal as fast as she could. She pedaled as hard as she could. Soon she was able to pedal without falling off.

Arm Wrestling. John challenged Bob to an arm wrestling match. Bob accepted, and they had a very good time. John got really hurt during the match. Bob didn't care, and kept hitting John even harder. Eventually John was so tired he couldn't finish the match.

Swimming. Gina wanted to swim. She decided to try it out. She went to the lake with her mom. But unfortunately she tripped on her mom's tattered swim trunks. Her mom made her climb into the water and she was fine.

Homework Help. It was a big test coming up and it was really important. I did a lot of work on the homework. I sent it to my parents for help. They told me to finish up. They also got me to come in for a meeting to make sure everything is okay.

NYSE. There was an opportunity for the CEO of the company to make extra money. The only problem was he had no money to invest. So he used his wife's birthday money to buy an index fund. He put it into an S&P 500. His wife was happy he did that.
The Find. I was walking through the woods one day. I saw a shiny disc on the ground. It was a camera. I tried to take it out of the ground. Luckily I got my friend to get it for me.
Candy Store. Cindy was on a field trip. There were tons of candy in the store. Cindy couldn't wait to get some. She spent the whole trip getting some. She was so happy to get some.
Sleepy. Lana was always late for work. When she went to work, she had to sleep in. She always woke up too late. She tried to get up early the next time. She fell asleep on the way.

Kidneys. We bought our child some vitamins. When he woke up, he wanted to use the bathroom. His mother asked him to go to the restroom first. She put him on the floor and covered his eyes. He never got the chance to urinate because he got sick.

Jackie's New Shoes. Jackie had always wanted to buy new shoes. She decided to save her money until she could buy them. She finally had enough money to buy a pair of new shoes. Jackie was so excited to buy her favorite shoes. They fit perfectly and she was happy with them.

No Response. Tim was out shopping with friends. He started getting irritated as soon as he noticed his car. He called the company to complain. Tim eventually got his car fixed by them. He paid his bill and left with a smile.

Truman's Keyboard. Truman decided to buy a new computer. He found out it would be cheaper to just buy a keyboard. He bought a great keyboard. He was able to type much faster and use more software. Truman was very happy with his new computer.

Games. Cynthia loves to play video games. One day, she had to work from home and didn't have any free time. She decided to play video games all day instead of work. Her boss was very upset and yelled at Cynthia. Cynthia decided to find a daycare that would let her play.

Mturk. Tom wanted to make a little extra money online. Tom decided to work on his mturk account. Tom did a great job on mturk. Tom made a good amount of money. Tom decided to keep working on his mturk.
Noises. Jenna loved to sing. Jenna was always making a large group of people scream. Her parents made her stop doing this. Jenna never did. Now, she always sings from the car seat.

cookies. Maddie loved making cookies. She was in charge of making the dough. She was mixing the ingredients. Finally, she was ready to put them in the oven. When the cookies were done, Maddie went outside to play.

Sign the Autograph. Gina's dad went into the kitchen to get ice cream. He saw his granddaughter, Tami, holding a picture of him. He told Tami she had to sign it. Tami smiled when he said she had to. Gina then took the picture and sign it.

Spin class. Miley decided to take a spin class for her birthday. When she arrived, she did not have a wristband. The instructor offered to give her one. Miley was upset she could not get it since she never had one. Miley was happy when the instructor gave her the wristband.
The Couch. The couch had been broken for weeks. It was sitting up in the living room. Jim decided to fix it. It took him two nights. He finally finished the couch.

Car Accident. Dan got a call from a friend that his car was totaled. Dan couldn't go out of the house, but he knew his friend could. Dan got his friend a ride to work. Dan's friend was so impressed with Dan that he offered to pay his fare. Dan thanked his friend for his kindness.

The trip. Timmy and his friend decided to go to the beach. The girls stayed at a campsite until the sun went down. The girls then went on a boat for a few hours. When they got home they both had a sunburn. Timmy had a headache from the burning.

Money. My friend's daughter was getting married this weekend. She wanted me to help with the wedding gift. I looked around and couldn't find anything I could buy. So I went to her cousin's to ask him for help. She said I was welcome to buy anything I wanted.

The Snowball King. Dan's family was celebrating their snow day. They wanted to show their snowman friend. They all made snowballs together. They showed him their snowman friends. His face melted with the candy.
Stan's Hat. Stan was riding a horse. He felt something fall off of the horse. He picked it up. He noticed that it was a hat. He put the hat on and it made him laugh.

Peppermint tea. I've been searching for a new tea that I can enjoy every day. I went online to look for the best peppermint tea out there. I found a great peppermint tea but it didn't have any sugar. I found a similar tea with sugar and it's great! I decided to add some sugar and make the peppermint tea a day.
First Dye. Sam dyed his hair red for the first time. His mother warned him that it would hurt. Sam dyed his hair blue anyway. He immediately became sick. He never got red hair again.
Stray. I saw a stray dog in my yard. He was hungry and alone. I let him sleep on my couch. He kept me up late at night. Eventually, he got fat and hurt himself.

Long Journey. I was driving home last week. A cop pulled me over. He got out and told me he thought I was doing something bad. He asked for my insurance information. He told me I have a criminal record and couldn't drive with no insurance.
Theo. Theo was a hard worker. He saved his money to retire. He worked hard and got a good job. He was happy to have a retirement. Theo was happy and he had more money.

Aurelia Learns to Tango. Aurelia wanted to learn a new musical instrument. She looked for a music shop near her house. She decided to take classes at the local conservatory. At first Aurelia was unsure about the classes. After two weeks, Aurelia was playing the tambourine.

Not a Federal Holiday. Timmy was out for a walk on a warm July afternoon. On his way home, he saw that the highway was closed due to snow. He decided to turn around and find somewhere to park. He made a turn off the highway, but the snow stopped. Timmy was stuck for over six hours with no parking.
Swimsuit. Gloria wanted to buy a new swimsuit. She had looked everywhere for one. She decided to buy one at the mall. It was expensive. But when she got home, she was thrilled.

Corner. Gina's mother said that she could go pick out a seat. Gina sat on the edge of the seats and looked out at the sidewalk. A man was sitting in the seat beside her. She made out the man's name and number on the seat. She felt foolish.
New Puppy. My daughter's best friend is allergic to cats. I asked her what kind of dog to get. She said a puppy. I looked up a puppy on the internet. I adopted a lab and gave her a puppy.

Ken's Kilt. Ken wanted to learn how to play his beloved basketball. He got his friends together to show him. They were able to show Ken several ways to use his feet to score. Ken tried many ways and he realized he was good at basketball. Now Ken is playing in the NBA.

Military. I had always wanted to serve in the military. When I was in high school, I had to decide what I wanted to do. I decided that I wanted to serve in the Air Force. My senior year, I decided to join the Air Force as a pilot. When I got out of the Air Force, I became a famous pilot for a living.

Unaffectionate. Cathy was very jealous of her friends girlfriend. She constantly told her that she was too cute. One day her friend got her boyfriend a dress for Christmas. When Cathy saw the dress, she was very jealous. To this day, Cathy will never be friends with her girlfriend.

The Arrest. Charles was sitting in his classroom and began reading. Suddenly, a teacher came in with a bat. He was immediately suspended. Charles spent the rest of the day in detention. His teacher warned him not to do it again.

New Boys. A group of guys decided to buy a truck for their car club. They named it the New Boys. They all talked and drank in the parking lot. The guys got along well, but the new boys got rowdy. The club didn't allow the New Boys to join.

Accident or fate. I was playing soccer in my neighborhood with a group of friends. We were all passing the ball around and playing in the mud. We kept losing the ball to each other, though, so I gave up. I ran through the street, knocking a neighbor over. I ran through the street, getting dirt all over my shoes.

Cable Service. I was sitting on the bench waiting for a bus today. Suddenly, my phone rang. When I answered, I realized that I had no cable service. My cable company had called and asked for me to come out early. So, I left my bench and went to the cable company.

Vance Veers Verbose. Vance was in a rush to finish his novel. He went to a different language to speed up the process. He tried to read the book but kept getting distracted. Vance eventually started typing the words out. Vance was more productive and finished his novel in record time.
Early Race. Beth was a runner. Beth started the race early. Beth crossed the finish line. She got a medal. Beth was happy to have raced early.

Anniversary Gift. I wanted to give my friend a birthday gift. I bought a bunch of birthday presents. The presents were small in comparison to my friend's. My friend was very pleased with the gift. I bought a bunch of gift wrapping paper and gave my friend his present.

Las Vegas. I used to go to Las Vegas with my parents when I was younger. We would go to a lot of casinos and go to strip clubs. After moving away, my family never went back to Las Vegas. I have a new found love for Las Vegas. Now I'm glad that I never used to go to Las Vegas.

The Picture. Jane had been invited to a Christmas party. She was invited to pose for a portrait. At the party, Jane was asked to hold her hand in a pose. She was nervous, but she was willing to do it. Jane was so happy when she got the picture she had been looking for!
Lost Voice. Jim lost his voice when he was very young. He hated the sound of it. When he reached middle age he began to lose his voice. Jim tried to keep a normal voice. Unfortunately it didn't work.

Basketball Superstar. Benjamin was a very skilled basketball player. However, Benjamin was not very athletic. He was never able to stay in the lane, and couldn't make many plays. As a result, he was often out of position on the court. In order to improve his game, Benjamin signed up for basketball coaching.
Injured. One day, I tripped over a rock. I fell down and hurt my shoulder. I didn't tell my parents until a few days later. I went to the hospital and was treated there. I went home a few days later.
Jason gets robbed. Jason is walking home from work. He sees someone running from a store. Jason tries to run as well. The person hits him in the face. Jason gets punched and run over by the robber.

The Speech. It was the last day of class before graduation. Amy and her friends were anxious to get started. She was nervous about her speech. Amy practiced at home every night after school. Her speech was flawless!

Cheese Bandit. Tom hated his job as a busboy. So one day, he decided to bandit his boss's car. Tom was caught and fired from the job. He tried to make money selling stolen goods. Tom ended up dying in a hail storm.

New Car. Bob always wanted a new car. He worked really hard and saved all his money. Finally he had enough saved to buy a new car. He went to the dealership and bought a nice red sports car. Bob now drives the new car all the time.
Cute Girl. Tom was with his friends on the beach. Tom and his friends found a cute girl. Tom had a crush on the girl. The girl did not like Tom. They ended up breaking up.
Broken Stove. Tom got a new stove. He tried using it everyday. Unfortunately one day his stove wouldn't turn on. Tom checked and it was broken. Tom had to buy a new stove.

The Pizza Coupon. Diana wanted to save money on pizza. She went to the grocery store and found a coupon for one free pizza. She went to her local restaurant and ordered the pizza. It came with a salad and a dessert. The waitress said it was a good deal.

Snowstorm. The weather had been freezing all week. It snowed all over the city the night before. On the morning of the storm, the roads were icy. I had to drive over a hundred miles to get to work. When I arrived, the road was not covered in ice.
Saying Hello. Sheila was walking to her house. But as she approached, she felt something. It was a small furry creature. And she realized it was a bunny! Sheila ran away as fast as she could.

The Code. Randy was a teacher at a small high school. He was worried about the incoming freshman. They would all need some guidance to fit in. He set up a code to help. He made sure they were prepared to deal with their first day.

The Bar. John and Kim got into a fight. The bar broke up their fight. The two of them decided to go to a local bar instead. The bartender took the pair's money. They bought a movie from the DVD store.

Ice Cream. Tommy's favorite drink was ice cream. He would try to make it every chance he got. One day his dad decided to take him ice cream shopping. Tommy was sad to see the store was closed. Tommy would try it whenever it became available.

Bruce Dog. Bruce had always wanted a dog, and finally his parents took him to a pet store. Bruce picked out the best puppy in the store, and loved his pet. After hours of looking, the day finally arrived for Bruce to pick a dog. Bruce chose a big and playful dog, named Boo Boo. When Bruce picked up Boo Boo, he could hardly contain his excitement.

Car Lock. I parked my car in my garage at home. I decided to leave the car door unlocked. I put my keys in the lock box of the car. I tried to open the door but the lock was too difficult. My daughter came in the car and unlocked the door for me.

Wrong Pizza. Tom was making a pizza. The pizza sauce got on one of the cheese slices. Tom did not know how to remove it. He decided to order pizza with extra sauce. The order came out perfect and Tom was happy.
Colin wants ice cream. Colin had a craving for ice cream. He decided to go get some ice cream. He went to the grocery store. He bought several ice creams. Colin ate the ice cream he bought.

DJ. Fred went to an electronic dance music festival. There were no DJ's to be found. Fred looked around and saw one DJ. Fred went up to the DJ and tried to talk to him. The DJ politely turned him away.

French Fries. Tom wanted to get creative. He asked his friends if they'd make french fries. They were very creative. Tom decided to make french fries instead. They ended up being better than he had expected.
Clean up duty. Allie had a cleaning job. She had to cut grass and sweep the floor. Her feet hurt. She didn't want to get the job back. So she gave up and didn't go cleaning.
bank. Mary needed a new bank account. She went to the bank to look. She checked several of them. She was happy with the bank she selected. She paid for the account and put it in.

Discount. Gina went to a store to get a toy. But she didn't want to pay full price. The cashier suggested they try a coupon. The coupon she saw offered 30% off. Gina used the coupon, and got the toy without paying full price.

Break Not Break Up. Sara was mad at her boyfriend for leaving her for a new guy. She decided to take some pills and throw up. Her boyfriend didn't notice, and went to sleep. When he woke up, Sara's stomach was raw and blue. She had just gotten off a powerful anti-anxiety pill.
A Snack. Tim was at school. He noticed a strange thing. A girl was sitting on his desk with no food. Tim wondered if she wanted some. She said no.

Trey's Soup. Trey was cooking dinner for his family. He was using a fancy new pan. Unfortunately, his new pan was a bit flimsier than normal. Trey's family was not happy about this. They all left him with soup without any sauce.

Losing a Wallet. Beth was walking on the street. All of a sudden she lost her wallet. She wasn't really worried since she had just bought it. All of a sudden a cop came up to her and searched her pockets. She had lost her wallet!

Wolf in Sheep's Clothing. Jake liked to pretend he was the wolf who lived in his living room. Once when Jake was playing with friends, he walked into his bedroom. Jake suddenly heard a noise in the living room and ran out to see what it was. Jake was startled when he saw his mother yelling at him for disturbing her. Jake's mother never let Jake play in her yard again.

Jill's Surprise. Jill had not told her mom that she had cancer. She was worried she would be told. Jill asked her mom if she could come to her birthday party. Her mom told her that she was invited and would be at the party. Jill was surprised and very happy for her.
Greg's party. Greg wanted to throw a party. He bought a bunch of food and drinks. Then he invited all of his friends. When everyone showed up, he had fun! Greg's party turned out great!

Christmas Gift. Jim had just received a brand new computer for his birthday. He was very excited for it to arrive and he was nervous about it. Jim opened up his new gift and began to enjoy it immediately. After watching a few movies, Jim felt more relaxed. Jim went home and felt very happy with his new computer.
College advertisement. Sam had a job offer in a marketing firm. He decided to take a look at the offers. He was not sure which one to take. He decided to take the job. He made $30,000 in the end.

Home Perm. Jan was painting the interior of her home. She found she was not good at painting the walls. She tried using paint from other places but it wouldn't cover. Finally, she found a homemade spray. She sprayed the walls and it was much easier to paint!

A Car Baby. Lilly was a single mother. She never expected her son to become a father. She thought he would be a nice baby. Her son decided to become a car baby instead. Lilly never found out he had been using her for years.
Slow keyboard. Tom was typing some text. His keyboard was acting slow. He decided to buy a new one. He went to the store and picked one up. When he got home, it worked great!

Pretty Pictures. Kelly's boyfriend had a new computer. He took pictures every night for a few months. They grew so popular, Kelly thought he would be embarrassed. But her boyfriend was not. He told her he thought it was funny!
sky. The sky was blue. We wanted to see the stars. My friends and I watched the stars in the sky. We played games and drank. It was one of our best nights ever!

Tonight's Supper. I was looking forward to tonight's dinner. It was almost time for supper. My parents went out of town and were away for the weekend. We have not had any dinner since then. I have not eaten since then.
Interesting Run. Tom ran everyday. He never made it to a cross country meet. He decided to try a triathlon. He trained for weeks. Tom ended up making it and was happy.

Jana Looks For A Home. Jana was looking for a new home. She decided to look in her neighborhood to see if she could find one. She found an empty house that had lots of windows. Jana offered to fix up the house and live there. Jana bought the house and moved in to take her new life.
Fajitas. Jim had always wanted to make Mexican food. He decided to make some Fajitas. He bought ingredients for some. It was a little over cooked but it was okay. He had a good time making the meal.
Earl gets in trouble. Earl is playing at the park. He is swinging from the tree. Earl hits his head. He has to go to the ER. Earl gets his head taken care of.

Train Ride. I was going on the train with my brother. It was dark and we decided to get a snack. The train was very slow. It took forever to get to our destination. After a half hour, we arrived at our destination.
Sharks at the Aquarium. Tom went to the aquarium. They had a bunch of sharks. There was a lot of action going on. Tom was amazed. It was really neat.

Jealousy. I was always very jealous of my friends because of their money. This jealousy never ended until i met a nice girl. I invited her to dinner and talked to her. However, i didn't even look her in the eyes. I just looked and felt her up.

The broken arm. One day while working at the pool I got a really bad bump on my arm. The doctor told me it was a broken arm. I immediately went to the hospital to get it treated. It turned out to be just a bruise and not the bone that broke. My arm is okay, but now I will wear a cast.

Pepper safety. I tried not to spill some pepper spray on my jacket. I took off the jacket and put it away. The pepper spray was still on the jacket. I tried to wash the jacket in the washer. I accidentally burned my jacket on the way to wash it.

Mike's Mountain Adventure. Mike wanted to hike the tallest mountain in North America. But Mike's truck broke down one day and he was unable to drive. He decided to walk the rest of the way on foot. And Mike found the biggest and most beautiful peak in the world! Mike's trip was one of the most memorable of his life.

Baby Passport. Jill was excited when she got her birth certificate. She was also relieved to learn it was an infant passport! However, it was only for babies born in the United States. That meant she needed to apply at her state's office. Unfortunately, they didn't have a birth certificate for Jill!

Media Day. Tommy didn't like the school dance. His friends told him he shouldn't go. Tommy's friends went out and got tickets for him. Tommy went to the dance with his friends. Tommy danced with his friends all night.

The Ring. The boy had been looking for his lost ring all day. His father promised to search for it and return it. On the way home from school, the boy realized his ring was gone. He raced home and returned to school to find his ring. His father found it and they had a good laugh about the lost ring.

Simple Hunger. Jane wanted to eat something that she had never had before. She went to the local store. She saw a frozen pizza and wanted to try it. Jane bought it and ate it in front of her house. She was hungry for days.

I'm Sorry, Baby. Lilith couldn't stop crying. She wanted to go home, but she was too far away. Lilith's mom told her to calm down and she would get home soon. At the hospital, she was taken to a recovery room and there was a bed. Her mom picked her up and took her home.

Hoping for a snow day. We were waiting for snow to fall on our way to work. Unfortunately we got very little snow. We hoped for a day of heavy snow. When it finally fell it was really wet. We ended up having to stay home.

President. When his school was founded there were only 2 people at the top. He never had to do politics at school. The school is now in 6 different states. The current president has changed this. He now has a full time job teaching his 4 year old daughter.

Visiting Santa. Jenny has been wanting to visit Santa Claus. Her parents tell her it's too dangerous. Jenny convinces her parents to go on a mission. They fly Jenny to Mexico. Jenny has a wonderful time in Mexico with Santa Claus.

Bicycles are Fun. Nancy wanted to ride her bike around town. She decided to ride to work everyday. However, she got tired of riding her bike. She decided to buy a bicycle horn. She had fun driving her bike around town.

Knockout Gas. Devin was walking down the street. Suddenly, he felt a pain in his leg. Devin tried to run away but he felt trapped. When he tried to use the restroom, he saw that there was no gas. He was forced to wait for someone to go first.
