A grade. Gina had done really well in her math class. But she didn't want to be called out on her mistakes. She took out her notebook and began to write down all the answers. When she was finished, she handed it back to the teacher. It was a D on the exam.
Creepy Basement. Tom noticed a creepy basement behind his house. Tom asked his parents about it. They didn't like it. Tom found another place to live. Tom moved to a safer neighborhood.

The Mailman. I went to work on a Saturday morning. As I sat down my boss called me into his office. He was carrying a stack of letters to the mailbox. I opened all of the letters and put them in the mailbox. I walked back to my job and put the mail back.

Vineyard Blues. I used to work in the vineyard. There was a lot of trash, dead and dying vines. My boss said it was okay, and I didn't have to clean it up. It was not ok in the slightest. I never went back to that vineyard again.

Cat and Dog. My cat and I are trying to make a good relationship. We both like to hide our affection. Last week I found him standing by the door with his mouth open. I was relieved to see he was still affectionate with his owner. He has learned to love himself by being a better dog and friend.

Alternative. I met this new girl on the bus today. She sat next to me and said she loved American Idol. I have not been on the show since I was on it in 2005. I decided to get an audition and talk to her face to face. I failed to win her heart and left the show without a date.
Law Breaker. I always hated being called a "dumb law breaker". My friends used to tease me. I decided to not take it personally. I began to study law. My friends no longer call me a dumb law breaker.

Mario. I went to Mario's house with my parents. My parents let me look at his Nintendo game systems. I looked at the New Nintendo. It was a Nintendo 64 with Mario characters. I enjoyed playing Mario's games.
The Closet. Tom bought some new furniture. His closet was getting very full. Tom decided to clean it. He spent days taking all his old junk out. He was finally able to have a neat looking closet.

The Surprise House. The family is on vacation in Vegas. They go to a party in a casino. They are invited to a surprise house. The family is surprised and had never seen a surprise house. The family stayed at a hotel to make it home.
Fair. Timmy loves to play fair. He took his new sled to the fair yesterday. He was excited to get started on the ice slide. He was so excited when he saw his friends. The fair was very fun for Timmy.
Hungry. I am extremely hungry. I could not finish my last meal. I decided to eat fast food. I ate at an ice cream parlor. I had no energy afterwards.
Grilled cheese. Kelly liked to grill. Her friends and family always loved the cheese grilled on it. Kelly loved to grill. One day she forgot to put on some cheese. All her friends left disappointed.

The Tulips. Josie was planting tulips in her yard. She was surprised to find all of them dead. A stray dog ate most of them. She brought the rest back home to plant them. She thought it was a nice gesture.

The Call. Dylan was playing video games on his laptop. While he was playing a knock came on and the doorbell rang. The knocker told Dylan he had to meet him at the store. Dylan did not have any money but called his mother for help. She drove him to the store and gave him fifty bucks to buy a drink.

Intern to Director. Janet was looking for a part time job. She found one at an animal shelter in the city. After two weeks, she got a call back for a full time job. Janet was ecstatic to finally be working in her field. She worked as a full time intern for three years.
Boredom. Tim had a lot to do. He did not want to get back to sleep. He kept waking up too late and late. He fell asleep watching television. He did not do any work.

A Day at the Beach. Mike and his family were bored and went to the beach. He wanted to surf so he went to the waves and swam there. After several hours, he decided that he had enough. He decided that he didn't want to surf anymore. He swam back to his car to head back home.
Stomach. Gina had eaten a small amount of cheese. Her stomach was feeling upset. She decided to take a laxative. She took the medicine and felt better. Gina's stomach was now feeling better.
Lingering Cramp. Lily was trying to write a letter on a table. She had a sudden cramp. It was really bad. Her friend sent her some pain relievers. Lily's cramp was gone for good.

The Bonfire. It was a hot, sunny day outside. The fire department put out the small blaze. The fire burned a lot of wood. The fire department bought extra supplies. The fire department put out a larger fire.

Shin. Sam was laying on the floor and was not looking at anything. He felt a sharp pain. It was his shin. He looked at the floor and saw a huge cut. He was rushed to the hospital and had his cast put on it.

Out of battery. Jan was on a road trip. She had been running out of battery for a while. She was getting really thirsty. She went to a gas station to get more. The gas station didn't have enough for her.

Raging Rivers. My friend's dad went to an old river. It had been the source of a great deal of water pollution. He decided to spend several hours scuba diving. When he came back the river was covered in algae. He is now planning on returning the next year to clean it.
The Broken Pot. Tom bought a new house. It had a very big kitchen sink. The pot was a little weak. Tom fixed it up. He didn't think much of it.

Aliens. The aliens were trying to find a spaceship to take to outer space. They were looking for one that would be able to land and take off. Eventually they were forced to look elsewhere. An air balloon landed in a field. The aliens couldn't make it out.
The Fender Bender. The kids were playing on the sidewalk. They were throwing rocks and bottles. The fender bender began to take shape. They started to argue. They ran for cover from the rocks.

First dibs. The waiter brought the meal. The waiter said that his boss was leaving. The waiter tried to leave the restaurant. The waiter was shot in the leg. The waiter lost the ability to work at the restaurant.

Losing the mail. Mary had gotten a letter for her birthday. She opened the envelope and read the contents. It was a notice from her postal service. She decided to just mail it and keep a different envelope. Mary wasn't angry but didn't like the idea.

Gerry. Gerry's dog ran away on him last week. Gerry searched all day but could not find him. The following day, Gerry's friend showed up at his door with the dog. Gerry was so happy, he jumped right in his arms. Now they are best friends and will play until their owners go home.

The Coming Out. I was in the third grade. My parents had made me go to the bathroom during lunch. I tried to hide from the teacher. She found me and told me I had to go. I cried a little because I was nervous about my future.

Runny Makeup. Janet had been at work all day. She put on some lipstick but it wasn't like she remembered. She looked in the mirror and saw red all over. Janet was upset at herself. She put on more lipstick before leaving to get some ice cream.

The Promotion. Gina was working on an important project. She was responsible for a project involving a sales promotion. Gina was really good at her job. Her boss offered her a great bonus for her hard work. Gina was thrilled with the offer.

Charlene the Song Bird. Charlene lived on a farm. She loved to sing and was very skilled. One day while visiting, Charlene's cousin fell from a tree. Charlene's cousin was singing as Charlene saw her. Charlene felt bad for her cousin that she lost her voice.

Heart Attack. The man went on a very strenuous hike. He thought he was done and couldn't climb any more. He decided to pull over to rest. He woke up and realized he had an extreme heart attack. He lost his left arm in the incident.
ice cubes. Tina went to the store. She saw the ice cubes. She decided she wanted to get some. She got a handful and popped them in her mouth. She couldn't stop eating them.
Struck. Bob walked around the street barefoot. He noticed a small bird's nest. He took a rock from the nest. The rock struck the bird. The bird stopped walking.
The Anime. I was reading my anime book. I was really enjoying it. The story was really interesting. Suddenly, it became very violent and graphic. I decided to skip the next chapter.

Oliver's Birthday. Oliver's birthday was coming up. He would like to get something. He decides to ask his parents. His parents tell him that they don't have much money. He has to go buy it for himself.

The Lightning Storm. It was a terrible storm that day. I thought I was going to drown! But thankfully, I was able to crawl out of a tree. My mom saw me and yelled at me for being careless. After that, I was always careful of lightning strikes.
Fleas. Nita was washing the dishes. She heard a noise in the kitchen. There were fleas. She tried to kill them with soap and water. Nita's husband told her the cats were hungry and took them home.

England. Kate was playing in the playground with her friends. She threw a ball and it flew into the sky. Her friend saw it and ran after it. Kate was in the air for a split second, then came back down. The ball hit her and she fell to the ground.

Camping Trip. The girls were going camping. It was supposed to be fun. Unfortunately, it turned out to be a nightmare. They spent almost all night in their tents. The next day, they all decided to go home and rest.

Fast Playing. The other night I was listening to some music. My friend and I decided to get into a game of speed chess. It is a very fast game. When it was my turn, I was not able to play. So I decided to skip the game and move on to the next one.

The Contest. Sue was having a spelling bee. She was ready for the first round of the spelling bee. She was really nervous for the final round. In the final round, she was a good speller and got the win. Sue was so proud that she entered the spelling bee again.

Heavy rainstorm. I got up early for work this morning. When I got to work, the entire office was covered in rainy. I had to wear a rain coat in order to work. I worked in the rain all day. I did not come home until it stopped raining.

Home Work. I recently was laid off of my job. I was not able to find another job. I took up home work as my first choice. I went to an agency to search for another job. I finally found another job that paid more than home work!

Sea Turtle. Gina loved sea turtles. She kept them as pets when she was little. When she went to visit her grandma she saw a turtle. She ran to the turtle. She took it home and brought it back to visit her.

Dinner. Dina got to work early. She bought all the needed ingredients for her family's dinner. She was so excited to start cooking. The first thing she did was put all the vegetables on the stove. She cooked and ate her family's delicious dinner.

The Vest. Amy loved her new school uniform. It had a lot of pockets and was long. Amy liked the way it looked on her. She even wore it out of the house to go shopping. She felt beautiful, and she knew she made the right choice.
Baking a Cake. Jana was making a cake. She got all of the ingredients ready to bake. Then she had her husband help her mix it. Afterwards, she baked it for an hour. The cake turned out perfectly.

Dentist. Mike was feeling really bad. He had a big cavity in his tooth. Mike went to the dentist to have it looked at. He was afraid but agreed to go. The dentist did an excellent job filling the cavity.

Regrets. I decided to get my nails done. I went to the salon and they did a fantastic job. However, when they came out my nails were huge and ugly. They ruined the picture. I went home and regretted my decision to get them done.

The Shower. Today is my first day as a new employee. I've just been hired as a shower maid. This is the first shower I will do this week. I really need to learn all these new techniques. I will work hard to do well in my new position.
Mugged. The man tried to walk to the store. He tripped on a rock. He was beaten up. Someone stole his wallet. The man ran home.
Protest. Tom got on a bus to protest. The bus driver called him a racial slur. Tom felt bad. The driver apologized. Tom had a better time on the next bus.

Carson Wins the Game!. Carson plays soccer at the local high school. During a game, Carson gets injured. His team is down 3 goals. They pull back from a game-winning shot. Carson ends up scoring the winning goal.
Late Flight. Tom was on an airplane. He noticed it was getting late. He tried to stay up as best as he could. He had to stand up late. He got the flight off the ground.
The GoldFish. Karen had a goldfish. She loved having it around. One day the fish got into her hair. Karen hated it, but she put a hair clip on it. She was able to get rid of it with her headband.

Rose and Her Rose. When I was a child my grandmother bought me a rose. I really liked her rose so I wanted a rose too. I begged her to get me a red rose so that I could see her face. She gave in and bought me a yellow rose instead. Now I can look at her face and know she was in love with me.

Desert Journey. I went on a trip to the desert. I was in awe at the lush green grass and lush trees. I was so happy with my trip to the desert! I took some pictures of the scenery. I took a few minutes to nap to make sure I was ready for my next trip.
Molly's Beau. Molly is in love with a man named Beau. Molly does not know he is gay. She visits Beau's house one day. The next day, Beau's parents tell Molly he is gay. Molly is heartbroken.

Race. Tim was excited about his first race. He didn't know what to expect. When he arrived, he started running. He was really fast and got second place. He was so excited that he ran it again on the track later that day.

The Scissors. Linda loved playing with scissors. She would cut the string and put the scissors in her pocket. She went to the store and bought a dozen of them. She took a pack home and began to use them. They became her new best friends.

Tom Gets a Mechanical Keyboard. Tom wanted a mechanical keyboard for work. His current keyboard broke and broke his fingers. Tom searched online for keyboards that would fit his needs. He found a great mechanical keyboard. He ordered it, and it arrived the next day.

Movies. The family had a long day at the movies. At the end of the night they went to bed. While the kids were asleep, they watched movies. When the kids woke up, they all cried. The movie they were watching was so funny that they stayed up all night!

FB Affair. Catherine and Mark were best friends. Mark was very popular and always had a lot of friends. Mark invited Catherine to a party at his house. The next day Catherine saw Mark kissing another woman. Catherine broke up with Mark.
Sinking Boat. Jill was playing outside. She threw a ball. It hit a large rock. It sank the boat. Jill and her brother had to swim to the shore.

The Man with the Cane. John worked hard every day at his office job. He could do no less than give his co-workers great service. He saw a woman and her husband walking down the street. John took a swing and knocked the man with the cane over. John made a big apology and then retired.
Girl Scout Cookies. Kim was at camp and wanted to earn candy. She decided to bake cookies. She made a dozen beautiful cookie. They were a hit! She couldn't wait to share them with her troop.
Car accident. Tom was driving on the highway. A car hit his side. Tom pulled over to the side of the road. The car behind him did not stop for Tom. Tom pulled over and the man apologized.
The Turkey Leg. Jake had made a huge turkey leg. He decided to eat it. He took it to school the next day. His mother was so mad. Jake never made a turkey leg again.

A lost wheel. The man turned his car and the handle got stuck. The mechanic came out to check the problem. He said there was a loose pin on the handle. He took the pin out and re-installed it. The mechanic said the wheel turned back on.

Cavities Galore. Kenny didn't think he would see his dentist for over a year. He had been worried for the past week that he might be cavityless. The dentist didn't need a dental assistant and scheduled an appointment. Once they had scheduled the appointment, they began cleaning. Kenny saw his dentist and had his cavity filled.

The Proposal. Nancy and her husband were engaged. She decided she wanted a ring with a big diamond. She went to the jeweler and asked for a big diamond. The jeweler cut the diamond down to size and put it in the ring. Nancy and her husband had their very first diamond ring!

Exchange. When she was little, Mary was a fan of a new soap opera. She knew that was going to be her last soap opera. She was upset, but knew she would miss the show. She would have to make her way to an exchange program. She went to one and her mother was so happy she cried.

Secret Smoker. Sam had a crush on a girl he saw at the bar. He told his friends that he wanted to smoke a cigarette with her. He was nervous because he didn't know anyone who smoked. His friends made fun of him because of his nervousness. Luckily, his friends stopped being so mean and decided to be cool.

Down the Stairs. The Smiths got into their car. They heard a loud noise and went to see what was wrong. When they went up the stairs, they saw their dog jumping up them. The dog was panting hard. She was panting because she was so tired.
Spaghetti. Gina had a craving for spaghetti. She went to the supermarket. She bought a large amount of spaghetti. She put it in the oven. But the spaghetti burned.

The Track Meet. Cathy was a running back on her high school's track team. She was in the middle of her first race. She was getting ready for her second race when the field was called. Cathy ran as fast as she could. Cathy ended up winning the second race in a close finish.

Used Books Suck. Lydia was going to be on a college tour. She needed to find some old books that were no longer in print. She had seen them at thrift stores but they were cheap. She couldn't afford to buy them but she was able to get some online. Lydia found some really great used books and got her tour started.
The Burger. Tom loved burgers. Tom decided to make his own. He took his favorite ingredients and made a delicious burger. Tom was proud of his creation. Tom decided to make more of them to celebrate.

The Accidental Crime. Sam was drinking with friends. He noticed his friend wasn't paying attention. Sam kept drinking. After a while, he ran into a friend at a party. The friend started a fight and stole some beer.

Making Music. Mike loved listening to his favorite band. One day Mike got the chance to perform in front of an audience. Mike did not know how to play the guitar, so he asked his dad for help. His dad taught Mike how to play the guitar. Mike learned how to make music and played for an audience.

System Failure. Gina was walking around her house when she saw something. She had accidentally left her phone charging in the microwave. She called her dad to pick her up. Her dad told her to stay put and waited for the problem to pass. The next morning, the power came back on and she ran to it.

Trick or Treat. We woke up early on Halloween and decided to go Trick or Treating. We were so excited to get started. When we arrived we were relieved to see the street empty. Our favorite candy was gone. I made my parents leave us at home, because it's not a good idea to leave candy.
Football. It was the last quarter of the basketball game. Trey was up by 10 points. The ball landed in his hands. He was ready to shoot. He missed the shot and the game ended.

A Wild Zebra Attack. Gina and her cousins were outside playing. They decided to jump in the water. The water was very rough. The Zebra jumped in and started biting the girls. Gina and her cousins decided to get out of the water.
Food. The restaurant has a long line. The wait is at least five minutes. It is very crowded. I ordered the food and was very happy. But when I left, I felt like a fool.

Walking in the store. Yesterday I went to the store to buy groceries. After buying the groceries I walked to the cashier. When I was walking towards the cashier I bumped into someone. I apologized for bumping into her. We ended up being friends and she gave me a hug.

Busted Pipe. Tom noticed his water heater was making a loud noise. He figured it was probably broken. He called up a repairman. Tom decided to go to a local appliance store to get the pipe fixed. The pipe came out but the water heater was ruined.

Justin's Job. Justin loved playing sports, especially football. He started playing when he was very young. During high school, he played on varsity. His coach asked him to start junior varsity so he could join junior. Justin accepted his decision and became a junior varsity player.
Like father like son. The first day of school is always scary. This is no exception. Last week, we went to school. The teacher yelled at all of us to quiet down. It was my first day as a new teacher.

Bad Weather. It had rained all day, making it worse. They went to a local bar. There was a fire going on, so they had to evacuate. They couldn't get a cab. They had to stay in the bar until it was safe.

Marty's Roach Problem. Marty noticed a small cockroach in his garage. He was afraid to use his sprayer to kill it. Finally Marty decided to take out his knife and pry it out. But after a minute of trying he was frustrated with the tiny roach. It ran out of the kitchen window, ruining Marty's coffee table.

Making chili. I wanted to cook my own chili. I looked up some recipes online. I went to the store and bought everything I needed. When I got home, I started mixing the ingredients. I made chili for myself, my friends, and even my neighbors.

First Snowfall. John woke up and saw that it was snowing. He rushed out the door and grabbed his coat and hat. He hurried home and made a fire. He then made breakfast and went to work. John enjoyed the snow and went back to bed.

Gas pump. Bob was filling up his car with gas. He had just bought a cheap one he didn't really need. Bob noticed that the pump wouldn't start. He looked in the cabinet and noticed it was broken. He had to buy a brand new one.
The Playdate. The two girls had a playdate. They were singing songs to each other. They were so silly! They even got a lot of laughs. It was a lot of fun!

New Shirt. Karen decided she wanted to dye her shirt. She went to the store and bought dye. She set her shirt up on the table and took it to the sink. When she turned it on, she saw pink instead of blue. Karen realized her mistake and vowed never to try that again.

Last Minute. The school started the new year on a Friday. There were about 40 students from the class. Everyone waited in the cafeteria for their turn. After 30 minutes, they were all there. It took a long time, but they all got in line.

Tired. Tom was playing sports at school. His coach got called to the office. It was time for him to go home. Tom was exhausted and told his coach he would be late home. He was able to go home just after his coach left.
Delivery Mistake. Tim ordered a pizza. He waited twenty minutes for it. Finally he checked the delivery notice. He didn't see a phone number, so he called his order. He got an extra pizza for free.

Peapod. Kate ordered takeout from Peapod for delivery. Unfortunately the food did not arrive that day. She was very disappointed. She called customer service to complain. The representative told her the order was placed on the wrong day.
Game. Ricky had a baseball game. He wanted to make a big score. He decided to run for home. He made a hundred and got home. He won the game!

March. The boys had a basketball match. Their first game started off badly. They were down by ten points at the end. They pulled it together and played better the rest of the game. They ended up winning the game.

Angry. She wanted to make a mistake but she was afraid. She began to cry and cry until her dad came home. He calmed her down and gave her chocolate. She felt like an adult again. She happily ate her chocolate with a smile.

Food Sale. Jan's mother was out sick and couldn't make her breakfast. Jan decided to go to the store and buy her mother food. Jan left the store with her mother's favorite brand of cereal. The store was out of that brand's cereal. Jan's mother was happy to get some cereal for the day.

off the beach. Lenny decided he wanted to take a swim in the ocean. He didn't have a bathing suit though. He decided to wear a t-shirt. The water was still chilly. Lenny was surprised at how nice it felt to swim naked.

Loud Music. The noise from the party was too loud. Sam's parents brought him to a quiet area. Sam was able to sleep a bit. It wasn't long before he woke up and it was loud again. Sam had to turn it down again.
No Knife. I got home from work. I noticed there was no knife in the kitchen. I decided to get a knife. I found a nice old one I wanted. I went to the kitchen and cut up some veggies.
Lexie brings breakfast. Lexie wanted to eat breakfast. She called the diner across the street to order. Lexie ordered an omelette. Lexie ate the breakfast. Lexie was full.

Vegetables. Tom bought a new garden. Tom realized that he was missing a lot of vegetables. He made a list of what vegetables he would like to grow. He grew his list and stocked up. Tom planted his vegetables and had a great time.

Grocery store. Anna went to the grocery store. She bought a gallon of milk and a dozen eggs. When she got home, she began to prepare her own food. When it was time to eat, she got all the food ready. She enjoyed the day.

Store Clerk. Kara was a new clerk at a grocery store. She was nervous because she had no experience handling customers. She watched a customer struggle to get a snack from the cooler. After a few tries, Kara managed to find the snack and hand it to him. The customer thanked her profusely for saving his snack.

Revenge. I was the bully for many years. One day I was called into the principal's office. The principal explained to me that I was suspended. I thought about what I would do to revenge. Since I was in school, I decided to kill the other kid and get away with it.

The Book Fee. Jared was reading in his car. He noticed that he was reading on the edge of a book. As Jared was driving, the book fell onto the ground. He was charged a small fee. Jared was upset about the fee.

Baseball Fever. Bob had always wanted to play baseball. He did not have any friends who were good enough to play. His friends told him he would have to ask his parents. Bob's parents had never played baseball. Bob was disappointed but made up for lost time.

Climbing. My nephew and I went to a rock climbing competition. We were very nervous and thought we wouldn't do well. I went first and I almost fell down on the first climb. I started freaking out and I fell over and started crying. When I regained my composure I climbed the rest of the routes.
A sad day. Tiffany and John went to the park. They had a blast playing in the sandbox. When they were finished they went home. It was a very sad day. They talked to their parents about the day.

Camping. Mike and his friends decided to go camping. He and his friends decided to get into the woods. They started walking through the woods. They eventually made it to the campsite. They spent the night there.
New Running Shoes. Ken ran all of the time. His running shoes were getting worn. Ken went to the running store. He was able to buy a new pair. Ken was glad to have new running shoes.

Reuniting. Tina was on a long plane ride. All the sudden she noticed her bags moving. They were all scattered all over the plane! The passengers had a hard time finding them. Luckily Tina had her passport in her bag.
Owner. Tom had a new job. His job required him to buy new shoes. Tom searched online for the best deals. Tom found a pair of shoes on sale for $90. Tom bought the shoes and now is a better shopper.

Tech Troubles. Jenny was having trouble with her computer. She called tech support and it took them an hour to figure out. Finally she called in a repairman. After an hour, he fixed her computer and fixed the issue. Jenny was happy her problem was resolved.
Salad. Linda was invited to a party. She made herself a salad. At the party, she was served fish. The fish was not what she expected. Linda was very disappointed.

Math Mastery. Tom was terrible at math. He would always come up short. His friends told him that he should try hard to become good. He practiced hard and took some advanced math courses. Tom now is an excellent math student.
Softball. My son played softball last summer. He started playing in September. Last week he broke his arm playing. He missed two weeks of play. Now I have to get my son to rehab.

Karen's Trip. Karen decided to take a vacation to a nearby island. She packed a backpack with supplies and packed her tent. While on the island, Karen took a wrong turn. She lost her compass. She ended up getting lost and lost her food and gear!
Ants. Kim's kids played with the trash. The trash was full of ants. Kim got ants in her house. Her kids went to the store to buy ant traps. The traps worked and the kids were no longer infected.
Louis Breaks Down. Louis was driving down the road. Suddenly he heard a loud bang. He tried to look back but couldn't see anything. He had to pull over to the side of the road. His car was totaled.

Cream. Kelsi wanted a new lip gloss. She finally found the perfect color to purchase. She picked out a bright green color. When she got it she loved it. Now she makes sure she always has a bright color.

Quentin Cleans House. Quentin notices that his house is becoming messy. He decides to clean it himself. He gets the tools and starts cleaning. Finally he finishes. Quentin feels happy that he cleaned up his house.

Fighting Neighbors. Tom wanted to teach his children to fight. He told them it was their only chance to fight. He would beat them until they cried. But then they got better and started talking. Tom found it very educational.
Good Neighbors. I went to a nearby town. They had a carnival at night. The carnival had some good games. My friend played all day and I just wanted to go home. I just wanted to get home and sleep.

The Conference. Gavin was hosting a conference in the morning. There were a lot of people at the conference. Everyone talked about politics. After lunch, there was a lot of discussion about what to do about climate change. Gavin had a great time at the conference.

Janice's First Day. Janice was starting a new job. She was very nervous about meeting the co workers. But after an hour she was making friends. It took her a long time to make new friends, but she made it. Janice was happy with her first day at her new job.

Hungry. John woke up to the sound of his mother knocking on the door. It was his mother saying that she was hungry. John walked to the kitchen to find a snack. John found a sandwich, a cookie and a fruit. He ate all three of them before his mother got home.

Pizza Pie. Sam's daughter was excited to bake a pizza. They were going to bake it together. Sam was upset because he was the only one not getting to help. Sam gave his daughter a piece of pie. She smiled and smiled and said thanks.

Closer Desk. Tom's desk was uncomfortable. It was made of cardboard and foam. He needed a much better looking desk. He bought one from a company that offered custom desk solutions. The desk arrived in a couple of days and Tom loved it.

Work. Tom was a truck driver. He was doing a lot of work to make a bit extra cash. He kept putting it off because he was scared it would be a waste. One day, he was offered a free ride on a train. Now Tom drives an express train from the East Coast to the West Coast every day!

Leg Press. I decided to do a leg press. I didn't go very hard on it. I used a heavy weight and was sore for days. I figured out I should do less work on leg presses. Now I do one set of five leg presses.

Lactose. Tom always had a soft drink in his coffee. One day he decided to cut it down to 1/4 the regular size. He didn't like the taste of regular so he drank it. The next morning he felt really sick. It turned out the milk had made him lactose intolerant.
Animal safari fun. My family took a trip to Africa for our vacation. We went on a safari. We were on an elephant named Mufasa. We saw lions, zebras, and hyenas. The African savannah is beautiful.

Oven shopping. Remy wanted to buy some baking supplies for his upcoming oven. He went to the supermarket but couldn't decide what to buy. So, he asked his mother to suggest things to him. She also decided to take him to the local store and pick things up. Remy went to the store and bought many different things that were needed.

Door Handle Disaster!. John was doing the dishes. He put on the handle and door handle to put in the dishwasher. But he forgot to put the handle in the door of the dishwasher. When he tried to pull the handle he heard a loud clunking noise. John's door handle broke off the bottom as he was pulling it out.
My niece. My niece was very ill. I took her to the hospital. She recovered quickly. After a few days I had to go to work. I couldn't wait to get back home to see my niece.

Cancer. Kia went to her doctor for some routine check ups. Her doctor said she had cancer, but she was only worried for a few months. She worried about it until the day came that she found out. A huge tumor had grown up to the size of a baseball. Kia was terrified and never wanted to have another check up.

Baby. The couple was expecting their first child. They went to the doctor to have the baby tested. The baby's father had to go home early to take care of his baby. When he returned, the doctor said the baby was healthy. The couple was elated with news of the good news.
Transit Photos. Tom was driving. He noticed a transit vehicle in his lane. He got out to take a better look. The car's window was open. Tom drove off.

New Leg. Tyson had always been very skinny. His doctor said he needed to have a surgery to correct his problem. Tyson and his doctor took a long time looking at different options. Finally they decided on laser surgery. Tyson was able to lose a lot of weight.

Hepatitis A outbreak. Samantha was recently infected with the Hepatitis A virus. The symptoms did not get much better. She went to a doctor who prescribed her some medicine. Her liver began to detoxify the virus. The symptoms gradually resolved themselves.

Robbery. John was walking to work one morning when he noticed something. The security guard at the store was holding a gun to his neck! The guard told John that he didn't have enough money to get out. John told him to give him some money and then he would let him go. John then walked back to work after giving the guard the money.

Hack. A man went into a bar and drank and gambled all day. At night, he was approached by a man claiming to be a security guard. The guard made the man watch the security cameras. The man found a woman and took her money. The man kept the woman and the woman gave him his money back.

The Heat. The air quality in Mike's house was bad. He decided to run hot water through his entire house. This helped a lot and his health improved as a result. Mike decided to be more conscious in the future. He decided to take extra care when it came to air quality.

Cereal and Milk. John was really hungry. John decided to go to the store and get some cereal. John decided to get some milk. John realized he forgot his milk when he got home. John made sure to get milk and cereal before he went out again.

Old shirt. Jim bought an old shirt. He decided to wash the shirt and put it away. The shirt didn't fit right after he washed it. He had to return it and buy a new one. Now the old shirt has to stay in the closet.
Tantrum. Tom bought a new puppy. He had to train him. He was very hard on him. Soon, he started to bark and his owners freaked out. They had to put him down.

Gymnastics. Alicia wanted to learn to do gymnastics. She was afraid her peers wouldn't like her, but they loved it. Then they decided to have an all-girls gymnastics team. They all had so much fun that they were able to practice all summer. Alicia ended up having the best time of her life!

Mike's Dream. Mike loved to watch football. He would play the game as often as he could. Mike had a big crush on a girl from the local college. The two decided to become friends. Mike's dream came true and they were together all the time.
school id. Sheila is starting a new school. Sheila needs a new id. She calls her school. They give her an old one. Sheila is happy she has a new ID.
Float Plane. Tom loved to float plane. He invited all his friends. His friends had a blast. Tom was happy he had something to do. He was happy it was over.

Jane Moves Out. Jane was not happy at her job. She didn't like to sit around in her office. One day, a friend asked if she would like to work from home. Jane was very excited to have someone to work from home with. She got a part time job at home so she could work from home.

Visiting. A friend of mine visited me this weekend. She was in town and wanted to see the river. I asked her if I could take her to a local restaurant. She agreed. I enjoyed my time with her and she is looking forward to my next visit.
Old Friends. Fred was at a bar. And he met his friend there. He brought his dog out with him. They were at the bar for a couple hours. They got along well.

The Pork Dinner. Nancy had forgotten to make dinner for her son. She decided to order her son out to eat. She picked a restaurant and her son got his food. At the restaurant they were served a delicious meal. When they got home Nancy was proud of how the meal was.
John burns the biscuits. John was making biscuits. He put the biscuits in a pan. Then he started to eat one. His hands got all burnt. John had to get his hands burned.

Scrapbooking. I started a photo album of my trips. I have been gathering photos for about five years now. I took the photos into an art gallery in NYC. The gallery owners told me they were selling prints. I sold several of the photos for more than I bought them for.

Facetime. Gina's mom was worried that her brother was trying to call her. His mother had heard that he was getting into a fight with a boy. Gina didn't really care about the boy at all. She tried to hide her frustration from her mother. She had tried to sneak out of the room and go to her room.

Stuffed Animal. Sam took a stuffed animal to a sleepover. The parents didn't notice that the animal was missing. The stuffed animal was missing until he asked the parents. They found the stuffed animal on the floor. The parents punished Sam for not knowing about the stuffed animal.

The Weird Deer. The other day I noticed something in my front yard. It was a weird deer. It looked at me and then began to walk away. My dog then chased it down and finally killed it. I hope I get home before the deer gets away.

Ventilation. My family was concerned that we were not getting enough fresh air. My mother suggested we get an air conditioner. We looked online to see what was available. We were able to purchase one at a local store. Now our home air conditioner is a big improvement.
Hair. Kelsey wanted to get a haircut. She couldn't afford it though. She went to a barbershop instead. The barber gave her a terrible haircut. Kelsey decided not to get a haircut again.

A Job At 14. Sally went to work at the age of 14 and hated her job. She hated everything about it. Her boss would not let her have breaks. She had to stand up everyday. She decided to quit after her break came.
Spaghetti. Lucy was eating spaghetti. She started to get sick. Lucy's stomach hurt and she was sick. She called her mother. Her mother made her get medicine.

Gravy Boat. The family was cooking dinner. They loaded up the boat and headed out. The boy in the back made a horrible noise. He jumped into the water and everyone laughed. They told him to jump back out and enjoy the boat.

Wetting the Bed. Tommy woke up to a huge thud. It woke him up in the middle of the night. He couldn't go back to sleep and got out of bed. He started to cry and scream for his mom to help him. When his mom didn't come out of the room in time, Tommy fell asleep.

Interview with Strange Man. One day Tim met a man outside his house. He told him how he was writing a song. Tim went to the club with him and they both got drinks. Tim was nervous because he didn't know the man. But after a few drinks the man turned out to be the lead singer.

The Jack O'Lantern. Ava was at home one night and heard a noise. Her son was turning a large jolly lantern into a lantern. Ava turned her head and saw that the lantern was just a lighted candle. Ava tried not to laugh, but she did when the jack o' lantern lit up. Her son had turned the lantern into a jack o' lantern to keep his mom warm!

Tea Time. Mia had an intense date coming up. She was really nervous but knew she had to be calm. Her friend convinced her to take her time with it. She picked her perfect date and waited for it. When it was time to meet Mia, she felt like a million bucks!

Loan Shark. Joey and his family went to the beach in the summer. They were playing around when they spotted something big. The shark had gotten a hold of their beach towel! Joey and his family quickly ran to tell their parents. The shark wasn't harmed in the least.
A Flat Tire. Cathy was driving down the road. She noticed her tire had no air in it. She pulled over. She took out her spare tire and changed it. Luckily it worked and she was able to keep driving.
Teacher. Timmy wanted to be a teacher. He was bad at math. He wanted to learn how to improve. So he took a math class. His teacher was so proud of him, she gave him a diploma.
Skiing Black. Kim was visiting the ski resort. She was on the ski lift at the top. She heard an old man yelling for help. She ran to him. He said he had been skiing all alone in the dark.

A Stolen Coat. My husband and I were walking through the park. It was a cool day and it began to rain. We got separated from the group and my husband walked home. A couple of minutes later the police found my coat and we were ok. We were relieved to find out that my coat wasn't stolen.

Acoustic Guitar. Mike really liked to play guitar. He got a new guitar and practiced all the time. Unfortunately he broke one string and it fell off. Mike decided to look for an acoustic guitar instead. He found a great one and practiced with it.

Dream to Reality. My grandfather came home from a long trip. When he came home my mom asked him to help paint her apartment. I got to work right away and finished it before she arrived. She was happy to see it was done. She gave me a little note to remember it by.

Helpful. Rita and her dog were walking together. She noticed her dog was looking sad. She offered to help the dog up. The dog was happy and they went on their way. Rita and her dog walked together for hours.
Making potato chips. Susie was making potato chips. She had no cheese on them. She used sour cream instead. They were gross. Susie decided to buy more cheese.

A New Friend. Timmy had been with his friend at the park all day. He ran into his friend after he returned home. His friend was upset because his phone had died. His friend offered him a ride to the store. Timmy was so happy and was glad he was now friendly again.

Money is no good. A man walked to the corner store. There was a woman working at the store and got a drink. The man bought the drink and went to the front of the store. The clerk asked the man for money. The man ignored the clerk and went back to work.

Skipping Lunch. I am a poor student and don't have much money. I always feel bad eating at lunch so I decided to skip lunch. However, it was very boring and I began to feel sad. My mother told me that she would make me dinner if I don't eat. I ate dinner and my mother made me dinner the next day.

Shaving. Tom was very frustrated with his stubble. He wanted to shave but he didn't want to hurt himself. He went to a local barbershop to learn how to do it. They were very helpful and gave him plenty of encouragement. Tom shaved the stubble right and was happy about it.

Irony. Tim was playing basketball with friends. Tim missed a shot and wound up being tackled. Tim had to get stitches on his knee. Tim was furious with himself for not noticing. Tim vowed never to play with the other kids again.

Wine Taster. Nancy loved wine. She loved to try new wines. She went to an event to taste one of her first wines. It was delicious and Nancy had never had that wine before. She ended up loving that wine even more.
Hill. The kids climbed a hill on a construction site. They climbed to the top and got high. They jumped off the top. They did it again, but had to come down. They never climbed again.
Beating the Rain Home. Mary was going to bat in the rain. She was going to go for the first pitch at a baseball game. Mary got the ball. It was on the grass. Mary hit it to center field.

Pizza party fun. Today was a great day to have a pizza party. All my friends were going to have pizza for dinner. My son decided to play a game with me. I had to win to play the game with my friends. I ended up winning all of the games!
The Lost Contacts. Lisa wore contacts. She loved wearing them. When she went to get something she had to put them away. Then, she could not find them. She went back to the pharmacy.

Messina. The kids went to the grocery store. While there, they bought some groceries. After they got home, they opened their cart. A big mess spilled out of their cart. The kids had to clean the mess up.

Match. Kate and her friend Erin played a game of trivia. Erin's answer was wrong and they had to look for a new one. The first two questions were wrong. But the final question wasn't. The next two questions were the right one, so they won the game!

New Appliances. The kitchen appliances were in disarray. I went to the store and bought new ones. My roommates and I bought the appliances together. The kitchen appliances worked great. We were happy about the money we saved.

Changing routine. Gina and her best friend were in their room. The girls were bored so they decided to play board games. They decided to switch their favorite board games. Gina and her friend were excited to play something new. They played a lot of board games.
New Puppy. Tim had a new puppy. Tim was nervous about him. He would be very spoiled. He took the puppy for a walk. He got used to his new dog.

Flooded Street. The river went to a flood stage. Drivers driving in the flooded street had to change lanes. Traffic backed up for miles. A man in the crowd tried to call a tow truck. A tow truck came to remove the car from the roadway.

Cardiac Arrest. Tom was on vacation in Florida. Tom was at a theme park one day. While on a ride Tom felt chest pains. Tom realized he had a heart attack. Tom was brought to the hospital where they treated him and kept him safe.
Fishing trip. My parents got a new fishing boat. They invited me to go fishing with them. I met up with my friend John. We had a lot of fun fishing. My parents were very proud.
Late getting home. Allie had been working late. She had been watching too much television. She wanted to get home for bed. Allie was running late so she went for a drive. Allie finally made it home.
The Garden. Cindy had a garden. It was a big garden. She put fresh flowers in it. Cindy planted a lot of vegetables. She was excited about her big garden.

Vegas. Today was the day of the big show. All of the athletes from the state of Utah went to the beach. We had a great time swimming and playing in the water. I took a long nap before heading back to camp. I was so tired and so glad I had made it to the beach.

Sunrise. I took my dog for a walk in the park. We found a spot for a nice shady spot. We took our time walking around the park. After a half hour I looked for the sun. It was not up and I had to wait for it to rise.

Basket. Gina had a basket of clothes to donate to Goodwill. She hadn't had a lot of clothes and it was her turn to get some. She decided on a bunch of shirts and sweaters. She left her stuff in the basket on her porch. She decided to wait till tomorrow morning to start collecting.
The Poker Game. Cory was very competitive. He had a poker game today. He was losing by twenty dollars. Suddenly, the crowd roared with approval. They all had won big!
Shopping with Bill. Bill's mother made him do his taxes. Bill did not understand how to do them. He asked his father for help. His father showed him how to do the taxes. Now Bill can do his taxes.
Tires. Tim got his new tires on. He drove his car around town. Tim hit a rock and hit the windshield. Tim had to get a patch put on the windshield. Tim went to get his car towed to a garage.
Lost ring. Linda wanted a ring. She could not find it. She looked all over. She finally found the ring in her dresser. Linda put the ring on.

Looking for a dog. I have been looking all over for a new pet. There are so many choices for them. So far I have decided on a beagle. I have heard they have great energy and are very playful. I am hoping to find a loving home for one of my new pets.

Older Child. Jim was having trouble with his daughter's school. The children were too noisy. Jim decided to teach the kids to quiet down. Jim worked with the kids for a few days to get them to behave. Jim was surprised at how much he had improved his child's behavior.
Cable Issues. John bought a new television. He took it home and set it up in his living room. A huge storm rolled through town. The cable did not work. John had to call in to cancel the television.
T-Bar. John was playing darts. He tried to get the most points but missed. His friend was so mad he called the cops. John's friend didn't care and beat him up. They had to pay for his damages.

Reynolds. Reynolds was a very smart boy who had the best grades in the class. Reynolds was excited when he went to his first science fair. He had an idea that made everyone smile. He built an amazing machine with his classmates that would spin a ball. He gave this amazing invention to his teacher and they loved it.
Eddie He crashes hard. Eddie was riding his bike. He began to pedal faster. Eddie continued to pedal faster. Eddie crashed into a car. Eddie broke his arm in the crash.

Sewing a Dress. Lisa loved fashion design. She loved it so much she did it for a living. Lisa wanted to be a designer and make a living out of it. One day, Lisa stumbled across her old sewing machine. Now she makes clothes by hand out of her old sewing machine.

Back pain. Marlene was very pregnant. She decided to skip a week so that she could go on vacation. Her baby ended up coming early so she could go. When Marlene went on vacation, she developed back pain. She had to stay home from that vacation.

Kristy's First Recital. Kristy's friends had arranged for her to perform for her first dance recital. Kristy wasn't sure how to dance. She practiced and practiced for months. Finally, Kristy was ready to perform. She was excited and nervous at the same time.
The Game. The girls were waiting outside the school on the playground. They were all ready to play. They were so excited. They played basketball for hours. They loved it.

Overweight Dog. John always had trouble getting in shape. He always ended up overworking himself. He started to think about joining a gym. He signed up and began working out. After a month of working out he saw his weight drop by ten pounds!
New screen protector. Dan had gotten a new screen protector. He was very excited about it. One day he dropped it on the floor. It shattered. Dan's warranty was ruined.
Ballet Class`. Barry was in a ballet class. He began dancing with his ballet partner. Suddenly, Barry fell off his back. He sprained his ankle. Barry was happy that he could get up and dance.

A roach. Joe had been sleeping with a roach in his bed. Joe awoke one morning and checked his bedroom. He saw a roach in his brother's shoes. Joe screamed at his brother who was so mad. Joe never let a roach sleep in his house again.

Facing the Fear. Diana was scared of heights. She had never seen so many birds. When she finally decided to go on a flight she was relieved. She stood at the top of the tower and gazed down at the clouds. It was beautiful and she wished she had never been afraid.
Angry Dog. Tim was sleeping. Suddenly he heard a loud noise. His dog had bolted into the house. Tim chased him down the street. It was the barking neighbor's dog who had been barking all night.

First Day of School. Jake just turned one year old. His dad told him about his first day of school. Jake was not scared of school and had a great first day. After Jake came home, he was excited and told his parents. They made plans to go to his first day of school the next day.
Ana Eats Cereal. Ana has been trying to eat a healthy breakfast. She decides to make a bowl of cereal. She eats a big bowl. She is very full! Ana is happy she can eat cereal!
The Look. The girl was wearing a purple skirt. She went outside to paint her nails. She put on a pair of purple sneakers. A neighbor saw her do it. He asked her if she needed help painting her nails.
Puppies. The woman bought a puppy. She took it to the shelter. They gave it to her so she could get to know it. They put her name on the tag. Her pet got adopted.
Gift. The woman gave the gift. The man received the gift. He took the gift home. He opened it. It was a video game system.

Beatles. Tom loved music from the 60's. He would often listen to them at the bus stop. He would then walk to school. Tom didn't listen to the music too much but loved it nonetheless. He would listen to it as he walked to school every day.

Brockton Rox. Brockton Rox were the best team in baseball. They beat Boston Red Sox in the championship series. The Red Sox had a lot of money. The Rox spent a lot of it on players. They didn't win the title but it was enough to be in the playoffs.

Death Scare. I was out jogging one day. Suddenly, I heard some noises and became scared. I quickly ran back inside, and called a friend. Then, I went inside and called my parents. Finally, I went to sleep that night.
First Day. I woke up on a new job yesterday. I got dressed and went to the office. It was very small. I sat at a computer and tried to use it. It was difficult to use.

A Good Student. A student from school was being bullied. He asked a teacher for help. The teacher reported the student to the principal. The principal suspended the student. The student received counseling.

Life Changes. Linda had always loved reading. She was reading a new book and really enjoyed the story. But the book took over her life. She read all the books in one year. Linda has become less and less interested in reading books.

Allergic Reaction. Sue found a jar of peanut butter on the kitchen table. She got a small bowl. Then she added powdered milk and a small amount of honey. She tried eating it but the peanut butter was too much for her. Sue threw the jar out.

Travel Spanish. The bus took them to a Spanish speaking neighborhood. A man at the bus stop helped them learn the language. He taught them some Spanish words as well. They were able to connect with the residents. They stayed a little while longer.

Energized. Jane was working out at the gym. She wanted to improve her bench press. She didn't want to do bench presses. She started working on her incline bench press. She ended up making a nice improvement.

Class. My friend and I decided to go to our first art class. At first we were very scared of how difficult it would be. When we arrived it was surprisingly easy. We could see the pieces we were making and did them very fast. Soon we had a very good picture of the art class.
Shampoo. I bought a bottle of shampoo. It smelled bad. I decided to try another shampoo. The new shampoo was more scented. I threw the old one away.
Caught. Tom was walking down the street. A car drove by and ran over him. They were unable to identify who it was. The insurance company was able to help out. Tom was awarded $2000 in compensation.

Headphones. Tom's friends bought him some headphones. He tried them on and they were too loud. He tried taking them off but they were too hot. He bought a case to protect them from the heat. He bought the headphones anyway and they were good.

Tough Negotiation. Cora's car stopped working a while back. She called her mechanic to make an appointment for tomorrow. The mechanic was more than willing to come and help. But she had to meet with his boss and negotiate some terms. After some intense bargaining, Cara agreed to a new service plan.
Jason Goes to Spain. Jason's wife has been sick. Jason has had a very long illness. He visits Spain to visit his wife. Jason's wife gets better. Jason is glad his wife is better.

Aw Nuts. Ava went on a camping trip with her friends. There were lots of loud, scary noises. Ava heard a crackling noise. When Ava checked it out, she saw a piece of wood had landed on her head. Ava cried.
Bulk. Tim wanted to buy a new book. He did not have a lot of money to spend. He decided to bulk buy the book. He got it in bulk, and read it over the next few days. Tim was happy with his new book.

Swimming Lessons. Trent was at the swimming pool. There were several other kids there. Trent tried to get in the pool but was unable to. He decided to go to the store. There, he bought a life jacket and swam out the pool.

Johnny plays basketball. Johnny wanted to play basketball with his friends. Johnny asked his dad if he could play. Johnny's dad said yes, he could play. Johnny went to his first game. Johnny had a good time playing basketball with his friends.

Making a painting. Mary wanted to paint her bedroom. She got a palette knife out of the garage. Then, she began cutting and painting. The painting was completed and she loved it. She hung it on her wall and admired it.

The Blanket. Anna was playing in her bedroom one night. She was tossing and turning in her room. Suddenly, she realized she had a stuffed animal blanket in her bedroom. Anna picked the blanket up to use it. Now Anna had a blanket for all of her pets!

Dottie Needs A Bath. Dottie was supposed to be playing with friends. She decided to play on the beach. She didn't clean her room very well. By the time her friends got there she was soaked. Dottie's parents took her to the beach to clean up.

Hunting. My brother and I were at the park with some friends. One of my friends said we were not allowed to hunt. My brother and I were arguing over this. We ended up having a big fight about it. When I returned home, I got a hunting license for my gun.

Health Care. The doctor said I needed glasses. I agreed, but he said I would need to pay for them. The glasses weren't cheap. I was hesitant to pay for them. But I realized that I could afford them, so I didn't mind.
Work Life. Tim was an actor. He did commercials. He quit his job. He went to live in another town. Tim was able to get a better job.

Hair. Gina's cousin came in for dinner. She was really excited to see her cousin. However, Gina's cousin did not like Gina's hair. She threw all Gina's hair in a trash bag. Gina was very upset that her cousin did not like her hair.
Amy's New Child. Amy wanted a child to keep her company. She finally met the right person. They began talking. Soon she was pregnant! Amy could not wait to name her new baby.
cooking class. I decided to try something new. I decided to take cooking classes. I got a good amount of exposure. I learned a lot. Now I'm very good.

Fusion. Tom was doing research for his English paper. He noticed that Chinese food was getting better and better. Tom decided to learn a new Chinese cuisine. He tried to make some fusion dishes. Tom was happy with the results of his learning.

First Haircut. Jill wanted a new style. She told her friends she wanted a haircut. She asked her best friend to help her get the cut. Her friend's friend was really nice. Jill had her haircut and was happy.

Train Trip. Tommy's father was a train conductor. Tommy's father was on a train one day. Tommy's father asked Tommy if he wanted to play football. Tommy thought about it and decided not to play. Tommy's father got upset when he found out.

The Investigation. Amber had seen her friend on the news talking about a burglary. She wanted to do some investigating. She called the local station and asked some questions. The reporter didn't think Amber was very qualified, though. Amber had to send her to a local community college to get a job.

Berry gets hurt. Berry is in the gym. Berry is getting pushed around by a bigger boy. He tries to go for a backflip and falls off. He gets up but loses balance. Berry sprains his ankle and is taken to the hospital.

Too tired to remember to pay. John came to the bank to get his money. He was waiting for the teller to give him his check. Suddenly his phone rang. He picked up the phone to answer it. The man said that his account was not at the bank.
stray. Tom was walking on the street. He saw a stray dog. He decided to pet it. It licked him and ran away. Tom regretted his decision.

Land Surprise. It had been years since I'd seen her alive. A stranger visited me in a hotel when I was in Los Angeles. The stranger asked if he could stay in my hotel room. I reluctantly agreed. The stranger showed up and we began to talk, with him acting weird.

The Trampoline. The kids were bored of sitting on the ground. They decided to build their own trampoline. They worked hard for 3 days on the swing set. The swing set was made out of scrap wood and corrugated metal. They took it outside and had a fun time on the trampoline.
Best job. Ethan was applying for a new job. He was a sales representative. He had done that before. He was excited about this. It turned out he got the job.

Dishes. Samantha was very hungry. She needed to make dinner for her family. She decided to make dinner out of the leftover food. She cooked the chicken, and veggies, but nothing else. When her family came to eat, they were satisfied with her dinner.

Cancer. I was diagnosed with early stage stage breast cancer in 2011. The treatment was unsuccessful and I had to stop work as a journalist. I was forced to move into a nursing home and was not allowed to leave. I finally got the news that I was cured. I will not let my illness prevent me from sharing my work again.

Fashionista in Training. Jessica is an aspiring fashionista. She's very self conscious about her fashion sense. She has been struggling to figure out where to begin. Her friends have told her that the first step is to be more confident. Jessica took this advice and began her fashion career.

Cat at the  window. I woke up one morning to a loud meow. I was curious as to why it was meowing. I went to see what it was, and found a little black cat. I let the cat out of the house, as it was a little cold in there. I didn't think it was a good idea to take it in, it was kind of scary.

The Dented Car. Tina had a brand new car. It had all new tires. The day before a small dent was found on the passenger side. Tina was very upset that her car was so dented. She called a company to help her with the repairs.
Large. The man set up a big party. He invited a lot of people. He invited a lot of food. He set up an indoor dance floor. The people loved it!

A new bike. Jane was excited to buy a bike. She found one in the mall. It was cheap, but it did not have bells or lights. Jane decided to save her money for something more durable. Jane bought a new bike with lights.

Phone Service. Our phones stopped working one day. We tried calling back several times. I called a number and they said that we were the last of our call. I called back a number and it was the first time I called them. I called back a number and it was a different person.
Bee. Lucy went to the garden. She wanted to plant some flowers. She looked in the field and saw a bee flying around. She jumped to grab it. The bee bit her on the leg.

Painting. The girl was learning how to paint. She was learning by watching a tutorial video. Then she tried her hand. It was rough but she made some progress. By the time she was done it was beautiful.

Shark Attack. Jim was swimming in the ocean. Suddenly, he felt a sharp pain. Jim thought it was just the tide. When he looked closer, he saw a huge shark swimming around. Jim panicked and swam far away.
Beach. Tim went to the beach. He was bored. He wandered off into the ocean. He swam for a while. He came back and was glad to be back home.

Life is No Beach. Bob hated the beach. The day was finally here and he was ready to leave. On his way out he bumped into a friend. Bob asked his friend to come back with him. The friend reluctantly agreed.

Loud Neighbors. We were having a hard time sleeping because of the neighbors. We tried moving out but they wouldn't let us. They kept us up all night. We called the police. Thankfully they didn't arrest any neighbors.

Found Change. Jane was a secretary who needed a change. She was on a tight budget and needed extra cash. She found some quarters and put them in her wallet. The next day she went to the store. She used the change to buy a sweater.
Out to lunch. I went to the buffet yesterday. It was very delicious. I did not get any food until 11. After that I ordered a ton of food. I enjoyed my lunch.
Songwriter. Lily liked to write songs. She wanted to be a professional songwriter. She wrote her first song in her bedroom. She wrote many more songs. Lily became a professional songwriter.

Defensive Driving. When I got my driver's license, I learned to drive defensively. I would slow down to see what other cars were doing, and move. It helped me learn to slow down, because I did not know how. My parents and teachers tried to get me to learn more, but it was too hard. I learned to drive, and made some friends in the process, too.

Just Order Pizza. Kelsi just had to order pizza. She went to a place online to order a pizza. But they charged her almost twice as much as her normal bill. Kelsi was upset, and wrote them a bad review. But luckily they decided to send her a free pizza.

Rock climbing fear. Ricardo was scared of rock climbing. His friends tried to take him up but it was hard. Finally Ricardo agreed to try it. He started at the top. His friends did it next and it was easy.

Accidentally. Sara was cleaning out the closet. Her cat jumped onto the top shelf when she tried to get it down. The cat fell onto the kitchen counter. It cut her hand pretty badly. Sara was in a lot of pain.
Robbed. I was walking home. A man came up to me and tried to rob me. I had some money in my pocket. He asked for a wallet. I gave him the money and he ran away.

Embarrassment at the Mall. Karen took her son to the mall. She waited in line for his picture. When her picture was taken, Karen felt ashamed. She had taken her son's picture at the last minute. Karen hurried home to change into a dress.
Bench. I put up a bench last week. It has a few good legs to it. The legs are to short for me. I bought a new pair of knee pads. I hope it doesn't rain any more.

Warm Milk. Tim had cold milk for breakfast. He needed to make hot milk too. Tim realized he didn't have a cup on the counter. He had to get a large cup from the fridge. Tim bought a gallon of warm milk.

Ghost. Tucker was having a very difficult time with his homework. He didn't think he could do it. Then he heard a sound that sounded like a ghost. It sounded like the teacher walking in the room. The ghost walked over to him and whispered in his ear.

New Chromebook Laptop. I went out and bought a new Chromebook laptop. I received the device in the mail the next day. I immediately started installing Windows on the device. Unfortunately, I had trouble running some programs. I had to go back to the store and return it.
The Good. Drake was very shy. He didn't like to make new friends. One day, he asked out a new girl at school. She agreed to meet him at a local bar. He went home that night with a good friend.
Tough burn. Tori had a bad burn on her knee. She went to the doctor. The doctor bandaged her burn. She went home and put lotion on it. The next day, she was in pain.

Objection. My mother's coworker and I were arguing about the meaning of a word. She said that it was an acronym for "don't kill yourself." I disagreed, saying that the word in fact was an adjective. She seemed confused, so I told her that she was mistaken. After we finished our argument, I called her supervisor, who fixed it.

Gym. Karen loved working out. She would go to the gym every day after work. When she was working out she began to develop muscle. She worked hard and was able to build muscle quickly. Karen now weighs a lot more than before she started working out.

First Female Football Player. Lydia joined the local high school football team as a cheerleader. She knew this was her dream. She did not want to be just a cheerleader. Lydia wanted to do her best in her role as a player. She was thrilled when she was asked to play on the team.

Bird Feeder. Tim was driving through a big city. He saw a sign that said bird feeder. Tim stopped his car and approached it. He picked up a bucket of food for the birds. He had fun feeding the birds that day.

New School. It was new school year and Sarah was nervous. She was a senior and was scared she would not make any friends. Her friends all met for coffee and she finally made some friends. At school everyone made a new friend and she felt better. At home she watched her friends make a new friend and was very happy.

Funny Girl. Rochelle found out she had cancer. She was sad, but determined to live life to the fullest. She kept her head up and fought every day. Eventually, she was told her cancer had been found. Now Rochelle lives a quiet life with her cancer in remission.

History. My friend invited me to go to the historical district of the city of New York. I looked online and saw several interesting sites. I decided to take him there and look around. At the historical district there were a lot of interesting sights. After that, we went to a museum and went back home.

Angela's Essay. Angela had a big essay due in one week. She knew she needed to write about her family's history. She sat down with a pen and paper. She started a short account of her family's history. She finished her essay a few days later!

The Phone Fiasco. Dan ordered a new phone from Walmart. When Dan received the phone, the screen didn't work. Dan had to return the phone. Dan didn't have money to buy a new phone. Dan decided to get the old phone instead.
Moused. We went to an arcade today. The game I played was mousing. It was like a mini-golf game. I lost every single round. I guess I will just keep practicing and playing until I win.

Karen's help. Karen asked her sister to help clean her house. Her sister agreed to help her clean her house. Karen decided to do a chore for her sister. Her sister agreed to do the chore with her. Karen ended up being very bored that day.

One Man Circus. The circus would bring the circus to town. Bill loved to see his favorite performer, Lenny. Bill took his wife Mary to see the circus. Bill saw Lenny do tricks, but the shows were too expensive. Bill's wife surprised him with a free trip to Disney World.

economics class. Jim was doing well in his economics class. He always won a prize for guessing the student's name. One day he guessed too many names and didn't win anything. He was so disappointed. He didn't study as hard as he had hoped.

sailing. I was taking my friend Sam on his first sailing trip. I was amazed at how fast they were sailing and how far out. At first we were just playing tag. Soon we were both racing around each other. By the end of the day I was very tired and glad we had come.

Trip to the Vet. I decided to take a trip to the vet for some shots. I had to drive three hours to get there and got all kinds of stuff. When I got there I saw a dog that needed to have a shot. I took him home and his owner was so happy. They took him for vet checkups every week!

Baking. My grandmother wanted to teach me how to bake cookies. She bought a box of dough and a box of sugar. I kneaded the dough and mixed it into a doughnut batter. I poured it into the oven and baked it for twenty minutes. They came out delicious and I was excited to learn how to bake.

Not Impressed. Tom was walking down the street. A girl asked him to date her. She didn't seem very interested in him at all. Tom ignored her and walked on. Tom's friends all laughed at him for being such a dick.

James and the Driving Test. James is very nervous about his driving test. He has never driven a manual car before. He makes several mistakes on his first try. The instructor takes James' test. James passes with flying colors.

The New Puppy. Alicia and her parents went to the pet store to buy a puppy. They were trying to decide which puppy to get. Alicia could not decide which one to get. She picked out a black and white puppy with pink spots. The parents took the puppy home that night.

Birthday Cake. Jim's girlfriend was having a birthday party. She told him she wanted a cake. Jim got creative and made his girlfriend a very special cake. She loved it and asked for another one. Jim's girlfriend is still a good friend and was thrilled with the cake.

Rebooting The Network. Tim was an internet salesman. Tim loved how well the network worked with one mistake. Tim made a mistake with one of his servers. Tim had a problem restoring his data from his servers. Tim made a mistake restoring his data for another customer.

Visiting Family. My mother and I went on a trip to Canada. We met up with my grandparents there. We also saw a bunch of cousins. They had some food there too. It was a great trip and I am going back soon.
Bottom of the sea. We went fishing by the ocean. We had a great time on this trip. We got out of the boat and the fish were biting. We decided to split the catch. I caught a massive fish.

Chef Tasha. Tasha had always wanted to become a chef. She went to culinary school but wasn't very good. Finally she went back to school for a masters degree. Tasha got a job at a fancy restaurant. Now she is a world famous chef.

Hamster. My hamster loves to eat rocks. Last night, we found a huge piece of granite. He threw up on my pillow! My wife called the exterminator to get the rock out. Now he sleeps with a blanket on the floor.
Allergic. Jim had a bad reaction to a drug. He told the doctor. The doctor said he should try a different drug. Jim took the new drug. Jim was allergic to it and did not get better.
Doll. My daughter was getting ready for school. I took her out to play. I showed her a cool toy. My daughter played for several hours. She got a lot of candy.
Getting Fat. Tim was a runner. His girlfriend noticed he didn't exercise. Tim's girlfriend started to get upset. Tim told her about all his workouts. His girlfriend started to lose weight too.

Nature. Bill has always been afraid of nature. One day Bill finally decided to go outside. He was scared to fall from a cliff and be eaten by wolves. Bill made it outside and was not eaten. Bill will never forget the fear of nature.
The Big Storm. It had been storming all day. It was pouring rain. Suddenly the wind picked up. It knocked out power. The storm was horrible and we were all wet!

Haunted?. Jenny was at her grandparents house for a sleepover. She thought it was just a normal night out. When her grandma came out she realized it wasn't. She got scared and cried, and her grandma comforted her. Jenny never went to that house again.

The Ski Trip. Caleb wanted to go to the mountains to ski. His friends agreed to go too. They hiked and hiked up a mountain to Caleb's cabin. Then, they played games and watched movies. They had an amazing time!
Muffler. Bob was an avid motorcyclist. He had a very old and large motorcycle. Bob wanted to keep his bike clean. He bought a muffler for his old bike. Bob's new bike had a very clean muffler.

Class. My class was having a picnic. I was sad because I had a crush on the girl next to me. Then, the teacher mentioned that he had been asked to sit next to her. I sat down and pretended to think about it. Finally, she walked away.

Ears Pierced for the First Time. Alex was excited to be learning about ear piercing. She put her earrings in and was amazed by how beautiful they looked. She began to notice some pain in her ears, but did not understand. A few months later, her ears started bleeding. Alex realized she had pierced too much.

mermaid. Anna was working on a movie set when a mermaid appeared. She was in charge of directing the crew. She tried to show the mermaid in all her glory. But the mermaid wasn't having any of it. She bit her hand and threw it on the floor.

Tomboy Ballerina. Jill wanted to be a tomboy ballerina when she grew up. Her parents took her to a ballerina audition. Jill was terrible, but they still let her take part. A few weeks later, they took her to the next audition. Now Jill's very good at ballerina and is very popular.
Garbage Man. Tom was an old man. He was very lonely. He wanted to get some company. He started a business cleaning up garbage. Tom now has lots of company.
Poor artist. Tom was an artist. His art was terrible. The clients wanted him to improve his work. He tried to draw better. Unfortunately he couldn't.

Roasting Session. I was working at the farmer's market. I had an interview with the lead of my company. I was so excited I forgot to pack my lunch. When I arrived at the interview, my lunch was gone. I realized I forgot my lunch while I was out of town.
Flat. Bill loved watching TV. He loved that they had many different shows. One day Bill saw that he had all the latest shows. Bill was so excited. He watched every single one.

His Feet. Gabe had a new pair of sandals that he was not very happy with. His feet were so big and wide that his foot was stuck in the top. The bottom sole had a hole that was bigger than Gabe's foot. The sandal came off, and Gabe walked out in embarrassment. He walked home, feeling dejected.

The last chance. Bobby was playing in his backyard. There was a ball in the backyard. He ran around until he found the ball. Then, Bobby went back outside to play. However, there was nothing left in the yard.

Horse Races. My friend is a professional race horse trainer. He loves the horse races and makes a lot of money from them. He and his wife live in the mountains. The horse races have very steep hills. My friend's wife has a bad back and would not be able to run in the races.
Homework. Bob needed help writing an essay. So he sent his daughter to the library. She finished the essay quickly. But she got an F on it. Bob was disappointed in his daughter.

Fruit salad making. Lizzie loved fruit salad. However her friend Sally hated fruit salad. Lizzie wanted to give her friend fruit salad. However Sally did not want to give Lizzie fruit salad. So instead Lizzie made her own fruit salad.
Cake. Caroline was baking a cake. She put the cake in the oven. She then smelled something burning. The cake was not coming out right. She had burned her cake.

The Lipstick. Jane wanted to be a fashion designer. She went to the salon to get a manicure. While there, she discovered a new color. Jane had never seen a color like it. She wore it everywhere and loved it.
