Fred. I was walking through the city one day when I saw a small dog with a collar on it. I approached the dog and pet it, which made the dog stand up. The owner of the dog was very angry at me for doing this. The owner told me I could not leave until I gave the dog back its collar. When I took the dog back home I was very happy.

Figuring out the story. Tom wanted to write a book about aliens. The aliens were very interesting. They seemed very hostile and wanted to kill all life. They seemed to want to take over the world. Tom made his story about that.

The Wedding Announcement. Marge and her husband were planning a big party. They bought invitations and printed out their invitations. Then, they ordered flowers and cake. Then, they decorated the house. After the guests arrived, they celebrated.

Billburg. One morning, I drove over to Billburg, a village in rural Pennsylvania. I was amazed at the quaint little houses, many with barns. I went into the nearest small business, where they made a wreath. They made me a very special wreath to sell to my local church. I will never forget the day that I became a farmer.
A few drinks. I wanted to celebrate my birthday. I decided to have some drinks. I ordered a few beers and a few sodas. Afterwards, I felt much better. I wanted to drink every day.
Snow Storm. Tom hated winter. He decided to go out. He tried to sleep in the snow. Unfortunately it snowed. Tom had to stay awake in the morning.

Hypnotism. Mimi was being bullied in school by a boy named John. John decided to use a trick to get Mimi to fall asleep. John began to whisper to Mimi while she slept. Mimi fell asleep after several minutes. John was then forced to sleep on the floor.

Hail Storm. One day during a thunderstorm James saw hail that was large. When he opened the umbrella, he realized it was too small. He went back outside to change his umbrella. In the middle of the storm, the thunderstorm stopped and James was happy. His umbrella had stopped the hail, so James went inside.
New Name. Jim hated his name. He had it for years. Finally he decided to change it. He went to the doctor and they gave him a name change. Jim was very happy with the new name.

Last Letter. Jill sent her husband an email expressing her love. Her husband replied back. He told her that he wasn't happy. He said that his dog stole his money. Jill realized that she loved him more than anything.
Smash. Bob and I were playing Smash Bros. Bob won the first two games. I won the third game. Bob complained. I got him banned.

Moving Out of State. My girlfriend wanted to move to the other side of the country. I decided that was a bad idea. I went back to my parent's house and we both cried. I decided I would try to move to a new area instead. Luckily my girlfriend came back to me in a week.

Torn Shorts. Bob was running in the park. He slipped on a rock and got his shorts torn. Bob tried to fix the shorts himself but they were too old. His mom came to fix them. Bob decided that he would never run in the park without pants again.
Tony Grills a Fish. Tony loved to eat fish. He was invited to a fish fry at his local restaurant. Tony grills a big juicy fish. Tony eats all of the food he grills. Tony is happy to have a good time.
Sam has a fall. Sam was an athletic kid. He loved to play sports. One day he hurt himself. His family took him to the doctor. The doctor told him to rest for a week.
Alarm. I got home after an important meeting. My alarm went off. I was frantic. I went to the kitchen to check it out. I finally realized the batteries in the alarm were dead.
Food Poisoning. Tim ate at a diner. He complained of food poisoning. He called the hospital. They sent a tech there. Tim vomited all night.

Bowling Champion. Seth was the bowling champ at the school. He went to the state championships. Seth lost to two other boys. Seth went to the state tournament the next week. Seth won and now he's bowling for the national championships.
Quiz. Joe was failing all of his classes. He had to take a final quiz. He tried very hard to finish it. He finally finished it. The next week he got his grades back and he got a great grade.

Check Again. Kate had a math test in one hour. She stayed up late to study for the test. She was really tired. She checked her homework and it was still there. She decided to leave early for the test instead.

The Cubbies. Gina went to her room. She was looking for something to hang up her posters on. She pulled out a giant stack of cardboard boxes. She used the cardboard boxes to hang all her posters. Gina was very proud of the neat display she had.

Good enough. Derek got his car inspected in his driveway. The mechanic said it was in excellent condition. He told Derek that he couldn't afford a down payment. Derek thought hard about it. He decided to make it his monthly payment.

Laundry Cash. I was running a grocery business for a living. I needed cash to fund my expenses. I decided to sell used clothes to pay bills. The business ran well for a few months. However, my business was shut down because of my poor business practices.
Piano lessons. I needed some piano lessons. I took lessons at home. They were very good. I wanted to go to the professional studios. Eventually I made it to the studio to practice.

Hair Loss. Amber started to feel horrible after an awful day. The doctor was unable to find anything wrong with her. He recommended she cut her hair as soon as possible. She was very reluctant at first. After a couple weeks she got it cut and was happy to look different.

The Fair. John went to the fair with his friends. His parents told him it was a waste of money. John thought it was a waste of money. His parents told him to go anyway. John went, and he ended up having fun!
Out of Deodorant. Cayla forgot her deodorant. She was wearing her work clothes. She smelled them on her leg. She looked everywhere in the office. She had used expired deodorant.
Lost and Found. I went to a convenience store. I found a dollar bill on the ground. I gave it to the cashier. The cashier thanked me. I returned the dollar bill to the cashier.

Uncertain about Lecture. Tom was preparing to give a lecture. He was not sure if he should start the presentation. Tom decided to start the presentation. The presentation was a success. Tom received a standing ovation.

Running in a race. Lucy needed to get a good workout. She looked online to find a running event. She found a new running event for a marathon. Lucy joined the race. Lucy got in shape and won the race.

Riding a Bike. Tim wanted to get more exercise. He decided to take a long bike ride. He was so bored on the bike ride that he fell. His face scraped and bled a lot. Tim decided not to ride a bike again.

Weight Sadness. Lorraine was feeling depressed. Her friends encouraged her to start a weight loss journey. Lorraine joined a weight loss club and lost 5 pounds in a month. Her friends cheered her on. Lorraine decided to join a weight loss club for herself.

Norma Cleans the Fish Tank. Norma is trying to catch more fish in her small pond. One day while cleaning the fish tank she notices some dead fish. She begins to suspect she may have caught a virus. Norma calls the number on the fish tank, and waits. She is so relieved when a lab tests confirm the presence of the virus.

Manicurist. I wanted to learn how to make manicures. My girlfriend thought it was great but she was a terrible manicurist. She taught me all about it and I got better at it. We went to the best manicurist in town. She gave me an A on my final attempt and I was glad!

Smoky Barbecuing. Jill got up at five to cook dinner for her family. At the same time, she got to work on her grill. She set up her meat and cheese on the grate. She walked around the backyard making a smoke trail. Jill's family looked on and admired her cooking.

Exam. Gabe was having a hard time in the chemistry class. The professor didn't like him and he wasn't popular. One day Gabe got bullied by the popular kid in class. He wasn't used to being the new kid and was a bit nervous. However, his friend helped him out and he ended up doing well.

The Windy Day. It had been raining very hard all day. Bob's school bus went by his house. A gust of wind knocked over his bus. Bob had to walk the rest of the way home. He called his mom to see how she was doing.

The Lightning. I had a thunderstorm yesterday. My daughter got stuck in a tree. I watched the tree take on large lightning bolts. I could see the lightning from a distance. The tree fell and my daughter got away.

Building a House. I bought a house. I found a house I liked in the neighborhood. I talked to the realtor and arranged a tour of the house. We drove to the house. I enjoyed the tour and bought a second house.
She Understands. The woman watched the boy's behavior. She saw that he was ignoring her. She began to approach him. He ignored her too. The woman decided to leave.
Too Drunk. Tom was going to his parents wedding. He drank too much alcohol. He felt very drunk. He passed out. Tom woke up two hours late.

Molly. Molly was in a very bad mood. She was very hungry and did not want to eat. Molly decided to go buy some chips and cheese. She was happy to eat and was hungry when she got home. Molly decided she would not make the same mistake again.
Bear. Tom went hiking in the mountains. He was out hiking and noticed a large black bear. Tom ran away. He called a hiker who helped him find his way out. Tom never went hiking that way again.

Cold Morning. Tom was sleeping in the cold. The wind outside was too much for him. The temperature started to drop. Tom started sweating profusely. He decided it was not worth it to stay up that late.

Cat Poop. Brianna heard a weird sound coming from her cat's litter box. She had never heard it before and she didn't know what it was. She got down on her knees and found what she thought was a lump. To her horror, she saw a cat poop in the box! Luckily, she was able to clean it up with an egg and a rag.
Mark Cooks Dinner. Mark is starving. He decides he needs to cook dinner. He sets up the oven. He begins cooking. He finishes cooking dinner.

A Fun Trip. Today I took my son to the amusement park. We were very excited to go on the roller coaster. The ride was so amazing, my son wanted to try it again. Once the ride started, we all fell asleep. We couldn't get back to sleep for two whole hours!

Johnny Runs a Marathon. Johnny decided he wanted to improve his endurance. Johnny bought a treadmill and ran for several miles every day. Eventually he ran a marathon. He beat his personal record by over 20 minutes! Johnny decided he had made a good choice.
The Sore Loser. Sam was trying to lose weight. He was in terrible shape. He went on a diet. He ended up losing 15 pounds. The next day he went to the casino.
The Cookies. Cindy is an avid baker. Her new business is selling cookies. Cindy had to go to the grocery store to buy ingredients. The cookies didn't sell well. She had to stop making them.
Helping Out. Kia worked at a clothing store. One of her friends had an idea. He wanted to sell her the clothes. Kia helped him out. They made a decent profit!

Baseball Throw. Jimmy was walking to school. He had a baseball glove in his hand. Jimmy decided to throw the baseball at a classmate. The baseball went far and bounced off the wall. The classmate laughed.

Hard Work Pays Off for Alexis. Alexis always wanted to get into the professional wrestling scene. She wanted to become a professional wrestler. Alexis trained and worked hard to become a professional wrestler. When Alexis became a professional wrestler, she became a big star. Alexis now has lots of fans and is able to go to shows all around.

Broken. Sue's car broke down on the highway. She called her friend to come pick her up. She was upset that her friend would not come help her. Her friend came to pick her up, and she got out of her car. Sue gave her friend a ride home.

Copy. The kids were supposed to copy the answers to a test. They decided to go the same book that the teacher was using. They thought it would be easier than a test book. The kids made a mistake. They got a zero on the test.

Martini. Meredith had a really hard day at work. She decided to go out and have a martini. She took a few and started feeling sick. When she went home, her stomach was in knots. She was glad to see she had eaten a full bottle.

Swept by the wind. The wind was blowing hard from the ocean. Kay and I were walking along the beach. Kay lost her balance and fell. Her arm hit the sand and broke her wrist. Kay was sad but we decided to continue walking.

Fred Collects Stamps. Fred is tired of being the only kid at his school who doesn't own a stamp. He decides he will buy a stamp as a special treat. He goes to the bank to purchase a stamp. He receives his stamp and sets off to get stamps. Fred has a great time on his stamp collecting adventure.

Canned Peas. Sam decided to make some chicken soup for dinner. He went to the store to buy some canned beans. Sam used half the amount of canned beans he planned to use. He was glad it was canned peas. Sam loved his chicken soup with canned peas!

The Bad Sitter. Ariel had to watch the toddler while her husband was away. One day, the child fell from the play structure. Ariel ran back to the house, crying and scared. She was unable to get the toddler back into his play spot. Ariel and her husband were no longer able to watch the toddler.

The Wet Paws. Cindy's dog ran around outside and got into a large puddle. Cindy tried to get the dog into the pool but it was too wet. She was horrified when her dog didn't come out. Instead, it dived into the puddle. The dog dived in and soaked her entire house!

Clowns. There was a circus going through town. My son was too excited to watch the show. I grabbed my son and brought him with me. After the show, we went back home. We could not stop laughing at clowns in the alley.

Pie Eating Contest. Anna entered her town's annual pie eating contest. She was very good at it. Anna won first place and a new car. She drove the car everywhere she went. Anna was so happy about her win she didn't want to stop.

A good fit. Tom always wanted to buy a house. Tom's realtor told him his measurements would be incorrect. Tom showed up to the home show and got a good look at the house. Tom liked the color and the overall look of the house. He got the offer he wanted and was very happy with the offer.

Running into old friends. Last week, I ran into a few old friends. I had a really great time at the carnival. While playing the games, I ran into two friends. We exchanged contact information, so I made plans to see each other again. It will be a fun, exciting new experience.
Red Sorghum. I was driving in my old truck. I decided to pull over for a while. As I got out, I smelled something foul. I noticed I was driving near red sorghum. I was amazed it was still green.

Don't Give Up. Dawn's boyfriend had a drinking problem. He was so drunk one day that he lost control of his car and wrecked it. Dawn decided to leave him after he crashed and was crying. She was going to call the cops and take him to the hospital. She knew that she had to let him stay in and drink.
beach. My family took a trip to the beach. We played in the water for a long time. The beach had lots of lifeguards. We saw a dolphin and some sharks too. We had fun.

Wedding. Diana had a big day coming up. She wanted to go to the wedding she wanted to attend. Her best friend was attending the wedding and asked to go with her. Diana was happy to finally have a friend who could go with her. When the day came Diana was so happy she couldn't wait to go.
The Bus Fight. Tim was in a bus. There were a lot of fights. One guy tried to pick a fight with a lady. The lady became very angry. The woman punched the guy in the face.

Time to cook dinner!. Sarah had a lot of chores to do. She decided to put them all on her plate at once. She walked across the room and grabbed each item one by one. After a couple of minutes, Sarah had finished cooking dinner. She was so hungry, she had to go and eat fast!

Sarah Flies On An Airplane. Sarah was bored on her flight. She decided to take a chance and sit in the back of the plane. She was scared to fly alone. The flight took off and Sarah was scared. She ended up flying on a plane and meeting her boyfriend.

New bag. I really needed a new bag to wear. So I went to Walmart and looked around for a few hours. Eventually I was able to find a great deal on a new bag. I decided to purchase it and went home to use it. When I put it on it was the best bag ever.

Cheap sale. Joe was having a great time at a garage sale. He bought an old tv and a few games. Then he put them in his closet. Joe was so proud of his new purchases. Unfortunately he didn't get a single sale!

Sparky. My dog Sparky was afraid of heights. One day we took him to the top of a mountain. He was very excited when we reached the top. However Sparky's fear had made him nervous. After we climbed back down he was no longer scared of heights.

Tarts. Lois and her friends were having a picnic. Lois had a lemon tart that she wanted to share with her friends. Her friends decided that they should each get one. Lois and her friends ate their lemon tart while the others watched. It was a great day for eating lemon tarts.

Losing religion. I had just joined a new religion. My friends and I went out with a few people on Sunday. We decided to try the new religion and practice for a month. On Tuesday I realized I needed to let go of my old religion. I was sad to be leaving the religion I had joined.

The Striker. Sandy was a great baseball player. She was also known for playing a tough hitting game. When Sandy's team won the title, they celebrated by firing fireworks. When they were done, Sandy was mad that she lost. Her teammates told her it was because she was too angry.

Browser. My parents always told me that computers are a waste of time. I never thought to follow their advice. I bought a personal computer in 1997. I installed all kinds of programs to improve my browsing. I loved my personal computer, and I bought two more.
The talk. Jan was talking to her boyfriend in class. He started yelling at her. She asked him why. He got really defensive. He apologized and said he wasn't upset.

Mommy's Sick For Now. My daughter's friend got very sick. He had to go to the doctor to be treated. My daughter came home. My daughter's friend came home. We watched television and talked about his sickness.

Wresting. I was in junior high school and had a crush on a girl. We were very close at the time and I wanted to ask her out. I never thought I would get the nerve to ask her out but I did. She was very flattered and gave me her number. I ended up asking her out and got the courage to ask her out.

Julie Gets a Trainer. Julie has always wanted to get into shape. She has tried working out alone but that has never worked. Julie decides to hire a personal trainer. The trainer helps Julie stay in shape for a long time. Julie is happy that she hired a trainer.

Arrows. Joe was a child who loved to play with his bow and arrow. Joe's mom took him to the archery range to shoot arrows. Joe could not figure out how to shoot the arrows. Joe asked for help from his dad. Joe's dad taught him to shoot arrows from a stand.
Carpet. Tommy had a big job. He had to clean the carpets. It was hard work. He finally finished. It looked great.

Kids trip to the mall. The kids were really looking forward to going to the mall today. Their mom took them to the mall for a few hours. The children were happy to spend time with the adults. At the end of the day they went home and told their mom. The kids are going to the mall tomorrow!

Bad Landlord. Sam needed to pay a few thousand dollars for a new apartment. His landlord had a bad reputation. Sam called several complaints, but none ever went anywhere. He went to his landlord to ask for help. They had to tell him it was too late for that.

Snacks. The boys would eat snacks at school. The boys would always bring their own. One day, they brought their own macaroni. The boys were sad that they didn't get to eat the macaroni. They had to go home empty-handed.

Card games. I love to play monopoly and blackjack. We play them in our house every week. I also love to play checkers. I am the best at both of those games! I hope I get to play poker as soon as I get my card.

Oscar's Onions. Oscar grew onions and put them in the garden every year. This year, he had not seen any onions. His wife told him there was no onions in the garden. Oscar took his wife to the store to get her onions. Oscar now has onions on every street corner.
Kick in the Shin. I was walking around the neighborhood. My friend suggested I take a left on his street. I turned the corner. I kicked him in the shin. He called me a faggot.
Burnt Pizza. My girlfriend and I were having a pizza party. We got the dough and toppings. I placed my order and waited. Then, my pizza came out. My girlfriend and I were sad that we couldn't eat it.

Comedy Show. Jim's favorite comedian was in town. They went to the comedian's house. They watched the comedian's routine. Jim and the comedian had a good time. They decided to do another show the following week.

Beer for Breakfast. Sam needed to get some fast food. He saw a place near by that was having a special. He ordered a burger and fries. He took a bite and sighed with relief. He was happy to find out they sold beer for breakfast.
Getting fit. I went to the gym today. I started working out with weights. I put on a good amount of weight. It made me feel really strong. I hope to continue working out.

Erin and the water bottle. Erin had to pee really badly. He decided to take a bottle of water with him. Erin drank the water while he was on the floor. The water helped him not to pee. Erin was happy to drink the water.

Malaysia. One day Anna was taking a cruise to Malaysia. On the ship, Anna met many beautiful locals. Then the boat left the port and Anna realized she was lost! Anna made a phone call and the boat continued on its way. Anna was happy she had learned so much about Malaysia.
Thunder. The thunder rumbled outside. The boy was scared and started to cry. The thunder rumbled again. The boy jumped for joy. The thunder was not scary anymore.

The cool rental. Kim was looking for something to do outside. She decided to rent a boat. The boat seemed to be a cool rental. But then she realized that it was not very big. Kim decided she would not rent a boat until she could get over it.

The Stuck Stroller. Sally had just picked up her 2 year old son from daycare. The child had fallen in a puddle. Sally called to her mom, worried about the child. The mother explained that the stroller was stuck on an incline. Sally was relieved, her son was safe and sound.

Break Up. Tim and Janie had been together for four years. They were married for a few years and planned to have children. Tim was having a hard time with money and couldn't afford child care. Janie told Tim they were breaking up. Tim felt betrayed and decided to move out.

Cabin. Mandy had to find a way to get from her job in New York City to California. She was in the market for a cabin. She shopped online and found a great one. She paid the deposit and had a cabin ready within 2 weeks. She loves the cabin and the company she works for.

Wedding. The couple had just got married. The groom was very shy. His friends encouraged him to walk down the aisle. He took a deep breath and asked the bride for her hand. She gave him one and he was so happy!

Rick's Day at the Waterpark. It was a beautiful day at the waterpark. Rick and his dad rode on the slide together. They were very close and had a great time. However, Rick fell off and scraped his knee. He had to get a band aid to stop the bleeding.

Vacation Time. The Smith family went on vacation every summer. They went to the beach, the mountains, and the ocean. The family was very spoiled by their vacations. One year, the Smith family went to a different country than last year. They all wished they hadn't gone.
Earrings. The woman put on earrings. She realized she needed to wash them. She took them off to the washroom. They were too big. She had to get another pair.
Pills. Tom was feeling bad. He didn't want to seek out a doctor. He had a good doctor. The doctor prescribed some pills. Tom took them for a while.

Clarence's Project. Clarence liked making projects for his classes. He wanted to make a video game that would allow students to play. He researched and studied on how to make a video game. He worked with the video game design software for months. The video game he made turned out to be a huge success.

Twin Feud. Lilly and Jim were identical twins. They loved each other. One day they began having a twin competition. They challenged each other to a game of chess. Each twin won and had fun playing with their sibling.

We're Gonna Need A Bigger... A small group gathered in a room. The moderator was giving them directions. The group grew quiet. Someone mentioned the size of the house they wanted. Everyone began to make their request.

Upgrade to first class. Jill needed to fly from Boston to New York on business. She had a connecting flight in first class. Jill was nervous about flying in first class. On the plane she felt relaxed and comfortable. Jill decided to upgrade to first class.

Learning to swim. Jake had never been swimming before. He wasn't sure he was able to swim well enough. He decided to ask his friends for advice. His friends told him that he should practice swimming everyday. Jake started swimming at his local pool everyday.

Hyacinth. Jill saw a hyacinth growing in her garden. She had never heard of it, and she was curious. She cut it and dug up the juicy stem. When she took the stem home, she put it in a vase. She was very happy that she had a hyacinth in her house.

No Swim in the Park. Kate went to the park for the first time with her family. The only place she could swim was in a small pool. They played Frisbee for awhile and then went to the park. Kate's father took her out to eat. Then they returned to the pool and swam.

Pickpocket. Jim went to his first car show. While there he saw a man trying to steal an expensive sports car. Jim ran after him. Jim caught the man and the car. Jim bought the man a nice new sports car.
New Pajamas. The girl decided to get new pajamas for school. She saw a pair she really liked. She put them on. They were too small for her. She tried to wear them to school anyways.

Magnet. Erik wanted to learn to use magnets. His brother didn't know how to use one either. He helped his brother learn how to use one. His brother made the magnet disappear. Erik was glad that he learned how to use a magnet.

Long-Winded. Kate had a long distance relationship. She often worried about her boyfriend not taking her. One day, Kate realized he was not taking her at all. She felt depressed about it. She decided to end the relationship.

Bar Fight. Billy loved to get drunk. He went to the bar one night and asked to have some drinks. Billy started drinking alcohol and started fighting with a stranger. Billy kicked the stranger in the head. Billy was arrested and sent to jail.

Buying a suit. Bill bought a new suit for his first day of college. Bill's dad made him get a suit. Bill realized he would like his new suit. Bill made sure to wear his new suit to class the next day. Bill's new suit became the best seller in his school's wardrobe.
The Dam. The family drove through a mud puddle. They ran into a ditch. The kid fell in the ditch. His mom took him to the doctor. He was very scared.

Clashing Color. Tom was going to a concert. It was a big outdoor concert. He got drunk at the concert. When it was time to leave, he noticed people were red. He tried to look at them more carefully and realized it was because he was drunk.

Charity. Sandy was trying to make ends meet. She went to the store to buy some groceries. She had to decide between buying food or clothing. Sandy decided to buy the clothing. The donation helped her to buy food and clothes.

Tooth Fairy. Jenna hated getting her teeth brushed. Her mother would tell her it was the most fun thing. When her father passed away, her mother was sad. Jenna knew that wasn't true. She went to her bathroom to brush her teeth.

Christmas. It was time for her daughter to pick out her present for Christmas. She knew her daughter would pick out something nice. Christmas was coming up fast. Jill couldn't wait to see what her daughter picked. Then she realized that her daughter didn't even want to pick out a gift.

The Acorn. Sue was visiting her grandfather's farm in Ohio. He had an old acorn on his farm. It had a hole in the top and was very hard. Sue's grandpa decided to teach her how to carve it. He let her carve it for hours, and made her feel happy.

Old book. I was at the library and needed to read something. I looked through the old books until I found an interesting one. I decided to read it. I was amazed by how good it was. I went home and read it several times.

Kenny loses the girl. Kenny went out with his friends to hang out. Kenny was drinking with some girls and started flirting. Kenny lost control over his drink. Kenny lost control and started to act crazy. Kenny had to go home because he was so drunk.

When A Family Visit Isn't. Trent and Tina were on a family vacation. They decided to go to Disney. Tina was excited. However she didn't know what to expect. Tina's trip to Disney was not as fun as expected.
Open relationship. Tom wanted to try a relationship. He went to talk to some women. After a while he got a girlfriend. His girlfriend was upset. Tom apologized to his girlfriend for asking her out.

Foggy. Tina went to see the new Batman movie. While she waited for her seat to be filled, her parents talked to her. They said they didn't like the movie. They tried to get her to leave. But Tina refused, because she loves Batman.

Free Drinks. Jim was out at the bar one night. He saw that many people were drinking free drinks. He decided to buy a few bottles for himself. He went home that night to drink them all. Jim was happy that he did not have to pay a cover charge for drinks.

A Man and His Dog. Tom was riding his bike home from work. His dog got loose and ran out of the neighborhood. Tom was worried that he was going to lose his life. He tried to call his friend to ask if they could come to help. Luckily his friend came and saved him.

Disney World. I took my kids to Disney World last week. We were going for the entire week. We took the bus to Orlando and stayed at a hotel for the whole time. I took them out to some restaurants and played in the water. We really enjoyed the week.

Choices. Kate was in a car accident last year. Her accident was so bad that she had to be hospitalized for six weeks. Kate's insurance would not cover it. However, Kate decided to get a new car. Now, Kate's insurance covers the cost of a new car.
Bob's Business. Bob started his own business. He spent months building his business and making money. His business did really well. He did a nice job for his clients. Bob was happy he did a good job.

The Tiger and the Goat. My daughter loves animals. She had just learned how to ride a goat. She was learning how to throw it too. She threw it at a tiger! The goat fell, but the tiger jumped up and took it away!
Planking. Mike is very lazy. He never planks. He only plays kickball. He tried to learn how to plank the other day. Unfortunately he ended up breaking his leg.

New Place. I bought a new house last week. I couldn't believe it when I got it. When I drove it home I couldn't believe it. I had never been so happy in my entire life. I decided to buy a bunch of houses.
Peas. I was trying to make a fruit salad. I used my hands to help. But then I realized I used too much. So I bought all of the pea shoots. Now I have a new fruit salad.

The Yellow Gauntlets. The yellow gauntlets were worn on the left hand. They were a symbol of the family. They were a great way to show off. One day, the grandmother stole the gauntlets. She was sent to jail.
Doggy Love. Fred played with his dog often. He loved his dog. His dog broke his leg one day. Fred had to walk his dog. He felt so much better once he walked his dog.
Lobster. The man liked to eat lobster. His friend did not. His friend asked for a lobster. The man was not interested. The friend didn't know what to get him for his birthday.

Competition. Tim and his team were competing in an athletic competition. All of Tim's teammates ran fast. Tim's team had trouble keeping up with the faster runners. Tim was faster than his team in his race. Tim won by a wide margin.

The bike tip. I was riding my bike one day. Suddenly, a bicyclist passed me. The bicyclist was riding very fast. I was scared and I almost crashed into him. He let out a big yell and told me to be careful!

Dinner plans. Tina needed some new recipes to put in her cooking book. She knew she had to write it down so she put them in her planner. When it was time to cook, she didn't have any ideas. Then she remembered that she had a cookbook at the office. She was able to come up with a good recipe for steak and potatoes.

Unending Sadness. When she arrived home, there was an angry letter waiting for her. She was going to tell her dad, but there was a problem. He had to work all day to finish the letter, and she was mad. She sat there and cried for hours. Finally, the letter was turned in, and she felt better.

Errand. The woman saw a car driving errand. She went to see it but they didn't see her. She thought they were driving down the street. They were really far away. She called the woman back and they came for her.

Rita passes. Rita has been practicing all week for a race. She is so ready she can barely stand. The day of the race she is exhausted and can barely walk. Rita is so disappointed when she can't even get on the starting block. Her teacher is so nice to Rita she doesn't even mind.

Brad gets revenge. Brad had a crush on the girl in his class named Julie. He decided to confront her. He approached her when class was over and gave her a nasty look. Julie ran away. Brad never spoke to her again.

Brainstorming. I had an idea for a novel. I sat down and began brainstorming. I ended up with a paragraph I thought up while I was writing. I submitted my draft to a publishing company. They rejected my novel and told me I had no ideas for new ones.

Bored Mike. Mike was having trouble staying awake at night. He started to drink more coffee to stay awake. Mike's girlfriend noticed that he drank too much coffee. She told him to cut down on the coffee. Mike stopped drinking coffee to stay awake.

Coming or Going?. Teddy went to the beach with his family. When they arrived they were very disappointed that there were no shells. Teddy's sister thought it would be fun to help him gather shells. She took Teddy to a local beach and showed him how to open them. After that Teddy had no problems finding shells for his collection.
The Investment. John was selling his house. He wanted to buy an expensive car. He talked to a broker about a car. He found a car he liked and bought it. He was happy he had found a good car.

Changing the Sheets. I needed a new bedding set. I went to the fabric store to see what was available. They had a good selection of different sheets. I picked the best. I put them on the bed right away.
Free Food. Josie needed money for food. She thought of a way to earn some money. Josie decided to clean her apartment. Josie then left for work. Josie got paid and went home to eat.
Vikings. Cynthia thought the Vikings were cool. She started reading them avidly. One day her dad said the Vikings were dead. Cynthia was devastated. She became a Christian.
Beth wins the lottery. Beth really wanted a new car. She did not have the money. Then she noticed a lottery ticket. She put the ticket in her purse. She won the lottery!
Ferrets. Tim went for a walk in the woods. He saw a tiny ferret on the ground. Tim walked up and pet it. He wanted to buy one too. Tim found out it was only a mouse.

Honeymoon. Gina and Tom had been dating for over two Year's. One evening at the theater they had an important date planned. They got dressed and drove to the theater together. It was their first date and they both had a lot of fun. They decided to do more similar things in the future.
Cheerleading. Kelly was a cheerleader. Her coach decided she needed extra practice. Kelly practiced all night. The next morning she tried out for the team. Kelly was happy she had done well.

Procrastinator. Nita was the procrastinator in her class. She would only finish work a few days before it was due. This made her students very nervous because she was late. One day, she went to the principal and asked to be let up. Her teacher gave in, and Nita was able to finish her work.

Wrong Phone. My phone rang. It was my friend asking me to meet her for the night. I said I was busy and would be busy soon. When I got to the restaurant, she asked me to wait. I never heard from her again.
heavy box. Gabby went to a craft store. She saw a box that said $3. It was the heaviest one in the store. She decided to purchase it. She thought she'd be able to lug it around with ease.
An Old Sword. Tom liked to play swords. He had an old wooden sword that he loved. One day it fell and broke. Tom had to get it repaired. He had to pay for the entire cost of the repair.

Symphony. Mia's favorite group were the symphonies. She was watching them perform at the recital. Mia was mesmerized by the music. She was even more fascinated by their costumes. Mia's favorite part of the show was when they danced in the light show.

Adopted Friend. Timmy had never met a cat before. He wanted to be a cat himself. So he went to the animal shelter to adopt one. He found a very friendly kitty that was very sweet. Timmy decided to adopt two more cats, just to be safe.

Dolores the Therapist. Dolores is a licensed counselor. She also is a licensed private investigator. She has had a great success rate on her clients. She got a client named Chris and hired him to help. Chris said the therapy helped Chris live a healthier life.

Cheesy madness. Ava's family went to get popcorn. As they were eating, she was very hungry. She wanted to eat more than she did, so she grabbed a bag. She ate all of her popcorn. Her brother felt bad, so he let her stay to finish.

Amnesia. Tom was driving to a family reunion. He got a flat tire while driving. Tom was confused since he thought he was going home. He pulled over to the side of the road. Luckily someone was able to give him a ride back to his car.
Stuck Paper. It was time to take a paper out of the library. I noticed my paper was stuck. It was stuck in a large crease. I had to rip it apart. It was then I realized I never took out my trash.

Building a treehouse. Jake was making plans to build a treehouse. He had a huge amount of trees to cut down. Jake had to build the treehouse himself. The treehouse was huge. Jake was able to finish the treehouse after a long time.

Curtains. Tim was a new teacher. He had never had any experience in curtains. His new class got a project. They would make curtains by the end of the week. Tim was thrilled and he learned a lot in the process.

Typing. Dan wanted to learn how to type on the computer. Dan spent many hours every day after work on his typing skills. At the end of the year, Dan was able to type a short paper. Dan took his paper to school and was accepted. Dan was very proud to be learning to type.
Bored. My wife told me to be bored for my nap. I went out with friends. I started making music. I heard some music and played the music. My wife woke me up.

Where Eggs Come From. I used to go to a store to buy eggs. When I went there, the egg cartons were very full. I asked the clerk to bring me some more. The clerk was too busy, so I drove home. I had to walk all the way back to the store to get more eggs.

Big Fire. John was playing in his yard. Suddenly a fire started. He tried to put out the fire with a hose. The hose kept getting hotter and hotter. Eventually the hose broke and the fire spread to the grass.

Laura Does Homework. Laura was learning to do her homework. She found it was harder than she had imagined. She had to turn in her work at a specific time. Laura was stuck doing her homework that day. After lunch, Laura decided that she would give it another try.
Nursery. Lucy's mother took her to the pet store. At the pet store she picked out a puppy. She put it in the car. Lucy drove home. Lucy's mother was surprised.
Navy. Dan loved to sail his sailboat. Dan decided to join the Navy. Dan worked very hard in the Navy. Dan was very excited when he started the Navy. Dan enjoyed the rest of his time in the Navy.

The Candy Store. Lily went to the candy store to buy some gum. She had forgotten her gum and she wanted to buy some more. When she got back to her car she had already bought a new box of gum. She drove home empty handed. She then decided to buy her husband some candy.
The Ocean. The children loved swimming at the beach. They swam until they were exhausted. They rested in the sand. They played in the water. They loved the quiet sunsets that day.

A Day at the Beach. Kia had always been afraid of the ocean. She had spent much of her childhood on the beach, however. One day, she decided she wanted to get off of the sand. She packed up her things and packed a life jacket. She went to the beach and went swimming.

Train Trip. Jim took the train to his summer home. There was a storm coming in the distance and the train was delayed. Jim and his family were stuck in the dark and dark for an hour. Eventually the storm passed and Jim and his family were relieved. He made sure the kids got off the train safely.

Unprepared. I was in a small group of friends. We decided to play a card game in front of the whole group. A group of guys in the back decided to sneak into the group. They stole a bunch of the cards before we knew. We were devastated and apologized to the people in the back.

Quitting smoking. Joe has been smoking for 20 years. But he wanted to quit smoking. Joe bought an electronic cigarette from the store. He started using it last week. After only a week he started to feel better.

The Doctor. Diana was having a baby. Her husband wanted her to get the help she needed. Diana made an appointment with her doctor. He recommended a surgery. Diana and her husband both had a healthy baby.
Making a garland. Cindy wanted to make a garland. She was at the store. She wanted the perfect one. She went to get it. It was a huge disappointment.

The bad veggies. Candy's favorite restaurant was having a sale. She decided to go to it. However, she didn't know which items to order. So she decided to just leave without them. She wound up disappointed because the food was awful.

Mixed Mail. I received a package in the mail yesterday from an unknown address. I was curious to see if the package had arrived or not. Upon opening the package, I realized it was mixed up. There were three packages inside, one for each person. I contacted the post office and they fixed the mix up.
Fish Tank. The children loved watching the fish. They liked to collect them in the tank. One day, one of the fish bit the child. The child cried. He learned that biting a fish was bad.

The Gem Stick. One day, Jane went to the beach with her father. Her father gave her a large blue and green gem stick. Jane played with the stick for hours. Jane was so happy to get back to the beach. Jane's dad brought her back home with a nice chunk of rock.
Sunny's Pooch. Sunny was very bad at swimming. One day, he decided to try something new. Sunny went to the pool and sat down. He got into the water and dove. Sunny was able to swim all day.
Salesman. Tina wanted to be a salesperson. So she studied very hard in college. Then, she applied for a sales position. She got the job. Soon Tina was the top salesperson at the office!

Headed to the movies. Liz had never been to the theater before. She had always loved going to them. One day, she decided to head out there. She decided to see a new movie. She couldn't believe how fun it was.

Steve Visits The Aquarium. Steve's parents take him to the aquarium. Steve loves fish and especially the baby fish. Steve asks his parents to take him home after school. Steve's parents get the kids and they go to the aquarium. After a fun day, Steve returns home.

Lopsided House. A man was at his home and it was in a terrible neighborhood. He decided to sell the house. He went on the internet and found a seller that he liked. The seller showed him an amazing house that was in a perfect neighborhood. The man bought the house and lived in it happily for the next 20 years.

Randy and his Grandfather. Randy had been out of the military for a few years. Randy finally decided to return home. He took a week and visited his parents. After he visited his parents he talked to his grandpa. Randy was happy to see him and was excited to see him again.
Sore throat. Tim was sick of eating all of the food. So he started to make his own food. And he cooked it himself on a regular basis. And it started to make him feel better. Tim became the new Chef.

Low Patience. Lucy had been having trouble with her computer for a week. She knew she needed to do something about it. She ordered a new computer from the store. When it came, it was broken, but worked just fine. Lucy was so pleased she bought another one.

The Pets. Jim and Nancy had five dogs. They took them to the park and let them roam freely. They also gave the dogs toys and water to drink. At night they would feed them and let them sleep. Jim and Nancy made the park their new favorite place to hang out!

Misha's Mirrors. Misha wanted to build a nice bathroom. She bought a couple of large, clear mirrors. After placing the mirrors in the bathroom, she used glue. Then, she went to work and poured some finishing paint. Finally, she was done and was happy that she'd finished.

What to Choose. Tina was at a party. Everyone was buying expensive watches. Tina's friend asked her what she wanted. Tina said she wanted something cheap. The friend told Tina she wanted a quartz watch.

Basketball Match. The two teams played a basketball match. They both took turns shooting three pointers. Eventually the player with the ball made the winning shot. The crowd applauded loudly for his feat. The player gave a bow to the crowd afterwards.

Swarming with Flies. Tom was in a house with ants. He did not want to be a fly on the wall, but he was terrified. He tried not to move too quickly around them. Eventually a swarm of flies appeared. Tom ended up being stung a few times by the flies.

Walking and Talking. My daughter decided to try walking and talking at school. I walked to and from school for a while. We walked around the hall. My daughter started talking to one of my coworkers. They became good friends.

Karen's Misfortune. Karen's favorite show was on. She loved when it was on. When the ratings started dropping she was very upset. She was very upset about it. Eventually she switched to another channel.

Game. A group of friends gathered to play board games. It was their first game and they were very nervous. The game went much better than they thought it would. After a couple of hours they decided to play another game. They spent all day playing board games together.
Movie poster. Jenny loved her new movie poster. She had gotten it on a sale. She didn't see her room again. When she did, she noticed that she had taken it. She ripped it down and threw it away.

Doored. My friend Tim has a gold Ford F150 pickup truck. Today his friend drove a white Ford SUV. A man ran across the road while they were driving. The SUV ran into him. The man died from his injuries.
Starry Night. There was a storm outside. It was hard to see the stars. Jim decided to look for them in the sky. He found them and was so proud. It made him feel more alive.

Andy Learns to Drive. Andy decided he wanted to learn how to drive. He decided to take driving classes at his local college. During his first class he took a driving test. He passed the test and he became a licensed driver. Andy now drives his friend all the time and makes lots of money!

Dirty House. Tom was out on a hike. He got lost and saw a small trail. He kept walking down it until it ended up dead ends. It was just a dead end and there were no trees in sight. Tom decided to take the trail down a different route instead.

Little Rascal. Tina bought a dog. The dog would bark every day. One day, she gave the dog a bone and let him chew. Tina was so surprised at how energetic the dog became. The dog has been her best friend ever since!

Jerry goes to camp. Jerry wants to go camping. He books a place on the property. He brings his tent and sleeping bags. When he gets to the campsite he packs his things. Jerry spends the night in the car camping.

Home plate. The Yankees went to the big game on Saturday. They needed home plate. They waited all day long for it to be delivered. The delivery never came. The Yankees were upset they had to forfeit the game.

Broken Copier. Tom was using a regular copier to do research. He noticed a black spot on the surface. He pulled the copier out and saw that it was broken. Tom decided to throw it away. He had to clean the copier again and replace it.
Lost. The boy couldn't find his bike. He looked everywhere. He walked all over the yard. He even searched under a bench. The boy looked under the bench again to find his bike.
The Cat. A woman saw a cat sitting on a street corner. She called the authorities. The cat had no collar or ID tag. The woman brought the cat in for help. The cat was returned home.
Volleyball game. The kids were playing volleyball. They played their heart out. The crowd was chanting and cheering for them. The game was tied. The crowd cheered even louder for the winner.

The Pirate Ship. Jude watched the ship sail across the water. He had a plan. Jude got out of the boat and jumped into the water. As he jumped in, he spotted a pirate. Jude jumped out of the water, and saved the pirate.

Tutor Girl. When I was in elementary school we got the first private tutor. The teacher was a very sweet lady who loved me very much. She knew everything I was going through and helped me out with it. I still can't believe I got a private tutor after all this time. I still cry every time I think about it, thinking she never loved me.
Bandits. Timmy liked to run around the neighborhood playing. His parents decided to go out for a walk. One of his neighbors was looking for him. Timmy ran away from home. He never came back.
Signed. Sasha was a huge fan of Harry Potter. She wanted to give him a nice gift. She found the perfect wrapping paper. Then she got her dad to sign it. She was so thrilled that he loved the gift.

No Show Date. Tina had wanted to take her friend Stacy out for a date. Stacy said she had other plans and wouldn't go with her. Stacy was mad and stormed out of the restaurant. Tina was really bummed. The waitress was nice though and helped her catch her breath.

Amazon. The woman went to the Amazon. She decided to pick out a basket. She found a great deal on a couch and some clothes. She put the couch and clothes into the basket. She left the basket and walked away.

Like Old Times. Molly loved her dog. He had grown from a puppy to a puppy-sized dog. One day Molly noticed that he was not feeling well. She had to take him to the vet. The vet told Molly that her dog had stomach issues.

Counting Change. John needed to pay for his groceries. He went to the register to get change. He found that it was a dollar short. John decided to go to a store to get more change. He bought some more from there and was able to pay for his groceries.

Dave's Music Store. Dave was an aspiring musician. He thought he had what it takes to start his own record label. When he was ready to begin, Dave went to an open mic night. When he took the stage, he was shocked at how great many people were. Dave decided to go back to the mic and try to make it big.

Having Wine. We went to a nice restaurant last night. They were offering wine tastings all night. We went in hoping to sample some wines. Unfortunately they had to close because of bad weather. I was sad that I couldn't have a drink.

Jack Instructs His Barber. Jack is working at the barber's chair. Jack takes off his hat and puts it back on. Jack starts cutting his client's hair. His client looks pleased with the haircut. His client tells Jack that the haircut was the best haircut that he ever had.

The Painter. Jenna loved art. Her mom encouraged her to go to art school. Jenna was offered a full ride scholarship to art school. She studied hard and studied hard. Jenna was able to find her dream career after college.
New scarf. Sara wanted a new scarf. She didn't have enough money for a fancy one. She decided to save and buy one. Sara worked very hard to save. She was happy when she was able to buy her new scarf.

Water. I was bored one day, so I decided to go to the lake. I decided to take a float, since it was only 50 feet from the shore. As soon as I came in the water, I began drowning. I panicked and tried to swim to the shore. I was rescued from the lake by a local dive team.
Hungry. Tom was hungry all the time. Tom asked his parents to buy him food. He ate his sandwich and juice. He did not feel hungry again. Tom was happy that he ate.

No Party Guests. Milly's parents didn't let her go out. So when she got home, she started to eat alone. The dinner ended up looking bland. She had to go to a restaurant to get something good. And luckily, she was able to get something good.

Chickens. My friend Tom had a girlfriend that he did not like. She kept going to a petting zoo. One day Tom asked her to come home. She came home and they fell in love. The next week they bought chickens and were happy.
Melting. Cathy was cooking chicken. She accidentally put too much salt in it. It melted and was a big mess. The chicken smelled and tasted terrible. Cathy didn't make that mistake again.

Sock escapade. Lizzy loves to knit. She loves it so much, that her friend recommended she try knitting socks. Lizzy started making socks as soon as she found out about them. Lizzy made a dozen pairs and showed them to her friend. Her friend thought they were great, and gave Lizzy five dollars for the first pair.
Weight Lifting. Jill was getting fatter all of a sudden. She tried dieting and trying to eat healthy. Nothing worked. Then Jill found a gym and signed up. Jill began lifting weights and lost weight.

The Dog. My dog likes to run away. One day, I found him on a neighbor's porch. We went back inside, and he was outside on the lawn. I went outside to see what was going on, and my dog was on the lawn. He ran around like a mad dog for an hour before I let him out.

watching tv. Lucy was watching a tv show on TV. The show was very funny. She ended up laughing a lot. The next day her mom asked her what she was laughing about. Lucy couldn't remember the episode she was watching.

The Horse. It was the start of summer vacation. Gina's class wanted to ride a horse for fun. She and a few friends rode the horse down the beach. The horse had a funny name, The Big Cheese. Gina and her friends had a great time.

Thanksgiving Session Ruined. Joe and his wife were preparing to eat at a diner. They were having a nice dinner, when a woman came in the dining room. The woman complained to Joe that she had a stomach ache. Joe quickly rushed to the kitchen to throw the food away. Joe was relieved to see he had thrown it away.

Computer. Kate bought a computer online. She was impressed with the computer when it arrived. Unfortunately however, she was unable to start the computer. She spent hours looking for the problem. Kate eventually figured it out and was able to start the computer.

escaped. I was on my way to my first class when I got lost. The teacher called my name and I ran to the front of the class. I found my teacher and he helped me to get back in line. He also gave me a book and I read it and learned a lot. I then felt very safe and confident.

Eric's Brunch Date. Eric and his girlfriend went out on a date. They had some drinks and went to brunch. Eric got a bit drunk and forgot to bring the food home. Eric's girlfriend made him dinner from scratch. Eric had a great brunch date!

Amber's Halloween. Amber wanted to dress as a princess for Halloween. She went to several stores to find the perfect outfit. She found a dress that was pink with a golden crown. She bought it and put it on. She felt very pretty in her princess princess costume!

Bob Goes Sledding. Bob loved going to the local amusement park. He decided that he wanted to go sledding with some friends. Bob gathered up all his friends and went to the local amusement park. They rode all the slides and had fun. They had a great time at the park and were glad to go.
Cards. Gina was in an organized card game. She would usually win the game. She only lost to her sister. Today, she lost by 3 points. It didn't matter, because she won the game anyways.

The Vase. Jenny bought a beautiful vase at a yard sale. Her friend complimented her on the vase. Jenny was very touched. She asked her friend for a job. She was hired and now Jenny and her friend shared a vase.

Math. Ben and I played hide and seek at night. We looked everywhere, but couldn't find him. We finally turned around and went back into the dark house. He was in the kitchen and had just cooked a pizza. It was all a big ruse.

Unjust Justice. Ben was a member of the football team. He often used foul language towards the opposing team's players. A teammate, who was a minority, saw him and confronted him. Ben admitted what he'd done and apologized. Ben was promptly suspended for one game.

Well Done. Drew always wanted to eat a well done steak. He would always make sure he was paying attention. His girlfriend got him some steak. They both loved it. Now they wait and wait to go back to eat well done steaks.

Too Much to Drink. Miles was at the bar with his friends. His friend tried a few beers but soon was inebriated. Miles was annoyed by this. He didn't want to keep him out of drinks. Miles called the cops to escort him home.

Elephants. The zoo had a herd of elephants. The elephants had been behaving strangely lately. They were walking in circles. A lion had to be sent outside to calm them down. Everyone was happy to see their favorite animals back in the wild.

The Writer. Mark wanted to make it in the writing field. He wanted to be an expert writer. He wrote a short story every day. Finally he got published in a magazine. He was happy he finally got his story published.

Boat ride. Allison went to the ocean with her family. She had a great time watching the waves roll in. They had to take turns riding a boat. As they got older, they had to pick a direction. Allison's kids had to pick a direction and then went their own way.

Ascension. The church was celebrating its new year. The pastor led an announcement to the people. He said that we are going to become an ascension church. The congregation joined him. They were surprised to see a new building.

Carl Corn. Carl got a new car, and it ran very hot. He tried to heat the car by running a fan in the window. The air was hot enough that he got stung by a wasp. Carl learned to use a better air conditioner. Now Carl drives his car in cool air.

Special B-Day. Renea had been celebrating with her husband for years. She wanted to take him to a special occasion. On B-day of their wedding she called him to ask him to come. She waited with tears in her eyes as he came up the stairs. They both smiled as they walked to the altar and then kissed.

Bike. Travis was riding his bike to school. When it got dark he started looking for a dark spot. Travis suddenly saw a dark shape in the sky. It turned out to be a UFO. Travis realized the lights were from a motorcycle he rode.

Jack Goes to the Dentist. Jack was driving down the road. Suddenly he was pulled over by a police officer. The cop was questioning Jack about driving while intoxicated. Jack was embarrassed and felt embarrassed. Jack got his car and drove home.
Vacation. My mom went on a family vacation. She told me she would be home in a couple of days. She did not tell me when she would be back. She didn't answer when I asked. I waited for her to call.

Ugly Baby. The doctor told the mom to bring her baby to the hospital. The baby's parents wanted to do everything to make it look perfect. The mom tried, but couldn't manage it. She had to bring it to the hospital anyway. The baby was a sad and ugly baby.

The Hike. Today I went on a long hike. It was not difficult, but I was tired after a long day. By the end of it, I was very tired. I decided to get some coffee. I felt very refreshed after my long hike.

Honeymoon Rodents. The couple was on a honeymoon in Florida. They were petting their dogs when they got a surprise. There was a swarm of cockroaches outside! The dog quickly got rid of them. The couple was relieved.

Mama's Bell Tower. Jim and his family were at the local park. His grandma let him play on the playground equipment. While playing Jim fell off of the swing and hit his head. He had a concussion and was taken to the doctor. Jim's grandmother brought him a bell tower to hang from her porch.

Fire Alarm. One day I woke up and had a huge fire alarm. I realized I had forgotten to put the fire alarm on. I quickly grabbed my clothes and went outside. I ran to my truck and got the alarm off. I put the fire alarm on and had no problems at all.
dicing chef. When I was younger, I wanted to be a chef. My dad offered to teach me how to do it. I practiced for a few years. My dad let me teach him. I became a good chef.

Bailey. Bailey wanted to write a novel. Bailey decided to write the novel in the English language. Bailey went to the bookstore and found a book on writing in French. Bailey bought the book and started working on the book. Bailey is happy that she is finally working on a book.

Squirrel!. The girl heard the scratching sound. She went to investigate. She found a squirrel running away from its nest. She picked it up and brought it inside. It lived with her until her parents caught it.

Missed Flight. Bill didn't have enough money to pay his flight ticket. He decided to steal a bus ticket for himself. Bill got on the bus with his ticket. After taking a bus to the airport, he noticed someone's card. He realized it was the bus driver.

Tummy Ache. The doctor told Bob he had a tummy ache. Bob ignored his pain and kept eating. Bob didn't listen to his doctor's advice to cut down on sweets. Bob ate a piece of candy and felt bad. Bob went to the dentist and had a cavity filled.

Poor Toby. Toby wanted to give up his role as the bad guy in class. He refused to listen to his teacher. So he decided to stay up all night and steal his homework. However, the teacher caught him and he had to repeat the grade. But he was even more disappointed when the teacher found out.

Escape From Spanish Camp. Gina's father went to a Spanish camp. She loved the other children. But there was a kid named James. James and Gina talked all day and played football. Gina decided to never be in that kind of environment again.

beautiful. Samantha was a big fan of Disney. She knew that her school would be holding a concert. She purchased tickets to see a movie. Samantha was sad when she couldn't find a seat in the theater. She was relieved when she could.

Rufus Rides the Bus. Rufus has never taken the bus before. He decides to go with his friend Mike. They arrive at the stop at a busy bus stop. The driver asks them to hurry up. Rufus is surprised that he never learned to ride on the bus.

Time Goes. Jim walked to work one morning. But it started to rainy outside. He went back inside and went to sleep. The next morning Jim got up and started the day. He went to work a bit later than usual.

Dirty Sheets. Allie loved to throw her blankets in the wash. One day she didn't realize there was a problem. Her sheets were soaked with soap. Allie had to throw them all out. She was upset she ruined her new blankets.

Apple picking. I had never apple picked before. I had always thought it was very time consuming. One day I decided to go ahead and try it. I bought some apples and got out my chainsaw. I am now on my way to the orchard picking my first apple.
Popcorn Problems. My popcorn was getting hot in the microwave. I looked at my options. I tried popping it. Unfortunately, it didn't pop. I had to throw it out.

Peachy. My mom said if you put peaches in a bottle they'll turn orange. She wanted the milk orange so I did it. When it was done, I didn't think it looked so bad. Then she told me to smell it. To my surprise it smelled delicious!
Missed Trip. Dan decided he would take a trip. He had a long day at work. Dan decided to stop by his old office. Dan accidentally walked into the building. Dan ended up losing his job for this.

Christmas Vacation. My friends and I decided to go to our grandparents house. We had a blast, but we couldn't believe it was Christmas. The lights were off, the decorations were still up. We all had fun doing activities. The most fun was when we went shopping for all of our gifts.

Carlsbad Caverns. Carl was on vacation in Arizona. He went to a state park called Carlsbad Caverns. He had a great time there. He took a long hot bath. Carlsbad Caverns is now his favorite place to go.

Man from peru. My friend Jim is from Peru. He recently moved to the US. He got hired by an online marketplace for an account manager. Jim told me that he hated his job and is now happy. He told me he was so happy he never wanted to leave.

Garbage Day. Tom was going to trash his apartment. But it was not that late, so he kept going. He reached into his pants and got no garbage! He decided to wait to see if the garbage truck showed. When the truck did arrive Tom threw away all his garbage.
The Trip. Timmy had always wanted to go to Hawaii. One day he went to his local college. He signed up for a course on Hawaii. It was an amazing experience. Timmy wished he had taken his trip sooner.

Gingerbread. Dan loved gingerbread houses. Every Christmas, Dan's grandma made him a gingerbread house. After a while, Dan was afraid he would fall in love with the house. He took a long time to figure out the perfect way to decorate it. Dan's grandma never had any luck finding him a new gingerbread house.

Stepparent Blues. Sandy was expecting her first child. She did not want a baby. She did not think she would have a happy life with one. Finally she found a nice husband and had a great life. Sandy and her husband adopted a boy and lived happily ever after.

My Best Friend. I went out with my friend and he started to flirt with me. I politely said no and he left. We ended up at a bar. I sat with my friend and we watched a football game. Later, I met up with him at his house.
Soda. I went to the supermarket. I found soda. I decided to buy a 12 pack. I decided to use it with my girlfriend. We drank that soda all day.

Home is best. Kelley's friend was sick and she was having a hard time taking care of him. One day she called her home and asked for some help. She gave him a list of things she needed. Kelley felt guilty and decided to give in. He started feeling better and now they live together.

Indirect Attack. Joe had just won the basketball game. Joe was getting frustrated with the score and decided to score the game winning shot. Joe did this by dribbling the ball towards the basket. He missed the shot and the game ended up being tied. Joe got upset with himself and decided to change his strategy.

Two More Books. I went on a trip to the library today. I was excited to see the shelves and shelves of books. A librarian handed me two books to check out. I checked out books on two topics. They both turned out to be very interesting.

Late Mail. Janet was upset that she was late to the post office. She decided to call up all her friends to tell them what was wrong. When she got to the office, they told her they lost her address. She had to call her mother to find out where she was. Luckily, she had a phone number for them so they were able to find her.
Daily Walk. Tom was a college student. His classes were very heavy. He decided to walk every day to work. He got his walk for free in his school. Tom was glad he had a walk to work.
The Big Date. Jake was ready to ask his crush out. He had been working on it for weeks. He finally went to ask her. She said yes! Jake couldn't wait to get to know her better.

Giving up Tinder. When I was in college I met a nice girl named Julie. I didn't think she'd like me, but we ended up dating for three years. Julie had been on many different dating sites. After 3 years of dating I couldn't take no for an answer. I ended up giving up on Tinder.

Conference call. The conference call was very important. I did not want to miss this call. I called and spoke to the company's corporate counsel. I explained the situation to the counsel and the CEO. The counsel and CEO agreed on a solution.

New Additional. Gina needed a new bra. She decided to ask her mom for a recommendation. Her mom told her to look on her own and pick out what she liked. Gina went to the mall and found the perfect bra. She bought it and was proud of herself.

Eggs. John liked to make scrambled eggs. His wife told him she did not like them. John looked it up in the recipe book. He changed the recipe to a healthy egg and it was great. His wife loved the healthy egg and she was very happy.

Hurricane Gloria. My friends and I had an amazing time at a party. We were having a lot of fun and making silly faces. When Gloria hit the coast, it was a real beast of a hurricane. The next morning the wind blew like crazy and all of our stuff was destroyed. Now we just stay in and listen to music while staying safe.
Train. I wanted to learn how to drive. I took a test and passed it. Then I took the driver's test. I passed both tests and received my license. I got to drive and now I am very well-versed!
Bad weather. Allie wanted to go to the beach. The weather was so cold. So she had to cancel her plans. Thankfully she got back to sleep late. But the next day was cold and rainy.

party all night. My friend had a birthday party in his room. I brought my friends to the party and had a good time. Later, I went back home and realized I left my wallet. I couldn't get in the party and I had no party. I had to pay for the party all over again.

Fallen. Alicia was in a classroom one day. She noticed that a girl was being bullied. Alicia picked up her books and left. However, she slipped on the wet floor. She ended up falling and hurt her knee badly.

Jake buys a car. Jake had recently started working as a car salesman. He went to the dealership with his first customer to sell a car. The car was a Ford Mustang, with a price of $25,000. Jake sold the car to a buyer in Colorado for $8,000 less than the sticker price. Jake felt like a great salesman, and he left feeling satisfied.

Chile. Irene wanted to visit Chile. She bought a ticket online. When she got there, she went to an authentic restaurant. She ordered some amazing chile con carne. It was the best Chile I had ever eaten!

Restaurant. John loved Chinese food. He bought some beef noodles for lunch. After eating the noodles, he realized he hated the flavor. John decided to eat Chinese food more often. Eventually, he became a famous celebrity for eating Chinese food.

Jasper Uses Air Conditioning. Jasper notices that the outside of his home is cold. He decides to purchase an air conditioning unit. Jasper goes to the store to purchase the unit. The store does not have the unit Jasper wants. Jasper buys the unit instead of waiting for it to be delivered.

Training for a Race. Cayla loved to run. She tried out for the track team, but she didn't make the cut. She decided to go the distance route and train hard. She went into the marathon with a goal of finishing strong. She finished strong and came in third place, which was good.
Better with Glasses. Tommy needed glasses. He had never worn them before. Tommy went to the optometrist. The optometrist gave Tommy some glasses. Tommy was happy with his glasses.

New apartment. Sandra needed a new apartment. She looked through many of her friends' listings. She finally found one that she liked. After applying for the apartment, she was accepted. Her apartment was so comfortable, that she forgot to eat!

The Unnoticed Costume. Jessica wanted to play with the new Halloween costume. She was too embarrassed to wear it. She had one of the kids pretend she did. Jessica's mother overheard the conversation. The mom told the children to be quiet and leave the hall.
100 lb. weight loss. I decided to lose weight. I bought a gym membership and started to workout. I started to lose weight. I decided to do 100 squats every day. I lost 100 lbs.

New Game. Billy was excited for the new game coming out. He played it the first day he got it. He got really into it the following week. He couldn't wait to play again. He finished the first game after two days.

The Diploma. Amber wanted a degree. Her mother convinced her to take an online class. It was more difficult than she expected. She failed the class and had to retake it. Her mother was shocked but said she had been saving the money.

The Leftovers. Bart had no money and was on food stamps. The next week he found some leftover turkey and potatoes. He made a feast out of the leftovers. The next night, Bart's neighbors told him he ruined their dinner. The next time, Bart used a different turkey and potato.
Catsup. Ricky was eating a hotdog. He tried to take a bite. It was too soft and his mouth touched the hotdog. He had to spit the hotdog out. Ricky wound up licking his lips.

Nervous Edna. Edna had just had a baby girl. She had been feeling very tired all day. She got her baby girl to sit up in the car. Her baby girl fell asleep right away. She had to stay up all night because of her baby's lack of energy.

Bob Gets Contacts. Bob always had big eyes. He thought it would be cool to have contacts. He put on some contacts and saw how they looked. They did not look right on him at all. Bob decided he would never wear contacts again.
Sleep Over. My family and I decided to sleep over. We played board games. We watched movies. We ate junk food. We fell asleep around midnight.
Carl. Carl had just broken his leg. He couldn't walk yet. He went to the doctor. He had to use a cane. He eventually got around!

Deep Cut. I was doing some gardening with my son. We decided to dig for buried potatoes. I dug up a small hill and found a large hole. My son dug up a small hill and found a small cavity. We filled the hole with sand and made a new hill with it.
produce. I wanted to grow a garden. I decided to grow carrots, and corn. I bought seeds and started planting. I planted for about a month. When the carrots started to grow, I bought some.

Cats. Anna loved cats and wanted a cat. She got a cat at the shelter. Anna's mom went to get her a new cat for the house. Anna's mom brought the cat home and brought Anna her new cat! Anna felt so much happier that she got a cat.

Hair Cut. Amy had a very long blonde hair. She went to the barber today. She told him she'd be cutting it tomorrow. But the barber cut it a couple inches shorter. Amy was upset and complained to the barber.

Anaconda. I was walking to my car when i came across an acorn. I had a close look and decided that it looked like an anaconda. It was brown and very hard. I couldn't believe that it was an acorn. I decided to make an appointment to see a naturalist.

The Surprise. Jim's girlfriend came to the house for a visit. She stayed over for a few days. While there, Jim's girlfriend noticed some strange people. He went to their apartment and saw that the guy was hiding there. The guy was a cop, and Jim's girlfriend had a surprise.

View from the top. Today was a very hot and humid day. I decided to take a hot air balloon ride. The hot air balloon took off and flew over the lake. I sat on top of the balloon and enjoyed the view. The wind and humidity made me feel very relaxed.

A pair of shoes. The kids were excited for their first day of summer. They packed their bags and left for summer camp. When they arrived at camp, they found a pair of shoes on the floor. They were the nicest shoes they had ever owned. The kids wore them all the time.
Video Store. Tara worked in a video store. It was all her friends jobs. She was tired but felt lucky. She had never lost money in her life. Tara had a fun life at work.

food fight. Lucy's parents were arguing. One parent was throwing spaghetti at the other. Lucy did not like it and wanted to leave. She was not allowed to leave the house that day. Finally her parents agreed that she could play outside.

A Better Lunch. Mary was at a lunch with friends. She had ordered her lunch and it was already ready. She went to pick it up but they forgot to put the food in the car. She asked her friends if she could get her. Mary ended up eating her food there instead.

Counterattack. Lily and her friends were playing Pokemon Go. They were walking through their neighborhood. Lily spotted a rare pokemon. She picked up the rare Pokemon. Her friends loved it so much that they ran back home.

ADHD. Sandra has been having trouble with her ADHD. She tries to avoid everything involving it. When her mom asked her to go with her to work, she didn't want to. Instead, she went to the mall with her friends. Luckily, she was able to keep her distance and not talk to her.
The Inept Football Team. The school year was ending. THey wanted to celebrate their victory. They decided to have a small game. The team played poorly. The coach got fired and had to start over.
Lego Designer. Tim was a bad boy. He built an elaborate robot. He decided to sell it to his friends. They were so happy that he let them sell it. Tim is now a millionaire.

The Dining Set. Lars and his family were having Thanksgiving dinner. They had been preparing for months. They bought all the items for the dining set. When they opened the set, they were very happy with the results. They each found a dish that was their favorite.

New Shoes. My shoes are very dirty. I went to a shoe store and bought some new shoes. I took them home and got to work cleaning them. After that I gave them a good washing and a new laces. Now they're clean and I can finally wear them!

Wife. Jane's wife wasn't feeling well. Jane went to visit her and the house was very dirty. Jane decided to clean it up herself. The dirty house was filled with flies. Jane was happy to have a clean house.

The New Garden. Lucy was digging in the garden in her front yard. Suddenly a butterfly flew over and landed right on her shoulder. It was tiny and pink but very beautiful. She smiled and pet the butterfly on the cheek. She walked back over to the fence and carefully tucked it into her pocket.

Angela 4. Angela went to the dentist for her first checkup. Her teeth were in bad shape and she had three cavities. Her dentist took x-rays of her teeth. She had to fill the cavities with fillings. Angela had to wear a crown for 2 months to make her teeth look better.
