School Board Victory. Mia loved to ride her bike. Mia's teacher told her she had to have a helmet in order to ride. Mia was reluctant to wear her helmet. The principal decided to hold a vote. The teacher approved of Mia wearing the helmet.
Coffee Break. My roommate asked me to stay after school. He had a car break down. He was running late for work. I went and helped him fix the car. I told him to come back early.

Portia Plays Badminton. Portia is the number one badminton player in town. Everyone wants to play badminton with her. However, she never lets anyone in. Now all of her friends are frustrated. Portia is very sad that her town is no longer badminton friendly.

Veronica's Bush. Veronica liked to go for walks. She saw a bush she thought was a snake. It was actually a cactus with a huge leaf growing from the top. She picked the leaf to keep the snake out. She went for a walk, and she was very careful about her choice.

Mom and the Car. Mom worked very hard. She had a very successful business. She put all her spare time into her job. She saved enough to buy her son a new car. The son told his parents she got him one because she worked hard.

Breaking the laptop. I was playing video games and trying to make them run. I accidentally turned off my monitor and laptop. I did not have any spare power so I had to run to my neighbors house. I ended up breaking both of their computers. Now they have a laptop that cannot turn on anymore.

Jane's Diary. Jane wanted to write a diary. She got a pen and paper and started to write. When she finished she put the diary away in her room. Jane decided it wasn't that important to write her diary. She decided she didn't need to remember it anymore.

The Basketball Game. Benny was on the basketball team at school. The next day, he played in a big game. His team won and got good seats. When they left, Benny was disappointed. But after the game, Benny's team won!

No More Swimming. The teacher announced that there would be no more swimming at school. The students immediately began to cry. They couldn't understand why they had to stop. They ran into the bathroom and cried harder. The teacher then gave an assignment on bullying.

Luscious. Kelsi really wanted to impress a date. She got out of bed and dressed up in lingerie. She wanted to feel special on a date. Kelsi then waited in line to get her date a bouquet. To her delight she got the date a beautiful rose.

Talking Smack. The baseball team got together for their first meeting. They had several players make new friends. The game was in the top ten and they were going to win it. They had practiced for months. They ended up winning, but they talked smack before the game.

Illness. Sam was not feeling well. His mom took him to the doctor. Sam had to wait a week for the test results. After the doctor had a look at Sam he said he could have an allergy shot. Sam was nervous but took the shot.

The Hat. Ethan had a very expensive hat. He went to a fancy dinner with friends. He tried on all his hats and found a good one. His friends complimented his hat and Ethan was happy. He couldn't wait to wear his fancy hat.
Pilot. Jim loved flying planes. He loved them so much that he flew them all the time. Jim was very good at it. One day, Jim got a great idea. He decided to be a pilot so he could fly the world.
Shopping. I wanted to buy a new dress. I drove to the mall with my mother. We walked all over the mall. My mother picked out the perfect dress. I got the dress and wore it the next day.

Password Woes. Tom got a new phone. He decided to make a password for it. He was never very good with passwords. He thought he would never get past them. Tom did just that and started using the phone again.

Haunted. We were watching some scary movies at the cinema. Suddenly the lights went out. Everyone started crying and freaked out. We had to call the cinema and ask them to switch. Luckily they were able to switch it out.

Sam's Tomato Plant. Sam got a new tomato plant. Sam started watering the tomato plants daily. Sam realized that his tomato plant was healthy. Sam added some water to his tomato plants. Sam saw his tomatoes starting to grow.

The empty theater. Tommy went to see his favorite movie in the theater. The movie was terrible. His girlfriend had to get out of the theater. She then decided to go home instead. Tommy felt so disappointed.

Dandelions. Sue planted some dandelions last summer. She brought them indoors and watered them daily. The next spring, she saw dandelions all over her yard. She did not know they survived that long. Now, Sue has a beautiful collection of dandelion plants.

Purse shopping. Kim was at the mall with some friends. They had been there for two hours and wanted to buy something. Kim found a few nice purses that she liked. Kim then decided to buy all the purses. Kim had a fun time looking at all the purses.

Meg's Field Day. Meg had finally gotten her chance to play catch in the field. Her mom was trying to get her excited so she took her. Meg's friends and family all cheered for her. Afterwards, they went around playing with the balls. Meg was so excited to play catch with her friends again!

The New Car. Jason loves his old car. He always drives it on weekend afternoons. It always gives him a lot of fun. Recently though, his car has stopped working. He bought a new car and he is glad he has one.

Troubled Child. The teacher asked the students to sit down. When a boy asked for a pencil, he fell on the floor. The teacher told the student to go home. The student threw the desk across the classroom. The teacher was very angry.

Making Tea. I decided to make some green tea. I picked out my favorite tea leaves and brewed them. When I added them to water, I felt like my throat was on fire. My husband got angry at me because I was so nervous. Afterward, we both vowed to never make tea without tasting first.

Too loud of a vacuum. Sara's mom was taking her to the park. She was trying to play outside when her vacuum fell. It crashed to the ground and smashed against some bushes. Her mother had to go get a broom to get her. The next day she told Sara to try playing outside again.

Ear Buds. I used to be able to hear sounds with my ear buds. I would sit down and blow them out to hear the sounds. This has changed since I had the ears on. Now I cannot hear the sounds with my ears. My ears were always plugged so I would not know the difference.

The Rookie. Gina had to be the new girl at the school. She was nervous but excited. Gina decided to be patient. In the first day she was greeted with hugs and smiles. Gina was not as nervous as she thought she would be.

My Trip. I took a trip to visit my friend, Bob in Florida. We both drove to Florida to meet up. I stayed in a hotel in Tallahassee. After meeting, we walked to a beach. We both had a great time on our trip.

Sylvia's Change of Opinion. Sylvia had worked as a maid for years. Sylvia had a crush on a man. She got along with him for a while but then he dumped her. She got really depressed and started a new life as an independent woman. After a year she saw that her views had changed.

actor appearance in show. I loved watching movies with my friends when I was little. I loved how they would get to act. So I decided to be a famous actor when I was a teenager. I did some of my best work on the big screen. It was a huge hit and I got to be a star!

The Party. Sara had invited her friends over for a party. They got in their cars and drove to her house. When they arrived, they made pizza. The food and drinks made the whole party special. They left after a long party and returned home.

Setting Up Her Sister. Jane started to teach her sister to fish. She set up the pole and fish tank. Her sister tried to catch a fish. Her sister couldn't get the line out of her mouth. Jane's sister had to go to the dentist.

Prom Pals. Hannah was on a team of friends. Her friend Amy wanted to run a school club. Hannah felt it was time to be the leader of the school club. She set up a meet and greet with the girls to show them how to be leaders. When it was time to elect the new leaders she was the first out.

The Artist. Roxy was an artist. She painted a lot of portraits. She was commissioned to paint one of the school's mascots. The artist worked on it for three months. Then, the day of the parade, she was able to paint it.
The Acorn. Tricia was in her backyard in the woods. She saw an acorn on the ground. She picked it up. It was delicious! Tricia was very happy to have picked up an acorn.
Yo yo. The man went to a taco place. He saw the menu. He ordered a taco. He got his order. The tacos were huge.

Best intentions. Jane was having an argument with her boyfriend. Jane wanted to call and cancel the argument. Jane decided she would try calling. After Jane called, her boyfriend called back. Jane never got the chance to cancel the argument.

The hostage situation. It was late at night, and there was a police station in the city. There were rumors that a police officer was dead. The police station was surrounded by protestors. They were angry at the police and the media for killing the officer. The protestors shot at the police from the balcony of the station.
Crystal Chandelier. I decided to make a chandelier. I bought crystals online. I ordered a crystal chandelier. I put it together. When it was all put together it looked great!

The Wheelchair Death. My grandmother was hospitalized for a stroke in 1993. We lived in her home for the first three weeks. The wheelchair ramp at her house had been repaired years before. In August of 1994, a wheel chair fell on top of her and broke her hip. She died that day, only a few weeks short of her 95th birthday.

The Gift. Briana was going to her prom. She went shopping with her mom and was excited. After the prom she saw a beautiful necklace at the mall. She put it on and wore it out. When she got home she realized she forgot it at home.
Pokemon Go. Jim was playing Pokemon Go on his phone. The game was very addicting. Jim had many adventures. After some time he became sick. Jim was sad he lost his interest in the game.

Past Ghosts. Jill's brother always haunted their basement. Jill begged him to leave but he wouldn't. One day he popped a small hole in the floor. He screamed so loud Jill's mom woke up. When Jill's dad saw the hole he scolded Jill.

Using a Coupon. Tim worked for a construction company. One day they used a coupon. Tim wasn't aware they used it. He was upset when he received a bill for double the price. Tim was grateful he found out.
Gift. Ava received a box of balloons from her cousin. She decided to put them in her hair. She went to her grandma's house. She put her hair in her grandma's braid. Ava looked great in the braid.

PIE. When I was little I always ate pies and cakes. I was eating all of my pies when I started to gain weight. I began to ask questions on the internet about weight gain. I realized that pies had a lot of calories and are not healthy. I stopped eating pie and found out that I did lose weight.

Driving on the highway. I was driving on the highway yesterday. I was about to pass a large truck. I changed lanes and hit a pole. I was not speeding but the truck hit me. I had to pay for the damage.

The Holiday. The Smiths had been expecting a big surprise this holiday season. On Thanksgiving they all went to the mall together. At the mall they met new friends. They shopped all day for all the gifts they wanted. By the end of the day, they were all sad and very thankful.
New Job. I had a new job. I was a carpenter. I was nervous that I would not be liked. My friends all complimented my work ethic. I was glad I made it this far.

Gym Error. Caitlin got a new trainer today. When she tried to use the treadmill today it wouldn't work. Her trainer told her it had a computer error. Caitlin didn't know what to do about it. Instead she walked the treadmill to see if it worked.

Best Friends. Jake was really jealous of Sam's best friend, Sam. He told all of his friends about his feelings. He thought Sam would tell him. His friends all got angry. Sam decided to never tell Jake the secret.

Road Trip. Maggie had been saving money for a trip to the country. She had to make a decision as to whether or not she should go. Finally she decided to check out the nearby lake. She went swimming and then got to the motel. She had a great day and decided to plan her trip now.

The Don Becomes King. Charles had been a King for only a month. He thought he was in the clear, but the people wanted him gone. They began to riot in front of his castle. Charles gave in and caved in to their wishes. His castle was burnt down and the people were angry at him.
Time Capsule. Tom was going on vacation. He ordered a travel time capsule. When he got home he saw that it was damaged. The capsule was empty. Tom had to send a new one.

Starbucks. Lily was at the coffee shop with her mother. She noticed a starbucks sign on the wall. She went into the store to purchase some The worker asked where she was from. Lily replied that she was from a far away land.

The Refund. Jill went on the internet to see what a new product was for sale. While looking through several listings, Jill discovered a great deal. Jill was able to get a brand new laptop for only $30 dollars off. Although Jill was excited, she did not think she would actually buy it. However, the laptop she purchased did not last very long and was eventually junk.

Medal. It was World War II. Harry worked at a munitions factory. He was told he had to get something special for his work. He found out his grandfather had just gotten a medal. Harry got to wear his grandfather's medal.
The Parade. Toby's friend was running a big parade. Toby got to be a part of the parade. At the end, Toby was the best in the parade. He ran home crying. Toby was glad he made it.

Cindy goes out. Cindy was bored one night. She decided she wanted to go out. She called her friends and asked if they would go out with her. They all agreed and Cindy went out with them. She had a great time with her friends.

The Author. Jenny is a writer. She is trying to become a published author. One day, Jenny was contacted by the owner of a successful fantasy site. The owner told Jenny that he had an idea for a book. Jenny is now trying to create her own fantasy book.

Paris. Alex wanted to take his girlfriend to Paris. He saved money so they could take the trip. The trip took three months. His girlfriend loved the trip and they both loved Paris. Now they plan to go again.

Wedding Troubles. Jane wanted to propose to Tom, but was afraid he would reject her. The only problem was she was planning on proposing to Tom's best friend. Jane was nervous about this. She wanted her best friend to be happy. But she knew Tom would be thrilled.

Great date. My best friend invited me out last night. She took me to a restaurant and I had a great time. I had to tell her that I was going to go out. I was embarrassed and she said it was okay. It turned out she was on her way and I left early.

Javier Wears Cleats. Javier wanted to wear his favorite sneakers during practice. He put on his shoes. Javier put his shoes on. He realized that his sneakers weren't on the ground. He ran to the office to see that his shoes were.
Pizza place. Dana was working late. She decided to make some pizza. She got all the ingredients together. But when she got home it was burnt. She realized she should have left the pizza in the oven!

The Bike. Jake went out for a ride one sunny afternoon. The bike he was riding had a flat tire. Jake took his time getting the flat tire fixed. Finally Jake took the bike home. He made it home on his own two feet!

Harry. Harry was a shy kid. He never told anyone how he felt. One day Harry got a letter in the mail from a girl. He opened the letter, and there was a love letter. Harry was overjoyed to hear the love letter and to start dating.

Ruined Vacation. I decided to go on a vacation to Hawaii. I was excited to see the amazing natural beauty of the island. However to my dismay the weather was atrocious. I got so sick I couldn't walk in the house. I never went on a vacation like that again.

Compulsive Liar. Rita lied about being kidnapped. She told her boyfriend to pick her up and return her phone. Rita was arrested for lying to her boyfriend. Rita got out of jail on a technicality. Rita was arrested again and jailed for lying to her boyfriend.

Second Home. Sally went to live in her friend's second home. She found the house to be extremely hot and humid. Her friend recommended an air conditioner. Sally bought a new unit, but had to pay $100 more than recommended. Sally's friend bought her the unit, and the next month the unit was repaired.

Samantha's Flight. Samantha was taking a flight to a new country. She was nervous but knew she had to do it. Samantha got on the plane and sat down. She watched the screen for the first time. Samantha loved the flight!

Bad Pasta. I decided to make some pasta this weekend. I tried a new recipe that was spicy. I didn't expect the food to taste so bad. I ordered a bowl of pasta. It tasted horrible and the food had been spoiled.
Ebay. I sold an original photo on eBay. It had a bid of $4. I got the photo back after bidding $4. The buyer told me that it was a fake. I never got the photo back.

Football game. Tucker and his friends were watching the game. They started to have fun. Tucker and his friends started to argue. Tucker and his friends started to fight. Tucker and his friends were kicked out of the game.
Cat leash. My cat escaped yesterday. She ran into the neighbor's house. She kept jumping on the fence. The neighbors called animal control. Now we have a cat who is confined to our yard.

Stage Props. Mark decided to make his living from selling stage props. He had one show today and wanted to sell his skits. When he was in line at the stand he saw a woman. He decided to let her look at his props first. She immediately liked his stuff and bought it for him.

The Mine. It was an exciting time in the small town of Brown's Pond. It was also an industrial area. Brown was a miner. He spent his days digging in his mine. Brown was happy that he had found the mine.

The Sick Boy. Jeb's mom told him to take care of his sick brother. When Jeb arrived, the sick boy was lying in a puddle. His mother picked him up, but his brother wasn't feeling well. Jeb drove him to a hospital, and then to the doctor's office. The doctor told Jeb that his brother had leukopenia - the early stages of cancer.

The Dress. Jill's mom asked Jill to help her pick out her dress. Jill thought for a minute, then she decided on a pink dress. She and her mom went through the store and bought the dress. Jill wore her dress to school that week. Her mom said that Jill had made the perfect dress!
Charlie. Charlie had a huge crush on Sue. He talked to Sue all the time. But she didn't notice him. So he broke up with her. She was so disappointed in him.

The Dune Buggy. James and his friends were bored. They decided to build their own dune buggy. They bought a dune buggy from a friend. James and his friends decided to play on it all day long. James and his friends spent many hours building their dune buggy.
Beating the Game. I sat down on the couch. I was bored from watching TV all day. I played my video game. It was so frustrating that I finally beat the game. It made me feel much better to finish.

Alphabet. Lucy got her first assignment in the third grade. She had to write an alphabet. She took the first letter of every word and wrote it. Then she added the last two letters. Lucy made the alphabet very difficult for her.
Spilled medication. Linda was sick. She decided to buy some cough medicine. It was a week before she needed it. She got it today. Linda then started feeling better.

Obsessive Sam. Sam always kept his belongings in his room. He would get distracted by thoughts that kept him from sleeping. His parents always told him that it wasn't important. Then one day, he started yelling at his brother for not doing homework. Now, Sam is very anxious and spends more time in his room.

Backyard Tennis. Bob had an intense tennis match to play. He wanted to take it a little easier. He made sure he had a spare racquet so he could play faster. He also bought a new tennis racket. He won the match in record time.
Pool. The kids went to the swimming pool. They played in the water all afternoon. At night, they watched the stars. They got ready for bed. It was a fun day.

Drugs. Dan bought a new motorcycle. He drove the motorcycle down the dirt road. Dan saw a girl walking down the street. He gave her some quarters to play a game. Dan was caught and the police took him to jail.

New Cat. Rosa wanted a new cat. She went to the pet store and saw a cat that she really liked. After talking to the owner, Rosa chose the cat. She took it home and named it Pippin. Rosa was happy with the new cat, and named it Pippin.

Rax. My friend Bob and I went fishing. I took out my reel and put it in the water. I held my line on to my line and began reeling in my fish. It was a very long line but I pulled it in with force. When I was done the fish was gone.

The Book. Natalie loved reading books. One day she found a huge one on sale at a library. She decided to read it all in one sitting. She read and read until her eyes felt like they were going to pop. By the time she finished it she had read it all.
tired. I was tired at my job. I decided to go out with friends. I didn't do a good job at setting my alarm. I woke up late to work. I had to stay in late until the sun came up.

IHOP. My friend Sue and her husband went to the IHOP. They did not eat much. On their way home they stopped for ice cream. Sue said she did not want to go back to the IHOP. They agreed not to go back to that place.
Apartment. The man knocked on the front door. It was his landlord. The man asked for an apartment. The landlord said no. The man felt sad.
A light Jog. Kia was running with her dog. She went up a hill. Then, she went down a hill. Then, she went over a big, steep incline. She came back up the hill and felt much better.

Bingo. Bob wanted to play a new game that is popular on the internet. He decided to join the Bingo site. He was not very good at the game. So he decided to learn a few new phrases. He was able to join the site and play the game.
Surgeon. Bob loved doing surgeries. He was great at them. He also did a lot of people's surgeries. One day his friends asked him to do a person's surgery. He decided to do that instead.

Gym Visit. It was Jenny's first time at the gym. She was scared, but she liked the girls. When she went to the locker room, there was no one there. She realized that they must have gone to the gym earlier. She headed into the gym and saw the gym closed.

Job Interview. Sara had a job interview on Friday. She spent time preparing her resume and speaking with potential employers. At the interview, she tried her best to impress the interviewers. Unfortunately, she was not good at answering any of the questions. Sara had to walk out of the interview disappointed.

Yevgeny gets a flat tire. Yevgeny was driving to school. He pulled over to check on his tire. Yevgeny noticed a flat tire in his car. He called a friend to call the cops. Yevgeny called the cops and reported a flat tire on his way home.

Fancy Dress. Diane wanted to impress her friend. She wanted to look great and wore a fancy dress. She went out with her friends one night. She realized she looked silly in her fancy dress. She had to admit she had no idea what to wear next.
Cheap as dirt. Tim wanted to build a house. He didn't want to hire a professional. He decided to build it himself. He found a plan online. Tim was proud of how easy it was.
Cheater. Joe wasn't paying attention. He tried to make his girlfriend mad. He made a joke. Joe's girlfriend laughed at his joke. Joe broke up with her.

Food Critic. Cindy hates eating fried food. Her boyfriend hates it as well. Last night he ate a lot of fried food. Cindy felt sick for the rest of the day. Cindy decided to give him space until she can eat again.
The Plan. John was at a friend's house. They were having a barbecue. John's friend made a new barbecue sauce. John got stuck in the house with it. It turned out to be delicious!

The New Neighbors. I had a new neighbor that moved into my house. The neighbor was loud and rude. She would sit outside all day and talk to the birds. I was annoyed at the noise. I eventually moved her out.

Birthday. Drake is very excited for his birthday. He is excited because his parents said they would surprise him. The family went out to dinner one night. At the restaurant there was a very tall, handsome man waiting for them. They spent the night together and Drake felt very romantic.

Orange Juice. Dan was trying to drink some orange juice. He poured the juice into a cup and took a sip. He began to choke on his orange juice. Dan was really embarrassed and asked his friend for help. His friend suggested that Dan should try water first.
Fall. Mary decided to play at the park. She ran into a small dog. The dog jumped her. She fell down the park. She was okay but scratched up.

The Old Lady's Boots. When I was four years old, I saw an old lady at the corner. I decided to try to find her and ask her for help. We walked together for three blocks and finally found her. When we found her, she told me that she had no boots. My father went into her house and bought her a pair of boots.

Bookmarks. My friend Sue bought me a new bookmark for my phone. She said I could not use my old one. I thought about it and decided to give it a try. It was great. I decided to buy the bookmark for myself.
What Shade. It was an evening and Jim was sitting at the bar. He ordered a beer. Jim's girlfriend came with him and drank it. Jim looked at his wife. His wife had a funny look on her face.

Feeding Frenzy. The kids loved eating cereal. They would go to the store to buy lots of them. They were excited for a party later that day. At the party, they couldn't stop eating cereal. They got so sick it was at the doctor.
Math pride. I went to a math test after class. My math grade was low. I tried very hard in school. My teacher made me read a lot of texts to help my grade. The next day I saw my grade rise.

Computer Problems. Sara decided to use the computer at her friend's house. When she turned the power on, she saw that it wasn't working. Sara got upset and called her friend's parents. The friends parents made her change the computer's password and put her in. Her parents were very understanding and didn't try to get her out.
The Futon. John loved his new futon. The first day of summer was coming up. He couldn't wait for it to be new! But when he went to move it in it got knocked over. He now had to fix it all over again.

Ghost Sheet. I was working on my car in the garage. I decided to make a sheet out of my sheet metal. I started by hammering the nails into the sheet. I was too lazy to stop and watch what I was doing. The nails stuck into the sheet and I had to rip the sheet.

Cooking Class. Tim was having trouble learning to cook. He decided to enroll in cooking school. He learned a lot of new techniques. By the end of the class Tim was a really good cook. He decided to become a chef.
Ronald's Speech. Ronald was a high school senior. He had been asked to give a speech at his school. He was a very good speaker. His speech went over well. He was asked to give more speeches.

Hot sun. It was the first day of summer and I could not sleep. I spent all night watching the sun come up. By noon, the sun was shining in my room. It was the most beautiful day I ever had. I went outside and had a picnic.

Walking in the woods. Jenna was walking through the woods. She spotted a rabbit and felt hungry. She kept wandering around for a while but saw no food. She came across a large pine tree and got a sandwich from it. Jenna decided to keep going since she liked the scenery.
Movies. I went to a movie with my friends. It was so boring! We didn't have anything to do for hours. We decided to just watch a few cartoons. Now we're watching cartoons together every Friday night.

Cell Phone. I've always wanted a cell phone. I don't have a lot of money so I'm worried I won't be able to buy one. I decided to ask the neighbor for a spare phone he had. He agreed and gave me his cell phone. I am so thankful that neighbor offered to lend me his phone!

Dad's Comet. Sam was sitting in the back seat of his dad's truck when he heard a noise. He jumped out of the seat and looked out the window. He saw a huge ball of green smoke in the sky. His dad got out of the truck and started looking up. He found a huge meteor shower and they were able to watch it together.

Trouble Board Game. John and Steve were at their aunt's house to play Trouble with her. They had been playing for hours. They decided to play Trouble again, but this time Steve brought a board game. The game went on for hours and they both felt very bored. Finally, they agreed it was a better game, so they played it again.

Ring. The woman put her ring on the counter. A man walked in and took the ring. The man threw the ring at the woman. The woman threw the ring back at the man. The man chased the woman for a few blocks.

Puzzle game. Natalie really liked to play a popular puzzle game called Pandemic. She played it all the time. But as she got older she became sick of it. So she put it on a digital disc and forgot about it. That weekend when Natalie heard she had to take medicine for the flu.

Taking my cat to the vet. One day my cat came up with a rash. He didn't want anyone to see. So my mom decided to take him to the vet. It turned out he had an abscess. Luckily it was just a mild infection and it went away.
Healthy. Sue was getting sick to her stomach. She decided to try and eat healthy. She read some healthy eating guides. She did her best and still was sick. Sue decided to go to the doctor.

Power House. Gina decided to do a yard sale to sell some items to the thrift store. She made a sign that said to sell to the power house. Gina's neighbor came by to help her clean up the yard. The neighbor found a box of old comic books. He gave Gina the books for $10.

New Job, Old Fear. Juan wanted to start a new business. But, his wife had recently gotten a new job. Juan worried that if his wife left him, he would lose his business. He went to a friend's birthday party to help his wife make new friends. Juan and his new friend had a great time at the party.

New Jersey. Joe had just moved to New Jersey from Pennsylvania. He had not had time to visit the Jersey Shore. The next day he got a phone call. The radio station was playing a special live broadcast. Joe was able to catch the beach and have fun.

The Peace Corps Beckons Again. Lina wanted to take up a new career. She wanted to volunteer overseas. She applied for the Peace Corps. After she heard back from them, she felt very happy. Now Lina is working as a volunteer overseas as a Peace Corps volunteer.

Money. Bill had a very large paycheck that he spent all day on his computer. He didn't even feel like he was doing his job at all. Bill's boss was unhappy with him. Bill decided to stop working online for money. He quit his job.

Smell. Sue got a new pet turtle. Her pet turtle began to make a bad smell. Sue bought an expensive scent and gave her the new scent. The smell went away quickly. Sue continued to keep her new pet turtle.

Infestation. Tim lived in a home with a bunch of rats. He never paid much attention to them. One day, a rat got loose from the home and started breeding. Tim was devastated to see his home lose its rats. Now the rats are all over his town.

The Walk. One afternoon, my wife and I walked to the zoo. At the zoo, we saw a lion on the ice and felt awe. We spent the next few hours looking at the lion. We went home with a new appreciation for nature. We were glad that we had taken a walk that day.

Cheater Cheater. Nancy was at school when a group of kids started a fight. One of the boys came to see what was happening and he saw a woman. He told the bully to stop it. However, he started to beat up the woman and she got injured. The bully was arrested and expelled from the school.
First Day of School. Gina was going to begin Kindergarten. She was nervous about starting school. She walked out into the school. She found a place to sit. And her mom took her to the teacher's desk.

Jasmine gets her car stolen. Jasmine has a dream of buying a new car. Jasmine decides she needs to buy a car to start her dream. She goes to the dealership and buys a new car. She loves her new car. Jasmine has fulfilled her dream of buying a new car.

Being Missed. Dan's class took a field trip to the zoo. They had to walk in an unfamiliar area. When Dan realized he was not familiar with the area he looked around. Everyone was following the same trail that led him to the zoo. Dan got lost because he was still looking for the correct path.

Martha's Reward. Martha never wanted to pay her rent. She wanted to take a vacation. She decided to take a vacation in her spare time. When she got back, she paid her rent. Martha was so thankful for the free vacation.

Stress reliever. Sally decided she needed to get a stress reliever. She read the list of some and she picked some. She took one and it worked. The next day it was not working. Sally realized it was too much and she gave it back.

Fool's gold. Timmy loved to play tricks. He would put his gold necklace on his head. Then, he'd fake to get the teacher's attention. The teacher would then ask if Timmy wanted to play. Timmy ran away, as the gold necklace made him look like a fool.
Waiting. Tom wanted to buy a car. He needed a new car soon. He found an old truck. It had been in the shop for a few months. Tom bought the truck and now was waiting.

The Girl. Kelsi liked to dress up in costumes. When her dad bought her her first doll costume she fell in love. She decided to wear the doll every single day. Her dad laughed when she showed him. Kelsi was so proud to be wearing the doll.

expensive troubles. Bill and his girlfriend are married. They have a lot of trouble making ends meet. One day they had to come home from work. Their car was broken into. Bill and his girlfriend ended up paying a lot more than they had to.
The Art Thief. Tom's friend was stealing pieces of art. They weren't selling. Tom decided to stop him. The friend decided to take them anyway. Tom was so mad he decided to sue him.
Dental work. Dana was not happy with her teeth. She decided to go to a dentist. She went to the dentist. Her teeth were looked at and filled. Dana felt a lot better after that.

Sign Language. Ronda was learning sign language. She was at a bar that was trying to teach sign language to the locals. Ronda wasn't getting it. She started to try and communicate without sign language. By the end, she was getting better at it.

Pregnant again. Shelley had been on birth control her whole life. She had tried to get pregnant for six years, and had failed. She decided to give birth naturally and try again. The doctors called her immediately and she was rushed to the hospital. There, she gave birth to a healthy baby boy and was so relieved!
Kate. Kate liked to go to the bar. She was at the bar with her friends on Saturday. They wanted to go to the bar on a date. But Kate did not have enough money. She went home.

First Day of School. Yesterday was the first day of school for my little sister. When she got out of school, I told her I wanted to go with her. She said it was okay, she would like to play. I told her that she is not ready yet to be in a band. She said she would be ready on Saturday.
It was his call. Ben had a favorite band. He listened to the music every day. His band had some rough times. They did well at the local shows. It was Ben's call to move on.
Blind Date. My friend and I are dating. I saw a picture of her on FB. I told my friend that the picture looked like her. She went to the mall and met her. They went to dinner and watched a movie.
Paying off credit card. Tim was in debt. He needed to pay his credit card debt. He decided to cut his expenses. He cut down his food intake. He finally paid off his credit card.
New Phone. Today I got a new phone. I had heard the price was very high. The phone is not very fast. It turns out I am getting a great phone. I decided to buy another one.

Fast Food Party. My friend Joe and I wanted to have a fast food party. We ordered Chinese food at a drive thru. After about an hour in line, the worker called for food. The food was delivered to our car with 20 minutes left. We drove home as fast as possible.
Out of Hot Water. Tom was cooking in the kitchen. The water went out. Tom wasn't able to turn it back on. He waited for the water to run. He eventually got it going again.

Belly. Elliott had a terrible stomach ache. He had a long walk to the store. At the store, he found out his belly button was really out. He told his mom and dad he needed to get some surgery. Elliott was told he needed to have surgery on his belly button.

Late Night Swimming. Diane wanted to take a swim in the pool. Her parents told her not to swim. She took a deep breath and swam anyway. She jumped into the water and screamed. It was the most fun she had all day!
Big Moose. A man was walking around in Montana. There were big moose in the woods. He tried to run away but was caught. He was shocked. The moose attacked him.
He Returns. Sandy was feeling lonely after her divorce. She looked online for a job. She finally found a good one. Sandy decided to interview. She got the job!
Snow Day. It snowed hard today. My family and I wanted to play. We packed all of our snow gear. We drove to a big park in Cambridge. The park was covered in snow.

The Great Coach. Charles made a lot of money as a professional basketball player. His coach thought he was the best player on the team. Charles practiced all of his shots day in and day out. But Charles didn't know how to play the game. After failing many times, Charles's coach fired him.

Laughing At Good Price. Tom bought a new video game at a big-box store. Tom had a good time at first. He was laughing a lot more than he should have been. Eventually, Tom got tired of laughing at the prices. He went home and forgot about the video game.

Jenny. Jenny was born a happy baby girl, but she grew up very sad. Every day, she would cry for hours. Her parents tried everything to calm her, but it didn't help. Finally, they took her to see a therapist. It was a hard process, but she finally started to feel better!

Musician Signs Himself. Joe decided he would be a great musician. He practiced his guitar everyday. He practiced very hard. When he got the opportunity to sing in a talent show, Joe accepted. Joe was glad that he had practiced hard.
The World Series. Tom wanted to have a baseball game. It was in New York. He bought a ticket and paid a small fortune for the game. Tom's team won the series. Tom was ecstatic.

Hopscotch. Timmy loved to play hopscotch. He would bet money on every single level. The money he lost was almost as much as he won. Eventually Timmy's parents told him he couldn't play hopscotch anymore. Timmy was sad he couldn't play hopscotch anymore.
Dax's Decisions. Dax felt guilty for what he did. He decided to clean up his life. He stopped drinking. He also lost the privileges to the bar. Dax felt a lot better about his life.

A Trip to the Store. The Smith's were going to the store to buy some items. After purchasing the items, they went to the checkout. The Smith's got their change and some gas. They drove to the store to pick up their purchases. The Smith's went home and watched TV.

Bill's Big Break. Bill wanted to get into the video game business. He decided to try to make his own game. Bill spent a few months developing the game and wrote all the code. He submitted the game to a publisher. Bill was told the game was rejected, so he got a job at McDonald's.
Phone case. Tim lost his phone. He decided to buy a new case. He tried to keep the phone safe. Unfortunately he lost it. He had to buy a new phone.
Quentin Tastes Cheese. Quentin was feeling hungry. He decided to get a snack. Quentin picked up a bag of chips. He ate them without chewing. Quentin was able to enjoy his snack.
Kitchen. The girl was eating food. She spilled it all over the floor. Her parents got her a new floor mat. They were so proud. She thanked them.

Mary's Flower Basket. Mary loved to plant flowers in the spring. One day her neighbor came to complain about the flowers. She offered Mary a small amount of money to plant the flowers elsewhere. Mary refused the offer. Mary got more flowers from her neighbor.
Tennis. I took a tennis class last week. It was so much fun. My serve was getting better. I had a very good match. I'll continue to take more classes.

Kids in a Pool. A family was playing on the beach. They decided to swim in the pool. As they were about to jump into the water the dad saw his wife. The woman was sitting on a bench. The couple tried to swim out of the pool but couldn't.

Buying Water. Ava was out swimming. But she had nowhere to go. So she decided to fill up a jug with water from the stream. She carried the jug to her house and filled it with water. Ava was happy to not have to walk to the stream anymore.

First Credit Card. Jill always bought snacks and soda from the cash register. But one day, she had to get money for her student loans. She had no money in her checking account. So she decided to apply for a credit card. When she did, she was approved for a very valuable credit card.

Inventor. Tim's dad was a science teacher at his elementary school. Tim was always inspired by his teacher. One day he decided to learn how to create his own inventions. Tim's dad was proud of Tim's work. Tim felt proud of his dad as well.

Rude Joe. Joes boss always asked him to clean his room. Joe told him no and went to work anyway. When Joe came home, Joe's boss asked him for the room. Joe was disappointed that his boss wouldn't clean his room. Joe went to his boss and asked for the room back.
Arm Wrestling. Eli was very tall. He was always afraid of arm wrestling. This summer he challenged his friend Tom to arm wrestle. They both put their arms up. Tom was the champion, but Eli felt good.

Job Promotion. Sally applied for a job at a local school. She was nervous when she got the email inviting her for an interview. Sally got on the bus for the interview. Sally got a phone call asking her to come in for an interview. Sally walked in for her interview and got the job as the new principal.

Noise Complaint. John heard a noise in his room one night. He had a loud dog that always woke him up. He checked the alarm clock. There was no noise. John took out the alarm clock and the noise stopped.
The Drunk. Tom had a big party. A few people got drunk. It turned really wild and Tom got scared. He left immediately. The party didn't go so well for him.

Doug has a problem. Doug is working on a large project at work. He starts to make some progress, but it takes a long time. He is getting really frustrated. After a while, he tells his boss that he needs some help. Doug gets a second job that he loves.
School. Gus went to high school. It was his first year. He had so much trouble. Gus had trouble passing his classes. Gus was never able to graduate high school.
The White Dog. One day Jane's dog was sick. The dog wouldn't eat. She went to the vet. The vet told Jane she had a virus. Jane's dog was cured by her dog vomiting up all the virus.

The Reporter. John worked as a reporter. John wanted to become a political reporter. He was hired by a political campaign. John worked very hard to become a great political reporter. John was proud to be the best political reporter.

Too much. I tried to buy a bottle of red wine today. When I tried to open it, it had a sticker on the side. I was about to complain when I realized it wasn't a sticker. I picked up the wine and went inside. When I got home, the sticker was on the top of the bottle.
Elms College. Tom wanted to go to a college. He applied to many places. He was rejected by every one of them. Tom applied to Elms College. He got accepted the next day.

The one that perseveres. Jenny wanted to go to the beach. She made sure to get good sunscreen so she could enjoy the beach. On the way there, Jenny spilled soda on her feet. She picked up the soda, and quickly put it in her bag. She made sure not to get any more on the way out.
The Fruit Juice. The couple was on a picnic. They picked up an apple and juice. They sat down and enjoyed their snacks. They drank their juice and chatted with each other. They were happy that day.
The Wild Cat. The kids were playing outside. A wild cat jumped onto their yard. The kids chased it down and scared it. The mom took the cat away. The kids were sad but happy the cat was safe.

Rude Awakening. Jim had just arrived at a new apartment. He got settled in the apartment and settled in the bathroom. All of a sudden the doorbell rang and Jim answered it. There was someone who was clearly drunk but Jim didn't know them. Jim asked the man where he was and the man ran away.

Caterpillar Panic. Bob saw a caterpillar on his porch. He tried to swat it away from the house. The caterpillar quickly hopped across the porch. Bob tried to move quickly away. However, the caterpillar jumped onto Bob's back.

Gross Mold. Rita was playing on her beach patio. She was splashing around in the cool water. Suddenly, her feet got covered in green mold. Rita started to complain to her parents about the moldy water. Her parents took her to the doctors who said it was safe.
Monument. The family went on a vacation. They went to the beach. When they got home they dug a big hole. They put a monument on top. Everyone got to have fun at the beach.

The Tire Machine. The family was on vacation. They stopped at a restaurant to eat and drink. When they were done, they took their car out of the trunk. They plugged the tires into the machine. It took a minute, but it finished.
The extra cookies. Eli was in the store. He got some cookies and wanted to buy more. He decided to go to the candy counter. When he got there he found out they had extra. Eli decided to eat them all.

Shoes. Kate bought new shoes. She liked the shoes, but they weren't comfortable. She tried them on, but it was so uncomfortable she couldn't wear them. She had to return them. Kate wished she had just bought some old shoes she liked.
monster. Sammy had a horrible, hairy friend. Her name was Kia. Sammy would sneak into her house at night. One day, Kia woke up and said she was afraid of Sammy. Sammy had to give her up.
Ray. Ray was an overweight man. He had a bad case of eating disorders. Ray's doctor put him on the drug Zoloft. Soon Ray lost 10 pounds. Ray was happy to be on the right track.
Music man. Bobby needed money. So he tried to become a musician. Eventually he made a recording contract. But he couldn't play his guitar. So he quit and went back to being a waiter.
Lost. Tom was walking with his friends. They lost a friend. They asked for help. Tom was the first to help. They got help soon after.

The Bird. Sandra walked home from work one day. She saw a bird flying across the sky. Sandra wanted to capture the bird to put in a display. She watched the bird for several minutes. When she finally decided to move the bird, she was disappointed.

Bird Friends. One day, Bill was playing catch with his dad. His dad had caught a bluebird that flew right into the house. Bill's dad explained to him that he could not play catch in his house. Bill was upset at his dad. Now, Bill's dad has to put him in a bird house.

Playing by the Pool. Dana loved playing by the pool. She got too good and her friends weren't happy. They got a sign that said she could no longer play. Dana thought about the sign and then she felt guilty. The next day, she apologized and she felt better about herself.

Max Cooks an Omelette. Max was excited to cook an omelette for dinner. He had never cooked a meal that small before. He made the omelette and put it on the table. His brother Max noticed he left the cheese in the pan and tried to eat it. He accidentally broke Max's Omelette and Max was mad.

Breakfast. Kelley had been up all night studying. She was now too tired to do her job at work. She was having trouble sleeping so she decided to make some breakfast. She woke up early and rushed out to the kitchen. She made a big pot of eggs, sausage and toast.

Peanut. Mia was allergic to peanuts. She had a big meeting with a high profile investor and she had to go. Mia went to the airport and got her bag ready. She was in her hotel room when her phone rang. Someone had called saying they had a plane full of peanuts and she was safe.

Dan loses a bet. Dan had a bet on a football game. Dan thought he was better than everyone in the arena. Dan was winning by a large margin. At the end of the game he bet the money he had. Dan lost and the audience booed.

Erica Trips. Erica is walking in the park. She notices a dog barking. She tries to pick up the dog by moving slowly. A stranger notices and calls 911. The police arrive and bring the dog back to the park.

Casual Friday. Jim has a lot of friends at work. His friend Kevin had a party today. The party was for casual Fridays. Jim was at a club with a bunch of friends. He missed the party because he was in bed.

Too many favors. I worked for a very famous magician in New York. I was his assistant for many years. One day, he told me that he needed my help. I was very interested and wanted to help. Unfortunately, the magician didn't return my calls for a month.
Snoring. Ben was working out. He kept snoring to himself. Ben complained to his friend about his snoring. His friend offered to listen to Ben snore. Ben could not stop snoring in his sleep.

Gold Digger. Gary was always a big fan of football. He was in high school when he decided to become a professional player. While at his first professional tryout, he was passed by two competitors. Gary's coaches were very impressed with his work ethic and speed. Gary was invited to the team's first game, and his persistence paid off.

Poisonous Mushroom. Sam had never tried any mushrooms. He thought they were all gross. He did not know about any that he should try. Sam's friend gave him a nice sample. Sam realized he had been wrong about mushrooms.

Cupcakes. Linda's grandmother had just died. The family celebrated the memory with a cake. The cake was covered in fondant, a special candy. When the family got home, they decorated the cake. It was a beautiful remembrance.

He Wasn't Much of A Fan. Jodie had always had an insatiable desire to meet Bill. He'd always been a big fan of her, despite his awkwardness around her. He'd only ever said that he wanted to meet her. Jodie had no idea he wasn't much of a fan. He went to see her at the mall, and was very awkward.
Lessons. Irene loved to dance and sing. She decided to take some dance and singing lessons. She tried out for the team. She got the lead position. Now, Irene is one of the team leaders!

Uncontrollable. Joe's friend bought some beer for him at a party. Joe was not a very good beer drinker. The next morning, he realized he had drunk too much. He could not go back to the party. Joe was never able to drink at that party again.
What color. It was Christmas morning. Kate looked out her window. Her son was coloring. She saw that his Santa was blue. Kate thought he was just being silly.
Shelly's Lunch. Shelly got a bad stomach ache. She had to take a sick day. Shelly couldn't eat at school. She got out her lunch. Shelly was happy to eat and have a good day.

Visit to the Doctor. Lily was a big fan of the Doctor Who show. She went to the doctor because she thought it was important. When she got there she learned it wasn't very important. The doctor told her she had cancer. Lily now has a scar on her chest.

4K TV. We recently purchased a new 4K TV for our living room. The picture quality was impressive. We loved the extra crisp images it gave us. I noticed that my friends were also having a good time with their new TV. It was a great product that made our living room feel more intimate.
Jerky. Tom wanted to get some jerky. He went to the local pet store. Tom bought some jerky. Tom went home and set up his grill. Tom was very happy with the jerky.

New Friends. John and Kim had been friends since kindergarten. When their mother died, they both decided to move out of her house. John and Kim got a room on their own at a dorm. They made a good decision and became best friends. When John's mom died, Kim became sad.

Anything for Pizza. My wife's boyfriend's dad got very sick. He had a stroke and was in a coma. He told me he had been going out of town to buy a car. I bought pizza and delivered it. He thanked me and said that he was still welcome at our house.

Unemployed. I was out of work for four years. So naturally, I got a job on the side. But I got no offers and my bills were piling up. The bills went up so high that I could barely pay them. So I was forced to look for a new job.

Major Switch. Drew took over the principal's office. He decided to teach all of the students how to do the math. Drew decided to put a computer in the office and started an email program. Drew had his assistant students copy the program to the computer. Drew was proud of his work.
No Free Money. Mike had lost his job. He had to get a part time job. He was desperate but didn't want to be late. He decided to steal from a local convenience store. He wasn't caught but was fired.

The Upset DJ. John was playing music in his apartment. His roommate, a DJ, was annoyed by this. He put all of the music on the couch in front of him. John sat on the couch while the DJ played his music. He was so annoyed that he told the DJ to leave.
Check on it. Bill woke up feeling bad. He did not feel like playing video games. Bill called his mom to check on it. She gave him a bottle of ibuprofen to take. Bill felt better after taking it.
Butch Awakens. There was a tornado that hit Butch's town. He lost everything. Butch still had his house. Butch had nothing left to sell. He sold his house in order to live in a tent.

Binge Watching. Kim was tired of television. So she decided to pick up a show online. She waited until it was on Netflix. Then she binge watched the entire season. It was good, but Kim knew she would have to work harder.
Lion. Bill was walking through the zoo. He saw a lion. He tried to run toward the lion. The lion turned around and looked at him. Bill then remembered he wasn't allowed to go near the lion.

Mopping the Floor. Kia was sweeping the floor one afternoon. She had just finished the first few steps and was going to sweep the last few. She felt a small puddle on the floor before she got to work. Kia quickly pulled the rug rug off of the floor. She then mopped up the wet spot with a rag.
Cooking. Lisa wanted to make some chili. She made a big pot of the chili. She added everything to the pot. She got some nice chili on the table. She ate it and then called for a refill.
Fired. The man asked his boss to fire him. The boss refused. The man went into a fit of rage. He then began to physically assault the boss. The boss fired him after that.

Hotel Lobby. Tom was a hotel guest. Tom stayed at a hotel that had a bad reputation. One day, he was invited to the front desk lobby. The front desk clerk had a cigarette in her mouth. Tom took her out and told the clerk that was gross.

Boot Camp. The new school year started soon. They needed to start a school project. They wrote a report about the hardships of refugees. They gave a presentation to the whole class. Everyone liked the report and started their new school year.

Pantsuits are great for work. I've been struggling to make a decent career out of my life. Pantsuits make me feel like I have a purpose in my life. A lot of my friends say that I should be running around naked. So, I try on one and find it very uncomfortable. I'm hoping that my pantsuit will somehow help me fit in with my friends.

Hurting my mouth. My mouth was bleeding from crying yesterday. It wasn't hurting much though. When I went to get my toothbrushes out I dropped them. My tongue got stuck in my mouth. It hurt so bad that I had to throw up.

Diapers. Sarah was a good housekeeper, so she didn't have a problem. She washed and folded every day. She was on a strict budget and rarely went out. Then her boss decided to let her go. Sarah felt sad, but she loved her job.

The Perfect Couch. Amy and her friends wanted to make a couch for a party. They all had a different color and design. They started working on it together. They decided on a black and white couch. They were happy with the outcome.
Lunch box. Kurt wanted to make some snacks for his daughter. He didn't have a lunch box. He looked for one. He couldn't find one. He decided to make his own.

Midnight mass. One night, I decided to celebrate mass. My mother did not go with me. My siblings and I went to midnight mass. It was fun and educational. I wish my mother would go with me every night.

Broken Heart. Joe was going out of town on a date. He had plans to meet her at a nice restaurant. Joe's date was really nice to him but was really rude. Joe decided to cancel his plans at the last minute. Joe was so disappointed that he lost his date.
Teaching French. John was a great French teacher. His students loved his class. John didn't take many vacations. He had to work hard to teach. John retired early.

The Dance. Lucy was nervous for the dance. Her mom had promised her a dance at the first ball. She was going to have to be brave and do something she didn't like. But she decided that it wasn't that bad. In the end, Lucy had a great time at the dance.
Mean women. I went to my high school swim meet. We had a race to see who was faster. I had a great swim. I won the race. The women in the race didn't like me.
The purse. The man found a purse in the street. He took it into his home. There was a note on the purse. It told him not to run. The man ran away.

The Easter Present. When he was little, Steve was sad. He never got his first Nintendo. One day his father brought him a Nintendo. They spent a day playing games together. Now, Steve doesn't feel bad about how sad he was.

Love Song. Ethan and his friends were in the audience. The song that was playing was called Love Song. The boys thought it was too loud. They asked their dad to turn it down. His dad turned it down and they enjoyed the show.

Eyeglass Debacle. Jane was a very fashion conscious young woman. She was shopping with her mom when she got her first pair of glasses. Jane was so excited to get her first pair of glasses. All the sudden she fell off of her cart and broke her glasses. Jane was very upset about her broken glasses.

Cold Sore. Sue's stomach ached all day. She could hardly breathe. She decided to visit the emergency room. They gave her medicine to make her feel better. Sue was happy to be relieved of her discomfort.

Headed to France. Dan was excited about a trip he was planning. He had always wanted to visit France. He had heard wonderful things about it. Dan checked out his options and decided to take one. He booked his tickets for the first leg of his trip and had a great time.

Pain in the Back. One day I was sitting in a car with my friend. We were doing lots of work on the vehicle. We started to feel pain in the back. I asked my friend what was wrong. We drove to the doctor and got some shots.
Mild Food. Jim was at a restaurant eating alone. But he noticed a girl talking to him. She looked like he recognized her. She seemed nice, and Jim got to know her. They eventually became friends.

Seeing an Ex. One day, Mike got to the corner store and saw a pretty girl. Mike ran up to her and asked her name. She gave him a name and a number to call her. After the girls left, Mike felt more relaxed. Mike was glad to have seen an attractive girl.

Joan. Joan worked at the restaurant that served her favorite food. As Joan worked the kitchen, she would receive a large tip from the manager. When Joan left the kitchen, the manager decided to give the money to her. Joan was disappointed that the manager didn't follow up. Joan was angry that the manager would make a generous donation without checking in.

Keyboard. When I was a child, I hated my teacher. I sat down on her lap and pulled her hair. She didn't stop until I got up and she was mad. I was never allowed to sit down on that desk again. When I went back to school, I switched to the new desk.

Baking Hand Pies. Lara's parents had told her she could not have sweets for christmas. She had no idea what to make for the holidays. Then she thought of a great way to get kids excited about baking. She decided to surprise them with a box of hand pies. The pies were great, but they had to wait until the next christmas to eat!

The wrong cake. The girls were getting ready to make cake. They both had their cake pans ready. Then the mix-up happened. It turned out they had bought the wrong cake. The girls quickly switched and got their cake.

A New Pet. Cindy was very happy when her mother told her to go and get a new pet. The new pet was a labrador retriever. Cindy was happy and curious about the new dog. When her mom wasn't looking, the dog bit her on the ankle. Cindy's mom grounded her for 2 weeks for fighting the dog.

School for the Blind. Bob and his son were on a road trip. Bob's son couldn't see at all and Bob didn't know how to help. He asked a blind person for help so Bob called them up. His son then asked for help and a man helped Bob's son. He was glad to hear it and it made his son happy.

Mom's Cookies. When I was five years old, my mother made cookies. She said it would be the first day they were homemade. I opened the box with excitement. The cookies were delicious and very moist. I told my mom it would be the best cookies.

From New to Broken. Dan was driving down the highway one night. All of a sudden he hit a big rock. He looked down to see his wheels were off the ground. The rock was embedded in the wheel hub! Dan had to go to the repair shop to get his wheel fixed.

A cat. There was a girl named Julie. She was the sweetest cat around. Her favorite thing was her little pink collar. One day a man came into her house. He was looking for the collar and Julie ran away.

Unorthodox Choice. I went to visit my mother in Michigan. We both saw our aunt and uncle who live out of state. The uncle lived in Chicago. The aunt was from Buffalo, NY. The uncle and aunt are now divorced.

The Story. The family was walking to their hotel in a foggy fog. They walked through a dark forest and heard a rustling. They were startled by a sound that sounded like a bear. It was a raccoon trying to get at their food. The family ran back to their car and didn't go in the forest again.

Kind Words. The other day I was walking and I met a homeless man. He gave me some warm words and I felt a lot better. It reminded me of what good things people can do. I'm going to do the same. Hopefully I'll be able to give back to those in need someday.

Barefoot. I was doing something strenuous with my bare feet. But I could not find a pair of shoes that fit me right. I asked a friend for advice, but he told me that shoes were too tight. I went out and bought a pair of sandals and decided to give it a try. My friends gave me mixed reviews on them, but I found them comfortable.
Never too late. John was feeling very late. He decided to look up the time. Unfortunately the clock wasn't working. He went to the library. John finally found out the time.
Tree. The family went to the yard. The tree had some branches missing. They took the branches to a sawyer. The tree was cut down. The family went home happily.
Teacher Leaves. Tom was in grade school. His teacher got sick. Tom decided to take the day off from school. When Tom was back he was very bored. He decided to stay home and watch TV.

Strike. The manager told his workers they would not be working during the lunch hour. Several of his employees went out and bought sandwiches. They put the workers to work early. They were very busy that day. The next day the boss told them to stay on the premises.
Swan. Ned liked to sail. He took his dad's boat out on the lake. He was out on a sailboat for a long time. Ned lost his sense of direction and his boat got a flat. Ned's dad grounded him for a week.
Cat Food. I recently ordered my cat a new diet. The cat hated the new food, though. He refused to eat it at all. My wife had to throw it away. Luckily, he went to the vet and got the diet fixed.
Tired workout. Sam was at the gym. He started working out. However it was really tiring. Sam got tired. He could not finish.

Driving after my stroke. I was driving around after my stroke. I noticed there were people walking all over the street. I stopped at the intersection. I saw a man with a cane walking across the street. I then asked him if I could cross the street.

Halloween on the street. Dan and his friends were on their way to a Halloween party. They stopped by a corner store and grabbed some snacks. When they got to the party, it was very busy and crazy. Everyone seemed to be having fun. Dan and his friends ended up staying longer and staying late.
Birthday Cake. It was Tina's first birthday. Her parents surprised her with a cake. She was sad and disappointed. Tina loved the cake and ate half of it. She had a great birthday.
The Tree. Sam was tired of the wind and rain. So he put up a tree to block the wind. The tree worked. He thought it would last a few weeks. It grew to be over a hundred feet tall.
The cook off. Gina wanted to cook for her family. Her mother was making spaghetti sauce. They all gathered around to taste. In the end Gina was the best. She was happy to win.
Wedding Day. Molly was getting married. She and her husband had a lovely wedding. Unfortunately, there was an issue with her veil. She had to put it on at the last minute. Molly cried for days.
The Big Test. Tom took his son to the library. His son had to study for a math test. Tom decided to give his son a cheat sheet. The cheat sheet did not work. His son was upset and complained.
Banging Noise. There was a loud bang. The noise scared me. My husband told me to put on the ear plugs. I listened to it later. The noise was not in my ear.
Freshly baked rolls. Sara made a batch of rolls. She wanted to make them to go. She had no butter. Sara went to the store to buy more. She decided to use butter instead of margarine.
Zoo. I was feeling very bored. I decided to go to the zoo. There were lots of animals there. I really enjoyed seeing them. I am excited to go back again.
The present. Today was a big day. Amber's parents were having a housewarming party. She would get to go with her friends. Amber was really excited. The best part was that she got to bring a present!

Wrong Change. Dan was waiting for his check at the bank. While he was waiting, Dan's car's alarm went off. Dan was embarrassed when the alarm was set off. He got out of the bank. Dan walked down the street until he found the change.
Bad Back. Ben had a lot of back pain. His doctor gave him some bad news. His back was a lot worse than he thought. He could hardly stand up anymore. He eventually had to go back to a regular doctor.

Guys. My friend and I were watching the Olympics on television. We were watching the Olympics on our cable box. We could not see the Olympics from our couch. We asked our parents if they could watch from their living room. They said they would do so if they could see the Olympics in the living room.

New York. The Smiths loved to go to New York City. They decided to take a trip together this year. They spent weeks researching and planning. On the day of their trip they decided on a great hotel. They were so glad they took this trip.

Shareholder. The Smiths had a large stock in a company. They were disappointed when they found out a large portion of the stock went to another company. They felt that was unfair. The Smiths voted against the new stock. It helped their stake in the company decline.

Family Photos. It was time to hang the family photos from the attic. They were going to hang them on the living room wall. They had to get a ladder to hang them there. The ladder was too tall and they couldn't reach the wall. The photos had to be hung on the front door instead.

Too Fast. Juan bought the book. He read it in about 30 minutes. When he got to the end he started to cry. He decided to read the last chapter to the end. He read until he was exhausted and then stopped.
Bad Pie. Diana baked her very first pie. The dough was soft and chewy. Diana let it cool. She tried to eat it but it was too tough. She had to throw it out.

Plumbing Problems. Sam got new plumbing installed in his basement. He realized he needed to add a second drain. He called the contractor. The man explained that he would have to run an extension. Sam was disappointed with the service.

Missing. It was a nice fall day at school. All of the kids were outside playing in the park. As soon as one of them got tired of running he walked to his car. He drove home before he went outside to play. When he got home everyone started running around in the park.

First Day of School. Samantha just moved to a new city. She has to start her first day of school. She is very nervous about this first day of school. At first, she does not know anything. After 3 days, she has a lot of new friends.

A Bad Movie. Dawn wanted to be a movie star. She knew her mom had bad taste in movies. Dawn asked her mom if she could star in a bad movie. Dawn's mom said she would give her the parts she needed. Dawn loved it and had a very successful movie career.
Double Rainbow. Amber was in class. Suddenly, she spotted a bright, beautiful rainbow. She didn't know what to do or where to look. Amber turned around. It was a beautiful double rainbow!

Jesus the great. When I was in elementary school, my friends and I would play the game of football. Our favorite players were all from different religious backgrounds. One day, we were all really excited when our local team was good. As we watched, our team was scoring a lot of points and the other team was losing. The other team had been winning in the game, but we ended up winning!

Violin. Shelly had always wanted to learn to play the violin. Shelly bought a violin at her local pawn shop. After a couple months of practice, she was excited. After a few months, Shelly began to want to take lessons. Shelly started to take lessons and was very happy with her progress.

Distraction. Dan was doing the dishes. He started working on his computer while he did. The dog jumped onto the keyboard and knocked it over. Dan's computer stopped working. He had to clean it himself.

Registering to vote. Tom's parents wanted him to register to vote. Tom was reluctant at first. He tried to hide his vote from them. His parents kept trying to talk him into it. Eventually he reluctantly signed up.
Lemonade Stand. I had a lemonade stand one day. I sold a lot of lemonade. I made some really good money from it. I put all of the money into my bank account. I'm now very wealthy.

Saturday Cartoons. Kelsi and her friends were watching cartoons. They decided to watch a new cartoon. The cartoon showed a dog chasing after a cat. It was so much fun to watch. Kelsi and her friends decided to watch more cartoons.

Dinner Proposal. My friend and I went to a fancy restaurant. While we were there, we talked for a bit. He gave me a great look and asked me to dinner. I declined because I had work to do. We didn't see each other again for about a week.
Sushi Roll Prices. Jane wanted to make sushi rolls at home. She got the ingredients together. She also bought all the needed sauces. She made them and tasted them. They were very tasty and cheap.
Henry gets caught. Henry is at a pool party. He is drinking a lot of beer. He is also drunk. Suddenly someone yells at him for not listening. Henry loses his cool and beats up the person.
New Beds. I got a new boudoir set for my wife. She was quite happy with it. The set cost $100. However, the set was delivered broken. I decided I would exchange it for something that would last.
Bra. Lucy wanted a new bra. But she only had one of each size. She went to the mall to get one. She found a good one, but it was too small. Lucy had to return it to the mall.

Vacation. I went to the beach with my cousins last weekend. We went on a rafting trip and ate lots of seafood. I saw dolphins and sea lions. We also went swimming. The water was warm, but the sun was very bright.

The bug bite. Kelly was trying to eat out. She decided to order something chicken. The waitress brought out a huge stack of wings. After they were placed on a plate, Kelly bit down. She bit into a nasty bug.

The Cleaning Lady. Manny was cleaning out his closet. He was surprised to see a picture of a model in his closet. He wondered if it was from his childhood. He had forgotten about it. Luckily, he found a reference for it in his childhood photos.

Lost Book. Jake left his book on his desk one morning. He had to run to the bathroom to clean it up. Jake didn't have his wallet or phone. He realized his book was missing from his desk. Jake called the library to see if they'd lost it.
Bonfire. Tim invited his friends over. Tim brought out a bunch of firewood. They started a small fire. They roasted marshmallows over it. They ended up having a bonfire for hours.

The War. The war began when a small town started to have problems with crime. There were too many armed people that would get into disputes. The police tried to take them all out and arrest them but it didn't work. The town was forced to make its own decision about the armed problem. They decided to ban all firearms and police had no choice.
The Pizza. The girl loved pizza. She made it every week. This week was no exception. She was having her friends over. She ate tons of pizza and didn't feel hungry.

Bad First Day. Jim was really nervous about starting college. His friends had all been in college before. He studied and ate well the first day. He was relieved to see that all his classes were going well. He felt that he would do fine regardless of the first day.

Icy Road. It was a very cold night when Dan went outside to play. He didn't realize he was too cold until he started to feel sick. He felt miserable and decided to go inside. Afterwards he felt much better. Dan went back out and played on his new ice skate.

Fertility. Maggie thought she was infertile. She went to her doctor to ask about it. The doctor said she could get pregnant if she ate a healthy diet. Maggie bought some supplements to try. The supplements worked and Maggie eventually conceived.

Nerves for the date. Tanya was nervous for her upcoming date with Bob. Bob was a very tall and thin man. Bob also had a big and dark mustache. Tanya hoped her date would like her because she was short and beautiful. She ended up liking Bob because of her hair and mustache.

The bad grades. Jane had to give a presentation at work. She had to memorize and grade a lot of material. She was really stressed out at work. She had trouble remembering the material and grading. Jane had to go home and rest.
Detention. The kid was late to school. He was given a detention. His mom yelled at him. He felt embarrassed. He apologized to his mom.

Far too hot. Tina got out of the pool and got out of the water. She put on her swimsuit and jumped in the pool. She realized it was too hot to jump in it. She called a lifeguard. The lifeguard turned her back to the pool.
A gift she didn't like. I got a gift at a birthday party. I didn't like it at all. My friends got to help me unwrap it. I opened it up. I was thrilled with the gift.

Startled Cat. I walked into the living room and saw a surprised cat. I sat down and asked the cat what was wrong. The cat looked at me and started crying. The cat's owners told me to go away and take her in. I put my head on my couch and enjoyed a snack.

Full Volume. Tim wanted to start a new podcast. He put his computer into download mode and began. After a few minutes he realized he was on a full volume. Tim called the hosts and had to wait 10 minutes. His computer ended up freezing and he couldn't continue.

Back to Ukraine. Last week we took a trip to the Ukraine. We decided to go with a group of friends. We met up with them in a nice restaurant. We drank some good wine and enjoyed the scenery. We got very hungry, so we went to eat there.
Knots. Tommy got out of his car. He found a long rope. He tied it on the top of a tree. He decided to climb a tree. Tommy was very happy.

The broken headphones. Sally was listening to music. Her headphones suddenly stopped working. Sally was so upset. She looked up what the problem was. It turned out to be the batteries in the headphones.

Chicken to Car. Bob's favorite food was chicken to carne. He wanted to try it for the first time. His friend offered him to eat some at her place. He was excited to try it. Unfortunately the chicken was overcooked.

Fish. It was lunch time and Lisa wanted to try something new. She decided to try fish tacos. At first she found them boring. But the flavors and the heat made them so much better. She decided fish tacos were going to be her new favorite.
